0(): ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i skyes rabs kyi 'phreng ba bzhugs so// /
1(): dz+nyA ta kAm+ba l+yA/ dod skad du/
2(): na dang/
3(): skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud/ dam po dang po// bcom
4(): ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyugal phyag 'tshal lo// dpal/
5(): ldan yon tan dam pas yongs bzung bkru shis pa// grags
6(): pa'i gzhir gyur ma rmed shin tu yid du 'ong// thub pa'i sgra tshe sgyu ma'i snod pa rmad byung /
7(): rnams// bdag gi snyan dang gos me tog snyim pas gus par mchod// grags pa'i
8(): mtshan mar gyur pa bzang po 'di rnams kyis// bde bar gshegs gyur lam rnams gang
9(): yin bstan par 'gyur// yid la dad pa med pa rnams kyang dad par 'gyur// chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
10(): gyis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mchog gi spyod pa dam pa'i phyogs tsam gyis// bdag gi snyan dang ga
11(): mnyan du rung bar bya ba'i phyir// lung dang gtsug lag rigs par mi 'gal lam dag gis// de ltar 'jig rten
12(): don 'gyur snyam nas 'di brtsams so// rang don brtson pas gzhan don brtson pa gang yin pa'i// yon tan
13(): sgrub pa bzang po'i rjes su mthun ma gyur// thams cad mkhyen ces brjod pa ma nor gsal bar grag// mnyam med de
14(): bur mkhyen bad+ma dkar po sar ro//
15(): dang chos dang dge 'dun spyi bos 'dud// bcom ldan 'das de sku tshe snga ma la'ang sems can thams cad la rgyu med
16(): par rab tu byams pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang bar bya'o// de yang
17(): 'di skad thos so// bdag cag gi bla ma dkon mchog gsum thA mar rnyed pa/ bsgrubya ba'i yon tan rnams kyis rna ma
18(): mgu bar byas pa yon tan gyi tshogs kyi sa bla mar gyur pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe snga ma'i rtogs
19(): pa brjod pa 'di dgra yongs su bsgrags pa rjes su thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' yi dam bcas pa khyad par can dang mthun
20(): bar gyur pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyod pa la sogs pa shes rab kyis yongs su zin pas skyon
21(): med cing snying rje'i rgyu mthun pa rnams kyis 'jig rten yongs su 'dzin pa na/ rang gi chos las mngon par dga' ba las gyur pa'i gtsang sbra dang / spyod pa dang
22(): ldan pa'i bram ze'i rigs chen po je mtho je mthor gyur pa zhig tu skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur to zhes grag go/ de skyes pa'i las bya ba la sogs pas sbyang ba rim
23(): bzhin du byas shing mngon par mtho bar skyes pa na/ rang bzhin gyis yid gzhungs pa dang mgon skyabs kyi khyad par dang / shes pa ched rgyar 'dzin
24(): pa dang le lo med pas ring po ma thogs par rig pa'i gnas bcwo brgyad dang / bdag gi rigs dang mi 'grel ba'i rgyu rtsal rnams la slob dpon gyi go 'phang thob
25(): par gyur to// rig byed shes la de ni tshangs pa bzhin// rgyal po rnams kyis bkur ba rgyal po bzhin// skye dgu rnams la brgya byin mngon sum bzhin// shes
26(): 'dod rnams la don spyod pa dang 'dra// de skal ba dang ldan zhing yon tan khyad par can du gyur pas/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa'i khyad par rnams
27(): rab tu byung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de blo chos la goms par bsgoms pa dang / rab tu byung ba la 'dris par byas pas/ de la mngon par dga' bar ma gyur to// sngon gyi
28(): spyod pas de blo yongs su dag/ 'dod pa rnams la skyon mang mthong nas ni// khyim na gnas pa nad bzhin yongs spangs nas// nags tshal gnas
29(): shig rab tu brgyan par gyur// de ni der yang chags med de yis su// shes rab yongs su sbyangs shing zhi ba yis// mi yi 'jig rten dam pa'i spyod bral ba// ngan par spyod
30(): la chags pa bzlog pa bzhin// de yis rang bzhin byams pa'i bdag nyid kyis// rnam par brlan pa bzhin du sems mthun zhing // phan tshun gnod pa med pa'i sems gyur
31(): nas// dka' thub can bzhin gcan zad khro bo'ang spyod// spyod pa dag cing dbang po dul ba dang // chog shes ldan zhing snying rje'i yon tan gyis// 'jig rten dag na skye ba
32(): ma 'dris pa'ang // gzhan la de byams bzhin du de la byams// 'dod pa chung la ngan g.yo mi shes shing // rnyed dang grags dang bde la ma chags pas// de ni lha rnams yid
33(): kyang mgu gyur nas// dang zhing gus la rab tu gzhol bar byed// de ni rab tu byung bar mis thos te// de yi yon tan rnams kyis sems drangs nas// gnyen dang yongs
34(): su bzung ba rnam spangs te// dgos sgrub bzhin du de yi slob mar gyur// tshul khrims gtsang sbra dbang po dul ba dang // dran pa mi nyams rab tu dben pa dang // byams
35(): la sogs dang yid nI ting 'dzin la// de ni slob ma rnams la ci nus spyon// de nas bdag nyid chen po de re shig cig na slob ma'i tshogs rnams ni dral cher yongs su rdzogs shing rgya cher gyur/
36(): dge ba'i lam la ni rab tu bkod/ 'jig rten pa rnams ni nges pa'i lam dam pa la btsud/ ngan song gi sgo ni bcad pa bzhin du byas/ bde 'gro'i lam ni lam po che bzhin du byas nas
37(): tshe 'di la bde ba spyad pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe rjes su mthun pa'i slob ma ma pham pa dang 'grogs te/ rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas ri'i sul spyan ljongs shig tu gnas shing spyod do//
38(): de nas ri khrod de na ni// stag mo phru gu 'brangs pa zhig/ phru gu 'brangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis// spyod pa nyams par gyur pa mthong // mig gnyis blta ba gzhan par gyur// bkres//
39(): pas lto ba rab tu rnyong // phru gu bdag gi bu yin yang // kha zas bzhin du blta bar gyur// ma la yid gcugs 'jigs med cing // nu zho 'dod phyir lhags pa la// steg skad nyer nyer
40(): sgra 'byin cing // gzhan gyi bu bzhin spong bar gyur// byang chub sems dpas de mthong nas// brtan yang snying rje'i dbang gyur pas// sa g.yos pa yi ljon shing bzhin// gzhan gyi
41(): sdug bsngal gdungs pas 'dar// bdag gi sdug bsngal chen pos kyang // snying rje'i bdag nyid brtan pa gsal// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal chung ngus kyang // 'dar bar gyur pa de
42(): rmad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtabs shing rings rings skad du smra ba'i tshig rang bzhin khyad par can gsal bar ston pa/ snying rje'i dbang gis tshig 'bru gsal bar
43(): slob ma la smras pa/ bu bu 'khor ba yon tan med la ltos// gcan zan mo 'di ltogs nas su// byams pa'i mtshams las 'das nas ni// bdag gi bu yang za bar 'dod// kye ma bdag
44(): la byams pa 'di// ha cang ma 'os mi bzod do// gang phyir ma yang bdag gi bu// za bar 'dod pa ga la srid// gang phyir 'di 'dra'i las dag kyang // byed par rtsom pa de lta bu'i// bdag la
45(): byams pa'i dgra bo de// 'phel bar byed pa su zhig yod// de bas na stag mo dag dang phru gu rnams ma rung bar ma gyur par 'di bkres pa'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i rgyu gang zhig nas myur du
46(): tshol cig/ bdag kyang 'di'i thub tshod 'di las bzlog pa'i phyir 'bad do// des kyang de mnyan te/ de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes nas/ de'i zas tshol ba la 'bad par gyur to// de nas byang chub
47(): sems dpas slob ma de bsnyad btags te btang nas bsams pa/ bdag gi lus 'di tshang bar yod bzhin du/ ci phyir gzhan las sha ni btsal bar bya// des kyang rnyed dam mi rnyed gtol med
48(): labadag gi dgos pa 'di yang mi 'grub srid// gnyis su na/ bdag med 'jig la snying po med pa'i lus// sdug bsngal dri med rtag tu mi gtsang ba'i// lus kyis gzhan la
49(): phan 'dogs 'gyur ba la// dga' bar mi 'gyur de ni mkhas ma yin// bdag gi bde la chags nas gzhan dag gi/ sdug bsngal yal bar 'dor ba mthu med dam// gzhan dag sdug
50(): bsngal dag la bde ba med// nus pa yod bzhin ci ste yal bar 'dor// nus pa yod bzhin bdag gis yal bor na// gsod pa'i dgra yang sdug bsngal bying ba la// yal bar bor na sdig
51(): pa byas pa bzhin// bdag gi sems ni 'dam bu mes tshig bzhin// de bas lus kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni// g.yang sar lhung la thug pa'i srog yod pas// phru gu gsod las gcan mo bsrung ba dang /
52(): gcan mo las kyang de yi phru gu bsrung // gzhan yang / 'jig rten phan brtson rnams la bstan pa dang // brtson 'grus gzhan la spro ba bskyed pa dang // gtong phod rnams ni dga' ba bskyed pa dang /
53(): skye bo dam pa'i yid ni drang ba dang // bdud kyi sde chen dpa' ni bskong ba dang // sangs rgyas yon tan dga' ba dang ba dang // bdag gi don brtson ngo tsha bskyed pa dang // 'jungs dang 'dod chen can
54(): yang ngo tsha bskyed// theg pa mchog la brten pa dang bskyed cing // gtong ba snyems pa ngo tsha bskyed pa dang // gtong la dga' ba rjes su yi rang rnams// mtho ris lam chen rnam par sbyang phyir/
55(): ro// lus tsam gyis kyang gzhan la phan thogs par// nam zhig 'gyur zhes bdag gis gang bsams pa// smon lam de ni 'bras bu yod par bya// byang chub mchog kyang rab tu nye bar bya/
56(): 'gran phyir ma yin grags pa 'dod phyir min// mtho ris 'dod dang rgyal srid bsgrub phyir min// bdag gi bde ba mchog thob phyir min gyi// gzhan don bsgrub phyir bdag ni
57(): 'di rtsom mo// de bas bdag ni 'di yis dus cig tu// 'jig rten dag la sdug bsngal bde 'byung ba// bsal zhing bsgrub pa rtag tu nus gyur cig/ nyi mas mun bsal sdang 'byung nus
58(): bzhin no// mthong zhing thos sam rjes su dran yang rung // reg gam gtam du brjod par gyur yang rung // rnam pa kun tu 'gro la phan pa ni// bde dang ldan pa rtag tu byed gyur cig/ de ltar gzhan
59(): don bsgrub phyir nges byas nas// srog dang bral yang rab tu dga' 'gyur te// brtan pa'i lha rnams ngo mtshar skye 'gyur bar// bdag gi lus ni de nas bor bar gyur// de nas stag mo de byang chub
60(): sems dpa'i lus bor ba'i sgra de thos shing ngo mtshar skyes nas/ bdag gi phru gu bca' ba btang ste/ de nas mig gnyis kyis bltas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus srog dang bral
61(): ba mthong nas/ de ma thag tu nye bar 'ongs nas bzo' bar brtsams so// de'i 'og tu de'i slob ma des sha ma rnyed par slar 'ongs te/ mkhan po gang na bzhugs snyam nas bltas pa na/
62(): byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus srog dang bral ba stag mo des za zhing 'dug pa mthong ba dang / des de'i spyod pa khyad par can ngo mtshar che bar bzung nas/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyi shugs
63(): btang ste/ de'i yon tan gyi gzhi la smon pa'i tshig tu smra ba bzhin du yid la bsams pa tshig tu smras na legs te/ e ma'o sdug bsngal can la 'di snying rje// bdag nyid che ba bdag gi
64(): bde ma chags// dam pa rnams kyi spyod pa mchog tu byas// gzhan gyi dpal dang grags pa zil gyis mnan// e ma'o rab tu dpa' la 'jigs pa med// yon tan gzhi ldan byams mchog
65(): rnam par brtan// e ma'o yon tan chen pos bdag gi lus// phyag gi gnas kyi khyad par can du byas// rang bzhin zhi ba sa gzhi bzhin du brtan// e ma'o gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa/
66(): e ma'o dpa' ba phun sum tshogs pa 'dis// bdag gi skyon ni rab tu grags par gyur// mgon po 'dis ni mgon dang bcas byas pas// da ni 'gro ba mya ngan bya mi dgos// gzhan gyis pham
67(): du dogs pa'i bdud dag kyang // da ni nges par shugs kyang nar zhes 'byin// yong ye skal ba chen po/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa/ thugs rje shin tu rlabs che ba
68(): snying stobs dpag tu med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i don ji lta ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes smras nas/ de nas des don de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la sbran to// de nas de yi spyod
69(): pas ngo mtshar gyur pa'i slob ma dang // dri za gnod sbyin klu dang sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po rnams// phreng ba na bza' rgyan dang tsan dan phye ma char phab pas// de yi sku gdung rin chen 'dzin pa'i sa gzhi khebs/
70(): par byas// de bas na/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das de sku tshe snga ma la'ang / sems can thams cad la rgyu med par rab tu byams pa'i rang bzhin can// sems can thams cad bdag/
71(): gir gyur pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dang bar bya'o// dad pa bskyed pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de lta bas na de ni bdag
72(): cag gi dad par bya ba'i gnas yin no// zhes de ltar yang sbyar bar bya'o// de ltar chos kyang bya dka' ba mang pos bsgrubs pa yin pa'i phyir rim gro bskyed de chos mnyan par bya'o// de ltar na snying rje ni
73(): gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin zhing / ngo bo nyid khyad par can bsgrub pa'i phyir snying rje'i yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i rgyud las/
74(): rtogs pa brjod pa dang po'o// / bcom ldan 'das des bya dka' ba brgya phrag mang pos bdag cag gi don du/ dam pa'i chos 'di yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir rim grong skyed
75(): de chos mnyan par bya'o// de yang 'di skad thos so// bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ dpag tu med pa'i dus nas goms par byas pas bsod nams kyi las
76(): bsags shing 'dris par byas pa des/ re shig yul shi bi pa rnams kyi rgyal por gyur to zhes grag go/ de byis pa nas rgan pa la bsnyen bkur byed par dga' ba/ dul ba la rjes su dga' ba/
77(): rje rlon la byams pa/ rang bzhin gyis yid gzhungs pas/ rig pa du ma rtogs pas blo rgya che ba/ spro ba dang / gsang tshig dang / gzi byin gyi mthu dang / skal ba phun sum tshogs pas skye dgu rnams
78(): bdag gi bu bzhin du sbyong bar gyur to// de la 'khor gsum rjes mthun yon tan tshogs// phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin du gnas par gyur// dngos po thams cad yongs su rdzogs gyur cing // 'gag
79(): zhing 'khrug pas mdzes pa med ma gyur// ma dul 'phyar ba rnams la 'phyas 'gyur ba// blun po rnams ni rab tu phung byed pa// bdag nyid chung ngu rnams ni myos 'gyur gang // dpal de de la ming ni don bzhin
80(): 'gyur// rang bzhin rgya che snying rje'i yon tan ldan// rgyal po de ni nor la dbang yod phyir// phongs pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i don 'grub pas// de zub mi gnag bzhin bzangs mthong bas dga'// de nas
81(): rgyal po de sbyin pa la dga' bas/ grong khyer gyi khor khor yug tu sbyin pa'i khang pa nor dang / 'bru dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa brtsig tu bcug nas/ bdag gi bdag nyid che ba dang rjes
82(): su mthun pa/ re ba ji lta ba bzhin du song ba/ gus pa dang bcas pas yid dga' bar byed pa/ dus bzhin du 'byor pas yid du 'ong ba'i sbyin pa'i char rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi sprin bzhin du phab par gyur
83(): te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ mal cha dang / stan dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / gser dang
84(): dngul la sogs pa 'dod pa rnams la de dag char bzhin du phab po// de nas rgyal po de'i sbyin ba rlabs po che thos nas/ phyogs tha dad pa'i yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams la mtshan
85(): che zhing snying dga' bar gyur te yul der lhags so// mi yul kun tu yid kyis brtags na yang // gzhan du blang ba'i skabs ni ma rnyed nas// phongs pa rnams ni dga' zhing der lhags pa// nags
86(): tshal glang po mtsho chen ngogs lpags bzhin// de nas rgyal po de skye bo slong ba thob tu re bas yid dga' bar gyur pa// 'gron po'i chas su zhugs pas mi sdug par gyur pa rnams so so nas lhags pa dang /
87(): skye bo mdza' bshes byas nas 'ongs pa dag/ mthong bar gyur nas dga' ba'i mig bgrang bzhin// slong ba'i tshig ni gtam snyan thos bzhin dga'// byin nas dga' ba slong ba bas kyang lhag/ sbyin pa
88(): las byung de yi grags pa'i dri// phongs pa'i tshig gi rlung gis bsgrags pa dag/ rgyal po gzhan gyi grags pa med byas pa// spos kyi glang pos glang po gzhan gyi bzhin// de nas re shig cig rgyal po
89(): de sbyin gtong gi khang pa rnams nyul du song song ba dang / phongs pa rnams re ba bskongs pas/ slong ba'i skye bo 'du ba nyung bar mthong nas/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams mi 'phel bar gyur pas mgu bar ma gyur
90(): to// de la brten nas phongs pa tshim par gyur// sbyin la dpa' ba de ni snying mchim// phongs pa rnams kyis slong ba'i tshad dag gis// de yi sbyin pa'i tshad la thub ma gyur// des bsams pa/
91(): phongs pa rnams 'dzem pa med cing bag btang ste/ bdag gi lus skyong ba yod pa'i skyes bu dam pa yA rabs de dag re skyid/ ngas nyon mongs pa phongs pa rnams tshig rtsub pos bsdigs te
92(): bskrad pa bzhin du nor tsam la'ang bag brkyang ste/ slong ma phod par gyur to snyam mo// de nas rgyal po'i sbyin pa rlabs po che// bdag gi lus la'ang rab tu ma chags par// sbyin par bya ba'i rnam
93(): rtog de rig nas// bud med khyo la gdungs bzhin sa g.yos so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sa g.yos pas// ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che'i 'od gsal ba g.yos par gyur pa dang / 'di
94(): ci zhig sam du rtog pa skyes so// rgyal po de'i rnam par rtog pa khyad par can 'di las sa g.yos par gyur par rig nas/ sems la ya mtshan chen por gyur te bsams pa/ sbyin la rab tu dga'
95(): ba'i yid kyis su// 'di ni rgyal pos kyi nar rnam brtags sam// bdag gi lus ni nges par sbyin byas nas// 'on te snying nas 'bad de bsams pa yin// de bas na 'di re shig brtag par bya'o//
96(): snyam mo// de nas rgyal po de blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor te 'khor gyi nang na 'dug cing / phongs pa rnams la 'os 'os su/ gang ci 'dod ces bos te/ nor bu rin po che dang / gser dang
97(): dngul dang / nor gyi tshogs rnams ni phyung ste/ dkor gyi bla rnams kyis spyan byas/ gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i gos kyi snod rnams ni kha phye/ bzhon pa dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
98(): drangs pa'i shing rta'i khyad par bzang po rnams ni bsogs/ skye bo phongs pa rnams ni so so nas lpags pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze rgan po long ba zhig gi
99(): gzugs su bsgyur nas/ rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'ongs par gyur to// de nas rgyal po de snying rje dang byams pas bsgos pa'i lta ba brtan zhing / gsal la zhi bas bsu ba bzhin 'khyud pa bzhin du bltas/
100(): pa dang / rgyal po'i 'khor rnams kyis ci 'dod ces dris pa na/ mi'i bdag po dang nye bar 'ongs nas/ rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i tshig gis shis pa brjod de/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so//
101(): sa bdag dam pa khyod kyi spyan 'tshal phyir// rgan po ring nas mi mthong bzhin du mchis// pad+ma'i spyan mnga' spyan ni gcig pus kyang // 'jig rten bdag po 'jig rten bgyi ba 'grub// de nas byang chub sems/
102(): dpa' yid la bsams shing smon pa rab tu grub pas/ rab tu dga' zhing spro bar gyur te/ ci bram ze 'dis 'di bden par smras sam/ 'on te 'di lta bu'i rtog pa la goms pas/ bdag nyid kyis
103(): 'di ltar zin snyam du rtog pa skyes nas/ yid la mig slong ba'i tshig sman pa nyan par 'dod de/ mig slong ba de la smras pa/ bram ze'i gtso bo nga la mig slong bar// su yis bstan nas khyod ni 'di ru
104(): 'ongs/ mig ni rab tu btang dka' zhes grags pa'i// srid pa su zhig nga la med par 'gyur// de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bsgyur ba'i brgya byin des/ rgyal po de'i bsam pa ri gnas smras pa
105(): brgya byi 'dra ba brgya byin gyis bstan nas// khyod la spyan slong slad du 'dir mchis so// de yi srid dang bdag gi re bdag/ spyar stsal bas ni 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ras rgyal po de brgya byin smos pas
106(): lha'i mthus bram ze 'di gdon mi za bar cho ga 'dis mig dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i tshig gsal bas de la 'di skad ces smras so// yid la re ba gang gis 'dir
107(): 'ongs pa'i// bram ze khyod kyi re ba de ngas bskang // nga yi mig ni ya gcig 'dod pa la// khyod la mig ni gnyis ka ngas sbyin gyis// des khyod ut+pal rgyas pa'i mig gis gdong brgyan nas/
108(): ci ge de 'di yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes// rnam rtog g.yeng bas de 'di yin zhes ngo mtshar gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas su 'gro ba mthong bar song // de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams mig sbyin par
109(): rtsol bar rig nas/ brtabs pa dang bcas pa'i shugs kyis skrag pas gdungs pa'i yid du gyur nas/ rgyal po la smras pa/ sbyin pa la dgyes ches nas mi rigs pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba mi brtag
110(): paralha de ltar mi mdzad du gsol/ spyan stsal ba mi rigs so// bram ze 'di ni gcig pu'i phyir// bdag cag thams cad mi 'dor gsol// skye dgu bde bar bskyed pa rnams// mya ngan shugs/
111(): kyis mi sreg gsol// dpal chen bskyed par 'gyur ba'i nor rnams dang // dpal dang ldan pa'i rin chen pa gzhon dang // dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta sgo la// glang po dregs pa gzi ldan
112(): 'gying bstsol// rkang gdub 'khrol ba'i sgra rnams grag pa yis// khang pa dus rnams kun tu bde ldan pa// ston ka'i sprin pas rab tu dkar ba stsol// 'gro ba'i mig
113(): gcig nyid kyi sman ma stsa la// gzhan yang rgyal po chen po re shig dgengs su gsol/ gzhan gyi mig gzhan la ji ltar sbyar du rung / de ste 'di lnga'i mthu zhig lags na/ khyod kyi spyan la ltos ci/
114(): 'tshal lha gzhan yang / gzhan gyi 'byor pa dbang byed pa// mig gis dbul la ci zhig bgyi// de bas dkor las sul du gsol// lha gcig thub tshod mi mdzad gsol// de nas rgyal po
115(): des blon po de rnams la byams pa'i tshig 'jam pos smras pa/ gang zhig sbyin zhes smras nas ni// mi sbyin pa yi blo skyes pa// de ni 'dod pa'i zhags pa yis// bdag nyid slar ni 'ching bar byed// sbyin
116(): no zhes ni khas blangs nas// gang zhig yid la gzhan sems pa// ser sna ma ngas blo can des// de las sdig che gang zhig yod// sbyin no zhes ni khas blangs pas// phongs pa'i re ba brtan byas/
117(): nas/ bslu ba'i tshig ni rtsub po de'i// sbyin pas bsab pa ci yang med// gang yang khyod na re/ de lha'i mthu nyid kyis/ 'di yi mig yod par ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhes zer ba de yang nyon cig
118(): gcig gis ni 'grub pa yi// 'bras bu gang yang yod ma yin// lha rnams kyis ni byas pa yang // rgyu rkyen gzhan la ltos pa yod// de bas nang sbyin pa chen po byed pa la/ khyed kyis gegs bya ba mi
119(): rigs so// sngon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po rgyal sogs pa stsal bar rigs kyi/ nyid kyi spyan ni stsal bar mi rigs so zhes bdag cag gis sbyar gsol ba lag/
120(): te/ de bas na bdag cag lha ba shul ma lags par gshegs su mi gsel lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang zhig slong ba de nyid sbyin par bya// mi 'dod pa ni byin yang dga' mi 'gyur// dus
121(): khyer ba la chu yis ci zhig bya// de bas blangs pa'i don ni 'di la sbyin// de nas rgyal po de'i blon po chen po rab tu yid bcugs shing / 'dris pa zhig byams pa'i shugs kyis zhes btang ste rgyal po de la
122(): smras pa/ kye cung zhig bzhes shig/ la las dka' thub ting 'dzin cho ga chen pos gang zhig thob 'gyur zhing // gang la brten nas mchod sbyin chen po mang pos grags dang mtho ris thob// brgya byin
123(): lings spyod la yang 'gran pa'i rgyal srid thob pa de spangs nas// ci zhig mthong nas khyod kyis mig sbyin cho ga 'di ni su las thos// mchod sbyin byas pas sum cu rtsa gsum nye// grags pas kun tu
124(): rab tu gsal gyur cing // mi dbang gtsug gi 'od kyis rkang brgyan pa// ci zhig 'dod phyir mig ni sbyin par byed// de nas rgyal po des blon po de la byams pa dang bcas pa'i tshig gis smras pa/
125(): 'bad 'di ni sa kun 'thob phyir min// mtho ris thar pa grags pa 'thob phyir min// slong ba 'di ni don med mi 'gyur zhing // 'jig rten skyab phyir nga ni 'di ltar 'bad// de nas rgyal po des me tog
126(): ut+pal mthing ga'i 'dab ma ltar mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i mig la gcig sman dpyad las byung ba bzhin du/ dal bus ma snang dar byung ste/ rab tu dga' bzhin du mig slong ba la/
127(): byin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ ci nas kyang mig de'i mig tu gnas par gyur pa/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa des mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byas so//
128(): nas mig ya gcig phye ste slong ba la bltas pa dang / rgyal po de snying rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ mig ya gcig kyang de la byin no// de nas rgyal po de yis mig byin nas// pad+ma med pa pad+ma'i mtsho 'dra
129(): gdong // gzhan la med pa'i rab tu dga' bar gyur// bram ze'ang mig dang ldan par 'khor gyis mthong // rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang po brang 'khor rnams kyang // mya ngan mchi mas sa gzhi
130(): thams cad chag chag btag/ rgyal po rdzogs pa'i byang chub blo brtan mthong nas ni// brgya byin de yang ngo mtshar che zhing rab tu dga'// de nas brgya byin ngo mtshar chen pos sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas/
131(): 'di snyam du sems so// e ma'o brtan zhing snying stobs che// e ma'o sems can phan 'dogs pa// las 'di mngon sum gsal gyur kyang // the tshom za bar gyur pa 'dra// de bas na ngo mtshar
132(): che ba'i sems can 'di yun ring du 'di ltar nyon mongs su gzhug par mi rigs kyis/ thabs kyis 'di'i mig slar skye bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po de rim gyis mig gi rma ni sos/
133(): btsun mo'i 'khor dang po zang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyi mya ngan ni bsrabs shing sangs nas/ rab tu dben pa 'dod pa'i phyir rdzing bu'i 'gram na me tog gi ljid kyis non pa'i shing bzang po stug po yod pa/
134(): bser bu bsil zhing bde la bsung zhim po'i ngad ldang ba/ dung ba mang po sgra 'byin pa zhig tu skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug 'dug pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin mdun du 'ongs so// de nas
135(): rgyal pos 'di su zhes dris pa dang / smras pa/ nga ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin yin te/ khyod kyi drung du 'ongs so// gshegs pa legs so ci bzhed pa bka' stsal du gsol zhes zhe sa dang bcas
136(): par smras pa dang / rgyal po la'ang smras pa/ rgyal po drang srong ci 'dod pa'i mchog de slongs shig/ de nas rgyal po de sbyin pa la goms kyis/ 'jungs shing slong ba la mgoms pa'i phyir/
137(): brtan pas ngo mtshar mi che zhing / rlabs can du smras pa/ brgya byin bdag ni nor mang zhing // dmag tshogs che la mthu dang ldan// da ni long bar gyur pas dag/ 'chi ba 'ba' zhig mngon par
138(): 'dod// gzhan yang / slong ba rnams ni yid la re ba kun// yongs su bskangs pas rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing // legs par blta ba'i bzhin rnams mi mthong bas// de phyir bzang po bdag ni
139(): 'chi bar dga'// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa rnams 'di lta bu myong bar gyur gyis de snyam du ma sems shig/ 'on kyang re shig khyed la ngas 'dri'o// slong ba rnams kyis 'di lta'i
140(): gnas skabs rgyur byas na// da ni de la khyod kyi yid ni ci snyam sems// ci nas yid ni rab tu ches par 'gyur ba ru// de ni gsang ba med par rab tu smra bar gyis// rgyal
141(): ngos smras pa/ bdag ngom du gzhug ber de tsam du khyed la ci ched che/ 'on kyang lha'i dbang po gsan du gsol// de tshe dang ni da lta'i slong rnams kyis// srung zhes nges par smra ba'i tshig rnams la/
142(): shis pa brjod pa bzhin du bdag dga' na// bdag gi mig ni ya gcig mthong bar shog/ de nas rgyal po de'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang / bsod nams spel ba'i khyad par gyis/ tshig
143(): de skad spras ma thag tu/ me tog ut+pal mthing ga'i dbus rin po che an da rnyil gyis spras pa 'dra ba'i mig ya gcig mthong bar gyur to// ya mtshan che ba'i mig de mthong bar gyur nas/ rgyal po de
144(): sems rab tu dga' bas yang brgya byin la smras pa/ gang yang bdag la ya gcig mig bslangs na// de la bdag gis mig gnyis dga' bzhin byin// dga' bzhin spro la rtse gcig sems
145(): gyur na// ya gcig mig kyang bdag la yod par shog/ de nas de skad smras ma thag tu rgyal po de'i mig ya gcig kyang mig snga ma dang 'gran pa bzhin du yod par gyur to// de nas ri dang bcas pa'i
146(): sa chen g.yos// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyang dus las 'das te byung // lha rnams kyis ni rnga bo che dag kyang // zab cing snyan pa'i sgra chen sgrogs par gyur// phyogs rnams kun kyang dang zhing gsal bar/
147(): snang ston ka'i dus bzhin zla ba gsal gyur cing // tsan dan phye mas bsgos pa'i me tog rnams// nam mkha'i nang nas lding zhing 'bab par gyur// lnga yi bu mo'i 'khor bcas lha rnams
148(): kyang // ya mtshan che ba'i mig dgrang der lcags gyur// bser bu yid du 'ong ba bde ba ldang // 'gro ba rnams kyi yid ni dga' bar gyur// 'byung po mthu chen ngo mtshar gyur pa rnams// yid
149(): ni rab tu dga' bas khyab gyur nas// rgyal po spyod mchog bstod pa'i gzhi brjod pa// snyan pa'i tshig rnams kun tu grags par gyur// e ma'o rlabs che e ma'o snying rje che// 'di yi sem
150(): ni ji ltar rnam dag ltos// e ma'o bdag gi bde la sems ma chags// brtan zhing dpa' mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma'i spyan ni dpal ldan slar rgyas pas// khyod kyi 'gro ba mgon
151(): bcas bgyis pa legs// e ma'o bsod nams tshogs ni don yod pa// ring zhig lon nas khyod kyi byin gyis rgyal// de nas brgya byin gyis legs so legs so zhes bya bas de mgu bar byas
152(): nas yang smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi bsam pa dag pa ni// nga yis snga nas mi shes ma yin te// rgyal po khyod kyi mig 'di gnyis// de ltar khyod la byin pas na// dpag tshad brgya ni khor lug tu/
153(): drag ri rnams kyis bar bcad kyang // khyod kyi mig ni 'di gnyis kyis/ thogs pa med par mthong bar 'gyur// zhes smras nas brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
154(): dpa' blon po chen po rnams dang / rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams ya mtshan che zhing sems rab tu dga' bar gyur pa'i mig gis blta
155(): zhing / bram ze rnams kyis kyang rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba shis pa brjod pa'i tshig smra bas mngon par dga' bar byas te/ pho brang dam pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs btsugs pa
156(): mngon par mtho ba'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par phyin nas/ 'khor gyi nang du 'dug ste/ dga' bar blta ba'i phyir lhags pa'i blon po chen po la sogs pa bram ze dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi
157(): ya rabs rnams la/ de ltar bdag gis nyams su myong ba'i chos bshad do// rab tu sbyin pa'i bsod nams las gyur pa'i// lha yi mthu ldan nga yi mig mthong nas// phongs pa rnams
158(): ni nor gyis mgu bya la// 'jig rten na ni su zhig sgom pa lhod// dpag tshad brgya ni tshun chad du// zag ri mang pos par bcad kyang // shin tu ring na gnas pa yi// blta bar bya ba
159(): gsal bar mthong // gang phyir mi yi mig ni 'di byin nas// mi las 'das pa'i lha mig bdag gis thob// gzhan la brtse zhing dul ba las byung ba'i// sbyin las gzhan pa'i mngon
160(): mtho'i thabs gang yod// shi bi ba rnams de ltar rig byas nas// sgyid dang smad pas nor rnams don yod byos// 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan la'adi 'di nyid ni// grags pa che ba'i bde ba
161(): 'byung ba'i lam// 'jig rten phan phyir byin pa gang yin pa// snying po med pa'i nor yang snying po yod// sbyin pa byas na gter dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ma byin na ni shin tu chud zos 'gyur//
162(): ltar bcom ldan 'das des bdag cag gi phyir// bya dka' ba mang pos dam pa'i chos 'di bsgrubs pa yin pas/ rim gro bskyed de chos mnyan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba
163(): nyid dang / snga ma bzhin du snying rje'i yon tan bsngags pa dang / tshe 'di nyid la bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mthong bar 'gyur ba la yang brjod par bya'o// de ltar rim gro bskyed de bsod nams
164(): bsags pa ni/ bdag gi mthu chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i me tog dang grags pa'i rgyun chags pa yid du 'ong ba tshe 'di nyid la bstan pa yin no// yul shi bi pa'i rgyal por skyes pa'i rabs te gnyis
165(): pa'o// sems rab tu dang ba las byung ba dang snod khyad par can la byin pa'i sbyin pa ni/ rnam par smin pa che ba'i phyir chung zhes bya ba gang yang med do// de yang 'di
166(): skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe// yul ko sa la'i bdag por gyur to zhes grag go// de yang spro ba dang / gsang tshig dang / mthu dang
167(): nus pa phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa rgyal po'i yon tan rnams mchog tu gyur du zin kyang skal ba phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan bzang pos 'byor pa lhag par gyur te// skal ba phun sum
168(): tshogs brgyan pas// de yi yon tan lhag par gsal// ston ka'i dpal ni gsal gyur pa'i// zla ba'i 'od zer gsal ba bzhin// de'i dgra dregs pa rnams kyang btang //
169(): de la brtan pa rnams kyang chags// khros dang byams pa'i rjes 'brang dpal// rgyal po gzhan la de ltar gyur// de ni chos kyi bdag nyid gyur pas na// gzhan la gnod pa'i sems gdug med
170(): par gyur// de yi dpal ni dgra la mi 'gro bas// 'bangs kyang de la glo ba nye bar gyur// de bdag gi tshe snga ma 'das pa rjes su dran par gyur to// de rjes su dran par gyur pas rab tu skyo bar
171(): gyur nas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phongs pa dang / slong ba rnams la bde ba'i rgyu dang / gzhir gyur pa'i sbyin pa khyad par can byin par gyur to// tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ngan pa mi yin
172(): pa dang / gso sbyong dang / nges par gnas pa dag kyang dus mtshams kyi nyin par yang dag par len to// rgyal po'i 'khor dang / bdag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bsod nams kyi mthu
173(): bsgrags pa dang / 'jig rten pa rnams legs pa la 'god par 'dod pas/ dad pa'i sems kyis don nges pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis yang dang yang du smra'o// bde bar gshegs
174(): la bkur sti byas pa chung ngu yang // 'bras bu 'byor pa chung ngu med ces sngon thos kyis// zan dron khengs pa rtsub po lan tshwa med pa yi// 'bras bu 'byor pa chen po 'di ltar gyur la ltos/
175(): shing rta sna tshogs na dang glang po 'gying ba dang // bdag gi dmag tshogs chen po 'di dang sa chen 'di// nor mang dngal yang rjes chags btsun mo rgya che ldan// zar rngon tshangs gcig 'bras bu grub pa/
176(): bzang po ltos// blon po chen po rnams dang / bram ze rgan po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi stod rims rnams yid la ngo mtshar che bar gyur kyang rgyal po chen po ci la dgongs te/ tshigs su
177(): bcad pa 'di gnyis rtag tu gsung zhes de la slar zhu ma nus so// de nas rgyal po de'i btsun mo gnang chen spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhig ngo mtshar skyes nas/ gtam gleng ba'i skabs su bab ste/
178(): 'khor gyi nang du de la zhus pa/ mi'i dbang po nges par gsung ba ni// thugs la dgongs pa'i dgyes pa zhal du byung // khyod kyis de skad gsungs pa bdag gi sems// de mtshar che bas rab tu
179(): g.yengs par gyur// skye bo 'di yis de ni thos rung na// rgyal po ci phyir gsungs pa bka' stsal gsol// gsang na de skad gar yang mi bsgrags te// de bas bdag gis bsgrags par zhus pa
180(): lags// de nas rgyal po de rab tu dga' zhing rab tu byams pa'i lta bas btsun mo la bltas te/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin mdangs dang ldan pas smras pa/ don dang rgyu mtshan ma phye bar// nga yis smras pa 'di
181(): thos nas// 'dir ni khyod ni 'ba' zhig tu// ngo mtshar cher 'gyur yid g.yos min// blon po chen po tshogs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang // yid ni ngo mtshar chen pos rab tu g.yos par gyur// nga/
182(): yi pho brang 'khor dang btsun mor bcas pa yang // gang phyir nga yis de skad smras pa mnyan par gyis// gnyid las sad pa bzhin du skye ba ngas dran pas// tshul dang ldan/
183(): kyang nor tsam gyis ni mtho ba la// las kyis mgu bar byas nas dman chos 'tsho ba yi// gla mi zhig tu grong khyer 'dir ning gyur to// gzhan gyis brnyas shing ngal la dman pa'i gla de yang /
184(): skyabs su re zhing mi tshor dogs nas de la zhugs// dge sbyong bzhi zhig bsod nams phyir lhags mthong bar gyur// dbang po dul zhing dge sbyong dpal gyis rjes 'brangs bzhin// dang zhing 'jam/
185(): pa'i yid kyis de la phyag byas nas// zan dron tsam zhig bdag gis khyim du gus par byin de yi myu gu tsam zhig byung 'dra 'di yin te// rgyal po gzhan gyi gtsug gis nga yi zhabs la gtugs// /
186(): nga yis de la bsams nas ni// lha mo khyod la smras pa yin// bsod nams kyis ni ngoms mi myong // dgra bcom mthong bas mi ngoms so// de nas lha mo de dga' zhing ya mtshan che ba'i mig dgrang
187(): nas rgyal po la rab tu gus par blta zhing smras pa/ mngon par mtho ba'i khyad par 'di lta bu ni bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa lags par gda'o// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar bsod nams mdzad
188(): pa la gus pa ni/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur pa'i slad du'o// de bas na 'di ltar dngos sdig mi mdzad pa dang / skye dgu rnams la ba bzhin du yongs su skyong ba legs par mdzad pa
189(): dang bsod nams kyi yon tan legs par bsgrub pa la mngon par phyogs pa legs so// grags dang dpal dang sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pas 'bar// bka' lung gnyen po rgyal po gzhan gyi/
190(): spyi bos nod// bser ma langs pas rlabs bskyod rgya mtsho'i gos gyon pa'i// chos kyi tshul bzhin sa chen yun ring skyong bar gyur// rgyal pos spras pa/ lha mo de de ltar ga la zhig ma yin/ mtshan
191(): ma bzang pos mngon par mtshon pa legs pa'i lam// de nyid la ni da rung bdag gis bsten par bya// 'jig rten pa ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu thos nas ster// nga bdag nyams su myong na ci phyir sbyin mi bya/
192(): de nas rgyal po des/ lha mo bzhin du dpal 'bar ba'i lha mo la rab tu byams pas bltas nas/ dpal phun sum tshogs pa la sems zhen pas yang smras pa/ skar ma'i nang na zla ba bzhin// bud med/
193(): nang na rnam par mdzes// shin tu yang 'ong 'byung ba'i las// dge ldan khyod kyis ci zhig byas// lha mos smras pa/ lha bdag gis kyang tshe snga ma la cung zad cig bgyis pa rjes su dran no// de
194(): smros shig smros shig ces rgyal pos dris pa dang / smras pa/ byis pa'i dus na myong ba de ni rjes dran bzhin// bdag ni bran mo bgyid pa'i tshe na zan tshangs gcig/ thub pa zag pa zad la gus par phul
195(): ba yis// de tshe gnyid kyis log pa 'dir ni sad pa bzhin// mi rje lngas mdzad dge ba de ni bdag gis dran// de yis bdag ni sa dang bcas pa'i mgon khyod gyur// zag pa zad la byas pa chung
196(): ba gang yang med// ji ltar thub pas bka' stsal bzhin du khyod kyis gsungs// de nas rgyal po des bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mthong bas bsod nams la gus pa bskyed pa sem
197(): rab tu dang bar gyur pa'i 'khor la ya mtshan rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas nges pa 'di 'dra ba cung zad cig rjes su bstan to// dge ba mi che bas kyang rnam smin rgya che dpal 'di mthong nas su// sbyin dang tshul
198(): khrims spyod la bsod nams bya la mi 'bad su zhig yod// nor gyis chog par yod kyang ser sna'i mun pas gang zhig blo bsgribs na// sbyin pas grags pa thob par mi byed mi de bltar mi rung // dbang med
199(): par ni gang zhig btang dgos de bzhin su la'ang phan mi thogs// nor de rigs par btang na gal te yon tan gang zhig 'thob 'gyur na// yon tan nyams ni yod bzhin de la su zhig ser sna'i lam la
200(): brten// sbyin pa las byung yon tan dga' la sogs pa sna tshogs grags dang ldan// sbyin pa zhes bya gter chen rjes 'gro rkun po la sogs thun mong min// sbyin pa 'dod dang ser sna'i skyon gyi rdul
201(): can sems ni sbyong bar byed// sbyin pas 'khor ba'i lam bgrod ngal ba med par bzhon pa bde ba yin// sbyin pa bde ba mang po 'grub cing grogs po bzang po'i mchog yin no// 'byor pa phun sum
202(): tshogs pa 'am bka' lung gnyen po'i yon tan nam// sum cu rtsa gsum po brang gnas sam gzugs bzang yon tan nam// gang zhig 'dod pa de dag thams cad sbyin pas thob par 'gyur// de ltar nges
203(): don gtan la phab na sbyin pa su mi byed// sbyin pas nor gyi snying po len par gsungs// sbyin pa dbang phyug rnams kyi rgyu zhes gsungs// sbyin pa dpal ldan skye bo mchog gi tshul// shes rab chung
204(): dus rdul tsam sbyin mi nus// de nas 'khor de dag gis rgyal po de'i tshig gzung du rung ba la// rab tu gus shing dga' bar byas nas/ sbyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bsgrub pa la mngon du
205(): phyogs par gyur to// de bas na de ltar sems rab tu dang ba las byung ba dang / snod khyad par can la byin pa ni rnam par smin pa che ba'i phyir sbyin pa chung zhes bya ba gang yang med do// de bas na sems
206(): rab tu dang ngas bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin na/ bdag kyang de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa'am/ de bas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa thob par
207(): 'gyur ba ring po mi thogs so snyam du rab tu bsams te dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// zan dron tshangs pa phul bar skyes pa'i rabs te gsum pa'o// / bam po gnyis pa/
208(): skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag brlag par gyur pa la yang mi 'dzem par sbyin pa byin par byed na/ bde bar 'dug pa lta su zhig sbyin par mi byed/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan
209(): 'das 'di sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ skal ba khyad par can dang ldan pa yon tan dang spro ba phun sum tshogs pas/ nor phur sum tshogs pa dang ni ldan/ spyod tshul mi mthun pa med
210(): pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas 'jig rten pa rnams kyis bkur sti bya ba'i gnas su ni gyur/ cho rigs btsun pa dang ni ldan/ rig pa dang rgyu rtsal gyi khyad par rnam pa du/
211(): ma khong du chud pas/ blo rab tu dri ma med par ni gyur/ yon tan che bas rgyal pos ni bkur sti byas/ rab tu sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas/ 'dor pa rnams ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang thun mong/
212(): du spyod pa'i tshong dpon zhig tu gyur to zhes grag go// phongs pa rnams ni dga' gyur pas// phan tshun kun tu bsgrags pa ni// de ming sbyin la dpa' bzhis// phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par gyur//
213(): sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i rnam rtog pa// yid la sems pa phongs pa rnams las med// de yi sbyin pa'i mthu chen grags par gyur// phongs pa rnams ni yid ches spobs shing slong // de ni bdag//
214(): gi bde phyir nor mi sbeng // 'gran pa dang ni chags pas zil mnon min// de ni phongs pa'i sdug bsngal bzod mi nus// de bas med ces smra ba sbas par gyur// de nas re shig cig sems dpa'
215(): chen po de zas kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ khrus byas byug spos kyis byugs pa dang / g.yo mkhan mkhas pas g.yos pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba bsung dang ro dang 'jam pa la sogs pa'i yon tan
216(): dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs bshams pa dang / rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa'i bud shing thams cad bsregs pa/ de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par 'phel bar 'dod pa zhig de'i khyim du bsod
217(): snyoms kyi phyir 'ongs so// 'ongs nas kyang sgo lang na sdod cing 'dug go// ngogs med mi g.yo brtan zhing zhi ba yi// mig gis sA la gnya' shing gang du blta// rab tu bar gyur cing der
218(): sdod// de lag pad+ma'i mchog ni lhung bzed thogs// de nas bdud sdig can byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa de mi bzod pas/ de la gegs bya ba'i phyir btsun pa de dang
219(): bar sgo gnyis kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i nang na me chen po 'bar ba/ zabs su mi 'greng du ma yod pa rab tu zab pa/ mthong na rab tu 'jigs pa/ 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra grag pa/ skye bo
220(): mang po rnam par g.yo bas gang ba zhig mngon par sprul to// de nas byang chub sems dpas rang sangs rgyas bsod snyoms la gshegs par mthong nas/ chung ma la bdag nyid kyis 'phags pa la
221(): bsod snyoms phul cig ces smras so// des de ltar mnyan te de bzhin bgyi'o zhes smras nas bza' ba dang bca' ba bzang po khyer nas song song ba las/ sems can dmyal ba mthong ba dang / 'jig
222(): shing skrag pa'i mig rig rig por gyur te/ sgo drung nas slar log pa dang / 'di ci nyis zhes khyim thabs kyis dris so// de brtabs pas skad 'gags nas/ de la smra yang de'u ra nus te smras so//
223(): de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ e ma'o 'phags pa 'di bdag gi khyim nas bsod snyoms ma bzhes par slar bzhud na/ ga la rung snyam nas des smras pa mnyan par/ rings rings ltar/
224(): bza' ba dang bca' ba bzang po bdag nyid kyis khyer te mthu chen po de la bsod snyoms dngul ba'i phyir sgo khang gi drung du phyin pa dang / bar der sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu
225(): 'jigs pa de mthong bar gyur to// de nas 'di ci zhig yin snyam du rnam par rtog pa skyes pa dang / bdud sdig can khang pa'i ngos kyi rtsig pa'i nang nas byung ste/ lha'i lus ya mtshan che ba mngon sum du bstan
226(): nas bar snang la gnas te/ phan par 'dod pa bzhin du gsal bar smras pa/ kye khyim bdag sems can dmyal ba chen po 'di ni 'bod sgrogs zhes bya ba yin no// phongs pas bsngags pa'i tshig gi/
227(): bslus nas ni// sbyin la zhugs pas gang gis nor chud gsan// de dag lo ni stong phrag du mar yang // 'di na gnas 'gyur dbyung bar shin tu dka'// nor ni 'khor gsum khyad par rgyu yin te/
228(): de med byas na su yis chos mi brlag/ nor chud gsan pas chos ni brlag 'gyur na// ci phyir sems can dmyal bar gnas mi 'gyur// sbyin pa'i phyir ni chos kyi rtsar gyur pa'i// nor ni khyed kyis chung
229(): gsan sdig byas pas// dmyal ba'i gshed po mi zad 'bar ba'i lce// de phyir khyod ni za bar 'dir 'ongs so// de bas blo ni sbyin las bzlog na legs// 'on kyang 'phral du lhung bar khyod mi
230(): 'gyur// snying rjer ngu zhing 'dre ldog byed pa yi// gtong ba 'di dang lhan cig khyod ma 'grogs// sbyin pa tshul bzhin mi byed len pa po'i// skye bo rnams ni lha yul 'gro bar 'gyur// de bas mtho
231(): ris lam sgrib btang nas ni// sbyin la brtson la gnas par mi bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ 'di skad zer ba'i bdag nyid ngan pa 'di ni// bdag sbyin pa byed pa de la nges
232(): par gegs byed pa yin no snyam nas/ bdag gi snying stobs kyi khar bor te brtan par byas nas/ tshig 'jam pos de la rgyun mi 'chad par 'di skad ces smras par nges so// bdag cag 'dra la phan
233(): par dgongs nas ni// khyod kyis 'phags pa'i lam 'di rnams bstan pa// gzhan la phan 'dogs mkhas pa'i spyod pa can// lha rnams kyis ni de ltar bgyi ba'i rigs// nyes pa byung ba'i sngon
234(): nam 'og tu yang // zhi ba'i lam der 'chi bar rab tu rigs// nad la cho ga spyad pa nongs pa yis// tshabs tshor gyur la dpyad kyis sman mi thogs// sbyin la zhugs pa bdag gi sdug bsngal
235(): 'dis/ dpyad kyis smon par rab tu mi 'gyur dogs// khyod kyis phan par bstan pa'ang mi mnyan par// bdag gi sems ni sbyin las slar mi ldog/ sbyin las sdig par 'gyur zhes gang /
236(): smras shing // nor yang chos kyi rgyu yin zhes bgyi ba// sbyin pa ma gtogs chos lam gzhan yod pa 'am// de ni gter sbas chos kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'am// 'on te rkun pos ngo mthon brog gyur
237(): gtam// 'od pas khyer te mi snang gyur pa 'am// me yis tshig na bsod nams thob 'gyur bar// mi yi blos ni rtogs par mi nus so// nor sbyin pas ni dmyal bar 'gro ba dang /
238(): len pa lha yul 'gro zhes bya ba yang // khyod kyis sbyin las bzlog par byas mod kyi// de yis bdag ni sbyin la brtson par gyur// khyod kyi tshig de gzhan du ma gyur cig/
239(): bdag la slong ba de dag mtho ris dang // 'jig rten phan phyir bdag ni sbyin par byed// bdag gi bde ba bsgrub phyir 'di mi byed// de nas yang bdud sdig can phan par 'dod pa bzhin brtan par bya
240(): ba'i lag pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ni nga yis phan pa 'am brdzun smras pa// legs par rtogs la gang du dga' bar song // bde dang ldan na gus bcas dran par
241(): gyis/ yang na 'gyod bzhin nga ni dran par byos// byang chub sems dpas grogs po khyod bzod par mdzod cig ces spras nas/ phongs pa rnams kyis bag phab spobs te bslangs pa la// sbyin
242(): pa'i dus su brnyas te ma byin dga' ba ngas// mi bzad me lci 'bar ba'i sems can dmyal ba der// me lce 'bar bas phog nas spyi tshugs lhung yang rung // de skad ces smras nas byang chub sems dpa'
243(): bdag gi skal ba'i mthu la brten nas/ sbyin pa la nyes dmigs med par yang shes to// bu spang dang g.yog 'khor 'gror mi ster bar then pa rnams bor nas/ blo la tsham chom med cing sbyin pa byed par
244(): 'dod pa skyes te/ dmyal ba'i nang nas bar song ngo // de nas de yi bsod nams mthu yis der// 'dam rdzab med par 'dam las skyes pa byung // ze 'bru dkar po so yi phreng ba dag/ bdud la 'phya ba
245(): bzhin du rgod par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bsod nams khyad par can las byung ba pad+ma'i stegs la song ste/ rang sangs rgyas kyi drung du phyin nas/ sems rab tu dga' zhing dang
246(): bas de la bsod snyoms phul lo// de yi yid ni rab tu dang bya'i phyir// de nas dge slong de ni mkha' la lding // de ni de na char 'bebs 'bar bar byed// glog dang bcas pa'i sprin gyi dpal bzhin mdzes/
247(): bdud ni yid la bsam pa ma grub nas// yi chad nas ni mdangs kyang nyams par gyur// de la phyogs nas lta yang ma nus par// dmyal dang bcas par de nas mi snang gyur// 'di ci'i phyir bshad ce
248(): na/ de ltar skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag brlag par 'gyur ba la'ang mi 'dzem par sbyin pa byed na/ bde bar 'dug pa lta su zhig sbyin pa mi byed/ de bas na snying stobs can ni bsdigs kyang mi rigs
249(): pa byed du gzhug mi nus so// zhes kyang bshad par bya'o// tshong dpon du skyes pa'i rangs te bzhi pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams na 'byer ba zang du dogs nas/ sbyin pa
250(): byed pa le zhum par mi 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / cho rigs dang / dul ba dang / mang du thos pa dang / shes pa dang /
251(): dregs pa med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ni ldan 'byor pa phur sum tshogs pa ni nor sbyin po dang 'dra/ blo bur ba thams cad la sbyin pa byed pas sbyin pa'i 'byor pa ni rgyun mi 'chad/ 'jig rten
252(): la phan pa'i don byed pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa po'i gtso bo tshong dpon zhig tu gyur to zhes grag go// ser sna la sogs pa'i nyes pas zil gyis mnon pa'i phyir/ ming yang zil/
253(): gyis mi non pa zhes btags so// 'dod pa'i don 'byor the tshom med gyur pas// dga' ba bskyed pa'i khyad par rgyur gyur pa// phongs pa rnams kyis de ni mthong ba bzhin// des kyang phongs pa
254(): rnams ni mthong na dga'// slong bas blang zhes nges par smras pa la// de ni med ces smra bar mi nus te// de yi sems ni nor la chags pa'i skabs// snying rje chen pos rab tu med par byas//
255(): phongs pa rnams kyis de yi khyim nas ni// nor gyi snying po phyung yang rab tu dga'// rgyu rkyen med par myur du chud za ba'i// nor ni shin tu mi bzad nor min rig/ 'jig rten dag na nor ni phal
256(): cher yang // chags pa'i gzhi dang ngan 'gro'i grogs su 'gyur// de yi nor ni bdag dang gzhan dag go/ 'byor pa thob pas don dang mthun par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
257(): des kun tu slong ba rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du nyon ma mongs par gus pa khyad par can gyis brgyan cing / nor sbyin pa rlabs chen pos rab tu tshim par byas pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po
258(): brgya byin gyis sbyin pa rlabs chen po thos nas/ yid la ya mtshan che bar gyur te/ 'di sbyin pa la brtan nam mi brtan nyams skyed pa dang / 'di nor zad du dogs pas ser sna byed du gzhug
259(): pa'i phyir/ nyin re bzhin rim gyis nor dang 'bru dang rin po che dang yo byad kyi rnam pa de dang de dag mi snang bar byas so// sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa la mos pas/ chu yi thigs pa
260(): nyi mas phog pa bzhin// de yi nor ni ji tsam zad 'gyur ba// de tsam du ni sbyin pa chen po yis// me yis tshig pa bzhin du khyim nas 'byin// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
261(): sems dpa' chen po de nor gyi mchog zad par gyur kyang / sbyin pa la rab tu gzhol bar gyur par rig nas/ blo la shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de'i nor gces pa thams cad nub gcig tu mi
262(): sdang bar byas nas/ thag pa gcig dang / zor ba gcig bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpas nang par nam langs nas/ dus bzhin du langs nas bltas na bdag gi khyim gyi nor
263(): dang 'bru dang yo byad dang mi rnams ni med/ sgra ca co ci'ang med la/ sdug sdug ltar 'dug cing / srin pos phung bar byas pa bzhin du/ bltan nyams mi dga' bar gyur pa mthong
264(): nas/ 'di ci nyes snyam du rtog pa skyes te/ kun tu nyul ba dang / theg pa sngags pa zhig dang / zor ba zhig de na 'dug pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ gal te 'ga'
265(): zhig gis slong ba'i tshig spri mi phod de/ bdag gi zho shas 'tsho bas bdag gi khyim du spobs pa de lta bu bstan na ni bdag gi nor legs par spyad pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de ste bdag skal
266(): pa chung ba'i skyon gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba ma bzod nas/ sus kyang ma spyad par med par gyur na ni ma rungs par gyur to snyam mo// nor rnams ngo ni mi rtag par/
267(): bdag gis snga nas shes zin na// phongs pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyis// bdag gi yid ni 'dir bsregs so// sbyin dang bkur stis yun rings bde byas pa// bdag gi khyim
268(): ni nor dang bral mthong ba// mtsho skams drung du skom pa lhags pa bzhin// bdag gi phongs pa de dag ci ltar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi brtan pa la brten
269(): pas zhum pa dang spro zhi bar ma gyur to// de'i gnas skabs na yang slong ba la ma goms pas ngo shes kyang gzhan la slong ma phod pa dang slong ba ni de ltar dka' ba lta zhig snyam nas de slong//
270(): ba rnams la de bas kyang rjes su brtse bar gyur to// de nas bdag nyid chen po de skyong ba rnams la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba tsam la ltos nas/ bdag nyid kyis zag pa sngogs pa de
271(): dang zor ba blangs te nyin re bzhin rtswa rtsongs pa de'i rin rnyed pa tsam gyis/ skye bo phongs pa rnams slong ba la mgu bar byed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ de rab tu dbul bar
272(): gyur kyang 'di ltar rab tu zhum pa med cing / sbyin pa la rab tu gzhol bar mthong nas/ ya mtshan che zhing gus par gyur te/ lha'i lus mngon sum du bstan nas bar snang la gnas
273(): te/ sbyin pa las bzlog pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po de la smras pa/ khyim bdag byams kyis 'gyod pa'i gnas skabs 'di lha ngur// sbyin pa drags pas khyod kyi myong
274(): ba ni/ rkun pos ma khyer chu dang mes mtshig/ rgyal po rnams kyis nor yang ma phrogs so// de bas khyod la phan phyir ngas smra yis/ sbyin la zhugs pa'i chags pa btang
275(): bar gyis// 'di ltar gyur kyang gal te ma byin na// sngon gyi 'byor pa bzang po 'thob par 'gyur// chung ngu god kyang rtag tu spyad na ni// yun rings spyad na mig sngan zad la
276(): ltos/ bsags na grog mkhar 'thon por gyur la ltos// dar bar 'dod pas bsdam par byas na legs// de nas byang chub sems dpas snyan pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i
277(): phyir/ brgya byin la smras pa/ spyan stong mnga' ba rab tu phongs gyur kyang // 'phags pas ma rabs chos bya rab tu dka'// gang zhig thob phyir sir sna'i sems 'byung ba/
278(): brgya byin nor de bdag la med kyang rung // slong ba'i sdug bsngal shi dang 'dra ba yi// gnyen po'i lam du 'gro bar 'dod pa la// de yis phongs pa ya rabs gzi byin can/ su
279(): zhig med ces zer ba'i ser bas rdeg/ slong bas gdungs nas ngo zum gnas gyur pa// bongs pa rnams ni mgu bar mi 'gyur ba'i// nor ram rin chen lha yi rgyal srid kyang /
280(): de lta bu dag bdag ni sogs sam ci// gang zhig ser sna'i skyon ni 'phel 'gyur zhing // gtong ba'i sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ bdag lta bu
281(): yis de ni btang bar rigs// yongs su bzung bar skad gdags phongs pa yin// glog ni 'gyu ba bzhin du mi brtan nor// kun dang thun mong phongs pa du ma'i rgyu// badre ba 'byung /
282(): nga'i rgyu ni sbyin yin na// ya rabs su zhig ser sna'i lam la brten// brgya byin khyod kyis bdag la gnyen par bstan// phan pa smras pas bdag la brtse bar gyis// sbyin pas
283(): yid ni dga' ba goms par 'gyur// de bas lam min su zhig dga' bar 'gyur// khyod kyi thugs ni khros par gyur pa yi// lam du 'jug par bgyi ba mi rigs so// ngo bo nyid ni/
284(): mi mthun phyogs kyi lam// bgrod dkar bzhugs pa sla ba ma yin no// brgya byin gyis spras pa/ khyim bdag 'byor pa phun sum tshogs shing / bang mdzod yongs su gang ba drang
285(): zhing gi rnams legs par byed cing / rlabs che la rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang / dbang phyug dbang du gyur pa la rim pa 'di 'jig rten na dar bar 'gyur gyi/ gnas skabs 'di
286(): lta bur 'gyur ba la ni mi rung ngo // ltos shig/ bdag gis blo yis lcogs shing ma yengs pa'am// grags pa'i rjes mthun rigs dang mthun pa 'am// las kyi yon tan gyis
287(): ni 'byor thob nas// nyi ma bzhin du 'gran zla zil mnan te// skye bo rnams ni zhar la grogs btsal nas// mdza' bor bcas pa'i gnyen rnams mgu byas te// rgyal po las kyang
288(): bkur sti thob gyur nas// mngon par chags shing dpal gyis 'khyud gyur na// de nas sbyin pa 'am bde ba'i rim pa la// rab tu zhugs na skye bos 'phyas gdags med// 'dab bshog
289(): ma rdzogs mkha' la 'phur 'drod bzhin// sbyin pa 'ba' zhig 'dod pas brlag par 'gyur// de bas sdom zhing mi g.yeng gnas byas la// sbyin pa thong la re shig nor sogs shig
290(): 'byor pa med par gang zhig mi sbyin pa// de la ma rabs 'gyur ba ci zhig yod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod de ltar ha cang du nan tan mche bar thong shig/ gzhan gyi don pas
291(): gang zhig bdag don cher 'dzin pa// des kyang 'byor pa khyad du bsad nas sbyin dgos so// gang dag chags pa spangs nas sbyin pas dga' gyur ba// 'byor pa chen po yis kyang dga'
292(): ba de mi myong // 'byor pa 'ba' zhig gis kyang mtho ris thob mi 'gyur// sbyin pa yis ni grags pa snyan pa zos par 'gyur// ser sna la sogs skyon gyis zil gyis mnon mi 'gyur/
293(): de bas 'byor pa de'i phyir sbyin pa su mi byed// gang zhig skye shis nyen pa'i 'jig rten skyong 'dod pa// snying rje'i dbang gis bdag kyang rab tu gtong byed cing // gzhan sdug bsngal
294(): bas bdag gis bde ba mi myong ba// de la khyod kyi dpal ldan nor yang ci zhig bya// lha'i dbang po gzhan yang / nor rnams phun sum tshogs pa bzhin// tsheyi
295(): gnas pa mi brtan te// de bas slong ba mthong nas ni// phun sum tshogs la mi blta'o// shing rta gcig gis sa la gang du lam drangs pa// de bzhin gzhan dang gzhan yang lam der brtun
296(): te 'dong // de ltar thog ma'i lam ni bde ba 'di bor nas// yang dag ma yin lam du 'jug par bdag mi dga'// gal te bdag ni phyis kyang nor dang ldan gyur na// slong ba rnams kyi
297(): sems ni nges par mgu bar bya// 'di ltar gyur kyang ci 'byor pa ni sbyin par bya// brgya byin bdag ni sbyin las ldog par ma gyur cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin
298(): yid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas legs so legs so zhes bya bas de mgu bar byas te/ rab tu gus shing byams pa'i lta bas bltas nas smras pa/ skye bo rnams ni grugs dang 'gal
299(): bar 'gyur ba'i las// mi bzad ngan pa rnams kyis 'byor pa thob par 'dod// bdag gi bde la chags pas nyes dmigs ma mthong nas// shin tu g.yengs pa'i sems kyis
300(): rab tu 'jug/ khyod kyis nor ni zad par gyur pa'ang ma bsams shing // bdag gi bde nyams nga yis bslus pa'ang ma bsams par// gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa la sems ni
301(): brten gyur pas// bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa rab tu che ba bstan// e ma'o rlabs chen khyad par 'phags pa gsal ba yis// snying gi ser sna'i mun pa rab tu gsal bar gyur//
302(): nor ni med par gyur kyang de la chags pa yis// rab tu sbyin las zhum pa'i skyon du yong ma gyur// gzhan sdug pa yis sdug las ngo mtshar mi che ste// snying rje'i dbang gis khyod ni 'jig
303(): rten phan par 'dod// gangs kyi ri bo rlung gis bskyod par mi nus bzhin// rab tu sbyin la bdag gis bskyod par ma nus so// grags pa kun tu bsgrags phyir yongs su brtags pa 'dis//
304(): khyod kyi nor 'di rnams ni bdag gis sbas par gyur// de ltar ma byas na ni nor bu bzang po yang // nor bu de ni grags dang rin chen mi ldem mo// de bas slong ba rnams la sbyin pa char bzhin
305(): phob// sprin chen gyis ni mtsho rnams bkang ba bzhin du byos// ngas ni rjes su bzung bas nor yang zad mi 'gyur// bdag gis gtses pa 'di yang khyod kyis bzod pa byos// zhes bya ba/
306(): de mgu bar byas nas/ brgya byin gyis de'i nor gyi rnam pa de dag kyang slar byin te bzod par byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa ni bdog pa zang du dogs
307(): pa 'am/ 'byor pa la chags pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do// tshong dpon zil gyis minon par skyes pa'i rabs te lnga pa'o// / sems dpa'
308(): chen po rnams ni dud 'gror gyur kyang sbyin pa ci nus su byed pa yod na/ mir gyur pa lta su zhig sbyin par mi byed/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ dgon pa'i gnas
309(): ldum bu dang rtswa dang shing ljon pa yid du 'ong ba yod pa/ me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa/ chu gtsang ma bai DUr+ya mthing ga 'dra ba 'bab pa'i mtshos mtha' bskor ba dang / sa gzhi ni ne'u
310(): gsing sngon po 'jam pa dang ldan pa/ skye bo dka' thub can dag gnas pa zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ri bong zhig tu gyur te gnas so zhes grag go// de ni lus bzang snying stobs
311(): che ba dang / stobs kyang che zhing gzi mdangs che bas na/ gcan gzan ngan pas glags ltar bag mi tsha// ri dgas rgyal po'i tshul gyis de na gnas// bdag gi pags pa a dzin gyon//
312(): bdag gi spu yis shun lpags byas// rtsa yi myu gus sems mgu zhing // thub pa bzhin du de na mdzes// de yi lus dang ngag yid las// byams pas yongs su dkar ba yis//
313(): ri dgas slob ma bder gnas shing // bdag nyid ngan pa spangs par gyur// de'i yon tan khyad par can gyis byams pa dang gus pa skyes pas sems rab tu chags pa'i grogs gsum
314(): zhig yod par gyur te/ sram dang / lce spyang dang / spre'u rnams so// de dag kyang phan tshun gnyen du 'brel pa bzhin du gcig la gcig byams shing chags par ni gyur
315(): gcig la gcig spobs shing bkur sti byed pas rab tu mdza' bar gyur pa'i grogs po bzhin du dga' bzhin de na gnas te/ dud 'gro'i rang bzhin la ni mi phyogs// srog chags
316(): rnams la snying rje che ba dang / brkam pa med pa dang / rku ba mi dran pa dang / chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba la gnas pa dang / rnam par shes pa gsal bas dul ba dang / sdom
317(): pa dang spyod pa brtan pa'i phyir lha rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur to// bde dang mthun zhing yon tan mi mthun tshul// yon tan mthun zhing bde dang mi mthun tshul// mi yang yon tan phyug
318(): la brten na ni// rnam par mdzes na dud 'gro smos ci dgas// ri bong gzugs can mkhas pa de rnams kyi// gzhan la snying rje che ba'i bla mar gyur// yon tan rjes 'gro rang bzhin
319(): phun sum tshogs// de rnams grags pa lha yul du yang grags// de nas re shig bdag nyid chen po de phyi dro'i dus su grogs de rnams chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags te/ rab tu gus par
320(): bkur sti byas pa dang / zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la/ dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs su nye ba'i nyi ma dang thag ring bas rnam par dkar zhing mdzes pa/ dngul gyi me long lung
321(): med pa 'dra ba/ ngos gcig cung zad sngo ba/ shar ba la bltas nas/ grogs rnams la smras pa/ dkyil 'khor cung zad ma rdzogs pa// bzang po 'di ni rgod pa bzhin/
322(): dge ba rnams la gso sbyong gi/ spro ba zla ba 'di ston no// de bas na nges par sang ni tshes bco lnga ste/ khyod kyis kyang gso sbyong dang sdom pa rnams bya bar brtsam/
323(): zhing rigs par rnyed pa'i kha zas kyis dus su lhags pa'i blo bur ba rnams la mgron gyi sa la srog gzung bar bya bar rigs so// khyed rnams ltos shig/ 'dru ba gang yod mtha' ni
324(): 'bral bar 'gyur// dar ba yod na ngan dang rgud pa'i mtha'// tshe yang glog bzhin 'gyur bzhin mi brtan no// de phyir bag yod pa la brten par gyis// de bas sbyin pa tshul khrims
325(): brgyan pa yis// bsod nams dag ni khyed kyis spel bar gyis// skye bo ngan 'gro'i nang na 'khor ba'i tshe// 'jig rten rnams la bsod nams rten gyi mchog/ skar ma rnams kyi
326(): dpal ni zil mnan nas// gzi mdangs yon tan gyis ni zla ba mdzes// 'od zer can rnams nyi mas zil mnan nas// mdzes par gang gyur de ni bsod nams mthu// sa yi
327(): dbang phyug rnams kyi bsod nams mthus// rgyal po rnams dang blon po dregs pa rnams// dregs pa kun spangs rta mchog tshul dag gis// dga' ba bzhin du bka' lung
328(): nyan par byed// so ches bya ba'i tshul la 'bad gyur kyang // bsod nams mi ldan dpal min rjes su 'brang // bsod nams che bas de ni bskrad pa bzhin// de dang mi mthun drung
329(): nas khros bzhin 'gro// sdug bsngal gzhir 'gyur gtam ngan rjes 'brang ba'i// sdig pa'i lam la de bas slar log la// de bas bsod nams spyod pa dpal ldan pa/
330(): bde ba rab 'byung bsgrub la blo byas shig/ de dag gis de bzhin bgyi'o zhes nas des rjes su bstan pa la nyan te phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas te bdag bdag gi gnas su dong ngo //
331(): grogs po de dag song nas ring po ma lon par/ bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/ mgron zhig 'ongs na de dag gis// ci yang rung bas mgron byar yod// bdag gis
332(): ci yang sbyin du med// bdag gis so rtses bcad pa yi// rtsa yi myu gu kha bo ni// 'gren la sbyin du yong mi rung // mi nus pas ni yod ye smad// de bas ci yang mi nus pa//
333(): bdag ni gsan yang ci la phan// bdag gi 'gron zhig 'ongs gyur na// dga' zhing mya ngan skye bar 'gyur snyam mo// da ni mgron byar mi rung ba snying po med pa'i lus 'di gar bor na
334(): 'ga' zhig la phan thogs par 'gyur du bsams pa dang / bdag nyid chen po des dran pa rnyed pa dang / e ma'o dbang bdag la yod cing snyed sla ba bdag gi lus nyid mgron rnams
335(): la sbyin du rung ba'i nor kha na ma tho ba med pa bdag la yod bzhin du ci'i phyir mya ngan bya/ bdag gi mgron byar rung ba 'di rnyed kyis/ snying khyod da ni mi dga' ba ma byed cig
336(): bdag gis da ni mgron rnams spobs pa la rdzogs par yod pa'i lus 'dis bkur sti bya'o/ snyam du nges par bsams nas/ sems dpa' chen po
337(): de rnyed pa mchog rnyed pa bzhin du/ yid rab tu dga' bar gyur cing de na 'dug go// de yi snying la rnam rtog pa// khyad par can ni skyes gyur pas// mthu dang rab tu dang bdag
338(): lha rnams la ni bstan par gyur// de nas sa gzhi ri dang bcas pa g.yos pa ni// rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'i gos gyon dga' ba bzhin// mkha' las lha yi rnga sgra rgyas par grag
339(): phyogs kyang rab tu dang ba'i gos gyen gsal// sprin kyang glog dang ldan pa 'brug gi sgra// rgyun chags dal bus sgrog cing rgod pa bzhin// phan tshun bdas pas rdul rnams/
340(): lhags pa yi// me tog rgyun chags rnams kyis de la 'thor// bser bu dal bus ldang ba'i rlung gis kyang // ljon shing sna tshogs me tog dri zhing rdul// rab tu 'khrigs
341(): pa srang mo'i gos bkram bzhin// rab tu dga' bas de la mchod byed 'dra// de'i rnam par rtog pa rmad du byung ba de la rab tu dga' zhing yid la ngo mtshar skyes pa'i lha rnams kyis kun
342(): tu bsgrags pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis thos nas yid la ya mtshan dang ngo mtshar che bar gyur te/ de'i bsam pa nyams bskyed pa'i phyir/ phyi de nyin nyi ma phyed kyi dus na//
343(): nyi zer gyi 'od ni rab tu gsal bar gyur/ phyogs rnams kyang smig rgyu 'khrigs pa'i gos ni gyon nyi mtsha ba'i 'od kyis ni mgo g.yogs mig gis bltar yang mi
344(): bzod par gyur pa'i tshe na/ nags tshal rnams kyi grib ma ni 'dus par gyur/ tsha ba'i sbrang bu rnams kyi sgra ni cher grag/ bya rnams lding zhing rgyu ba'i rgyun ni chad 'gron po
345(): rnams ni tshangs gdungs shing ngal bar gyur pa na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur nas lam nor ba 'dra bar byas te/ bkris pa dang sgom pa'i ngal
346(): bas gdungs shing mgrin pa 'gags pa bzhin du de dag dang nye ba zhig tu sgra phyung ste ngu zhing bos pa/ grogs dang bral ba gcig pur gyur// nags tshal stug po'i nang du 'khyam//
347(): bkres shing ngal bas bdag lus dub// dge ba rnams kyis bskyab pa'i rigs// bdag ni lam dang lam min sems mi shes// gcig pu phyogs bslad gar 'gro tol kyang med//
348(): dgon pa 'di na tsha zhing skom pas gdungs// ma 'jigs sgra yis su yis bdag tshim byed// de nas sems can chen po de dag de'i sgra snying rje rje skad zer ba des/ snying 'dar bar
349(): gyur nas/ rings rings ltar mgyogs su dong ste/ phyogs der phyin pa dang / 'gron po lam nor te nyams thag pa de mthong nas nye bar lhags te gus pa dang bcas
350(): pas dbugs 'byin cing smras pa/ bdag ni dgon par 'khyams snyam du// khyod kyi brtabs pa de thong zhig/ bdag gi slob ma'i 'khor bzhin du// bdag
351(): cag gang zhig nye bar 'khod// de bas de ring bdag cag gis// bkur sti bya ba yongs bzung zhing // zhi ba rjes su bzung nas su// sang ni ci ltar 'dod par song // de nas de ci yang
352(): mi zer bas// mgron du bos pa khas blangs pa sram gyis rig nas dga' bas rtab rtab por gyur cing mgyogs par song ste/ nya mo bdud khyer te 'ongs nas de la smras pa/
353(): ba rnams kyis brjed nas bor ba'am// dngangs te rgal bas thang la 'gres pa dag/ mi dga' gnyid kyis log bzhin nya bdun po// bdag gis rnyed pa 'di dag zo la 'dug
354(): nas lce spyang yang ci red pa'i zas dag khyer te 'ongs nas de la phyag byas te/ gus par smras pa/ sbyin gor gcig dang zho ni rdzi'u gang zhig/ la la zhig gis bor ba rnyed pa 'di//
355(): bdag la phan pa'i phyir du de snoms la// yon tan gnas khyod nags tshal 'dir bzhugs shig/ ces smras nas yid dga' bzhin du de la byin no// de nas spre'us shing A mra'i
356(): 'bras bu rab tu smin pa 'jam po ldong ros kyi phye mas kha dog bsgyur ba 'dra ba rtsi ser ba/ rtsa ba dmar ba'i ska ma dag cig khyer te 'ongs nas thal mo sbyar te de la smras pa/ A pra smin
357(): cing yid du 'ong ba'i chu// grib ma bsil ba dam pa rnams dang grogs// bdag la mchis kyis tshangs pa rigs pa'i mchog/ 'di dag snoms la khyod ni 'dir bzhugs shig
358(): de nas ri bong gis zhe sa byas te drung du 'ongs te gus par blta zhing bdag gi lus kyis 'gron byed pa ni/ nags kyi ri bong nga la ci yang med// mu dag dang ni til dang 'bras kyang med// /
359(): bdag gi lus ni me la bsregs pa 'di// snoms la di ring dka' thub nags la bzhugs// bdag gi don bsgrub nor ni ci yod pa// phongs pa 'ongs na de ni de la dbul// bdag
360(): la lus las lhag pa'i nor yang med// de bas bdag gi nor dbyig 'di khyer cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu gzhan dag gi/ srog kyang gcod par mi byed na/
361(): de ltar rab tu byams brtan pa// khyod lta bu la smos ci dgos// ri bong gis smras pa/ bram ze'i cho sa la 'di lta bu'i snying rje nye bar gnas pa ni rigs kyis de bas na bdag la phan
362(): pa'i thabs 'ga' zhig gud nas btsal te/ 'ong gi bar du bdag la phan gdags pa'i slad du/ khyod re shig 'dir bzhugs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i bsam pa
363(): shes nas/ mdag ma'i phung po gser btso ma'i kha dog 'dra ba/ cung zad 'bar ba/ me stag rnam par 'phro ba du ba med pa zhig mngon par sprul to// de nas ri bong gis phyogs
364(): kun tu bltas pa dang me'i phung po de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang yid rab tu dga' nas/ brgya byin la smras pa/ bdag la phan pa'i thabs 'di bdag gis
365(): rnyed de/ de bas na bdag gi lus longs spyod du byas pa/ phan gdags pa'i bsam pa 'bras bu dang bcas par bdag la mdzad de'i rigs so// bram ze chen po gzigs su gsol//
366(): sbyin par bya dang sbyin 'dod gzhol sems dang // khyod lta bu yi 'gron dang ldan gyur pa// 'di lta bu yi rnyed pa rab tu dkon// khyod la brten nas bdag ni don yod gyur// ces
367(): 'gron la dga' ba'i phyir gus shing rim gro bskyed de de la de skad smras te/ de nas de ni me 'bar de'i nang du// nor 'dod pa dag gter ni mthong ba bzhin// rab tu dga' bas me yi nang
368(): du zhugs// par 'dab rgyas pa'i chu nang dang pa bzhin// lha rnams kyi bdag pos de mthong nas yid la ngo mtshar skyes te/ bdag nyid kyi lus su gnas nas/ lha'i me tog char ba nin/
369(): 'bab pa dang bcas pa'i tshig rnar snyan cing yid du 'ong bas mngon par bstod de/ bdag nyid kyi lag pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dpal phun sum tshogs pa/ sor gdub kyi rgyun bzang
370(): pos brgyan pa gnyis kyis de blangs nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su khyer te bstan to// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris na gnas pa'i lha khyed rnams ltos shig/ skyes bu chen po
371(): 'di'i lus rab tu la mtshan che ba 'di la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/ 'gron la byams pas de ring chags med par// e ma'o 'di yis ji ltar lus btang ba// sems can mi brtan
372(): rnams kyis dman ma yang // de ltar the tshom med par gtong mi nus// 'di lnga'i rigs dang de dang 'gal ba yi// gtong brgya chen sems kyang gsal ba 'di// lha mi bsod
373(): nams mi byed pa rnams la// dpe bstan bzhin du 'di ni rnam par gsal// e ma'o yon tan goms byas pa// 'di yi blo la dges pa dang / e ma'o dam pa'i spyod gzhol ba/
374(): spyod pa rgya chen 'di yis bstan// de nas brgya byin gyis de'i lus khyad par can bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten la phan par bsams nas/ khang bzang mchog rnam par rgyal ba dang lha'i
375(): mdun sa chos bzang gi khang partsegs pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ri bong gi gzugs brnyan gyis brgyan te bzhag go/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba la// ding sang du yang
376(): ri bong gzugs// me long dkyil na gzugs brnyan bzhin// rab tu mngon par mdzes par snang // de dag phyin chad 'jig rten pas// ku mu dra ni kha 'byed pa// mtshan
377(): mo'i mtshan ma zla ba la// ri bong mtshan ma can zhes bsgrags// de bas na de ltar sems can chen po dud 'gror gyur pa rnams kyang ci nus par sbyin pa byed par mthong na mir
378(): gyur pa su zhig sbyin pa mi byed/ de bzhin du dud 'gror gyur pa yang yon tan la dga' na/ dam pa rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba'i phyir yon tan la gus
379(): par bya'o zhes kyang bshad par bya'o// ri bong du skyes pa'i rabs te drug pa'o// // dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa rnams la'ang gtong ba dang /
380(): dpa' ba gnyis rgyan du 'gyur na khyim na gnas pa rnams la lta spos kyang ci dgos/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i
381(): tshe 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir 'khor ba na gnas pa'i tshe/ spyod pa dang yon tan rnam par dag pas mngon par mtshon pa sa'i steng na rgyan du gyur pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
382(): yongs su rdzogs pa nam mkha' la shar ba bzhin du/ bram ze'i rigs shig tu skyes par gyur to zhes grag go// de rim pa bzhin du thos pa dang dran pa las byung ba'i cho ga
383(): bzhin du skyes pa'i las la sogs pa bya ba rnams ni byas/ rigs byed yan lag dang bcas pa ni bslabs mkhas pa'i grags pa ni mi'i 'jig rten ma lus par khyab par
384(): byas sbyin pa po yon tan la dga' ba rnams kyis gsol ba btab ste phul ba rnams blangs pas/ 'byor pa'i phyir nor rab tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to// gnyen
385(): dang mdza' bshes rten dang phongs rnams dang / 'gron pa bla ma bkur sti bya ba rnams/ 'byor pa des ni rab tu tshim byas pa/ yul du sprin gyi char chen phab pa bzhin
386(): mkhas pa'i phyir ni de yi grags pa de// gtong ba dang ni dpa' bas lhag gyur pa// ston ka'i zla ba rnam par dag pa dang // yongs su rdzogs pas lhag par gsal ba bzhin//
387(): de nas bdag nyid chen po de khyim na gnas pa bya ba ngan pas 'brel pa'i nyes pas glags pa/ bag med pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ nor sgrub cing bsrung ba'i zhar gyis rnam par dkrugs
388(): pa nye bar zhi ba dang 'gal ba sdug bsngal mang po'i mda'i 'ben du gyur pa/ so chos kyi las sgrub pa mtha' yas pas dub par gyur pa/ chog mi shes pa/ bde ba
389(): myong ba chung bar rig nas/ rab tu byung ba ni de'i nyes pa med cing ba de la/ chos sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa thar pa'i chos brtsam pa'i gnas su gyur par mthong bas/
390(): nyon ma mongs par rnyed pa'i nor phun sum tshogs pa 'jig rten gyis bkur sti byas pas yid du 'ong ba de dag kyang rtswa bzhin du spangs nas rnga/ rab tu 'byung ba dka' thub can gyi
391(): 'dul ba dang sdom pa la rab tu 'bad par gyur to// sems dpa' chen po de rab tu byung bar gyur kyang grags pa che ba dang mngon pa shes pa rjes su dran pa dang / srid pa'i yon tan
392(): dang / rab tu zhi bas mtshan pa'i phyir/ legs par 'dod pa'i skye bo rnams de'i yon tan mang pos yid mgu bas de bzhin du 'du zhing yong bar gyur to//
393(): de skye bo khyim pa'i 'du 'dzis rab tu dben pa'i bde ba med par byed pa/ 'khrug pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / bar chad du gyur pa de la mi dga' nas rab tu dben pa la dga' ba'i phyir/
394(): ka re zhes bya ba'i gling / lce phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs rlung gis bskyod pa/ an+da rnyil gyi bcag 'phro ltar sngo ba 'thor bas tha ma bskor ba/ sa gzhi bye
395(): ma skya bos khebs pa/ shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs me tog dang / 'bras bu dang 'dab mas brgyan pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ chu gtsang ma btung du rung ba yod pa zhig tu
396(): gnas nas dka' thub kyi gnas dpal dang ldan par byas so// lus bzang de ni dka' thub kyis// rid par gyur cing de na mdzes// mkha' la zla ba mdzes pa bzhin// gzi mdangs
397(): che ba mkha' la snang // spyod dang dbang po rab tu zhi zhing dul// brtul zhugs sdom la nges byas nags tshal gnas// blo yi mthu chung rnams kyis thub pa zhes// bya dang ri dgas rnams
398(): kyang de la 'khor// de nas bdag nyid chen po de dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas kyang sbyin pa la rab tu goms pas/ blo bur ba rnams dus su 'ongs pa na/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu
399(): ci rnyed pa dang / chu gtsang ma dang 'dir 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis shes pa brjod pa yid du 'ong ba'i skye bo dka' thub can la 'os pa rnams kyis mchod par byed do// rno
400(): bur du lhags pa rnams la 'gron byas pa'i lhag ma nugs tshal nas byung bas 'tsho ba'i phyir za zhing gnas so// de'i dka' thub mchog tu gyur pa'i grags pa 'phros pas lha rnams
401(): kyi dbang po brgya byin sems mgu bar gyur nas/ sems dpa' chen po de brtan mi brtan nyams bskyed pa'i phyir/ dgon pa'i gnas de na rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dka' thub can
402(): rnams kyis bzar rung ba thams cad mthar gyis mi snang bar byas so// byang chub sems dpa' yang yid bsam gtan la zhugs pas chog shes pa la goms pa dang /
403(): zas la zhen pa med pa dang / lus la ma chags pa'i phyir de dag mi snang bar gyur pa'i rgyu yid la mi byed do// de shing gi lo ma gzhon nu dag btsos te/ des zas kyi dgos pa
404(): byas te zhen pa med cing zas khyad par can mi tshol bar blo bde bar byas te de bzhin du gnas so// cho ga shes nges pa'i bdag nyid can// 'tsho ba gang yang btsal mi dka'//
405(): rtse dang lo ma chu yi gnas// gang na med pa ma yin no// de de ltar gnas pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin yid la ngo mtshar che bar gyur nas/ yon tan rab tu brtan par gyur
406(): ba de brtag pa'i phyir nags tshal dgon pa de na shing ljon pa dang ldum bu thams cad dpyid kyi rlung gis btab pa bzhin du lo ma med par byas so// de nas
407(): byang chub sems dpa' lo ma lhags shing rnying pa cung zad rlon pa rnams btus te chu'i nang du btsos pa de dag za zhing mi dga' ba med par bsam gtan gyi bde bas yid tshim par
408(): byas te/ de na bdud rtsis ngoms pa bzhin du de gnas so// mang du thos pas bsnyems pa med// 'byor pa rnams ni ser sna med// dgas tshal gnas rnams chog
409(): shes pa// yon tan rgyan gyi mchog yin no// de nas de'i cho ga shes pa brtan pa ngo mtshar du gyur pa des/ brgya byin ngo mtshar cher gyur nas khros pa bzhin du sems dpa' chen po de//
410(): dro la bab pa'i tshe/ me la sbyin sreg bya ba ni zin/ bzlas brjod ni rdzogs nas/ skye bo blo bur du 'ongs pa blta ba'i phyir phyogs su bltas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram
411(): ze'i lus su bsgyur nas blo bur du 'ongs pa 'dra bar mdun du 'ongs so// byang chub sems dpa' yid rab tu dga' bas de'i drung du 'ongs te/ 'dir 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba la sogs
412(): pa'i tshig snyan pa brjod de/ zas kyi dus la bab pa bstan nas mgron du bos so// de cang mi smra bas khas blangs par bdag nyid chen po des shes nas/ sbyin par 'dod pas mig
413(): dgrang bzhin ni 'dzum pas mdzes// yid 'ong rnar snyan tshig gis dga' bar byas nas ni// dka' bas rnyed de btsos pa de dag thams cad kyang // de la byin nas bdag nyid dga' bas
414(): tshim par gyur// de de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi gnas su zhugs nas dga' zhing mgu ba de nyid kyis nyin mtshan 'das so// de nas brgya byin de'i phyi de nyin dang / nyi ma gsum pa la'ang
415(): de bzhin du brtul zhugs kyi tshe de'i mdun du 'ongs so// de yang yid rab tu dga' nas de bzhin du de la mchod pa byas so// sbyin par 'dod pa'i dge ba rnams// snying rje'i goms pa las
416(): skyes pas// sdug bsngal srog la bab na yang // dman zhing zhum par yongs mi 'gyur// de nas brgya byin gyi sems la ngo mtshar rab tu che bar gyur te/ 'di ni dka' thub che
417(): baMs/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rwa dag po'i dpal thob par bya ba'ang 'dod pa tsam gyis 'grub par rig nas/ dogs pa dang 'jigs pa skyes te/ bdag gi lus lha'i cha lugs ngo
418(): mtshar che ba bzang po dang ldan pa mngon par bstan nas/ de la dka' thub kyi dgos pa dris so// gnyen dang mdza' bshes mchi mas 'dzu ba dang // bde ba'i rgyur gyur yongs su
419(): bzung bor te/ bsam pa'i lcags kyus gang du dmigs nas ni// dka' thub sdug bsngal 'di la gnas par gyur// bde bar 'byor pa'i longs spyod yongs bor zhing // gnyen
420(): pa rnams kyang mya ngan bslang nas su// rgyu rkyen chung ngu dag gis brtan pa rnams// bde dang 'gal ba'i dka' thub nags mi 'gro// gang gis yon tan thos
421(): nas khyod lta bu'i// blo yang de ltar dbang du byas pa de// bdag la gal te sgrub byar rung na// de bas bdag gi rtog pa bsal ba'i rigs// byang chub sems dpas spras pa/ gang
422(): gi phyir bdag 'di ltar 'bad pa/ grogs po khyod nyon cig/ yang dang yang du skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang // rga dang rgung dang na ba'i sdug bsngal dang // 'chi bar 'gyur snya me sems pa'i
423(): 'jig rten rnams// bskyab pa'i phyir ni bdag ni de ltar gnas// de nas brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ 'di ni bdag gi dpal 'dod pa ma yin no snyam nas dbugs phyin te/ legs/
424(): par smras pa des yid dga' bar gyur nas/ de'i tshig de rigs so zhes bya bas dga' ba bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchog sbyin par byas so// 'dir khyod kyis dka'
425(): thub can dang mthun pa'i tshig legs par smras pa'i phyir 'od srungs khyod la mchog sbyin gyis gang 'dod pa de slongs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' bde ba la ma chags pa dang / slong ba
426(): nyid sdug bsngal du rig cing chog shes pa le goms pas/ brgya byin la spras pa/ rjes su phan par 'gyur ba'i mchog/ gal te bdag la sbyin 'dod na// lha yi mchog la dam pa
427(): 'di// bdag gis da ni blang bar bya// chung ma yid du 'ong dang bu dang dbang byed dang // mngon par 'dod pa'i nor rnams rgya chen thob gyur kyang // gang gis yid gdungs nam
428(): yang cho ga mi shes pa yi// brkam pa'i rlung de bdag gi snying la med par byos// de nas de'i cho ga shes pa la gzhol ba legs par smra bas gsal bar byas pa des/ de rgya byin yid
429(): rab tu dang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya bas bstod de/ de yang mchog sbyin pas 'dun par byas so// 'dir yang skye bo thub pa dang mthun pa'i tshig
430(): khyod kyis legs par smras pa la dga' bas skyes lan dang 'dra bar mchog gzhan yang sbyin par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas mchog blang ba la snyed btags te/ nyon mongs
431(): pa dang bral ba thob dka' ba nyid de la bstan pa'i phyir yang de la chos bstan to// yon tan mchog gnas brgya byin khyod// nga la gal te mchog sbyin na// lha yi dbang po dam pa'i
432(): mchog/ de bas gzhan yang 'di bslang ngo // sems can gang gi zil gnon dgra bo bzhin// nor yang nyams shing mdog bzang grags pa dang // bde ba las kyang nyams par
433(): 'gyur ba yi// zhe sdang me de bdag las ring bar byos// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te legs so zhes bya bas de la gus par bstod de/ yang smras pa/
434(): rab tu byung la grags pa der// rjes su chags shing brten pa'os// de bas legs par spras pa yi// mchog de bdag las bzhes su gsol/
435(): nas byang chub sems dpas nyon mongs pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyir mchog 'dod pa la snyad btags nas sems can nyon mongs pa can dang 'grogs pa smad pa'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so//
436(): byis pa rnams ni nam yang mi thos shing // mthong bar mi 'gyur nam yang mi smra yang // de dang 'grogs pas skyo ba'i sdug bsngal yang // mi myong mchog de bdag ni khyod la slong //
437(): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ phongs par gyur la khyad par du// dam pas phan gdags ma yin nam// phongs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir// byis pa tha ma yin par 'dod// byis
438(): pa 'di dag khyad par du// snying rje'i gnas su gyur pa na// ci phyir snying rje can yin yang // mthong ba tsam du'ang khyod mi 'dod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po ma
439(): nus mod/ 'di la khyod ltos shig/ ji ltar byas kyang byis pa la// phan gdags par ni mi nus te// bdag cag lta bu ci ltar na// de la phan par brtson mi byed// de lta bsan//
440(): 'di dag phan gdags par bya ba'i snod ma yin par zung shig/ 'di dag tshul min pa'ang tshul bzhin byed// gzhan yang 'di la rab tu sbyor bar 'dod// 'dul dang drang po'i rim pa mi
441(): mthun par// phan pa bstan kyang rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur// mkhas pa'i nga rgyal gti mug mes bsregs shing // phan par sprul khro bas rtsub 'gyur ba// 'dul la brtson 'grus
