442(): chung bas gzu lums can// de la ji ltar phan gdags rung ba spros// lha yi gtso bo de bas na// snying rje che bar gyur pa yang // byis pa rdzas su mi rung ba// mthong ba tsam du'ang mi
443(): 'dod do// brgya byin gyis de thos nas/ legs so legs so zhes de la bstod de/ legs par smras pas sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas/ yang smras pa/ legs par smras
444(): pa rin chen la// rin ni ci yang yod ma yin// dga' bas me tog snyim bkang bzhin// 'dir yang khyod la mchog sbyin no// de nas byang chub sems dpas skyes bu dam pa gnas
445(): skabs thams cad du bde ba bsten pa'i phyir/ brgya byin la smras pa/ brtan pa mthong zhing brtan pa thos pa dang // de dag nyid dang brgya byin bdag 'grogs 'gyur// de dang smra zhing /
446(): spobs pa'i bde ldan gyur// lha yi dam pa mchog de bdag la stsol// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni brtan pa la rab tu dga' ba 'dra na/ de smros shig/ brtan pas khyod la
447(): ci zhig bya/ 'od srungs de yi rgyu smros shig/ brtan pa mthong bar 'dod pa yis// gang phyir mi brtan bzhin du gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpas de la skyes bu dam pa'i yon
448(): tan bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/ bdag gang gi phyir brtan pa 'ba' zhig mthong bar 'dod pa de grogs po nyon cig/ yon tan lam du bdag nyid 'gro bar byed/
449(): gzhan yang lam de nyid du 'dzud par byed// rtsub mo'i tshig kyang mi bzod skye mi 'gyur// de yi tshig ni phan dang ldan pa yin// g.yo sgyu med pa'i 'dul bas rtag tu brgyan// de
450(): wAr pan pa dag kyang bstan par nus// de bas bdag blo yon tan dga' ba la// yon tan dga' phyir rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur// de nas de la brgya byin gyis legs so 'di
451(): ni rigs so zhes bstod de/ sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas/ yang mchog sbyin par byas so// chog shes pa la goms gyur pas// khyod kyis kun tu bzlog gyur kyang
452(): bdag la phan gdags blo yis su// mchog ni blang bar bya ba'i rigs// gus dang phan pa'i bsam pa dang // mthu yang ci 'dod thams cad kyis// mtshig ni sbyin par bya ba
453(): las// ma blangs pa ni sdug bsngal che// de nas byang chub sems dpas de rab tu phan 'dogs par 'dod pa rtogs nas/ de la dga' ba dang phan par 'dod pas
454(): sbyin pa la rab tu dga' ba de la bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/ khyod kyis kha zas zad pa'i nyes pa spangs// yid kyang sbyin par dga' dang mthun 'gyur ba'i// slong ba rnams kyang
455(): tshul khrims rnam dag brgyan// 'di dag bdag la yod 'gyur mchog slong ngo // brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'dir yang khyod ni legs par smras pa rin po che'i 'byung khungs
456(): su gyur to// gzhan yang khyod kyis gang blangs pa// de dag thams cad de bzhin 'gyur// legs par smras pa 'di la yang // khyod la mchog ni sbyin par bya// byang
457(): chub sems dpas smras pa/ lha rnams kun gyi mchog tu gyur pa khyod// bdag la phan 'dogs rgyur 'gyur mchog sbyin na// gsal bar bdag drung slan chad mi 'byon pa'i/
458(): mchog 'di lha min 'joms pa khyod la slong // de nas brgya byin de mtshar du gyur nas/ mi bzod pa bzhin du de la smras pa/ khyod re shig sdod cig dang / bzlas brjod brtul
459(): zhugs mchog sbyin dka' thub spyad pa yis// skye bo 'di dag kho bo rjes su mthong 'dod na// kho bo mchog sbyin 'dod phyir 'di ltar 'ongs pa la// khyod ni de ltar mthong bar mi 'dod/
460(): ci yi phyir// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di la bdag gis khyed mnyes par bgyi yis/ lha'i rgyal po khyod ma bkyon cig/ 'di mi srun pa'i tshul kyang ma lags
461(): ma gus par bgyis pa'ang ma lags/ khyod dang phrad par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags na/ lha yi gzugs mchog rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang // gzi brjid gsal zhing
462(): mdangs dang ldan pa mthong 'gyur na// khyod ni rab tu dang zhing zhi bar gyur pa yang // bdag gi dka' thub nyams par gyur du dogs lags mod// de nas
463(): brgya byin gyis de la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas nam langs pa dang lha'i bza' ba dang / btung ba brgya byin gyis sbyar ba rnams dang / rang
464(): sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma brgya byin gyis spyan drangs pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gzhon nu bshos 'brim par chas shing bsdogs pa du ma tsum+bi lpags par byang chub sems dpas mthong bar
465(): gyur to// bza' ba dang ni btung bar sbyar ba de dag gis// drang srong chen po de dag mchod pa byas pa dang // thub pa de ni dga' ba chen po thob par gyur// skye bo dka' thub can dang mthun
466(): po'i tshul dag dang // bsam gtan tshad med sdom dang zhi ba'i tshul gyis gnas// de bas de ltar dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa rnams la'ang / gtong phod pa dang dpa' ba
467(): rgyan du 'gyur na/ khyim na gnas pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na mi rnams kyis kyang gtong phod pas bdag brgyan par bya'o// zhes khyim bdag gzengs bstod
468(): pa'i phyir/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das de sku tshe snga ma la'ang legs par gsungs pa khyad par can rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
469(): lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe ba nyid bstan pa la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// a gastar skyes pa'i rabs te bdun pa'o// / bam po
470(): gsum pa// snying rje chen pos/ gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams ni bdag gi bde ba la mi lta ste/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ byang chub sems dpa'
471(): bdag gi che ba nyid kyis snying rje dang ldan zhing 'gro ba yongs su sgrub pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / nges pa la sogs pa 'jig rten
472(): la phar 'dogs pa dang / mthun pa'i yon tan khyad par can mngon par 'phel ba/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i yid du gyur pa/ byams pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rgyal por
473(): gyur to zhes grag go// skye dgu rnams kyi bde dang sdug bsngal gang // rgyal po de yang de dag bzhin du gyur// de bas de ni skye dgu bsrung la mkhas// mtshon cha dang ni gtsug
474(): lag rnams la goms// mi yi dbang pos bka' khrims spyi bos mnos// de yi mtshon cha rgyan dang 'dra bar gyur// 'jig rten phan 'byung snyan ngag tshul rnams kyis// gtsug
475(): lag dag kyang rnam par gsal bar snang // tshar bcad pa dang phan 'dogs bya ba la// chos dang 'gal ba de ni yong mi byed// tshul la mkhas shing phan par sems pa'i phyir/
476(): skye dgu rnams la ston mkhas pa dang 'dra// de de ltar skye dgu rnams chos kyis skyong ba na/ bden pa dang gtong ba dang nye bar zhi ba dang shes rab la sogs pa
477(): gzhan la phan par yongs su bsdus pa'i phyir/ khyad par can du gyur la rlabs che ba'i rim pas byang chub kyi tshogs bsags shing mngon par dang ba las/ re shig cig nyes pa 'ga'
478(): zhig byung ba'i phyir/ gnod sbyin gzhan gsod pa la mkhas pa mdangs 'phrog pa lnga zhig/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag pos rang gi yul nas spyugs pa de de'i yul du lhags so// de'i
479(): yul na gnod pa thams cad med pa dang / rtag tu dga' ba sna tshogs yod pa dang / phun sum tshogaso pa mchog dang ldan pas mi rnams rab tu dga' mgu zhing dar ba mthong nas/
480(): de dag yul de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog 'dod par gyur to// de dag rab tu bsgrims nas ni// rang gi las la 'jug byas kyang // de na gnas pa rnams kyi mdangs/
481(): 'phrog par bya bar ma nus so// rgyal po de'i mthu khyad par che bas na// bdag gi yin pa'i blo ni gar bzhag pa// de nyid de yi bsrung ba mchog yin pas// de dag gi ni mdangs
482(): 'phrog nus ma gyur// de ltar rab tu 'bad kyang yul de ni gnas pa gang gi mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma nus pa de'i tshe/ de dag cig la gcig bltas nas// grogs po dag 'di
483(): ci zhig yin snyam du sems par gyur to// bdag cag mthu la gnod par nus pa yi// rig sngags dka' thub dngos grub khyad par yang // de dag la ni yod pa ma yin na// 'on/
484(): kyang de ring bdag cag thams cad kyi// ming ni don dang mthun par ma gyur te// de nas gnod sbyin de dag bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ dong dong pa dang grib shing sngon po zhig gi
485(): drung na/ nags na rgyu ba'i ba lang rdzi gcig gcig lham dang bcas par 'dug cing / nags tshal gyi shing gi me tog lo ma dang bcas pa'i phreng ba ni thogs/ dbyug pa dang dgra
486(): sta ni g.yas rol du bzhag/ gcig pu srad bu ni 'khal/ shu glu ni len cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de'i drung du lhags te smras pa/ kye ba lang rdzi 'di lta bu'i dgon pa dben pa
487(): 'gro ba med pa na/ gcig pu ji ltar mi 'jigs/ des de dag la bltas nas/ su la 'jigs zhes smras so// gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/ srin po rnams dang 'dre
488(): rnams rang bzhin gyis gtum zhing ma rungs pa yin par khyod kyis sngon ma thos sam/ rig sngags dka' thub bde legs ldan pa dag/ grogs kyis bskor ba'i nang na 'dug gyur cing /
489(): dpa' la 'jigs pa med pa'i mi dag kyang // gang las thar bar gyur par rab dka' ba// nags tshal rab tu dben zhing zab pa la// 'jigs pa'i san grogs kyang yong med par/
490(): mi yi sha dang tshil dag za ba yi// srin po de dag ci phyir khyod mi 'jigs// de skad smras pa dang / ba lang rdzi des brgad nas de dag la smras pa/ bde legs
491(): chen pos 'gro ba 'di// yongs su bskyangs par gyur pas na// lha yi dbang po dag gis kyang // 'di dag gtse bar mi nus na// sha za dag gis ga la nus// de bas nags
492(): na'ang khyim bzhin du// mtshan mo dag kyang nyin mo bzhin// gcig pu'ang grogs kyi nang 'dug 'dra// bdag ni 'jigs pa med par 'dug/ de nas gnod sbyin de dag ngo mtshar che bar
493(): gyur nas de la zil gyis gnon pa bzhin du ched cher byas nas smras pa/ kye bzang po khyod kyi bde legs kyi bye brag de ci 'dra ba zhig re shig smros shig/ de brgod cing de dag la smras
494(): paM/ bdag cag gi bde legs kyi bye brag rmad du byung ba ci 'dra ba nyon cig/ gser gyi ri bo'i zag ltar yangs pa'i brang // ston ka'i zla ba dri med mdzes pa'i zhal// dpung pa gser
495(): gyi sdong po lta bur rgyas// mi dbang khyu mchog spyan 'dra rnam par gnon// bdag cag gi bde legs kyi khyad par ni 'di 'dra'o zhes smras nas/ ngo mtshar che zhing khro ba dang bcas pas
496(): gnod sbyin de dag la bltas te yang spras pa/ e ma'o 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o// mi dbang mthu chen 'di ltar grags pa yang // khyed kyi rna lam ji ltar ma grags kyi// 'on te thos kyang
497(): shin tu rmang byung bas// khyed cag yid mi ches phyir ma bzung grang // khyed cag gang nas lpags pa'i yul de yi// mi rnams yon tan tshol la mi mkhas sam// ched cher mi 'dzin
498(): skal ba med pa'i phyir// mi dbang grags pas rnam par spangs su dogs// de bas na de lta bu yul mtha' 'khob nas 'dir lhags pa ni khyed rnams la skal ba cung zad cig yod do//
499(): gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang po de'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis gnod par bya bar mi nus pa/ rgyal po de'i mthu da lta bu ci las gyur/ ba lang
500(): rdzis smras pa/ nged kyi rgyal po chen po 'di'i mthu 'di lta bu ni rang gi che ba nyid kyis thob pa'o// bram ze dag ltos shig/ de'i dpung byams pa ru mtshon khra bo'i dpung ni cho ga tsam//
501(): de ni mi khro tshig rtsub mi smras na gang legs par bsrung // de yi bka' khrims chos yin rgyu med nor yang dam pa mchod// de ltar rmad du byung yang ngan pa'i chos nyid dregs pa med/
502(): bo cag gi rje 'di ni de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan mang po dang ldan te/ de bas na de'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod pa byed mi nus so// de lta bas na kho bos khyed la ji snyed
503(): cig smra bar mi nus kyi/ mi'i bdag po'i yon tan thos par 'dod na/ khyod grong khyer nyid du 'dong ba'i rigs so// khyed der dong na skye bo rnams rang gi ngang gis chos la dga' bas ya
504(): rabs kyi tshul la gnas pa dang / rtag tu bde zhing lo legs pas rab tu dga' bas phun sum tshogs shing cha lugs bzang la mi 'phyar ba dang / skye bo rno drur
505(): du lhags pa rnams la khyad par du byams pa dang / mi'i bdag po'i yon tan snying la dran pa dang / de'i grags pa'i gzhi bstod pa'i bkra shis dang / bde legs bzhin du rab tu
506(): dga' zhing goms par byed pa dag mthong na/ rgyal po'i yon tan rgya cher shes par 'gyur ro// de ltar yon tan mang po brjod pas/ de mthong bar 'dod pa la nges par de'i yon tan
507(): mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin de dag rang gi mthus ma tshugs pas/ rgyal po de la sems mi bzod pa dang bcas pas yon tan snying nas brjod cing rigs pa dang bden par
508(): smras pa des kyang / sems 'jam por ma gyur to// dman pa rnams ni phal cher yang // mi bzod pas ni yid gdungs nas// dngos po gang la de grags pa// de yis lhag
509(): par gdungs par 'gyur// rgyal po sbyin pa la dga' bar shes nas/ de la gnod pa byed par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag gis rgyal po mthong nas/ mthong ba'i tshe bza' bar slangs
510(): so// de nas rgyal po de rab tu dga' nas/ de'i las su bskos pa'i mi rnams la kha zas zhim po bram ze rnams la myur du byin cig/ ces bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po
511(): la 'os pa'i kha zas rnams khyer te 'ongs na'ang / gnod sbyin de dag na re/ kha zas de lta bu dag ni bdag cag mi za'o// zhes smras nas stag gzig rtsa sngon po mi 'dod pa bzhin du/
512(): len du ma btub bo// de rgyal pos thos nas/ de dag gi drung du song ste/ 'on khyed cag kha zas ji lta bu 'dod pa de 'dra ba btsal lo zhes smras so// gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/
513(): mi sha shin tu dron mo dang // mi yi khrag ni dron mo dag/ brtul zhugs ma nyams pad+ma'i spyan// gnod sbyin rnams kyi bza' btung lags// zhes smras nas rang gi lus kha nas mche
514(): ba gtsigs pa mig 'bar zhing ser la yo zhing mi sdug pa dang / sna lim zhing mi sdug pa dang / skra dang kha spu mer 'drar ba ltar ser ba dang / lus char sprin ltar ngam gnag/
515(): cing mi sdug pa 'jigs pa bstan pa dang de dag mthong nas rgyal po des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni sha za yin te mi ma yin no// de bas na bdag cag gi bza' ba dang btung ba mi 'dod
516(): dro snyam du nges par gyur to// de nas mi'i dbang po de snying rje can gyi rang bzhin pas/ bsam pa dag pas de dag la snying rje de bas kyang cher gyur nas/ snying la snying rje 'ba' zhig
517(): sems pas gnod sbyin de dag la mya ngan byed cing / don 'di lta bu sems par nges so// snying rje can la 'di lta bu'i// bza' dang bca' ba rab tu dkon// nyin re zhing yang /
518(): de btsal ba// de bas sdug bsngal che ba med// snying rje med cing mi nus na'ang // 'bad pa'i don ni med par 'gyur// nus na'ang phan byed goms pa la/
519(): de bas dka' ba ci zhig yod// snying rje med cing yid ni ma zhi ba// de lta bu yi kha zas za ba rnams// tshe 'di dang ni pha rol rang don sreg/ 'di dag sdug bsngal nam zhig med par
520(): 'gyur// da 'di dag gi kha zas sbyar bas nyin 'ga' tsam yang gzhan gsod pa la zhugs pa 'di las ci ltar bzlog par bya/ phongs te slong du 'ongs pa rnams kyi gdong // re
521(): bzlog pas ngo zum gnag 'gyur ba// bu yug rlung gis pad+ma rnyings pa bzhin// mi dga' byas pa nam yang bdag mi dran// gdon mi za bar bdag gi lus ni brtan cing rgyas pa/
522(): las// khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams sbyin par bya// phongs pa 'ongs pa de ni rigs pa snyam// de las gzhan pa bdag gis gang du btsal// bdag rang shi ba'i sha rnams
523(): drod med la// khrag rnams de la yod pa ma yin zhing // bru ba tsha bas sems ni gdungs pa la// de yis legs par mgu bar 'gyur ma yin// gson po'i sha'ang gud nas
524(): bdag gis ji ltar btsal bar bya/ 'di dag bdag gi thad du 'ongs nas bkres pa dang skom pas mig dang gdong gi mdangs nyams shing bslangs pa dang re ba'i 'bras bu med pas
525(): lhag par yid la sdug bsngal zhing / phongs bzhin du slar dong yang ji ltar bya/ de bas 'di ni dus la bab kyis/ rtag tu na zhing sdug pa'i rma 'dra ba// nad kyi 'byung khungs
526(): ngan pa'i lus 'di las// dgos pa khyad par can du spyad pa yis// btsos pa'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzang por bya// de ltar nges par byas nas rgyal po de rab tu dga' bar gyur//
527(): pas/ mig rtsa dang gdong gi mdangs bzang pos ring gi lus bstan nas/ gnod sbyin de dag la smras pa/ bdag gi sha ni khrug dang bcas pa 'di// 'jig rten rnams
528(): la phan pa'i phyir bzung ste// gal te de ring 'gron du byar rung na// de ni bdag gi mngon par mtho bar 'gyur// de nas gnod sbyin de dag rgyal po de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
529(): shes bzhin du/ ngo mtshar rab tu che bas yid mchis nas rgyal po la smras pa/ phongs pas bdag gi sdug bsngal dag/ slong zhing dman pas bstan pa legs// de la
530(): sbyin pa po nyid kyis// dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod// de nas rgyal po des bsams pa/ de ni 'di dag 'dod do snyam nas snying rab tu dga' nas/ rtsa bkrol
531(): bo'i phyir sman pa rnams bos shig/ ces bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams rgyal po'i sha dang khrag rnams sbyin par rtsol bar reg nas/ rtab rtab por
532(): gyur nas mi bzod cing sems 'khrugs nas/ byams pa'i dbang gis don 'di lta bu cung zad cig gsal bar smras so// lha sbyin pa la ha nang dgyes
533(): ches pas 'bangs glo ba nye ba rnams la phan pa dang / gnod par 'gyur ba mi gzigs pa mi rigs so// lhas 'di dag mi mkhyen pa yang ma legs te/ 'di ltar/ skye dgu
534(): rnams la gnod pa gang dang gang // de dang de dag gnod sbyin rnams la dga'// gzhan la gnod pas 'tsho zhing dga' ba skye// 'di dag rigs dang rang bzhin de ltar legs//
535(): rgyal srid dpal 'di 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir// de la ma chags lha yis bzung bar mdzod// de bas bdag gi sha sbyin rtsol ba yis// log pa'i lam du yi dam bcas pa thong //
536(): skyes bu dpa' bo khyod kyi mthus bskyabs pa'i// 'jig rten gdon mi za bar 'di mi bzod// phung bar byed la mkhas pa 'di dag ni// tshul min tshul gyis skye dgu phung bar byed//
537(): mchod sbyin tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'ong // tshil dang zhag la sogs pa bsregs pas mgu// khyod kyi zhal zas phun sum tshogs pa dag/ gus par byin yang 'di dag 'dod mi
538(): 'gyur/ lha'i thugs ni bdag cag lta bu'i skye bos bcos pa ma lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'di ni bdag gi don du gtses pa'i slad du/ bdag cag 'di ltar rko long gsol bar
539(): gyur to// gnod sbyin lnga po 'di rnams kyi slad du/ 'bangs thams cad mgon ma mchis par bgyi 'am/ lha 'di lta bu'i chos gang gi lam lags/ gzhan yang 'di ltar bdag
540(): cag la mi byams pa tsi las gyur/ rje'i slad du 'tshal ba la/ sha dang khrag yongs su rdzogs par mchis pa 'di dag sngon bdag cag gang gis sbas te ma phul na lha nyid kyis btsal
541(): bar bzhed/ de nas rgyal po des blon po de dag la smras pa/ yod bzhin du ni med ces su// nged cag lta bu ci wAr smra// brtul te gsal bar blangs pa nas// mi sbyin zhes kyang
542(): ji skad smra// chos kyi bka' khrims thog mar 'gro ba dag/ gal te ngan pa'i lam du bdag song na// nga yi spyod de'i rjes su 'jug pa yi// nga yi 'bangs rnams gnas skabs/
543(): ji ltar 'gyur// 'di yang skye dgu rnams kyi don gyi phyir// ngas ni lus la snying po dbyung bar bya// nga yi sems ni ser snas phrogs gyur na// skye ba'i don la dge ba'i gzi
544(): ci 'dra// khyed kyis nga la gus pa dang bcas par byams pa dang / bag phab ste gang smras pa 'di ltar bdag cag la mi byams pa ci las gyur/ sha dang khrag bdag la yongs
545(): su rdzogs par mchis bzhin du/ lha nyid kyis btsal bar bzhed ces zer ba de yang khyed la bshad kyis nga khyed la mi 'jar zhing mi byams pa'ang ma yin la/ mi sbyin du dogs
546(): pa'ang med mod kyi/ rims kyis nor ni nyung du gyur pa 'am// skal ba chung bas zad par gyur na ni// mdza' bo rnams la skyong ba mdzes par 'gyur// nor ldan
547(): dngul la skyong ba yong mi mdzes// skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi phyir bskyed pa'i// lus ni sha rgyas shin tu mtho ba dag/ nga bdag nyid la chen po yod bzhin du// khyod la slong bu legs
548(): pa ma yin no// mi shes gzhan gyi gnod pa'ang mi bzod na// khyod kyi gnod pa bdag gis ga la bzod// 'di dag khyed la mi slong nga la slong // de bas bdag gi sha ni sbyin par bya//
549(): de bas na nga la rab tu byams pas// chos kyi gegs la 'dzem pa med pa 'di thong zhig/ nga'i don du khyod kyis spyod pa 'di lta bu bya ba mi rigs so// 'di ni re shig dpyad dgos te/
550(): bza' la sogs pa bdag don du// sbyin la 'gog par ji ltar 'gyur// legs sam gal te ma legs kyang // de ltar byed pa ji 'drar 'gyur// de ltar 'dir gal gyis 'chu
551(): ba de thong la/ nga'i grogs rjes su mthun par bya na/ rigs pas dpyad par bya'o// lam bzlog par 'gro ba las log pa'i yid can du byas la rjes su yi rang ba dang mthun par yid/
552(): la khyed kyis byas na bzang gi/ de ltar mi brtan par bya ba mi rigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nor ni gcig pus dpyad pa ma yin la// slong ba nyin re rtag tu 'ong ma yin// slong
553(): ba 'di lta bu dang phrad pa ni// lha dag mnyes par byas kyang mi 'grub na// slong ba 'di lta bu yang 'ong 'gyur zhing // lus kyang chung za mi bde'i gnas 'gyur la// the tshom zan 'a/
554(): rgya cher mi 'gyur na// 'jungs shing zhum pa mun pa'i mchog yin no// de ltar rgyal po des rang gi 'khor rnams la khyed kyis de ltar nga la dgag par mi rigs so// zhes tshig
555(): 'jam pos bsgos nas/ sman pa rnams bos te/ rang gi lus la rtswa lnga bkrol te/ gnod sbyin de dag la smras pa/ nga yi lus 'di khyer nas ni// chos kyi grogs kyang
556(): bya ba dang // nga yang rab tu dga' gyur par// khyed kyis da ni bya ba'i rigs// de dag gis de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal po'i khrag tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba 'dra ba snyim pa
557(): bzed de btung bar chas so// rgyal po de'i lus gser mdog 'dra ba la// mtshan mo spyod pa rnams ni khrag 'thung ba// ri rab lhun po'i ri la dus mtshams kyi// char sprin
558(): spug pos nye bar bskor ba bzhin// dga' ba mchog ldan brtan dang ldan pa dang // lus kyi yon tan ldan pas rgyal po de// lus kyang ma nyams sems kyang brgyal ba med//
559(): khrag gi rgyun kyang zad par yod ma gyur// gnod sbyin de dag skom gyis gdungs bzhi nas/ da ni 'dis 'tshal to zhes rgyal po la smras so// sdug bsngal mang po 'byung ba'i
560(): gnas kyi lus// rtag tu byas mi gzo yang rgyal po de// slong bdag la sbyin pa'i don grub pas// rab tu dga' dang rjes mthun bzung bar gyur// de nas
561(): rgyal po de rab tu dga' bas bskul bas mig rang bzhin gyi mdangs lhag par gsal bar gyur nas/ ut+pal mthing ga'i 'dab ma ltar mdog sngo ba'i ral gri rnon po dang rin po ches
562(): spras pa'i 'od kyis mdzes pa blangs te/ bdag gi sha bcad cing de dag la byin no// sbyin la dga' bas yang dang yang // skabs ni med par byas pas na// bcad pa'i sdug
563(): bsngal de yid la// dmigs par byed na ma nus so// ral gri rnon pos bcad nas drangs pa dang // dga' bas phyir yang ring du bskrad pa dang // de'i sdug bsngal skyo zhing ngal
564(): ba bzhin// yid la 'jug par byed pa chung bar gyur// rang gi sha yis gnod sbyin de dag ni// tshim par byas pas de ni de bzhin dga'// de dag sems ni khro ba'i rang bzhin yang //
565(): de ltar byas pas 'jam zhing nges par gyur// chos la dga' zhing snying rje'i dbang gyur te// gzhan gyi don du bdag lus gces btang bas// zhe sdang me yis bsregs pa'i yid rnams
566(): kyang // rab tu dang zhing mdog kyang gsal bar byas// de nas gnod sbyin de dag rgyal po de rang gi sha gcod pa la 'bad cing sha bcad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi sa bzhin mdangs ma 'gyur ba
567(): dang / mi g.yo ba de bzhin du 'dug pa mthong nas/ rab tu dang zhing ngo mtshar cher gyur to// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad byung 'di dag ci// bden nam rdzun zhes brjod cing dga' ba skyes//
568(): rgyal la mi bzod zhi nas yid kyang dang // de la bstod cing phyag kyang 'tshal bar gyur// lha nyid kyi sku 'o brgyal bar mdzad pa gtang du gsol/ bdag cag kyang tshim par bgyis
569(): legs kyis/ skye bo slong ba yid dga' bar bgyid pa shin tu rmad du byung ba khyed kyi spyod pa 'di/ de 'tshal gyis gtang du gsol zhes rgyal po la gus pa dang bcas phyag 'tshal
570(): ba dang bcas par rab tu dang zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis bltas nas yang smras pa/ gus pa'i dbang gis skye bo khyed kyi grags pa sgrogs pa thog tu bab// dpal yang pad+ma'i nags
571(): tshal btang ste khyod la brten pa thog tu bab// brgya byin mgon du gyur kyang khyod kyi mthus bskyabs sa yi lha mo 'di// mtho ris kyis mthong smon par nges te gal te mi smon bslus su
572(): zad/ mang du smos kyang ci dgos te/ skye bo 'di lta bus mngon par bzung ba'i mi'i 'jig rten 'di dag ni skal ba dang ldan pa'o// khyod lta bu'o brgyal bar bgyis pa 'dis ni bdag
573(): cag bsregs kyis ma mchis so// da 'di ltar gyur pa las kyang skye bo khyod lta bu la brten nas bdag cag thar bar nus grang / bdag cag gis nongs par bgyis pa gsol ba'i slad du/
574(): zhu bar 'tshal lo// bde ba brnyes par gyur pa dang // rgyal po'i dpal yang bor nas ni// 'di lta bu yi spyod pa yis// rmad du byung ba'i gnas ci bzhed// tham/
575(): cad sa yi bdag po 'am// nor gyis phyug pa 'am dbang po'am// tshangs pa 'am rnam par grol ba dag/ dka' thub 'di yis bzhed lags sam// 'di lta bu yi rtsol phod pas// bzhed
576(): pa'i don ni mi ring ste// gal te bdag cag thos rung na// bdag cag la ni bka' stsal rigs// rgyal pos smras pa// ci'i phyir nga 'di ltar byed pa nyon cig/ rnyed par dka' la 'jig
577(): par sla ba dang // cho ga pa'i bde med rab tu zhi med pa'i// srid pa'i longs spyod bde ba mi 'dod// lha dbang dpal yang 'dod pa ma yin na// de las gzhan pa smos kyang ci zhig dgos//
578(): bdag gi sdug bsngal zad pa tsam gyi phyir// nga yi yid ni mgu bar 'gyur ma yin// sdug bsngal mi zad nad kyis nyen pa yi// lus can mgon med 'di rnams ngas bltas nas// bsod/
579(): nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa yi// go 'phang thob cing skyon gyi dgra btul nas// rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i rlabs 'khrugs pa'i// srid pa'i mtsho las skye bo 'don par 'dod/
580(): de nas gnod sbyin de dag rab tu dga' zhing ba spu langs nas/ rgyal po la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'di lta bu'i rtsol ba khyad par can gyi las 'di ni rigs te/ de bas na khyod lta bu'i
581(): dgongs pa 'grub pa ni ring po mi rdzogs so snyam du yid la nges par bsams nas gsol ba btab pa/ khyod kyi mdzad pa 'di kun no// 'jig rten pan pa'i phyir lags kyang // bdag
582(): cag rang la phan 'tshal bas// de tshe bdag cag dgongs su gsol// ma 'tshal bas na bdag cag gis// bdag gi don yang ma mthong bas// de ltar khyod ni 'o brgyal bas// de yang
583(): bzod pa mdzad du gsol// khyod kyi bka' yang bdag cag la// rjes su bzung ba'i rgyur gyur pa// blon po dag la bgyi ba bzhin// 'dzem pa med par btsal ba'i rigs// de nas
584(): rgyal po des de dag sems rab tu dang zhing 'jam par gyur par rig nas smras pa/ 'di ni nga la phan pa yin gyi// gnod pa min pas mi bzod du dogs pa ma bskyed cig/ gzhan yang /
585(): chos kyi lam la 'di ltar grogs byed pa// byang chub thob nas brjed par ga la 'gyur// rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi las// khyed cag nyid la thog mar bgo bar bya// nga ni de la
586(): dga' bar shes byas nas// srog gcod khyed kyis dug bzhin spang bar byos// gzhan ner chung ma dag la chags pa dang // rdzun du spyi dang chang gi sdig pa spongs// de nas gnod sbyin/
587(): de dag de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes de la mnyan nas/ de la bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// sems dpa' chen po des bdag gi sha dang khrag nges par spyi
588(): par byas pa de nyid kyi tshe/ sa ni rnam pa mang por g.yos par gyur// gser gyi ri bo rnam par 'gul bar gyur// de na gnas pa'i rnga rnams sgra yang 'byin/
589(): shing rnams 'gul bas me tog lhags par gyur// de dag rdzis bskyod mkha' la sprin ltar chags// la lar bla rer bris shing bya rgyus bzhin// kha cig tu ni phreng ba brgyus pa bzhin//
590(): mi yi bdag po'i khor yug mnyam par lhags// rgya mtsho chen po shin tu bdo ba'i rlabs// rang bzhin las ni lhags pa'i shugs dang sgras// 'gro la brtun pa'i lus ni gzi mdangs
591(): can/ sa yi bdag po bzlog pa bzhin du byung // de nas lha yi bdag po 'di ci zhes// brtabs par gyur nas de yi rgyu rtog cing // rgyal po nyes par dogs te rab myur bar//
592(): rgyal po'i pho brang mya ngan 'khrug par 'ongs// sa yi bdag po de ltar gyur na yang // gzi mdog gsal bas lhag par ya mtshan skyes// thad du 'ongs nas snyan pa'i tshig rnams kyis//
593(): dang zhing dga' bas de yi spyod pa bstod// e ma'o skye bo dam pa'i chos re bzang // e ma'o yon tan sgom pa rgya re che// e ma'o gzhan la phan pa'i blo re des// sa 'di khyod la
594(): gtad pa mgon dang bcas// zhes bstod nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha dang mi'i sman gyi khyad par rma sar pa sos par byed nus pa rnams kyis/ de'i lus sngon bzhin
595(): du sdug bsngal med par byas nas/ rgyal po des kyang mthun pa dang / gus pa'i yo byad kyis slar mchod pa byas te nyid kyi gnas su slar dong ngo // de ltar na snying rje chen po rnams ni
596(): gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal zhing bdag gi bde ba la mi lta ba yin na/ nor tsam la chags nas gtong mi phod pa lta su zhig yod ces skye bo sbyin pa byed pa dag la gzengs bstod pa
597(): dang snying rje'i yon tan la bsngags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba bstan pa dang / bsti stang du byas te chos mnyan pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
598(): slong lnga po 'di dag ni mang du byed byed pa'o zhes gang gsungs pa de yang 'di la dgongs so// de'i tshe na gnod sbyin lnga por gyur pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ci ltar zhal gyis
599(): bzhes pa de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsi byin pa yin no// byams pa'i stobs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te brgyad pa'o// // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni/ sems
600(): can ngal pa rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba tsam yang legs par byed mi nus nA/ kun tu spyad pa lta ga la nus/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ dbang po dul ba/ goms par gyur pa
601(): dpa' ba dang / tshul dang dul ba phur sum tshogs pas rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal thob po/ rgan pa la bsnyen bkur nges par byas pas/ rig byed gsum dang / brtag pa'i don
602(): gyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pa/ nang gi 'khor rang gi chos dang las la 'bad pa/ yid ma byung zhing bde bar 'tsho ba/ snying nye ba rnams kyis bka' khrims
603(): bzang po bsgrags pa/ 'tsho chis bya ba legs par 'byor pa/ yul shi bi pa rnams kyi rgyal po kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo // yon tan ldan pa'i mi yi bdag po'i dpal/
604(): rigs ldan chung ma bzhin du snying nye ba// ri phug seng+ges bsrungs pa'i ri dgas bzhin// sa yi bdag po gzhan rnams glags mi lta// dka' thub rnams dang rigs dang rgyu rtsal la//
605(): gang gi 'khor gyis goms par byas pa rnams// 'ongs na rim gro lhag par che bar 'gyur// bkur sti byas pas gtso bo yin par snang // de rgyal srid thob ma thag tu de'i bu/
606(): thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba yon tan mang po rtag tu grags pa zhig rgyal tshab tu gyur te/ de'i tshe rgyal tsha ba de bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yin no// gzhon yang rgan pa'i nye bar zhi la
607(): dga'// gzi byin che yang bzod cing nges pa dang // mkhas par gyur kyang shes pa'i nga rgyal med// dpal dang ldan zhing 'byor yang dregs pa med// de yi grags pas 'jig
608(): rten gsum khyab pas// phyogs rnams rab tu rgya chen mthong gyur kyang // gzhan gyi grags pa cung zad yod pa rnams// 'phro ba'i skabs ni med pa bzhin du gyur// skye bo rnams
609(): la sdug bsngal dbang byed pa// de yis ma bzod snying rje'i gzhu drag dang // sbyin pa'i mda' rnams char bzhin 'bebs pa yis// de dang lhan cig g.yul chen 'gyed pa 'dra/
610(): denyin re zhing slong ba lhags pa rnams la// bslangs pa bas kyang lhag par nyon mo mongs par nor gtong zhing / tshig 'jam pa dang gus pa dang yid du 'ong bas rab tu tshim par byed par
611(): gyur to// dus mtshams kyi nyi ma dag la yang / gso sbyong dang / nges par gnas pa dang / rab tu zhi bas brgyan te/ mgo khrus byas shing gos dkar po gyon nas/ glang po
612(): tshe'i mchog gangs ri 'dra ba/ dregs pa'i dngul gyis gdong brgyan pa/ mtshan nyid dang / dul ba dang / mgyogs pa dang / snying skyobs che ba phun sum tshogs pa/ grags pa
613(): bzhon par 'os pa'i spos kyi glang po che mchog zhon nas grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug na bdag gi sbyin gtong gi khang pa skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi rdzing bu dang 'dra ba bshams te bzhag pa
614(): rnams nyul du song ngo // dga' ba'i khyad par 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur te/ phongs pa rnams la sbyin 'dod pa'i// dga' ba gang dag skye ba ni// khyim na gnas pa'i
615(): longs spyod la// de tsam du ni dga' ba med// de nas re shig cig de de ltar sbyin pa byed pa la/ snying rab tu dga' ba'i slong mo pa rnams kyis kun tu grags pa thos nas/ de'i
616(): nyi 'og gi rgyal po gzhan zhig gis bsams pa/ 'din sbyin pa la dga' ba'i dbang du gyur pas bslu bar nus so snyam nas/ glang po che'i mchog blang ba'i
617(): phyir der bram ze dag cig btang ngo // de nas thams cad sgrol rang gi sbyin gtong gi khang pa nyul zhing rab tu dga' bas bzhin gyi mdangs bzang po la/ bram ze de dag gis rgyal ba
618(): dang shis pa brjod nas/ lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng ste bstod nas/ mdun du bsdad pa dang / des glang po che'i mchog de'i kha bzung nas zhe sa dang bcas par ci bzhed
619(): gsungs shig ces ci'i phyir lhags pa dris so// bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod ni sbyin la dpa' ba dang // khyod kyi glang po chen po 'di// 'gros bzang 'gying zhing 'gro
620(): ba yi// yon tan 'tshal phyir bdag cag mchis// te so'i gangs dang 'dra ba yi// glang chen 'di ni btsal ba yis// 'jig rten 'di dag la mtshan gyis// yid ni rab tu
621(): dang bar mdzod// ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rab tu dga' bas kun tu rgyas par gyur nas/ yun ring mo zhig na gdod slongs mo pa'i skye bo rlabs cher slong
622(): phod pa mthong bar gyur to snyam du bsams so// bram ze 'di dag la ni glang po che'i rgyal po 'di lta bu dag cang mi dgos kyi/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni brkam pa dang phrag dog gi skyon gyis
623(): yid dkrugs pa'i rgyal po 'ga' zhig gi 'dod chen gyis sbyar te btang ngo snyam du nges so// grags dang chos la'ang ma bltas par// nga la phan bzhin gang byed pa// rgyal po de yi
624(): bsam pa dag/ re thag chad par mi bya'o// de ltar nges par byas nas bdag nyid chen po de glang po che'i mchog de las myur du babs te/ bzhes su gsol zhes nas gser gyi ril ba
625(): btud de de dag gi mdun du 'dug go// nor sgrub ngar ni chos lam mi mthun pa'i// rgyal po'i gtsug lag dag la mkhas gyur kyang // chos la dga' bas de nas glang chen byin/
626(): tshul dang 'gal bas de ni g.yos ma gyur// glang chen gser gyi dra bas mdzes par legs brgyan pa// ston ka'i sprin tshogs glog 'gyu 'dra ba de byin nas// mi yi dbang po'i sras
627(): de rab tu dga' bar gyur// tshul gyi phyogs la dga' bas grong khyer pa rnams 'khrugs// de nas glang ngo che'i rgyal po de byin pa thos nas/ yul shi ba~M pa'i bram ze rgan po dang / blon po
628(): bka' la gtogs pa dang / dmag mi dang / grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams ca co'i sgra phyung nas/ rgyal po kun tu rgyal ba de'i drung du lhags te/ rtab rtab por gyur te mi bzod cing
629(): rngams te/ zhes btang nas rko long du smras pa/ lha rgyal srid kyi dpal 'di ltar che ba btsal kyang yal bar 'dor ba 'di ci lags/ lha nyid kyi rgyal srid 'di ltar nyams par gyur
630(): pa bzod pa mdzad pa mi rigs so// rgyal pos rings rings skad du 'di ci nyes zhes smras pa dang / yang spras pa/ ci lha mi mkhyen tam/ gang gi 'gram pa
631(): bung ba sgra sgrogs pa// rdul gyi dri zhim rlung gis reg pa yi// gzhan gyi glang po myos shing dregs pa rnams// rtsal ba'i sdug bsngal med par zil mnon pa// gang gi gzi yis
632(): khyod kyi dgra bo rnams// mthu stobs mnan cing dregs pa med byas pa// thams cad sgrol gyis glang po de byin pas// khyod kyi rgyal ba gzugs can gzhan yul song // ba dang
633(): gser dang gos dang bza' ba dag/ rgyal pos bram ze rnams la sbyin par 'os// gang la dpal dang rgyal ba des yod pa'i// glang chen btang bas sbyin pa dpa' ches so// tshul dang
634(): 'gal ba'i lam du song ba 'di// rgyal po'i dpal ni ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di ni yal bar bor na khyod la gnod// khyod kyi dgra ni mdun nas dga' bar byed// de skad thos
635(): nas rgyal po de bu la byams pas/ de dag nyid la cung zad cig yid mi dga' bar gyur nas/ dgos pa'i dbang gis mi dga' bzhin du de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ yul shi bi pa
636(): rnams la yid bzhes te smras pa/ thams cad sgrol 'di sbyin pa la zhugs shing tshul gyi rim pa la mi lta bar ngas shes te/ rgyal srid la dbang byed du bcug pa ni/ de ltar yang bya/
637(): bami rigs mod kyi/ 'dis kyang rang gi glang po che byin zin pas/ skyugs pa dang 'dra bar bor blta ga la su zhig slar 'phrog/ 'on kyang ngas 'di ci nas kyang sbyin pa la chod zin par
638(): bya yis/ khyed 'di ltar 'khrug par ma byed cig/ shi bi pa rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po thams cad sgrol 'di ni/ don 'di lta bu dag la gtams pa tsam gyis mchis su
639(): btub pa ma lags so// kun tu rgyal bas smras pa/ 'o na de la ngas gzhan ci zhig bya/ nyes par spyod la gang zhig mi dga' zhing // yon tan sten la skyon du bzung ngam ci/
640(): glang po de yi phyir ni bdag gi bu// gsod dam 'on te bzung ngam ci zhig bya// de bas na khyed 'di la rngam zhing 'khrug par ma byed cig dang ngas thams cad sgrol 'di lta bu dag byed du mi gzhug
641(): go/ de nas yul shi bi ba rnams khros nas rgyal po la smras pa/ mi yi dbang po khyod kyi sras de la// gsad dam bcing ngam rdeg pa su zhig 'tshal// chos la zhen pa snying rje'i
642(): bdag nyid pas// 'dis ni rgyal srid gzung bar yong mi nus// 'khor gsum sten la mkhas shing gzi che la// grags pa thob pas seng+ge'i khri la 'os// tshul la mi lta chos
643(): la rang dga' bas// 'di ni dka' thub nags na gnas par 'os// sa yi bdag po rnams kyi tshul nyes skyon// de la brten pa rnams la 'byung mod kyi// 'on kyang de dag bcos
644(): su rung ba mchis// sa bdag gtso bo nyams na bcos mi rung // 'di la mang du gsol yang ci 'tshal te// khyod kyi srid nyams mi bzod shi bi ga// 'di
645(): rnams kyis ni 'di ltar nges par bcad// mi rje'i sras 'di dka' thub 'phel ba'i phyir// grub pas bsten pa'i ri bo bang gar btang // tshul ma yin pas nyams su dogs shing phan
646(): par dga' ba'i skye bo de dag gi ngo bzlog phod par smras pa dang / de nas rgyal po de bu dang 'bral bas sems gdungs pas khong sngangs shing ngo tsha ba bzhin du mgo smad de nyam nga nga ltar shugs
647(): nar zhes phyung nas/ byams shing spobs pa dang yid bcugs pa'i dbang gis yul shi bi pa rnams la smras pa/ khyed de ltar 'di la gal gyis 'chu na re shig nyin zhag gcig tsam spro ba
648(): srings shig dang / sang nang par khyod kyi bsams pa bzhin du thams cad sgrol byed du gzhug go// yul shi bi pa rnams kyis de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ bsgo ba mnyan pa dang
649(): rgyal po des gsol ka ba la khyod song la 'di ltar gyur pa thams cad sgrol la sbron cig ces bka' stsal to// des kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas/ mya ngan gyi mchi mas gdong
650(): khebs shing thams cad sgrol rang gi khang pa na 'dug pa'i drung du song ste/ mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyi shugs kyis skad phyung ste ngus nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal to// thams
651(): cad sgrol gyis rtabs rtabs ltar/ e ma'o rgyal po thugs bde 'am zhes dris pa dang / mi dga' bas tshig mi gsal bar de la rgyal po ni thugs bde'o zhes smras so// 'o na ci'i phyir
652(): de ltar mi brtan par gyur ces thams cad sgrol gyis yang dris pa dang / gsol ka ba mchi mas brnangs shing skad 'dzer ba la dbugs kyis brnangs pa'i tshig mi gsal bas/ gcom
653(): chung ngus smras pa/ shi bi pa rnams mi srun par// 'khrugs par gyur nas rgyal po'i bka'// 'jam pos stsal ba'ang mi nyan par// rgyal po khyod ni yul nas 'byin// thams
654(): cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ yul shi bi pa rnams ci'i phyir 'khrugs nas nga skrong/ 'dul dang 'gal ba'i lam mi 'gro// bag med pa la nga mi dga'// nyes par byas pa'ang ma
655(): mthong na// shi bi pa rnams ci'i phyir 'khrug/ gsol ka bas smras pa/ ha cang rlabs ches pas lan no// khyod ni chags pa med la dga' bar gyur// slong ba rnams kyi yid ni
656(): chags la dga'// glang po'i rgyal po khyod kyis byin pa'i phyir// shi bi pa rnams 'khrugs nas brtan pa nyams// de bas rang gi chos bor te// khyod la tsham chom med par ni// gang
657(): du spyugs mi dong ba yi// lam der khyod kyang song zhes zer// de nas byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba la goms pa'i shas che ba dang / skye bo slong ba la byams pa dang / rang gi
658(): brtan pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/ yul shi bi pa rnams ni mi brtan pa'i rang bzhin can te nga'i rang bzhin mi shes pa ltar byed mod/ 'jig rten/
659(): don dung lus 'di 'dzin na// phyi rol nor lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// rang gi mig dang mgo yang ngas sbyin na// phyi rol nor sbyin spos kyang ci zhig dgos// slong ba rnams kyis
660(): blangs pa'i tshig dag la// rang gi lus kyang gtong bar sems pa la// skrag par byas nas mi sbyin snyam sems pa// byis pa rnams kyi mi brtan ston du zad// shi bi pa rnams thams/
661(): cad kyis// nga ni bsad dam spyugs kyang rung // mi sbyin par ni nga mi byed// dka' thub tshal du 'gror zad mod// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mos gtam ngan thos te bzhin
662(): gyur pa la yul shi bi pa rnams kyis 'dir ji ltar nges par byas pa khyod kyis thos sam/ nga las khyod kyis ci thob dang // gang yang khyod kyi pha ma yis// nor rnams cung zad ci yod/
663(): pa/ de dag khyod kyis gter du spos// mA traMs smras pa/ lha 'di dag gar gter du sba bar bgyi/ thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ rtag par tshul khrims ldan pa la/
664(): sbyin pa bkur stis brgyan pa byin// nor rnams de ltar gter bcug pa// rjes su 'gro zhing 'phrog tu med// gyos rgyug gnyis po bde bar mdzod// byis pa gnyis kyang yongs
665(): su skyongs// chos la gcig tu bag yod byos// nga med mya ngan ma byed cig/ mA tres de thos nas/ snying rab tu gdungs kyang / khyim thab mi dga' ba spang ba'i phyir/ mya ngan dang /
666(): mi dga' ba btang te smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nyag gcig pu// nags su gshegs pa chos ma mchis// rgyal rigs gang du gshegs pa der// bdag kyang de bas mchi bar 'tshal/
667(): lha bdag gis ni nags tshal na gnas pa mi bde bar ma mthong lags so// ci'i slad du zhe na/ mi srun mi med shing dang chu la spyad// bya rnams sna tshogs sgra 'byin ri dgas mang // ne'u
668(): seng sngon po yid 'ong bai DUr 'dra// skyed mos tshal bas dka' thub nags tshal dgyes// lha gzhan yang / nags tshal lcug ma'i khrod dag na// gzhon nu 'di gnyis 'phreng ba yis//
669(): brgyan cing rtse ba gzigs na ni// rgyal srid dag kyang dgongs mi 'gyur// dus kyi dbang gis gyur pa yi// nags tshal mdzes pa sar pa dang // sman ljongs 'bab chur bcas pa
670(): yi// nags tshal dag na dgyes par 'gyur// dga' ba 'tshal ba'i bya rnams ni// sna tshogs sgra 'byin sil snyan bzhin// 'dod chags bde ba'i slob dpon gyis// bstan pa'i
671(): rma bya gar yang bgyid// bung ba'i na chung glu len pa// rab tu snyan cing ma smad pa'ang // nags tshal dag na glu gar gyis// khyod kyi thugs ni dgyes par bgyid// nags tshal
672(): dag na mtshan mo'i zla 'od ni// ras dkar bzang pos g.yogs pa'i rdole ba dang // me tog shing gis dri zhim bsgos pa yis// nags tshal bser du bsil yab
673(): g.yob par bgyid// 'bab chu'i na chung gor mas bskyod pa yi// chab sgra snyan pa lhung lhung sgra sgrogs pa// rgyan gyi sgra rnams sil khrol mchi ba bzhin// khyod kyi thugs ni rab tu dgyes
674(): par bgyid// de de ltar btsun mo gnang chen gyis yid bzhos pa dang / nags tshal du 'gro ba la sems spro bar gyur nas/ skye bo slongs mo pa rnams la bltas te/ sbyin pa chen po byin
675(): pa la zhugs so// de nas thams cad sgrol de ltar btang bar gyur pa thos nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang na ngung mo'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to// skye bo slongs mo pa rnams kyang mya ngan gyis
676(): gdungs pa'i shugs kyis brgyal ba bzhin du gyur cing / smyo bla can du gyur pa bzhin du smre sngags rnam pa mang po 'don par gyur to// 'bras bu zhim po yod pa'i grib shing dag/ bcad pa'i
677(): phyir ni sta re gzas pa rnams// 'dzin pa'i sa ni ngo mtshar ma gyur pa// 'di ni sems pa med par gsal bar mngon// chu gtsang zhim po bsil bas gang ba yi// rdzing bu 'dral ba
678(): dag kyang mi 'gog na// 'jig rten skyong rnams ming ni don med gyur// grags par zad dam gal te gud du dong // gang na rgyal po thams cad sgrol// rang gi srid las phyung bas
679(): na/ kye ma'o chos min gnyid ma log/ chos ni gnyid log yang na shi// bdag cag phongs pa slongs mo pa// nyes pa cung zad med pa la// srog la rgol ba mi srun pa// de wa
680(): phung byed mkhas pa med// de nas byang chub sems dpas nor bu rin po che dang / gser dang dngul gyis gang ba'i mdzod 'bum phrag du ma dang / nor dang 'bru mang po ldan pa'i byang
681(): mdzod rnams dang / bran pho dang bran mo dang theg pa dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang yo byad la sogs pa thams cad phongs pa rnams la ji ltar rigs par byin te/ pha ma mya ngan gyi sdug
682(): bsngal gyis brtan pa zil gyis gnon pa gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bu dang chung mar bcas te/ shing rta'i mchog la zhon nas bsod nams kyi nyin par gyi sgra bzhin du
683(): skye bo mang po cho nge 'don pa'i sgra sgrogs shing / grong khyer gyi mchog gi nang nas phyir byung ste/ rjes su chags pa'i dbang gis rjes su 'brang ba'i skye bo mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i mchi
684(): mas gdong yog pa rnams nan gyis slar bzlog ste bkye nas/ bdag nyid kyis srab skyogs bzung ste/ ri bangadag gang na ba der song ngo // grong khyer gyi mchog gi nyen kor skyed
685(): mos tshal bzang po yid du 'ong ba dang ra ba 'das nas kyang / yid 'khrug pa med par mthar gyis grib shing nyung zhing skye bo 'grul ba'i rgyun chad pa/ ri dgas mang po rab tu rgyu ba/
686(): phyogs gsal bar snang ba/ tshad byi'u tsa ci'i sgra grag pa'i dgon pa zhig tu phyin to// de nas bram ze khyams pa dag cig gis de la shing rta 'dren pa'i rta blangs
687(): so// dpag tshad du ma'i lam du de lus la// bu smad bcas shing grogs ni med gyur kyang // sbyin la dga' bas phyi rjes mi blta bar// bram ze rnams la rta bzhi byin par gyur/
688(): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis shing rta drang bar bsams nas/ legs par chas pa dang / gnod sbyin gzhon nu bzhi zhig ri dgas dmar po'i gzugs su bsgyur
689(): nas rta bzang po rab tu dul ba bzhin du bdag cag nyid kyi shing rta'i gnya' shing gnya' bar thogs par gyur to// de mthong ba dang / mA tra dga' zhing ngo mtshar du gyur pas/ mig
690(): dgrang ba la/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gang na 'di ltar blo bur 'ongs pa la// byams pa'i rtswa zug ri dgas mchog 'khod nags// dka' thub can gyi gnas bcas
691(): bkur ba yi// mthu chen khyad par 'phags pa 'di la ltos// mA tres smras pa/ dam pa rnams kyi yon tan dag/ rab tu goms kyang mi 'dra bas// bdag gis bsams na
692(): mthu chen 'di// rgyal po khyod kyi lags pa snyam// mtsho yi nang na skar ma'i gzugs brnyan rnams// ku ru nga rgyas pas lhag par mdzes gyur pa// zla ba'i 'od zer ltad mo blta ba
693(): bzhin/ 'dir mchis pa rnams rgyur gyur lags pa snyam// de ltar de dag phan tshun rjes su mthun pas cig la gcig snyan par smras shing lam du zhugs te dong ba las/ bram ze
694(): zhig 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la shing rta spangs so// slong la dga' ba'i gnyen gyur pa// bdag gi bde la ma chags des// shing rta byin pas bram ze de'i// re ba
695(): yongs su rdzogs par byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid dga' bzhin du/ bdag gi bu smad shing rta las pang ste/ shing rta'i mchog bram ze de la byin nas/ gzhon nu dra ba can
696(): pang du thogs te rkang pas lam du zhugs so// mA traM'ang yid la mi dga' ba med par gzhon nu ma kr-iSh+Na 'dzin pang du thogs te de dang 'grogs te song ngo // ljon pa'i shing rnams 'bras bu
697(): bzang po yis// rtse mo btud nas mgron du gnyer ba bzhin// bsod nams mthu yis mngon du lta byed cing // slob ma dul ba phyag kyang 'tshal ba 'dra// gang du chu 'dod gyur pa rda
698(): dag tu// dang mo'i dpung mgos pad+ma bskyod pa yis// ze ba lhags pas ser por gsal gyur pa'i// mtsho rnams de la rab tu byung bar gyur// sprin rnams kyis kyang bla re bzang po
699(): bres/ bser bu bde ba dri zhim dad kyang ldang // ngal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba mi bzod pas// gnod sbyin rnams kyis de yi lam yang bsnyungs// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
700(): skyed mos tshal gyi nang nas 'gro ba bzhin du/ 'chag na dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su myong zhing / lam gyis dub pa'i sdug bsngal ma myong bar/ bu smad dang bcas
701(): te phyin nas bad ga'i ri mthong bar gyur to// de na yang me tog dang 'bras bu dang lo mas brgyan pa'i shing ljon pa snum snum ltar 'dus pa rnam pa du mas gang ba/ bya mang po 'dod pas myos
702(): shing dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ rma ba mang po gar byed pas mdzes par gyur pa/ ri dgas kyi rigs du ma rgyu ba/ mitsho chu sngon po gtsang mas ched du bskor ba ltar 'dug pa/ me tog gi
703(): dris bsgos pa'i bser bu dang ldang ba'i dka' thub kyi nags tshal du/ nags tshal na rgyu ba rnams kyis lam mtshon te zhugs pa dang / de na'ang brgya byin gyis bka' stsal te/ las sna tshog
704(): byed pa nyid kyis byas pa/ shing lo'i khang pa mthong na yid du 'ong ba/ dus thams cad du bde ba/ de lta bu zhig tu gnas bcas te 'dug go// nags tshal de na chung ma sdug pas bkur sti
705(): byas// bdag gi byis pa'i sman dngags ma bsgribs snyan pa nyan// skyed mos tshal na 'dug bzhin rgyal srid bsam pa med// l-i phyed lhag tsam de ni dka' thub spyod par gyur// de nas
706(): re shig cig rgyal po'i btsun mo rtsa ba dang 'bras bu tshol du song ba'i 'og tu/ byis pa gnyis bskyang ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i bu gnas bsrung zhing 'dug pa na/ bram ze lam gyi rdul gyis rkang
707(): pa dang / byin pa rtsub rtsub ltar 'dug pa/ ngal bas bzhin mdog dang mig rtsa nyams pa/ ril ba spyi blugs dbyig pa la btags pa phrag pa la thogs pa/ chung mas g.yog khrid
708(): de shog cig par ched cher spring ba zhig phyogs der 'ongs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas yun ring mo zhig na gdod phongs pa 'ongs par mthong nas/ yid rab tu dang bas mig dang
709(): bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu gsal bar gyur nas/ bsu ste 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba la sogs te tshig snyan pa brjod de/ dka' thub kyi nags kyi nang du bzhag nas/ blo bur du 'ongs
710(): pa la bkur sti bya ba byas te/ ci'i phyir 'ongs pa dris so// de nas bram ze de chung ma la byams pas/ brtan pa dang ngo tsha ba bor zhing bslang ba 'ba' zhig tu chas pas/ don 'di lta bu smras
711(): so// gang na snang zhing mnyam pa'i lam yod pa// 'jig rten 'di dag der deng nyam ngar min// 'gro ba 'di ni phal cher ser snas bsgribs// bdag gis gzhan du spang ba'i tshig mi
712(): byin/ sbyin la dpa' ba'i grags dang dpal dag gis// mthar phyung ma lus khyod kyis mthar phyin pas// de phyir bdag ni slongs mo bgyid par gyur// de bas sras gnyis g.yog
713(): tu bdag la stsol// de skad ces spras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin la dga' ba goms byas shing // slar zlog pa ni ma bslabs pas// rab tu
714(): sdug pa'i bu gnyis kyang // tsham tshom med par sbyin zhes smras// bde legs su gyur cig/ nga 'di na mchis te cing gyi zhes bram zes smras pa dang / bu
715(): gnyis kyis byin pa'i gtam thos pas skrag pa'i mig rig rig por gyur pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i shugs kyis snying gdungs par gyur pas
716(): smras pa/ khyed la 'di gnyis ngas byin no// 'di gnyis ma ni nags tshal du// rtsa ba 'bras bu tshol du song // de yang de ring 'dir 'ong gis// 'dir ni zhag gcig ngal so la//
717(): de dang phrad nas 'o byas pa// rgyun gyis brgyan cing 'phreng ba can// nga yi bu gnyis sang khrid cig/ bram zes smras pa/ khyod 'di la dus kyis 'chu ba 'di thong zhig/ bud med
718(): rnams ni mi drang bas// ming ni g.yon can zhes su btags// khyod kyis sbyin pa gegs byed kyis// de bas bdag ni 'dug mi 'dod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa
719(): sbyin pa'i gegs su gyur du ma dogs shig/ de ni nga'i chos spyod pa'i grogaso yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'di la khyod ci dgar zad do// gzhan yang bram ze chen po/ rab tu gzhon
720(): zhing byis pa la// g.yog gi bya ba mi mkhas pas// 'di gnyis khyod kyi bran byed kyang // ji lta bur na mgu bar 'gyur// shi bi'i rgyal po nga yi yab// 'di gnyis 'di ltar
721(): gyur mthong na// 'di gnyis blu ba'i nor dag ni// ci 'dod khyod la nges par ster// de bas de yi yul du ni// 'di gnyis khrid na legs par 'gyur// de ltar byas na nor chen dang /
722(): chos rnams dang yang ldan par 'gyur// bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal po sbrul gdug pa dang 'dra ba'i drung du/ mi dga' ba'i skyes 'tshal te mchi ba'i rngo mi thog go// rgyal pos bdag la
723(): 'di gnyis 'phrog/ yang na chad pas gcod kyang srid// de bas 'di gnyis bram ze mo'i// g.yog tu bdag nyid khrid de mchi// de nas byang chub sems dpas don yongs su ma rdzogs
724(): par/ 'o na nga ci dgar zad ces smras nas/ bu gnyis la rjes su chags pa dang bcas par g.yog legs par byos shig ces rjes su gtams nas/ len du gzhug pa'i phyir/ bram
725(): ze'i lag pa brkyang ba la ril ba spyi blugs btud do// de yis bsgrims pa'i mthu dag gis// ril ba las ni chu byung na// mig ni pad+ma dmar 'dra las// ma bsgrims par yang mchi
726(): ma byung // de nas bram ze de brkam pas ha cang yang dga' ches nas/ brtabs pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i bu dbrog par rings pas shis par brjod pa'i tshig
727(): mdor smras nas/ tshig drag po rtsub pos phyir byung zhes smras nas/ gzhon nu gnyis dka' thub kyi nags nas phyir phyung ngo // de nas gzhon nu gnyis bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis snying
728(): gdungs pas pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du smras pa/ yab cig yum yang slad rol phyung // khyod kyang bdag cag btang bar bzhed// de
729(): dang mjal gyi bar du gzhes// de nas bdag cag khyod kyis stsol// de nas bram ze des bsams pa/ 'di gnyis kyi ma'ang de'u re 'di nas tshur 'ong la/ 'di yang bu la byams pas
730(): 'gyod pa skye yang srid do snyam nas/ pad+ma'i bam po bcings pa bzhin du/ de gnyis kyi lag pa lcug mas bcings pa dang / de gnyis gcig la gcig 'khri zhing / pha la bzhin slar phyog
731(): te lta ba rab tu zhan pa'i gzhon nu gzhon sha can gnyis bsdigs shing khrod do// de nas gzhon nu me kr-iSh+Na 'dzin sdug bsngal dang po myong ba des skad phyung ste ngu zhing pa la smras pa/ ba cig
732(): bdag la bram ze 'di// brtse ba med par lcug mas 'ju// bram ze chos dang ldan zhes gda'// 'di ni drabram ze ma lags nges// gnod sbyin bram zer bsgyur nas ni// nges par
733(): bza' ba'i phyir khrid do// sha zas bdag cag khrid gyur na// yab cig ci phyir yal bar dor// de nas gzhon nu dra ba can yang / ma'i spyi sngags 'don cing smras pa/ bram ze
734(): bdag la rdeg pa 'di// de tsam sdug bsngal mi che yi// de ring yum dang ma mjal ba// de yis bdag ni bkas pa bzhin// dka' thub nags tshal stong pa ni// yum ni nges pa
735(): yun rings pa shums// nyon mongs bu yi sdug bsngal gyis// bye'u phrug bsad pa'i ma mo bzhin// bdag cag phyir ni nags tshal nas// rtswa ba shing thog mang po rnams/
736(): bsnams te byon nas gnas stong 'di// gzigs nas yum ni ci ltar 'gyur// yab cig chibs rta 'di rnams dang // glang chen shing rta gang mchi las// phyed tsam yum la phul na
737(): ni/ de yis thugs ngan chung yang srid// 'phrin gyis yum la phyag 'tshal zhing // thugs ngan mdzad las bzlog tu gsol// yab cig khyod dang yum de yi// zhal ni mthong bar
738(): rab tu dka'// kr-iSh+Na tshur shog bdag cag 'dong // bram ze bran g.yog 'dod pa la// yab kyis bdag cag byin zin gyis// bdag cag gson yang ci zhig rung // de nas
739(): byang chub sems dpa'/ bu smre sngags 'don pa snying rje rje skad zer ba des blo rab tu bskyod kyang byin zin pas du 'gyod kyang ci phan snyam nas/ mya ngan gyi me bzlog dka' bas snying
740(): btsos te/ dug langs pas brgyal ba bzhin du/ sems blos blong por gyur nas de nyid du 'dug go// bser bu bsil ba'i rlung yab kyis 'du shes slar rnyed pa dang / sgra ci yang
741(): mi grag cing bu mi 'khod pa'i gnas mthong nas/ mgrin pa dbugs kyis brnangs bzhin du/ rang la rang smras pa/ nga'i snying bu zhes btags pa la// 'dzem 'dog med par
742(): mngon sum du// mtshan gyis 'debs pa ji ltar na// bram ze ngan pa ngo mi tsha// lham yang med par rkang gis dong // rab tu gzhon pas ngal mi bzod/
743(): ji ltar lam du zhugs te dong // ci ltar de yi bran g.yog byed// lam gyis ngal zhing dub pa la// su zhig de ring ngal sor 'jug/ bkres skom sdug bsngal nyen pa gnyis/
744(): bslang ba'i gnas kyang su zhig yod// bdag ni brtan par byed 'dod kyang // 'di lta bur ni sdug bsngal na// da bu bde bar bskyed pa gnyis// gnas skabs ci ltar gyur cing 'khor/
745(): kye ma'o bu dang bral ba yi// sdug bsngal me yis bdag sems sreg/ dam pa rnams ni chos dran nas// su zhig rjes su 'gyod par byed// de nas mA tra mi dga' ba 'byung
746(): ba'i lhas ngan pa rnams kyis yod mi dga' bar gyur bzhin du/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu khyer te rab tu myur bar 'ong 'dod kyang / gcan gzan khro bo rnams kyi sa lam chod pas/ ring
747(): zhig lon nas dka' thub kyi nags su phyin nas bsur 'ong ran pa'i sa dang / rtsed mo rtse ba'i sa dag ni bu gnyis mi snang ba dang / rab tu mi dga' ba'i dbang du gyur to// ltas ngan
748(): byung bas dogs pa skyes par gyur// de nas bu btsal phyir ni mig kyang blta// yang dang yang bos de gnyis lan med pas// mya ngan gdungs nas smre sngags 'don par gyur//
749(): bus pa smra ba'i sgra grag nags tshal 'dir// sngon ni bdag la mang po tshogs bzhin snang // de gnyis mi snang de gnyis de ring ni// bdag la dgon pa bzhin du skyabs med snang //
750(): kye ma gzhon nu 'di gnyis ci nyes kye// rtse rtse ngal nas gnyid kyis log gyur tam// nags tshal stug por brlag gam 'on te nyal// bdag 'od 'phyis pas maM mgu 'chus
751(): gyur tam// byis par gyur pas gshed gab cing 'khod// gal te de bsad mthong na 'khrugs nas ni// bya 'di kun kyang ci ste sgra mi 'byin// 'bab rgya drag po rlabs chen 'khrug
752(): pa yi// chu yis gal te de gnyis khyer gyur tam// 'on kyang nga ni bdag gi log par rtog pa 'di ltar ma gyur cig/ rgyal po yab sras bde legs su gyur cig/ ltas ngan mtshan ma
753(): ngan pa ston pa yang / bdag gi lus la smin par gyur cing / bdag gi snying 'di'ang ltas ngan pas dga' ba ni zlog/ mi dga' ba'i mun pas ni khebs nas/ gas pa bzhin du gyur
754(): tam tsi/ bdag gi lus kyang lha tshigs bral ba snyam byed/ phyogs rnams kyang 'khrugs pa snyam byed/ nags tshal 'di'ang dpal nyams shing g.yo ba snyam byed par gyur to//
755(): nas dka' thub kyi nags kyi nang du 'ongs nas/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag s+ho/ zhes dang bcas par khyim thab la bu gnyis gar mchis zhes dris so// de nas
756(): byang chub sems dpa' ma ni bu la byams pas snying stobs chung ba dang / mi dga' ba'i tshig brjod dka' bar shes nas/ de la cung zad kyang spra ma nus so// dga'
757(): bar bya rigs skye bo la// mi dga' smra ba'i mi dag gis// ched dkar yid ni gdung bya ba// snying rje can gyis rab tu dka'// de nas mA tres bsams pa/ 'di 'di ltar mya ngan
758(): gyis gdungs nas cang mi smra ba dang sbyar na/ bdag gi bu gnyis gdon mi za bar ma rung bar gyur to snyam nas/ dka' thub kyi nags kun tu sems kyis brtags na/ bu gnyis mi
759(): snang bas/ mchi mas brnangs nas yang smras pa/ byis pa gnyis kyang yod mi sdang // khyod kyang bdag la cang mi gsung // mi dgar gyur pa mi gsung bas/ kyi hud bdag
760(): ni bsad kyis med// de skad ces smras nas/ mya ngan gyi mes snying bsregs nas lcug ma rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du 'gyel lo// de 'gyel ma thag tu byang chub sems dpas
761(): blangs nas/ rtswa'i stan la bzhag ste// chu grang mo btab nas slar sad pa dang / dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/ byams pa'i yid kyis mi bzod la// brtan pa med du
762(): ngogs pas na// mA tre khyod la nga yis ni// sdug bsngal myur du ma smras so// rgas shing dbul po'i sdug bsngal gyis// nyen pa'i bram ze gan 'ongs// de la nga yi bu
763(): gnyis byin// mya ngan ma byed sprong srings la// bul ma sems nga la ltos// nga yi mya ngan gdungs snying la// mtshon gyis 'debs pa bzhin ma byed// bslangs par gyur na/
764(): srog dag kyang // mi sbyin par ni ci ltar nus// de bas nga yi sbyin pa la// bzang mo rjes su yi rang byos// mA tra sa de thos nas/ bu shir dogs nas snying gtses pa la/ bu
765(): gnyis gson pa'i gtam thos pas/ mya ngan chung ngu gyur nas/ khyim thab mya ngan bsang ba'i phyir mig gnyis mchi ma phyis te/ ya mtshan che bar bltas nas/ khyim thab
766(): la smras pa/ mang du gsol yang ci 'tshal te ngo mtshar che'o// 'di ltar khyod kyi thugs la ni// 'jungs pa'i skabs kyang ma rnyed pa// lha yi sems kyang nges par ni// ya
767(): mtshan che ba'i dbang du gyur// khyod kyi grags pa'i tshig sdebs sgra grags sam// lha yi rnga chen brdungs pa'i sgra rnams kyis// brag ca'i sgra yis phyogs rnams thams cad
768(): du// tshig 'bru gsal bas nam mkha' khyab par gyur// sa gzhi ri yi nu ma g.yo ba can// 'dod chags langs pa bzhin du rab tu g.yos// gser gyi me tog rnams kya
769(): mkha' las lhags// glog 'gyu 'od kyis nam mkha' gsal gyur cing // de bas thugs ngan ma mdzad par// stsal bas thugs ni dgyes par mdzod// 'jig rten rnams
770(): la btung chu bzhin// slan chad kyang ni sbyin bdag mdzod// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sa gzhi g.yos pas ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'gul ba dang / 'di
771(): ci zhig ces rtog pa skyes pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba la mtshan skyes pas/ mig dgrang pa rnams las sa g.yos pa'i rgyu/ thams cad sgrol gyi sbyin pa yin par rtogs nas/ sems
772(): rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ de'i mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur nas/ slongs mo pa 'dra bar byas te thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs so//
773(): byang chub sems dpas blo bur du 'ongs pa la bkur sti byas nas/ ci 'dod ces skabs phye ba dang / de la chung ma spangs so// mtsho chen dge la chu ni mi zad bzhin// dam pa
774(): rnams la sbyin pa'i chos mi zad// de bas lha 'dra khyod la 'phags ma slong // btsun mo 'di ni bdag la stsal ba'i rigs// byang chub sems dpa' yid mi dga' ba med pa nyid du
775(): de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/ sbyin par byas so// de nas de ni lag g.yon mA tra bzung // g.yas pas ril ba spyi blugs bzung nas ni// de yi lag g.yas rtse la chu sbrengs
776(): nas/ 'dod lha'i sems ni mya ngan me yis tshig/ de yi rang bzhin phan sems shes nas ni// sems kyang ma 'khrugs dus kyang ma dus na// sngon med sdug bsngal khur
777(): gyis non gyur nas// de la mig tshugs blta zhing bris bzhin 'dug/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de mthong nas/ snying la ngo mtshar rab tu che bar gyur te/ sems dpa' chen
778(): po de la bstod nas smras pa/ ya rabs ma rabs chos gnyis ni// e ma khyad par re che ge/ bdag nyid ma sbyangs pa rnams ni// sus kyang yid ches mi nus so// 'dod
779(): chags bral bar ma gyur pas// bu smad rab tu sdug pa dag/ de ltar ma chags sbyin byed pa// 'di 'dra'i rlabs chen su la yod// khyod kyi yon tan chags pa'i gtam
780(): dag gis// khyod kyi grags pa phyogs su sgrags par nges// nyi ma'i 'od kyis gzhan 'od zil mnan bzhin// gzhan gyi dpal grags zil gyis non par gyur// khyod kyi
781(): spyod pa mi las 'das// 'di la gnod sbyin dri ze dang // ltos 'gro sum cu rtsa gsum pa// brgya byin bcas par yi rang 'gyur// brgya byin gyis de skad smras te/ bdag gi
782(): lus 'od gsal bar 'dug pa bstan nas/ bdag ni brgya byin lags so zhes sbran te/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ zla ba btang ste zla 'od rnams// gzhan du
783(): 'gro ba mi rigs kyis// khyod kyi btsun mo mA tra 'di// khyod bdag nyid la bdag 'bul lo// brtan pa rnams ni spangs na ster// seng+ge'i chung ma lce spyang la// byin la
784(): de yis ci zhig bya// de ni seng+ge nyid la 'os// mthon po rnams dang dman pa la// rgyal ba'i myu gu 'dra bar sems// de bas de yi spyod pa res// 'jig
785(): rten rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ de bas bu dang bral bar ma sems shig/ rgyal srid nyams pa'i mya ngan ma byed cig/ khyod kyi yab ni tsha dbyug gnyis dang 'grogs// khyod kyi
786(): mgon byas mgon bcas rgyal srid byed// de skad ces smras nas/ brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// brgya byin gyi mthus bram ze de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i bu gnyis
787(): yul shi bir khrid de song ngo // de nas yul shi bi pa rnams dang / shi bi pa'i rgyal po kun tu rgyal bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu snying rje ba shin tu bya dka' ba
788(): thos na/ snying brlan par gyur te/ bram ze las byang chub sems dpa'i bu gnyis blus nas/ thams cad sgrol mgu bar byas te/ bsu nas rgyal srid byed du bcug go
789(): de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni shin tu rmad du byung ba yin pas/ de la phyogs pa'i sems can khyad par can rnams la brnyas pa 'am/ gnod pa mi bya'o// de bzhin
790(): gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa dang / bkur sti bskyed de/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// thams cad sgrol gyi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu pa'o//
791(): bam po bzhi pa// / bsam pa dge ba rnams ni sdig pa byed du gzhug par bskur mi tshugs te/ de bas na bsam pa dag par bya ba la 'bad par bya'o//
792(): de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bsod nams kyi mthus thob pa/ rgyal phran thams cad phyag 'tshal ba/ bdag dang gzhan gyi 'khor la sogs pa'i gnod pa rab tu
793(): zhi bas/ 'tsho ba med pa gdugs zla med pa bgo skal gyi rim pas thob pa'i sa skyong zhing 'dug go zhes grag go// dbang po'i dgra thul de ni sa yi mgon// 'bras bu smad pa spyad
794(): la ma chags shing // dngos po kun gyis 'gro la phan byed pa// thub pa bzhin du chos don gcig pu byed// skye dgu rnams ni gtso bo'i rjes spyod par// 'jig rten rang bzhin
795(): de yis shes gyur nas// skye dgu rnams ni dge la gzud pa'i phyir// khyad par du ni chos la spyod par gyur// nor yang byin zhing tshul khrims spyad pa mnos// bzod pa bsnyen
796(): cing 'gro ba'i don yang spyod// 'gro la phan sems mthong na zhi bar snang // gzugs can chos bzhin de ni rnam par mdzes// de nas re shig cig de'i mthus de'i yul bskyangs//
797(): kyang ma phan te/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi nyes pa dang / lha'i bu char 'bebs pa'i las su bskos pa rnams bag med par gyur pa'i dbang gis/ kha cig tu than pa byung bas
798(): 'khrug cing gnod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po des bsams pa/ 'di ni bdag gam skye dgu rnams kyis chos legs par ma snad pas lan gyi ma rung ba/
799(): gyur te snyam du blo nges par gyur to// skye dgu rnams la phan pa'i bsam pa che ba dang / de'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pas/ chos kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas par bkur ba mdun na 'don/
800(): pi'i gtso bo drim ze rgan pa rnams dang / blon po rnams la de las thar bar bya ba'i thabs dris so// de nas de dag gis mchod sbyin gyi che ga/ rig byed las 'byung ba'i srog cha/
801(): du ma gsod pa 'jigs 'jigs skad zer ba byas na/ char legs par 'bab par 'gyur bar bsams nas/ cho ga de de la gsol to// rgyal po des mchod sbyin las 'byung
802(): ba'i cho ga srog chags gsod pa'i rgyu shes nas snying rje'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de dag gi tshig de yid la 'bab par ma gyur te/ 'dul ba'i rjes su mthun par de dag la ngo zlog/
803(): bor pa'i tshig rtsub po ma smras par/ skabs gzhan gyis de dag gi gtam de khyad du bsad do// de dag yang rgyal po de la chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skabs rnyed nas/ de'i bsam pa zab cing /
804(): brtag dka' ba ma shes nas// mchod sbyin bya ba'i gros 'debs so// rgyal pos bgyi ba dre ba gang lags pa// sa gzhi thob dang yongs su bskyang ba ste// de dag khyod ni dus
805(): las 'da' mi mdzad// de dag go rims chos dang bde ba bzhin// 'khor gsum sten la mkhas par gyur pa dang // 'bangs la phan phyir gnam du bsnams pa de// mchod sbyin
806(): cho ga mtho ris them skas la// ji ltar khyod thugs bag med dbang du gyur// khyod kyi bka' ni rgyal po gzhan rnams kyis// 'di ni dngos grub mngon du grub yin zhes// 'badra
807(): dang 'dra bar rab tu gus nod na// mchod sbyin dag gi grags 'bar legs pa dag/ da ni khyod kyis mdzad pa'i dus la bab// sbyin pa mdzad cing sdom la gnus pa yis// rtag
808(): par khyod ni dbang bsgyur lags gyur kyang // 'on kyang rig byed grags pa'i mchod sbyin gyis// lha yi bu lon bral bar mdzad pa'i rigs// mchod sbyin legs par bgyis bas
809(): lha mnyes na// tshor pa 'bab pas 'byung po mgu bar bgyid// de bas 'bangs dang bdag la phan pa'i phyir// grags par 'gyur ba'i mchod sbyin cho ga mdzod// des bsams//
810(): pa/ kye ma'o gzhan gyi dring la 'jog cing / blo chung la/ dpyod mi nus pa/ chos tsam la dga' zhing dad pa skye ba'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni shin tu ma legs par bstan to// gang na
811(): 'di ltar/ 'jig rten dag na gang la skyabs btsal ba// de dag bsad pas chos su 'gyur ba ni// de yis bstan pa skye bo lam ngan song // ngan song mi bang dog pa'i nang na
812(): 'khod daphyugs rnams bsad pas chos 'gyur zhing // lha yi 'jig rten skye ba dang // lnga yang mnyes par 'gyur ba dag/ ci lta bur na dad par 'gyur//
813(): phyugs rnams bsad pa sngags kyi mthus// mtho ris 'gro phyir de bas de bsad na// chos su 'gyur zhes zer ba de yang brdzun// gzhan gyis byas pa pha rol su zhig 'thob/
814(): log par spyod las yid ni ma bzlog cing // dge ba'i las la nges par ma byas pa'i// phyugs rnams mchod sbyin dag la bsad gyur kyang // bdag byas gzhi med ji ltar
815(): mtho ris skye// mchod sbyin la bsad mtho ris 'gro na ni// bram ze bdag nyid phyugs su bsgyur la rag/ gang phyir tshul 'di gang na'ang mi snang bas// de ltar de dag tshig
816(): ni su zhig nyan// mtshungs med mthu bsung ro dang gzi ldan pa'i// bdud rtsi zas mchog lha mos phul ba dag/ bor nas phyugs bsad sha khrag la sogs pas// lha rnams
817(): mgu bar 'gyur ba ga la srid// rgyal po des nga ni 'dir 'di ltar bya dgos so snyam du bsams nas/ mchod sbyin bya ba la mos pa 'dra bar byas te/ de dag gi tshig de mnyan nas/
818(): de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag 'di ltar bdag la phan par sems pa ni/ bdag mgon dang bcas shing phan 'dogs pa dang ldan par gyur to// de bas na bdag ni mi stong gi
819(): mchod sbyin byed 'dod kyis ji ltar bskos pa'i blon po rnams de'i yo byad sbyor du chug cig/ bkadas rtsig tu rung ba'i sa phyogs dang / de dang mthun pa'i tshes grangs dang byed pa dang /
820(): yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dang sbyor ba'ang rtogs shig/ de nas de la mdun na 'don gyis spras pa/ 'dod pa'i don grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgyal po chen po re shig khrus mdzod
821(): cig dang / mchod sbyin cig bgyis lags nas/ smad ma rnams rim gyis brtsam mo// cig car mi stong bzung na/ khyod kyi 'bangs rnams gdon mi za bar yid 'byung bar
822(): 'gyur ro// bram ze rnams kyis kyang de med do zhes smras so// rgyal po des de dag la smras pa/ khyed 'bangs rnams 'khrug par gyur du mdogs shig dang / bdag gis
823(): ci nas kyang 'bangs rnams yid dbyung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de nas rgyal po des/ grong khyer gyi mi rnams bsdus nas smras pa/ nga ni mi stong gi mchod sbyin byed 'dod
824(): na nyes pa med par mi 'dod bzhin du/ su yang phyugs su byar ngas mi nus kyi/ de bas na deng phan chad khyed cag las gang dang gang tshul dang bka' khrims las 'gal bar byed/
825(): cing / nga'i bka' bcog pa de dang de dag/ nga'i rtog chen gyi mi bag med pa'i gnyid kyis ma leg cing dri ma med pas brtag par bya'o// rang gi rigs la gnod pa dang /
826(): yul ni gnod pa byed pa dag yod na ngas phyugs kyi gor bzung bar khyed kyis shes par gyis shig/ de nas de dag gi nang gi gtso bo rnams kyis thel mo sbyar te de
827(): la smras pa/ khyod kyi spyod pa thams cad 'bangs la phan par gzhol// mi rje lngas mdzad de la 'gal bar ga la bgyid// khyod kyi spyod la tshangs pa'ang rjes su yi rang 'os/
828(): khyod ni legs pa tshad ma'i nang na tshad ma mchog/ lha cig dgyes pa gang lags pa// bdag cag kun kyang de la dga'// 'o skal dgyes shing smon pa las// dgyes pa gud na
829(): gzhan ma mchis// de ltar grong khyer gyi 'bangs rnams kyis bka' stsal pa nyan pa dang / rgyal po des blon po thugs ches pa rnams skye bo mang pos mthong bar 'gyur ba'i yo lang chen
830(): po dang bcas par ljongs dang / grong khyer rnams su sdig byed pa'i mi rnams 'dzin du bkye'o// kho ra khor yug tu yang nyin re bzhin 'di skad bsgo'o// brten zhing gtsang la tshul
831(): khrims nor ldan mi mchog la// rgyal po mi 'jigs sbyin pa mi 'jigs sbyin par mdzad// 'bangs la phan phyir tshul min byed pa'i mi rnams ni// phyugs su bsgyur ba stong gis
832(): mchod sbyin mdzad par bzhed// de bas de ring phyin chad gang zhig tshul min rjes spyod cing // rgyal po'i bka' lungs skyong blon pos bkur tang 'gal byed
833(): pa/ de ni rang gi las kyi mchod sbyin phyugs su byas gyur nas// mchod sdong lus btags gram zhing bskams pa skye bos mthong bar 'gyur// de nas yul de na gnas pa'i mi rnams
834(): kyis mchod sbyin gyi phyugs su bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i tshul bzhin mi byed pa'i mi tshil du 'jug pa dang / nyin re bzhin 'jigs 'jigs skad bsgo ba de thos pa dang / rgyal po'i mi rnams
835(): sdig byed pa'i mi bzung ba'i phyir thams cad du tshol zhing 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshul bzhin ma yin par byed pa la dga' ba ni btang / tshul khrims dang sdom pa yang dag par blang ba la ni 'bad//
836(): dgrar 'dzin pa las ni phyir phyogs/ cig la gcig dga' ba dang gus par ni byed/ 'thab pa dang rtsod pa ni rab tu zhi/ bla ma'i ngag nyan cing rjes su mthun par ni byed/ bgo bshal
837(): byed pa la ni bag tsha ba med/ blo bur du 'ongs pa la ni dga'/ dul ba dang gus par bya ba la ni 'bad bar gyur te/ rdzogs ldan gyi dus bzhin du gyur to// shrI bas 'jigs shing 'jig
838(): rten pha rol sems// rigs kyi nga rgyal grags pa bsrung ba dang // bsam pa dag cing ngo tsha shes pa yis// skye bo rang gi tshul khrims dri med brgyan// ji lta ji ltar skye bo chos 'bad//
839(): pa/ de lta de ltar bsrung ma khyad par du// tshul bzhin mi byed skye bo tshol bar gyur// de nas chos las su yang g.yos ma gyur// rang gi yul ni de ltar gyur thos nas// rgyal po
840(): dga' ba'i khyad par brtan pa ni// dga' ba'i gtam snyan rgya cher bsgrags pa yis// rnon po mgu bar byas nas bka' stsal pa// nga ni 'bangs rnams bsrung /
841(): bar rab tu sems// de rnams kun kyang da ni sbyin gnas gyur// nga ni mchod sbyin byed 'dod ces bsams nas/ mchod sbyin phyir ni nor rdzas bsags pa ni// gang zhig bde ba
842(): bskyed pa'i nor gang 'dod// nga yi drung nas de dag ci bder khyer// 'di ltar nga yi yul ni dbyed spyo ba'i// dbul ba ci nas yul na med par gyur// 'brangs rnams bsrung bar
843(): sems pa nga 'dug cing // grogs ldan yo byad phun sum tshogs bzhin du// skye bo phongs byed nga na mi bzod pa// nga yi sems ni yang yang bsregs pa bzhin// de nas rgyal po
844(): de'i blon po rnams legs so snyam nas de'i tshig mnyan te/ grong dang / ljongs dang / grong khyer thams cad dang / lam gyi ngal so ba'i sa phyogs thams cad du sbyin gtong gi khang pa
845(): brtsigs nas/ rgyal pos ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ nyin re bzhin 'phongs pa rnams ci 'dod pa'i nor gyis mgu bar byas so// de nas skye bo de dag dbul bor te// sa bdag
846(): las ni mthun par nor thob nas// rnam mang gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// dga' sten bzhin du bzang pos rgyas par gyur// phongs pas rab tu dga' ba'i bstod pa'i tshig/ rgyal
847(): po'i grags pa phyogs su rgyas gyur pa// mtsho nang pad+ma'i ge sar phye ma dag/ rlabs kyis bskyod de kun tu khyab pa bzhin// de ltar rgyal po'i tshul bzang yon tan gnyis// skye bo ma lus
848(): legs par spyod gyur pas// dge ba chen pos gnod pa rnams kyi mthu// zil gyis mnan nas chags med zad par gyur// dus tshigs rnams kyang dus bzhin mthun par bde// rgyal po
849(): bzhin du chos la gzhol bar gyur// sa gzhi 'bru rnams sna tshogs skye bar gyur// chu gzhi chu gtsang sngon po pad+mar bcas// 'gro ba nang chen dag gis mi 'debs gyur// sman rnams//
850(): yon tan rab tu che bar gyur// dus tshigs dbang gis bser bu dad kyang ldang // gza' rnams lam ni bzang por rgyu bar gyur// gzhan gyi dmag gi 'jigs pa med par gyur//
851(): tshun gnod dang gnam gyi 'jigs pa'ang med// skye bo nges par ches skyong dul gyur pas// rdzogs ldan dus bzhi ni phun sum tshogs par gyur// de nas rgyal pos chos kyi mchod sbyin de/
852(): lhar byas pa dang / skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal dang gnod pa ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa gzhi ni skye bo rab tu dga' ba mang pos rab tu gang zhing mngon par mtho ba nyams dga' bar
853(): ni snang / 'jig rten pa rnams ni rgyal po'i shis pa brjod pa 'ba' zhig kha ton du byed/ rgyal po'i grags pa ni thams cad du rgyas par gyur pa dang / blon po'i gtso bo gcig
854(): yid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yi// dgos pa rtag tu gzigs pas na// dbang phyug rnams
855(): kyi blo dag ni// gong nas gong du spyod par 'gyur// zhes bya ba 'di ni shin tu legs par smras pa lags so// 'di ltar lha'i zhal snga nas phyugs dgum pa'i skyon ma mchis par chos kyi
856(): mchod sbyin gyis 'bangs rnams 'jig rten gnyis gal phan par bgyis so// gnod pa dang dbul ba'i sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar gyur to// mang du gsol yang ci 'tshal te/
857(): 'bangs de dag ni skal ba dang ldan pa lags so// zla ba bzhin du sku la kr-iSh+Na 'dzin ma gsol cing // dbang bskur gdams pas rang bzhin mdzes pa'i spyod pa yongs ma zhus// spyi bo
858(): gdugs dang 'dra ba'i dbu mdzes bsgril ba de bzhin gnas// khyed kyi gtong bas brgya byin grags pa rmad byung zil gyis gnon// 'jig rten mchod sbyin phal cher gsod cing dman/
859(): 'bras bu 'tshal bas mchod sbyin ma legs kyi// khyod kyi mchod sbyin grags pa'i rgyan gyi sa brgyan// tshul khrims skyon med yid du 'ong dang mthun// gang rnams skyob pa khyod bzhug
860(): pa'i/ skye dgu de rnams skal dang ldan// bu rnams la yang ba dag ni// nges par de ltar skyob mi 'gyur// gzhan zhig gis smras pa// sbyin zhes bya ba'i nor yod ster ba
861(): skye bo de yi dbang du gyur// tshul khrims bsrung ba'ang 'jig rten bde la phyogs shing mtho ris 'dod la chags// gzhan gyi don bsgrub phyir ni de gnyis de bzhin spyod pa gang lags
862(): pasamakhas pa ma lags sems stobs mi ldan pa la de dag yod ma mchis// de lta bas na bsam pa dge ba rnams ni sdig byed du gzhug par bskur mi tshugs pas bsam pa dag
863(): par bya ba la 'bad par bya'o// de bas 'brangs la phan brtson pa// legs dang grags dang bde ba thob// de bas rgyal po'i tshul de las// 'gal bar bya ba yod mi rigs//
864(): de bzhin du rgyal po'i gdam ngag la'ang brjod par bya'o// chos la goms par byas pa ni skye dgu rnams longs spyod che bar 'gyur bas na/ longs spyod che bar 'dod pas chos kyi rjes su
865(): 'brang bar bya'o// zhes de ltar yang sbyar bar bya'o// mngon par mtho ba ni sbyin pa dang dul ba dang sdom pa la gnas pas 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ phyugs bsad pas ni nam yang mngon
866(): par mtho bar mi 'gyur ro// de bas na de 'dod pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa la 'bad par bya'o zhes de ltar yang sbyar bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ni sku tshe snga ma la'ang 'jig rten gyi don
867(): spyod pa la'ang thugs gzhol ba yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// mchod sbyin byed kyi skyes pa'i rabs te bcu pa'o//
868(): sdom lnga// stag mo shi bi ko sa la bdag/ tshong dpon gnyis dang ri bong dang // a gasti dang sha byin dang // thams cad sgrol dang mchod sbyin
869(): byed// / bdag nyid chen po rnams ni rgud par gyur tam/ dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang rung ste/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba lhod par mi 'gyur ro// de yang /
870(): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas bsod nams spyod pa la rab tu goms shing / sbyin pa dang dul ba dang sdom pa dang / snying rje la 'dris par gyur pa/ gzhan la phan par
871(): spyod pa khyad par can la nges par spyod pa de/ re shig cig lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du gyur to zhes grag go/ lha dbang dpal ni de la brten bcas pas// gzi byin chen po lhag par
872(): mdzes gyur pa// yang thog rdo thal gsar du bskus pa la// zla ba'i 'od zer byung ba gsal ba bzhin// gang phyir lha ma yin rnams tsham tshom med par ni// phyogs kyi glang chen
873(): mche ba lto bas zed 'ong ba// skal pa che bas bde ba thob pa'i dpal de ni// de'i snying dregs pa'i dri ma can du byed ma gyur// de lha'i yul dang mi'i yul legs par bskyangs pa la
874(): gyur pa'i grag pa phun sum tshogs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi mtha' klas pa/ rmad du byung ba'i dpal de lha mo yin rnams kyis ma bzod nas/ glang po che dang / shing rta dang
875(): rta pa dang / rkang thang gi dmag bshams pa chas pa rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar snang ba/ sgra 'jigs 'jigs skad sgrogs pas rgya mtsho 'khrugs par byed pa/ mtshon cha dang go
876(): cha dri ma med par byis pa 'bar 'bar ltar 'dug pa/ mig mi bzod pa'i dpung gi tshogs chen po dang bcas te/ de la dmag rgol du lhags so// chos kyi bdag nyid yin yang de la
877(): gzhan sngo ba// rol pa'i bgegs 'gyur yid 'byung 'gro ba 'jigs par 'gyur// gzi brjid can gyi tshul bzhin bya ba'i rigs pas na/ snying ni dmag drang g.yengs la mngon par
878(): phyogs par gyur// de nas sems dpa' chen po de gser gyi shing rta dam pa/ rta bzang po stong dang sbyar ba/ gos bzang po 'os pas/ ba dan mdzes pa phyar ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng
879(): ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od gsal bar snang ba/ lus 'bar ba/ rgyan gdags pa'i go rims nges par byas pa/ ngos gnyis mtshon cha rnon po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar bas
880(): mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i gos dkar po can gyi steng du 'dug nas/ rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i dpag gi dpung chen pos
881(): yongs su bskor nas/ lha ma yin gyi dmag gi tshogs de rgya mtsho'i 'gram du thug par bsu'o// de nas der ni g.yul bsres pa// sngar ma rnams ni skrag par byed// phan tshun
882(): mtshon 'debs phye mar lhags// go cha rnams ni ral bar gyur// da ni 'di na 'dug bzhin du// mthong zhing thar bar ga la 'gyur// thob shig da ni med zin to//
883(): de ltar phan tshun dmyal rdor gyur// de nas mtshon cha 'khrugs pa yi// sgra chen g.yul ni bsres pa dang // rnga brdungs sgra ni grag pa yis// nam mkha'i ngos ni ral ba bzhin// zag
884(): ltar 'jigs pa'i glang chen dag/ phan tshun 'thab me 'gyed pa yi// rdul gyi dri ni mi bzod pas// dus mtha'i rlung gis g.yos pa bzhin// glog ltar 'gyu ba'i ba dan can// shing
885(): rta'i sgra chen grag pa ni// phyogs rnams kun tu khyab gyur pa// sprin chen blo bur langs pa bzhin// phan tshun mda' rnams 'phangs pa yis// lha dang lha min dpa' bo dang // gdugs dang
886(): rgyal mtshan go cha dang // cod pan dag ni 'gyel bar gyur// de nas lha min mda' 'phangs bdas pa dang // lha dbang dpung ni 'jigs pas byer bar gyur// dgra yi dpung ni shing rtas rnam
887(): bcil nas// lha dbang gcig pu g.yul ngor then par gyur// de nas lha ma yin gyi dpung rab tu dga' bas shin tu bdo bar gyur te/ ca co'i sgra chen po seng+ge'i sgra bzhin sgrogs pa mthong ba
888(): dang lha'i dbang po'i kha lo pa nA ta lis yis/ bdag cag gi dpung bros par gyur pa mthong nas/ da ni slar ldeg pa'i dus la bab po snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po'i shing rta slar bzlog go/
889(): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shing shAl ma lI la nam mkha' lding gi tshang bcas pa dag cig/ shing rta drangs pa'i gnya' shing gi rtse mos phog par 'gyur ba'i lam du bab par mthong ngo //
890(): mthong ma thag tu sems snying rje la dmigs nas// kha lo pa mU ta li la 'di skad ces smras so// shA la ma lI'i shing la bya tshang dag/ bcas pa'i nang na bya drug mtshar ba/ 'khod pa 'di
