1331(): gi yid la gcags pa dang / bdag nyid gtsang mar bstan pa'i phyir/ mna' khyad par can bor ba/ bram ze khyod kyi rtsa ba sus khyer ba// 'byor pa'i mtshan mas brgyan pa'i khyim
1332(): bdag dang // chung ma yid du 'ong ba'ang rnyed par shog/ bu dang tsha bo rnams dang ldan par shog/ de'i 'og mas smras pa/ bram ze khyod kyi rtsa ba sus khyer ba// phreng ba do shal
1333(): tsan dan gos bzang dang // bu yis reg pa'i rgyan rnams thogs pa yi// 'dod pa mi zad pa la spyod par shog/ yang gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyi rtsa ba gang gis khyer ba de/
1334(): zhing rmos pa la nor dang bran rnyed cing // bu dang smra bas rab tu dga' bar gyur// tshe la'ang mi lta khyi ma la dga' bar gyur// yang gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyi rtsa ba brkam pas
1335(): gang khyer ba// rgyal po'i bran bzhin dul bar spyod pa yi// gtsug tor btud pas rab tu phyag byas shing // rgyal po'i tshul gyis ma lus sa skyong gyur// yang gcig gis
1336(): smras pa/ khyed lta bu yi rtsa ba gang khyer ba// de ni rgyal po'i mdun na 'don gyur te// sngags la sogs pas bde legs byed gyur cing // de bzhin rgyal pos bkur sti
1337(): bya bar shog/ yang gcig gis smras pa/ rtsa ba 'dod cing yon tan mi 'dod pa// rigs byed legs par lobs nas ston par byed// dka' thub can du re ba chen po yis/
1338(): yul mi kun gyis de la mchod par shog/ grogs pos smras pa/ khyod lta bu yi rtsa ba la chags gang // yul gru dam pa 'byor pa bzhi brgya tsam// rgyal po dag las thob nas
1339(): spyod gyur cing // 'dod chags ma dral bar ni shi bar gyur// bran gyis smras pa/ rtsa ba'i phyir ni bdag don chung gson pa// grogs po'i nang na da ni grong dpon gyur// rgyal
1340(): po'i chad pa bdag gis mchod par// bud med glu gar dag gis dga' bar gyur// sring mos smras pa/ khyod lta bu yi rtsa ba gang khyer ba// de ni rgyal po'i btsun mor gyur nas
1341(): su/ gzugs dang dpal gyi gzi byin 'bar gyur cing // btsun mo dam pa stong gi mchog tu gyur// bu mos smras pa/ gang gis rtsa ba mthong la chos ma mthong /
1342(): de ni gcig tu dge ba rnams dang bral// bkur sti byas pas myos par byas nas su// kha zas zhim po dag la dga' bar gyur// de nas nags tshal de na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang glang
1343(): po che dang / spre'u dag cig der chos nyan du lhags pas/ gtam de thos nas rab tu ngo tsha zhing mi dga' bar gyur te/ de nas gnod sbyin gyis bdag gtsang mar bstan pa'i phyir
1344(): de dag gi mdun du mna' bor ba/ khyod kyi rtsa ba'i phyir ni gang 'khrul pa// gtsug lag khang chen dag na rkyen par gyur// bkru bshal stor khung dag gi zhig ral
1345(): 'chos// nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang ba byed par gyur// glang po ches smras pa/ thub mchog khyed kyi rtsa ba gang rku ba// de ni zhags pa dam po drug brgyas bcings// lcags kyu rnon pos bkug
1346(): pa'i rman zhing // nags tshal nyams dga' bor nas grong 'dab song // spre'us smras pa/ khyod kyi rtsa ba brkam pas gang rku ba// de ni me tog phreng can zha nye thogs// dbyig pas rdeg cing
1347(): sbrul gyi khar gtong cing // se ral khar bcings khyim na gnas par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpas de dag thams cad la 'jam zhing dul ba dang / bzod pa dang / zab pa ston
1348(): pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces smras so// gang gis ma brlag par ni brlag ce 'am// gang zhig 'di 'drar khyer la dogs gyur pa// 'dod pa yid 'ong ci bder spyad nas su// khyim na
1349(): gnas bzhin 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de dag gi 'dod pa la nye bar spyod pa dang mi mthun par smod pa/ zhi gnas khyad par can du gyur par smra ba de gus pa dang ya
1350(): mtshan skyes par gyur te/ bdag rang gi gzugs 'bar ba drang srong de rnams kyi drung du bstan nas/ mi bzod pa bzhin du smras pa/ khyed re shig sdod cig/ gang dag thob phyir
1351(): yid la rtsol byed cing // bde ba 'dod phyir yid la gnyid kyang med// dka' thub 'bad pas gang dag thob 'dod pa'i// 'dod pa de dag ci phyir smod par byed// byang chub sems dpas
1352(): smras pa/ grogs po 'dod pa ni nyes dmigs mtha' yas te/ gang la brtags nas thub pa rnams 'dod pa la mi spyod pa de mdo tsam zhig nyon cig/ 'dod pa'i phyir ni 'jig rten bcing
1353(): zhing gsod par 'gyur// mya ngan gdungs shing 'jigs pa mang po'i sdug bsngal myong // rgyal po rnams kyang 'dod pa'i phyir ni brlag par 'gyur// phyi ma la yang chos nyams sems
1354(): can dmyal bar lhung // gang gis mdza' bo rnams dang myur du 'khon 'byung 'gyur// gang gis g.yo sgyu dri ma can gyi lam du 'gro// grags pa nyams shing phyi ma la'ang sdug bsngal
1355(): myong // de dag 'thab par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni 'dod pa yin// de bas rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams// 'di dang pha rol tu yang 'dod pas gsod par byed// bdag la phan 'dod sprul
1356(): gdug khros pa bzhin// thub pa rnams ni de la mi brten no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshig de bden no snyam nas mngon par bstod de/ drang srong de dag gi mthus de yid
1357(): dga' bar gyur nas/ de dag la bdag gi nyes pa khas blangs so// gang dag brtags nas yon tan rnams// re ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur// brtag pa'i phyir ni bdag gis
1358(): 'dir/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba sbas pa bzhin// pad+ma'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis// khyed cag rnam dag spyod pa bstan// thub pa bden par smra ba yis// 'gro ba
1359(): mgon dang bcas pa mthong // de skad ces smras nas/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i de'i spyod pa bzang po de la/ gzi
1360(): byin gyis non pa'i tshig drag pos smos so// nged cag khyod kyi grogs dang gnyen ma yin// gar mkhan khyod min nged cag 'phyas gdags min// lha dbang ci phyir khyad du bsad nas
1361(): su/ drang srong rnams la rtsed mo'i lam bzhin bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin rab tu gus pas rna cha dang / cod pan 'gul ba'i 'od kyis gdong gsal
1362(): bar gyur te/ rab tu gus par phyag 'tshal nas de la bzod pa gsol pa/ bdag gis 'di ltar mi brtan pa// bgyis pa'i dgos pa sngar smras lags// pha dang slob dpon
1363(): 'dra ba ru// bdag la khyod kyis bzod par mdzod// shes pa'i mig ni btsums par gyur pa rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni mnyam la'ang 'khrul par gyur// bdag la phan
1364(): pas de la bzod par mdzod// de bas bdag la thugs la mi bcang gsol// de ltar bzod par gsol nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de lta bas na rab tu dben pa'i bde ba'i
1365(): ro myong ba rnams ni 'dod pa la phyas kyi gnas dang / gnod pa lta bur mi mthun par sems so// de la skyes pa'i rabs 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ nga dang shA ra dwa tiH
1366(): bu/ mo'u mgal bu dang 'od srungs dang // gang po ma 'gags kun dga' bre// de yi tshe na spun du gyur// sring mo ut+pal mdog yin no// bran mo kub dza uta ta ra// bran po khyim
1367(): bdag mdzes pa yin// gnod sbyin ri bo bde ba yin// glang po bai ri le ya yin// spre'u ni sbrang rtsi 'bul ba yin// brgya byin nag po 'char ka yin// skyes pa'i rabs ni de ltar zung /
1368(): pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i skyes pa'i rabs te bcu dgu pa'o// / yon tan med pa la yod par grags pa ni/ skyes bu dge ba rnams la bskul ma btab pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur/
1369(): de bas na yon tan bsgrub pa la 'bad par bya'o// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang / dul ba dang / tshe rigs btsun pa ma 'jungs shing khong bzo ba/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du bya ba la 'gal
1370(): ba med pa/ gtsug lag mang po la goms pas/ tshig la mkhas par grags pa/ snying rje dang ldan zhing sbyin gtong che bas nor gyi 'byor pa thams cad du khyab pa/ rab tu phyug pas khyim
1371(): bdag rin po che ltar bkur ba/ rgyal po shig gi tshong dpon du gyur to zhes grag go// de ni ring bzhin chos kyi bdag/ thos la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyan// 'jig rten dag gis pi'i cher ni// bkur
1372(): sti bya ba'i gnas su gyur// de nas re shig cig sems dpa' chen po de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ba'i 'og tu/ de'i sgyug mo don zhig gnyer zhing bu mo dang phrad pa'i phyir de'i khyim du/
1373(): song ngo // 'gron 'ongs pa'i bkur sti bya ba byas nas/ gtam gleng bslang ba dang / rang gi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma la/ bde 'am mi bde 'dri ba'i skabs su/ bu mo khyod kyi khyim thabs khyed la
1374(): byams sam mi byams/ khyod kyis bkur sti byas pa'i yon tan drin du bzo 'am mi bzo/ mi bde ba lta yod dam med ces dris pa dang / de ngo tsha bas mgo smangad de mi spobs bzhin du gcom sbyangs te smras
1375(): pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang yon tan dang spyod tshul ni rab tu byung ba la yang ma mchis so// zhes byas pa dang / de na de'i ma ni na so rgas pas rna ba migs zhing sems mi gsal ba dang bu mo des de skad
1376(): ces smras pa'i tshig kyang ngo tsha zhing gcom chung nges legs par ma thos la/ rab tu byung ba'i sgra zhig kyang thos pas khadag gi dmag pa nges par rab tu byung ba lta zhig snyam nas/ bu mo'i mya ngan dang /
1377(): de'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur nas/ smre sngags 'don zhing des skad phyung ste ngus so// 'di ltar snying nye ba'i bdag gi bu mo'ang bor ste/ rab tu byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan dang spyod tshul yang
1378(): ci 'dra ba zhig go// bu de'i rab tu byung ba'ang ci lta bu zhig go// dar la bab cing byad gzugs bzang // gzhon sha can la bde bar gsol// de ni rgyal po'i gnang chen yin// dgon par gnas
1379(): blo ji ltar skyes// nang mi dag dang khon ma byung // rgas pas mi sdug ma gyur cing // nad med ji ltar tshig gcig gis// khyim gyi longs spyod de yis btang // 'dzangs dang dral ba'i rgyun
1380(): gyis brgyan// gzhan la snying brtse mnyes kyang gshin// mi brten nang mi snying rje med// 'di lta bu ni ji ltar lobs// dge sbyong bram ze mdza' bo'i rten// nang mi dag dang phongs pa gso//
1381(): nags tshal dgon par gang btsal ba// gtsang sbra tshul khrims nor ldan pa'i// khyim na rnyed par mi 'gyur ram// rjes su mthun zhing chos grogs byed// nyes pa med pa bor nas ni// ha cang
1382(): chos la dad ches nas// chos dang 'gal ba 'dir ma lta// de ltar gus pa'i skye bo spangs// yid la snying rje cung zad med// chos ni cung zad 'grub re skan// kye ma'o gnas kyi mnar ba blta/
1383(): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma/ bdag gi khyim thabs rab tu byung ba'i phyir/ bdag gi ma snying rje zhing snying nas smre sngags 'don pa des/ bud med kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir snying mi dga' bas
1384(): 'khams shing blong blong por ni gyur/ mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sems dkrugs nas gtam gleng bslang ba'i 'phro yang brjed/ bdag gi khyim thab rab tu byung ba'i gtam ngan ni thos nas
1385(): bdag gi ma/ bdag mya ngan bsang ba'i phyir khyim 'dir 'ongs so snyam nas/ bu mo de smre sngags 'don cing skad phyung ste du ngu ba las brgyal bar gyur to// khyim mi dang g.yog 'khor rnams kyis
1386(): kyang de thos nas/ mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyi shugs kyis cho nges btab bo// khyim mtshes dang mdza' bo dang gnyen bshes dang / de la brten pa'i skye bo dang bram ze dang / khyim
1387(): bdag rnams kyis kyang de thos nas/ khyim bdag de la rjes su chags pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyang phal cher khyim der dong ngo // gang phyir 'jig rten dag na srid pa ni// /
1388(): bde dang sdug bsngal dag la mtshungs par spyod// de bas 'di la'ang 'jig rten slob ma bzhin// bde dang sdug bsngal dag la mtshungs spyod 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po'i pho brang
1389(): nas slar log ste/ bdag gi khyim dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa na/ bdag gi khyim na tshe nges 'debs pa dang / mi mang po 'dus pa mthong nas/ bdag gis g.yog la de lta bur gyur pa ci nyes rtogs te shog
1390(): cig ces bsgo'o// des de ltar gyur pa brtags nas/ de'i drung du phyin te de la bzlas pa/ jo bos 'byor pa'i khyim spangs nas/ rab tu byung zhes thos nas ni// skye bo 'di dag gang zhig nas// byams pa'i
1391(): dbang gis 'dus par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis bsam pa dag pas tshig des bskul ma bta pa bzhin du/ ngo tsha zhing mi dga' bar gyur nas bsams pa/ e ma'o skye bo rnams de
1392(): ltar bdag la re ba ni legs so snyam mo// skye bo rnams kyi yon tan du// brjod cing grags pa theb gyur la// gal te khyim la phyogs na ni// bdag lta mir yang ga la rung // de ltar bdag ni skyon la dang
1393(): gyur cing // yon tan khyad du gsod la tshul ngan na// skye bo dge bas yang bar rtsi bar 'gyur// de ltar gyur na gson yang ci zhig rung // de bas skye bo re bar 'gyur ba 'di// spyod pa ngan pas nyon mong/
1394(): khyim spangs nas// dka' thub nags na dga' ba'i yon tan gyis// nyams su blangs te rab tu bskang bar bya// bdag nyid chen po des de ltar nges par byas nas/ de ltar slar log ste/ rgyal po'i gsol/
1395(): ka ba la// tshong dpon spyan sngar mchi 'tshal lo zhes gsol cig ces smras so// spyan sngar mchi bar gnang nas kyang tshul bzhin du rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos ci'i phyir
1396(): 'ongs zhes smras so// lha bdag ni rab tu dbyung bar 'tshal na gnang de'i rigs so// de nas de la rgyal po des rim gro bskyed de/ byams pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces smras so//
1397(): nged 'dra'i gnyen dang mdza' mchog yod bzhin du// nor dang thabs dang mthu rtsal gang dag gis// nga yis thub par gyur pa ma yin pa'i// sdug bsngal gang gis khyod ni bas mthar 'gro//
1398(): gal te nor 'dod pa las nor khyer cig/ gnod pa yod na de las bzlog par bya// nga dang gnyen bshes gsol ba 'debs pa rnams// bor nas ci zhig 'dod phyir bas mthar
1399(): 'gro/ de ltar bdag nyid chen po de la rgyal pos byams pa dang gus pas bsgo ba dang / de la tshig 'jam pos smras pa/ khyod la brten pa gnod pa ga la mchis// nor gyis
1400(): phongs pa'ang mchis par ga la 'gyur// de bas phongs te bas mthar bdag mi mchi// gang gi slad du mchi ba gsan du gsol// skye bo mya ngan gdungs pa'i/
1401(): mchi ma can dag gis// bdag ni rab tu byung bar gyur ces rab tu bsgrags// bdag ni yon tan ldan zhes dad pa'i gnas su gyur// de bas bdag ni bas mtha' dben par gnas/
1402(): par 'tshal// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod skye bo rnams kyi tshig tsam gyis nged dor bar mi rigs so// khyod lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bo'i tshig bsrungs pa tsam gyis
1403(): chog pa'ang ma yin la/ de ma byas na mi rung ba'ang ma yin no// 'jig rten mu cor smra ba'i gtam rnams ni// rang dgar rtog pa dag la rnam par 'phro// gang zhig de dag snying la
1404(): sems na yang // phyas su 'gyur na byed pa ci zhig smos// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de skad bka' mi srul du gsol/ skye bo'i bka' mchid dge ba
1405(): grags pa rnams ltar mi bgyi ba'ang ma legs so// lha gzigs su gsol// mi yi bdag po gang tshe dge ba mo// chos dang ldan zhes grags par gyur pa las/
1406(): mi yis de las nyams par mi bgyi zhing // ngo che'i phyir yang rab tu 'bad par rigs// yon tan yod ces grags shing re ba dag/ ji ltar gyur yang rung ste gnang na ni/
1407(): grags pa dag las gtam snyan 'phel bar 'gyur// gzhan du bgyis na khron pa skam po bzhin// don bzhin ma yin yon tan grags pa 'phel// rnam par rtog pa'i rlung
1408(): gis bskyod pa la// mi rnams grags pa nyams par gyur na ni// slar yang grags par 'gyur ba rab tu dka'// sbrul nag khros nas gdengs ka brdeg 'dra ba'i// yongs su brdung
1409(): brtsod pa'i rgyur gyur pa// spang rigs de ni spong bar bgyid pa la// lha cig bdag ni bzlog pa mi rigs so// gus par mkhyen nas 'bangs la byams pa yis// khyod kyis
1410(): ltar bya ba rigs mod kyi// bdag ni sems kyis rab tu byung lags nas// 'du 'dzi nyon mongs can gyis ci zhig bgyi// de ltar gsol ba btab nas bdag nyid chen po
1411(): de rgyal po des gnang te/ dka' thub kyi nags su 'gro bar chas so// de nas de'i mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / de la brten pa rnams lpags nas mya ngan gyi mig mchi
1412(): mas gang zhing rkang pa la 'jus te 'gror mi ster bar gyur pa ni/ kha cig gis thal mo sbyar zhing gsol ba 'debs shing de'i lam bkag cing 'khod kha cig gis ni mgul nas
1413(): 'jus te tshig 'jam pos brid tsang khyim phyogs su 'khrid par byed/ kha cig gis ni spobs pa'i tshul gyis tshig rtsub pos spyi rtol med pa sha stag byed ces zer zhing gshe
1414(): cig ni mdza' bo dang / nang mi rnams la'ang snying mi rje 'am zhes zer zhing 'gror mi ster/ la la ni khyim na gnas pa'i dka' thub nyid bsod nams che mod ces zer/
1415(): zhing rnar 'ong ba dang / rigs pa'i tshig gis rtogs pa bskyed/ gzhan dag ni dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa sdug bsngal che ba dang / da dung bya ba kha cig ma zin pa yod
1416(): pa skad du gsol ba 'debs/ kha cig ni tshe phyi ma la bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yod dam med gtol med ces the tshom bskyed de gzhung lugs kyi khyad par de dang de dag smos shing slar log
1417(): tu 'bad par gyur to// de de ltar rab tu 'byung du mi ster ba/ nags tshal du 'gro ba la 'gog cing then pa gdong mchi mas gang ba'i mdza' bo de dag la bltas nas 'di ltar sems/
1418(): par mngon no// mdza' bor 'thams pas mdza' bo bag med la// phan par gyur na rtsub po'ang sbyar ba'i rigs// phan zhing 'jam na smos kyang ci zhig dgos// dam pa
1419(): rnams kyi chos tshul de ltar yin// nags pas khyim na dga' bar 'di dag sems// nags na gnas pa dogs shing 'jigs pa med// tha mal gnas pa ji ltar mi sems
1420(): kye sdig pas gos pa bzhin du 'gog par byed// mi dag shi'am shi bar gyur pa 'am// chos las nyams na mi dgar 'gyur ba bzhin// nags tshal gnas 'dod nga ni gson
1421(): bzhin du// ci zhig sems shing 'di dag ngu bar 'gyur// nga dang bral bas de ltar mi dga' na// nga dang lhan cig nags na ci mi 'khod// gal te bas khyim na 'khod dga' na/
1422(): mchi ma zad par du ba ci ched che// de ste bdag gi mi la chags pa'i phyir// dka' thub byed du 'gro bar mi ster na// dgra dang dmag 'gyed de dang de dag tu// 'gro ba na yang de
1423(): dag cir mi byed// phongs par gyur pa'i tshe na mdza' bo rnams// mchi mas 'ju zhing 'ong ba'i mthu yang mthong // mdza' bo'i rang bzhin rab tu brtan gyur kyang // phyi bzhin
1424(): mi 'brang g.yo dang thabs byed bzhin// slad du bzlog pa'i phyir yang skad 'dzer zhing // mig ni mchi mas gang bzhin smra ba dang // mtshungs pa la yang bla ma 'dra bar ni/
1425(): mgo bo btud de 'di dag phyag 'tshal ba// rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab 'byung bar// 'di dag byams na de bzhin bya ba'i rigs// dam pa'i sems ni ngo mtshar gyur
1426(): pa yi// gar mkhan spyod pa bzhin du mi 'gyur ram// yon tan med la phongs par gyur tshe yang // grogs po gnyis gsum nges par yod par 'gyur// yon tan yod bzhin nags su 'gro ba na//
1427(): grogs po gcig kyang med pa ngo mtshar che// glang chen smon pa g.yul ngo bzlogs pa na// nga yi sngon du 'gro bar 'dod pa dag/ nags su nga 'gro phyir ni mi 'gro ba// de dag yin nam da yang de ma yin// de ltar byams pa/
1428(): med pa 'gyur ba'i rgya// nyes pa byas pa bdag ni mi dran ma/ bdag gi mdza' bo 'di ltar 'khod bzhin du/ 'di skaltar gyur pa rung bar 'ong ngam kye// bdag ni nags su 'gro phyir mi 'brang ba/
1429(): bdag la yon tan med pas de ltar grab/ yon tan dgal rjes su chags pa rnams// de ltar 'brang bar nus pa su zhig yod// gang dag khyim gyi nyes pa gsal bar mngon// dka' thub nags chal yon tan mi mthong ba/
1430(): shes pa'i mig ni btsums gyur de dag la// bdag gis gzhan du rtag tu ci yang med// phyi ma'i tshe dang tshe 'di'i sdug bsngal rgyu// 'dod pa dag ni spong bar mi 'dod pa// dka' thub nags dang 'gal bar
1431(): byed pa de// de ring bdag 'dor ba ni gti mug yin// bdag gi mdza' bo 'di rnams gang gis bslus// 'jig rten ma lus zhi bar ma gyur pa// dka' thub nags tshal rnyed pa'i mthu chen gyis// nyes
1432(): pa de dag mngon du gzhom par bya// de ltar nges pa'i bdag nyid can gyis yongs brtags nas// mdza' bshes spobs pa rnams kyis rnam par dpyod pa dag/ 'jam zhing rab tu mnyen par smra ba'i tshigs rnams
1433(): kyis// bags kyis brid de bor nas dka' thub nags su song // de lta bas na yon tan med pa la yod par grags pa ni skyes bu dge ba rnams la bskul ma btab pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ de lta bas na yon tan
1434(): sgrub pa la 'bad par bya'o// 'di ltar dge slong ngo zhes 'am/ dge bsnyen no zhes yon tan du brjod par gyur na/ dge ba rnams kyis dngos po de bsgrub pa'i phyir bdag yon tan gyis brgyan par bya'o// de bzhin du chos
1435(): sgrub pa'i grogs byed pa rab tu dkon no zhes de ltar yang sbyar bar bya'o// tshong dpon du skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu pa'o// / sdom la/ brgya byin bram ze myos byed ma// legs par ba rol byin
1436(): dang / bya dang bum pa phyug po'i bu// dka' thub can dang tshong dpon no// bcu tshan gnyis pa'o// khro ba thul na dgra zhi bar 'gyur gyis gzhan du byas na dgra 'phel lo// de yang 'di ltar byang /
1437(): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs chen po yon tan la goms pa'i mthus grags pa rgyas pa 'byor pa'i yon tan nges pa/ rgyal pos bkur sti byas pa/ 'jig rten pas lha bzhin du bkur ba
1438(): zhig tu skyes par gyur to zhes grag go// de yun ring du gyur nas cho ga'i las su bya ba rnams ni byas pa dang / mang du thos pa'i yon tan la goms par byas pas mkhas pa rnams kyi nang du ming grags par gyur to// /
1439(): mkhas pa rnams kyi grags pa ni/ mkhas pa nyid kyi nang du 'phel// rin chen shel la rin chen dang // g.yul ngo dag tu dpa' bo bzhin// de nas bdag nyid chen po de'i tshe rabs snga ma la rab tu byung
1440(): ba la goms shing chos la sems dpa' goms par byas pa dang / blo dang shes rab shin du gsal ba'i phyir khyim na gnas pa la dga' bar ma gyur te/ de 'dod pa rnams la 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang grags pa dang khon dang
1441(): mi mthun pa mang ba dang / rgyal po dang rkun po dang / chu dang / me dang / dgra dang / bag skal la dbang ba rnams dang / thun mong yin pa dang / chog mi shes par 'gyur ba dang / nyes pa mang po'i gnas su gyur pa'i
1442(): phyir bdag la phan par 'dod pa rnams pas drug can spong ba bzhin du yongs su spangs te spa dngab spu bzang po grags te/ gos 'dos bsgyur bdur smrig ni gyon/ khyim pa'i malugs ni por
1443(): nas/ rab tu byung ba'i 'dul ba dang sdom pa'i dpal la gnas par gyur pa dang / de'i chung ma de la snying nye ba'i dbang du gyur pa'ang skra bregs te/ lus la rgyan dang lhab lhub med par byas/ rlung bzhin gyi yon tan
1444(): bzang pos ni brgyan/ gos ngur smrig ni gyon nas de'i phyi bzhin du rab tu byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dka' thub kyi nags tshal du 'gro ba'i rjes su 'brang bar shes nas/ bud med sdug
1445(): ma myong ba dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas mi nus pa'i phyir de la smras pa/ bzang mo khyed nga la byams pa'i rang bzhin 'di bstan zin gyis khyod nga'i phyi bzhin du 'gro bar chas pa 'di thong zhig/ bud med
1446(): rab tu byung ba gzhan dag gang na 'khod pa der khyod kyang de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dug par rigs so// dgon pa'i gnas na 'dug pa ni rab tu dka'o ltos shig/ dur khrod dang ni khang stong ri bo dang // nags tshal gcan zan khro
1447(): bos gang ba na// nyi ma gang du nub par gyur pa der// dka' thub can rnams gnas med 'khod par 'gyur// bsam gtan byed cing rtag par gcig pur gnas// bud med dag ni ltar yang med par byed// khyod kyi 'bad pa 'di ni ci
1448(): zhig dgos// de bas khyod blo slad du ldog par gyis// de yang de'i phyi bzhin du 'gro bar yid dam bcas pas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du cung zad cig 'di skad ces slar smras so// khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'gro ba la// bdag
1449(): nigal te nyon mongs na// bdag sdug khyod kyang mi dgyes bzhin// ci yi slad du de ltar bgyid// bdag mi khyod dang bral bzhin du// mchis par nus pa ma lags kyis// de ltar dka' dang 'gal ba 'di
1450(): bdag la bzod par mdzad du gsol/ de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du bsgo yang slar ldog sum rung ba dang / de nas byang chub sems dpas de la cang ma smras pa dang / b+ha ngur ba'i phyi bzhin du ngung pa
1451(): mo 'brangs pa dang 'dra bar de yang de'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs te/ grong dang ljongs rgyu zhing song song ba las/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ re shig na nags tshal rab tu dben pa nyams dga' ba/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/
1452(): grib ma stug pa la la dag na nyi ma'i 'od zer tig tig po de dag gis me tog sil ma bkram pa ltar 'dug pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi phye mas khebs pa'i sa gzhi gtsang ma zhig tu bsam gtan gyi cho ga byas nas/ byi dror
1453(): dus su ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ phyag dar khrod kyi tshem bu 'drub cing 'dug go// bud med rab tu byung ba de bang de dang mi ring ba zhig na/ rang gi lus kyi gzi mdangs lha mo dang 'dra bar mdzes pas shing drung brgyan pa bzhin du
1454(): 'dug cing / yid la bya ba'i man ngag des bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du bsam gtan byed cing 'dug go/ de nas yul de'i rgyal po sa phyogs de dang nye ba'i nags tshal dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i shing lo lhag par mdzes
1455(): ba dang ni ldan bung ba che tha mang po ni s+kha di ri ri zer/ bya ko kau la mang po na sgra snyan pa 'byin/ mtsho'i gnas rab tu nyams dga' ba/ me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pal kha bye ba ni brgod pa bzhin du 'dug pa
1456(): sa/ tog dri'im po sna tshogs kyi bsung gis dgos pa'i bas bu'i dang rnams su bde ba dang pa yong ba na/ mthar kyis rgyu ning song song ba lasas phyogs de tsun to/ mahog rtswa tshogs cho brdu ma
1457(): tu mdzes// dpyid kyi dpal gyis ched du bshams pa bzhin// ko kil po dang ma byasgra yang 'byin// mchog nas bzang po me tog chu skyes ldan// ne'u sing sngon po mdzes pa'i rtsa 'jam yod// bung ba myos
1458(): pa'i sgra 'byin nags tshal drag/ 'dod pa'i lha yi rtsed mo'i gnas gyur 'dra// yid la lta bar rab tu 'dod par gyur// de nas rgyal po dngul zhing zhes bskyed de// byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i gtam
1459(): nas/ de dang nye ba'i phyogs cig tu 'dug go// des bud med rab tu byung ba mthong na yid rab tu 'phrog par 'gyur ba de mthong nas/ de'i gzugs bzang mo de la snying chags par gyur te/ 'di ni 'di'i chung ma yin
1460(): yang dag go snyam nas/ 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir de 'phrog pa'i thabs bsams so// dka' thub can gyi dbod pa me 'bar ba'i// mthu ni khro ba'i me 'drar nges shes nas// yid la 'dod pas brtan
1461(): pa g.yengs gyur kyang // de la 'phral du brnyas thabs ma byas so// des bsams pa/ de'i dka' thub kyi mthu shes par byas la/ nus na ni de bya bar rigs kyis de ltar ma yin na ni mi rung ngo snyam nas/ gal te 'di de la/
1462(): sems chags pa'i dbang du gyur na ni/ de la dka' thub kyi mthu med gor ma chag go// de ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni de la mi lta ba'i rigs so// de bas na de'i dka' thub kyi mthu che 'am chung ba rtag go snyam nas/
1463(): rgyal po des dka' thub kyi mthu ba rtag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' la phan par dga' ba bzhin du spras pa/ kye rab tu byung ba khyod 'jig rten 'di na mi g.yon can dang thub tshod can rab tu mngan nags tshal dben par
1464(): mda' bzlog tu'ang med pa 'di lta bun/ chung ma 'di lta bu dang lhan cig 'khong du rung ngam/ khyod kyi chung ma 'di la 'ga' zhog gis gces na ni nga la'ang gshe bar 'gyur ro smos shig/ dben pa 'di na dka' thub chung ba
1465(): khyod// 'ga' zhig chos dang bcas te brnyas byas nas// chung ma 'di ni mngon gsum phrogs gyur na// mya ngan byed las gzhan ni ci byar yod// khro ba bskyed na'ang yid ni 'khrugs 'gyur zhing // chos dang 'gal
1466(): la grags pa'ang med par 'gyur// de bas 'di ni grong du bzhag pa'i rigs// dka' thub can la bud med bsnyen ci dgos// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gsung ba yang med na/ gal
1467(): te de ltar gyur na bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba gsan du gsol/ brgyags pas bsnyems sam gal te ma brtags par// bdag la gnod pa byed pa 'dir byung na// sa rdul stug po char gyis mnan pa bzhin/ bdag
1468(): nyid gson bzhin de ni yong mi gtong // de nas rgyal po des bsams pa/ 'di ni chung ma 'di la rab tu chags pas dka' thub kyi mthu'ang med do snyam nas/ sems dpa' chen po de la brnyas par gyur te/ des
1469(): gnod pa byas su'ang mi dogs la/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur pas/ bud med de mthong ba'i mi rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed deng la bud med rab tu byung ba de bo zang nang du khrid cig ces bsgog
1470(): #bud med rab tu byung ba des de skad zer ba thos nas/ nags tshal gyi dgo ba mo gcan zan ma rungs pas gtses pa bzhin du 'jigs shing bag tshabs ngo 'dzum ni 'gyur/ mig ni mchims
1471(): gang skad ni 'dzer zhing phongs nas smre sngags 'di skad 'don no// 'jig rten phongs shing dgra yis gces gyur na/ rgyal po dag la pha bzhin skyabs tshol na// de nyid gang la mi rigs byed gyur na// de
1472(): yis su la phan skyabs btsal bar bya// kye ma'o 'jig rten skyong ba'ang tshul las nyams// gang dag phongs pa legs par mi sbyong ba// 'on te med dam shi bar gyur tam ci// chos kyang grags pa tsam du bad pa lta/
1473(): jo bo bzhugs shing lha yis ci zhig bya// gzhan zhig yin na'ang rjes su bsrung rigs ma// sdig can rnams kyis bdag ni khrid bzhin du// bdag la skal ba med pas cang mi gsung // gang gi dmong pa'i
1474(): ser ba bab gyur na// ri yi gzugs kyang mi snang dral gyur na// bdag ni 'di ltar gyur yang de mi smra// 'on kyang byung ngan ma ni bcug son// bdag ni 'di ltar rab tu phongs gyur kyang // sing
1475(): rje'i snod du ma gyur sdig re che/ phongs la snying rjes can gyis bskyabs bya ba// 'di ni dka' thub can gyi tshul min nam/ bdag nyid slad du bzlog kyang ma log pa// de nyid da rung thugs la bcangs pa 'dra/
1476(): khyod ni mi dgyes bzhin du bdag mchis pa/ kye ma'o bdag dgar bgyid pa ga la srid// de ltar bud med rab tu byung ba de snying rje rje skad du smra 'e ldugs 'don pa dru ba tsam la brten pa rgyal pos bsgo ba'i mi
1477(): rnams kyis sems dpa' chen po des mthong bzhin du/ shing rta'i steng du bzhag sde po brang gi nang du khrid par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas kyang so sor brtags pa'i mthus khro ba'i stobs bcil te/
1478(): de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa med cing rab tu zhi bas phyag dar khrod kyi tshem bu 'drub cing 'dug go// de nas de la rgyal pos smras pa mi bzod khros pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i tshig khyod kyis bsnyems shing gsang stong
1479(): spras zin na// nyon mongs ma de mthong bzhin phrogs gyur kyang / mthu med zhum nas rab tu zhi bar 'dugade bas rang gi mthu rtsal bstan par gyis// dka' thub gnas pa'i gzi 'a
1480(): bsags pa'ang ston/ bdag gi tshod kyang gzung ba ma shes nas/ khas chas don med lhags pa ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag gi yi ma du bcas pa
1481(): de ni don ma mchis pa ma lags kyis mkhyer bar mdzad du gsol gang zhig bdag la gnod pa bgyid pa de gal bzhin du yang bdag gis yongs ma btang / bdag gi mngon sum du yang zhi bar/
1482(): byas 'debs bdag gis yi dam bcas bzhin 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig rab tu brtan pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i tshul gyis ston pa des dka' thub can gyi yon tan yod par yid ches par gyur nas
1483(): bsams pa bram ze 'dis ni gzhan zhig la bsams nas smras pa lta zhig na/ bdag gis des shes nas 'dis bu mi brtan par byas so snyam ste rtog pa skyes nas byang chub sems/
1484(): dpa' la smras pa/ rnam par g.yo bzhin khyod kyis ma btang ba/ khyod la gnod byed de ni su zhig yin// char pa bab pas rdul bran bkab pa bzhin/ khyod kyis gang zhig rab tu zhi bar
1485(): byas// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gsan du gsol/ skyes na'ang gang zhig mi mngon la/ ma skyes na ni dge bar mngon// bdag la gnod pa'i khro bde/ bdag gis shor bar ma gyur to//
1486(): mi phan 'dod pa'i mi rnams ni// gang zhig skyes na dga' 'gyur ba// dgra rnams dga' 'gyur khro ba de// bdag gis shor bar ma gyur te// gang zhig skyes par gyur na mi// dam pa'i don la spyod mi 'gyur/
1487(): rgyal po long bar byed pa yi// khro ba de la bdag mi gnas// gang gis zil gnon dge ba gtong bar gyur// don rnams grub kyang nyam par 'gyur ba li// khro ba ma rungs gdon gyis bsgyur 'dra ba// tshul
1488(): min byed pa'i gdon gyis zin par 'ong // rtsub shing brtsubs pa las ni me byung na// de nyid rab tu tshig par gyur 'dra ba/ log par rtogs las 'bar bar gyur pa yi// khro ba'ang de bzhin bdag
1489(): nyid pung bar byed// rab tu 'bar zhing tshig pa'i me 'dra ba// snying la gdung ba'i khro ba ma bcil na// yang bar gyur pas de la gtam ngan 'byung // nang par nam langs zla ba'i 'od nyams bzhin
1490(): gzhan la gnod pa bya bar mi sems par// khro ba la ni dgra bzhin gang lta ba// de yi grags pa nges par rgyas par 'gyur/ zla ba yar gyi 'od zer gsal ba bzhin// khro ba la nyes dmigs chen po 'di lta bu
1491(): gzhan dag kyang yod de/ khro ba'i me yis bzhin mdog nyams 'gyur na// rgyan gyi brgyan yang bzang por yong mi snang // mal stan bzang po dag la nyal gyur kyang // khro ba'i zug rngus sems ni sdug bsngal
1492(): 'gyur// bdag la phan pa'i don bsgrub brjed gyur te/ khro bas gdungs nas lam ngan 'gro bar byed// grags dang don bsgrub pa las nyams 'gyur te/ zla ba mar gyi ngo bzhin dpal las nyams/
1493(): mdza' ba shes dag gis rab tu bcugs gyur kyang / khro bas mi rigs g.yang sar lhung bar 'gyur/ phan dang gnod par sems las blo nyams nas/ phal cher 'gal zhing sems ni rmongs/
1494(): par 'gyur/ khro bas sdig pa'i las ni goms byas pas// ngan song dag tu lo brgyar sdug bsngal myong // gnod pa chen po byas pas shar nyer ba'i// dgras kyang de las lhag par ni byar yong
1495(): khro ba 'di ni nang gi dgra/ bdag gis de ltar shes nas ni// de yi mthu ni 'phro ba dag/ skyes bu su zhig bzod par byed// de bas bdag ni gson bzhin du/ khro bas g.yos kyang ma shor to// phung bar
1496(): byed pa'i dgra po de/ su zhig yal bar 'dor bar byed// de nas de'i rab tu zhi ba'i yon tan rmad du byung ba dang / tshig snying la bab pa des/ rgyal po de yid rab tu mgu bar gyur nas smras pa/ khyod kyis smras
1497(): ba'i rim 'di dang // zhi ba rjes su mthun pa 'di// mang du smos kyang ci dgos te/ khyod dang ma phrad brlag par 'gyur// de skad ces bstod nas/ drung du bsnyen nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te sdig pa
1498(): byas pa'ang bshags so// bud med rab tu byung ba de la'ang bzod par gsol nas slar btang ngo // bdag nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog tu las blangs so// dag bas na/
1499(): khro bathul bar gyur na grazhi bar 'gyur gyis gzhan du byas na dgra 'phelo li de bas na khro ba thul bar bya ba la 'bang par bya'o// de ltar 'khon du 'dzin pa med na/ dam zhi bar 'gyur la dul bar byas na dam
1500(): 'phel lo// de bzhin du mi khro ba ni gnyis ka'i don stong par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzod pa'i phan yon 'byung ba'i mdo sde dag la'ang brjod par bya'o// khro ba'i nyes dmigs kyi gtam bya ba dang / de bzhin
1501(): gshegs pa'i che ba nyid la'ang brjod par bya'o// gtsug phung byang chub kyi skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu gcig pa'o// bab po bdun pa// das pa rnams
1502(): dud 'gror lhung ba'i spyod pa la'ang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyis rjes su mthun par bya ba tsam yang mi nus so// da yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhin gyis mtsho chen po'i nang na ngang pa'i khyu chen po brgya stong
1503(): phrag du ma grangs mang po'i bdag po ngang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// de'i blon po ngang pa'i sde dpon rigs pa dang mi rigs pa yongs su shes par bya ba la mkhas pa yun
1504(): ring por yang dran pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/ rigs mthon po'i nang nas gtso bor gyur pa/ mkhas pa dang / nges pa dang / dul bas brgyan pa/ brtan pa dang / gtsang ba dang tshul khrims dang spyod
1505(): tshul dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dpa' la sdug bsngal bzod cing bag yod pa/ g.yul ngor 'gyed pa'i dgra thabs la mkhas shing mi 'jigs pa/ rje bo la snying rtse zhing legs par sgrub bzhin bzangs/
1506(): zhes bya ba zhig kyang yod par gyur te/ de'i tshe de ltar gyur pa de yang gnas brtan 'phags pa kun dga' bo yin no// de gnyis cig la cig byams shing mdza' ba'i yon tan gyi mthu rab tu che bar gyur te/ 'jig rten
1507(): gnyis ka la phan pa 'byung bar bya ba'i don du legs par 'jog pa ni/ slob dpon dang slob ma'i gtso bo bzhin/ gzhan ni slob ma phal pa bzhin rnam pa gcig tu ni pa dang bu rab tu thu ba bzhin/ gzhan ni
1508(): bu phal pa bzhin no// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang grub pa dang rigs sngags 'chang ba dang dka' thub can de mngon sum du mthong ba rnams rab tu ngo mtshar che bar gyur to// de gnyis ngang pa'i tsho gas rnams
1509(): 'khod pa de'i// bde ba'i lus ldeg spyod pa gcig tu gyur// mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya 'i 'dab ma gnyis// lus ldeg phyir ni spyod pa gcig pa bzhin// de ltar de gnyis kyis ngang pa'i tshogs de
1510(): dag rjes su bskyang ba ni chos dang srid dar ba gnyis kyis mi rnams rjes su bskyangs pa bzhin du rab tu dar bar gyur to// nges mtsho de yang rab tu mdzes par gyur to// mtsho nang 'dug
1511(): cing tshogs pa yi// sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba de// pad+ma dkar po rgyu ba bzhin// mtsho de rab tu mdzes par byas// la lar ngang pa so sor gyis// kha cig tu ni phang phung chas// kha la sprin rnams
1512(): gyes 'phungs pa'i// mdzes pa'i dpal yang zil gyis non// de na ngang pa'i bdag po sems can thams cad la phan par dga' ba de dang / blon po ngang ba'i sde dpon bzhin bzangs/
1513(): de'i yon tan khyad par can gyi mthu chen pos yid la ya mtshan chen por gyur pa'i grub pa dang / drang srong dang rigs sngags 'chang dang lha mang po rnams de gnyis kyi grags pa'i gzhi las gyur pa'i gtam 'ba' zhig
1514(): 'dze ba zhing de dang de dag na 'khod do// gser mchog bco ma'i kha dog 'dra ba'i mdog/ dpal ldan lus can tshigs 'bru gsal bar smra// dul zhing rigs pa'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas/ nga ba'i
1515(): tshul can 'di gnyis nges par gzhan// phrag dog med pas yon tan bsgrags pa dang // de gnyis grags pa phyogs su rgyas par gyur// rgyal po rnams kyang de la dad pa skyes// dam pa tshogs
1516(): pas skyes dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de'i tshe yul bA ra NA si'i rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba zhig yod de// des ngang pa'i rgyal po de dang / ngang pa'i sde dpon de'i yon tan khyad par can gyi gtam blon po yid ches bya
1517(): dang bram ze rgan po rnams kyi tshogs pa'i nang du gleng bsrung ba lan du ma zhig thos nas/ de gnyis lta 'dod par gyur te/ blon po bka' la gtogs pa/ gtsug lag du ma la goms shing mkhas pa'i blo dang /
1518(): ldan pa rnams la smras pa/ kye ngang pa mchog de gnyis ci nas kyang nga'i spyan sngar brim du rung ba'i thabs bzang po 'ga' zhig tshol cig/ de nas blon po de dag rang rang gi blo la ci dran pa dang / gzhung
1519(): lugs dang yang sbyar te/ rgyal po la gsol pa/ sems can rnams ni bde ba 'tshal// bde bar 'gyur ba'i yon tan mchog de dang de nas 'gugs par bgyi / de bas de thos de gnyis mchi
1520(): de bas na mtsho gang na de gnyis mngon par dga' bar gyur pa'i bka' mching gda' ba de bas kyang yon tan khyad par du 'phags shing bzang po'i mtsho zhig/ yul 'dir yang dgon pa'i sa phyogs zhig tu bgying du
1521(): stsal la/ gdugs re zhing yang bya thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra bsgrags shing / ci nas kyang ngo mtshar cher gyur pa'i bde ba'i yo byad kyi yon tan khyad par can thos nas de gnyis 'dir ma
1522(): par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi ba'i rigs so// lha gzigs su gsol/ lha cig sems can phal cher ni// bde ba rnyed pa khyad du gsod// thos na dga' ba'i bde ba dag/ gud na 'dug kyang yid thog
1523(): 'gyur// de nas rgyal po ngas bsams pa de bden no snyam nas/ ring po ma lon par grong khyer gyi skyed mos tshal dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu/ yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i longs spyod kyi yon tan la 'gran du
1524(): rung ba me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / so'u gan d+hi ka dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ku mu da dmar pos khebs shing chu gtsang ma mang pos gang ba/ rab tu
1525(): yid du 'ong ba'i mtsho chen po zhig byed du bcug go// ljon shing me tog bzang ldan zhing // lo ma bzang po 'od gsal rnams// de la skad mo ltar lhags bzhin// mtsho yi mtha' ma yongs su bskor// pad+ma rnams ni dgod pa pa nin
1526(): chu rnabs 'khrugs pas yod par 'gyur// de la chags pa'i bung ba rnams// gso dang 'phur ba mang pos ga / kha cig na ri tha 'od kyis/ 'brug su dadag mdzes/ gang
1527(): gi grib mas rab bcang nas/ kha cig zla ba'i dum bu 'dra// pad+ma ut+pal phye ma rnams/ rlabs kyi sor mos bris pa bzhin// mtsho yi 'gram dag rab tu brgyan/ kha cig gser bye'i ri mo bzhin
1528(): pa.A mu t+pal 'dab mdag/ ga sar bcas pas de dang der// me tog seMs ma bsam pa bzhin// rab tu nyams dga' rnams par mdzes// chu ni rab gas la mi g.yo bas// lus kyi yon tan gsapa
1529(): mdzes pa'i// nya yi tshogs ni mang po dag/ mkha' la rgyu ba 'dra bas brgyan// la lar mu tig phreng chad bzhin// glang chen sna nas bus pa dang // brag la phog pa'i chu 'bros pa'i// rlabs kyi
1530(): phreng ba rab tu 'phro// rig 'dzin na chung khrus byas shing // glang chen rgyal ba'i bsung dag dang / me tog rnams kyi phye ma yis// kha cig tu ni bsung bsgos bzhin// zla ba'i chung ma skar ma
1531(): rnams// spyi yi gdong lha me long bzhin// bya rnams dga' ba mang pos gang // de yi sgra snyan rab tu grag/ mchod lta bu bya mang po thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad dgag pa med pa de lta bu byed du bcug
1532(): nas de dag la byin te/ bya rnams yid ches par bya ba'i phyir nyin re zhing yang mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra sgrog tu bcug go// mtsho yi me tog pad+ma dang // ut+pal 'dab mas gang ba'i chu// rgyal
1533(): bos bya rnams kun la byin// dga' zhing mi 'jigs lon dang bcas// de nas re shig cig sngon gyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ sprin gyi mun pa yol bltar sgrib pa ni med/ sngon gyi dus kyi yon tar bzang po na
1534(): byung / phyogs ni gsal ba ltar snang / me tog pad+ma mang po kha bye bas ni mdzes par gyur/ mtsho'i chu rnams ni rab tu dang zhing yid du 'ong bar gyur/ zla ba ni gzi mdangs kyi mchog dang ldan zhing 'od zer
1535(): rab tu 'phel ba bzhin du gyur/ sa gzhi ni me tog rnam pa mang pos phun sum tshogs pas brgyun pa dang ldan par gyur/ bya ngang pa gzhon nu mang po ni rgyu bar gyur pa'i tshe/ yid bzhin gyi mtsho
1536(): nang na ngang pa mang po 'khod pa de'i nang nas ngang pa shug gnyis shig ston gyi dus nyams dga' ba'i tshe/ yul rgyu zhing mthar gyis dong dong ba las/ rgyal po de'i yul du phyin to// de na'ang bya mang po'i
1537(): sgra mi 'byin bung ba mang po ni sma ri ri zer/ bser bu bsil ba langs pas/ rlabs kyi phreng ba 'khrigs par byas shing kho ra khor yug tu me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la'i dri zhim po'i ngad ni ldang pa
1538(): kha bye ba rnams ni 'bar ba bzhin me tog ku mu da dkar po rnams ni dgod pa bzhin du 'dug pa'i mchod mthong bar gyur to// ngang pa shug gnyis po de gnyis yid bzhin gyi mtshon 'khod 'khod kyang mtsho de'i
1539(): dpal rab tu ying du 'ong ba de mthong nas ya mtshan che zhing rang gi ngang pa'i tsho gas rnams kyang rjes su dran par gyur te/ e ma'o ngang pa'i tshogs de dag kyang 'dir lhags kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems par gyur/
1540(): 'jig rten pa ni bal che ru/ phyi yi bde ba myong nas mi byams shing rjes su chags pa yis/ mdza' bshes thogs mar dran par 'gyur/ de nas dang pa shug gnyis po/
1541(): de na ji srid 'dod par 'khod 'khod nas dbyar gyi dus la bab pa dang klog chub ni mtshon cha 'debs pa 'dra/ sprin gyis khebs pa'i mun pa ni ha cang yang mi gnag/ sprin gyi tshogs mang po
1542(): 'du ba ni lha ma yin gyi dmag gi tshogs 'du ba bzhin rma bya'i mdongs yongs su rgyas pa ni mdzes par gyur/ rma bya'i sgra cong tsong bu 'byin pa ni dbyar gyi sprin rnams rgyal bar gyur pa
1543(): bzhin du mgu bar byed/ rma bya mang po ni gar sna tshogs byed bya phran mang po ni sgra sna tshogs 'byin cing rnam par rgyu/ me tog ka dam pa dang sardza dang ardzu na dang / ke ta ka'i dri
1544(): zhim pos bgos pa'i bser bu bsil ba'i ngad ldang ba ni nags tshal dbugs 'byin pa bzhin bya dkar mo'i phreng ba rgyu ba ni/ sprin gyi so'i phreng ba gtams pa bzhin ngang pa'i tshogs rnams
1545(): gung du 'dong 'dong bas sgra cher 'byin cing / 'gro chas byed pa bzhin du ngang pa shug gnyis po de yang yid bzhin gyi mtsho de nyid du slar dong ngo // ngang pa'i bdag po'i drung du lhags nas kyang yul dang phyogs
1546(): rnams kyi gtam gleng bslang ba'i tshe/ mtsho de'i yon tan khyad par can de glengs so// lha gangs ri'i lho phyogs na yul bA ra NA si zhes bgyi ba na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis te
1547(): des mtsho chen po rmangad du byung ba bzang ba/ yon tan che ba brjod kyis mi lang ba zhig bya rnams la rang dgar spyod cing bde ba'i longs spyod du bstsal te/ nyin re zhing yang mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra yang sgrogs/
1548(): bya rnams kyang de na rang gi khyim na mchis pa bzhin du 'jigs shing bag tsha ba ma mchis par spyod cing mchis so// de bas na lha yang dgung lo slang ma la der gshegs pa'i rigs so// de skad ces
1549(): zer ba thos nas/ ngang pa de dag thams cad kyang de lta bar 'dod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas ngang ba'i sde dpon bzhin bzangs la/ gros 'dri ba'i tshig dang yi ge gsal bar rgya cher bstan
1550(): nas/ ji ltar bya ba'i rigs zhes smras so// de nas bzhin bzangs kyis de la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ lha der gshegs pa mi rigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'o skol gyi lus 'di ni sha bzar rung
1551(): ste chags pa'i gnas lags shing yid du 'ong ba sha stag lags la bdag cag 'di na cis kyang phongs pa ma mchis so// mi rnams kyi snying yang tshig 'jam po bcos ma phyi bzhag can du
1552(): spru la/ gnod par sems pa'i rang bzhin ngan pa ni mi mngon par bgyid cing phal cher snying rje chung la g.yo ngan lags so// rje cig gzigs su gsol/ phal cher bya dang ri dgas rnams// smre
1553(): dang sems pa mthun par bgyid// mi yi nang na kha cig ni// de las bzlog pa'i tshul la mkhas// 'jam zhing snyan par tshig smra yang // don dang mthun pa ma mchis so// tshong pa rnams kyang khe 'tshol phyir//
1554(): bdag gi nor yang 'god par bgyid// skyon dang bcas shing mi rigs pa// dgos pa mchis kyang mi smra ste// de bas lha cig de tsam gyis// thugs ches mdzad pa mi rigs so//
1555(): gal te der mi gshegs su mi rung na'ang der gshegs la mtsho de'i longs spyod bltas la slar myur du gshegs par rigs kyis/ de na yun ring du bzhugs pa'ang mi rigs la/ gtan du bzhugs par
1556(): yang dgongs par mi rigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi dus la bab cing zla ba dang skar ma/ rgyu skar dri ma med pas brgyan pa'i tshe dang pa'i tshogs mang po yul bA ra NA si'i mtsho lta bar 'dod pa rnams
1557(): kyis der 'dong ba'i phyir yang dang yang du gsol ba btab pa dang / ngang pa de dag gis ngo bzlog ma phong nas/ bzhin bzangs la sogs pa'i ngang pa mang pos yongs su bskor te/ zla ba ston gyi dus sprin gyis
1558(): bskor ba bzhin du der song ngo // mtsho chen de'i nyams dga' dpal mthong nas/ yid du 'ong dgu bkod pa sna tshogs rnams// rab tu dga' bar sems dpa' de rnams kyi// gnas su rung bar yon tan
1559(): mtshungs gyur nas// mchod gnas skabs de dang de dag gis// yid bzhin mtsho bas gang dag lhag gyur pa// de phyir de na ring du gnas par sems// yid bzhin mtshol de dag mi sems so//
1560(): dag gang gis mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra de yang thos la/ de na bya mang po rnams kyang bde bar 'khod/ mtsho de'i longs spyod kyis sems rab tu dga' zhing de na skyed mos tshal du rtser dong dong bzhin du longs spyod rjes
1561(): su myong zhing rab tu dga' bar gyur to// de nas mtsho de bsrung bar bskos pa'i mi rnams kyis kyang / ngang pa de dag der lhags pa rgyal po la gangs par gsol pa lha sngon ngang pa mchog gnyis shig
1562(): yon tan dang gzugs bka' mchid du gda' ba/ de kho na 'dra ba'i ngang pa mchog gnyis shig 'dab ma gser gyi 'dab ma ltar mdzes/ gdong dang rkang pa gnyis ni gser bcom pas kyang lhag par mdog
1563(): bzang zhing mdzes lus kyi tshad ni lhag par che zhing legs pa dag cig ngang pa'i g.yog 'khor brgya phrag du mas bskor te/ lha'i mtsho brgyan pa'i phyir mchis pa bzhin du 'dir mchis so zhes gsol to//
1564(): de nas rgyal po des bya gshor ba'i mi bya gshor ba'i las la mkhas par grags shing grub pa zhig btsal nas/ bya de gzung ba'i phyir rim gro bskyed de bka' stsal to// des kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes
1565(): rgyal po'i bka' mnyan nas/ ngang pa de gnyis kyi gnas dang spyod yul legs par brtags te/ de dang de dag tu snyidas po rnams mi mngon par byas te btsugs so// de nas dang pa de dag yid gan
1566(): zhing mi rung du dogs pa med pas rab tu dga' nas yid g.yengs bzhin du rgyu zhing 'khod 'khod pa las ngang pa'i bdag po'i rkang pa gnyis snyis zin par gyur to// bring pa'i thabs ni mkhas pa yis// nyes
1567(): su dogs pa med pa rnams// bag phab pa ni log par gyur// bag med brlag pa'i 'byung khungs yin// de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ gzhan dag las kyang kha cig
1568(): 'di lta bu'i nya mnyes par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ sgra 'byin pa'i bye brag gis/ mtsho 'di 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes bsgrags so// de nas ngang pa de dag ngang ba'i
1569(): bdag pos snyis zin pas snying sngangs nas 'jigs shing skrag la/ brtabs pa'i skad mi snyan pa phyung ste/ cig la cig mi lta bar dmag mi g.yul ngor pham pa bzhin du phyogs phyogs su
1570(): 'phur nas byer ro// ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzangs ni ngang pa'i bdag po'i drung nas ma g.yos so// byams pa'i bcing bas yid ni bcings pa rnams/ rang gi srog dang bral bar
1571(): mi sems so// mdza' bshes nyam nyes gyur pa'i mya ngan ni// srog dang bral ba bas kyang sdug bsngal che// de nas byang chub sems dpas bzhin bzangs la smras pa song zhig song zhig
1572(): bzhin bzangs khyod// 'di na 'dug pa mi rigs so// nga ni 'di ltar gyur pa las// khyod kyis grogs byar ga la yod// bzhin bzangs kyis smras pa 'di na mchis pa 'gum
1573(): par nges ma mchis// gud du mchis kyang rga shi med mi 'gyur// bde ba'i tshe na rtag tu khyod bkur la// nyam nyes chen 'dor du ga la rung // bdag gi srog bzung tsam gyi phyir/
1574(): byayi rgyal po khyod bor na// gtam ngan char bzhin 'bab pa yi// skyabs ni bdag la ci zhig mtshos// rgyal po chen po nya ma nyes pa// bor te mchis na chos mchis sam// bya rgyal khyod ni cir gyur pa//
1575(): de skar bdag cing gyur kyang rung // byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sris ni zin par gyur pa la// tshang mang min pa gang du 'gro// khyod ni ma zin bde bar gnas// ni phyir nga yang 'gyur bar 'dod//
1576(): de ltar byas na cir 'gyur ltos// gnyis ka srog dang bral gyur na// gnyen pa shes phyi na 'khod pa dang / khyod dang ngal ci zhig phan// bde dang mi bde mun lung bzhin// phan pa'i don ni mi mngon pa//
1577(): de lta bu la srog bor na// khyod kyi don ni ci zhig bstan// bzhin bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'dab chags rnams kyi gtso bo khyod// chos kyi don yang mi sems sam// chos don legs par bgyis/
1578(): na ni// srid kyi don mchog thob par 'gyur// bdag ni chos kyi don la lta// chos las srid kyang thob par 'gyur// khyod la glo ba nye ba'i phyir// bdag ni gson par mi 'tshal lo// byang chub
1579(): sems dpas smras pa/ mdza' bo nyam nyes gyur pa las// grogs po gang dag chos dran zhing // srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ba// dam pa rnams kyi chos yin bden// de bas khyod kyis
1580(): chos bzhin byas// nga la gus pa'ang bstan zin gyis// ngas ni gsol ba btab pa bzhin// nga bdag 'dod pa bzhin du song // de ltar byas na rung ba ni// mdza' bshes nga dang bral ba
1581(): rnams// blo gros phun sum tshogs pa khyod// song na 'byor pa mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar de gnyis cig la cig byams pa'i yon tan smras pa las/ 'chi bdag mngon du 'ongs pa bzhin/
1582(): 'on pa da mal sa[।] nga pa yong da stsu 'dod/ nga
1583(): 'dir 'ga' tshig ni chos zin yang dag go sngam nas thos nges pa bskyed de ni gzugs pa'i gnas rnams su nul du song ba dang / rang pa'i mchog gnyis mthong ngo // rang ni gzun
1584(): badza ba ris yid la ma mtshan cher gyur d+ha/ gnyis ka nis bon to rnams nas/ der gtsugs pa'i ni gnyis brgyas padang / de nas gcig ni rnaMs padag rnas sa zan pa ra
1585(): 'dug bzhin du rim gro byed cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ snyings sa mtshan che bar gyur to// bzhin 'as la ched du smras pa/ bya 'di snyi zin pas na// 'phur te 'gro ba'i mthu rtsal med//
1586(): yang drung du 'ongs bzhin du// mkha' la 'phur te mi 'gro 'am// khyod ni ma zin bde bar 'dug/ 'dab bshos rdzogs shing mthu dang ldan// nga ni 'di skar 'ongs gyur kyang // ci'i phyir mkha' la myur/
1587(): mi 'gro// bzhin bzangs kyis de skad zer ba thos nas/ tshig 'bru rab tu gsal zhing spel legs la rang bzhin gyis yid du 'ong zhing brtan pa'i yon tan gyis gzi byin dang ldan pa'i sgra byung ste/ mi
1588(): skad du smras pa/ nus bzhin du ni mi 'grob// bya 'di sI yis zin gyur na/ sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur/ de byi rang ni mi 'gro'o// khyod kyis 'di yi rkang pa gnyis/
1589(): yi nags pa chen pos bzung / bdag kyang 'di la yon tan gyi// sis ni bas dam du zin// de nas rngon pa de rab tu pha mtshan cher gyur te/ ba spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas bzhin bzangs la yang smras/
1590(): pa nga yis 'jigs nas ngang pa gzhan// 'di bor nas ni gud du song // khyod ni 'di ltar 'di mi gtong // bya 'di khyod kyi cir 'ong gi/ bzhin bzangs kyis smras pa/ ngang pa'i rgyal po srog dang
1591(): 'dra ba'i grogs// bde ba sbyin pa de ni nyam nyes gyur// de bas bdag ni srog ni yal gyur kyang // 'di ni nga yis gtong bar mi nus so// de nas bzhin bzangs kyis rngon pa de yid
1592(): mgu zhing ya mtshan cher byed par shes nas smras pa/ bzang po bdag cag smras pa 'dis// gal te bde ba 'byung 'gyur zhing // de ring bdag cag btang na ni// chos dang ldan pa'i
1593(): grags pa 'thob/ rngon pas smras pa nga ni khyod la gnod mi byed// khyod ni nga yis bzung ba'ang med// de bas khyod ni ci bder song // gnyen dang phrad cing dga' bar
1594(): gyis// bzhin bzangs kyis smras pa bdag gi sdug bsngal mi bzhed na// bdag gis gsol ba bzhin du mdzod// gal te gcig gis mnyes gyur na// 'di ni thong la bdag
1595(): zung shig/ bdag cag mchu dang zheng yang mnyam// nachod la yang rgan gzhon med// 'di ltar bslus par gyur pa la/ khyod dang bdag gnyis pham rgyal med// bdag la thugs
1596(): ches mi 'gyur ma/ khyod kyis bdag ni sngar bzung la/ bya yi rgyal po byo nas mthong / khyod kyi rnyed pa'ang de bzhin la/ bdag gis gsol ba'ang gnang bar mdzod
1597(): ngang pa mang po dga' bar gyis/ debs mdza' ba'ang de bzhin 'gyur/ khyod kyis btang na ci ltar 'gyur ba gzigs/ ngang pa mang po grags pa'i bdag pa de/ nam mkha' dngas pa'i nang na rnam
1598(): mdzes pa// lha min rgyal pos zla ba btang ba bzhin/ de nas rngon pa de snyings zhing rtsub pa la goms kyang / de rang gi srog la'ang mi lta bar rje bo la snying nye zhing byams pa dang chu gang dang khrel
1599(): lhas che ba'i yon tan gyi gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / brtan zhing 'jam por smra ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshig des sems dul bar gyur nas ngo mtshar che zhing rab tu gus pa'i dbang gis thal mo sbyar
1600(): te bzhin bzangs la smras pa skal pa chen po legs so legs// rje yi don du srog btang ba/ khyod kyis 'dir ni gang bstan pa/ de lta bu yi chos bzang ba/ lha 'am mi yi nang
1601(): na dkon// de bas khyod kyi rgyal po de// mgu bar byas nas btang bar bya'o// khyod kyi srog pas phangs de la// gnod par byed pa su zhig yod// de skad ces smras nas/ rngon pa des
1602(): rgyal po de'i bka' mnyan par ngang pa'i rgyal po snying rje can de la rim gro byas te snyi bkrol te btang ngo // de nas ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzangs de ngang pa'i rgyal po de btang bas snying rab tu dga' bar gyur te/
1603(): rngon pa la dga' zhing byams pa'i lta bas bltas nas smras pa/ ngang ba'i rgyal po khyod kyis de btang bas// bdag ni mdza' bos ji ltar dga' 'gyur bar// bzang po khyod kyi gnyen dang lhan gcig tu/
1604(): ston brgya mang po dag tu dga' bar shog/ khyod kyi las byas don med mi 'gyur phyir// nga dang ngang ba mang po'i bdag po gnyis/ bde bar bzung la khur gyi ngor sngos te/ pho brang nang du rgyal po'i spyan
1605(): sngar brims// ngang pa'i rgyal po g.yog dang bcas gzigs ma// rgyal po de ni nges par dgyes par 'gyur// khyod la mgu bar gyur pa'i nor chen rnams// re yang mi re ba dag stsol bar 'gyur/
1606(): de nas des de ltar gal gyis bcus pa dang / rngon pa des bsams pa/ 'di lta bu'i ngang pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di gnyis re shig rgyal po'i spyan sngar brim mo snyam nas/ ngang pa'i mchog de
1607(): gnyis khur gyi dor sngos te/ bde zhing ma bcings pa khyer te song song nas rgyal po'i spyan sngar brims so// bdag gis ngang pa'i rgyal po 'di// sde dpon dang bcas 'tshal te mchis// rmad du
1608(): byung ba'i spyan gzigs 'di// rgyal pos spyan sngar brim du gsol// de nas rgyal po de la mtshan che zhing snying rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ ngang pa'i mchog gser gyi pha bong ltar gzi mdangs dang ldan
1609(): pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba de gnyis la bltas nas rngon pa de la smras pa/ bya 'di gnyis ni ma bcings la// snang cing rmas pa'ang yong med par// khyod ni sa la 'gro ba yi// ji ltar zin
1610(): bzhib du smos// de skad ces smras pa dang / rngon pa des rgyal po la phyag byas nas smras pa/ mtsho dang lu ma'i 'gram dag na bya rnams rgyu ba'i sa phyogs su/ bya
1611(): rab tu mi bzad pa// bdag gis shin tu mang po btsugs// de nas ngang pa'i mchog 'di ni// bag phab dogs pa med par rgyu// sti rnams btsugs pa de dag gis// rkang pa gnyis ni
1612(): zin par gyur// gcig ni ma zin de la 'khor// bdag la de yis gsol ba btab// ngang pa'i rgyal po'i srog glud du// bdag nyid mchid kyis 'tshal bar 'gyur// mi yi skad du tshig smras pa/
1613(): rnam par gsal la tshig 'bru 'jam// bdag gi srog kyang yongs btang zhing // gsol ba 'debs kyang gzi byin che// de bas 'di tshig rab tu 'jam pa dang // rje la snying nye spyod tshul bstan pa des//
1614(): bdag ni mgu bar gyur nas 'di yi rje// bdag gis khro ba btang nas 'di yang btang // de ltar bya rgyal 'di ni btang ba yis// dga' bar gyur nas snyan pa mang du smras// bdag gi sug las don med mi
1615(): 'gyur phyir// khyod kyi spyan sngar khrid ces bdag la mchi// de bas 'di ni bya'i gzugs can chos dang ldan pa gzhan zhig lags// gang gis bdag gi sems kyang de ma thag tu 'jam zhing mnyan par gyur/
1616(): de bas bdag gis bya yi rgyal po snyi las bkrol te btang ba dang / bdag la drin bzo byir ni rje los bcas te khyod kyi spyan sngar mchis/ rgyal po des de skad thos nas rab tu dga' zhing yid la ngo mtshar cher/
1617(): gyur te/ gser gyi stan khri rgyal po'i stan du 'os pa/ khri'i rkang pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i 'od zer 'phro zhing sdug pa sgra'i gdan rim pa du mar bshams shing bzang ba rgyab rten
1618(): bde zhing nyams dga' bas brgyan pa rkang rten btsugs pa zhig ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stan du thing zhig ces bka' stsal to// blon po chen po'i stan du 'os pa spa'i khri zhig ni bzhin bzangs kyi
1619(): stan du thing zhig ces bsgo'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ da ni dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam bya ba'i skabs su bab po snyam nas/ dril bu ster snyan pa'i skad phyung ste/ rgyal po
1620(): la smras pa/ gzi byin che zhing mdangs dang ldan pa'i sku// bde ba'i gnas khyod da ltar thugs bde 'am// khyod kyi chos kyi sku la rma med dam/ bka' lung snyan pas rgya cher dbugs phyung ngam/
1621(): phan gdags nan thur bgyi ba'i bka' khrims kyis// 'bangs kyi skye dgu bsrung ba'i dbang bskur tam// bdag gi grags pa'i gtam snyan rgyas gyur tam/ 'bangs rnams glo ba nya zhing phan btags
1622(): sam/ blon po 'dzangs shing bro ba nye ba rnams// brtag pa'i thabs kyis legs par brtags lags sam// 'bangs la sman pa rtag tu dgongs lags sam// de dag mi mkhyen par ni mi
1623(): bzhugs grang / dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas pa'i bka' nan gyis/ rgyal phran de dag bka' ni nyan lags sam/ thugs rje chen po'i mdzes pa mchis lags sam/ thugs ches bapag med pas
1624(): ni min nal grang // chos dang bde dang srid rnams mthun lags sam// khyod kyi spyod pa dam pa dga' ba yi// grags pa phyogs su rgyas par gyur pa yis// dgra rnams shugs 'byin
1625(): spong bar gyur lags sam// de nas rgyal po de sems rab tu dang zhing dbang po rnams kyang dang la gsal bar gyur nas de la slar smras pa/ ngang ba de ring bdag kyang bde// thams cad du yang bde bar 'gyur/
1626(): dam pa dag dang phrad pa 'di// yun ring bsam pa grub par gyur// khyod ni snyi yis zin pa na// dga' ba'i sems ni g.yengs gyur nas// khyed la dbyug pas brdegs nas ni// 'di yis snang bar ma
1627(): byas sam// de ltar rngon pa 'di dag ni// bya rnams zin zhing snad gyur na// dga' bas sems ni g.yengs gyur nas// ngan pa dag kyang spyod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di
1628(): snga bur ni nyam nyes kyang // rgyal po chen po bde zhing mchis// 'dis kyang bdag la dgra bzhin du// gnod pa ci yang ma bgyis so// bzhin bzangs 'di yang ma zin par// bdag la byams pas/
1629(): zin bzhin 'dug/ 'jam por smra bar mthong ba dang // ngo mtshar ya mtshan che bar gyur// 'di yi tshig ni 'jam po yis// de nas yid ni mgu gyur nas// dul zhing rim 'gro cher bskyed de/
1630(): bdag ni 'di yis snyims bkrol// de bas 'di ltar bzhin bzangs kyis// 'di la phan yon gdags pa dang // bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i phyir// bdag cag gnyis ni 'dir mchis so// rgyal
1631(): bos smras pa / bsam pa gnyis ni 'dir byon te/ khyed gnyis byon pa rab tu legs/ khyed gnyis mthong bar gyur bas ma bdag ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ rjor pa 'das
1632(): yang de ring ni/ don chen grub par gzigs su gsol/ 'o skol gnyis ka dgyes bgyis pas// 'di ni mgu bar bgyi bar rigs/ de skad ces spras nas/ rgyal po des rngon pa de la/
1633(): nor rab tu mang zhing rgya cher byin te mgu bar byas nas/ yang dang pa'i rgyal po la sbas pa/ khyed gnyis ched du bdag gi khyim du byon// de bas bdag la 'dzem dag ma mchis par/ ci dang mi bzhed de
1634(): dag bdag la gsungs// bdag gi bdog pa khyed dang thun mong lags// mdza' bos spobs te dogs med tshig gsal bar// longs spyod bdog la blangs na mgu 'gyur ba// de lta bu ni
1635(): nor gyis mgu mi 'gyur// de bas mdza' bos spobs na phan yon che// de nas rgyal po des bzhin bzangs smrar 'jug par 'dod nas 'dzum dmul te/ bzhin bzangs la bltas nas smras
1636(): par skye bo gsar du gshe zhing ma 'dris pa// rab tu spobs shing bag dbab mi rung kyang // des shing mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshig dag ni// zhe sar bcas shing snyan par mi smra min// de bas tshig
1637(): tsam smra ba yis// bdag ni spobs par re ba dang // phyi phyir mdza' bar 'dod pa yis// bsam pa don yod bgyi ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang / ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzangs kyis//
1638(): de la tshul bzhin du phyag 'tshal te spras pa/ dbang chen 'dra bar byed dang gnyis// de ltar bka' mchid gsung ba ni/ rab tu dgyes pa'i tshul bstan ma su zhig yid la bsam mi
1639(): rdzogs// mi yi bdag po bka' mchid gsung bzhin la// bya yi bdag po'ang rab tu dga' bzhin du// bka' mchi nga lga'i nang du 'bangs dag gis// spyi rdol skyed de smra bar gal rigs/ pa ra/
1640(): dul ba'i tshul ni de ma lags// de ltar 'tshal bzhin rab tu ji ltar 'jug/ rgyal po chen po de bas bdag mi smra// bzod par bzod pa'i rigs na bzod par gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang
1641(): rgyal po de rab tu dga' zhing bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu phyung nas/ bzhin bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyi yon tan gtam snyan mi rnams zer ba'i rigs// ngang pa'i bdag po dang yang grogs
1642(): por 'thabs pa'i rigs// dul ba dang ni tshul la mkhas pa 'di lta bu// rang gi sems ni ma sbyangs pa la gal yod// de bas bdag cag mdza' ba 'di// ci nas rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
1643(): de bzhin bdag la spobs par gyis// ya rabs phrad par nyams ma gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyal po de rab tu mdza' bar 'dod pa dang / byams par gyur pa shes nas/ de la mgu
1644(): par byed cing 'di skad ces smras so// dang po bshes par gyur pa na'ang // bdag nyid chen po'i tshul 'dzin pas// mdza' bo dam pas bya ba gang // de ni khyod kyis bdag la byas// bkur sti bgyi
1645(): ba'i cho ga 'dis// khyod kyis bdag la gang bstan pa// rgyal po chen po su yi sems// dran zhing dmigs pa mi 'gyur mchis// dgos pa lta zhig ched che ci zhig mchis// rgyal po chen po khyod
1646(): sa brten cista/ khyod ni 'gron la dga' zhing yon tan 'dod// 'di ltar gyur pa nges pa goms pa'i yon// 'bangs la phan phyir rgyal po'i tshul 'dzin pa// drang srong mnyam bzhag dka' thub 'bad
1647(): pa bzhin// khyod kyi yon tan rang gi ngang gis gnas// rang bzhin dul ba khyod lta lags kyang mod// de bas bstod par 'os pa'i yon tan bde// 'byung po nyes pa'i gcong rong mi gtong ngo //
1648(): yon tan skyon gyi chos nyid 'di shes nas// sems yod su zhig mi phan lam ngan 'gro// dpa' bas yul 'khor thob par mi 'gyur la// nor dang rtsol phod thabs kyis de mi thob// yon
1649(): tan med ra nor bkod 'bad mi pham rgyal po yon tan can gyis thob par 'gyur// swa yi rgyal po'i dpal yang yon tan ltos// yon tan yod na rgyud kyang rab tu 'phel/ grags pa rnams
1650(): kyang yon tan nyid las 'gro/ bdag nyid che ba'i mthu bang yon tan gnas// zla ba'i 'od pas gsal ba'i yon tan ni// dgra bo mi bzang grags pas sdang ba dang / khon snying yod cing phrag dog
1651(): che ba yang / yid ni rab tu dang zhing mgu byed do// rgyal po de ltar dul la sogs pa yi// yon tan bzang zhing che ba ma nyams par// rgyal phran dregs pa mthu yis btul nas ni// sa 'di
1652(): skyongs la 'bangs kyang bsab tu gsol// 'bangs la phan gdags rgyal po'i don gyi mchog/ rgyal po chos la dga' bar gyur na ni// tshe rabs gnyis kar bde ba'i lam
1653(): 'di yin// rgyal po spyod pa bzhin du 'bangs kyang spyod// de bas chos bzhin sa la gnas par spobs// sum cu rtsa gsum lha yang khyod la bsrung / khyod kyi drung na bde bar gnas gyur
1654(): kyang // bdag gi grogs mang sdug bsngal 'bod po bzhin// de nas rgyal po de 'khor dang bcas pa de'i tshig de la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas bkur sti dang tshig snyan pa smras te/ ngang ba'i
1655(): gtso bo de gnyis slar bkye'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi nam mkha'i dkyil ral gri dri ma med pa ltar sngo zhing dngas la mdzes pa la 'phur nas bzhin bzangs phyi bzhin du 'brang ba ni
1656(): gzugs brnyan drung na 'dug pa 'dra bar byas te/ ngang pa'i tshogs mang po de'i drung du 'ongs pa dang / mthong ma thag tu rab tu dga' ba dang ldan par byas so// dus dus dag tu ngang pa'i rgyal po de/
1657(): gzhan la snying brtse'i phyir ni rgyal po de'i// ched du song nas chos kyang 'chang par byed// rgyal po des kyang mchod pa gus par byas// de lta bas na dam pa rnams dud 'gror lhung ba'i spyod pa la'ang
1658(): skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyis rjes su mthun par bya ba tsam yang mi nus na bde 'gro na gnas pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos de ltar tshig snyan pa ni gnyis ka la phan par
1659(): 'byung ba yin no zhes tshig snyan par smra ba'i yon tan bsngags pa la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan na don bsgrub pa dka' ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes dge ba'i bshes gcen
1660(): gyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i sngon gyi rigs mthun par bstan par bya ba la'ang brjod par bya ste/ gnas brtan 'di de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
1661(): dang lhan cig tu 'grogs 'grogs pa ste/ yun ring por byams pa dang rab tu gus pa 'ba' zhig byed byed pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// ngang par skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu gnyis pa'o//
1662(): bam po brgyad pa// skyes bu dam pa rnams ni phan gdags pa drin du gzo ba dang / bzod pa la goms pas rim gro ma byas kyang sngon phan 'dogs 'dogs pa la snying brtse ba lhod par mi 'gyur ro//
1663(): de yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ kun tu rgyu byang chub ces bya bar gyur to zhes grag go/ de khyim na gnas bzhin du 'jig rten pas bsngags pa'i rig
1664(): ba'i gnas rnams kyi go rims ni rgya cher shes/ rmu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs pa ni mkhas par byas/ rab tu byung nas kyang 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par brtson pas/ chos kyi gtsug lag rnams la lhag
1665(): par yang blo zhan par ma gyur te/ de dag la slob dpon gyi go 'bang thob par gyur to// de bsod nams dang ldan zhing yon tan rgya che ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i spyod tshul la mkhas pa dang
1666(): nan tan che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ gang dang gang du song ba de dang der mkhas pa rnams dang mkhas pa la dga' ba rnams dang / rgyal po rnams dang / rgyal po'i blon po
1667(): rnams dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can rnams dang rab tu byung ba rnams kyis bkur sti bya zhing dran par bya bar gyur to// bsod nams gzhi las
1668(): 'bar ba'i yon tan rnams// nan tan sgrub pa'i byin gyis dga' bar 'gyur// dgra yang rang gi grags pa bsrung ba'i phyir// lhag par bkur sti byed pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas bdag nyid
1669(): chen po de 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i phyir grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor du rgyu zhing song song ba las rgyal po zhig
1670(): gi yul gyi 'dab tu phyin par gyur to// de'i yon tan gyi mthu rgya chen po de rgyal po des thos shing de rgyang ring po nas 'ongs par shes nas yid rab tu dga' ste/ rang gi skyed mo'i tshal nyams
1671(): dga' ba'i sa phyogs shig tu de'i gnas byed du bcug/ bsu ba la sogs pa bkur sti cher byas te/ de rang gi yul du bzhag nas slob dpon la slob mas bya ba bzhin du rim gro dang bkur sti tshul
1672(): bzhin du byas te mchod cing bkur to// longs spyod yon tan phun sum tshogs// khyim du re ba'i mgron 'ongs na// yon tan can la dga' ba rnams// rab tu dga' zhing spro bar 'gyur// byang chub
1673(): sems dpas kyang de la chos kyi gtam yid du 'ong zhing rnar snyan pa rnams kyis phan par 'gyur ba'i lam bstan pas/ nyi ma re re zhing phan 'dogs par gyur to// gus pa med pa'ang chos la dga' ba
1674(): rnams gzhan la snying brtse phan pa'i tshig smran// phan par 'dod cing yon tan dga' ba yi// skye bo snod gtsang 'dra la smos ci dgos// de nas rgyal po de'i blon po de rnams dang / mkhas
1675(): ba'i thabs thob pa rnams 'khor tshogs pa'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro cher byas pa dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pa la phrag dog gi sems skyes nas mi bzod par gyur to// rang
1676(): gi yon tan grags pa khyad par can// 'gro ba mgu bar nus pa'i mthu can la// yon tan bcos mas bkur sti thob pa rnams// phrag dog me ni gor ma chag par 'bar// de la gtsug lag gtam gyis
1677(): mngon sum du zil gyis mnan ma nus shing / rgyal po chos la brten pa'ang ma bzod nas/ thabs de dang de dag gis rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la mi dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so//
1678(): lha kun tu rgyu byang chub la thugs ches par mdzad par mi rigs so// gdon mi 'tshal bar 'di ni lha yon tan la dgyes pa dang chos la phyogs par 'tshal nas brlag par bgyi ba'i slad du g.yo dang bcas pa'i
1679(): tshig 'jam po smra zhing spyod pa'i nyams drod 'dzin pa lags te/ nyi 'og gi rgyal po 'ga' zhig gis bya ma rta btang bar gor ma bkum mo// de ltar ci'i mngon zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi bdag nyid
1680(): can du bgyis nas lha'i zhal snga nas gcig kho nar thugs rje che ba dang / ngo tsha mkhyen cing 'jas des can du bslabs te/ srid dang 'dod pa dang mi mthun pa/ rgyal rigs kyi
1681(): chos ma yin pa/ snyan dngags dang mi mthun pa chos la bskul ma 'debs shing snying rje dang ldan par bgyi ba don du sgrub cing ched cher bgyis nas thabs kyis bag 'bebs so// nyi 'og gi rgyal/
1682(): po'i pho nya dag dang yang bshes shing 'grul la/ 'di nyid kyang rgyal po'i gtsug lag gi rgyus la mi mkhas pa'ang ma lags te/ de bas na bdag cag ni 'di la glo ba mi ches so// de nas rgyal po
1683(): de la dbyen gyi thabs yang dang yang du lan du mar phan par 'dod pa bzhin du mi mang pos smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la yid mi ches par gyur te/ byams pa dang bkur sti chung zhing sems/
1684(): sngon dang mi 'dra bar gyur to// 'brug sgra drag po'i ser ba 'dra ba yis// dbyen gyi ser ba rdo rje bab na ni// mi tsam tshod kyi mdza' ba brtan pa dag/ nyams shing zhig par mi 'gyur su zhig yod//
1685(): de nas rgyal po de byang chub sems dpa' de la bag mi 'bebs shing / dga' dga' ltar mi byed la/ bkur sti chung bar gyur nas sngon bzhin du rim gro mi byed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
1686(): yang sems gtsang bas rgyal po rnams ni bya ba mang pos brel to snyam nas/ de ltar gyur pa yid la'ang mi byed na/ de'i 'khor na 'khod pa rnams gus pa dang rim gro byed pa la g.yel bar gyur pa mthong
1687(): ba dang / rgyal po'i thugs mi dgyes par gyur pa shes nas kun du rgyu'i yo byad dbyig pa gsum dang / ril ba spyi blugs la sogs pa khyer te 'gro bar ches so// de ltar gyur pa rgyal po des
1688(): thos nas/ da dung kho na byung ba nyid du'ang ma gyur pas des shing dul ba'i tshul bstan te/ de'i drung du song nas rtab rtab por gyur pa 'dra bar byas te/ slar bzlog par 'dod pa bzhin du smras
1689(): pa ci phyir 'di ltar phral la bdag bor te// khyod ni 'gro bar chas pa bzhin du sems// nongs par dogs pa 'ga' zhig byung ba'i gzhi// bdag gi nongs pa khyod kyi mthong ngam ci// de nas byeng
1690(): chub sems dpas de la smras pa/ bdag ni 'phral la 'di ltar mi mchi bzhin// bkur sti chung ba tsam gyis khros ma lags// khyod ni chos kyi snod du ma gyur cing // g.yo dang bcas pas bdag ni
1691(): 'di ras mchi// de nas rgyal po de'i khyi gnang chen po zhig khros shing zugs te so gtsigs nas der zar 'ongs pa bstan nas yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po mi ma lags pa 'dis che bzhi bgyis pa
1692(): gzigs su gsol// khyi 'di sngon ni khyod kyi rjes 'brang zhing // bdag la rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa las// mdzad stangs gsang ba shes par ma gyur nas// zugs shing za bas
1693(): khyod kyi dgongs pa bstan// bdag la ma gus rtsub pa cung zad cig/ khyod las nges par 'di yis thos lags grang // de bas 'dis kyang rjes su 'brangs par gyur// 'khor rnams
1694(): stong pa khyod ring gyes par bgyid// de nas rgyal po de rtags la bab pa dang ngo tsha bas mgo smang de 'di'i blo rno ba des/ sems dus nas mi dga' bar gyur te ni g.yo bya ba'i
1695(): dus la ma bab po snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ khyod la glengs nas bka' mching 'di lta bu// bdag cag tshogs pa'i nang du bgyis pa med// dogs pa'i
1696(): dbang gis bdag gis yal bar bor// de bas bzod par mdzod la ma bzhud bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa bdag ni bkur sti chung ba'i phyir mi bzod de mchi ba ma lags
1697(): kyi rgyal po chen po da ni mchis pa'i dus ma lags pa'i slad du ma mchis so// khyod kyis gzigs su gsol/ bkur sti cung zad bri bar gyur pa'i tshe// bdag rang langs te song bar ma gyur
1698(): na dgongs bzhin 'dug pa ngan zhing byis pa'i chos// ma ste sa na ni slad kyis bskrad par 'gyur// de bas da ni mchi ba'i dus la bab// mi dga' bzhin du mchis su ga la rung // lan cig
1699(): tsam zhig smra bab gyur pa yis// sngon chad phan btags pa dang ga la mnyam// byams pa'i rlan med brten du mi rung ste// khron pa skam po chu 'dod mi brtan bzhin// de la rab tu
1700(): bsgrims te don bsgrubs kyang // de don chung zhig rnyogs pa can du 'gyur// bde ba 'dod cing nyon mongs mi 'dod pas// mtsho chen ston ka'i chu gtsang 'dra bar ni// rab tu dang ba nyid
1701(): la brten pa'i rigs// tshul 'di 'jig rten dag na gsal bar grags// gus par byed kyang gzhan du phyogs pa dang // gzhan du phyogs kyang zhum pas de la ste// sngon chad pan btags/
1702(): drin du mi gzo ba// mi yi gzugs te ci lags gtol ma mchis// ma brten pa dang rab tu brten drags dang // spang ba drags na byams pa med par 'gyur// gnas pa'i skyon las
1703(): mdza' ba'i mjug 'di ni// srung bar 'tshal gyis bdag ni re shig mchi// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod gal te mi 'gror mi rung yang dag par sems na/ da rung slar yang 'dir byon cing bdag spyan ras
1704(): kyis btsa' ba'i rigs so// ha cang ma brten pa las kyang 'khon 'byung bar bgyi ba mi rigs so// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten na gnas pa 'di dag ni bar chad mngal
1705(): gnod pa dang dgra mang pos gdon mi 'tshal bar mchi'o zhes mchid kyis 'tshal du mi rung ngo // gal te mchis pa'i skabs dang ldan na khyod kyi zhal ta'o zhes bdag nyid chen po des rgyal po de tshig 'jam pos
1706(): dga' bar byas nas/ rgyal po des gnang zhing bkur sti byas nas de'i yul nas byung ste song ngo // de khyim pa brten pa des sems mi bde bar gyur nas/ dgon pa'i gnas gcig gcig tu gnas /
1707(): blo bsam gtan la brtson zhing de na gnas pa las/ ring po ma lon par bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to// rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba'i ro myong ba de rgyal po de la snying brtse ba'i
1708(): dran pa byung bar gyur pa ni/ rgyal po de tsam ji lta ba zhig tu 'dug snyam pa dang / de nas des 'di ltar blon po de dag gis lta ba ngan pa gang la chags pa de dag la bltar bcug
1709(): bar mthong ngo // de la blon pa la las ni rgyu brtag me bzod pa'i dpe rnams kyis rgyu med pa'i sra ba sadrangs so// pad+ma'i sdong bu mo maze ba'i snying po dang // kha dog dbyibs dang 'jam la sogs
1710(): pa'i rgyu ni gang / bya yi 'dab ma sna tshogs ri mo 'dri ba su// 'gro ba 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin nges// kha cig ni dbang phyug gis rang gi blos sbyar ba rgyu yin par ston te/ 'di dag
1711(): thams cad rgyu med 'byung bar mi rigs te// 'di la kun gyi bdag po mtha' yas gcig gcig yod// sna tshogs 'di dag rang dgar byed pa nges par yod// 'jig rten byas nas phyis kyang
1712(): mnyam du med par byed// yang la la ni bde ba dang mi bde ba 'di dag thams cad sngon gyi las kyis byas kyi 'bad pa'i mthus byas pa ni ma yin no// zhes de la de ltar 'dzin du bcug go//
1713(): dngos po mtha' yas so sor gnas pa mang po rnams// gcig pus dus gcig tu ni ji ltar bya bar nus// bde ba byed la mkhas pa'ang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de bas 'di dag
1714(): thams cad sngon gyi las las gyur// gzhan dag ni chad par lta ba'i gtam gyis de 'dod pa'i longs spyod byed du gzhug pa'i phyir smras pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog yon tan ldan pa'i shing //
1715(): las kyis byas pa ma yin 'on kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// chud gzan rnams kyang sngar ni de bzhin skyes mi 'gyur// 'jig rten de dang 'dra bar bde la gzhol bar mdzod// kha cig ni de la rgyal rigs
1716(): kyi gtsug lag las 'byung ba g.yo dang dgra thabs dang 'brel ba'i snying rje med cing skyon dang bcas pa chos dang 'gal ba la 'di ni rgyal po'i chos lags so zhes gsol to// brten pa'i mi rnams la ni
1717(): grib ma'i ljon shing bzhin// de dag ji srid dgos pa'i dus la ma bab pa// de srid byas pa gzo bas rang gi grags pa bsrung // dgos pa byung na mchod sbyin phyugs bzhin de dag spyad// de ltar
1718(): blon po de dag gis rgyal po de lta ba ngan pa'i lam de dang de dag tu drangs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po de skye bo sdig pa can rnams dang brten cing blo gzhan gyi dring la 'jog pas lta ba
1719(): ngan pa'i g.yang sar lhung du nye bar rtogs nas de la snying brtse bar gyur te/ de las bzlog pa'i thabs bsams pa/ yon tan goms pas dge ba rnams// legs par byas pa sems la gnas/
1720(): pad+ma'i 'dab las chu ba bzhin// nyes par byas pa mi chags so// de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ da ni de'i dus la bab po snyam nas rang gi dka' thub kyi nags su spre'u chen po cig
1721(): mngon par sprul nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus de'i pags pa bshus te/ gzhan mi snang bar byas nas spre'u'i lpags pa chen po sprul pa de gyon te/ rgyal po de'i pho brang gi sgor phyin pa dang / chab
1722(): stobs kyang sbran nas rgyal po'i 'khor tshogs pas go rims bzhin du mi 'khrug par 'khod pa/ mtha' ni mtshon cha thogs pa rnams kyis bskor// blon po dang bram ze dang po
1723(): dang nang mi'i gtso bo rnams kyis ni gang / skye bo rnams kyi chas ni dul zhing brtan la rgya che/ chab sga chen po ni chab sgo ba ral gri dang dbyig pa thogs pa rnams kyis bsrungs/ mi'i bdag po ni
1724(): seng ge'i khri la 'dug par 'ongs so// rgyal po des kyang bsu ba la sogs pa dang / mgron 'ongs pa'i bkur sti bya ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / bstan gding ba byas nas/ spre'u'i
1725(): lpags pa gyon pa ngo mtshar cher bzung nas dris pa/ 'phags pa la spre'u'i lpags pa 'di phul bas bdag nyid phan pa chen po btags pa su zhig lags/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
1726(): rgyal po chen po 'di ni bdag nyid kyis rnyed kyi gzhan sus kyang ma stsal to// sa gzhi rang bzhin gyis 'khrung ba la/ rtsa ku sha dang rtsa tsam bting ba la mchis shing nyal bas gdungs na chos kyi
1727(): cho ga bde zag tu bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs la/ spre'u chen po 'di'ang dka' thub kyi nags tshal na mchis pa bdag gis mthong nas/ de la bdag gis bsams pa/ bdag gi chos spyod pa'i yo byad spre'u
1728(): 'di'i lpags pa rnyed do snyam mo// 'di la 'dug gam nyal na chos kyang bsgrub nus la/ rgyal po'i mal stan bzang po la ma chags par yang rang gi chos kyi cho ga bsgrub tu rung ngo snyam nas bdag gis
1729(): de'i lpags pa 'di bcangs te/ de yang ma mchis par bgyis so// de skad zer ba thos nas rgyal po de dul zhing nges pa'i tshul bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la ci yang slar ma smras so// de ngo tsha bar
1730(): gyur nas cung zhig mgo smad de 'dug go// de nas blon po de dag sngon yang sems dpa' chen po de la sems mi bzod cing smra ba'i skabs rnyed pas 'dzum dmul te mdangs phyung nas rgyal po la bltas nas byang chub
1731(): sems dpa' bstan te smras pa/ kye ma'o khyod kyi chos la rjes su dga' ba'i blo la ltos/ e ma'o rtsol phod pa'i mthu che zhing brtan kyang dka' thub kyi gnas na 'dug bzhin du gcig pus dka' thub spyod
1732(): bas lus nyams chung yang spre'u chen po 'di lta bu song ba ngo mtshar che'o// dka' thub grub par gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpas ma khros par smras pa/ khyed rang gi lta ba bzang po la mi lta bar/
1733(): 'di ltar bdag smad par mi rigs so 'dis ni mkhas pa'i grags pa phyin par mi 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa dag dgongs su gsol/ bdag gi lha la gnod pa'i tshig/ gang gis gzhan la smod byed pa/
1734(): de ni bdag la gnod pa yis// gzhan gyi mi snyan sgrogs par byed// de ltar bdag nyid chen po des// blon po de dag la spyir smras te/ so sor smra bar 'dod nas blon pa rgyu med par smras
1735(): pa 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin khyod zer na// gal te de ltar bden na bdag la ci phyir smad// spre'u de ngo bo nyid kyis shi bar gyur pa la// bdag la ci phyir sdig 'gyur bsad du mi
1736(): bzang dam// de ste de bsang bdag la sdig tu 'gyur na ni// 'o na 'di ni rgyu las gyur par 'grub par 'gyur/ de bas rgyu med smra ba 'di ni dor ba'i rigs// 'di ni
1737(): deskad smra ba khyod la mi rigs 'gyur// gal te pad+ma'i sdong bu skyes la sogs 'dra na// 'on rtag tu rgyu med par yang ci ma 'byung // chu la sogs dang sa bon dag gis de byas nges//
1738(): de dag yod na sgro la med na mi skye'o// gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa dag re shig legs par rtogs shig/ gtan tshigs bcas par tu med zer ba ni// bdag nyid kyis ni las ches sun byung ngo //
1739(): ste gtan tshigs bstan par mi 'dod na// khas 'che tsam gyis 'di la ci zhig phan/ gang zhig kha cig tu ni rgyu rkyen ma mthong bas// de nyid kyi ni thams cad rgyu med smra na ni// de dag rgyu dang bcas
1740(): par mngon du mthong bzhin du// de la sdang bas 'gal ba'i tshig ngan smras par 'gyur// gal te gang na'ang rgyu ni yod par ma mthong na// de ni med ces nges par ci ltar smra bar 'gyur// nyi ma
