2931(): par gyur to// des na 'di dag nub pa med pa'i brtson 'grus la nye bar sbyar bar bya'o snyam nas bdag nyid kyi brtsod 'grus chen po brtan par bya ba'i phyir bdag bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
2932(): byang chub pa thob kyi bar du lus kyi pags pa dang rgyus pa dang rus pa'ang bskams sha dang khrag thams cad kyang yongs su zhig cing bskams kyang brtson 'grus 'di nyid mi gtong ngo snyam du nges par byas
2933(): nas de nas de ni byang chub sems dpa' dpag med dang // nyan thos tshogs dang skye bo 'dus pa dpag med tshogs// lha klu dri za lta pir pi 'am ci rnams kyis// mchod cing bstod pa'i rgyal/
2934(): ba dor yod gshegs pa'i drung // gus pas song ste bdag gi brtsod 'grus ma smad pa// rab tu brtan pas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par byed// de'i tshe dge slong grags pa'i 'od de bzhin
2935(): gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar 'dus pa de dag thams cad la sdang bar byas nas/ bdag gi lus ras bcos bus dkris te til bar gyis byugs shing bdag nyid kyi lus la me sbar ngas spyan sngar langs
2936(): te mar me byas so// der lus la 'bar ba'i phung pos bsregs bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dor yod gshegs pa de la tshigs su bcad pas mngor par bstod pa/ rnam 'drer rang byung thug
2937(): dag batha' yas mchog/ skyor dang rgyags dang nyes pa spangs pa lags// 'gro ba lam ngar zhugs la thugs rje bskyed// kun tu gzigs pa gnas mchog bstad du gsol// skye
2938(): bo blo nya mas sdug bsngal rab tu sdug/ mig nyams gnas med yongs su 'khyams pa la// snying rje chen po dpag med bskyed ras su// 'gro ba thar par bgyi slad spyod pa spyad/ bdag
2939(): ni bdag la dga' bar mi bgyid do// 'gro ba la mgol mchi ba 'di la bltas// 'dod chags zhe sdang 'bar bas 'gro ba gdungs// de dag bdag gi lam chus zhi bar bgyid//
2940(): drang srong chen po stobs bcu khyed kyi bsrab// bdag gi dngos la ltos med spyod pa spyad// 'gro ba 'di dag 'bang bas bsreg pad// bdud rtsi'i char gyis bsal/
2941(): bar gyur par bgyi// sems cad don du bdag gis lus bsregs pas// sems cad kun gyi lus la dang med shog/ sems cad don du bdag gi 'bad pa 'dis// sems can sdug
2942(): bsngal gnod pa med gyur cig/ de ltar bdag nyid chen po des rang gi lus kun tu 'bar ba'i mes bsregs kyang brtsor 'grus brtan pa'i mthus sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba zil gyis bdar te de bzhin
2943(): gshegs pa la bstod pa'i dbyangs de lta bus bstod par gyur to// dge sbyong chen pos rang gi lus// sdong bu'i snying po bzhin du byas// me lce'i reg pas reg pa de// bde ba'i mchog
2944(): dang mtshungs gyur te// dper na 'dod cher skye bo dag/ lha po'i reg pas rig pa bzhin// lus kyi bud shing dbang por bcas// 'bru mar 'bar bas sreg byed pa// de bas rab tu 'bar
2945(): ba'i stobs// ye shes me lce rab gsal bas// nyon mongs bud shing sreg byed cing // sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems pa snyam// de ltar slad du byung ba'i spyod pa brtan pa de la 'dus par
2946(): gyur pa'i lha dang mi thams cad kyis mchod cing ched du brjod pa du mas ched du brjod te 'di ltar smras pa nges so// e maho rlabs che e maho brtson 'grus che// khyod kyi byang chub mchog gi spyod
2947(): pa brtad// khyod kyi sdug sngal snang ba med par byas// khyod de 'jig rter kur gyi gnyen gcig 'gyur// de ltar 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod// me
2948(): tog sil ma'i tshogs rnams dang // lha yi rgyan dang gos kyi tshogs// dge sbyong ga la ba der 'thor// de yi spyod pa rmad byung bas// rab tu brlad pa'i skye bo rnams// gdung ba'i mchim
2949(): rab g.yos pa// bkod ma'i chu bo g.yos pa bzhin// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs stong gis kyang // ched du bsgrags pa'i dro sgra bzhin// phyogs rnams kun tu khyab byed pa// gsal zhing rab
2950(): tu rgyas par gyur// dge sbyong de yi lhag pa'i bsams pa yis// bskul ba'i stobs kyis rab tu sbar gyur pa// 'bar ba'i phung po de yi 'od 'bar bas// nyin por byed pa'i 'od stong
2951(): 'bar ba dag/ zil gyis bdan nas phyogs rnams kun tu gsal// de yis lhag bsam gsal bar byas pa 'dra// de yi mthus bskyod rab tu g.yo ba'i rlung gi mthu yis bskyod pa ltar//
2952(): zhing khams kun tu sa cher ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa rab tu g.yos// rmad du byung ba'i brtson 'grus can khyod rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur ro zhes// 'dzub pa'i 'od bkye lung bstar mdzad pas
2953(): lha mi'i tshogs rnams tshim par byas// de lta bu'i bdag nyid chen po'i spyod pa rmad du byung ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa de'i don de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dren pa
2954(): de la mchod pa byas pa dang // bde bar gshegs la dngos po phul ba yis// sangs rgyas mchod byas bskal chen brjod du med// subacu drug tu ngad 'gror ma song
2955(): ngo rtag tu lhar song mi yi 'jig rten thob// nga ni gsal bdag dang dbang phyug gyur// rtag tu 'gro dang bathud par 'khor lo bskor// lha dang mi rnams kun gyis dmachod do// zhes bya ba
2956(): 'di gsungs so// de lta bas na skye bu dab pa rnams de sems can gyi don du bla de med pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir ba dka' ba'i brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa rtsom par byed do zhes brtson 'grus nyid
2957(): bsngags pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'di'i dpya dka' ba dpag tu med pa dag gis bsgrubs pa yid do zhes ripo 'gro ba skyed de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// dge slong grags pa'i 'od kyi
2958(): skyes pa'i ras te ba'i bcu pa'o// / sdom la/ zla ba lcags kyi khyim du skyes// bde shing rta yid dam brtan// ded dpon gser bdog kun+da dang // rigs ngan grags/
2959(): po 'od dang bcu/ skyes bu dab pa rnams de nyid phongs pa thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i zhi ba'i bsam gtad tshol ba la brtsod par byed do// de yang 'di skad zos te/ sdor/
2960(): byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i sdor rol du de bzhidi gshegs pa 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur
2961(): par khyim bdag dben pa 'dod pa zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// de chung ngu ras skye ba'i las yongs su rdzogs par byas shing gzhad du sbyir pa spyad pa las byung ba'i mthus longs spyod chen po dang ldan
2962(): pa rang bzhin gyi tshul khribs kyi dab lo yongs su bsrungs pa/ chos kyi dge legs kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pas legs par gsungs pa yongs su tshol ba la brtsod pa/ snying rje'i dbang gis
2963(): sems can rnams la brtse bar byed pa zhig byung ngo // de ri je bas je mtho'i rigs las skyes// dbang po pa nyabs gtsang zhing mdzes la gsal// stod ka'i dpal gyis mdzes pa'i zla 'od
2964(): bzhin// de ri skye bo kun la mngon par brtse// skye bo kun kyang de la brtse ba yis// de yi longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po bzhin// zad pa med cing skye bo phongs pa dag/ thun mong lta bur spyod pa
2965(): dpal dang ldan// 'phongs pa rnams la byams pas zad med cing // dpal dang ldan par spyod pas thun mong bzhin// de de ltar rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i ngang gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
2966(): yar gyi ngo bzhin rnam par dkar ba'i yon tan rab tu 'phro ba las byung ba'i dbang gis skye bo'i tshogs phal po ches bkur ba rgyal po lta bur gyur to// de nyon mongs pa thams cad las dben pa'i
2967(): bsam gtan dang legs par gsungs pa tshol bar byed pa la brtson pa las/ dus gzhan zhig gi tshe khyim bdag de rang gi khang pa na gnas pa las nam mkha' las sgra thos pa/ 'di nas shar
2968(): phyogs na de ba'i gshegs pa 'od zer dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba sems cad thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa/ ngan song gi sgo 'gegs shing mtho ris kyi lam dkar bstod pa/
2969(): sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang dam pa la rab tu 'jog par mdzad pa/ 'khor nyan thos dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag du ba dang bcas pa 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra thos pa thag tu khyim
2970(): bdag de yid dga' ba dang bde ba khyad par car thob par gyur ras bra gos phyogs gcig tu gzar te pus po g.yas pa'i lhung sa la btsugs nas/ bar snang la phyogs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras
2971(): pa de ring bar snang 'di dag la// tshig skur gtong ba su zhig lags// 'dren pa de ni gang na bzhugs// de ni de khyod kyis bdag la gsungs// zhes brjod cing lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ba
2972(): bskyed par bar sdang la sgra grag pa// shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs can// grong khyer lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dga'// zhes byar rkang gnyis gtso bo bzhugs// the tshom thams cad gcod par/
2973(): mdzad/ des yang thal mo sbyar nas smras pa// dpag tshad bye ba ji snyed yod// dpag tshad ji snyed dag tu 'gro// dpag tshad ji snyed song bas su// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar
2974(): 'gyur/ zhes gsol ba btab pa de// yang bar snang de nyid las rjes su bstad pa'i snga zos pa/ dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang // brgyang cu 'das pa'i pha rol ra// der rdzogs sang/
2975(): rgyas bzhugs pas// der song the tshom yongs su zhus// zhes bya ba'i sgra zos nas des rang gi 'khor gyi gtso bo mas la smras pa/ grong gi gtso bo dag bdod pa bzang po byur du byos la brjod/
2976(): pa'i yo byad kyi khyad par dang bcas pa khyer cig dang / 'di nas shar phyogs dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang stong 'das pa na grong khyer lhurang po'i rgyal mtshad zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de ra de bzhin gsheg
2977(): pa'od zer dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so zhes grag gis// de la lta ba dang bsnyed bkur ba bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // de nas de yi 'khor rnams kyis// rab tu dul ba'i tshul bzung ste/
2978(): khyim bdag bdag nyid chen po des// bsgos pa bzhin du bzhon pa'i tshogs// rab tu bshams nas khyib bdag la// gus pa'i yid kyis/ de skad smras// jo bo gang gi dus la bab par
2979(): mkhyen na bzhon pa bzang po dag bshams lags so// de nas khyim bdag dben pa 'dod pa shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bzhor pa bzang po la zhon te de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'gro bar 'dod pa'i
2980(): lhag pa'i bsam pas rang gi grong khyer nas byung ngo // de nas skye bo dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa// gus pa'i rang bzhi na mchi ma g.yo ba rnams// khyim bdag de yi lhag pa'i bsam pa yis/
2981(): drangs pa bzhin du phyi bzhin 'breng bar gyur// zla ba'i rjes su zla 'od rnams// kun tu 'gro bar byed pa bzhin// de yi rjes su skye bo rnams// 'gro ba tshul dang mthun pa snyam// de dag so
2982(): so'i mthu yis ni// rab tu bshams pa'i banod pa'i tshogs// gling chen rta dang shing rtar bcas// sprin gyi phung po 'gro ba bzhin// snying rje'i dpal gyis 'khyud
2983(): gyur pa/ de yi rjes su 'jug pa'i sems// 'dod ldan lang tsor bcas pa yis// dga' bzangs mthong das rjes 'gro bzhin// de ltar skye bo'i tshigs chen po de dang ldan gcig tu de
2984(): bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der dong ba na de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mthu ni 'di lta bur gyur to// gang na dpag tshad bye ba brgya phrag gi/ lam der zhugs nas gzhan du sems
2985(): pa med de ni bza' dang btung ba yid mi byed// 'dod dang khro ba gti mug ring du spangs// skye bo gzhan yang de dang mthun par gyur// sangs rgyas mthus bskul gnas gtsang lnga/
2986(): yi bu mthu ren ldan rnams de yi blo rtogs nas// stobs dang mdangs kyang lhag par bsrung bar byas// de ras grong khyer lhung po'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyi rol gyi skyed mos tshal kun nas
2987(): mdzes pa zhes bya ba ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bskor ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis nye bar brgyan pa// pad+ma dang ut+pal dang ku mud la sogs pa'i me tog gi tshogs thams cad kun tu gtor zhing
2988(): mngon par bkram pa/ spos mchog dang phul du byung ba du ma dag gi ngang ldang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyis 'bar ba'i skyed mos tshal de ltang nge lham me brgyad ring po nas mthong ngo //
2989(): de mthong nas kyang banod pa las babs nas rkang zang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'chag na dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su myong zhing 'gro bar gyur to// de'i lhag bsam ba
2990(): par dag pa'i stobs// mkhyen nas sangs rgyas mthu yis bskyod pa yis// bser bu bsil ba dag kyang byung bar gyur// spos dang rab tu ldang ba char gyi rgyun// dal bus 'bab cing
2991(): phyogs kun gsal bar snang // lam gyi sdug bsngal snang ba med par byas// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byir rlabs kyi mthu bstan par mdzad cing khyim bdag de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed
2992(): pa'i phyir bdud rtsi'i 'od bsil ba dri ba med pa lus dang sems rab tu tshim par byed pa btang nas// de dag gi lus dub pa med par mdzad cing shing ta la gcig tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags te 'cha
2993(): pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas khyim bdag dben pa 'dod pa 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa mdzes shing lta na sdug pa/ dbang
2994(): po zhi zhing thugs ni ba bar snang la 'chag cing bzhugs pa mthong nas/ mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod de tshigs su bcad pas zhu bzhus pa/ e ma ho// ji ltar thos pa de bzhin bathong /
2995(): de bas kyang ni lhag par bzang // 'jig rten dag ra khyod dang ni// ye shes yon tan mtshungs ma mchis// zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa na/ slar de bzhin gshegs pas
2996(): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyed kyis tshig smras pa// legs so bded par gyur pa yin// ji ltar 'dir ni yud ring du// dge ba'i rtsa ba shin
2997(): tu brtad// 'jig rte nga dang mtshungs pa med// nga las lhag gyur ga la yod// khyim bdag cung zad yid la ni// gang dag zhu bar 'dod pa zhus// des pa khyod kyi 'dod pa gang /
2998(): nga yis sems ni rangs par bya// nga la cung zad gang 'dri ba// de ring the tshom med par bya// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // khyim bdag dber pa 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i
2999(): khyad par ci 'byor pa dag gis mchod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bsam gtan gyi zhu ba zhus pa/ ci ltar bsam gtan la gnas mchis// bsam gtan bsam
3000(): gtan yon tan dga'// 'di la yid gzhol ci ltar 'gyur// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis de// shes pa de ni rtogs par 'gyur// ldang ba dang /
3001(): shes pa'i rgyu// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs// zhes gsol pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpag tu med pa des tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bka' stsal pa mdzad pa/
3002(): mtshad pa med pa'i bsam gtad ni// ldang ba la yang shin tu nges// shes pa gang gis bsapa gtad de// so so thob das rab tu shes// zhes bya ba'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig po 'ang
3003(): bka' stsal pas// khyim bdag dben pa 'dod pa la sogs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ba snyed kyi sems cad rnams skye ba med pa'i don rab tu thob par gyur to// khyib bdag lhag pa'i bsam
3004(): pa dang ldan zhu ba'i tshig gis rab nus pa// 'dred pa 'od zer dpag tu med pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis yud gcig gis// ma rig pud bsal the tshom dra ba rab tu bcad nas zhi ba'i lam/
3005(): kun tu gsal mdzad 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams bsam gtan nad med mchog la bkod// de lta bu'i do / de ci'i phyir bshad cer/ skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
3006(): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bsam btan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol bar byed pa na/ 'gro ba gzhan gyi dor chen po'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bsam gtan dang rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde
3007(): ngag la'ang brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur par bya dka' ba du ma dag gis bsam gtan yongs su btsal ba yin no// zhes sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
3008(): bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// khyim bdag dben pa 'dod pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni 'khor los bsgyur/
3009(): ba'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug kyang bor nas bsam gtan gyi bde ba don du gnyer bar byed cing bsam gtan thob nas kyang sems can gyi don rjes su spyod pa yin no// de yang 'di skad thos
3010(): te sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing zla ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du bdag cag gi smyon pa 'di byang chub
3011(): kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sbyor ma sdang byed ces bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// de ni rab tu brtan pa'i rang bzhin can// snying rje'i bdag nyid gzhan la
3012(): phan par brtsod// gzhan gyis brtsad du med pa'i rigs las byung // shes rab stobs kyis gzi mdangs lhag par gsal// nyi ma'i 'od kyis skar ma zil mdar bzhin// skye bo rnab
3013(): dang rgyal phrad dregs pa rnams// zil gyis bdan nas rang gi chos lam dag/ rab tu gsal bas ma lus sa skyor ba// dge ba'i lam rnams rab tu snang byed pas// rgyal po'i
3014(): ming ni don dang mthud par gyur// de lta bu'i rgyal po chen po des 'dzam bu'i gling de snyigs ma lnga la bab tu zid kyang / skye bo phongs pa rnams de longs spyod kyis kun tu tshim par byas/ chos kyi la/
3015(): dang rjes su mthun pa'i bka' khrims bzang pos ngan par spyod pa rnams de tsher bcad/ dge sbyong dang bra ze la sogs pa dul ba'i lam la gnas pa rnams la bstod cing bdag nyid kyi lhag
3016(): pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas/ rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa'i sa chedan po 'di kun tu bsnyungs pa las rdzogs ldan gyi dus dang rjes su mthun par gyur to// dbang phyug rnams kyi snying rje
3017(): stobs rab tu gsal ba'i yon tad ri// mkhas pa'i rang du mkhas pa bzhid// grags pa gsal bar gyur pa snyam// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi ro rgyal po po brang 'khor gyi steng/
3018(): mos tshal bzang po shing ljod pa rnam pa sna rogs kyis bskyor ba/ me tog gi rigs du ma skyes pa chu gtsang mas yongs su gang ba'i rdzing bu bsil ba yod pa'i sa phyogs su 'jig rten
3019(): pa'i bde ba yongs su spyad pa'i phyir pho brang ras byung ste song ba dang / phyi rol du mi 'ag bcing bdas pas bcings te nyam zag pa bzhin du 'dug pa bzong nas blong po rnams la smras pa
3020(): kye mi 'dis ci zhig byas blon po rnams kyis gsol ba/ lha mi 'dis ni lha la dongs pa bgyis te/ dgung lo gcig la mi 'di yi 'bru dang lo thog ci 'khrungs par gyur pa de dag
3021(): las drug cha gcig lha'i zhal sngar 'bul ba lags na/ ci ltar grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi mi dang / ri brag na gnas pa rnams kyis 'bul ba bgyid pa ltar mi 'di
3022(): 'bul bar mi bgyid lags so// rgyal pos de dag la smras pa/ mi 'di thong la su la'ang bathus dor dang 'bru dag pa sdud cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha sems cad
3023(): rnams shin tu dad pa'i dbang gis 'bul ba ni nyung ste/ 'di ltar ba bgyis da'ang gdugs gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zos la sogs pa yongs su spyad pa'i longs spyod dang /
3024(): btsur po'i 'khor dang / sras dang / nye bar 'khor ba rnams kyis yongs su spyad pa'i dngos po gang lags pa rnams sems rab tu dang bas 'bul bar mi
3025(): bgyid lags so// rgyal po des de skad du smras pa zos das 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma 'dzam gling skye bo rnabs// bdag gis sbyang bar byed 'dod kyang // rang gi nyes pa'i
3026(): tshogs rnams de// kun tu 'khrugs pa nyid du gyur// e ma'o 'du byed thams cad mi rtag ste// snying po med pa 'dir dri ma rtogs pa// byis pa bas ni 'khrul pa'i dbang du
3027(): gyur/ rmi lam lta bu'i bde la rjes chags pas// skye rgan 'tsho'i rba rlabs rab 'khrugs pas// 'khor ba'i rgyu ratshe thug med gting du bring // legs par spyod pa'i dal
3028(): 'byor gru chen yang // gti mug rgya srid 'dod pa'i lto ba cad// rir ba'i dbugs kyis rab tu drangs byas nas// ngar 'gro'i khar song rab tu rlag par byed// 'dod la zhen cing sred pas rab
3029(): dkris pa// rab pa rnams kyi spong ba pa yin no// des dbadag ri rdul srid rab spangs te// myur ba'i dug 'dra 'dod pa yongs spangs nas// bsapa gtad ting 'dzid bde ba bsgru
3030(): pa'i phyir// rab tu byung das dgas khrod gnas par bya// bdag nyid chen po des de ltar blol nges par byas nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug mchil ba'i thal ba bzhin
3031(): du yongs su spangs te/ rang gi bu lbu ban+d+ha yod pa la 'dzam bu'i gling cha lnga brgyar bgos nas byid te bla na med pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bdag gi btsun mo'i 'khor dang
3032(): skye bo'i tshogs bya ngan gyi mchims gdong khebs par gyur pa rnams tshig spyad pas yongs su bzlog nas bdag nyid rab tu byung bar gyur to// de yang dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i khyad
3033(): par ni 'di lta bu yin te/ 'dzam gling dpal gyis rab tu 'byor pa'i mchog gyur lha dbang dpal la'ang 'grar du rung ba dang // nor dbyig ring ched rta dang shing rta ba lang mchog dang rin chen
3034(): mchog rab tu bkra ba rnams// 'jam pa'i gos dang lha mo lte bur rab tu mdzes pa mdzes pa'i rid ched do shal sil sil bcas// dga' ba'i khyad par ldan pa de dag thos par gyur
3035(): na'ang sred par ldar rnams rab tu 'ching bar 'gyur// dam pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thob par gyur kyang phyag dar khrod dang mi gtsang phung po ltar// 'dod par byed cing sgyu
3036(): ma'i gzugs cad slu bar byed pa nyid du shes shing nges par 'byung ba mtshar// de nas bdag nyid chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling las lho phyogs kyi cha nor bu len pa'i sgo dang nye ba/ ring po
3037(): che at+pa rIl brdal ba lta bu'i rgya mtsho rlung bser bus bskyod pa'i rlabs kun tu 'byung ba'i 'grab cung zad mngon par mazo ba'i ri'i ngos shing gi rigs du bskyes pa rnams ni ched du
3038(): bkod pa lta bu/ rtsa 'jam po dag gis sa'i phyogs kun tu khebs pa/ pad+ma dang / ku mud dang ut+pal la sogs pa'i me tog gi tshogs ni be tog phreng rgyud
3039(): mkhan mkhas pas bkod pa bzhin/ nags tshal na gnas pa'i bya'i tshigs sgra snyad pa 'byin pa dag gis gang ba/ dka' thub can rnams kyi gnas su rung ba zhig tu gnas par gyur to/
3040(): de ni bya ba du mas rna ma gtses pa'i// dug dang mtshungs pa'i rgyal srid de spangs nas// dka' thub nags tshal zhi ba rab brgyad te// bsam gtad sgrub pa tshul dang mthud pa snyam//
3041(): dka' thub nags tshal mdzes pa de// tshad du bkod de bskyed pa bzhin// gtsang zhing mdzes pa'i sman ljongs la// me tog sil ma bkod pa bzhin// lteng ka mdzes pa'i me
3042(): long dag/ pad+ma'i bzhin gyis rab brgyan pa// sgeg pa'i dbang gis dgod pa 'dra// ku bud rnams 'bar ba bzhin// bung ba myos pa'i sgra 'byin pa// dus kyi rlung gis phye
3043(): ba yi ge sar dag la rtse ba bzhin// rang bzhin 'phro ba'i dri ba sung dag/ rnam par 'phro ba'i ngad ldang ba// tsan dan 'phrog par byed pa'i dri// yid ni 'phrog par byed pa
3044(): bzhin/ sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bung ba rnams// rang gis zlos gar byed pa la// ldum bu gsar pa gzhon nu dag/ blta ba'i phyir ni lhags pa 'dra// 'bras bu'i tshig
3045(): rnams mang po dag/ ched du sbyar ba'i zas mchog bzhid// rlung gis bskyod pa'i yal ga yis// ched du btud te 'bral ba 'dra// mdzes pa'i bya tshogs skad 'byid pa/
3046(): lha yi sil snyan brdungs pa bzhin// dus kyi dbang gis bsgyur ba yis// nags tshal lo 'dab gsar pa dag/ rkyen gyis cung zad kha phye ba// dga' bas seg kyang
3047(): byed pa 'dra// de ltar nags tshal zhi ba yis// dga' bar khyed par gyur pa des// bsam gtad yod tan spel ba'i phyir// rgyal srid spangs par gyur pa snyam//
3048(): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po de u dum ba ra'i shing drung du shing lo'i khang bu dus thams cad du bde bar gyur pa na 'dug cing kho na ma tho ba med pa'i 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang lo ma
3049(): dag za zhing bsam gtan bzhi dang tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi sgom pa las mthar gyis mngon par shes pa'ang thob par gyur to// de ltar rab tu dben la gzhol byas shing // rnam
3050(): rtog g.yeng ba'i dgra las rab byol te// rtse gcig sems kyi bsam gtan sgom byed na// mngon shes lnga ldan ring por mi thogs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
3051(): dka' thub spyod cing gnas pa las// dus gzhan zhig gi tshe ded dpor zla ba la sogs pa tshong pa lnga brgyas rgya mtsho las rin po che'i tshogs du ma dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu khyer te 'ongs
3052(): pra las de'i dbang gis klu rnams kyang 'khros srin po gdug pacad ma rungs pa dag kyang de dag la glags lta bar gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa'i dbang gis rgya mtsho
3053(): 'gram der zhag bdun gyi bar du rlung dmar chen pos kun tu bskyod pa'i chang drag po dang / 'brug gi skad chen po 'jigs 'jigs ltar sgrogs pa glog 'gyu ba mtshon cha 'debs pa lnga/
3054(): bu snying la skrag pa bskyed pa byung ste/ phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i lam yang stong la nyin mtshan gyi bye brag med par gyur nas tshong pa de dag mya ngan gyis non cing / smre sngags du ma 'don
3055(): par gyur te/ kha cig rang gi lha la gsol ba 'debs// gzhan dag gu lang chu lnga tshangs pa dang // lus ngan grags dang ldan pa 'bod par byed// gzhan dag pa ma sdug pa'i
3056(): bu rnams 'bod// kyi hud 'phongs pa'i dbang gyur pas// 'di lta bur di nya ma nyes gyur// sdug pa rnams dang rab tu bral// bdag cag ma rungs gyur gyi sa med// ces bya
3057(): ba la sogs pa'i smre sngags du ma 'don pa byang chub sems dpas mngon par shes pa'i mthus mthong ste/ de dag la snying rje chen po skyes nas tshong pa de dag ga la ba der song ste/ ma
3058(): 'jigs shig ngas khyed rnams kyi lam bstan par bya'o// zhes dbugs phyung nas rang gi lag pa til mar gyis byugs pa'i ras kyis dkris te me sbar nas smon lam 'di skad ces
3059(): btab po// bdag ni gzhan la par phyir mi lo nyi shu rtsa drug tu// rgyal srid rab spangs dbed pa'i gnas su rtse gcig bsam gtar byas// dgod pa'i spyod pas klu dang gnod spyir khrag
3060(): khrig rab tu btul// bden pa de yis tshong pa khyed rnams 'jigs med lam mthong shog/ de skad brjod pa'i mthu yis ni// tshong pa de dag dbugs phyir te// de yi lag pa'i
3061(): spyod me yang // til mar bcas pa'i smod shing bzhin// zhag bdud bar du 'bar gyur pas// rab tu gsal zhing bud pa dag/ sel byed nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhid// 'di ni drang
3062(): srong mchog gi mthu// de nas tshong pa de dag dga' gyur te// drang srong de la gus pas mchod pa byas// de dag 'dzam bu'i gling du bder phyin nas// longs spyod dpal gyi dga' stor
3063(): rgyas par gyur// drang srong de la skyes 'bul ji bzhid du// de dag chos kyi lam la brten par gyur// de lta bas da skyes bu dpa pardabs ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi dpal
3064(): yang spangs te dben pa la brtson par byed do// des na dam pa'i rjes su slob pa rnams ni snying po med pa'i longs spyod la chags par mi bya'o zhes bsam gtan gyi phar yod bsngags pa la 'ang/
3065(): brjod par bya'o// rgyal po skrod ma sdang byed kyi skyes pa'i rabs te bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// skyes bu dab pa rdabs de dud 'gror gyur kyang gzhan dag ci rus kyis
3066(): bsam gtan la myor bar byed dbyung gyu ba ltas nig brtson par byed/ desang 'di gra ngos te/ bcob ldang 'das 'a byung chubs pa sa pa snang ba spyod du
3067(): re shig ci g+sa dgod pa'i gnas rab tung ba pa'i spyad ljongs shing gel bdag gis mdzes par byas pa phyogs rnams dab tu gsal ba'i srang rgyad de ci du byas pa banid/ dgas tshal gyitshig
3068(): tha dad pa'i tshul du bkod pa bzhin/ rtswa man po dang bcas pa'i sa ljongs rnams ring ngal 'am po'uras sdod po zang du brkyang ba lda d+ha/ rnam pa gad m+b+hab la sogs pa'i tog 'tshogs
3069(): pa rnams rab tu skyes pa/ phyogs thams cad na dngul rgya lang dkar zhing gtsang la dri ba med pa'i steng ka dang dru mig gis rab tu brgyan pa/ ri dgas kyi rigs du sad+b+ha ba/ dka' thub can
3070(): rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa ni grod/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dir bo zhig tu gyur to zhes klag go// de ni rngom med pa'i lus// zla ba'i drung bu shar ba bzhin// de yi d+hAd ni nu ba
3071(): yis brtse ba'i bsil zer 'phro ba snyam// dbyig pa ril ba spyi blugs dag/ mi 'dzid gyur krung shing kun dang // ku sha'i stan la legs 'dug pa// 'bras bu'i zas
3072(): za drang srong bzhin// dka' thub ngur smrig sa gyon kyang // rab tu dkar zhing mdzes pa de// mngon par dga' ba'i sems dpa' bzhid// ri bong gzugs kyi tshul 'dzin pa/
3073(): re shig bcos par gyur pa 'dra// de ltar nags tshal dam pa de brgyad par gyur to// de dang nye ba'i shing ljon pa zhig gi drung dbram ze ba ra d+h+wa dza dang rus gcig pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang bas pa
3074(): gtan byed cing gnas par gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe dus ma yin pa'i char gyi rgyud chen po byung bar gyur te/ zhag bdud du shing thog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'ang led pa med par
3075(): gyur te de bsapa gtar byed cing 'dug go// de'i drung du byang chub sems dpa' ri bong 'ongs te rkang pa la gtugs shing lces ljags nas gus par byas so// bram ze des kyang rnam par
3076(): dag pa'i lus sprul pa lta bu de la ya mtshan du 'dzid cing drang srong gi lag pa pad+ma'i mchog lta bu des ri bong de la byugs te byabs pa'i yid kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ri bong tshal
3077(): shing dang dag nas pa legs// chos dang ldan zhing chos dga' bla ma bster// gang gi sred pas tshal shing 'di ru gnas// bdag gis dris pa 'di ni legs par spros//
3078(): dang lhan cig 'dug pa mi 'jigs sam// gzhan yang bkres dang skom pa med dpa ci// rtsa 'jam dag la za bar mi byed dam// khyod ni rgyu mtshan gang gis tshal 'dir gnas//
3079(): skad smras pa dang / ri bong des zhes bskyed de tshig dang don rab tu gsal bar mi'i skad du smras pa/ rags khrod 'di na chos spyod khyod lta zhing // btung ba dang ni de bzhin rtswa mi 'tshal//
3080(): drang srong mchog dang lhan cig dga' bar bgyi// chos ldan mthong nas tshul khrims brtul zhugs spyad// 'jig rten bde ster dga' mgur thob par bgyi/
3081(): bram zes smras pa/ khyod ni gang gi las kyis mi yul du// rgyu mtshan ci yis dud 'gro'i skye gnas song // gang zhig zos nas mgu bar gyur pa dag/ de ni brtags pa'i tshig gis
3082(): ngal smros// ri bong gis smras pa/ sngon gyi srid par chos 'chad nyan pa dag/ yod pa'i gnas su zhugs nas bdag gis ni// chos sgra de dag gtses pa'i las kyi mthus/
3083(): des ni dud 'gro'i 'gro bar bdag song ngo // de ltar skyes bu dam pa ri bong de dang bram ze gnyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas nas bram ze'i drang srong dka
3084(): thub kyi nags tshal de nas 'tsho ba'i phyir grong khyer du 'gro bar chas te/ ri bong de la smras pa/ ring zhig bdag de 'dir 'dug nga ni 'gro// de la khod ni cung zad bzod par mdzod// khyod
3085(): kyang chu gtsang 'thung zhing rtswa zo la// spyod pa dus las 'da' bar yod pa byed// de skad smras nas/ bram ze de 'gro bar chas pa dang // ri bong des gsol ba btab pa bdag
3086(): ni chu dag don du gnyer ma yin// rtswa yang mi 'dod bshad pa'ang mi 'dod kyi// bdag la gzigs shing gzhan du ma bzhud par// bram ze tshal 'di'i nang na bzhugs par mdzod/
3087(): bram zes smras pa/ khyod kyis gnas par gsol mod kyang // bza' ba'i dngos po cung zad med// de bzhin btung ba'ang yod mid na// bram ze tshal 'dir ga la zug
3088(): de skad ces smras pa ri bong des thos nas 'di snyam du bsams so// e pa'o bdag lta bu skal ba chung bar gyur pas drang srong 'di la 'tsho ba'i yo byad cung zad kyang dbul du med do//
3089(): nga bdag gis drang srong 'di ci nas zhag 'ga' tsam bsam gtan sgom zhing 'dug pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang nas btsal bar bya/ bdag gis rnyed pa'i myu gu dang // rtsa ba 'bras bu
3090(): kha bo ni// mgrod la sbyid du mi rung na/ bdag lta gson yang ci zhig rung // yang bsams pa/ bdag gi lus 'di ni bzar rung ba zhig ste/ da bdag gis ci nas snying
3091(): po med pa'i lus 'di la snying po blang ba'i phyir drang srong 'di la 'bul bar bya'o// snyam nas de la gus pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ drang srong bdag gis ji ltar bsrung ba'i zas/
3092(): 'bras dang til la sogs pa'ang yong med cing // de bzhin btung ba mal cha'ang yod med la// bgo bdag kyang yod pa ma yin pas// drang srong la ni bdag nyid 'bul
3093(): bar bgyi// rab tu dgyes pas bdag gi lus sdoms la/ mthong ba'i chos la dga' ba rnyed dka' ba'i// don gyis de ring tshal 'dir bzhugs par mdzod/
3094(): de skad smras pa zos nas/ drang srong de yid la ya mtshad che bar gyur te/ e ma'o 'di ni bded dam brdzun/ re shig brtag par bya'o snyam nas de la smras pa/ nged/
3095(): cag lta bu srog gcod yong mo byed// khyod la 'tshe ba ston pa gal zhig/ khyed rang nyid kyis song la bdag la byid// de des re shig tshal du gnas par bya// ri bong gis smras pa
3096(): bdag gi lus 'di ltos pad po dang du// legs par bsregs te de ring bskam par mdzod// mkhas pa dag dang phrang pa yid dga' bas// shim zag tu bdag ni bde bar 'gyur//
3097(): de nas drang srong des ri bong de la nyams sad pa'i phyir rtsa dang shing dag bsdus nas me bus pa na/ de das me 'bar de de ri bong gis mthong nas// tsha bas gdungs pa'i skye bo 'bab dur 'jug
3098(): pa bzhid// dad dang dga' ba'i sems kyis me 'bar de dang du// ltos pa med par bdag nyid kyis ri zhugs par gyur// de nas bram ze'i drang srong des// mgyogs pa'i shugs kyus
3099(): de bzung ste// ched du brjod pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod// dga' ba'i shugs kyis de la spras// e ba'o dam pa'i spyod pa cad// pangs pa'i lus kyang rab btang nas// dber
3100(): la rab tu dga' ba yis// khyed kyis ngag tu gang smras pa// de bzhin bdag gis bsgrub par bya// de skad ces smras nas/ bram ze'i drang srong de byang chub sems dpa' ri bong de'i
3101(): spyod pa rmang du byung ba de la rjes su yi rung bar gyur te lhag pa'i bsapa pa mthu brtan par gyur nas dgod pa'i gnas de nyid du gnas shing / gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi yod tad dpag
3102(): tu med pa thob par gyur to// de lta bu'i dod de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ri bong de ni nga nyid yid// shes rab chen po sha ri'i bu// de yi tshe drang srong gyur// de yis/
3103(): rtag tu gnas thob po// zhes gsungs so// de lta bsar skyes bu dam pa rnams gzhan dbed pa la gzhug pa'i phyir/ bdag gi lus la'ang ma chags pa'i tshul gyis rtson par byed pa rus
3104(): bzhin du de'i rjes su su zhig slob par mi byed/ ces dbar pa la rjes su mthun pa'i gtam la brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ri bong dber pa la dga' ba'i skyes pa'i rabs te bzhi bcu
3105(): gsum pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni rgyal srid kyi dpal chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis kyang bsam gtan gyi bde ba la sgrib par mi 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyi don
3106(): sgrub pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan par gyur to// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sdod byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po kun tu go byed ces bya ba byung ngo // de chung ngu nas bsod nams kyi mthu'i dpal
3107(): gyis mdzes pa'i skye bo'i mchog rab tu ma spang ba'i spyod pa cad rnams kyis lha bzhin du bkur ba/ gzhan du sbyangs pa'i mthus rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang gtsug lag gi rigs byed du ma
3108(): khong du chud cing chos dang mthun pa'i ngang tshul can du gyur te de'i rang bzhin ni 'di lta bur bdod do// rigs mchog mthon por gyur kyang mngon pa'i nga rgyal med// mkhas/
3109(): pa'i mchog tu gyur kyang rlob pa'i dregs pa med// longs spyod dpal gyis phyug kyang 'byor pa'i sred pa spangs// sgrib pa'i mud la sel byed stor gyi zla ba bzhin// de ni bag yod bya ba
3110(): pa'i rang bzhin las// skye dgu dpas la bdag dang mtshungs spyod pa// nyes pa'i tshogs rnams ched du bskrad pa bzhin// nyi na'i drung nas mud dga'abros pa 'dra// sdug bsnga
3111(): kun gyi gzhir gyur bag med pa// ma rabs rnams la rjes su 'brang ba de// bag dang ldan pas ched du bskrad pa bzhin// rgyal po de ni de yi tshul la mkhas// de ltar rgyal po des
3112(): rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dam pa mchog tu gyur pa thob cing / bye brag tu'ang rgyal po de'i pho brang gi 'khor de nyid du kun tu dga' bar byed pa'i longs spyod du btsun mo dam pa khri phrag brgyad
3113(): byung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang dpal mo gzugs dang ldan pa/ bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor stor gyi zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa ltar gsal zhing mdzes pa/ ut+pal sngon po rgyas pa lta bu'i
3114(): mig cad/ rang bzhin gyis dul ba'i dpal dang ldan pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar 'jam zhing rab tu rgyas pa'i yan lag rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis mngon par brgyad pa/ spyod lam rnam pa
3115(): ba'i yid bzhin du spyod pa can/ lha mo'i tshogs zil gyis gnon par byed pa sha stag tu gyur to// thub pa chags pa bral ba ma gtogs par/ 'dod ldan 'dod pa'i khams darab par
3116(): myos bdag nyid ma sbyangs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi// bde ba cung zad tsam la'ang zhen gyur na// 'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten gyis bkur zhing // rang gi mthu yis rang bzhin
3117(): lhag par yang // 'dod pa'i khams na 'dod yod phul byung ba// lha po'i tshogs kyis lha dbang mchod bzhin du// dga' ba'i bzhin gyis dga' ba rab bskyed cing // tshul
3118(): dang mthun pas tshul bzhin rab bkur ba'i// rnam pa gcig la'ang rnam kur zher gyur na// dam pa rnams de de las zlog pa snyam// de ltar 'jig rten pa thams cad rab tu 'ching
3119(): bar byed pa chags pa dang ma bral ba rnams kyis kun tu bltar yang mi bzod pa'i/ bud med kyi tshegs de dag gi dang du rgyal po kun tu go byed skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug bzhin du ting
3120(): nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i don du 'di snyam du sems par mngon no// kye ma 'jig rten rnams ni bag med 'khrul pa'i mun pa tshang tshing gis/ rnam pa kun tu dkris te zhen pas chags
3121(): pa'i rgya mtshor rab ltung zhing / sred pa'i chu srid tshor ba'i mche ba rab tu dam pos bzung byas te// thar pa'i srog bcas bsam gtad bde ba bcom nas sdug bsngal 'khor bar byas/
3122(): de bas ci ras bdag gis ni// tshor ba'i sdug bsngal rab bcad de// bde ba'i mchog la'ang nid dbed par// rab tu brjed par bya ba'i rigs// bas/
3123(): gtar rab zhi bde ltar pa// goms pa bsal ba'i spyod pe yis// gti mug mud pa sel byed pa// 'di ni dab pa rnabs kyi rgyud// shes rab ched po'i ting 'dzid gyis//
3124(): skad cig chos kyi tshul shes shing // 'jig rten bde ba zil gnon pas// bde ba'i bde ba tshungs med pa'o// sred 'das bsam gtan pa du bzhin// 'dod pa'i 'dab
3125(): gyis bgos par// shes rab zer gyis gsal phye bas// dam pa'i rgyad du mdzes pa swa pa// de ltar bdag nyid chen po des// bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag/
3126(): pas btsun mo'i 'khor de dag la dga' ba'i sems sapa/ 'dod pa'i sems skad cig kyang skyes par ma gyur te/ de bsam gtad gyi mthus nyon mongs pa'i bye brag dang /
3127(): yod tan gyi bye brag ji lta ba bzhir du bakhyed pa'i mdzod shes dang ye shes kyi mthu thob par gyur das bud med kyi tshogs brgyad khri po de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ji lta ba bzhin du
3128(): khong du chud nas/ de dag gi nyon mongs pa bcad pa'i phyir/ chos bstan pa'i tshul 'di lta bus bstan par mdzod do// gang dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis bcings pa//
3129(): rigs dang gzugs dang lang co 'byor pa'i dregs pa rnams// pa rig dbang gis bdag tu lta bar gyur pa'i gzhi// phung byed de nyid gzhom pa'i phyir du rgyal pos bstan/
3130(): bzang mo khyed cag don 'di shes par gyis// 'du byed rnams ni kun tu mi rtag ste// tshe yang glog bzhin 'gyur zhing pi brtan do// 'dod la zhed pas slu bar byed pa ste// lang
3131(): tso'i yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur kyang // rgas pa'i dbang gis mi sdug gyur par byed// phangs pa'i sems kyis rab tu gsos pa'i lus// rgyar gyis brgyad te rab tu
3132(): mdzes byed cing // nor bu'i mchog ltar gos kyis legs dkris kyang // dur khrod gnas su wa dang bya rgod dang // lce spyang tshogs kyi sha rus gtor byas te// mngon
3133(): par mi dga' mi gtsang phung por 'gyur// des na mi rtag tshul 'di rgyud par sgom// gang gis rang gzhan rgyud la gdod byed pa// tshor ba'i rkyen las skyes pa'i zhe sdang me//
3134(): rab 'bar dkar po'i sa bon sreg byed pa// sbrul gdug khros pa lta bu'i rang bzhin can// ring du spangs te snying rje'i rang bzhir chus// bsil bar byas te byams pa rab
3135(): tu skyed// dge ba'i lam la sgrib byed mun pa bzhin// ngan 'gro'o gnas su 'khrid par byed pa yi// gti mug mun pa rab tu bsal bya'i phyir// rton cing 'brel bar 'byung
3136(): bachos kyi don// 'phags pa'i lam dang mthun pa'i snod pa skor// 'jig rten tshul la dam par zhen pa dang // bdag tu blta ba ring du spangs pa ste/
3137(): bdag med rab tu zhi ba'i bsam gtan don// byams dang snying rje'i rgyud gyis rab brgyan te// rtag tu rang gi rgyud la goms par bya// de ltar khyed cag mngon par shes par gyis/
3138(): dge ba'i lam la bag yod nges par byos// zhes bya ba la sogs pa so so'i khams rgyud dang 'tsham pa'i chos bstan te/ bud med kyi tshogs khri phrag brgyad po de dag thams cad bag med
3139(): pa las rab par zlog cing bsam gtan dang tshad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rjes su bkod nas thams cad kyang tshe 'phos pa zag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to// de ltar bdag
3140(): nyid ched po dag/ 'jig rten bde brtsar bcas bcom// 'dod bde'i 'dod la g.yengs pa dag/ bzlog nas chags bral la bkod pa// 'di yi mthu yi khyad par ni// sbrul
3141(): cher dbugs dang mtshungs pa snyam// de ltar rgyal po ched po kun tu go byed rdul srid kyi 'byor pa'i dpal ched po la gnas shing / bud med kyi 'khor brgyad khri dang lhad cig tu gnas
3142(): pa'i 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyad du bsad de/ bsam gtad gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu skyes pas skye bo'i tshogs rnams tshangs par spyod pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'bras bu
3143(): la bzhag nas/ bdag nyid kyi bsam gtar gyi mthu chen po yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// de lta bas na skyes bu dab pa rnams kyi rjes su bslob par 'dod pas de lta bu'i bsam gtad
3144(): bskyed par bya ba dang / bsam gtan dang rjes su 'brel pa'i thabs mkhas pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// rgyal po kun tu go byed kyi skyes pa'i rabs te bcu bzhi pa'o// /
3145(): skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag nyid nyon mongs pa thams cad las dben pa'i bsam gtad sgom pa la brtson par byas na gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing / gzhan gyi don spyod par
3146(): yang 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon rol du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid kyis phyogs su 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya ba byung
3147(): ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa zhig bya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos 'jig par gyur pa'i dus kyi tshe/ sa chen po skyong bar byed pa'i rgyal po glang po zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i yul khams
3148(): su khye'u'i mchog gnyis shig byung ste/ 'dir spras pa/ lhag bsam yongs su sbyangs shing zhi// bsod nams dpal gyis mngon par mtho// khor yug dbus kyi lhung po bani/
3149(): rang gi yon tan lhag par gsal// sngon gyi yongs su spyad pa mthu che zhing // snying rje'i dpal gyis yongs su 'khyud gyur pas// 'jig rten bsil byed yon tan gyis gang ba/
3150(): lhar bcas kun gyis blta ba'i 'os su gyur// de lta bu'i skyes bu dpa pa de dag bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad cing lhag pa'i bsab pa dang ldan pas rab tu byung /
3151(): nas ji skad du thos pa'i don rnams legs par bsam shing 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i don du ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes su sbyor bar gyur te/ khye'u de gnyis lhag pa'i bsam pa yis// bde
3152(): bar gshegs pa'i bstan la rab byung nas// bse ru lta bur nags khrod stug por gnas// de yi mthu yis skyes bu dam pa gnyis// rdzu 'phrul ldan ning bsam gtan bzhirnapas
3153(): thob snyan dag bstan bcos mkhas shing rtogs pa ste// rjes su rig cing mkha' la thogs med 'gro// de dag nags khrod stug po bsil ba dang // me tog sna tshogs yid du
3154(): 'ong bas gang // bya rnams du ma sgra 'byin nags tshal na// de gnyis phan tshur chos kyi gtam gyis mgu// rnyed dang bkur sti don du pi gnyer zhing // bsam gtan zas la bde
3155(): bar spyod cing gnas// de ltar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis dka' thub kyi rags tshal du gnas pa la/ du sarare shig cig na yul de'i rgyal po chen po de'i rigs gshor ba'i don du legs par bshams
3156(): pa'i ngomag gi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig dang bcas pa nags khrod chen po der zhugs shing dong ba las/ gang na dka' thub can gnyis yod pa'i sa phyogs der phyin to// der phyin nas kyang dka'/
3157(): thub kyi mthus rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i yid chos la gzhol zhing rab tu zhi bar gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di smras par nges so// e ba ho// de ring 'dir ri sdod chad pa myong ba'i/
3158(): bdag gi yid de dga' bas rgyas par gyur// rnyed pa'i mchog cig rnyed par 'gyur ba snyam// phyogs 'dir legs par brtags te bag yod byos// zhes smras te kun tu brtag
3159(): pAn dka' thub kyi gnas rab tu mdzes pa/ shing ljon pa lo ma dang 'bras bu bzang po rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa ched du bkod pa lta bu me tog gi rigs du ma dang ldan pa/ n+ya gtsang ma
3160(): bai DUr+ya mthing ga ltar dri ma med par 'bab pa/ skye bo mchog rnams kyi bsti gnas su rung ba de na/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis chos kyi dpal gyis mdzes pa rin po che chen po byi dor legs
3161(): par byas pa ldang nge 'dug pa bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar zhing bzhugs par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang rgyal po chen po des skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la dga' ba dang gus pa'i sems skyes te
3162(): 'khor dang bcas pas bkur sti byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de gnyis kyis kyang rgyal po de la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ji ltar 'os pa'i bsu ba byas nas//
3163(): de dag gi sems shes pas chos dang ldan pa'i gtab bstan pa/ sa yi bdag po rgyal po chen po nyod// sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog tu rnyed pa dka'// pi yi bdag po rtag tu
3164(): bag yod gyis// tshe yang rgyud du 'gro zhing mi brtan te// ri yi chu bo bzhin du myur du 'gro// bya ngar nad dang rga bas gzir ba la// khyod la dge
3165(): ba'i las 'dra skyabs gzhan med// rgyal po glang po'i chos rnams snang bar gyis/ stobs bcu ldan pa'i bstad pa 'di yang srungs// zad pa'i dus da shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshe//
3166(): chos spu'i skyes bu gcig tsab bsrungs pas kyang // tshe rabs kun tu yon tan ldan par 'gyur// sa bdag chos kyi phyogs la gnas par gyis// zhes bya ba la sogs
3167(): pa chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan pas/ rgyal po chen po de 'khor khrag khrig drug bcu dang bcas pa bla da med pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cing yid dga' ba dang
3168(): bde ba skyes nas/ dka' thub can de gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te slar rang gi pho brang du song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor der rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du gnyer
3169(): ba'i dge slong mang po dag bstan pa'i snyig mar gyur pa'i dbang gis byung bar gyur to// dmigs pa'i lha bca rgyud yongs su ma bsdams pa/ phrag dog dang g.yo sgyus zil
3170(): gyis don pa/ tshul 'chos pa byed pa du ma dag rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du byung ste/ de'i dbang gis skye bo rnams kyang phal cher chos kyi snod ma yin par gyur to// 'jig rten
3171(): pa rnams phal cher ni// sdig pa'i grogs po dang ldang pas// nyes pa phal cher 'byung gyur te// dam pa rnams la ma yin ro// rgyal po des skyes bu dab pa dka'
3172(): thub can de gnyis kyi bsngags pa brjod par byed pa pho brang 'khor gyi dge sbyong de rnams kyis tshor nas de dag gi spyod pa la khyad du gsod pa lta bu de bdag nyid kyi grags pa nyams
3173(): par gyur du dogs pa'i dbang gis sems rab tu dang bar ma gyur to// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ rnyed pa 'dod phyir dmigs pa'i lta ba can// bde gshegs bsdad pa rab
3174(): tu 'jig byed pa// bdud kyi gnyen gyur dge sbyong mang po dag/ rnyed phyir dam pa'i spyod pa rnab spangs nus// phrag dog me yis rang rgyud 'bar byas te/ pho brang 'khor gyi
3175(): gsang tshig 'dzin rnams la// rgyal po de yang bsgyur ba'i phyir smras pa// chos spa gnyis po 'di ni bsad par gyis// 'di dag mu stegs chad par smra ba ste// yun
3176(): rings spyod pas yang dag 'jug byed kyang // de dag gang du'ang mya ngan 'da' mi stod// las kyang 'jig cing rnam par smin pa 'jig/ tshul 'chos 'di dag phung po med
3177(): par smra/ rgyal pos 'di gnyis yul das spangs nas ni// 'dir yang chos ni yun ring gnas par gyur// de skad ces yang dang yang du smra ba brgyud pa rgyal po des
3178(): thos te the tshom du gyur par/ rgyal po de'i phyir 'brang ba'i lha mo byang chub tu spyad pa spyod pa zhig gis rgyal po la smras pa/ rgyal po sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig
3179(): dag gis// de lta bu yi sems ni ma skyed cig/ dge slong chos smra mkhas pa gnyis po 'di// sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig gi sam spang zhig/ shin tu 'jigs pa mi bzad/
3180(): dus kyi tshe// rgyal po glang po chos la gnas kyis zhes// de dag gis ni dgas khrod ci bshad pa// mi yi bdag po cung zad la nga mi dran dam// lha mo de yis de skad
3181(): du bskul ba'i tshig rgyal pos thos nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi yon tan rjes su drad pa'i stobs kyis sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du ma gyur to// de nas yang rgyal po de skyes
3182(): bu dpa pa de gnyis la lhag par gus par rig nas dge sbyong ma rungs pa de dag de bas kyang sems la ma bab par gyur te/ rgyal po de'i du bo gleng zhing gtum pa nye 'khor du rgyas
3183(): po byed pa zhig yod pa de sdud pa'i phyir/ rgyal po de'i drung du song ste phan par 'dod pa sa smras pa/ rgyal po khyed kyi gcen ni sdig pa can// bdag gi srog kyang dam du
3184(): 'dod mi byed/ dge slong gnyis po rig sngags drag ldan pa// de dag dang mkha' la yang sngags kyis 'gro// de thos nas ni khyod kyi drung du 'ongs// thams cad
3185(): 'dus te gsol ba 'debs pa ni// rig sngags drag ldan 'di gnyis myur du song// phyis ni 'gyod par gyur na ma legs so// de skad ces smras pa rgyal po des thos ngas
3186(): dge sbyong sdig pa cad de dag gi tshig bded par 'dzin par gyur to// dam pa ma yid gang bstan pa// rlag par byed pa'i gnas yin te// kA la kU Ta bden pa yis//
3187(): gnyis ka phung par byed pa bzhin// de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bsad pa'i dor du sdig pa can dmag gi sde dang bcas pa nags khrod chen po de logs su song ba las/ bdag nyid chen
3188(): po de'i bsam gtan gyi bathu dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dam pa'i chos bsrung ba de dag khros pa'i dbang gis nags tshal dam pa de'i khor yug nas/ rgyal po sde dang bcas pa de
3189(): dag la rdo dang sa phag char phab phyir yang skad// ltos shig sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur pa// khyod lta ci zhig rung zhes spro ba byas// de tshe sdig cad rgyal po
3190(): yi lus mgal dum bzhin du sdug bsngal me yis bsregs// de ma thag tu sa yi dbus nas ni// dmyal ba'i gshed po mi bzad 'bar ba'i lce// bkres pa bzhin du
3191(): rngam zhing 'ongs gyur te// de ni rol gyis med pa bzhin du gyur// chos smra ba la khro ba byas pas de// der ni tshe rabs drug cur mnar med song // rgyal rigs rgyal po gang
3192(): gis skad byed pa'i// dge slong dmigs lta mang po de dag kyang // tshe rabs bas pa yas dmyal ba'i gnas su lhung // chos kyi rgyal po bdag nyid lnga mor
3193(): bcas/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig drug cu rnams// de dag kun gyis ting 'dzid bzang po 'di// thob nas rkang gnyis gtso bo mya ngan 'das// de ltar bdag nyid chen po de
3194(): gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi mthu chen pos log par lta ba de dag sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu med pa de ma thag tu myong zhing / gus par byed pa rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu nges
3195(): par gyur pa 'di ni bas patan gyi mthu chen po las byung ba yin no// de lta bu phyis byung ba'ang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mar me mdzad de de na gcig tu gyur/
3196(): de tshe chos smra gnyis pa nga yin no// de dag rjes mthun rgyal po byams pa yin// lha mo de ni zla 'od gzhod du ste// rgyal po de yi nu bo sdig pa can// lha sgyid de yi tshe na der gyur to//
3197(): zhes gsungs so// de lta bas na dben par bsam gtad la mnyam par banag na gzhan gyi dod spyod par 'gyur zhing gdod pa rnams kyis kyang rdzi bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sdig
3198(): pa'i grogs po dag bsten pas dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang brjod par bya'o// gzhan yang bdag nyid bag yod par byas na sdig pa'i grogs pa'i
3199(): dbang du mi 'gyur ro// zhes kyang brjod par bya'o// khye'u gnyis kyi skyes pa'i rabs te bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi
3200(): chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don du bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la rtson par byed pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab po/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ sdod byung ba 'das
3201(): pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na rgyal po brtan pas byin zhes bya bar gyur to zhes
3202(): grag go/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i nga shin tu gtsang zhing mnyam pa yangs par gyur te grong khyer bye ba brgya phrag bdun cu rtsa drug byung ba thams cad kyang chu zheng du dpag tshad lnga
3203(): pa rin po che sna bdun las mngon par grub pa/ skyed mos tshal brgya phrag mang pos rab tu brgyan pa byung ngo // 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan der byung ba// skyed mos tshal mchog de
3204(): dag rnabs// mkha' la skar ma bkram pa bzhin// rab tu mdzes shing gsal bar snang // ched du bskor ba'i bza' shing rnams// 'bras bu me tog tshogs kyis gang
3205(): bya tshogs du mas bstod pa bzhin// la gu a pra 'dzam bu dang // kar Ni tsam pa pUraNasogs// ldan pa'i tshogs kyis rab tu brgyad// der bya tshogs mang po 'dus
3206(): pa dag / yang lag bkra zhing tshon chen kha dog 'bar// shin tu yid 'ong sku 'jab dga' bas 'byid// ka la bingag rma bya de tse dang // khu byug
3207(): ri stegs ngang pa'i rgyal po dang // shang shang te'u kun das sgra skad pa// rab tu sgrogs byed lha yi sil snyad bzhin// btang zung mya ngan tshang dang pa sha ka/ a ti puk+ka
3208(): tog sgyu snar dang // pad+ma ut+pal ku mud pad+ma dkar// pad+ma 'dab stong brgya yis rab tu brgyad// me tog de dag rdzing bu mdzes par byed// dri zhipa spos mchog dam pas so
3209(): sor brgyad// rdzing bu sdug cing shin tu mdzes par gyur// de ltar rab tu mdzes pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling der skyes pa'i rgyal po brtan pas byin zhes bya ba de yang rang bzhin 'di lta bur
3210(): gyur te/ rnam dag rigs skyes rnam par dag pa'i lha yi lha ltar mtshungs med pa// rgyal po de ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bsod nams mthu yis khyad par du// khyad du 'phags shing
3211(): blta na sdug pa'i bu yang lnga brgya ldan par gyur// brtse ba'i shugs kyis skye bo kun la mnyam par skyong ba'i sa skyong gyur// de lta bu'i rgyal po chen po des tshon po rgya mtsho'i mtha'
3212(): klas pa mtshor gyi chad pa med cing bde bar skyong ba las/ de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi don la mnyam par gzigs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
3213(): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid tshogs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag drug cu dang bcas pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po chen po de 'khor
3214(): dang bcas pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa de la rab tu dad par gyur nas mchod pa'i bye brag dpag tu med pas mchod cing spyod pa 'di lta bu mngon du byas so// rgyal ba de la gus pa rab
3215(): skyed de// zhabs la mi yi bdag pos phyag 'tshal nas// de tshe stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyan sngar 'dug/ rab tu dga' zhing sor bcus thal mo sbyar// de yi spyod pa yongs
3216(): suM dag rig nas// dbang po dag la dbang gis pha rol phyir// rgyal bas mi mchog mos pa mkhyen pa yis// de la ting 'dzin rgyal po 'di bshad do// rgyal po de ni don
3217(): dam 'di thos tshe// 'phags pa'i dga' ba mtshud med skyes nas su// gling bzhi'i rgyal srid thams cad rnam spangs te// 'dod pa bor te khyim nas mngon par byung //
3218(): sangs rgyas 'dod pas byang chub don du yang // gang tshe rgyal pos sa bor rab byung tshe// 'dzab bu rgyal mtshan de yi mi kun yang // 'dod pa'i yon tan spangs nas rab tu byung //
3219(): de ltar rgyal po chen po dang 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi mi thams cad khyim gyi bde ba dang 'dod pa thams cad spangs te sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin la brtsom
3220(): par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de dag gi yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur gyur te/ de tshe 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan na// sna tshogs gos kyi shing byung ste// dge
3221(): slong po mo de dag la// nye bar spyad pa'i chos gos dag/ ngur smrig dri ma med pa'i tshegs// rab mdzes bsams pa tsam gyis byung // marmos kha zas sna tshogs pa//
3222(): lhung bzed bcas pa'ang byung bar gyur// 'dod pa'i lha tshogs kun gyis kyang // g.yog dang bsnyed bkur byed par gyur// de ltar sangs rgyas byin rlabs dang /
3223(): rgyal po de yi lhag bsam stobs// 'di 'dra'i stobs can sul yod// de ltar 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po dang bcas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de dge thams cad ting nge
3224(): 'dzid rgyal po la dad cing ting nge 'dzin gyi don la spyod par gyur to// de lta bas da skyes bu dang pa rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas kyang khyim gyi gnas la ltos pa med par sangs
3225(): rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung zhing / ting nge 'dzid stod pa'i mdo sde dag mnyan pa dang / ting nge 'dzid gyi do sgom pa la brtsod par bya'o// skyes pa'i rabs 'di nyid kyi 'jug
3226(): thogs su da ltar gdams pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa/ gzhon du ltos shig rgyal mchog de yang de// sa rnams thams cad rab spangs rab byung na// zad pa'i dus
3227(): ra sems can mang po dag/ shin tu longs spyod rlung yang khyir mi gtong // shing srog dang de bcing bachad pa mang // gshe zhing stobs sdug bsngal mi dga' ba// rgyal ngon/
3228(): chad pa mang po bzod par byed// longs spyod chung la khyim na bza' ba med// shin tu tshe yang thung la nor yang med// rab tu bag chung bsod nams stobs kyang med// mi
3229(): mkhas bzo yi gnas kyang mi shes te// dbul por gyur cing khyim gnas dor yang med// dri ma ma dag gzhan gyi bud med chags// phrag dog byed cing shin tu brtsam
3230(): pa med/ nyon mongs chos ldan tshul la mi gnas kyang // deng dri sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhes smra// gsog gis slu zhing babacol byed pa dag/ nga ni phyug po'i 'jig
3231(): rten chos nor sbyin// gdod pa byed cing tshul 'chos sgyur ba dgra/ nged ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhes smra// gzhan dag bsad cing bcing dang 'tshe la dga'// tshul
3232(): khrims 'chal pa pa rungs zhe sdang yid// byas pa mi bzod dbyed byed tsher mar gnas// btsun pa byang chub stod pa stod ces smra// gang las des dri byang chub spyod thos pa//
3233(): de nyid la ni khong khro rab bskyed nas// mkhas pa 'khrul pa'i tshig 'ga' thos na yang // de la mi snyad brgya dag sgrogs par byed// gzhon nu nga yi tshig 'di thos nas su//
3234(): de dag dang ni bsted par ma byed cig/ byang chub dab pa rig par 'dod na ni// rmi lam du yang de la yid brton// sbyangs tshul bsnyungs pa yon tan du ma ni//
3235(): bskal pa brgya phrag mang po rab bshad kyang // de yi yon tan dag la mi gnas na// byang chub zhi pa mchog ni rtogs mi 'gyur// khor mor yang ni dge zhing 'jab par gyis//
3236(): tshul khrims dag cing rtag tu dad pa'i yid// khor mor tshul khrims yongs su dag par gyis// ring por mi zlogs ting 'dzin mchog thob 'gyur// nga rgyal ma byed za ba ma bskyed
3237(): par rtag tu yid ni yong su dag par gyis// nga rgyal rgyags dag chags pa kun spongs la// ting 'dzin mchog 'di rab tu thob par gyis// rtag tu yon tan las ni rgyal
3238(): badran/ gser mchog mdog 'dra shin tu 'od mdzes pa// mtshar mo gdam la skad pas gang ba ltar// thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis yongs su rgyas// 'chag cing 'dug
3239(): dang 'greng zhing nyal ba na// mi gang thub pa'i zla ba dran byed pas// de yi mdud na rtag tu thub pa bzhugs// de ni rgya cher ba ngan 'das par gyur// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
3240(): bla de ba dan mchog/ phye ma byug pa mang po kun thogs la// rtag tu bde bar gshegs la mchod par gyis// ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob// spos mchog
3241(): phreng ba me tog byug pa dang // rol mo sel snyan mang por bzogs la// rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la mchod par gyis// ring por pi thogs tring 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob// glu gar
3242(): bzang po sna tshogs mang po dang // yid gtsang bzhad gang rol mo bzang po dang // rtag par mar be phreng bdug bzang po yis// mtshungs pa med la mchod bzang rab gyis shig/
3243(): mkhar rnga dang ni sgra snyan rdza rnga brgya// rnga dang gling bu sgra mchog sna tshogs dang // sgra snyad rol po yon tan sna tshogs kyis// dang ba'i yid ltar 'dren pa mchod par gyis// sangs
3244(): d+has sku gzugs shin tu mdzes pa dag/ rin cher byi dor legs par byas pa yang // lta ru sdug cing shin tu bzang po gyis// ring po mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/
3245(): de bzhi gsar ngag dang ni dngul dag dang // tsad dan gyi ni sku gzugs bzang po dag/ mdzes shing shin tu ltar sdug par gyis// ring por pi thogs ting 'dzid mchog 'di 'gron
3246(): 'jim pa dang ni de bzhin rdo ba dang // shing dang ri mo bris pa'i sku gzugs dag/ mdzes shing shir tu ltar sdug par gyis// ring por mi thogs ting 'dzid mchog 'di 'thob//
3247(): rtag tu nags khrod dber pa bstad par gyis// grong dang grong khyer dga' ba rnams spongs la// bse ru lta bur gnyis su med par gyis// ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di
3248(): 'thob/ dang ni chos rje khyod ning yi bu// nga yi ting 'dzin spyod pa rjes su spobs// nga ni de tshe phyogs su grags pa yi// mi dbang bstad pas byin zhes
3249(): bya bar gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// ngas sngon sangs rgyas mtha' yas mchod pa byas// rtag par ngas ni tshul khrims rnam dag bsrungs// nga yis
3250(): stobs bcu dag la ri mor byas// ting 'dzim ni ba mchog 'di tshal ba'i phyir// ngas sdor bu dang chung ma yongs btang ste// mgo dang rkang lag mig mchog bzang po byin// zhub
3251(): pa'i sems su nam yang yongs ma byas// zhes gsungs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin btsal bar bya ba rnams las brtsams te gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin
3252(): du bsgrub par bya zhing / bsam gtan gyi mthu bskyed par gyur pas dpag tu med pa'i don du 'gyur ro zhes kyang sbyar bar bya'o// rgyal po brtan pas byin gyi skyes pa'i rabus te bzhi
3253(): bcu drug pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bya dka' ba du mas bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing dpag tu med pa'i sems cad gyi
3254(): don yang byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i snga rol du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
3255(): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas yongs su mya ngan
3256(): las 'das par gyur to// de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po dpal dbyangs zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa'i phyir/ mchod rten
3257(): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong byas te/ mchod rter re re la'ang mar me bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad khri
3258(): bzhi stong btsugs so// de bzhin du rol mo sil snyan dang // me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
3259(): dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan yang mar me'i grangs snyed byas so// de ltar rgyal po chen po dpal dbyangs kyis// rgyal ba mchod phyir mchod rten mchod par byas// rab
3260(): tu bkra zhing rab bkra rab gang byas// de yi mthu yis mthu chen rdzu 'phrul can// byang chub sems dpa' sems cad phar brtson pa// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brgya phrag
3261(): bcu sde snod bsdu phyir rnam par 'dus pa yang // mi dbang rgyal po de yis mchod par byas// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chen po bde ba sbyin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste
3262(): 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin dang ltung bar gsal bar mngon par gyur pas pa sebs so// de dbyis pa gnod dunas// skar ma'i bdag po rdza ba ba na// rngub par
3263(): dkar ba'i rigs su gyur// dbang po rab tu ni zhing dul// lang tso'i yon tan lhag par 'phel// rig pa'i gnas kyi yon tan rdzogs// dri med sdong zla'i yang ngo banin/
3264(): yon tan bdun po'i khyad par dag/ je bas rje rer gsal gyur cing // 'dam las 'thon pa'i padra bzhin// 'jig rten 'dod pas gtses pa med// de ni rgyal ba'i bsnad la
3265(): rab byung nas// gcig tu bag yod snying rje'i dbang gyur pas// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni mngon du byas// gzhan gyi don spyod de yang rjes su stong// de de ltar rang gi ting nge 'dzin/
3266(): gyi mthu thob cing snying rje chen pos sangs rgyas kyi bsdud pa rnam par spel bar bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ston pa la gzhol bar gyur to// de nas dus gnas
3267(): zhig gi tshe rgyal po chen po dpal dbyangs kyis chos bgro ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la gsol ba btab nas/ de'i nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten
3268(): de dag la mchod pa snga ma bas kyang ches lhag par byas te/ 'khor gyi khyams chen po phyag bdar byas shing / chag chag btab nas/ de'i nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
3269(): rten spos kyis byugs te me tog bkram zhing rin po che'i khri sde tshogs bshams shing / bdag nyid kyang gso sbyong legs par blangs nas bdag nyid kyi khang pa'i yang thog tu chos
3270(): nyad pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'dug go// gzhan yang chos nyan pa'i phyir lha dang mi dpag tu med pa 'dus par gyur te de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bde ba spyir
3271(): gyis de lta bu'i 'dus pa de mthong ngas 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma'o 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i lhag pa'i bsab pas yongs su bskul zhing 'dus par gyur pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
3272(): chen po 'di dag kyang blar med pa'i byang chub la gzhug pa'i phyir dang / gzhan yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bdag nyid
3273(): kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan par byas te/ 'khor dang bcas pa ngo mtshar du 'gyur bar
3274(): bya gor ma rag go snyam ste/ de nas dge slong bde ba sbyin/ rgyal po'i mchod rten drung du ni// 'dus pa'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu// chos kyi don du lhags gyur pa/
3275(): de tshe bdag gi lag pa g.yas// 'bru mar gyis byegs ras kyis dkris// mar me'i snying po ji bzhin du// rang gi lag pa sbar bar byas// de ltar byang chub sems
3276(): dpa' bde ba sbyin// bdag gi lag pa pad+ma'i mchog de ni// spyod shing bzhin du rab tu 'bar gyur kyang // lus kyi bzhin mdangs lhag par gsal
3277(): ba'adra// gang tshe lag pa rab tu sbar zhing 'bar bar gyur pa'i 'od zer dra ba can// 'od stong 'bar bas sgron po 'bar ba bye ba khrag khrig zil gyis mdar par gyur// de yi mthu
3278(): yis sa gzhi ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa dga' ba'i lus ltar g.yos// lha dang lha mi dpa' ba ci dang pi yo tshogs rnams rab tu dang bar byas// brtson 'grus chen pos
3279(): gsal ba'i 'od kyis bdud kyi sems ni rtsa bzhin bsreg par byas// tsha zer byed pa 'od stong 'bar bas sdang bar nus mir gling bar rnams kyang sdang // 'di 'dra'i mthu
3280(): cher khyad par mthu 'di gsal bar gyur pas lhag bas pa gsol ba bzhin// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu cher byang chub zhugs pa rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa yin/
3281(): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rang gi yan lag dam pa spod me byas shing / 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad la chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
3282(): yang tshig dang yi ge rgyud chags pas 'khor de dag thams cad la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// de'i tshe rgyal po dpal dbyangs 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'
3283(): bde ba sbyin gyis lag pa 'bar bar byas pa'i 'od kyis mar me'i tshogs de dag thams cad zil gyis padad te snang bar byed cing chos stod pa mthong ste/ rab tu gus pa'i sems kyis byang chub
3284(): sems dpa' bde ba sbyin gang na ba der logs su mchongs nas song ngo // de tshe de la brtse bas de logs su// stong phrag brgya yi khru tshad g.yang sa der// mchongs par gyur kyang lha
3285(): rnams kyis bzung bas// nyes pa med par bya 'phur bzhin du gyur// de nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i drung du phyin pa dang / 'di ltar byang chub sems
3286(): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba sbyin bdag gi lag pa bsregs shing 'bar bar mthong nas/ de nyam nyes su dogs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang bcas pa ngu zhing skad cher
3287(): po phyung ras ro nges btab ste drung du 'dug go// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bde ba spyir gyis rgyal po chen po dpal dbyangs la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ci'i slad du skye bo'i tshogs
3288(): chen po dang bcas pa bdag gi mdun du bzhugs shing skad chen po phyung ste cho nges btab nas mchi ma 'byin par mdzad/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis byang
3289(): chub sems dpa' bde ba sgyid la tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ shes rab chen po bde ba sbyin// chos smra ba ni mkhas pa yin// yan lag ma tshang rig nas ni// skye bo 'di
3290(): dag de phyir du// gzi brjid phung po 'phags pa yi// 'di lta bu yi gzugs 'di yang // lag pa nyams par shes ras ni/ bdag kyang shin tu
3291(): sdug bsngal lo// khyod kyi lag pa 'bar byas pas// de yi 'od ni phyogs bcur btang // khyod las byung ba'i lha rdzas kyis// mar me 'di dag mi gsal byas// sa 'di rab
3292(): tu g.yos gyur te// khyod kyi sems ni g.yos pa med// de nas bdag ni sems skyes pas// mkhas pa za ma la ma yin snyam// bdag gi btsun mo'i 'khor bcas pa// bu ni
3293(): stong phrag brgya pa yi// khang pa'i steng nas mchongs gyur kyang // bdag gi lus la gnod ma gyur// legs so ye shes ngo mtshar khyod// legs so sems kyang bla na med//
3294(): brtsod 'grus legs brtsams legs pa ste// bsam gtan chen po legs pa yin// gang gis lag pa' bar byas kyang // khyod la nam yang g.yo ba med// dga' zhing rang
3295(): pa skyes nas su// phyir yang chos 'di rab tu 'chad// ji ltar zla ba nya ba dang // nam mkha'i dkyil na nyi ma bzhin// ri rab ri yi rgyal po ltar// rab tu mdzes shing lham par
3296(): sdang / bdag kyang mkhas pa khyod bzhin du// smod lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi// lus la phangs pa rab spangs te// bdag gis srog chags don rnams bgyi// chos kyi
3297(): dga' bas rangs gyur te// 'di ltar bdag ni bde gyur kyang // khyed kyi lag pa ma tshang ba// des ni rab tu sdug bsngal lo// de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po la sog
3298(): pa skye bo'i tshogs de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpas rigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/ gang la lag pa med pa yang / de ni yang lag pa tshad mid// su
3299(): la tshul khrims med pa dang // de ni yan lag ma tshang yin// rul ba yi ni lus 'di yis// bsam gyis mi khyab yod ta ldan// 'jig rte kun gyi mchod pa'i
3300(): gdas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gis mchod// stong gsum rin chen yongs bkang ste// 'jig rten mgon la mchod pa byas// su dag chos rnams stong rig nas//
3301(): lus kyi mchod pa bsam mi khyab// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas gnas skabs su'ang gnod par mi gyur te/ bdag gis bded pa'i tshig brjod par
3302(): bgyi'o// rgyal po chen po bdag la gson// bden pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchog/ 'jig rten mchod rten bdag 'gyur ro// sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur// gzhan yang
3303(): sems cad dpag med pa// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed de// ci snyed kyi ni don bya zhing // chos rnams thams cad dmigs med par// lag pa zhes kyang bya med na// bde//
3304(): pa de yis sngod ltar bdag/ lag pa myur du 'byung bar shog/ srid gsub sems cad ji snyed pa// gnod pa thams cad rab spangs nas// thams cad mnya
3305(): par bzhag par shog/ de skad ces brjod pa thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bde ba sbyin gyi lag pa zla ba sgra gcad las grol ba bzhin du mtshan thams cad kyis mngon par brgyad te snga ma bas/
3306(): kyang lam par gyur to// e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yis// ting 'dzin pathu yi khyad par gsal ba 'di// skar pa'i nang da bsil zer byed pa bzhin// gsal bar
3307(): bstan pa 'di ni rigs pa snya pa// gang tshe dge slong bde ba sbyin// mthong bar gyur pa'i bud med tshogs// de dag skyes pa'i dbang po thob// lha yang bye ba phrag stong dang // de bzhin
3308(): klu dbang kur gyis kyang // bde ba sbyid la mchod pa'i phyir// bar snang la ni 'dug nas su// de tshe me tog pan+da ras// dge slong de la 'thor bar byed// mi ma yin pa'i me
3309(): tog gis// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang bar gyur// lha mo bye ba khrag khrig rnams// klu dbyangs rol mo rab tu byed// de tshe bde ba sbyin pa yis// sgra 'di dag ri byung ba na//
3310(): rnab 'phrul 'di ni sangs rgyas dag/ bye ba stong gis gzigs par 'gyur// rang rang gi dri zhing dag tu// dge slong pha dang dge slong mo// dge bsnyed pa dang dge bsnyen pa//
3311(): grags pa chen pos go bar mdzad// dge slong bde ba sbyin pa de// mkhas shing stobs kyang che ba ste// sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes phyir// des de lag pa 'bar bar byas// de
3312(): yis zhing rnams stong dag dang // gang gA yi ni bye ma snyed// mar po des ni snang byas te// bsreg pa'i bskal pa byung ba bzhin// me tog dang ni phyi ma yis// zhing rnams
3313(): thams cad gang bar gyur// sa gzhi dag nas yan chad du// pus nub tsam du gang bar gyur// rin chen me tog thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas zhing 'di gang bar gyur// rin chen
3314(): bkod pa thams cad kyis// zhing 'di rab tu brgyan par byas// de lta bas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin tshol zhing gzhan gyi don yongs su spyod pa na de ltar brtsod par byas pas gzhan
3315(): gyi dor dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob par 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes kyang brjod par bya'o// de lta bu'i dod de yang
3316(): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// nga ni bde ba skyid par gyur// ma pham pa ri dpal dbyangs yin// mkhas pas bdo sde 'di thos nas// lus
3317(): la phangs pa ma byed par// ting 'dzin rjes su bslab par gyiso// zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' bde ba sbyin gyi skyes pa'i rabs te bzhi bcu bdun pa'o// // skyes
3318(): budam pa rnams ni bdag nyid bya dka' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos te 'gro ba'i don yongs su spyod par byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba
3319(): 'das pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i bstan pa yongs su nub tu nye ba na chos smra ba'i
3320(): dge slong spyad pa'i 'od ces bya ba ni bdul ba rang bzhin gyi yon tan dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa legs par bsrung
3321(): ba/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa la gzhol ba/ bya ba dang bya ba ma yin par legs par stod pa la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin cad gzhan gyi don byed pa la zhugs pa zhig byung bar gyur
3322(): to zhes grag go/ de ni gsum rig dbang po dul ba dang // mang du thos shing mngon shes lnga yang thob// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni yongs su stod// stong zhing zhi ba'i bzod
3323(): la rab tu gnas// snying rje'i bdag nyid gzhan la phan par brtsod// 'gro ba'i bla ma bzhin du mthun par gyur// de lta bu'i dge slong chen po de ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul legs par
3324(): gnas shing // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa'i dben pa'i phan yon shes kyang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'ang zla ba mar gyi ngo bzhin du 'grib par gyur pa'i gnas
3325(): skabs de yang mthong zhing skye bo rnams kyang rab tu ma rungs par rig nas de snying rje chen po'i dbang du gyur te/ kye ma mtshor byas sems can rnabs ni bstan pa'i don la ring du gyur
3326(): zhing bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam las nyams te ngad 'gro log par ltung ba la bab par gyur to// rgyal ba'i bstan pa ma smad pa// tshul khrims rtsa ba las byung zhing // bas
3327(): gtan dri bsung phun sum tshogs// shes rab yal gas rnam mdzes pa// phan par byed pa'i ljon shing 'di// cung zad dus las yol ba snyam// de ltar ma rungs
3328(): sems can la// dam pa rnams kyis phan gdags par// lhag par brtsod par bya ba'i rigs// bdag nyid chen po de de ltar blo la nges par byas nas sa chen po 'di
3329(): skyong bar byed pa'i rgyal po bsod nams blo gros zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ skye bo rnams chos bzhin du skyong bar byed pa zhig yod de/ de nyid chos
3330(): la bsku la skye bo gzhan yang de'i rjes su spyod pas sems can gyi dor du 'gyur bar rig nas rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa 'di lta bu mdzad par gyur to// sa bdag rgyal po chos kyi rang
3331(): bzhid la// rab tu gzhol zhing bdag nyid chen po des// sdod du gyur zhing gzhan gyi don byed par// drang po'i lam du khyu mchog 'gro ba bzhin// rjes su 'brang rnams don
3332(): du 'gyur rig nas// dge slong snyad 'od rgyal po'i pho brang song // de ni dran dang ldan zhing rtogs par ldan// brtul zhugs ldan zhing nges pa tshul khrims
3333(): dga'/ 'dubangs kyang snyad cing mi rtsu ba 'jam pa ste// khams rnams shes shing dbang mchog rab tu thob// lha yang bye ba brgya phrag phyir 'brang zhing // grong du 'ongs nas
3334(): bsngags pa brjod byed pas// bsod nams blo gros dad cing 'dun gyur nas// srog chags brgya stong gis kyang bkur sti byas// de ltar skyes bu dam pa de rgyal po'i
3335(): pho brang 'khor du snying rje'i dbang gis song ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul bstan pa las/ sems can rnams dad pa'i dbang gis de la chos gos bye ba brgya stong dag kyang phul zhing
3336(): grags pa dang snyan pas phyogs thams cad du khyab par gyur to// de'i dbang gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du gnyer ba'i dge slong brgya phrag mang po phrag dog gi sems kyis rabatu
3337(): 'khrugs par gyur to// dam pa rnams kyi bsod nams stobs// gzhan la phan par byed pa'i mchog/ rab tu phun sum tshogs ldan pa// de mthong bas ni skye bo gzhan//
3338(): mud pa'i blo ldan de dag la// ched du phrogs par gyur pa bzhin// phrag dog rlung gis bskul ba yi// zhe sdang ma ni rab 'bar bas// dkar po'i sa bor sreg byed cing
3339(): ngo tsha med par spyod gyur pa// 'di ni 'jig rten ngan pa'i lugs// de ltar phrag dog dang ldan pa'i skye bo dge sbyong gi gzugs cad bdud kyi gnyen du gyur pa de dag tshul khrims
3340(): la mi gnas shing ngo tsha med la bag med par spyod pas byang chub sems dpa' la lhag par zhe sdang zhing mi snyad pa sgrogs par byed pa/ rgyal po bsod dmas blo gros des rag nas dge
3341(): slong de bsrung ba'i don du srog chags stong phrag lnga brgya rnams go cha dang mtshon cha legs par thogs pas chos smra bde bsrung zhing bkur sti byas so// log par spyod pa'i skye bo ngan
3342(): pa dag glang chen spyod pa rang gis myos pa bzhin// bdag gzhan phung bar byed la rab tu gnas// gang gis bsod dmas mthu yis thob gyur pa'i// brgya byin dpal
3343(): la lha mi gtum po dge/ phrag dog dbang gis lhag par sdug bsngal 'gyur// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe skyes bu dam pa de bsad par 'dod pa'i phyir dge slong ngan pa bang po
3344(): de dag mtshon rnon po thogs te 'ongs par/ de lta bu'i bdag nyid dad pa'i tshul de bdag nyid chen po des bzong das 'jigs pa med cing snying rje chen po dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid//
3345(): kyi rnam par rjes su dran te/ bdag nyid kyi phyag me tog pad+ma kha 'bus pa ltar mdzes pa/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis mdzes pas rang gi spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/ bag tsha ba med pa'i
3346(): spa dbyangs kyis bden pa'i tshig smras pa/ rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams la bga'atshal lo// bded pa gang gis chos 'di stong pan// mchod cha 'di rnams
3347(): me tog man dar gyur// sems can su dgang la sdang byed pa// de dag phyir dri byang chub bdag spyod gyur// thub pa tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan pa yis// gzhan du mi 'gyur
3348(): tshig 'di smras mthag/ dgas tshal bcas pa'i sa yang rab tu g.yos// mtshon chad dag me tog man dar gyur// dga' ba'i tshal na dga' bas lha po dag/ me tog zigs
3349(): te rab tu g.yo ba bzhin// dmigs pa can dag mtshod chu thogs pa ni// de tshe lus dang sems ni zhum gyur nas// de nas drung du nye bar 'ong ma dus// skrag cing spa gong dang
3350(): kyis btab pa bzhin// de dag gdong yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// sgra gcar kha rlangs phog pas nyams pa 'dra// gang dag de sdod gyur pa'i skye bo rnams// khyad par du
3351(): yang ngo mtshar chen por gyur// su dag thub dbang la ni dad mos shing // gang dag stod pa zhi ba 'dod pa rnabs// de dag yal la spong brjod nas su// gos mchog bcu
3352(): yis dge slong mngon par g.yogs// de ltar bdag nyid ched po de la log par lta ba'i skye bo de dag gi gnod pas lus dang sems rdzi ba med par gyur te slar yang sems can gyi don/
3353(): du ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i tshul lo brgyad bcu'i bar du brtad par gyur to// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag gcig pu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa ma yin te/ gzhan gyi
3354(): don la brtson pa'i dben pa dang ldan pa yin no// de lta bu'i las brtsams nas da ltar dang pa 'ongs pa'i dus su 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon
3355(): gyi srid pa de ltar smad spyod pa// dge slong snyad 'od de ni nga nyid yin// bsod dmas blo gros rgyal po'i bu de ni// tshe rabs stong du grogs byas byams pa yin// gzhon du thos
3356(): nas nga yi rjes su spobs// nga di bya ngan 'das gyur phyi ma'i tshe// dpe pa'i chos ni rnam par 'jig pa na// dge slong bu stegs blol brtson pa dag/ de dag nga yi zhi pa'i chos
3357(): lam spong // khengs shing rgod la gtum zhing spyi rtol che// sdig pa'i grogs po'i zas la chags pa dag/ chos gos lhung zed dag la chags shing brkab// rnyed la gnas
3358(): shing de dag chos lam spong // yid gtum zhe sdang ldan zhing byas pi gzo// dman pa'i rigs dang dbul po'i rigs las ni// da ni bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas// de dag
3359(): zhi ba'i chos 'di spong bar byed// bdud dang 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// zil nor stong pa zhi ba'i chos mi 'dod// dge slong dge slong ma dang khyim pa rnams// sdig
3360(): pa'i blo yis 'dzin bcug rmongs byas te// de dag dbang du rtag par song gyur pa// phyi ma'i dus las byang chub spong bar byed// nga yi tshig 'di gzhod dus
3361(): thos ngas su// dge slong dgon pa bdag rtag tu bstod// su dag stong pazhi la dga' ba yis// rgyal ba'i chos 'di legs par bzung ba yin// su dag ting 'jid 'don
3362(): 'dzin gyur pa// de dag nga yi bstan la rab byung zhing // dge slong bsnyen rdzogs gso sbyong las rnams byas// zas la mi brkam mi chags zab yin// lus dang srog la lta ba
3363(): rab spong la// stong pa shin tu zhi ba bsgom par gyis// brtson zhing rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis kyang // ri dgas bzhin du dgod par gnas par gyis// zhes gsungs so// /
3364(): de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam gtan bskyed pa la'ang sbyar bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
3365(): bsngags pa dang rim gro ba skyed de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// dge slong snyan pa'i 'od kyi skyes pa'i rabs te bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// // skyes
3366(): bu dam pa rnams ni las kyi rnam par smin pa sngon du byas shing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad la chags pa med par bsam gtan sgrub pa la brtson zhing / sems can du ma dag kyang
3367(): yon tan gyi gnas thob pa la 'god par byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngod byung ba 'das pa'i dus na yul bA rat+na si zhes bya bar rgyal po tshangs byi zhes bya ba byung ste/
3368(): de'i yul shin tu 'byor zhing rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang chom rkun rnams med cing yul 'khor thams cad
3369(): shin tu bde bar gyur pa/ rgyal po'i bka' khrims bzang po bsgrags shing skye bo rnams kyis ma spang ba/ bkra shis kyi khyad par du ma dang ldan pa byung ngo // sa bdag 'byor pa'i
3370(): dpal 'byor rgya che zhing // mtshon gyi chad pa med cing bde bar gnas// de yis skye dgu yongs su bsrung gyur cing // ma lus sa rnams kur la dbang byed kyang // gang na
3371(): 'jig rten rigs rgyud kyis dben pa// de yi rgyal srid mdzes pa med gyur te// dus tshigs bab pa'i gsal byed dub pa na// gnam sa'i bye brag mdzes pa med pa bzhin//
3372(): de ltar rgyal po de'i longs spyod kyi khyad par gzhan phul du byung du zin kyang bu med par gyur nas/ des rig byed kyi thabs dang srid sgrub pa'i bya ba la brtson zhing 'jig rten gyi lha thams
