3795(): gdong la phyogs che ge mo zhig na shing lo ma skam skams pa zhig mchis pa de la khwa zhig mchis te/ de'i mchid nas shing lo ma sngo zhing snum pa gzhan dag mchis bzhin du/ de la bdag dga' bar mi 'gyur gyis/
3796(): 'di la bdag mchis na/ bde ba ci las gyur ces gyis shig/ de rnams chas pa las ri dgas zhig gis dbyug gu can mthong nas/ des smras pa/ dbyug gu can gang du 'gro/ kho bo ni gang du'ang mi 'gro
3797(): na/ 'di dag gis kho bo khrid do// gang du/ me long gdong gi drung du'o// kho bo'i 'phrin yang khyer la gnas dag na bsing ma dang / rtswa sngon po dag mchis bzhin du bdag de dag la ma dad pa la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes
3798(): gyis shig/ de rnams chas pa dang / ji tsam na sreg pa zhig gis mthong nas smras pa/ gang du 'dong zhes bya ba nas/ 'on kho bo'i 'phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bdag phyogs gcig
3799(): tu ni sreg pa'i skad 'byin la/ phyogs gzhan du ni skad gzhan 'byin pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig mches zhes gyis shig/ phyogs gzhan zhig na sbrul zhig gis mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/ 'on khro bo'i 'phrin yang
3800(): khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bdag phugs nas ni bde bar 'byung la slar ni sdug bsngal gyis 'jug pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig/ yang sbrul zhig dang ni'u le gnyis pa na/
3801(): tshun mi mthun zhing 'thab par byed pa zhes bya ba nas 'o na bdag cag gi 'phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bdag cag nyin par cig gis cig mthong nas 'thab mo bgyid cing dga' bar mi
3802(): 'gyur ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig/ yang bag gsar gzhon nu ma zhig gis zhes bya ba nas/ des smras pa/ 'o na bdag cag gi 'phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste
3803(): gang gi tshe bdag pa'i khyim na mchis pa de'i tshe ri gyos po'i khyim 'tshal la/ gang gi tshe gyos po'i khyim na mchis pa de'i tshe ba'i khyim 'tshal ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig bgyis shig/ 'dir gzhan dag gis smras pa
3804(): kye ma rnam pa du ma yi// spyod pa bag med dbang gyur pas// nyes pa dag dang phrad par gyur// 'di ni 'jig rten nyams pa yin// gang na nyes pa brgya phrag gis dkrugs la// 'jig rten 'dir ni 'jig rten
3805(): gsal ston pa// sa bdog dpal ldan rnams kyis zin gyur na// nyes pa'i mur pa sel byed zla 'od bzhin// yang dag spyod pa gsal byed rab rib 'joms// kye ho dam pa rnams ni bla na med// de rnams rgyal
3806(): po me long gdong ga la bder dong ste phyin nas/ dbyug gu can gyis rgyal po la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// gzhan dag gis kyang rkang pa gnyis la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te 'khod
3807(): pa dang rgyal pos dbyug gu can la dris pa / khyod cil 'ongs lha bdag ni khrid do// ci zhig gi phyir dbyug gu can gyis khyim bdag dang ci zhig las rtsod pa de smras so// rgyal pos khyim bdag /
3808(): la dris pa/ khyod kyis glang mthong ngas/ mthong lags so// dbyug gru can khyod kyis glang lugs su bskrad dam/ sku bslad lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang ga
3809(): phyir go bar ma byas pas dbyug gu can 'di yi lce chod cig/ gang gi phyir 'di'ang mthong bzhin du glang ma btags pas mig phyung zhig/ khyim bdag gis smras pa/ rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi
3810(): glang stor/ rnam pa gnyis su bdag gi mig phyung ba bas dbyug gu can rgyal zhing nyes pa med par gsol lo// yang mi gcig gis spras pa/ lha dbyug gu can 'dis bdag gis rta rgod ma zhig bkum mo//
3811(): ci ltar bsad/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi phyir ji ltar nus pa de bzhin khog cig smras pas mi 'di yi lce chod cig/ gang gi phyir rdo bas mi bsnun par gzhan gyis dgag par
3812(): mi byed pa dbyug gu can 'di'i 'ang lag pa chod cig ces smras pas/ mi des smras pa rnam pa gcig tu bdag go rta rgod ma bkum/ rnam pa gnyis su bdag gi skye gcod pa bas/ dbyug gu can
3813(): rgyal zhing nyes pa med par gsol lo// yang thag pa'i chung mas rgyas par smras pa dang rgyal po smras pa/ 'di nyid khyod kyi khyim thabs tu khyer cig/ des smras pa/ rnam pa gcig tu ni bdag gi khyim
3814(): thab bkum/ rnam pa gnyis su 'di khyim thab tu gyur pa bas dbyug gu can rgyal zhing nyes pa med par gsol lo// yang shing mkhan gyis rgyas par smras pa/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi phyir ste'u chu'i dbus
3815(): su bor nas tshig smras pa shing mkhan 'di'i lce chod cig/ dbyug gu can 'di'ang chu'i gting zab par mthong bzhin du shing mkhan la 'dri bas mig phyung zhig shing mkhan gyis spras pa/ gcig tu bdag gi ste'u rus
3816(): khyer gnyis su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas dbyug gu can rgyal zhing nyes pa med par gsol lo// yang chang 'tshong mas rgyas par smras pa/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'dis bu thams cad kyi thams cad
3817(): gos kyis g.yogs nas bskal pa chang 'tshong ma 'di yi lag pa chod cig/ dbyug gu can yang ma brtags par gzhan gyi stan la sa pas 'di'i mig phyung zhig/ des smras pa/ rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi bu bkum/ rnam pa gnyis su bdag
3818(): gi lag pa bcad pa bas dbyug gu can rgyal zhing nyes pa med par gsol lo// dbyug gu can gyis khwa'i 'phrin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ dbyug gu can khwa de la khyod phyogs de na ri bor zhig yod pa'i grong
3819(): gi bdag por gyur pa na shing skam po de'i drung na gter yod kyi de 'ga' zhig la byin te song zhig dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgos shig/ yang ri dgas kyi 'phrin smras pa/ khyod kyis ri dgas de la ri dgas khyod
3820(): de na yod nal gag nas sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag ste/ de zags pas rtswa dang ne'u sing mngar por gyur pa la khyod za za ba la sbrang ma de song zin gyi sa ro la chags par ma byed cig tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal du
3821(): gyur ta re zhes smros shig/ yang sreg pa'i 'phrin smras pa dang / rgyal po smras pa gang du sreg pa'i skad 'byin pa'i phyogs de na gter med kyi/ gang du skad gzhan du 'byin sa de na yod pas khyod kyis gter
3822(): 'ga' zhig la ston la tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur na mi rung gis gzhan du song zhig ces bsgos shig/ yang des sbrul dang ne'u le'i 'phrin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/
3823(): de gnyis la khyed cag mir gyur pa na spun gnyis zhig tu skyes te/ de la cig gis smras pa nor bgo'o// cig shos ser snas zil gyis non pas ma bgos so// de la cig ni lhag par chags pas sbrul du skyes so//
3824(): cig shos kyang nor la then te lhag par chags par byas pas ne'u ler skyes so// de bas na khyed cag gis nor de dag dge sbyong ngam bram ze dag la byin la gnas de bor dang bde bar 'gyur ro// zhes bsgos shog/ yang sgrug
3825(): gyi 'phrin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis sbrul de la khyod ltogs shing nyams chung bar gyur pas ni phu go nas phyir 'byung la/ kha zas phal mo che zos nas ni sdug bsngal bas phug tu 'jug pa yin
3826(): gyis/ khyod kyis kha zas la ji tsam du spyad pas tshod zin par byas na khyod bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgos shig/ yang bag gsar gzhin nu'i 'phrin smras pa dang / rgyal pos spras pa/ khyod kyis bag gsar gzhon
3827(): nu ma de la khyod kyi pha'i khyim na 'grogs pa shes shig gnas te/ gang gi tshe khyod gyos po'i khyim na 'dug pa de'i tshe ni 'grogs bshes de 'dod do// gang gi tshe ba'i khyim na 'dug pa de'i tshe ni khyim thab de 'dod de/
3828(): de bas na khyod tshul bzhin ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur na mi rung gis gnas gcig thong la gcig legs par byos shig ces smros shig ces rjes su bstan to// blo ldan rnams kyi shes rab stobs/
3829(): gzhan la phan par byed pa gang // rnam par dpyad pa'i mthu cung zad// snying rje'i sems kyis ston pa yang // legs par bstan pa nyid 'gyur te// phal pa rnams la mngon sum du// bstan kyang de ltar rtogs/
3830(): mi 'gyur// de bas blo ldan mtshungs med do// de nas bud med de dang sbrul gyis ni rgyal pos ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du rjes su sgrub po// sbrul dang ne'u le dang khras ni nor de dag dbyug gu can la byin no// lhag
3831(): ma rnams kyang rgyal pos bstan pa de nyid kyis rtsod pa dang sems 'khrug pa med par gyur te thams cad kyang bde bar gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ e ma ho// lha la 'di lta bu'i
3832(): spobs pa mnga' ba ltar/ gang na blo ldan rgyal po khyod bzhugs pa// kye ho 'bangs rnams mchog tu skal ba bzang // shes rab mthu yis 'jig rten gsal ston cing // drag shul las kyi spod pa
3833(): rnams spangs kyang / chos dang mthun pa'i bka' khrims bzang po yis// mngon mtho'i lam la 'bangs rnams khrid mdzad de// nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu mngon gtod pa'i// so bdag
3834(): khyod kyis mgon byas dpal dang ldan// e ma'o blo che e ma'o mchog tu zab// lha yi lha mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar rgyal me long gdong skye dgu rnams nye bar skyong ba la/ dus gzhan zhig
3835(): gi tshe skye dgu rnams kyi las kyi nyes pa 'am/ lha dang klu char 'bebs pa rnams bag med pa'i dbang gis lo bcu gnyis su mu ge chen po byung bar gyur to// de tshe skye 'gro phal cher rnams// bkres pas
3836(): nyams thag gnas gyur te// mya ngan smre sngags 'khrug par gyur// phongs pa'i 'jig rten nyams thag rnams// sa bdag snying rje'i rang bzhin gyis// mthong bas de bas sdug
3837(): bsngal gyur// de nas de yis blon po'i tshogs la smras// de dag gus pas rgyal po'i bka' bzhin du// gang na skye bo 'du bar rung ba yi// sa phyogs rnams su sbyin pa'i bkad sa brtsigs// phongs
3838(): pa'i rdzing dang 'dra ba der bshams nas// snyan pa'i sgra yis phyogs rnams thams cad du// su dag gos dang rin chen bza' btung nor// 'dod pa de dag tshul bzhon longs spyod ces// phyogs bcur//
3839(): lha yi rnga sgra bzhin du sgrogs// de yis phongs pa'i skye bo yid drangs nas// pad+ma'i mtsho 'gram glang po lhags pa bzhin// snying rje'i sprin las legs par 'thon gyur pa'i// sbyin pa'i char rnams phyogs
3840(): bcur phab pa las// phongs pa'i blo yi lteng ka rab gang ste// dbul bas gdungs pa'i gzhi rnams brlan gyur pas// 'gro rnams dga' ba'i myu gul 'bus shing // gdong gi chu skyis 'dzum zhing dgod pa
3841(): bzhin grags pa'i dri bsung phyogs bcur rgyas gyur pa// ma lus sa 'dir bkram pa bzhin du gyur// de ltar rgyal po des sems can thams cad la bza' ba dang btung pa la sogs pa ci dang ci 'dod pa'i
3842(): sbyin pa chen po byas pa de nyid kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas yid dgu par gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs rnams la don 'di'ang smras so// blo ldan chos dang mthun pa yis// nor la chags par mi byaste/
3843(): tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yi// yon gnas la ni yongs su 'bul// dge sbyong bram ze nges pa dang // phongs pa legs par tshim byas na// shes rab can de lus zhig nas// lha yi nang du skye bar/
3844(): 'gyur/ mkhas pas de ltar shes byas nas// dad ldan chags pa med sems kyis// yon gnas rnams la sbyin pa ni// rgya chen rab tu btang bar bya// zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang dag par bstan
3845(): pas skye dgu dpag tu med pa thams cad gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi don rgya chen po la yongs su sbyong bar mdzad do// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas 'jig rten thams
3846(): cad la phan pa'i shes rab kyi mthu thob par bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par dag pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa rnams ni sems can la phan par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro zhes kyang sbyar
3847(): bar bya'o// me long gdong gi skyes pa'i rabs te lnga bcu lnga pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab chen pos gzhan la phan par mdzad
3848(): cing byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus nas chen po skyong bar byed pa'i rgyal po phyogs bdag ces bya ba byung ste/ de la bu rdul phran zhes
3849(): bya ba zhig kyang byung ngo // rgyal po de'i mdun na 'don bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu gnag lhas skyes zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de la'ang bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes bya ba mkhas pa yid gzhungs pa/ gzhung dang /
3850(): mthun par spyad pa'i shes rab can skye bo thams cad kyi yid bzhin du mgu bar byed pa zhig kyang byung ste/ bram ze gnag lngas skyes kyang bya ba gang byed pa gzhon nu de la dris shing byed par gyur to//
3851(): gzhan la phan par 'dod pa'i dam pa dag/ shes rab mthu los lhag par gsal gyur cing // 'gro ba pad+ma'i tshogs kyi gnyer gyur pas// tsha zer byed pa'i dkyil 'khor dri med bzhin// de'i tshe rgyal po phyogs
3852(): bdag bram ze gnag lhas skyes dang shin tu yid mthun par gyur pas bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa thams cad 'dri zhing rnam pa de dang de dag gis dga' bar byed do// de nas dus re shig bram ze de shi bar gyur pa las rgyal
3853(): po chen po de shin tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te/ mya ngan byed pa la zhugs par gyur to// de ltar mya ngan byed pa rgyal po'i bu rdul phran gyis mthong nas/ yab ci'i phyir thugs mi dgyes par mdzad ces
3854(): gsol to// rgyal pos smras pa/ kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes// mkhas pa'i bdag nyid rgyal srid mkhas// de ni shi bar gyur pa yis// bdag gi rgyal srid nyams pa bzhin// rdul phran gyis gsol pa/
3855(): yab de ltar thugs zhum ci 'tshal/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyi bu khye'u me gso zhes bgyi ba mkhas shing gsal ba/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes nyid kyang bya ba thams cad rung ba dang mi rung ba de la dris shing
3856(): byed pa de lta bu yod bzhin du lha ci'i slad du de dbang bskur bar mi mdzad/ de skad ces smras pa thos nas rgyal po shin tu dga' zhing bram ze'i khye'u bkug nas bram ze chen po khyod deng phyin chad ngas khyod kyi pha
3857(): ba nAg lhas skyes kyi las thabs su bcug go// bram ze des kyang lha bka' bzhin du 'tshal zhes bdag gis pas ji ltar byed pa'i bya ba thams cad rgyal po de'i yid bzhin du bsgrub par byed do// ring du
3858(): gzigs shing 'jig rten pan byed pa// de dag 'jig rten skyong pa'i tshul la mkhas// lha rnams yid kyang mgu bar byed 'gyur bar// 'jig rten rnams la gsal bar ston par byed// de nas dus gzhan
3859(): zhig gi tshe rgyal po de'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i rgyal rigs kyi bu drug la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag/ khyed rnams gzhon nu rdul phran gang na ba der dengs la rgyal ba dang tshe spel bar byos la
3860(): 'di skad ces smos shig/ ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde ba bzhin bdag cag kyang bde zhing ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na de bzhin du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rig drug po ni rdul phran khyod kyi brog po dang /
3861(): snying du sdug pa dang ne'u ldang yin gyis/ rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'das nasas kyi srid ci bang phyug la bzhag nas ci nas kyang bdag cag la lo dro spyod dag las lodro spyod kyi bgo bga' mdzod cig ces kyis shig/ mkhan po bka'
3862(): bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gis rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu rdul phran skyes gang na ba der song ste shis pa brjod nas snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du gsol ba byas so// gzhon nu rdul phran yang shin tu
3863(): dga' bar gyur te de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po phyogs bdag shi bar gyur te gzhon nu rdul phran rgyal srid la bzhag cing dbang bskur ro// ji lta ji ltar gong du 'phags pa
3864(): dag 'de lta de ltar ming gi khyad par yang // gong nas gong du bstod cing bsngags 'gyur te// de yis de yi khyad par gsal ba yin// de'i tshe gzhon nu rdul phran dang bram ze'i khye'u me gso
3865(): zhes bya ba'i ming de gnyis nub nas/ rgyal po chen po rdul phran zhes bya ba dang / bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal pos bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/ mkhan po khyod
3866(): kyis bdag gi pha la rjes su bstan pa de ltar bdag la'ang rjes su bstan cing rgyal srid legs par skyong ba'i bya ba bgyis shig/ bram ze kyang lha de bzhin du 'tshal zhes mnyan nas sa thams cad du bde bar 'gyur/
3867(): ba'i thabs bsams pa/ gang gis mi dbang rgyal srid rab brtan par// mthun pa'i dbang gis sa stangs gsal 'gyur te// gangs kyi ril zla 'od shar ba bzhin// mdzes shing dkar ba 'di ni chos nyid yin//
3868(): gang nas bdag dpal 'byor lus rgyas kyang // yan lag bcad pa'i glang chen theg pa bzhin// dpal las nyams shing sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pas// skye bo rnams kyis smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// de bas
3869(): nad ni dus la bab po snyam ste rgyal rigs drug po pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed rnams deng la rgyal po chen po rdul phran la shis pa brjod la sa'i bdag po bdag cag gis gsol ba btab pa
3870(): dgongs sam zhes smos shig/ gal te dran no zhes zer na lha nga ni de'i dus la bab po zhes smos shig/ 'on te 'di skad ces/ sa chen po nang yangs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'god pa/
3871(): su zhig yod nas zer na/ lha gnag lhas skyes ma lags pa gzhan ma mchis so zhes smos shig/ de nas rgyal rigs drug po de rnams kun// dga' bzhi nas bdag rdul phran spyan sngar song / rgyal
3872(): bar gyur ces shis pa'i gsang bstod nas// gleng pa'i skabs la bab tshe 'di skad gsol// sa bdag gzhon nur gyur pa'i dus// bdag cag rnams kyis gang gsol pa// mi dbang thugs la dgongs lags
3873(): sam/ de yi dus ni da lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ de lta bu de shin tu'ang dran na/ sa chen po nang yangs la phyi shing rta ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'god shes pa su zhig yod/ de rnams kyis
3874(): gsol pa rnga lha gnag lhas skyes ma yin pa su'ang ma mchis so// de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis bram ze chen po de bkug ste/ mkhan po khyod kyis sa chen po 'di cha bdun du 'god nus sam
3875(): lha legs par dro thog go// 'o na khyod kyis de ltar byos shig/ de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis de dag gis yid dang rjes su mthun par sa chen po 'di cha bdun du byas par gyur te/
3876(): gang na rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer dang // khor yug de dag ris su bcad byas shing // gzhon dang gzhan gyi yid dang mthun pa yi// yul 'khor de dang de la de dag bkod// de ltar rgyal po
3877(): rgyal phran drug bcas pa// so so'i yid bzhin babs pas dga' gyur te// de rnams blo gros phyogs gcig mthun par yang // bram ze 'dis ni bdag gi yid bzhin du// stsal bar
3878(): mdzad snyam de la dga' ba skyes// de nas rgyal po rdul phran dang // rgyal rigs drug po de rnams kun// de la dga' bas ched du brjod// legs so ston pa bla na med//
3879(): khyod ni shin tu mkhas pa lags// ji ltar sa bdag rjes ston par// de bzhin mnyam par gzigs su gsol// de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis/ de ltar rgyal rigs chen po bdun
3880(): dang / gzhan bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo dang / bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang / sgyu stsal gyi gnas la slob pa thams cad la rjes su bstan cing thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan/
3881(): par gyur to// phar sems ldan zhing lhag pa'i bsam pa can// 'gro ba'i bla ma bzhin du rjes ston pa// de yi shes rab lhag par gsal ba'i mthus// sa chen rgya mtsho'i gos gyon mdzes
3882(): pa 'di// mtshon gyi 'khrug pa med cing bder gnas pa// lha yi gnas la 'gran pa bzhin gyur te// dga' ba'i yul gyis rgyal po'i skye bo rnams// bram ze de la ched du bstod par byed//
3883(): sa bdag chen po rdul phran yang // 'di ni bdag cag bla ma zhes/ bram ze de la mchod gyur na// phal pas smos kyang ci zhig dgos// rgyal rigs drug po de rnams kun// bdag
3884(): cag bsod nams dpal 'di ni// bram ze 'di yi mthu yin zhes// de la lha bzhin bkur 'gyur// bram ze rnams dang skye bo la// 'dis ni tshangs pa'i sa thob ces/ 'jig
3885(): rten kun tu sgrogs byed cing // gdong bzhi pa ltar bkur bar gyur// de yi zhal gyi zla ba las// 'phros pa'i legs bshad 'od zer gyis// phog pas snying gi ku mud// rang dbang med
3886(): par kha bye zhing // bstod pa'i tshig gi ze 'bru dag/ langs shing kun nas g.yo ba 'dra// de ltar skye bo kun gyis bsngags gyur cing // bkur ba mthong nas bram ze chen po de// 'gro 'di
3887(): bdag la re ba char gyur zhes// bskul ba bzhin du lhag par ngo mtshar gyur// e ma'o// skye bo 'di rnams yon tan gyi gnas cung zad tsam la chen por mthong ba ni ma legs te/ bdag gis ni
3888(): tshangs pa ma thob kyang 'di rnams kyis na tshangs pa'o snyam du shes na rig byed kyi gzhung lugs las dbyar zla ba bzhi dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan la gnas na de'i drung du tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes
3889(): thos kyis/ ci nas kyang bdag gis 'di bsgrub par bya'o snyam du bsams te/ rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / khyim dag de dag la bdag ni dbyar zla ba bzhi dben par gnas par 'dod do ces legs
3890(): par go bar byas te/ grong khyer chen po de'i shar phyogs su khang bzangs shig brtsigs nas/ skye bo rnams kyi rgyun lugs med par shin tu dben par byas te dbyar zla ba bzhir tshad med pa bzhi
3891(): la mnyam par bzhag go// de zla ba bzhi 'das nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis ni rig byed las bshad pa bzhin du dbyar zla ba bzhir snying rje chen po la mnyam par bzhag kyang tshangs
3892(): pa mi mjed kyi bdag po mdun du ma 'ongs so snyam mo// de ma thag tu sems kyi rtogs pa de mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas rig nas skad cig de nyid la skyes bu lag pa brkyad pa
3893(): 'am bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa chen po de bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyi drung du 'ongs te/ bdag gis khang bzangs thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab pa mthong ste bltas pa na mi mjed kyi bdag po lha'i
3894(): gzugs rmad du byung ba dri ma med pa'i dpal gyis mdzes pa de mthong nas tshogs su bcad de smras pa 'di 'dra ba yi kha dog ni// bdag gis sngaran chad ma mthong na// gzugs bzang
3895(): kha dog ldan pa yi// grogs po khyod ni su zhig yin// tshangs pas smras pa/ gang la lhar bcas tshangs ris dang // de bzhin du ni gzhan dag gis// gzhon nu rab shes de lta bur//
3896(): gnag lhas skyes kyi sa shes byos// de skad thos nas yid la dga' ba skyes te bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis gus pa dang bcas pas mi mjed kyi bdag po'i drung du btud de gsol pa/ tshangs
3897(): pa khyod la 'dud gyur cing // bkur sti yang ni bgyid lags kyis// bdag gi tshig rnams kasan mdzod la// myur du gnang bar mdzad du gsol// tshangs pas spras pa/ bram ze chen po
3898(): khyod nyid kyis// smras pa'i tshig de gzung bar bya// tshe 'di'i don de gang yin dang // phyi ma'i don ni gang yin pa// yid la bsams pa de dag ni// bram ze la dris shig dang // dris pa de
3899(): dang de dag ni// nga yis khyod la gtan la dbab// bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du bsams te/ re zhig bdag gis mthong ba'i chos kyi don gyis thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag
3900(): gis thob kyi sa ma la bdag gis tshe phyi ma'i don la brtsams te dri bar bya'o snyam nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blo la bsams pa'i yid gnyis the tshom dag/ tshangs pa kun dge gzhon
3901(): nul 'dri ba// gang du gnas shing gang du bslab byas na// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mi 'chi thob par 'gyur// tshangs pas smras pa bram ze mi nang du'o snyam spangs shing // gcig pur gyur/
3902(): pa snying rjer mos pa dang // dri nga med cing 'khrig las chags bral ba// 'di la gnas shing 'di nyid la bslabs na// mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dri med 'thob// khro dang rdzun dang 'khon dang
3903(): rnam 'tshe dang // 'jungs dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal mi bzod dang // chags dang zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang // phrag dog ser sna dag dang 'tshig pa ste// de dag bram ze mi nang dri nga yin//
3904(): 'jig rten kun la dogs kyis 'bab chu ltar// de yis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can// tshangs pa thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes so// de skad ces smras pa thos nas 'di snyam du gyur te/
3905(): tshangs pas bshad pa'i don de bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas tshangs pa chen po sa bram ze'i sems kyi rtog pa de shes nas smras pa
3906(): legs so mkhas shing rigs pa khyod// tshangs pa'i gnas pa thob bya'i phyir// 'di la 'bad pa brtan pa bgyis// chos 'di dag pa g.yung drung yin// zhes brjod
3907(): nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes rgyal po chen po rdul phran gyi drung du song ste gsol pa/ sa bdag rgyal chen rdul phran khyod// bdag gi tshig ni gsan par
3908(): mdzod/ gnag lhas skyes bdag mi spro yis// rgyal srid bde bar bskyang du gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyi 'dod pa mi chog pa// yod na de yang khyod la bskrang // khyod la
3909(): 'tshe ba de bsad kyis// gnog lhas skyes kyis bdag ma spang // slar gsol pa/ rgyal po bdag 'dod mi chog min// bdag la 'tshe ba'ang ma mchis te// mi ma yin pa'i tshig thos nas//
3910(): khyim du gnas par bdag mi spro// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang las thos nas bram ze khyod// 'dir ni bdag dang 'dab spong ba// mi ma yin pa de ci 'dra// dris pa 'di ni bdag la smros// bram
3911(): ze gsol pa/ snying rje chen po'i gnas pa yis// dben par bsam gtan byed pa na// de tshe tshangs pa mdun du 'ongs// tha dad phyogs ni snang bar byas// bdag gis de yi tshig thos nas//
3912(): khyim gyi 'dod pa mi spro'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ bram ze gang du 'gro ba der/ kho bo yang ni 'gro bya zhing // khyod kyi nyan thos 'gyur bar bgyi// gnag lhas skyes khyod ston pa mdzod/
3913(): gang la so so'i skye bo rnams// chags pa'i 'dod pa de dag spongs// 'dod pa rnams la mi lta zhing // bden pa'i chos la gnas par mdzod// tshangs par skye bar bgyid slad du/ no/
3914(): bu dag pa bai DUr+ya// ji ltar ma bcos dri med lta'i// tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi// mkhan po de'i dus la bab pa mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas bram ze gnog lhas skyes kyis rgyal rig
3915(): drug la smras pa bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod na shes ldan dag ci byed/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ mkhan po lo bdun gzhes shig dang / bdag cag gi bu rnams rgyal srid
3916(): la bskos nas mkhan po'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo // bram zes smras pa 'dod pa rnams ni chags pa'i gnas su gyur// longs spyod rnams kyis myos shing cho ga mi shes// 'chi ba'i
3917(): dus kyang shes pa ma yin na// su zhig la bdun tshad kyang sbyin par byed// lo bdun 'das kyang ci byed gtol med pas// re shig bdag nyid rab tu 'byung bar bya// de dag gis gsol pa/
3918(): mkhan po yang gsung ba mad ni/ re shig gzhes shig dang bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas bram zes gzhan bram ze rnams dang / khyim bdag dang / bdag nyid kyi yon tan gyi rjes
3919(): su 'brang ba rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ba ga yod par byos la/ sdig pa'i chos rnams spang zhing dge ba'i gnas la brten par gyis shig/ bdag ni rab tu byung ngo // de rnams
3920(): kyis gsol pa/ bdag cag rnams kyis gang shes pa'i// yon tan cung zad ldan pa yang // khyed kyis rjes su bstan pa lags// gang na mkhan po khyod nyid kyis/
3921(): rmad du byung ba gzigs pa bzhin// bdag cag rnams kyang spyad par bgyi// bram zes smras pa// skye bo phal mo che dag 'jig rten gyi bde ba la zhen pas/ khyim gyi gnas spang bar ma nus su dogs
3922(): mod de bas na ci dgar zad do// de nas bram ze chen po gnago lhas skyes 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad spangs te/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung zhing dka' thub kyi nags su song ste
3923(): de'i ming yang ston pa chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes grags so// bram ze de yis rab tu byung ba'i tshe// sa bdag rgyal phran bcas pa de dag dang // bram ze bdun dang khyim bdag chen po bdun// de yi bzang
3924(): me bzhi bcu tham pa dang // bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya rnams dang ni// dang ldan skye bo brgya phrag du ma rnams// khyim gyi bde ba spangs nas rab tu byung // de ltar ston pa chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ste bsam
3925(): gtan dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su tshad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam por bzhag pas yon tan dpag tu med pa thob cing / 'khor de dag la'ang ji ltar 'os pa'i gdams pa rjes su bstan pas thams
3926(): cad kyang tshangs pa la bkod nas 'gro ba dpag tu med pa'i don byas so// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas shes rab dang snying rje chen po'i mthu thogs pa med pa bskyed na gzhan
3927(): gyi don du 'gyur ro zhes shes rab kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// bram ze'i skyes pa'i rabs te lnga bcu drug pa'o//
3928(): skyes bu dam pa rnams ni rang gi blo gros lhag par gsal bas gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa'i shes rab kyi mthu thob par 'gyur ro// de yang
3929(): 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol du sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du 'dzam bu'i gling chen po byung ste/ chu zheng du dpag tshad drug khri bar kun tu mnyam zhing gru bzhi pa shin tu
3930(): mdzes shing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ shing ljon pa rnam pa du mas mdzes par byas pa/ grong khyer gyi tshogs du mas kun tu phye ba/ longs spyod kyi rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa me tog gi rigs
3931(): dpag tu med pa skyes pa/ lha rnams kyi gnas la 'gran du rung ba byung ngo // de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khrid par mdzad pa ces bya ba byung ste/ de'i dus nas chen
3932(): po skyong bar byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba bu stong dang ldan pa byung ngo // 'dzam gling dpal ldan dpal gyi 'byor pa der// mi dbang chos ldan chos kyi rgyal po byung // tshul bzhin spyod pas spyod pa
3933(): rmang byung gyur// rang bzhin dul bas dul ba'i lam la brten// dri ma med pa dang pa'i rgya mtsho bzhin// yon tan rgyu skar dpal gyis lam mer mdzes// skye bo kun don byed de btung chu
3934(): bzhin 'phan byed yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur// de'i tshe rgyal po de'i bu thu bo gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/
3935(): dge ba'i rtsa ba mthu che ba yongs su bsgrags pa skye bo thams cad kyi blta ba'i 'os su gyur pa zhig byung ste/ de ni dag cing dpal dang ldan// rigs dang gzugs kyi yon tan rnams/
3936(): de la phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin// rang gi mthu yis gsal bar gyur// khyad par du'ang yongs su sbyangs pa'i mthus// shes rab stobs kyis 'jig rten phan par brtson// gcig
3937(): tu bag yod chos kyi mthu ldan pas// shes bya'i yul rnams de dang lhan cig bzhin// 'od zer can gyis sa stengs bab pa na// dngos po kun tu gsal bar byed pa 'dra// de lta bu'i gzhon/
3938(): nu de chos rnams kyi rang bzhin dngos po rnams rtogs pa'i dbang gis rnam pa thams cad gsal bar byed pa rtul po de'i mngon du gyur te/ de nas rgyal po rgyal ba'i sdes// gzhon nu'i blon rtog/
3939(): bya'i phyir// blo gros shin tu zab de la// re shig cig ni 'di skad smras// gzhon nu khyod kyi bya ba ci zhig yod pa de ni zhig bstan par bya ba'i rigs so// gzhon nus smras pa
3940(): yab gal te bdag la thugs dpag par mdzad na dge sbyong dang bram ze mang du thos pa rnams bsdur gsol/ gang gi chos kyi 'i tshom rnams yongs su bgros nas the tshom de dag padag gis gcod par rjes
3941(): lags so// de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros kyi tshig de thos nas/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni dge slong dang bram ze mkhas pa blo gros dang ldan zhing spyod pa nyams pa de dag rgyal
3942(): po'i skyed mos tshal du bsdus te/ de rnams la ji ltar 'os pa'i bkur sti byas nas/ gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros skyed mos tshal der song ste/ dge slong dang bram ze mkhas pa rnams dpan cig tu dam
3943(): pa'i chos bgro bar byed par 'dod nas/ snyan pa'i ngag gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten na ni 'gro ba li// gnod chen byed pa gang zhig lags// de nyid gsal bar ston mdzad gang //
3944(): blo gros ldan rnams gsung par gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze de rnams so so'i blo gros kyi mthu ci ltar yod pa gsal bar ston par byed de/ de la la la ngag 'di skad
3945(): du rnga 'jig rten du longs spyod kyis dbul bar gyur pa ni gnod par byed pa ste/ phongs pa 'di ni 'jig rten gnod pa ste// dbul bas nyen pa'i 'gro ba de dag ni// longs spyod ldan la re zhing brten par
3946(): byed// khyi bzhin 'jig rten smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// zhes zer ro// yang gzhan dag na re 'jig rten na brnyas pa'i yul du gyur pa ni gnod de/ dman pa zhum zhing ngo 'dzum nag gyur cing //
3947(): gzhan dag dbang dang ldan la brten par byed// de yi smad pa'ang dang du len gyur cing // mi bzod bzhin du mya ngan byed par 'gyur// zhes so// yang kha cig na re/ gang dag glan par gyur pa 'di
3948(): ni mi rnams la gnod par byed pa'i mchog tu gyur pa lags te/ blo dang mi ldan 'jig rten na munu ba bzhin du gnas par 'gyur/ blo ldan bde bar 'tsho byed cing /
3949(): gzhan gyi bsnyas pa'ang ring du spong / mkhas pa'i bdag nyid gnyis ka la// phan par byed pa nyid 'gyur ro// zhes so// yang kha cig na re/ 'jig rten na mdza' ba shes dang bral ba ni
3950(): gnod par 'gyur te/ gang dag mdza' bshes ldan pa'i mi// dpa' bo bzhin du stobs ldan 'gyur// bya dang bya min spyod pa rnams// gsal bar 'jig rten slob dpon bzhin// zhes
3951(): ston par byed do// de bzhin du bzo'i las la mngon par zhen pa kha cig 'di skad du/ bzo yi yon tan gnas la rmongs gyur pa// de ni 'jig rten mkhas pa'i grags mi 'thob/
3952(): blo ldan 'jig rten bzo yi gnas sbyangs pas// gzhan gyis rgyal po bzhin du bkur bar 'gyur// zhes so// rgyal po la brten pa dag ni 'di skad du/ rgyal srid nyams pas 'jig rten
3953(): gnod gyur te// srid kyi dpal rten thams cad bde bar gnas// de bas mi yi yon tan rten gyur pa// sa bdag chos bzhin bde bar gnas pa yin// zhes zer ro// khyim gyis
3954(): gnas la dga' ba rnams ni 'di skad du/ bdag nyid g.yem dang chung ma ma bsrungs na// 'di ni 'jig rten gnod par byed rgyu ste// khyim gyi nyes pa phung khrol bskyed 'gyur zhing // lus
3955(): dang sems la gdung ba byed pa yin// zhes so// gzhan dag na re/ longs spyod kyis chog mi shes shing ma byin par len pa ni 'jig rten na gnod pa yin te/ chog mi shes shing 'jig rten dun
3956(): ma rnams skye bo rnams la gab cing lam min 'gro// bsad dang bcing dang brdeg pa'i gzhir gyur cing // gzhan gyis smad cing 'dor ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de bzhin du la la dag na re drin du mi
3957(): gzo ba ni rang gzhan la gnod de/ byas pa mi gzo dag gi las lam ldan// 'di ni 'jig rten gnod byed mchog yin te// khrel med gzhan gyis smad pa'i gnas gyur pa// grogs byed ngom bsad mi yis
3958(): smad pa bzhin// zhes zer ro// de ltar dge slong dang bram ze de rnams kyis 'jig rten la gnod par byed pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa du ma dag rab tu bstan to// de'i tshe gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros kyis dge sbyong dang bram
3959(): ze mkhas pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so// bstan pa ngo mtshar che'o// de las gnod pa gzhan ches mi bzad pa mthong ngam/ smras pa gzhan ni khong du ma chud do// de nas yang gzhon nus dge sbyong dang
3960(): bram ze rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag gis 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba'i rgyu dang gnod pa sna tshogs bshad pa ni 'jig rten na yod de// 'on te bdag kyang skye bo ji snyed pa la thams cad du gnod pa ni ma mthong
3961(): gis 'jig rten kun tu gnod par gyur pa ni gsum zhig bdag gis mthong ste/ de bas na de'i don 'di re shig gsan par mdzod cig/ gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten srid pa 'dir// rgas dang na dang 'chi bas gnod
3962(): byed de/ rab tu rgyas shing lang tshor ldan pa'i lus// mthu med rab tu nyams shing zhum 'gyur la// dbang po rgud cing so yang byung gyur te// dbyug pa la brten lus ni shig shig
3963(): gyur dbyis pa rnams kyi bzhud gang gnas gyur pa// rgas pa 'di ni 'jig rten gnod byed yin// rlung mkhris pad kan nad kyi tshub ma yis// dran pa nyams shing phyi rgan 'gyel gyur te// sba ba'i gnad kyang
3964(): lhug par ston byed la// grib so 'dus ltar lus ni rjes 'bab cing // sems kyang 'khrul te kyi hud 'don byed pa// gtam ngan 'di ni 'jig rten gnod pa yin// btsan zhing longs spyod ldan pa gces pa'i
3965(): lus rdza gos kyis dkris shing byi dor byas gyur kyang // ngan skyugs bzhin du dur khrod bor byas te// bdag gi longs spyod gzhan gis ca cor 'god// khwa dang dur bya'i gshog rgod rtsub mo yis//
3966(): brdabs shing gtor te mi gtsang phung po bzhin// dring rul cing bu yis shig shig gyur// kha cig mig tu sa btab dong du sbed// la la me yis bsreg cing tshir tshir zhu// kha cig nyi rlung drag pos
3967(): rdul bzhin gtor// mthun grogs rnams kyis yongs su spangs gyur nas// ngan 'gro'i gnas su bdag nyid dbang med 'gro// 'di dag 'jig rten rnams la gnod byed yin// 'jigs
3968(): pa 'di las skyab mdzad skyob pa gang // bzhugs pa de la don 'di zhu bar bya// 'di lta bu'i don 'di bstan nas yang smras pa/ shes ldan dag tshur shog/ bdag cag rnams thams cad lhan cig tu/
3969(): 'di nas thag mi ring ba na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad la thugs mnyam par brtse ba can// chos kyi rje 'jig rten 'khrid par mdzad pa bzhugs kyis de'i drung du dong ste brjod/
3970(): ldan 'das la don 'di dag zhu bar bya'o// de nas bdag cag rnams kyi the tshom yongs su gcod par mdzad cing lung ston par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas
3971(): bdag cag gi don 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu'o zhes dge sbyong dang bram ze de rnams dang lhan cig tu gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros srog chags bye ba phrag drug dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa khrid mdzad ga la ba der
3972(): song ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te mchod pa'i khyad par du ma dag gis mchod cing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas gnon nu zhi ba'i blo gros kyis the tshom 'di dag sangs rgyas bcom
3973(): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yongs su zhus pa shin tu dri med thugs zhi lhar bcas pa'i// 'jig rten khrid mdzad khyod la zhu ba ni// 'gro bar bcas pa'i gnod pa gang lags pa/
3974(): kun tu spyan mnga' 'di dag bdag la gsungs// 'ching ba gang gis 'gro ba'i gnod pa dag/ gang zhig thos nas bdag dang skye bo rnams// thar pa'i lam la legs par 'jog mdzad pa// phan ma
3975(): brtser ldan bdag la gsung du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khri mdzad kyis gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ zhus pa'i don tshig su/
3976(): bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs pa gang gis 'jig rten gnod par byed pa ni// rga dang na dang 'chi ba mya ngan dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal gnod gyur pa// 'gro
3977(): bas nye bar nyon mongs mi shes so// sngon gyi las kyis skyes ma thag tu yang // bud med skyes pa de bzhin ma ning ngam// bram ze rgyal rigs de bzhin rje rigs dmangs// gzugs bzang ngan dang
3978(): de bzhin longs spyod mtha'// dbang po ma tshang rgud pas 'jig rten 'di// skye rgan 'chi nyams su myong gyur te// srid par 'di dag shin tu gnod byed yin// rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu gzhan yang 'jig/
3979(): rten thams cad la gnod par byed pa dang / phan par byed pa'i khyad par gzhan yang bstan par bya yis nyon cig/ srog chags bsad pas tshe ni thung 'gyur la// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod myong bar
3980(): 'gyur/ yang sos sdug bsngal myong nas slar yang ni// mir skyes na yang de tshe nang can 'gyur// srog gcod spangs pas tshe ring thob 'gyur zhing // mtho ris go 'phang 'jig rten bde ba 'thob/
3981(): mi gang gzhan gi nor la me byin len// de ni ngan song sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de ni mo yi srid pa 'dir 'ongs kyang // 'phongs shing gzi brjid chung la mya ngan 'gyur// gang zhig longs
3982(): spyod chags pa yongs spong ba// lha yi longs spyod bde ba phun tshogs 'thob// gang zhig gzhan gyi bud med der 'gro na// lcags kyi shal mtsher ma rnon po yis// 'bigs par byed cing sdug
3983(): bsngal me yis gdungs// de las thar yang chung ma mi srun 'gyur// gang zhig chags pa'i bde ba spongs byed na// lha mo'i tshogs kyis kun tu bde byed 'gyur// mi gang tshig rnams shin tu mi
3984(): sdom pa// rdzun dang tshig rtsub dag 'khyal phra ma rnams// smra ba de dag mi bzad dmyal bar ltung // 'bar ba'i phur pa rnams kyis lce brgyangs shing // thong gshol 'bar ba lnga brgyas rmod par
3985(): byed/ kha cig spu gris bcad de rang nyid za// gzhan dag ro nye 'thungs shing kun tu 'bar// mi bzad skyabs med du zhing sdug bsngal 'gyur// gang dag ngag las ring du spong byed pa// skye ba kun tu dag
3986(): rnams btsur 'gyur zhing // snyan ngag bstan bcos dbyangs rnams phun sum tshogs// shin tu dag pa'i ngag dbang thob par 'gyur// mi gang yid kyi nyes pa skyed byed pa// brkam zhing gzhan gyi bde ba khyad
3987(): gsod pa ra lta na zhugs pa de dag ngan song 'gro// de yi lus la dmyal ba'i shed po rnams// shing la bya ba bzhin du gsheg cing gcod// gsal shing rtse 'bor brgya yis 'bugs shing 'byin// gzhan dag
3988(): ro nya khol ma'i nang du ltung // mar ko ta yis lus kun 'bigs shing za// las kyi stag gzig sbrul chen 'bar ba yis// gtses shing mtshon cha'i tshal rnams kun tu rgyug/ yan lag dum bur gsheg cing rab med
3989(): lhung // sdug bsngal de 'dra'i bar mtshams med par 'gyur// gang zhig yid kyi las rnams rnam spangs na// lha mi'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa myong // rnam dag lta bas 'jig rten dga'abyed cing // rtag tu sangs
3990(): rgyas rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur// byas pa'i 'bras bu chud gsan mi 'gyur zhing // byed pa po dang las kyang gang yang med// 'bras bu spyod pa gang yang 'thob med de/ rgyu la brten nas/
3991(): chos rnams rab tu 'byung // med la 'dzin pas sdug bsngal rab tu 'jug/ rgyal ba gang dag 'das su yongs 'das pas// thams cad chu zla lta bur gzigs pas na// chos rnams ngo bo nyid de de 'drar
3992(): ltos/ ji ltar smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid myong ltar// dngos dang dngos med bral bas ci yang med// ji ltar rmi lam du ni dngos med dang // ji ltar du nang sprin gyi dngos med ltar/ de ltar chos rnams dag cing
3993(): ngo bo med/ nam mkha'i bar na skar ma 'dug pa ltar// dngos po'i ngo bo gzhan dngos 'di dag gsog/ ji ltar mi dag myos pa'i rmi lam na// dga' bar tshor ba sad na de med cing // rmi lam rmis pa
3994(): snying po med pa ste// sad pa'i tshe na de nyid rjes dran bzhin// dngos po dag kyang de bzhin ngo bo med// ji ltar 'dod pa can gyi rmi lam ra// bud med rgyar sdug dag gi bzhin mthong na// dga' bzhin 'dod
3995(): la chags pa skyes gyur na// sad nas bud med bzhin ni ma mthong ltar// 'dod la chags pa'i yul rnams 'di dag kyang // snying po med cing rmi lam de 'dra'o// de ltar gzhon du mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
3996(): ni rtag tu chos rnams rmi lam 'drar rtogs shing // gnod pa'i 'ching ba rnams las thar byas te// de bzhin gzhan dag la yang rab tu ston// zhes bya ba la sogs pa chos kyi tshul yang dag par
3997(): bstan pas/ gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros la sogs pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag drug chos zab mo mthong zhing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// gang gi blo gros dag cing ma snad pa/ 'jig rten mdung /
3998(): pa med pa mchog gi mthus// yongs bskul rgyal ba'i thugs rje rmad byung ba// 'gro ba'i don ni mtshungs med byed par 'gyur// dus tshigs rkyen gyis bskul ba yis// tsha zer car dang mtsho skyes dag
3999(): phrad pa'i rkyen gyis sems dpa' can// mgu zhing dgod par byed pa bzhin// e ma 'o rmad du byung ba yi// blo gros mthu 'di rigs pa yin// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi mthu
4000(): la brten nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don rnams gsal bar rig par 'gyur ro zhes shes rab dang ldan pa'i bsngags pa dang / bdag cag gi ston pa 'di ni sngon yang legs par
4001(): bshad pa'i 'byung khungs yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros kyi skyes pa'i rabs te lnga bcu bdun pa'o//
4002(): skyes bu dam pa shes rab dang ldan pa rnams ni rang gzhan thams cad la phan par byed cing // legs par bshad pa'i 'byung khungs su 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang
4003(): chub sems dpar gyur pa na klu'i rgyal po rje zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// de ni gzhan la phan par byed cing brtse ba dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin can rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyis brgyan par gyur te/
4004(): gzhan yang de'i rjes su slob pa'i spun du gyur pa nye rba zhes bya ba zhig kyang byung ste/ yon tan rgya mtsho'i dbus su nyer mdzes pa// rnam dag lus la shes rab gdengs kas mdzes// snying rje'i
4005(): sprin gyis rab tu 'khyud gyur cing // legs spud char rgyun 'bebs par byed par gyur// de bas 'dir ni 'jig rten du// / phan par byed pa'i blo gros can// gnyis ka srog gcod las bzlog cing // tshul
4006(): khrims ldan zhing dbang cher grags// klu yi skye gnas la smod cing // mi yi srid pa 'dod par gyur// tshul ldan mang du thos pa yi// dge sbyong bram ze mthong na ni// mi yi lus su bsgyur nas ni//
4007(): bsnyen bkur dag kyang byed par gyur// zla ba phyed pa'i tshes brgyad dang // bcu bzhi bco lnga gang yin pa// de la yan lag brgyad pa yi// gso sbyong la ni legs mnyam 'jog/ de lta bu'i bdag nyid
4008(): chen po de gnyis sngon gyi gnas spangs nas yul rgyu zhing song ba las/ rnga sgra zhes bya ba'i klu gnas pa'i sa phyogs su phyin pa na klu'i skyes bu dam pa gnyis po de la rnga sgra khros pa'i dbang du gyur pas gdug
4009(): pa'i dbugs 'byin cing / khyed gnyis ni chos spyod pa ma yin te g.yo sgyu can ngan pa'i rang bzhin tshul 'chos pa'i nga'i gnas su ma 'dug cig ces tshig rtsub mos skud par byed do// de ltar yang dang yang du
4010(): bskrad pa thos nas nye rnga khros par gyur nas phu bo rdol spras pa/ kye rnga mi yi 'jig rten ngan pa dag/ tshig ngan sngon du sba bas gdung byed pa// sbal zan chu yi 'gram nas skyes pa yi// mche ba gdug pas
4011(): bdag cag spyod par byed// 'di ni chu nang dud 'gro rnams la 'tshe// thang la mi rnams la yang 'tshe bar byed// gtso bo gal te bdag la bzod mchis kyang // tshig ngan smras la yid ni bzod mi nus/
4012(): de 'dir 'di yi grong khyer dang // pho brang gnyen 'dun bcas brlag ste// rnga sgra gtan nas spangs nas su// 'di nas bdag cag 'dod par bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs po che nges
4013(): nu bo'i tshig thos nas brtse ba chen pos yid la 'bab par byed pa'i tshogs bcud 'di skad ces smras so// gang gis khyim du nyin zhag 'ga' gnas shing // bza' dang btung ba legs par blangs
4014(): gyur pa de la'ang yid kyis gnod par mi bsam ste// byas pa gzo ba skyes bu dam par bsngags// ljon shing gang gi grib ma yis// yud tsam zhig kyang legs 'gebs de'i
4015(): lo ma'ang bcad par mi byan// yal ga ljon shing smos ci dgos// nags tshal shing ni bcad dam bsregs kyang rung // slar yang skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// lag brlon bcad phyir yang mi skye
4016(): ltar/ grogs la 'khru ba yun rings bde mi 'thob// skye bo ngan pa yun rings mchod byas shing // bza' btung zhim po mang pos phon btags kyang // des ni nges par grogs po spong 'gyur te//
4017(): glang chen gyis ni ku sha'i spyil po bzhin// ji ltar chu 'gram shing ni 'gyel gyur ltar// mi gang blo ni g.yo zhing 'gyur byed pa// de yi mdza' ba shes brtan par mi 'gyur te// shing shun tshon gyis ras dka
4018(): bcos pa bzhin// gal te mkhas pas dgra bo dag/ mi dga' bar ni byed 'dod na// sems la skyon ni med byas na// de nyid kyis ni de gnod 'gyur// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang // sa naH
4019(): bdag gi khur min gyi// byas pa mi gzo gang yin pa// de ni bdag gi khur chen min// mi gang sems ni mi rgod cing // byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tsher// byas pa rgud gson mi byed pa// de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngag/
4020(): chos bde byams pa bde ba ste// 'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bzhin// grogs la 'khu ba med pa dang // nga bsnyems nga rgyal zad pa bde// khengs dang zol byed nga rgyal tsho// sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang //
4021(): stobs ldan rnams la rgol byed pa// de dag rnams kyi grags pa 'jig/ de phyir khengs par mi bya ste// khro ba rnam par spangs par bya// khengs dang khro ba 'ongs gyur na// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig par 'gyur//
4022(): gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa'i rjes su slob pa la dman pa rnams la snying brtse ba dang bzod pa'i go cha bgo bar bya ste/ de yang / gang zhig rgan dang byis pa nad pa dang // nyam chung thabs stor de bzhin dman pa dang /
4023(): rgyal pos spangs dang skyabs med pa dag la// snying rje med pa de dag mir mi rung // rang gi yul 'khor gnas spangs te/ gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin pa na// tshig ngan so sor bzlog pa la// bzod pa chen po bya dgos
4024(): song rang gi yul na bsnyas bzhin 'dug pa bas// mi rnams gzhan gyi yul na gnas kyang rung // gang na mi rnams gzhan gyis mi brnyas te// rang gi yul yin de dag rang gi mi// mi mchog rnams ni brnyas thabs byas
4025(): pa'i tshe/ chung ma bu dang longs spyod rgya chen gtong // ngan pa rnams ni de na'ang yongs su 'khyam// brnyas thabs byas pa de yang chu bzhin 'thung // gzhan yang 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams bde ba'i rgyu ni 'di lta bu yin te//
4026(): de yang bstan par bya yis nyon cig/ dar ba rnyed par dka' ba ste// rgud pa mod pa yin pa'i phyir// sems can dmas par gyur pa'i tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// gal te nor med phyogs nyung dang // mdza'
4027(): bshes phyogs kyi stobs chung ba// dgra bo phyogs kyi stobs ldan tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// mi rnams chos min byed pa dang // 'dod pa'i longs spyod mngon dga' zhing // dang chung ngo tsha med pa'i tshe//
4028(): kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// mi rnams khro bar byed pa dang // gnod sems mang por gyur pa dang // gzhan la tshul ldan 'jug pa'i tshe// kha rog 'dug dong bde ba 'thob// mi rnams dad pa med pa dang //
4029(): khwa bzhin mu cor smra ba dang // sgyu dang g.yo dag byed pa'i tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// mi rnams tshul khrims 'chal pa dang // gtum zhing gzu lums byed pa dang // bden da'i chos dang mi ldan
4030(): tshe kha rog 'dug dang bde ba'i thob// mi rnams ngang tshul ngan pa dang // log pa'i lta bas bcom pa dang // gtum zhing sdang bar gyur pa'i tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// ngo tsha med cing rdzun du smra//
4031(): don med phra ma tshig rtsub dang // dbyen dang 'khyal pa smra ba'i tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// ya rabs tshul med shin tu khengs// nga rgyal gyis ni 'gying ba dang // pra dog brkam chags tshul nyams /
4032(): chos kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// gang tshe mi yi rus rnams dang // rigs rnams shes pa ma yin pa'i// mi dang lhan cig 'dug pa na// de tsheng rgyal byar mi rung
4033(): gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang // gzhan gyi 'tshe bas 'tshe ba'i tshe// yul gyi phyir dang bde ba'i phyir// gzhan gyi brnyas pa de bzod bya// gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang // gzhan gyi 'tshe bas
4034(): 'tsho ba'i tshe// sdang pas 'khrug par gyur pa na// gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya// gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang // gzhan gyi#/ dman pas bskrad par gyur kyang rung // shes
4035(): rab ldan pas de bzod bya// kye ma yul log bdag gnas shing // mdza' bshes don dang phrad pa na// byis pa rnams dang 'grogs pa yi// gnas su mya ngan rten byed med// shes rab ldan pas de
4036(): bsams nas// mi shos mi dang 'grogs byed kyang // mkhas pas nor dang longs spyod phyir// gzu'u mas kho nar khro mi bya// ji ltar thal bas bkab pa'i me// rtswa dang shing gis g.yogs pa la//
4037(): rlung rnams kyis ni legs bus na// shin tu rab tu 'bar gyur te// rtswa shing de dag bsregs nas su// chen por 'tshed cing 'bar ba yis// rtswa shing gel ba mang po dang // ljon shing mang po bsreg pa ltar//
4038(): de bzhin rnam rtog bud shing las// byung ba'i khro ba me 'dra bas// bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag la// phung khrol chen po byed par 'gyur// de phyir khro ba byung ba na// zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi// byams pa sems//
4039(): la bsgoms nas su// mkhas pa rnams kyis zlog par byed// bstod pa byas na mdza' byed la// ma bstod mdza' bar mi byed cing // mod la yongs su spong byed pa// de ni byis pa'i mtshan nyid yin// gal te
4040(): 'di na byis pa dag/ sgro gshog btogs pa'i bya lta bur// blo spangs shes rab ma 'tshal na// mkhas pa ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang phyir byis pa phal cher ni// blo gros spangs shing shes 'chal ba
4041(): dephyir mkhas pa shes rabacan// khyad par du ni bde bar 'tsho// mkhas pas nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la// phongs par gyur kyang mi 'khrul 'khrug pa med// rjes su bzung phyir phan pa de smran// legs smra
4042(): yin zhes gzhan gyis de mi rtogs// mkhas pa gzu lums med par gyur pa de// de nyid dpyad la legs par mnyan nas su// de ltar rnam par bsams nas rang don dang // gzhan gyi don dag legs par
4043(): spyad par byed// mkhas pa rnams ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu tsam gyis// sdig pa'i las rnams kun tu spyod mi 'gyur// gal te bde dang sdug bsngal ldan gyur kyang // rtag tu chos don yongs su gtong ba med//
4044(): blo ldan g.yo sgyu can du mi 'gyur te// rmongs par mi 'gyur tshig rtsub khro mi 'gyur// phongs pa'i gnas ngan mya ngan mi byed pa// gzhan gyis gnas la 'bebs par byed re skan// ha cang thal dang ha cang zhum
4045(): pa yi dman pa'i mi rnams la yang ma yin te// bar ma'i gnas la bstan par byed pa dag/ de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid yin// kye gzhan yang 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni legs par brtag par
4046(): bya ba kho na ste/ re shig 'di yi tshul bstan par bya'o// ha cang thal ba rtag tu 'khon// ha cang zhum pa rtag tu brnyas// de phyir de gnyis spangs nas su// go 'phang bar ma bsten par bya//
4047(): res 'ga' lkugs pa'am 'on pa lta bur gyis// dus la bab nas bdag bzhin du spros// res 'ga' gangs ri bzhin du bsil bar gyis// dus la bab na me lce bzhin du spor// res 'ga' rtswa dang 'dra//
4048(): bar zhum par bya// dus la bab na ri rab lta bur gyis// res 'ga' rgyal po lta bur 'gyur bar bya// dus la bab na thub 'dras nags su song // res 'ga' bkres dang skom pa'ang bzod par bya/
4049(): dus su bde dang sdug bsngal dang du blang // nor phyir bran bzhin bkol bar mi bya ste// khro ba'i dbang du gyur bar mi bya'o// res 'ga' dga' ba'i glu dang sil snyan gyis// rtse zhing sha dang chang yang spyad par bya//
4050(): res 'ga' ri dag sa lta bur 'jigs shing song // dus su seng ge bzhin du nyams rtsal bstan// dang po dus dang dus min dang // bdag nyid stobs ldan stobs med dang // dar dang rgud pa brtags nas su/
4051(): de nas don rnams legs par brtsam// bzod med rnams la bzod pa dang // bzod ldan rnams la'ang bzod par gyis// nyam chung rnams la bzod pa dang // stobs ldan rnams la'ang bzod par gyis// /
4052(): khon gyis khon zhir nam yang mi 'gyur bas// bzod med rnams la'ang bzod par byas na legs// khros pa rnams la'ang rtag tu dad pa dang // gzhan gyi skyon rnams rtag tu bcab par gyis// gtsog
4053(): rnams kyi tshig ni 'jigs phyir dang // 'thab zla'i tshig dag 'thab bcugs 'gyur phyir bzod// glang zhig bar ma'i tshig dag bzod byed pa// de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas gsungs// gshed /
4054(): gya choms smra ba dang // tshig ngan smra ba byed pa la// blo gros chung ngu mi bzod de// pad+ma la ni rdo char bzhin// gshe dang gya tshoms smra ba dang // tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la// mkhas pa shin tu bzod byed de/
4055(): glang chen me tog char pa bzhin// khro ba dang ni rdzun dag dang // tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la// mkhas pa shes rab ldan gyur pa// gang yin de ni thams cad bzod// rdo ba bsregs kyang 'ju mi 'gyur// char
4056(): pa bab kyang 'jig pa med// de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal gyis// mkhas pa nyams par 'gyur ba med// gang zhig bden pas gshe byed pa// de la mkhas pas bzod par byed// bden pa ma yin pa
4057(): gang bzod// de las gzhan pa bstan du med// 'di ltar skyes bu mkhas pas nor gyi phyir// sdug bsngal bzod bya bzod par 'gyur bar bya// gal te mi bzod mya ngan rnam spangs te// gzhan du song na
4058(): stong phrag rnyes dang 'dra// yal ga rnyings la 'ju bar mi bya bzhin// chags bral sems la chags par mi bya ste// bzang zhing sdug pas sa stangs gang pas na// 'jig rten spangs pas gzhan du 'gror
4059(): zad mod/ gang na brnyes byed bkur sti mi byed dang // smod par byed cing bstod par mi byed na// mkhas dang blur grogs ched ka mi che bas// rang rgyal bzhin du mi smra de 'gro rigs// gang la skyes bu
4060(): 'thab la dga'agyur nas// g.yo sgyu'i bsam ldan rtag tu glags kyang byed// kyal pa dbyen rdzun tshig rtsub smra byed pa// de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song // gang na mi
4061(): rnams 'tshe bar byed 'gyur nas// phan tshun gnad la 'bebs par dga' ba dang // lus dang ngag yid sdom pa med gyur pa// de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song // gang na mi rnams phrag dog byed
4062(): 'gyur nas/ gzhan gyi rnyed la rtag tu mi bzod cing // sdang ba'i bsam pas rnam rmongs tshul 'chos pa// de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis// gang na mi rnams sdig byed 'dod gyur nas/
4063(): bkur sti 'dod cing tshul 'chos g.yo sgyur byed// nang yang ma dag phyi yang ma dag pa// de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis// gang na mi rnams zhes med gyur nas// ya rabs tshul med khengs
4064(): shing nga rgyal ldan// byis pas ma'o sa pa rtag tu brnyas byed pa// de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis// gang dang gang du bza' btung dang // gang du gos rnams rnyed pa dang // gang du 'tshe ba
4065(): der song la chags gyur gnas su ma 'dug cig/ gzhan yang 'jig rten na phud par byed pa thams cad bag med pa las byung zhing sdug bsngal du ma myong bar byed pa'i rgyu 'di rnams spang bar bya'o// lan
4066(): 'ga' rtsod 'gyur sred pa gang yin spongs// rtag khengs mchod med nga rgyal gang yin spongs// 'bras bu ngan pa'i khro ba gang yin spongs// phongs dus mi lta'i grogs po gang yin spongs// me yis
4067(): gang pa'i lam 'dra'i ma rig spongs// byas gzo mad pa'i gnyen 'dra'i 'dod chags spongs// mche ba mi bzang klu 'dra'i chags pa spongs// dgra bo mtshon cha lta bu'i sdug bsngal spongs// bu mo
4068(): lta bu'i mi bzad chung mthong // mgo la ma 'bar lta bu'i bu rnams thong // 'go ba'i nad bcas lta bu'i khyim rnams thong // btung pa dug can lta bu'i 'dod pa thong // khyim gyi phyir ni gcig btang
4069(): ste/ srog gi don du khyim btang ngo // ljongs kyi phyir ni grong khyer te// bdag gi don dus btang ngo // mi ya~M yan lag phyir ni nor btang zhing // srog gi don du yan lag btang bar bya// nor dang yan
4070(): lag rnams dang de bzhin srog/ thams cad btong gi 'dir ni mchog bsrung ngo // chos spyod pa la 'jigs skrag med pa nyid// chos spyod pa dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/ chos spyod pa ni 'dod pa'i 'gro
4071(): bar 'gro chos min spyod pa shi ras gdung bar 'gyur// mkhas pas nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la// nir zad na yang blo gros mi 'khyil bar// 'jig rten dag na ci dgar legs rgyu ba// sems
4072(): can nang na mi yi snying por chud// gang zhig dga' bas gzhan la nor sbyin zhing // nga rgyal 'tshe ba rnam spangs bden la gnas// rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sems ldan de dag ni// dpa' bo brtul
4073(): phod ya rabs thabs ldan yin// gang zhig de dang de la legs bslabs pas// don rnams kun la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang // des la 'grogs na bde ba de dag ni// dam pas legs
4074(): pa yin zhes bsngags pa mdzad// de skad ces smras pa dang / yid zhi bar gyur te nye rngas smras pa/ rnga khyod la ni phyi phyir zhing // 'di ltar bdag ni rab tu dang // bdag gi lus
4075(): 'di bskams pa 'am// yang na sems ni med kyang bla// sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad par// ltung yang phyin chad sdig mi bgyid// tshul khrims nyams pa gson pa bas// tshul khrims ldan pa
4076(): yang bla'i skye ba gcig tu lus 'di'i phyir// ji lta bur ni mi bzad spyad// de skad ces smras nas brtul zhugs brtan par gyur to// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa shes rab kyi mthu thob pa rnams
4077(): ni dgra gnyen thams cad la phan par byed pa yin no zhes shes rab kyi phan yon bsngags pa dang / bdag cag gi ston pa 'di sngon yang legs par gsungs pa'i 'byung khungs su gyur na/ mngon par rdzogs
4078(): par sangs rgyas nas lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / rim gro bskyed de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// 'di phyis byung ba'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis
4079(): bka' stsal pa/ sngon chedang ni rngar gyur te// kun dga' bo ni nye rnga yin// lha sbyin rnga sgrar gyur to zhes// skya rabs de ltar gzung bar gyis// zhes gsungs so// klu'i rgyal po'i skyes pa'i rabs te lnga
4080(): bcu brgyad pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni dud 'gror gyur kyang shes rab lhag par gsal zhing rigs dang mthun pa rnams phan pa dang bde ba'i lam la yongs su sbyor ro//
4081(): de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sngon byang chub tu spyad pa spyod pa na/ gzhan gyi don byed pa dang rjes su mthun pa rang bzhin gyi yon tan bzang pos brgyan cing rang gi rigs dang mthun pa rnams/
4082(): la ci nus kyis phan 'dogs par byed pa chu sreg cig tu gyur to zhes grog go// de ni lus bzang stobs kyang che ba dang / blo dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus che bas brgyan// mkha' lding lta bur mthu rtsal che bas
4083(): na/ gzhan gyi gnod pa med pa'i che bas mdzes// dud 'gro'i gzugs can de ni dud 'gro yi// rang bzhin spangs pas chos kyi rang bzhin can// de yi rjes 'brang chu sreg de rnams kyang // de yi rjes
4084(): zhugs de dang lhan cig gyur// de ltar chu sreg lnga brgya dang bcas pa sa'i bdag po'i dpal 'byor rab tu gyur pa bzhin du gzhan gyi gnod pa med cing bde bar gnas pa las/ dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na
4085(): chu sreg rgan po zhig gis chu sreg de rnams kyi sgo nga dang phru gu rnams thabs kyis zos nas/ de dal bu dal bus 'chag cing bya ba med pa'i gnas skabs na rkang pa ya gcig bskums nas mi bde ba bzhin
4086(): du tshul 'chos par byed do// gang dag lus kyi tshul 'chos shing // rigs dang dam pa'i spyod pa dor// sems dang spyod pa gzhan gyur pas// bdag gzhan phung bar byed pa yin// de nas chu sreg bu dang bral
4087(): ba de rnams sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur nas/ dpon po'i drung du song ste rigs mthun pa'i skad kyis ngu bar brtsams pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu sreg gis rang gi 'khor chu sreg
4088(): de rnams sdug bsngal ba mthong nas/ de rnams la tshig snyan pas dbugs phyung zhing chu'i gling kun tu nyul bar brtsams pa dang / chos nyid kyi blo dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
4089(): dpa' rnams ni tshul 'di lta bu yin te/ tshul dang ldan dang tshul ldan ma yin pa'i// rnam pa sbas kyang mngon sum shes 'gyur te// blo ldan rnams kyis rjes su dpag pa yi// rtags la brten nas
4090(): mngon sum ltar du rig/ gang zhig sa yis g.yogs pa'i mi gtsang gter// dag byed chu rgyun phog pas dri ngar 'gyur// ngan g.yo'i rang bzhin tshul 'chos bsgyur ba dag/ mkhas pa'i drung na rnam pa gzhan
4091(): du 'gyur// rnam pa gang de gsal bar mi bzod pa// 'di yang 'jig rten gsal bar grags pa yin// de nas chu sreg rgan po de dal bus 'chag cing phyogs cig tu song nas rkang pa la gcig
4092(): bteg cing 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' chu sreg gis mthong nas/ 'di ni rang gi rigs kyi phyir rgol ba rang bzhin ngan pa yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi sgong
4093(): phru gu dang // rus chags rnams kyang zos nas ni// rkang pa gcig btsugs 'dug pa ste// kye ma khyod kyi brtul zhugs yin// kha tsag smra ba yang bden te// gom pa dal bus 'dor byed cing //
4094(): dal bu dal bu smra ba dang // gnya' ba gyur bzhin byed pa ni// de ni ngan g.yo'i mtshan nyid yin// des bsams pa/ dpon po 'dis ni bdag gi rgyas shes so snyam nas de nyid la skyabs su song ngo // de la
4095(): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khu khu nam chu sreg gi tshogs rnams 'khrug par ma gyur pa de srid du khyod kyi sems bde bar gyis shig/ 'jig rten ngan par spyod pa dag/ chen po zhig la brten gyur
4096(): kyang / nyes pa mngon du gyur na ni// ched du spangs pa bzhin du 'gyur// de ltar thabs mkhas pas smras pas/ chu sreg rgan po de bros nas chu sreg de rnams bde bor gyur to// blo ldan rnams kyi blo yi
4097(): stobs 'khyad par gsal bar gyur pa 'di// nyes pa'i mun pa sel byed pas// nyin mor byed pa 'bar ba bzhin// gzhan du blo ldan min pa dag/ 'bad kyang gnyis kar gnod 'gyur te// yal ga drung
4098(): las byung ba'i ma// rang bzhin sreg par byed pa bzhin// des na lhag par mthu ldan pa'i// shes rab lam la blta bar bya// de lta bas ra skyes bu dam pa rnams ni dud 'gror gyur kyang shes rab lhag par
4099(): gsal zhing / de'i dbang gis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa la mthu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / dud 'gro la'ang shes rab dang ldan pa mdzes par 'gyur na/ mi rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes shes
4100(): rab kyi phan yon bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// chu sreg gi skyes pa'i rabs te lnga bcu dgu pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dpag tu
4101(): med pas lta ba log pa'i dbang gis nyam nga bar zhugs pa'i skye bo rnams sdug bsngal las drangs nas yang dag pa'i lta ba la sbyor zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang la 'jog par byed do// de yang
4102(): 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol du bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na re zhig cig ston pa shes rab sna tshogs zhes bya bar
4103(): gyur to zhes grug go// de ni gzhan du spangs pa'i mthu dang snying rje chen po'i dbang gis sems can gyi don du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes par gyur cing / shes rab kyi mthu dpag tu med pa/
4104(): rigs byed kyi tshegs ji snyed pa thams cad khong du chud cing bsam gtan gyi mthu thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan zhing 'gro ba rnams kyi blo dang mthun par don bya ba de dang de la dub pa med pa zhig tu
4105(): gyur to// rig byed rnams la de ni tshangs pa bzhin// gtsug lag don la mkhas shing gsal bar rig/ dka' thub can gyi 'bras bu grub pa'i mchog/ thub pa bzhin du 'jig rten gsal bar ston//
4106(): skye dgu rnams kyi don spyod nyi ma bzhin// mnyam pa nyid du blo yi mun pa 'joms// de ni shes rab snying rje'i rang bzhin pas// gzhan gyi don la skyo zhing dub pa med// de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' nga
4107(): dben par ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing // dus la bab par 'gro ba'i don spyod pa na/ re shig cig drang srong rigs mchog ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste// de 'dod pa rnams la 'ching bar
4108(): byed par 'du shes shing spong ba zhig byung ste/ des 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa thob nas 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la rtog pa dang dpyod pa can 'di ni rab tu ma
4109(): zhi ba yin te/ 'di bas gzhan zhig gong mar gyur pa yod do snyam nas bsam gtan sgom pa las des rtog dpyod nub pa'i bsam gtan thob ste/ 'di ni zhi ba dang gla nom pa'o// rtog pa thams cad nub
4110(): pas na phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o snyam nas de ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma rnams la ting nge 'dzin de rjes su bstan par gyur to// /
4111(): 'jig rten rnams ni shes rab mthu chung zhing // bsam gtan bde ba'i ro la chags gyur pas// 'bangad pa don med sdug bsngal bskyed gyur te// rig sngags rnon po'i sgrub pa log pa bzhin// de'i
4112(): skye bo mang po de rnams 'di snyam du gyur te// gang rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste skye ba med pa thob po snyam mo// de dag bsam gtan de la zhen par gyur pa'i dbang gis shes rab
4113(): kyis ma zin cing bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam las ring du gyur te/ de dag rtog pa med pa la mthar thug tu 'dzin pa'i dbang gis dus 'das te thams cad kyang 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/ bsam gtan gyi
4114(): nyer bsdogs de la brten nas rtog pa med pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba las byung ba'i mthus 'od gsal gyi lha rnams su skyes te gzhal med khang gi snang ba byung bar gyur to// de'i tshe shes rab kyi stobs
4115(): zhan pa'i skyes bu de rnams 'di snyam du gyur te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten na mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smra ba de ni log par zhugs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag cag rnams ni rtog dpyod las 'das pa'i ting
4116(): nge 'dzin thob kyang 'dir skyes par gyur to snyam mo// khams gsum ting 'dzin tshul la rmongs gyur cing // sgyu ma lta bu'i shes rab nyams gyur pas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha
4117(): rol 'da' yin te// log pa'i rlung gis drangs po'i gru zhig bzhin// log lta'i rlung chen dran pas bdas pa yis// mi bzad 'bar ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// yang dag min la yang dag lam
4118(): rtog pa// log pa'i lta ba mun pas khebs pa dag/ bdag med gnas la bdag tu rtog byed cing // yul gyi kun rtog nub par gyur pa la// 'bras bu ro zhen pas log pa'i lam du 'gro// 'jig rten gnod/
4119(): byed dug nI re shig dug/ bsam pa'i dug ni rnam kun gnod par byed// de bas mkhas rnams kun rtog dug spongs shig/ de ltar sems can de rnams log par lta ba de'i dbang gis bsod nams dang /
4120(): ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu nyams nas gzhal med khang de dag mi snang bar gyur cing de ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar gyur to// shes rab mthu yis yongs su ma zin pa'i// rtog dpyod nub pa'i gnas pa
4121(): de nyid la rnga mthar 'dzin zhen pa'i bdud kyi pho nya yis// log lta'i zhags pa dam pos rab bcings te// mi bzang dmyal ba'i gnas su drangs gyur cing // nyams thag cho nges 'byin pa tsam la zhugs//
4122(): de ltar sems can de dag las kyi mun pa chen pos 'thibs shing bsam gtan gyi bde ba bcom nas/ ngan song gi gnas 'bar ba chen po de na sdug bsngal brgya phrag du mas nyam thag pa de rnams bram ze'i
4123(): drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa shes rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba de'i mngon par shes pas mthong nas/ kye ma 'jig rten na gnas pa 'di rnams rab tu nyams te log par lta ba'i dbang gis sems
4124(): can 'di rnams dmyal ba chen por rab tu ltung ngo snyam mo// rgyu des sems dpa' chen po de snying rje'i dbang gis 'di snyam du dgongs par nges te/ kye ma mtshar byas/ 'jig rten kun tu rtog pas nyams/
4125(): bdag dang gzhan du kun rtog pa// g.yo ba'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes// sred la tshor zhing nyer len pa// lha sogs 'jig tshogs rkyen gyis 'dir// rnam pa kun tu bcom par gyur// yang yang 'jig rten
4126(): gar mkhan bzhin// sna tshogs rtog pas gar byed do// 'di na bsam gtan bde bas lus sems brlan byed pa// sred pas bdag lta'i shugs drag chu klung du bdas te// shes rab gru chen bshes gnyen
4127(): dam pa dang bral bas// skyabs med g.yo bzhin ngan 'gro'i chu srin khar lhung ste// sna tshogs sdug bsngal mche ba rnon pos rab rmas nas// kun tu rmongs byas gti mug chu srin lto bar gnas// da de bas na
4128(): ci nas bdag gis 'di rnams kyi don bya ba'i dus la bab po snyam du dgongs so// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen rnams// nyams theg gyur pa'i 'gro ba la// don bya'i sems kyis bskul gyur pas/
4129(): de dang lhan cig spyod pa 'dra// de nas drang srong chen po de ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po de thams cad bsil bar byas so//
4130(): gang gis dmyal ba'i me chen 'bar zhing 'khrug pa yang // ting 'dzin chu klung snying rje'i stobs kyis char phab pas// bsil bar gyur nas sems can de dag sgra 'byin cing
4131(): kye ma'o 'di ltar gyur pa 'di ni ci zhig zhes// cung zad ngal sos dga' bas phyogs rnams kun tu bltas// bdag nyid che de zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba bzhin// dkar zhing mdzes la bsil zer 'od
4132(): rnams 'gyed pa mthong // nyams thag de rnams mgon po de la gus par gyur// de nas bdag nyid chen po des dmyal ba pa de rnams la snyan pa'i sgra phyung ste smras pa/ kye ma sems can khyed rnams kun//
4133(): log par lta ba'i dbang gis su// mi bzang dmyal ba'i gnas su lhung // nyams thag 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal myong // sngon tshe mi yi srid par skyes pa na// rtog dpyod nub pa'i bsam gtan ting 'dzin la/
4134(): mya ngan 'das par khyed rnams 'du shes te// 'od gsal lha yi gzhal med skyes pa na// log par rtog pa'i dbang gis dmyal bar lhung // de ni khyed cag log lta ring du spongs// mya ngan 'das pa'ang yod pa
4135(): shes par byos// rtog dpyod nub ste mya ngan 'das min pas// shes rab mthu yis khams gsum kun mthong nas// 'khrul ba'i dra ba ring du bsal byas te// dam pa'i chos la gcig tu gus par byos/
4136(): 'on tam mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur// de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis de lta bu'i sgra thos te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes rnyed cing skyes bu dam pa de la gus pa'i dbang gis sems can
4137(): de rnams dmyal ba'i lus de nas shi 'phos te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi go 'phang thob nas thams cad kyang gus pas 'phangs pa'i dbang gis ston pa shes rab sna tshogs de'i drung du lhags so// der lhags nas
4138(): kyang skyes bu dam pa des sems can de rnams la 'jig rten gyi bstan bcos thams cad nas dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi lam yang dag par bstan te thams cad kyang byang chub kyi mthas gtugs par byas so//
4139(): thugs rje'i mnga' bdag shes rab stobs ldan rnams// 'gro ba'i log lta ring nas gcod mdzad pa// mkhyen pa'i ral gri thugs rje'i phyag gis 'dzin// 'ching ba'i bdud rnams gcod mdzad bla med do//
4140(): de lta bas na 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'ching ba thams cad gcod par byed pa'i shes rab kyi lam stong pa dang snying rje zung du 'jug pa bskyed par bya'o zhes shes rab dang
4141(): mthun pa'i mdo sde rnams la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du sbyin pa nas bsam gtan gyi bar la shes rab kyis yongs su zin pas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur zhing ma zin pas ni mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod/
4142(): par bya'o// rnga bdag cag gi ston po 'di ni sngon yang thugs rje dpag tu med pas sems can gyi log par lta ba thams cad gcod par mdzad na/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lta ci smos zhes sangs
4143(): rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// ston pa shes rab sna tshogs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te drug bcu pa'o// / sdom la/ tshangs byin chos tshol ye shes ldan/
4144(): chu 'bebs dang ni me long gdong // gnag lhas skyes dang gzhon nu dang // rnga dang chu sreg drang srong bcu// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni snying rje chen po dang thabs mkhas pas/
4145(): rang dang gzhan gyi don bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na sems can gyi don bya bar khyad par can
4146(): la zhugs pa snying rje chen pos rgyud bskul ba'i ded dpon zhig tu gyur to zhes grag go// srid pa gzhan du sbyangs pa'i mthu che zhing // sbyin pa'i pha rol legs par son gyur kyang // gzhan la phan pa'i don bzhin
4147(): spyod pa dag/ longs spyod sgrub pa lta bur ston par byed// nyes pa'i tsho gas bcom pha rol mthar phyin pa'o// rin chen gling du 'dren par byed pa yis// ded dpon chen po'i ming ni don bzhin gyur// de bas 'dir
4148(): ni snying rje can zhes grags// de ltar dad dpon de tshong pa lnga brgya dang bcas pa dbul bar gyur pa'i sems can la phan par 'dod pa'i sems kyis rgya mtsho'i 'jings chen po gang na skye bo phal gyis dpag par dka'
4149(): ba rnams na gnas pa'i rin po che'i gling tha dad pa rnams las gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / an+da rnyil dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mar gad dang / ka ki tra dang / mu tig dang /
4150(): spur len la sogs pa'i rin po che dpag tu med pa rnams blangs nas gzhan la phan par byed cing / skye bo rnams yid mgu bar byed pa las/ dus re shig slar yang tshong pa lnga brgya dang bcas pa rgya mtshor zhugs
4151(): pa lasarnga de rnams kyi nang na mi sdig pa'i las ngan pa la zhugs pa/ mda' dang mtshon cha'i thabs la bslabs pa// brku ba dang pha rol gyi nor 'phrog pa la gnas pa zhig kyang tshong pa'i cha lugs ltar bcos te
4152(): gru der zhugs par gyur to// ngan par spyod pa'i skye bo ni// gus pa'i tshul du 'chos byed kyang // ji ltar byi la'i spyod pa bzhin// gnod par byed pa kho na sems// gdan rgya mtsho'i gru chen nor dbyig gis// gang
4153(): ba de yi bgo bsha'i skal pa yang // gang gi so tshe gcig zad par nus min kyang // chog shes med pas ngan par spyod la gzhol// de nas mi g.yon can de ni bdag gis tshong pa 'ang thams cad srog dang bral
4154(): nas nor thams cad khyer te 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o snyam du sems so// de'i tshe ded dpon snying rje chen po gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du/ rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i lha de rnams kyis bstan pa/ khyed kyi gru 'di na mi
4155(): ming dang rus 'di lta bu zhes bya ba slu bar byed pa gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa zhig yod de/ des ni tsheng pa 'di rnams srog dang phral te nor rnams khyer te 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro bar sems kyis/ 'dis sdig pa'i
4156(): las 'di byas na tshod pa lnga brgya po 'di bla na med pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir mi ldog pa yin pas/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa ni byang chub sems dpa' re re'i phyir yang / ji srid byang chub sems dpa' re res
4157(): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang dub bsgrub par 'gyur ba de srid kyi bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen por 'tshed par 'gyur te/ de bas na ded dpon chen po khyod kyis ci nas kyang mi 'di'ang/
4158(): sems can dmyal ba chen por mi skye ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bsad par mi 'gyur ba de ltar thabs soms shig ces rmi lam du bstan to// de nas ded dpon snying
4159(): rje can/ snying rje'i bdag nyid brtan pa de// brtan pa'i sems kyis rab tu brtags// brtags nas ji ltar rigs pa snyam// kye ma 'di rnams bsad par mi 'gyur la// 'di yang ngan sems bzlog
4160(): par ci ltar 'gyur// gal te chong pa rnams la spyan byas kyang // de dag 'khrugs pas rnam smin mi bzad 'phel// 'on tam 'di yi ngan spyod ci ltar bzlog/ kye ma bdag gi sems ni bsregs pa bzhin//
4161(): da ni 'di la thabs gzhan yod min te// bdag ni sems can dmyal bar song yang rung // gzhan la phan cing bde la sbyor nus na// snying rje'i bdag nyid dam bca' brtan pa dag/ gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bdag
4162(): gi khur yin mod// de bas da ni brtson par bya ba'i rigs// de nas ded dpon snying rje can gyis 'di snyam du blo la nges par byas te bdag sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa brgya stong du song yang rung gis/
4163(): mi 'di dmyal bar mi ltung bar bya ba dang / tshong pa 'di rnams kyang srog bskyab pa'i phyir bdag gis mi ngan pa 'di bsad par bya'o snyam du nges par byas nas/ snying rje'i bdag nyid brtan pa la// las 'di
4164(): shin tu dka' gyur kyang // gzhan don spyad phyir 'bad pa yis// ut+pal 'dab ma ltar sngo ba'i// ral gri phyung nas sdig can de// mtsher bar ni srog dang phral// de ltar mi de bsad par gyur pa dang // tshong
4165(): pa'i tshegs rnams 'di yi rgyu ci zhes// ded dpon chen po de yi drung du 'ongs// de yis rab tu gsal bar tshig smras pa// mi 'dis sdig pa mi bzad pa// rab tu spyad te khyed rnams kun// srog dang bral
4166(): te nor khyer nas// 'di yang dpag med dmyal bar ni// 'tshed par 'gyur zhes lha yis bstan// de phyir bdag ni sdig can gyur// de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ tshong po de rnams yid ches la ya mtshan che bar
4167(): gyur cing ded dpon chen po de la yid dga' bas 'di skad du brjod pa snyam sems so// e ma'o thabs mkhas e ma'o snying rje ldan// gang gis bdag cag srog kyang spyir byed cing // sdig can 'di yang dmyal
4168(): ba'i gnas las bskal// khyod ni bdag cag don rnams mdzad par nges// bdag nyid che bas bdag gi bde ma chags// sems can tshad du sdug bsngal khur chen khyer// khyod kyis mgon bcas sdig pa can
4169(): 'di yang // da ni nges par thar pa'i lam du 'gro// skal pa chen po legs so legs so 'di ni snying rje chen po dang rjes su mthun no// bdag cag thams cad la brtse bar mdzad do ces smras so// mi de yang
4170(): tshe 'phos ma thag tu mtho ris kyi gnas su skyes so zhes grag go// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang // rang nyid bde 'dod mtshungs pa ma yin te// so so'i nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
4171(): sngags dang sman dang nor bu'i yon tan bzhin// so sor gsal bar 'jig rten 'byung ba yin// 'di yang rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan pa yin// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni 'gro ba gzhan gyi don/
4172(): du 'jig rten 'dzin pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa dang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// dor 'di la bcom
4173(): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas thabs mkhas pa de dang snying rje chen po des bskal pa brgya phrag stong du 'khor ba las rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur to// de'i dus kyi tshong pa lnga brgya po de rnams
4174(): ni bskal pa bzang po 'di la byung ba'i sangs rgyas lnga brgya yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pa zug go ces bya ba de yang / mnyan yod kyi grong khyer na skyes bu srid pa tha ma pa nyi shu dang /
4175(): de'i dgra nyi shu yod pa de rnams 'dul ba'i ched du bstan pa yin no zhes gsungs so// ded dpon snying rje chen po'i skyes pa'i rabs te drug bcu gcig pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bla
4176(): named pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na snying rje chen po yongs su bsngags par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
4177(): bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 'das pa'i sngon rol du bskal pa mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyis khams bde ba zhes bya bar bdag cag gi ston pa 'di rgyal po gzhon nu snying rje cher
4178(): sems zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de la ci'i phyir bde ba zhes bya zhe na/ de ni rin chen rgyu las legs grub cing // sa yang lag mthil ltar du mnyam gyur to// ka tsa lin+di ka yi gos
4179(): ltar 'jam// bkra zhing gtsang la nor bus rnam par brgyan// de ni mi khom 'gro ba med gyur te// zhing der 'gro la sdug bsngal sla yang med// sna tshogs gos kyi shing rnams dang // bza' ba du ma bsams pa
4180(): bzhin la 'byung ba'i ljon pa du mas gang // sna tshogs me tog sna tshogs gzugs// 'bar ba bzhin du mnyam par bkram// lha dang mi rnams longs spyod kyi// tha dad bye brag med par gyur// chu gni chu
4181(): gtsang pad+mar bcas// mdzes pa'i bya gzugs du ma rnams// gsal dag dbang po rab tu rdzogs// chos dang lhan cig spyod par byed// bde ba'i rgyur gyur thams cad gnas// sdug bsngal rgyur
4182(): gyur 'ga' yang med// yon tan rgyur gyur gyis bsten pas// zhing 'di rgyur gyur lags pa snyam// de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge
4183(): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dag pa bkod pa zhes bya ba chos kyi bdag nyid/ gling bzhi legs par skyong pa rin po che sna bdun
4184(): dang ldan pa rnga bu stong dang ldan pa byung ngo // de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa sha stag go// sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyang lo dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur to// de'i tshe
4185(): rgyal po dge ba bkod pa bu stong dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa thob nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
4186(): pal lo 'bum gyi bar du thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// de tshe mi dbang sras dang bcas pa rnams// rtag tu chos nyan
4187(): brtson pas zhugs pa yis// stong phrag brgya li le grangs de snyed du// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rjes dran dang // byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur// de rnams dran dang ldan zhing rtog par
4188(): ldan/ thub pa dgyes pa'i spyod pas dus 'da' zhing // rgya mtsho bzhin du chos kyi snod du gyur// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du song ba las/ de'i tshe/
4189(): de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma rjes su bstan pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces/
