4190(): gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul gzhan dag mchis lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
4191(): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po cho 'phrul dag pa gzhan yang yod do// de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang sems
4192(): las byung ba gzugs ma yin pa rnams bshad pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba 'gags pa rnams bshad pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa
4193(): dang rnga ma skyes pa ma byung ba'i lam bshad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo ro gcig pa rnams la yan lag gsum du smos pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod pa
4194(): dang rnga mtshon ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos bshad pa dang / phyin ci log
4195(): dang nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med
4196(): pa dang / byas pa med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / 'byung ba med cing skad cig pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / lus dang sems dben
4197(): pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i chos rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / pha rol dang tshu rol med pa'i chos rnams//
4198(): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / brtags pa dang bsal ba med pa'i chos rnams la thabs mkhas pa yod pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang rten pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pa bsgom pa dang /
4199(): bya ba med pa dang gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams la snying rje spyod pa dang / dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dga' ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms sgom pa dang /
4200(): shes pa med pa dang mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang / thos pa med pa dang rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa dang //
4201(): dmigs pa dang / sems dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yod pa dang /
4202(): sems dang lus dang sgra dang brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang / gnas med pa'i chos rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa dang / skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med
4203(): pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa dang / dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po bstan pa dang / stobs med pa dang nyam chung ba med pa'i chos rnams la stobs yongs su brjod pa dang //
4204(): nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang / khyad par med pa'i chos rnams la smon lam dang / zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la zhi gnas bskyed pa dang / rnam par grol
4205(): ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa smos pa zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
4206(): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de dang / bu stong po de dag dang / btsun mo'i tshogs de dag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
4207(): de nyid las brtsams te/ de lta de ltar chos bstan pa dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang / de'i bu stong
4208(): po rnams kyis ni chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dag gis bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi spobs pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
4209(): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni// lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar
4210(): de bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni// chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes// zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod nas/ yang gsol pa/ bdag gis bde gshegs legs mthong zhing // chos 'di legs par
4211(): thos pa dang // byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba// bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa// de ni chos la'ang rtag tu dga'// chos rnams spod par mi bgyid par// sems
4212(): can kun la rtag dga' lags// de nas 'khor de nyid du chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dug par gyur pa des/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras pa/ rgyal po
4213(): chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dang mthun par ma byas kyis/ khyod ni gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos kyi gnas la gnas
4214(): la/ nga mas sman dar+dz+dza k+Sha / nga sa smyas
4215(): ba dU rnam par mdzes pa dang 'drangs/ btsugs me bya/ 'du ya ba// dgas medang/ nga ma pa sa ma rgyu rgya kyi y-i / na
4216(): byung dru chos rnams pa dang marnam pas thams pa kyi rgyas sa pa ma/ rlung nas mamams dang rgyun pas blam mi pa na// na tsu
4217(): ba'i byung dru ni brtags pa dang bsngal ba dang bral bas par nu ba'o// byang chub ni mthun pa mang bus lag par dag so ba med pa'o// byang chub ni mongasasu rtsub pa ma dngas sems sa ma 'i
4218(): byang du ma nas sa skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o// 6nga chub ni rnam par rig pa'i mdu dam pan pas ng+ge sa sa nga tu byaba'o// cing napa rnaM rnams da seM da ma pa
4219(): pa dang bral bas rnam par rig pa med pa'o// byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas d+ha ma pa'o// byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bras pas spros pa med pa'o// rlung du
4220(): ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o// byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mtshan ma meng pa'o// byang chub ni smon pa thams cad dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o// byang chub ni las
4221(): kyi rnam par smin pa med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o// byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang / ngo bo da/
4222(): de lta bu la sgrub par byed pa dang / gang dag smon lam 'debs par byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni log par rtsol ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ci
4223(): 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la'ang de 'dra ba yin pas na/ gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de lta bas na rgyal po chen po gos dang rgyan tsam gyis
4224(): mchod pa de ni mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi/ de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyis/ de dag khyod kyis sgrub shig/ de yang gang zhe na/ gang dag stong chen sems can
4225(): de dag kun// byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing // ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa rdzogs par ni// bu dang rung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa bas// gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas// de bzhin
4226(): gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pa dang // byang chub sems kyi gom pa gcig bor ba// de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags// gang dag sngan chad byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang // gang dag ma byon da ltar/
4227(): bzhugs pa rnams// de dag skyon mang khab ni ma spangs par// bla med byang chub zhi pa thob pa med// rab byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rab tu bstod cing bsngags pa bkur ba de// gang zhig
4228(): sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa// rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung gzung bar gyis// gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i// gang gA'i ji snyed sangs rgyas zhing byin dang //
4229(): gang zhig rab byung de nyid mtshan gcig tu// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na// de ni rab byung ba ga yod gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu
4230(): bcom byas shing // dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin// rab byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang // lam gyi rjes mthun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod// de ni dge ba cung zad ma yin zhing // de ni yongs
4231(): su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin// khyim las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing // nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med// rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod// spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dkar
4232(): de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas tshig su bcad pa de dag thos pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / longs spyod dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dag la mi lta bar gyur cing / skyo la 'dod chags dang bral ba
4233(): skyes par gyur te/ rab tu byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par
4234(): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa
4235(): rgyal po chen po rab tu byung ba ni 'gag pa med pa ste/ sems can thams cad la yang bar du mi gcod cing skabs yod do// khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyis gal te 'dod nungs/
4236(): khyod la gdams shing rjes su bstan gyis khyod kyis kyang gdams shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nges rab tu byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba
4237(): bkod pas bu stong po de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag rnams las rgyal srid bsgrub pa dang // sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos lam dag/ 'dzin du 'jug par spro ba su zhig yod// bdag ni rgyal ba'i
4238(): bstan la tshangs par spyad// de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ yab bdag cag rnams kyang khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags kyis/ bdag cag mi 'dor bar gsol/ gang du rgyal bas
4239(): bsngags gyur cing // lha rnams kun gyis legs bstod pa'i// lam de spangs nas mun khrod lta'i// rgyal srid skyong par su zhig spro// rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te khyed cag thams cad rab tu byung na gling
4240(): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rab tu chud zos par 'gyur gyis/ khyed cag las gang sems can rnams la brtan pa'i snying rjes 'jug par gyur pa des/ rgyal srid/
4241(): bsgrubs la sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du chugacig/ gling bzhi pa yi 'jig rten na// gnas pa'i 'gro 'di ma sbyangs na// bag med gyur pa'i sems can rnams// mngon du sdig la phyogs
4242(): par 'gyur// de lta bu ni byang chub kyi// spyod pa gnan du 'gyur zhig gu// de nas rgyal po gzhon nu de dag gi nang nas rgyal po gzhon nu snying rje cher sems bya ba des/ rang gi pa dang /
4243(): rgan rabs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rab byung yon tan du ma bsags pa zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyi// de ltar lags kyang snying rjer gyur pas na// 'gro la/
4244(): phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub// ji srid 'tsho bar bdag ni tshangs spyod cing // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi// me tog rnams dang dri dang bdug pa dang // de bzhin chang yang brang
4245(): bar mi bgyi'o// lus la rin chen rnams ni mi thogs shing // mchil lham mi 'tshal rin chen gtsug phud min// khri rkang gser las bgyis pa mi nyal zhing // rgyal po'i rkyen gyi gos kyang mi 'tshal
4246(): lo sil snyan glu dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing // rma bya ngang pa'i sgra la'ang nyan mi bgyid// skye bos mdun bdar bud med gnas spang zhing // gcig pu mal na gnas shing rlung g.yab min// bdag ni gling nas
4247(): gling du mchis bgyi zhing // dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi// khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa bsten bgyi zhing // rab tu byung ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bgyi// gzugs dang longs spyod dbang
4248(): phyug dregs pa yis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrod mi bgyi// byang chub sems ni 'dor bar mi bgyi zhing // rtag tu yid byung srid gsum spyad par bgyi// sbyin dang snyan smra don spyod don thun pas/
4249(): sems can bsdu ba la ni brtson bgyi zhing // bla med theg pa dam pa 'di la yang // srog chags bye ba mang po yongs smin bgyi// chos don nyan cing bshad par bgyi slad du// nyin mo dus gsum mtshan mo
4250(): dus gsum du// ri rab lta bu'i spyan sngar nyer mchi zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod pa'ang bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des rgyal bu gzhon nu snying
4251(): rje cher sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// khyod kyis bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa des na khyim na gnas kyang rab tu byung ba
4252(): dang yon tan mtshungs pa yin no// khyod kyi snying rje chen po de ni yon tan gyi mchog yang dag par bsgrub pa yin no// de ltar rgyal bas bsngags pa las// gzhan la med pa'i dga' bas brgyan/
4253(): rang gi dam bca' g.yo med pa// lhun po lta bur brtan par gyur// de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas gzhon nu snying rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas// bdag nyid bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba
4254(): dang bcas pa rab tu byung nas/ ring po ma thogs par gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin dang mngon par shes pa lnga mngon du gyur to// rgyal po gzhon nu snying rje cher sems ni rgyal srid du dbang bskur nas zla ba nya bo
4255(): cog gi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing rjes su ston pa'ang byed de/ 'dus byas rnams ni snying po med pa ste// chu shing bzhin du brtag na stong pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams ni
4256(): u dum par bzhin// bskal pa bye ba mang la res 'ga' 'byung // tshe yang grog bzhin 'gyur bzhin mi rtag ste// yo byad rnams ni rtsa ba'i zil pa bzhin// de bas myur du 'bang/
4257(): pas bstan pa la// thub rnams dgyes par myur du bsgrub par byos// bag med dbang du 'gyur bar gyur ta re// 'jig rten bde ba bskal pa brgyar spyad kyang // slar yang 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal
4258(): phung por 'gyur// de bas zag med bde ba gya nom pa// ri rab lta bu'i bka' las myang bar byos// zhes bya ba la sogs pa sems can thams cad la yang dag par bsgrags shing / ci nas srog
4259(): chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag gnyis sangs rgyas kyi bsten pa la byang chub tu sems bskyed cing rab tu byung nas phyir mi ldog pa kho nar gyur to// de ltar rgyal ba'i thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor
4260(): dang // 'gro ba'i pangad tshal dus la bab pa yis// gzhon nu'i snying rje'i rlan gyis badran gyi sra/ 'gran pa bzhin du rgyal sras pad tshal rgyas// de yis skye 'gro'i cod pan mdzes byed pa'i// rgyan gyur rgyal ba
4261(): mchog tu gyur to zhes// dpag med rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngags mdzad cing // rgyal sras bung ba'i tshogs rnams tshim 'gyur bar// da dung du yang phyogs kun gsal bar khyab// de ltar skyes bu dam
4262(): pa de'i snying rje dang ldan pa'i spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags par gyur cing // sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams der tshangs par spyod pa shin tu
4263(): rgya cher 'phel bar gyur to// de lta bu phyis byung ba'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de ni 'od dpag tu med pa yin no// 'jam
4264(): dpal ni chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to// bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa stong ni rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i bu stong du gyur to// nga ni rgyal bu gzhon nu snying
4265(): rje cher sems zhes bya bar gyur to// zhes gsungs so// de lta bas na byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs shing sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags par 'dod pas thabs mkhas pa'i snying rje
4266(): chen po la gnas par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// rgyal po gzhon nu snying rje cher sems kyi skyes pa'i rabs te drug bcu gnyis pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni snying rje
4267(): chen po'i dbang gis sems can gyi don du thabs mkhas pa la brten nas 'dod pa mngon du brten pa ltar snang yang de nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur la/ don chen po bde brag tu 'grub par yang
4268(): 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i snga rol na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub tu spyad pa spyod pa na/ re shig khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar
4269(): gyur to zhes grag go// de ni 'di lta bu'i tshul dang ldan par gyur te/ shes rab yongs su sbyangs shing zhi ba yis// mi yi 'jig rten dam pa'i spyod pa la// rab tu gyur cing gzi byin ches bas
4270(): brgyan 'khor lug dbus kyi lhun po mtho ba bzhin// yon tan tshogs kyis che ba'i gnas su gyur// de ni skyo ba goms par gyur pa pis// sbyim na dga' ba shin tu
4271(): spangs gyur te// dben par spyod pa rnam par dag pas mdzes// de yi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa ni// gsar mgar mkhas pas byas pa'i rgyan bzhin dag/ de yi tshul khrims rnam par
4272(): dag pa ni nor bu snying pos mngon par smras pa 'dra// de yi snying rje rnam par dag pa ni// skye bo'i yid rnams mgu bar byed pa bzhin// de yi lus ni brgya byin mngon sum bzhin// mthong ba'i
4273(): skye bo yid kyang g.yo bar byed// de yi zhal ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar// mthong bas skye bo'i gdong gi pad+ma dag/ so yi zo 'bru gsal bar snang byed cing // de yis dbang med khrid par byed pa snyam//
4274(): de ltar khye'u skar ma de bdag nyid yon tan gyi tshogs la goms par gyur cing / tshangs par spyod pa dang dben pa'i phan yon mngon du gyur nas/ khyim gyi gnas spangs te/ nags khrod dben pa zhig brgyan
4275(): par gyur to// de ni nags khrod zhi ba na// thub pa dgyes pa'i brtul zhugs dang // rjes su mthun par spyod byed cing // 'dod pa rnams dang mthun ma gyur// de de ltar rang bzhin dang / snying rje chen po
4276(): dang / lus kyi yon tan dang / blo gros kyis che ba yin yang / skye bo de rnams 'dod pas g.yengs shing bag med pa kho na shas che bas/ de grong khyer du 'gro bar mi byed cing / gang na grong khyer
4277(): las ring du gyur pas/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang zhing rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bzang po dag skye ba/ dben pa'i gnas su rung ba zhig tu 'dug ste lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod
4278(): pa spyad do// de nas dus re shig skyes bu dam pa de rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor pa zhes bya bar phyin pa na pho brang 'khor gyi grong khyer de nas bu mo lang tso dar la bab pa zhig chu blang ba'i phyir 'ongs pas/
4279(): khye'u skar ma mthong nas de'i gzugs bzang po de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi sems drag po g.yos par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems so// e ma bram ze'i khye'u 'di// gzugs dang
4280(): lang tse'i yon tan dpal// 'dod ldan yid kyi lcags kyu bzhin// bdag gi yid kyang rab tu drangs// 'dzag rten bde sbyin mngon sum bzhin// 'di 'dra mnyes par ma gyur pa// bdag ni
4281(): bsam pa don med do// de bas 'dir ni bdag gis ni// ci ltar mdzes tshul yid g.yo ba// zla ba'i rkyen gyis ku mu da // gsal ba bzhin du byed zhig gu/ 'dir ni 'bad par rigs pa snyam//
4282(): de ltar srid pa'i kun rtog g.yos gyur te// 'dod pa'i dbang gis brtan pa'i ngo tsha nyams// byang chub sems dpa' skar ma mthong nas ni// myur ba'i shugs kyis gom pa bor te dong // de ltar
4283(): bud med de khye'u'i drung du rgyags te dong nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' khye'u skar mas smras pa/ sring mo khyod ci 'dod/ bu mos smras pa/ khye'u bdag khyod 'tshal
4284(): los khye'us smras pa/ kho bo ni 'dod pa dgos pa ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ gal te bdag khyod dang 'tshal bar mi 'gyur na ni bdag 'di nyid du 'gum par 'gyur ro//
4285(): de nas khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma'o 'jig rten ngan pa 'di// 'dod dang sred pas rab tu dkris// bdag gis mi lo bzhi khri dang // nyis stong tshangs par spyod spyad de// 'dir ni
4286(): brtul zhugs 'jig byed pa// 'dir ni rigs pa ma yin no// snyam du bsams nas nan gyis thon te song pa dang / de nas bu mo de kha sbub tu 'gyel nas mya ngan gyis zin te lus rdul zhing tshe'i dus
4287(): byed pa la zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpas rnam pa de mthong nas gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa na/ snying rje chen po skyes te 'di snyam du gyur to// kye ma'o mtshar byas/ 'jig rten gnas
4288(): pa 'di dag shin tu rmongs// 'dod pa'i me 'di thog ma med pa nas// rab tu 'bar bas yul gyi bud shing bsregs// da dung 'di la chog par ma gyur mtshur// 'dod pas 'gro rnams dbang med/
4289(): bdas gyur te// 'khor ba'i gcong rong nyam ngar lhung byas shing // skye dang rga ba na ba 'chi ba yi// sdug bsngal brgya phrag du mas gnod par byas// 'dod pa'i rgyu yis mi dge spyad pa yis// khrag dang
4290(): khu ba bshang gci dring ba// 'dres pa'i mngal gnas mun ru pa nag po ru// yang yang skyes shing lus bskyod mi shes kyang // da dung phyir phyir 'dod la zhen pa mtshar// kha cig phon 'dod 'dod pa spyad
4291(): pa la 'byung ba'i 'bras bu bu zhes bltas byas kyang // phan par mi byed byed pa tshul min pas// bsad dang 'ching zhing zhing dang longs spyod rnams// 'phrog par byed cing ci yang byar med pa// 'dod
4292(): pa'i phyir yin yin par ma shes mtshar// dmyal ba'i gnas na 'bar ba'i bud med dag/ me stag 'khrug pa'i mtshon gyi phreng ba yis// brgyad kyang las kyis mdzes pa ltar mthong nas// shal
4293(): ma li li ri bo rab 'bar ba// mtshon rnon gtams pa'i lam du rgyug byed cing // sha dang rus pa rkang rnams thal byung ste// phye mar brlags nas slar yang sred pa yis// dbang med yun rings
4294(): dmyal ba'i gnas su 'khyams// dmyal ba'i gshed po las kyis byas pa dag/ mthong nas khyim thab 'du shes rnyed gyur te// drung du snyegs pas bzung ste 'bar ba yi// gzhi la bzhag ste thu lum
4295(): 'bar ba yis// skyes gnas nas bsregs brang gi rgyab mdo ru// sha rgyus bsregs shing tshir tshir sgra byung nas// 'o dod cho nge 'byin pa tsam la zhugs// de la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal du ma rnams//
4296(): 'dod pa bsten pas yang nas yang myong yang // da dung 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba mtshar// 'di ltar rang dbang med pa 'di// kye ma bdag gi sdug bsngal bzhin// bdag ni tshul khrims zhig gyur te//
4297(): mnar med 'bar bar zhugs kyang bla// 'di ni sdug bsngal bcas bzhin du// tshe yi 'du byed byas gyur na// bdag kyang sregs par 'gyur ba bzhin// de bas bdag nyid sdug bsngal yang /
4298(): #gzhan gyi bde ba yud tsam yang // dam pa rnams kyi bsgrub bya yin// de lta bu'i sems bskyed nas/ rigs kyi bu khye'u skar ma slar log ste/ bu mo de lag pas bzung ste/
4299(): sring mo khyod ci 'dod pa bya yis longs shig ces smras so// de nas khye'u skar ma bu mo de'i khyim du song ste lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du khyim gyi gnas de nyid du gnas te/ slar yang khyim nas khyim
4300(): med par rab tu byung nas tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed par gyur to// dam pa rnams kyi snying rje yi// stobs kyi nyon mongs bcom byas nas// yon tan lhag par 'phel 'gyur te// sngags
4301(): kyis bcom pa'i dug bzhin no// de ltar snying rje chen po'i dbang du gyur pas/ khye'u skar mtsho 'phos ma thug tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to zhes grag go// 'di lta bu'i don yang
4302(): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i dus na khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba de ni nga yin te/ grags 'dzin ma ni bu mo der gyur to// ngas 'dod pa ngan pa de la snying rje chen po skyes pas kyang bskal/
4303(): pa stong phrag bcu'i 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur to zhes gsungs so// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni
4304(): snying rje chen po la rag las so zhes snying rje'i phan yon bsngags pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i sgo mngon du gyur pa na nyon mongs dman pas kyang de nyid la nges par byung ngo zhes thabs ma khas pa bsngags pa
4305(): la'ang brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na sems can gcig gcig gnas skabs kyi bde ba nyams su myong na/ bdag nyid dmyal bar sdug bsngal
4306(): nyams su myong ba dag kyang bzod par mdzad pa'i thugs rje dang ldan na da ltar lta ci smos zhes sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// khye'u skar ma'i skyes pa'i rabs
4307(): te drug cu gsum pa'o// skyes bu dam pa rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa du ma dag gis sems can rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi go 'phang la 'jog par byed do//
4308(): de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i snga rol du bskal pa chen po ut+pal zhes bya ba byung ba na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di byu ru byung ba zhes bya ba snyigs
4309(): ma lnga dang ldan par gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur te/ re shig cig lha dang mi'i 'gro ba skyong bar byed pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas gzhan gyi dor sgrub
4310(): pa la brtson par byed pa'i lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin legs par snang byed ces bya bar gyur to zhes grag go/ de ni gzhan du spyad pa'i mthus// lha yi longs spyod phun tshogs pa// 'byor pa'i
4311(): dbang phyug de thob kyang // bag med ring du spangs par gyur// gzhan don spyod pa'i bsam pa can// snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dag/ lha dbang dpal la'ang tshogs med cing // gzhan don yongs
4312(): su spyod par gyur// de ltar brgya byin de lha dang mi'i 'gro ba bdag gi mnga' ris su gyur pa rnams skyong bar byed pa'i tshe 'dzam bu gling pa rnams bag med par gyur te/ ngan par
4313(): spyod pa bcu dang ldan par spyod pas ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba la phal cher gzhol bar gyur to// de'i tshe kye ma 'jig rten pa 'di dag ni ma rungs par gyur to// 'di ltar log par ltung ba
4314(): 'di las bdag gis ji ltar bskyab par bya/ log par rtog pa'i skye bo ngan pa dag/ byams pa'i tshig gis bzlog par yongs mi nus// rtsub mo'i tshig kyang me lce 'bar ba bzhin// rang gzhan
4315(): rgyud rnams sreg par byed mod kyang // brtse ba'i yid can bu la brdeg pa ltar// rtsub mo'i thabs kyang 'gal ba med pa snyam// bde yang sdug bsngal rgyur gyur spang bya ste// ma sha'i 'bras chan dug/
4316(): dang 'dres pa bzhin// de bas da ni ci nas brtson byas te// nus pa'i stobs ldan brtson pa bya ba'i rigs// mthu rtsal yod bzhin ci ste ya la dor na// brten pa'i 'gro rnams g.yang sar khrid pa bzhin/
4317(): bdag gi sems kyang gzhan du 'gyur bar byed// de bas na da ni nges par thabs bya ba'i dus la bab bo snyam ste/ sems dpa' chen po des bdag nyid gnod sbyin gyi gzugs shin tu 'jigs su rung ba
4318(): mthong na spu zing zhes byed par nus pa zhig tu sprul te/ rab tu gnag pa'i dus mtshams phyogs kyi char sprin lta bu'i lto ba can/ skra dang smin ma rab tu 'bar zhing nags kyi me lce 'phro ba bzhin// g.yo
4319(): ba'i mig ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor khrag dang bcas pa lta bur 'jigs// khro gnyer rab bsdus mche ba gtsigs shing sen mo zag gis gos pa bzhin// de ltar gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'jigs su rung
4320(): ba de 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag gi mdun du 'dug pa na mi de dag skrag cing dang de la spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ zhe sa dang bcas te gnod sbyin chen po khyed la ci 'tshal// khyed gang bzhed pa 'bul bar
4321(): bgyi'o// des smras pa/ kho bo la kha zas drag dgos so// me de dag gis gsol pa/ khyed kyi kha zas ci lta bu lags/ gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/ mi sha shin tu dron mo dang // pi yi khrag ni gsar/
4322(): pa dag 'phrog byed nga yi zas dang skom// de btsal phyir ni 'dir 'ongs so// de bas na khyed cag rnams shes par gyis shig/ deng phyin chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i lam yang dag par len
4323(): pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yang ngas bza' bar mi nus kyi/ gang mi dge ba'i spyod pa log par lta ba can/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la yang dag par mi gnas pa
4324(): de dag nga yis za ba yin no zhes smras shing / des bdag nyid kyis sprul pa'i mi dge bzung ste yan lag dang nying lag dag phral zhing sha rus dag cham tshom du za bar bstan pa na/ mi de dag shin tu rang
4325(): 'jigs shing srog dang phral du dogs pa'i sems kyis mi dge ba thams cad las bzlog cing dge ba bcu'i lam la yang dag par bkod nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ rang shugs/
4326(): kyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad dang / gling bzhi pa gzhan du 'khod pa rnams kyang de lta bu'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum la nges par bkod do// de ltar thabs la mkhas
4327(): pa'i tshul rab tu bstan pa'i mthu 'di ni// snying rje'i rang bzhin can rnams kyis// tshul 'di spyad par rigs pa snyam// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis gzhan gyi don yongs su spyod pa la
4328(): thabs la mkhas par bya ba dang / mthar thug bde bar gyur na gnas skabs su gzhan la 'jigs pa dag kyang bstan par bya'o zhes kyang brjod par bya'o// brgya byin gyi skyes pa'i rabs te drug cu bzhi pa'o//
4329(): skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ thabs mkhas pas bdag nyid byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs shing skye bo bag med pa rnams
4330(): thabs mkhas pas bskul zhing mngon par shes pa la sbyor bar byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa rnams dang mthun par
4331(): 'jug pa rnga ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pa de re shig cig phyi rol pa'i spyod pa dang mthun pa'i drang srong rnams kyi nang du ston pa lkugs 'phye zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// rang rgyud yongs su sbyang
4332(): shing zhi ba yis// mi yi 'jig rten dpal gyis 'khyud gyur te// de na'ang skyo bo'i yid kyis bskul gyur nas// thub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben par 'gro// der yang de ni chags med sbyangs po
4333(): yis / skye bo rnams kyi don kun grub par byed// rig byed gnas la de ni tshangs pa bzhin// dka' thub grub pas lha yi bla ma bzhin// lha rnams kun gyis mchod pas brgya byin bzhin// gtsug lag bstan
4334(): bcos mthong byed mig ji bzhin// shes 'dod rnams kyi don byed gyur pas na// gsal bar 'jig rten ston pa zhes su grags// de lta bu'i ston pa bram ze de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la rjes su ston cing
4335(): grong khyer las ring du gyur pa shin tu dben pa/ dka' thub can dang rdzas su mthun pa'i gnas/ shing ljon pa'i tshogs bskyed shing ltar bkram pa/ chu gtsang ma'i chu mig dang lteng ka du ma dang ldan pa
4336(): pad+ma dang ut+pal la sogs pa'i me tog mdzes shing dri zhim pa rtsa ba bzar rung ba rnams skyes pa/ tshod rjid dang 'bras bu du ma yid bzhin du skye ba'i dgon pa zhig tu gnas so// 'jig rten ca co rnam spangs te//
4337(): dgon dben spyod pa spyod gyur pa// dam pa'i drung du gnas pa dag/ myur du yon tan 'phel ba yin// 'on kyang bag chags kun rtog 'di// na chung sred pas myos pa bzhin// 'dod pa'i yul la chag
4338(): gyur pa sa dben par gnas kyang 'dod bya la// rang dbang med par drangs pa bzhin// g.yo zhing bag med spyod gyur pa// brtson ldan rnams kyi gegs yin zhes// thub pa chags bral rnams kyis
4339(): bstan 'de ltar dka' thub kyi gnas na bram ze'i khye'u rnams la ston pa chen po des rjes su bstan kyang yon tan mchog thob par ma gyur pas/ ston pa bram ze de 'di snyam du gyur te/ ci'i phyir bram
4340(): ze'i khye'u 'di rnams mngon par shes pa lnga ma thob snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du 'di rnams ni g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyu gu dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs/
4341(): gzar gyi snod lhag pa 'chang zhing / tshong rngad dang ut+pala'i rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa las gyur to snyam du shes so// shes rab ldan pa'i blo ni ston zla bzhin// dkar zhing gsal bar sa
4342(): yi steng du 'bab// des ni blo ldan ku mu da yi tshal// dgod pa bzhin du yon tan 'phel bar byed// de nas 'di snyam du bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la nan tu re zhig ma byas na spyod pa 'di
4343(): 'bral bar dka' ba snyam ste/ byang chub sems dpas thabs mkhas pa mngon du byas nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ khye'u dag zla ba gsum po 'di'i bar kho bo nang du yang dag
4344(): par 'jog 'dod kyis kho bo la 'bras bu dang rtsa ba stob pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang / gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs par bdag gi gan du gcig kyang ma 'od cig/ yon tan thob
4345(): par byed pa la// rnam g.yeng ring du ma byas shing // longs spyod sred pa ma btang na// dben par gnas kyang ci zhig phan// de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis kyang khrims su byas te rtsa ba/
4346(): dang 'bras bu stob pa'i bram ze gcig dang / gso sbyong bco lnga pa ma gtogs pa su yang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes dam bcas te/ bdag nyid chen po nang du yang dag par 'jog
4347(): pa la zhugs so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na ston pa lkugs 'phyes rgyang ring po nas ri dgas zhig mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so// ri dgas 'ongs pa legs so tshur shog cig/ ri dgas khyod
4348(): dang kho bo mtshungs pa ste// khyod kyang lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog shes shing // bdag kyang lto 'grangs tsam gyis kun tu chog/ 'di na kha cig de lta ma yin te// ha cang bag med 'dod pa'i dbang gyur/
4349(): pas tshong rngang ut+pa la yi rtsa ba dag/ sbyor bar byed la nyin mtshan brtson par gnas// de skad ces smras pa bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis thos te/ 'di snyam du mkhan po ni gdon mi za bar brtul zhug
4350(): rdzogs par gyur te/ ri dgas dang lhan cig smra bar byed do snyam nas thams cad 'dus te mkhan po'i drung du song nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de la ston pa bram ze cang mi
4351(): smra'o// mkhas shing zab pa rnams kyi tshig/ ma brtags gyur na blo ldan yang // re shig dub pa nyid du 'gyur// brtags pas rig nas mngon du 'gyur// de nas yang bram ze'i khye'u rnams mkhan
4352(): po ni ri dgas dang lhan cig smra bar byed kyi/ mi rnams dang ma yin no snyam nas stan las langs te song ngo // de nas dus gzhan zhig na ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can zhig ston pa lkugs 'phye gang na ba
4353(): der song ba na de la 'di skad ces smras pa/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so legs// ri dgas rjes zhugs brtul zhugs can// khyod dang kho bo mtshungs pa ste// cho ga shes pa dang ldan phyir ro// gang gi
4354(): g.yang gzhi ril ba spyi blugs dang // blugs gzar gcig gis legs par chog shes la// bza' ba lto 'grangs tsam gyis 'tsho byed pa// 'di ni dka' thub can la rigs pa
4355(): yin 'di na kha cig de lta ma yin te// g.yang gzhi dang ni de bzhin shing shun dang // dbyu gu ril ba blugs gzar yo byad rnams// lhag pa 'chang zhing 'dod pa'i rjes zhugs te// tshod rdad khre rgod ut+pat+pa
4356(): rtsa ba dag/ sbyor zhing brtson pas dus kyang 'da' bar byed// de skad smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis thos nas 'di snyam du gyur te phan tshun smras pa/ kye ma mkhan po chen po ni 'dod chen pa la
4357(): ni rnam par smod la 'dod pa chung ba rnams la bstod pas/ don gyis na mkhan pos bdag cag la nan tur byas kyis/ da ni bdag cag rnams g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyug gu dang / ril ba
4358(): spyi blugs dang / blugs gzar gyi snod lhag pa rnams chu bo d+hA 'bab kyi nang du bor la mkhan po gang na ba der 'dong ngo // de nas bram ze'i khye'u bro ldan rnams// don de rig pas ngo tshar bcas gyur te/
4359(): yo byad lhag pa de dag rnams spangs nas// bdag gi mkhan po'i drung du nye bar lhags// de ltar bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis yo byad lhag pa rnams spangs te mkhan po'i drung du thams cad kyang rgyud
4360(): gtsang ba dang spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang bcas te song nas mkhan po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas ston pa lkugs 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyi sems
4361(): kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams kyi rang bzhin shes pas/ ji lta ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyi mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to// de ltar
4362(): thugs rje che zhing blo ldan pas// thabs kyis 'dod dang rnam g.yeng rgyun bcad de// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi// lam la drangs te mngon par shes la bkod// des na tshul 'di/
4363(): 'di na mngon sum bzhin// zhi gnas rtsa ba 'dod pas dben pa ste// rnam g.yeng gis ni 'jig rten rmongs par byed// rmongs bral shes rab ldan pa'i lhag mthong gis// 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan/
4364(): 'das 'gro zhes// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa mdzad// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pas bram ze'i khye'u de thams cad kyis mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing bla na med pa'i
4365(): byang chub la bkod do// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do zhes thabs mkhas pa'i phan yon bsngags pa dang / rnam par g.yeng
4366(): ba dang 'dod pas ni byang chub kyi lam las ring bar byed do zhes 'dod pa'i nyes pa bstan pa dang / dben pa'i phan yon bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// ston pa bram ze'i skyes pa'i rabs te drug
4367(): cu lnga pa'o// skyes bu dam pa rnams ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas glu dang gar la sogs pa rnam par g.yeng ba dang ldan pa lta bu la brten nas kyang sems can rnams/
4368(): yongs su smin par byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na re shig cig gar mkhan gyi rigs su skye ba bzung bar gyur to zhes
4369(): grag go// de yang sngor byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i snga rol gyi 'ang ches snga rol na/ gar ma khan gyi slong dpon 'gro ba thams cad kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba 'dzangs shing gsal
4370(): ba yid gzhungs pa/ mkhas shing brtan la gzhan gyi yid dang mthun pa/ tshig bzung bar 'os pa/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dga' bar byed pa/ dus shes pa/ pha dang ma dang dge sbyong dang bram ze la
4371(): dga' bar 'jig rten gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs shing tshig smras pa tsam gyis sems can gyi bsam pa 'dzin par byed pa zhig byung ngo // mkhas shing gsal ba'i rang bzhin can// yon tan tshegs
4372(): kyi dpal 'bar ba// de ni skye bo kun dang mthun// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no// de'i bu mo 'gro ba'i dpal mo zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsam pa
4373(): che ba/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug chung ba/ mi las 'das shing lha'i gzugs dang kha dog lta bu glu gar la mchog tu mkhas pa mthong ba tsam gyis skye bo rnams kyi mig 'dzin par byed pa zhig
4374(): byung ste de yi lus ni dpal gyis rab tu brgyan// de yi gdong ni ston zla lta bur dkar// de yi mig ni ut+pal sngor po bzhin// de yi yan lag pad+ma'i rtsa ba 'dra// gang gi gdong la mig gi ut+pal rgyas
4375(): pa dang 'apad+ma dkar 'dra'i so yi phreng ba rab dkrigs shing // ban d+hA dzI ba ka rgyas 'dra'i mchu smos dmar gsal// sna rgyud mtho mdzes smin ma'i 'dab ma g.yo bas brgyan// skye bo'i yid rnams 'dren/
4376(): par byed pas lcags kyu bzhin// bzhin ras ldan 'di pad+ma'i mtsho dang mtshungs pa snyam// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i dpal mo 'di// chags ldan yid rnams 'dren byed kyang // chags pa'i sems las
4377(): grol ba snyam// rin chen rgyan gyis rab brgyan pa'i// yan lag gis gar mdzes byed kyang // sgeg pa'i tshul la 'phyar ba spangs// ka la bing ga'i sgra dbyangs pas// snyan par dag tu glu len kyang //
4378(): tsaco'i 'bring bar byed pa min// snying rje'i dbang gis sems can la// chags pa'i tshul gyis nyon mongs gcod// de ni dam pa'i spyod pa yin// de ltar gar mkhan gyi bu mo 'gro ba'i dpal mo gang na /
4379(): bo'i tshogs mang po 'dus shing 'khod pa der/ bdag nyid rgyan thams cad kyis mngon par brgyan nas skye bo'i tshogs kyi mdun du 'dug ste glu 'di skad ces blangs so// lang tse 'di dag ri bo'i chu lha
4380(): 'gro skud cig thang cog yud tsam gcig tu lhung // byis pa'i skye bo rab tu myos pa dag/ brgyal zhing g.yo ba'i shugs kyang mi shes so// smon ka'i sprin sdug snying po med pa dang // char rgyun grag+sa
4381(): ltar lang tse 'gro ba yin// gang dag gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings pas ni// mi rtag mi ltung bar ni mi 'dzin no// ji ltar byis pa khye'u'i ma ma ltar// mi mkhas blo gros ngan pa de dag ni// yid bsku
4382(): 'chi bar 'gro mi shes so// de nas 'bras bu med pas yid spags pa// de ni mi rtag 'jigs pas skams par byed// bsod nams med pas 'chi mtha' srog
4383(): 'joms so// mkhas pa gang dag rgyal ba'i gsung rab la// rtag tu brtson pas lang tso'i dga' ba la// mkhas pa de yis dga' bar mi bya'o// mkhas pas bde bar gshegs pa'i
4384(): gsung rab las// snying po med par gsungs pa brtag par gyis// rgas pas de yi lang tse mngon du 'phrog/ gal te skye bo mkhas shing 'dzangs pa dag/ 'di dag bdag med lang tse rtog par
4385(): byed ji ltar skyes bu 'bad pas slongs mo pa// bde ba 'dod pas kun tu rgyu ba dag/ bde bar mi 'gyur bsnyas pa'i gnas su 'gyur// de bzhin rtag tu lang tse'i don byed pa// de yang mi rtag/
4386(): rgas pas zil mnan nas// kun tu zhum zhing sdug bsngal gnas su 'gyur// de bas lang tse'i dus la bab pa dag/ stobs dang brtson 'grus nyams par mi bya ste// bdag gi lang co rgas
4387(): pas mngon phrogs zhes// bgA yod spyod pas rgyal ba'i bstan la sbyar// gang dag lang co'i rnam pas yid 'phrog pa// kye ma bsam pa bslus shing stobs nyams so// lang tse'i rnam pa 'di ni
4388(): skad cig la// mi rtag stobs kyis myur du 'gyur bar byed// lang tso 'di la 'bad pas skad cig kyang // yongs su brtag par bya ba snga min pas// de bas mi ni lang co 'dzin pa'i tshe// rga shi thar
4389(): bar bya la 'bad par gyis// dge ba lang tse dus las 'das gyur kyang // chos ni nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin no// mkhas pa gang dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa la// spyod par byed pa bdud rtsi 'thungs pa yin//
4390(): chu yis btab pa'i me ni shi ba ltar// bdud kyi 'ching ba de yis gcod par byed// de lta bas na lang tse'i dus bab tshe// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la 'jug par gyis// zhes bya ba la sogs
4391(): pa'i legs par smra ba du mas 'gro ba de rnams theg pa gsum gyi lam dang rjes su mthun pa la sbyor zhing / mi rtag pa stong zhing zhi ba snying po med pa mngon du go bar byed do// 'di lta bu'i tshul 'di yang
4392(): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rmad du byung ba yin te/ gang na byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de dang de yis 'dul gyur pa// de la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad// gang tshe chags ldan sgyu ma la// 'ju
4393(): pa de tshe sems can la// sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul ston par mdzad// gang tshe 'jig rten gzugs kyis 'dul gyur pa// de tshe lha yi lus las brgyar 'phags pa'i// rin chen rgyan 'phreng mdzes pas
4394(): brgyan byas par// bstan nis 'dod pa'i 'dam rdzab skems par byed// zlos gar dbyangs dang drug 'gyur brgya dag gis// kA la bing ga'i sgra dbyangs 'phrog byed pa// ngag tshig dri ma med
4395(): par rab bsgrags nas// skye bo'i ngag rnams legs bshad tshig la sbyor// chags ldan chags bral byed la chags ldan bzhin// bstan pas bstan pa gsal byed bstan bcos bzhin/
4396(): snang mdzad snang ba'i 'od snang rgyas pa bzhin// 'di lta 'di ni sangs rgyas 'dir byung bzhin// gang gis mthong thos thar lam mchog la sbyor// kye ho rmad du
4397(): byung 'di bstan pa snyam// de ltar gar mkhan gyi bu mo 'gro ba'i dpal mo gang na grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor skye bo mang po 'du ba'i gnas de rnams su/ glu dang
4398(): gar gyi rnam pa la brten nas theg pa chen po'i lam ston cing dpag tu med pa byang chub tu smin par byas so// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas 'gro ba 'dul bar
4399(): byed pa'i stobs dpag tu med do zhes brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du mi rtag pa'i gtam bye ba la'ang brjod par bya'o// gar mkhan gyi skyes pa'i rabs te drug cu drug pa'o// /
4400(): skyes bu dam pa rnams ni thabs mabs pa du mas sems can rnams la 'dod pa'i nyes pa dang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ston par byed pas dpag tu med pa'i mngon mtho dang nges legs la sbyor
4401(): bar byed do// de yang 'di skad zos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus skye dgu rnams tshe lo dpag tu med pa na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i spyi bor sha'i lba ba shing ba la
4402(): 'dab ma lter 'jam pa zhig byung ste/ de smin cing rdol ba las/ khye'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser du snang ba/ mtshan bzang po sum cus kun nas
4403(): brgyan pa zhig byung ngo // de btsas ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo brgyad khri'i nu ma las 'o ma zags par gyur te/ da las nus nga las nus zhes smras pas khye'u'i ming yang
4404(): nga la nu zhes grags so// kha cig ni spyi bo skyes zhes zer ro// gzhon nu de rang gi bsod nams kyi mthus bskyed cing rtsed mo rtsi ba la brgya byin drug tshe 'phos pa'i bar lon no// de nas gzhon nu yul
4405(): gzhan zhig tu phyin te kun tu spyod pa la brgya byin drug tshe 'phos pa lon no// de'i tshe rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags na bar gyur nas/ 'tsho bar byed pa rnams kyis gsos kyang ma phan te dus las
4406(): 'das par gyur nas/ pho nya btang ste gzhon nu tshur byon khyod kyi yab ni grongs kyis rgyal srid bzhes shig ces springs pa las/ nga la nus bsams pa gal te bdag gi yab drongs na der song nas
4407(): ci zhig bya/ gal te kho bos chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal srid thob par gyur du zin na ni 'di nyid du rgyal srid du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas de skad du springs so// yang blon po rnams kyis gsol
4408(): pang rgyal srid du dbang bskur ba la seng ge'i khri dang / cod pan dang / gdugs la sogs pa dang / yo byad mang du 'tshal gyis pho brang du gshegs su gsol/ des smras pa/ ngas rgyal srid chos
4409(): dang mthun par thob pa lta na 'di nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin lha gnas zhes bya bas rin po che'i btsal dang / seng+ge'i khri de nyid du blangs so// pho brang 'khor du gnas pa rnams kyis cod/
4410(): pan la sogs pa khyer te 'ongs nas lha dbang bskur ba bzhes su gsol zhes smras pa dang / gzhon nus smras pa/ kho bo chos dang mthun par rgyal srid thob na mi ma yin pa rnam
4411(): kyis cod pan 'ching bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi ma yin pa rnams kyis cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid du dbang bskur zhing rin po che sde bdun yang byung bar gyur to// bsod nams dpal gyis mngon par/
4412(): mtho ba yi mi dbang chos kyi rgyal po nga la nu// de ni rang gi bsod nams mthu yis 'dir// 'khor lo rin chen rta dang glang po dang // bud med khyim bdag dmag dpon rin chen bdun// mi mchog
4413(): bsod nams dpal gyis thob par gyur// dpa' zhing brtul phod gzugs dang ldan pa yi// bu yang stong du tshang ba byung bar gyur// de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang yang // gnas bcas zhes kyang grags
4414(): gyur te chu zheng dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa// gser gyi rabs yongs bskor zhing // ljon pa'i tshogs kyis rab bkra ba'i// skyed mos tshal rnams du mas brgyan// bai DUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i chu// lding du/
4415(): bsil ba du mas bskor// gser dang dngul gyi them skas can// pad+ma ut+pal du mas mdzes// bya rnams du ma sgra snyad 'byin// bung ba mdzes pa gar byed pa// de na skye bo myos pa rnams// 'dod pa'i/
4416(): longs spyod du ma dang // bcas shing dga' ba'i dpal gyis brgyan// kha cig rgyal po'i shis pa brjod// rgya mtsho mthar gtugs sa chen 'di// gdugs dkar gcog gis khebs pa bzhin//
4417(): lhan cig dpal la spyod par gyur// de ltar rgyal po ngal nus/ 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang byed par gyur to// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor na nags tshal stug po zhig yod pa
4418(): na drang srong lnga brgya bsam gtan byed pa las/ de na bya dkar po mang po gnas pa rnams sgra 'byin pa la drang srong bzhin ngan zhes bya ba 'khrugs nas gshog pa rnams theng la lhags par
4419(): gyur cig ces byas pas/ bya dkar de rnams 'dab ma byi zhing rkang gis 'gro bar gyur pa rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa 'di rnams ci nyes blon po rnams kyis gsol pa
4420(): bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas/ drang srong bsam gtan byed pa la gnod par gyur nas dmod pa bor ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ sems can la brtse ba med pa'i drang srong yang
4421(): yod pa lta/ shes ldan dag dong la drang srong rnams nga'i sa char ma 'dug cig ces smros shig/ de dag gis de skad ces bsgos pa dang / drang srong rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni gling
4422(): bzhi la dbang ba yin no snyam nas ri rab kyi bar rim du song ste gnas so// de'i dus kyi mi rnams bzo la sogs pa'i las rnams la rtog par byed 'jal bar byed pas rtog dpyod ces bya'o//
4423(): de nas rgyal po ngal nu ljongs rgyu ba na mi rnams zhing gi las dang / ras bal dang / 'khal ba dang / thags su bya ba byed par mthong nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ mi 'di
4424(): rnams ci zhig byed/ blon pos gsol pa/ 'tsho bar bgyid pa'i yo byad bgyid pa lags so// rgyal pos smras pa nga'i mi rnams 'di lta bu'i las
4425(): byed dam/ blon po rnams kyis gsol pa lha bza' ba dang gos kyi char dbab tu gsol ces gsol pa dang / de nas rgyal po nga la nu rang gi bsod nams mthu brtag
4426(): phyir sems ni bskyed par gyur ma thag/ 'bru rigs nyi shu rtsa bdun dang // sna tshogs gos rnams du ma dag/ lha rnams kyis ni char du phag// de tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa rnams//
4427(): longs spyod tshogs kyiso brel ba med par gyur// phan tshun dga' zhing bde ba rgyas gyur te// ston ka'i dpal bzhin rgyun du gnas par gyur// 'di rnams su'i bsod nams kyi mthu las byung / blon
4428(): po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha'i 'ang lags/ bdag cag gi'ang lags so// de nas yang rgyal po nga la nu rang gi bsod nams kyi mthu brtag pa'i phyir bdag gi pho brang du zhag bdun gyi bar du rin po
4429(): che sna bdun gyi char bab cing / phyi rol du ni kar Sha pa ni gcig kyang ma bab kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa na/ sems bskyed ma thag tu pho brang du rin po che sna bdun gyi char bab cing phyi rol du ni ma babri ste/
4430(): de ltar bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mthu che ba mngon du gyur te/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di rnams su'i bsod nams las gyur/ rgyal po'i lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis nyes te/
4431(): sbyar nas rgyal po'i lags so// zhes brjod na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ba zhig na/ 'on kyang khyed rnams las gang dag rin po che ci dang ci 'dod pa long zhig/ ces smras
4432(): so// de lta bu'i tshul gyis rgyal srid bsnyungs pa las brgya byin drug tshe 'phos pa lon no// gang gis bsod nams mthu yang dpag med la// 'dod pa 'di yang chog shes med gyur te// ji ltar me la shing
4433(): cho ga shes med// de ltar 'khor ba 'di ni mtshar cig byas// de nas rgyal po ngal nu 'di snyam du gyur te/ gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/ gang ngas bka' stsal dgos pa bka' 'og tu mtshud pa'i gling
4434(): gzhan lta yod dam/ lha gnas kyis smras pa/ shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba mchis kyis lha'ang der gshegs pa'i rig so// /
4435(): de nas sa yi bdag po de// khyogs dang dpung dang bzhon par bcas// bye ba brgyad 'bum lhan cig tu// lus 'phags gling du nye bar song // der yang snga ma bzhin du rang gi bsod nams kyi dpal 'byor
4436(): las grub pa/ bde ba'i yongs su spyad pa snga ma lta bu'i tshul gyis lo bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma gnas par gyur te/ dge ba bcu'i khrims dang rjes su bstan pa ston tsang der yang brgya byin drug tshe 'phos pa
4437(): lon no// de bzhin du nub kyi ba lang spyod du'ang snga ma lta bu'i tshul gyis song ste rjes su bstan cing brgya byin drug tshe 'phos pa'i bar gnas so// de nas yang gnod sbyin lha gnas las thos nas/ byang gi sgra mi snyan
4438(): ces bya ba de na/ 'byor cing rgyas pa'i longs spyod bsam gyis mi khyab pa nga yir bya ba med do zhes grag mod kyi/ 'od kyang der song ste dpung gi tshogs la bstan par bya'o snyam du sems rkyed
4439(): ma thag tu dpung gi tshegs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang bcas pa byang gi sgra mi snyad du song nas de nam rmos pa'i 'bras sA lu dang / dpag bsam gyi shing las skyes pa'i gos sna tshogs pa la yongs su spyod cing /
4440(): der yang brgya byin drug tshe 'phos pa lon no// yang rgyal po nga la nus lha gnas la smras pa/ bka' 'og tu ma chud pa'i gling gzhan lta yod dam/ lha gling gzhan ni ma mchis te 'on kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa zhes bya ba
4441(): ri rab kyi kha la gnas pa'i lha tshe ring zhing kha dog dang ldan pa bde ba mang ba mchis kyis lha rnams gzigs pa'i rigs so// de nas rgyal po nga la nu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la gling bzhi pa bkra ba lta na sdug
4442(): pa'ang yod/ rgyal srid rin po che bdun dang / bu dpa' zhing brtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa stong yang tshang / lo bye ba brgya stong du mar bde ba'i yongs su sbyar ba du ma'ang spyad mod kyi
4443(): 'on kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam du sems bskyed ma thag tu dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas chas so// mi yi bdag po nga la nu// dpung tshogs
4444(): bye ba brgyad 'bum dang // bcas te mkha' la 'gro ba de// sprin chen rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// mu khyud 'dzin dang rnam par 'dud// de bzhin ri bo rtan dang // lta na sdug dang seng ldeng can// gshel mnga' 'dzin
4445(): dang gnya' shing 'dzin// gser gyi ri bo khor yug bdun// rim pa phyed phyed kyis 'phags pa// dal b+his kun tu blta zhing dong // bde ba'i longs spyod nyams su myong // de ltar khor yug re re'i steng du yang //
4446(): lha dbang brgya byin drug drug tshe gnas te// lha mi'i bde ba yang yang myong gyur kyang // 'dod dang sred pa phyi phyir 'phel bar gyur// de ltar brgya byin bzhi bcu zhe gnyis kyi tshe tshad dang mnyam par ri bo bdun gyi steng
4447(): du rang gi 'khor lo rjes su ston cing slar yang ri rab kyi ngos la song ba na drang srong lnga brgya po de gnas pa las/ de rnams kyis rgyal po 'ongs pa mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po 'thab krol
4448(): can de 'ong ngo // de nas drang srong bzhin ngan zhes bya ba des sbyor bar chu blugs te gtor bas dpung gi tshegs thogs par gyur nas/ blon po rin po ches drung srong rnams la smras pa/ bram ze khro ba dor bar gyis/
4449(): 'di ni kun la grub pa yin// mi dbang rgyal po nga la nu// bya dkar de dag ma yin no// de'i 'og tu rgyal po nga la nus smras pa/ dpung 'di sus bkag/ drang srong rnams kyis so// de nas rgyal pos drang srong 'di
4450(): rnams ral pa byi nas mda' gzhu thogs te nga yi sngon nas 'gro bar gyur cig/ ces byas pa dang / de rnams ral pa byi nas sngon du dong ba dang / bud med rin po ches gsol pa/ lha 'di rnams drang srong dka'
4451(): thub can lags pas thong mdzod/ de nas rgyal pos slar btang bas/ brtson 'grus bskyed nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon du byas so// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ gang gis brgya byin mthu yang zil
4452(): mnon zhing // stobs dang brtson 'grus dpag tu med ldan pa'i// dmod pas drang srong dmod pa zil mnan nas// ral pa byi nas zhum pa bzhin du gyur// dbang por bcas pa'i srid pas
4453(): bstod byed cing // thabs kyis rgyal po'i cha lugs 'dzin gyur la// co 'dri byed pa 'bar ba'i phung po yi// drung na rtswa shing mngon du gnas pa bzhin// de nas rgyal po nga la nu dpung dang bcas pa ri rab kyi ngos la
4454(): song ba na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bsrungs ma rnam pa lnga 'di lta ste/ chu la gnas pa'i klu dang / phreng thogs dang / yol thogs dang / rtag myos dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis kyang rgyal po'i bsod nams
4455(): dgag par bya ba ma nus te/ gang na lha klu stobs chen dang // lha min gtum po stobs ldan rnams// phan tshun stobs kyis 'gegs byed kyang // bsod nams stobs kyi dpal 'bar ba'i// mi dbang 'gegs par/
4456(): mi spyod do// bskal pa dpag med bden pa'i stobs ni rab bsgrubs pa'i// sreg pa'i ngag la nags kyi me lha gtum po yang // skrag pa bzhin du zhum par gyur na sems ldan dag/ gus par mi spyod pa'ang 'jig
4457(): rten 'di na yod// de nas rgya lo nga la nu dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa'i sngon du lha rnams kyang 'gro bar gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas su song ngo // der lha rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag nr-i ste rgyug/ de rnam/
4458(): kyis smras pa/ mi'i rgyal po 'ong ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu dang ldan te dgag par mi bya'o snyam nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la sbran no// de tshe lha rnams
4459(): thams cad kyis// mi dbang bsod nams mthu rig nas// dga' bas yid kyang g.yo bzhin du// mchod yon kun gyis bsu bar gyur// de nas rgyal po ri rab kyi khar phyin pa dang tshul sngon po mdzes pa sprin spungs pa
4460(): lta bu mthong nas lha gnas la dris pa/ nags tshal mdzes pa sprin gyi phung po bzhin// rab tu gsal zhing mtho khyud 'phags pas mdzes// snum zhing gtsang la mthong bas yid g.yo ba// 'di 'dra snang ba 'di ni ci
4461(): zhig yin/ lnga gnas kyis smras pa/ 'di ni shing yongs 'dus rtol zhes bya ba lags te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la dga' mgur spyod pa'i gnas lags so//
4462(): lha'ang der gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas yang dkar zhing dkar ba sprin spungs pa lta bu mthong nas lha gnas la smras pa/ gangs kyi ri bo sprin dkar zhi bas 'khyud pa bzhin// ku mud dang zla ba'i 'od zer spungs
4463(): pa bzhin mthong na mdzes shing yid 'phrog byed pa lta bu yi// gnas 'di ci yin 'di yi ming yang myur du spros// lha gnas kyis smras pa/ 'di ni chos bzang 'dunas te// dbang por bcas pa'i lha rnams kun//
4464(): bgro zhing rtog par bgyid pa lags// lha yang gnas 'dir gshegs par 'gyur// de lta bu'i tshul dpung gi tshigs la ston cing lha'i grong khyer lta na sdug tu phyin to// grong khyer de ni chu zheng du dpag tshad nyi khri lnga stong
4465(): yod pa/ gser gyi rab rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ de dag gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gsum yod pa/ de dag la lcog rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang /
4466(): bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa skar bung dang bag ma legs par byas pa'o// grong khyer lhan sdug gi nang gi sa'i phyogs ni bzang po mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ tshon brgya zug ci
4467(): gis bkra bar byas pa/ dper na ras bal gyi 'dab ma ltar rkang pas mnan na ne ma zhes byed pa/ bteg na par ces byed pa/ lha'i me tog man+da ra ba pus mo nub tsam du bkram ste/ rlung langs pas me tog rnying pa rnams
4468(): 'khyer la/ me tog gsar pa rnams 'bab par byed do// lta na sdug gi grong khyer la sgo dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/ sko re re na gnod sbyin gos sngon po can go cha bgos pa/ mda' gzhu skyed bskor thogs pa lnga
4469(): brgyar 'di ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gnas so// grong khyer lta na sdug gi srid du ni dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod la/ zheng la dpag tshad bcu
4470(): gnyis yod de/ bzang po mdzes pa/ lta na sdug pa/ gser gyi bye mos bangal ba/ tsan dar gyi chus chag chag btab pa/ gser gyi dri bas bres pa/ de'i phyogs kun na rdzing bu rnam pa sna tshogs yod la rdzing bude
4471(): rnams pha gu rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai bAR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pas bskor ro// rdzing bu de rnams kyi them skas rnam pa bzhi po/ gser dang / dngul dang /
4472(): baiDUR+Ya dang shel las byas pa yin no// rdzing bu de rnams lan kan rnam pa bzhi po/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pas bskor zhing / rdzing bu de
4473(): rnams chu sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ning bsil bas gang la/ ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang zhing chu la gnas pa'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams
4474(): kyis snyan cing mdzes la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra skad 'byin par byed do// de'i phyogs kun nas me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / dbu rgyan skye ba dag shin tu dbyibs legs shing legs par skyes pa ni/
4475(): dper na phreng ba mkhan nam phreng ba mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis rna rgyan du bya ba'i phyir me tog gi phreng ba legs par brgyus pa bzhin no// thang la gnas pa'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i
4476(): gzugs can rnams kyang snyan cing mdzes pa'i sgra skad 'byin no// grong khyer lta na sdug na dpag bsam gyi gos kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa bzhi po/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams las/
4477(): dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi po/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams te/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag ji lta bu 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu thob par 'gyur
4478(): ro/ rgyan gyi shing rnam pa bzhi po rnams las rgyan rnam pa bzhi po lag pa'i rgyan dang / rkang pa'i rgyan dang / smad kyi rgyan dang / snang bar bya ba'i rgyan no// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo dag ji lta bu 'dod pa sems
4479(): bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu thogs par 'gyur ro// rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa bzhi po/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / sgra snyan rnams la lha'am lha'i bu mos ji lta bu sems bskyed ma thag
4480(): tu de lta bu lag na thogs par 'gyur ro// lha'i kha zas rnam pa bzhi po/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams las lha 'am lha'i bu mos ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de
4481(): lta bu lag tu thogs par 'gyur ro// khang pa dang / khang pa brtsegs ma dang / bsil khang dang / 'khyams skar khung dang / mthongs khung can bud med kyi tshogs rnams dang / lha mo'i tshogs rnams 'du ba'i gnas dag yo/
4482(): de de na btung ba sbrang rtsi'i btung ba dang / mA d+ha pa'i btung ba dang / ka dam b+ha ra'i btung ba dang / rol mo'i sgra skad rnams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ rang gi
4483(): bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bar byed do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs zhes bya ba/ srid du dpag tshad sum brgya pa/ rgyar dpag tshad sum brgya pa ste/ kho ra khor yug
4484(): tu dpag tshad dgu brgya yod pa/ bzang po mdzes pa/ ltan sdug pa/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba spu grong khyer de las dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi gyen du 'phags so// der sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bstan
4485(): bshams pa ni/ nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi stan dag so sor ba shams so// rgyal po nga la nu'i stan ni stan de dag thams cad kyi mjug kho nar
4486(): bshams so// de nas lha rnams kyis rgyal po nga la rubasu nas brgya byin dang nye dbang rnams rim pa bzhin du gral la 'khod pa na/ rgyal po la ru 'di snyam du sems so// gang stan rnams las tha ma gang yin pa ni gdon
4487(): mi za bar bdag gi yin gyi/ bdag la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyan byin gyi stan phyed bstabs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / des sems bskyed ma thag tu lha rnams kyi dbang pos stan phyed bstabs te/ stan la 'dug pa na/ brgya
4488(): byin dang ngang la nu gnyis gzugs dang gzi brjid khyad par med par 'dug ste/ gzhan du na mig phyed btsum gyi rnam pa tsam las lha dang mi'i bye brag reg pa tsam mo// de tshe lha dang mi rnams kun// 'dod pa'i longs spyod du ma la/
4489(): tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis// mi rnams khyad du 'phags par gyur// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/ longs spyod kyi phyir lha ma yin rnams lha la g.yul 'gyed du 'ong bar gyur te/ srung bar byed pa'i rim pa lngas
4490(): bzlog par ma nus pa de'i tshe/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis lha'i dbang po'i drung du song ste/ mkhyen par mdzod cig/ lha ma yin rnams bsrungs ma rim pa lnga dral te mchis kyis khyed kyis bsham pa dang bgyi ba mdzod cig
4491(): ces bskul nas lha rnams kyi dbang pos bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa go bgos shing rngas par gyur pa rgyal po nga la rus mthong nas smras pa/ lha'i dbang po bzhugs shig/ bdag mchi'o// brgya byin gyis/
4492(): smras pa de bzhin mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal po nga la nu// dpung tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang // bcas te go cha logs par bgos// mkha' la mngon par 'phags gyur te// lha dang lha min dmag dpung de rnams kyi//
4493(): gong du 'phags nas sprin phung bzhin du 'gro// de yi gzhu rgyud sgra skad spang ba dang // lha min dmag rnams ngo mtshar skyes gyur te// 'di ci sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i// bdag cag steng du 'gro ba 'di su zhig/ lha kha cig/
4494(): gis smras pa/ bdag cag steng la 'gro ba 'di// mi yi rgyal po ngal ru// dmag gi tshogs dang bcas pa yin// lha rnams rgyal bar byed pa yin// de skad ces thos nas/ lha ma yin rnams 'di
4495(): snyam dud kye ma gang gi shing rta bdag cag gi ltag gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyis dbang che bar grags pa yin no snyam nas 'jigs shing skrag la zhum par gyur nas bcom
4496(): zhing bros par gyur te lha ma yin gyi gnas su zhugs so// rgyal po nga la nus smras pa/ gang rgyal/ lha rgyal lags so// rgyal pos bsams pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams las ni bdag lhag go snyam
4497(): mo'ade lta bu'i tshul gyis rang gi bsod nams kyi mthu la spyod cing lha'i bde ba la spyod pa la brgya byin sum cu rtsa drug tshe 'phos pa yin no// sred pa'i me lce rab 'bar bas// yul gyi bud shing sreg byed pa//
4498(): bag med myos par gyur pa gang // brlag par byed pa'i 'byung khungs yin// de nas rgyal po ngal nu 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor cing bde ba'ang yod/ shar gyi lus 'phags dang / nub kyi
4499(): ba glang spyod dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / rin po che sna bdun dang / du dpa' ba brtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa stong yang yod/ bdag gi pho brang du gser gyi cher
4500(): zhag bdun gyi bar yang bab/ bdag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du'ang phyir/ lha'i dbang pos stan phyed kyang bstabs kyis/ kye ma bdag gis lha'i dbang po gnas 'di nas phyung la bdag kho na lha
4501(): dang mi rnams kyi rgyal srid la dbang bya'o snyam pa dang / de ma thag tu lha rnams kyi dpal 'byor de las nyams nas/ 'khor dang bcas pa 'dzam bu'i gling du babs te/ rgyal po ngal nu rang tshabs chen pos kyang
4502(): btab par gyur to// gang gis brgya byin brgya dang bcu bzhi'i tshe tshad du// lha dang mi yi longs spyod bde ba'i dpal spyad kyang // slar zhing 'dod pa 'phel ba'i skabs 'di bstan pa yis// srid pa'i dgon par
4503(): bag med spyi rnams kyi hud nyams// de nas rgyal po ngal nu'i blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / rtsis pa dang / sna che ba la gtogs pa rnams mya ngan dang bcas bzhin du/ rgyal po gang na ba der song ste/ 'di skad
4504(): ces gsol to// lha 'das nas ljongs kyi mi slad ma dag rgyal po nga la nu nongs pa'i tshe ci gsung zhes 'dri na/ ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi/ sna bo dag de skad du 'dri na/ 'di skad du lan thob cig/ rgyal po nga/
4505(): la nu ni rin po che sna bdun yang ldan/ gling bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i longs spyod kyi dpal la spyad kyang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag la ma ngoms bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes zer ro zhes smros shig/
4506(): kar Sha ba na'i char bab kyang // 'dod pa dag la ngoms pa med// mkhas pas 'dod pa mnog chung zhing // sdug bsngal mang bar shes nas ni// lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang // dga' bar gyur pa gnas med do//
4507(): yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// nyan thos sred pa zad la dga'// gangs kyi ri bo dang mnyam pa'i// gser gyi lhun po yod gyur kyang // gcig gi nor du'ang des mi chog/ mkhas pas de ltar shes
4508(): par gyis// gang zhig zhi ba'i bde ba rtogs pa des// 'dod pa dag la slar yang ji ltar dga'// 'jig rten longs spyod zug rngur rtogs nas ni// brtan pa gang dag 'dul phyir bslab
4509(): par bya/ de skad ces smras nas/ rgyal po nga la nus longs spyod kyi dngos po ci dang ci su 'dod pa rnams la byin cing / gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa dang / srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma
4510(): rgyal po nga la nu ga la ba der lhags par gyur te/ der lhags pa rnams thams cad la/ rgyal pos 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs kyi gdams pa dang / khyim na gnas pa dang / bag med pa la smad pa'i
4511(): gtam yang dag par bstan par gyur te/ 'jig rten pha rol nyam nga zhing // tshe thung bar ni shes byas nas// bdag gi bsod nams las bya ste// bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur//
4512(): de bas bsod nams 'dod pa yis// sbyin pa tshul bzhin btang bar bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// sbyin pas bde ba bla med 'thob// gang dag rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs dpal 'bar ba'i//
4513(): sa la spyod cing bag dang mi ldan na// srid pa gzhan du sdug bsngal dpag med 'gyur// lha dang mi yi longs spyod dpal ldan la// chags shing dbang med srid pa gzhan du 'gro// mkhas pas 'jig
4514(): rten srid la yid ma rton// gang dag 'khor ba'i dgon pa na// bag med chom rkun gyis bcom nas// thar pa'i srog dang phral byed cing // lus dang gnyen dang longs spyod rnams// mthong zhing gshin//
4515(): rje 'bar ba yis// las kyi zhugs pas drangs byas te// dran 'gro'i brtson khang nag po ru// mngon sum 'dir ni khring gyur tshe// de tshe kun tu yi mug gyur// de bsamakhas pa gang yin pa/
4516(): rgyal ba drang srong gis bsten pa'i// nags khrod rab tu zhi ba der// gcig pu bag yod spyad par gyis// zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su bstan pas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma rnams khyim
4517(): gyi gnas spangs nas/ drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste nags tshal du 'dug nas tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgom pa la gzhol bar gyur to// de'i tshe gzhan dag gis tshigs su bcad pa
4518(): ngal nub rgyal po mchog/ chos kyi bdag nyid rgyal po de// de ni khyogs dpung bzhon par bcas// chos kyi mtho ris bzhud ces grag/ de ri brgya byin brgya phrag dang // bcu bzhi'i bar du bde myong
4519(): nas slar yang bag med nyes pa yis// nyams thag rga shi mngon du gyur// kye ma 'khor ba snying po med// gang na sred pa ma zad pa// de yi sdug bsngal thar byed med// kye ma mi dbang rgyal
4520(): po de 'di ltar gyur pa mthong bzhin du// su zhig 'dod la dga' ba skye// kye ma rgyal po nga la nu// de yang thams cad spangs gyur te// 'jig rten pha rol 'gro dgos na// su zhig bag med
4521(): dbang du 'gyur// slar yang mi bdag rgyal po des// thub pa drang srong gis bsngags pa'i// lam de bstan nas pha rol song // zhes bya ba smras par nges so// de ltar rgyal po nga la nu'i rmad du byung
4522(): ba'i gdams pa rjes su sgrub par byed pa rnams tshe 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to// zhes grag go// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi
4523(): thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa tshad bzung bar mi nus so zhes rig par bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod pas chog mi shes pa'i nyes pa bskrun pa dang / longs spyod kyis ni nam yang thar pa'i gegs byed
4524(): pa yin no// zhes kyang brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du mi rtag pa'i tshul bstan pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// nga la nu'i skyes pa'i rabs te drug cu bdun pa'o// / skyes bu
4525(): dam pa rnams ni thabs mkhas pa du mas 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par 'jug cing ra ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba
4526(): 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po legs bcas zhes bya ba la/ bdag cag gi ston pa 'di 'dzam bu'i shing ba Ta skyes pa'i gnas su/ klu'i rgyal po gter ston ces bya bar skye ba bzung bar gyur
4527(): to zhes grag go// bdag nyid che ba rnams ni gzhan gyi phyir// sna tshogs don du sna tshogs spyod la 'jug/ de bas 'dir ni klu yi dbang po de// sa chen rgya mtsho'i 'jings rnams mthar gtugs
4528(): par rnam par dag pas rab tu dbang byed phyir// lhag bsam mthu yis skye ba rab tu bzung // snying rje'i klu dbang shes rab lus rgyas shing // thabs mkhas gdengs ka phyar ba'i mgo bos mdzes//
4529(): brtse ba'i sprin phung rab tu g.yo byed cing // legs bshad tshim par byed pa'i 'brug sgra sgrogs// ye shes 'od kyi dra ba rnam 'gyed cing // sbyin pa'i char rgyun rab tu 'thon byas te// 'gro ba'i zhing rnam
4530(): rab tu tshim byed pa'i// sems dpa' klu dbang chen po rnams la mas// de bas tshul 'di bstan par gyur pa snyam// de ltar bdag nyid che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ji srid du bdag gi don
4531(): ring du spangs te/ rtag tu sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa can des 'di ltar brtags pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling rnam rgyal sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba der skyes pa'i sems can rnams ni dbul zhing
4532(): 'phongs pa/ kun tu longs spyod kyis chog mi shes pa/ de'i dbang gis sgrib par spyod pa'i las la 'jug cing / log par ltung ba la kun tu gzhol bar rig nas/ de las bzlog pa'i phyir
4533(): bdag nyid chen po des rtsom pa 'di lta bus sbyor bar gyur te/ gang gi nub mo klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de nyid kyi tshe/ rin po che'i gtere bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mi rnams la kun tu bstan nas sgra skyugs
4534(): pakye sems can dag phyogs 'dir gser dang dngul dang bai DUR+Ya dang man shel dang byu ru dang skar mdog dang chu gdangs la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i gter dag yod
4535(): kyis so sor legs par long la rtsod pa med par blangs nas kyang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par zung zhig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/
4536(): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang la mos par sems bskyed cig/ de ltar byas na longs spyod thams cad kyang chud ma zos par 'gyur ro//
4537(): zhes rjes su bstan cing 'di ltar brjod par nges so// gang na 'dzam gling skye bo rnams// kun tu 'phongs par gyur pa la// 'dod dang bag med 'khrugs pa yis// thar par
4538(): 'gyur ba ma yin gyis// brag yod chog shes ldan pa yis// bdag gis bstan pa'i rin chen gter// long la 'bras bu don yod byos// 'phongs par 'gyur ba ga la srid//
4539(): kye ma 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo rnams// rtsod cing 'khrug pa med par rin chen dag/ long la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems skyed cig/ su yang ngal zhing don med ma gyur cing /
4540(): dbyig rnams kyis kyang shin tu phan thogs 'gyur// bgu yod chos ldan gter la longs spyod na// phyir zhing gter mang brgya phrag thob par 'gyur// bag med 'khrug cing 'dod pa'i
4541(): dbang gyur pas// rnam dag longs spyod thob par mi 'gyur ro// de bas khyed rnams ring du chos spyod cig/ bdag gis rin chen gter rnams sbyin par bya'o// de ltar bdag nyid che bas
4542(): kun tu bstan// skye bo rnams ni dga' bas mig dgrang nas// a la la zhes rin cheni gtero rnams la// bag brkyang nas ni legs par blangs te spyod// de yi tshig bzhin dang ba bskyed/
4543(): par byas/ 'de lta bu'i tshul gyis bdag nyid chen po des lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du rin po che'i gter dpag tu med grangs med pa dag sems can rnams la bstan
4544(): cing rab tu byin nas der sems can dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dag kyang rim gyis drangs te theg pa gsum la nges par sbyor bar byas so// 'jig rten na ni 'dod ldan dag
4545(): 'dod pa'i dbang gyur dga' ma zhes// kun tu de yi dbang du gyur// de bzhin gzhan la phan byed pa'i// rgyal sras rang gi 'dod brel ba'i// 'dod ldan 'dod la drangs te 'god// 'di ni
4546(): thabs mkhas spyod pa zhes// rgyal sras rnams kyis bsdogs pa snyam// gang zhig 'jig rten skye bo dag kyang gzhan la phan 'dod pas// bskul ba min kyang rang gi don phyir 'dod pa'i rgyu yis
4547(): ni kun tu bskyod nas gnyen zhes de yi rjes su 'jug par spyod// de ltar rab tu dkris gang de la nges par 'jug pa mtshar// gzhan la phan byed bskal pa du mar rang gi don// spangs te brtse ba'i
4548(): shugs kyis bu sdug bzhin gzigs shing // phan pa de'i mchog rab stsol bar mdzad de'i rjes su mi 'jug pa yang yod// kye ma mtshar byas 'khor ba'i rang bzhin 'di ni su yis rtogs par 'gyur//
4549(): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba de dag gis 'dul ba'i sgo ji lta ba dang thabs ji lta bar yongs su 'dul ba'i sgo bstan nas smon lam yang dag par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par gyur to//
4550(): de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni thabs mkhas pa'i dbang gis gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing skyo ba med pa la gnas pa yin no// bdag cag gi
4551(): ston pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyu med par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i dbang gis don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do ces sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod/
4552(): par bya'o// gzhan yang longs spyod rnams ni bag med par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin yang / 'gro ba rnams bkren pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba spyod pa las bzlog nas byang chub kyi lam
4553(): du sbyin par mdzad pa 'di ni thabs mkhas pa'i yan lag yin no zhes kyang sbyar bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal po'i skyes pa'i rabs te drug cu brgyad pa'o// / bdag nyid
4554(): chen po snying rje'i don khong du chud pas gzhan la phan par byed pa rnams ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur du zin kyang / sems can rnams bslu bar mi 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi don spyod par 'gyur ro// de
4555(): yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bdag cag gi ston pa 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'gro ba rnams kyi don bya ba ji lta ba dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pa na/
4556(): re shig seng ge'i rgyal po dar dkar lta bu'i ral pa can yan lag ma smad pa zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// de ni las kyi dbang gis der gyur tam// bdag nyid che ba'i dbang gis de ltar gyur/
4557(): de ni rtag tu sems can thams cad la// byams pa'i dbang gis bu sdug bzhin du sems// 'dod dang gti mug brkam pa'i chags pa yis// gnod par spyod pa de las yongs su bzlog/
4558(): dang 'bras bu lo ma la mos pas// dka' thub can bzhin dka' thub spyod par ldan// gangs ri'i dum bu lta bu'i lus mdzes pa// ku mu da dang zla 'od spungs pa bzhin// pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar
4559(): 'jam sdug pa'i// mche ba'i 'phreng ba rgyan 'phreng bzhin du snang // sder mor ldan pa'i yan lag ma smad pa// brtse bas pad+ma bzhin du 'jam zhing mdzes// de lta bu'i bdag nyid chen po de gang
4560(): na skye bo thams cad kyi rgyun lam med pa/ rdo rje ltar rab tu brtan pa'i brag ri ut+pa la spungs pa lta bus kun tu gang ba/ shing gi rigs du mas yongs su gtams shing ngam grog dang g.yang sa chen
4561(): pos phyogs du ma nas kun tu bskor ba'i gnas/ 'bab chu gtsang ma dang 'bras bu'i tshogs bzar rung ba'i sa phyogs shin tu dben pa zhig tu gnas shing ci nus kyis 'gro ba'i don spyod pa las
4562(): de dang nye ba zhig na spre'u pho mo gnyis shig kyang gnas so// de nas dus gzhan zhig ni spre'u phru gu gnyis byung bar gyur te/ de dag kyang ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge de snying rje'i bdag nyid du gyur par
4563(): shes nas de la bag tsha ba med par gnyen gyi dam pa ltar rjes su sems pa'i dbang gis gnas skabs shig tu spre'u phru gu de gnyis ri dgas kyi rgyal po la bcol te/ spre'u gnyis
4564(): po de nags gseb tu dong ngo // gang na byams pa'i bdag nyid can// phan par byed pa gang yin pa// de la skye bo dga' ba yis// kun tu brtse bar sems
4565(): pa yin / de nus bar skabs der bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri ba zhes bya ba steng gi bar snang las babs te spre'u'i phru gu de gnyis blangs nas steng gi bar snang la gnas par gyur pa dang ri dgas
4566(): kyi rgyal po seng ges bya rgod kyi rgyal pos spre'u'i phru gu gnyis khyer ba mthong nas/ e ma'o bdag ni bag med par gyur te spre'u phra gu de gnyis nyon mongs par gyur gyis/ da ni nges par myur du thur
4567(): par bya ba'i dus la bab po snyam ste/ gsal zhing dri ma med pa'i tshig gis bya rgod la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bya nod rgyal po khyod la bdag gsol pa// bdag gi spre'u phrug de gnyis khyod
4568(): kyis thong / bdag ni de dag 'jigs med bya phyir gnas// skyabs su dong ba ma bsang btang bar gyis// de skad du gsol cing snying rje'i bdag nyid gsal bar ston pa bya rgod kyi rgyal pos
4569(): mthong nas/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ri dgas rgyal po gal te khyod ni bdag 'dor na// de lta na ni 'di gnyis mi bsad btang bar bya// kho bos 'di gnyi
4570(): zos nas kho bo mkha' la gnas// khyod ni khros par gyur kyang bdag la ci byar yod// de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po gzhan la phan par byed pa'i brtse ba chen po'i shugs
4571(): kyis 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni shi bar gyur kyang bla yis/ nyam nyes pa 'di gnyis thar bar bya'o snyam nas yang smras pa/ bdag ni btang gis yongs su bza' bar gyis// bdag
4572(): gi spre'u phrug gnyis ni btang bar gsol// byang chub zhugs pa dam bcas bsrung bar byed// mkhas pa dag ni rdzun du ga la smra// bdag rdzun gyur du 'ong zhes ma rtog par// kun tu khyod kyis
4573(): yid ches mdzad du gsol// de smras drang srong chen po'i spyod pa bzhin// bdag gi lus 'dri bag phab legs par nyal// sems can ched du bdag gi lus btang zhes// lhag pa'i
4574(): bsam pas yongs su dag par gyur// de nas bya rgod kyi rgyal po des rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa de mthong nas nam mkha' de nyid nas ched du brjod pa/ e ma'o rlabs che e ma'o ngo mtshar che// gang
4575(): dag gzhan phyir rang gi lus 'dor ba// de dag 'tsho ba 'jig rten bde phyir 'tsho// kho bos spre'u phrug 'dri gnyis btang bar bya// khyod kyang 'tsho zhing ring du chos spyod cig/ rmad byung khyod la bdag ni
4576(): yi rang ngo // 'di skad brjod nas bya rgod des// spre'u yi phru gu dal gyis bzhag/ bdag nyid che ba'i gzi byin gyis// kun kyang bde ba'i gnas gyur te// nyin mor byed pa'i 'od gsol bas// pad+ma rnam
4577(): ni dgod pa bzhin// nyon mongs mun pa thams cad kun// bsal nas bdud kyi stobs 'dul ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhum pa bzhin// rmang du byung 'di gsal bar bstan// de ltar
4578(): bdag nyid chen po seng ge de'i snying rje dang bden par smra ba'i stobs rnam par dag pa bstan pas/ spre'u phru gu gnyis kyang gnas skabs kyi 'jigs pa las thar bar
4579(): byas shing / bya rgod kyi rgyal po de yang mi dge ba las bzlog nas byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su bskyabs pas thams cad kyang 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar
4580(): gtugs par gyur to// de lta bu'i phyis byung ba'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ger gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du
4581(): sem sa na de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge der gyur to// 'od srungs chen po dang / ser skya bzang mo ni spre'u pho mor gyur to// sgra gcan 'dzin dang kun
4582(): dga' bo ni spre'u phru gu gnyis su gyur to// dge slong phreng ba bzang po ni bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri ba zhes bya bar gyur to// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lus yongs su btang
4583(): bar bya yis/ skyabs su dong ba dag ni yongs su btang bar mi bya ste/ ji skad smras pa bzhin du gzhan gyi don yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// yan lag ma smad pa'i
4584(): skyes pa'i rabs te drug cu dgu pa'o// // skyes bu dam pa rnams ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mthu thob pa shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pas
4585(): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad de/ sems can dpag tu med pa'i don yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba bskal pa grangs med
4586(): pa 'das pa'i snga rol na/ bdag cag gi ston pa 'di byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na raM shig cig bram ze'i khye'u sprin zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// de ni btsas nas rang bzhin gyis
4587(): rnam par dag pa'i lus can/ dri ma med pa'i bai DUR+Ya'i rigs chen po ltar rang bzhin gyis dag pa/ gzhon nu gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa ltar sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
4588(): mchog dang ldan pa snyan ngag dang / bstan bcos dang cho ga shes pa'i ngang tshul can du gyur to// de'i slob dpon yang mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can bram ze rin po che zhes bya ba bram ze'i khye'u
