4589(): lnga brgya tsam la rjes su ston cing / ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i khrod na legs par gnas so// bram ze'i rang bzhin rnam dag de rnams ni// bstan bcos rig byed gsang sngags pha rol phyin// 8
4590(): pa'i bdag nyid mkhas pa bzhin du spyod// legs bu'i lam dang rjes su mthun bzhin gnas// khyad par du yang bram ze'i khye'u sprin// rang gi lhag pa'i yon tan gsal gyur pa'i// skar pa'i nang
4591(): na zla 'od 'bar ba bzhin// yon tan rnams kyis mdzes pa'i bdag nyid gyur// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe khye'u sprin gyis mkhan po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di ces smras so// /
4592(): kye mkhan po bdag grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su mchi'o// mkhan pos smras pa/ kye bram ze'i khye'u/ bdag
4593(): cag bram ze rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ gang gis bstan bcos legs par lobs nas/ mkhan po la zong brgya dang ras zung gcig dang / mkhar ba dang ril ba rnams sbyin dgos
4594(): so/ 'bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po bdag la pags pa dang mkhar ba dang ril ba ma gtogs pa ci'ang ma mchis pas grong khyer du mchi bar gsol zhes lan gsum gyi bar du
4595(): gsol ba btab nas/ mkhan pos gnang ste/ bram ze'i khye'us rim gyis ri'i rgyal po gangs las bab nas/ grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs rnams su rim gyis phyin no// de'i tshe grong khyer
4596(): chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na/ bram ze sa ga bzang po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de la bu mo bzang len ldan zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po
4597(): rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de bram ze'i mchog gang yin pa de la sbyin no snyam nas/ de nyi ma re re zhing bram ze bzhi khri tsam la mchod sbyin byed do// bram ze'i khye'u sprin kyang //
4598(): lha'i bu zhig gis lam bstan pa la rjes su zhugs te/ grong khyer chen po bde ba'i pha rol 'gror mchod sbyin gyi gnas ga la ba der phyin par gyur to// de ni phyin ma thag tu yang // gzugs dang
4599(): dpal yon gzi brjid kyis// mngon par gsal zhing mdzes pa de// mthong bas dga' bas rgyas par gyur// bu mo de lis de mthong nas// lus sems mngon par g.yos gyur te/
4600(): bdag gi phal 'di skad smras// yab cig bdag nyid 'byor par bcas// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la stsol// bdag gi bsam pa don yod 'gyur// de nas bram ze 'dus pa de rnams dang //
4601(): khye'u sprin ni lhan cig smra byed cing // sngags dang rig byed don rnams 'dri byed pas// khye'u sprir gyi khyad par gsal bar gyur// yon tan khyad par de dang de dag gis// gzhan gyi yon tan
4602(): zil gyis mnan pa bzhin// de nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas de na bram ze dum bu sbyin zhes bya ba zhig rgun gral du 'dug ste mchod sbyin byed do// de nas khye'u sprin gyis bram ze dum bu sbyin gang na
4603(): ba der song ste phyin nas kyang lhan cig tu rig byed dang gsang sngags smra bar byed cing / de ni 'di lta ste/ sprin nyid rig byed dang gsang sngags dang bstan bcos dag gis khyad par du 'phags
4604(): so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis bram ze dum bu sbyin la smras pa/ bdag cag gi chos nyid ni gang gis bstan bcos thams cad rtogs shing khong du chud pa de bstan mgo la 'dug pa yi/
4605(): no des na khyod longs shig kho bo 'dug go// bram ze dum bu sbyin gyis smras pa/ kho bo stan 'di las ma bslang zhig dang / zong lnga brgya 'thob pa khyod la sbyin no// smras pa kho bo la mi dgos so//
4606(): longs shig ces bram ze de bslang nas khye'u sprin nyid seng ge'i khri la 'dug go// de nas bram ze sa ga bzang pos bu mo bzang len ldan lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/ gse
4607(): gyi mkhar ba dang / ril ba dang / ras zung gcig dang / zong lnga brgya khyer nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gang na ba der phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di dag long zhig/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin
4608(): gyis zong de dag blangs nas bu mo de ma blangs par 'di skad ces kyang smras so// bu mo 'di yis ci zhig bya// bud med rnams ni rgod cing mi brten pa// 'phyar zhing dge la bar du gcod par byed// kho bo dgran
4609(): pa dben par gnas pa la// sbyin pa'i tshul 'di rigs pa ma yin no// bram zes smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod dben pa la dga' yang // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don gyi phyir// sbyin 'dod ldan la len
4610(): pa grogs su 'gyur// bzang mo skyon med yid kyi rjes mthun pa// longs spyod dang bcas gus pas khyod la 'bul// bdag la snying brtse'i phyir ni 'dri bzhes shig/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / des
4611(): de ma blangs par mchod sbyin gyi gnas de nas langs te ri'i rgyal po gangs ga la ba der 'gro bar chas so// de nus bram ze sa ga bzang pos bu mo bzang len ldan la smras pa/ bu mo khyod khyim thab kyi phyi bzhin
4612(): du ci'i phyir mi 'gro/ des de'i tshig mnyan te ri'i rgyal po gangs ga la ba der logs su 'phags so// de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu zhig gis ri'i rgyal po gangs su 'gro ba'i lam mi snang bar byas shing
4613(): rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du 'gro ba'i lam snang bar byas te/ khye'u sprin lam de la zhugs so// gang na khye'u sprin ni der song ba// de yi rjes su bzang len ldan de yang / mthun pa'i spyod pas rjes su zhugs nas/
4614(): grag/ zla ba'i rjes su zla 'od 'brangs pa bzhin// de ltar mthar gyis song ba dang rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can dar gyi lnga ldi bres pa/ me tog bkram pa/ bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod dang rab mthong nas des
4615(): dris pa grong khyer chen po 'di ci'i rgyus mngon par brgyan par gyur/ de nas rgyal po 'o brang pad+ma can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u
4616(): khyod kyis ma thos sam/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po ma skyes dgras spyan
4617(): drangs nas de 'dir 'byon pa'i phyir grong khyer chen po mngon par brgyan no// de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag bram ze rnams kyi nang na bstan bcos thams
4618(): cad la spyod pa gsal zhing mkhra pa dkon na/ sems can rin po che 'di lta bu 'dzag rten du 'byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos kyis/ bdag gis zong lnga brgya po 'dis me tog nyos la de bzhin gshegs
4619(): pa la mchod par bya ba gor ma chag go snyam nas/ de phan tshun du me tog tshol ba la brtson par gyur to// des gang du dris kyang 'di skad ces zer ro// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis ma thos sam/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras bka' stsal te/ me
4620(): tog thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya dgos pas su'ang nye tshong mi gnang ngo zhes bsgrags pa yin no// gang zhig lhag pa'i bsam pa yis// rgyal
4621(): pa mchod par byed don du// rtsom pa gang de ma 'grub na// de las ngal ba ci zhig yod// de nas skabs der bu mo bzang len ldan gyis/ bram ze'i khye'u sprin me tog tshol ba la brtson/
4622(): par mthong nus me tog phreng rgyud mkhan zhig gi drung du song ste/ ut+pa la bdun bum par bcug ste grong khyer du song nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi drung du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so// bram/
4623(): ze'i khye'u ci tshol/ smras pa/ me tog tshol lo// de nas rab tu dang ba yis// bzang len ldan ma bzang mo de// pad+ma ut+pal g.yo ba'i mig/ chu skyes thogs shing sgo drung 'dug/ snyan par smra bar bya/
4624(): ba'i phyir// ka la bing ga rma bya'i sgra// yid 'ong dang mo'i sgra lta bus// bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa// khye'u ci nags kyi nang nas ni// 'di ltar kun tu rgyug byed pa// rgyal po'i dmag gis ma gtses
4625(): sam gcan gzan gdug pa red dam ci// rtsa ba 'bras bu ma rnyed dam// re shig bzhugs la zan zo zhig/ bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/ bu mo ngal khyim med cing // yongs su bzung ba'ang bdag
4626(): la med// 'dod pa'i yon tan nga mi 'dod// rgyal po'i dmag gis ma gtses te// seng ge'i phru gus gtses pa mir// rags na 'bras bu rtsa ba yod// bzang mo ut+pal dgos pa'i phyir/
4627(): dephyir nga 'dir grong khyer 'ongs// bu mo bzang len ldan gyis smras pa/ ut+pa la 'di dag gis khyed la ci zhig bya/ khye'us smras pa/ bdag gi phreng phyir mi 'dod la/ ut+pal bsnams phyir 'dod pa
4628(): min brtser ldan mar me mdzad kyi phyir// bzang me bdag ri ut+pal slong // bu mo bzang ler ldan gyis spras pa/ bde bar pha rol 'gro ba na// gal te pa las zan zos tshe// bslang ba'i
4629(): tshig smras mi dran nam// 'dzem med me tog cis mi stong // dus 'dri ras ni skye ba rnams// kun tu bdag gi don byed na// ut+pal 'di rnams khyed la 'bul// de phyir 'di rnam
4630(): gnang bar mdzod// bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/ bzang mo ut+pal rir du rin cher dbyig/ lnga brgya 'di sbyin dge la dga' mas byin// bdag ni sangs rgyas yon tan tshol byed cing // rnam
4631(): kun 'dod las dkris pa mi dga' na// bzang mo khyod kyis dge ba'i glegs ma byed// dge ba'i bar du gcod par 'gyur dogs so// bzang len ldan gyis smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u gzhan du ma
4632(): dgongs shig/ bdag ni khyed kyi dge la gegs mi byed// gal te slong la bdag nyid byin na yang // mi dga' med kyis re shig phyi 'brang gsol// de nas bram ze'i khye'us bu mo bzang len lngar/
4633(): la smras pa/ bzang mo khyod dge ba'i gegs su 'gyur bar mi byed na khyod kyis ci ltar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ ces spras ras ut+pal blangs te/ bzang len ldan gyis ut+pal lnga dang / bdag
4634(): 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba yin na/ bshul nas bzur te bdag gi ral pa la zhabs 'jog par gyur cig/ de yi lhag bsam dag pa yis// bden
4635(): pa'i tshig 'di smras ma thag/ thams cad gzigs pas dgengs mdzad de// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas zhabs gar bzhag pa der khyed rnams kyis bzhag par
4636(): mi bya'o// do ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i ral pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
4637(): kyis bram ze'i khye'u ga la ba der gshegs te/ zhabs gnyis ral pa'i steng du bzhag go/ de nas khye'u sprin sa'i steng nas langs nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad
4638(): la ut+pal de dag gtor to// gtor ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor gyi steng gi drang thang du ut+pa la'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ ka ba bzhi drug pa/ cha mnyam zhing shin tu
4639(): rnam par dag pa/ yid du 'ong ba zhig tu gnas par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa de na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku snang ngo // de ltar rmad byung cho 'phrul de mthong nas// bram ze'i khye'u
4640(): gzhan med dga' bas brgyan// dpag med yongs su sbyangs te zhir gyur la// de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum lung bstan gyur// de ras bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u
4641(): sprin la/ khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa ma de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su
4642(): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston par 'gyur ro// zhes bram ze'i khye'us bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos
4643(): nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rang ba skyes te mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// de bzod pa thob nas steng gi nam mkha' la ta la bdud srid du 'phags nas ting nge 'dzin drug stong mngon du
4644(): gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyang mthong bar gyur te// gang tshe rgyal bas lung bstan thob gyur pa// de tshe ta la bdun srid yongs su 'phags// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i
4645(): bye ma snyed// mthong zhing ting 'dzin drug stong mngon du gyur// lha rnams kun gyis drang srong mchog bzhin du// bstod cing bskul la phyag kyang 'tshal bar gyur// de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin
4646(): bar snang las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas rab tu byung ba dang dge slong gi dngos por gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la phar par byed
4647(): barmang du byung ba'i spyod pa can du gyur to// gang na rgyal ba'i sras po rnams// rmang du byung ba'i spyod pa yis// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rdzogs byed cing // thub rnams dbyes pa'i spyod
4648(): nyid kyi ming gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phul cig ces ut+pal gnyis dang bdun bskur ba de dag khyer te grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu byung ba dang / de nas pad+ma can gyi grong khyer
4649(): khor yug tu// me tog sil ma dag gis yongs su bkram byas shing // gos bzang rin chen brgya yis mngon par brgyar byas te/ skye bo rnams ni mchod pas kun tu rnam par g.yo// gang na
4650(): tshangs pa dbang por bcas pa dang // lha klu mi dang dri za nam mkha' lding // 'byung po mthu chen khyad par ldan pa rnams// rgyal ba mar me mdzad la mchod phyir lhags// a kA ru dang tu puH
4651(): la sogs// bdug spos rgyan phreng me tog rgyar phreng dang // rin chen rgyan phreng gos mchog rgyan phreng gis// rgyal ba mchog la mchod cing mngon par 'thor// gzhan dag gus pa'i dbang gis mchi
4652(): mama'adzag/ nyes pas dbang po rmugs pa'ang dbang po thob// lhan cig chos kyi dpal yon bzang por gyur// de ltar rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi byang bar ldan pa der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
4653(): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad thugs zhi zhing dbang po dul bzhi pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho ltar dngas shing rnyog pa med pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong dri ma
4654(): med pa ltar mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal gyis brjid pa/ skye dgu thams cad kyis mngon par mchod cing dgra bcom pa bdun stong gis yongs su bskor zhing byon pa mthong nas
4655(): 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa yin par
4656(): bdag gis thos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la mtshan sum cu zhig snang ste/ mtshan gnyis ni mi snang bas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'ad/
4657(): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi kun tu rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du
4658(): mdzad pas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag snang bar gyur te/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do// bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis de mthong
4659(): nas/ dga' zhing mgu la mchog tu yid dga' ba skyes te/ pags pa de bting ba dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis pags pa de blangs nas phan tshun du dor te/ 'di skad ces bram ze'i
4660(): khye'u ma byos sam/ gang du rgyal po'i na bza' bting ba der/ khyod kyi pags pa rtsog pa 'di 'dings par byed dam/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis pags pa blangs te lam nas bzur bas lam gol
4661(): bar phyin te bden pa'i tshig 'di byas so// bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i bden pa dang bden pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa
4662(): par ldar// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig mtshungs pa med// yin phyir rnam kun phyag 'tshal lo// de lta bas na bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas/
4663(): lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang spyod pa rnam par dag par bya'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o// de lta bu'i phyis byung ba'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i
4664(): dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u sprin de nyid nga yin no// bram ze'i bu mo bzang len ni sa 'tshe mar gyur te de bas na dge ba'i rtsa ba la chog shes mi bya'o// bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi skyes pa'i rabs te
4665(): bdun cu pa'o// / sdom la/ snying rje can gnyis skar ma dang // brgya byin bram ze gar mkhan mo// nga la nu dang klu yi rgyal// seng ge khye'u sprin dang bcu
4666(): skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa mthong nas rmang du byung ba'i smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi mthas gtug
4667(): bar yang 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad zos te/ sngor byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po 'od ldan zhes bya ba byung ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i yor tan gyis kun nas 'byung ba/ byon rje'i kyi'i
4668(): 'khor drim med pa yongs su rdzogs pa ltar rnam par dag pa'i rang gi yon tan gyi 'od zer gyis skye bo rnams kyi blo'i ku mu nga'i tshal rab tu phye bas spong tshul dag pa'i gesar gsal bar 'byin par byed/
4669(): bangs chen po rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs par skye 'gro'i nyes pa'i rab rib dang nyer mongs pa'i tshe gdung rab tu zhi bar byed par gyur to// zhes zag go// sa bdag dpal ldan lus kyi dpal rgyas
4670(): shing bsod nams dpal gyis skye bo'i dpal mgor gyur// de ni ngang gis chos kyi don mthun pas// mthun pa ma yin chos la 'jig rten bzlog/ legs pa'i lam ston lha yi dbang po bzhin/
4671(): rig pa'i gnas lugs rtogs shing mthu che la// tshar gcod pan 'dogs bya ba'i las la mkhas// khyu mchog bzhin du de ni 'bangs rnams sbyong / snying rje'i bdag nyid drag shul spyod pa spangs//
4672(): sa bdag sa 'dir skyong ba dpal dang ldan// de lta bu'i rgyal po chen po de rang gi bsod nams kyi mthu'i khyad par gyis rta dang glang po nor bu'i mchog rnams dang ldan par gyur to// de nas dus gzhan
4673(): zhig gi tshe rgyal po de'i yul du glang po rin po che me tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ lta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo // de nas rgyal
4674(): popo 'od ldan gyis glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so// mkhas pa nges pa khyod kyis glang po che dam pa 'di myur du legs par dul bar byos la phul cig/ lha
4675(): bka' bzhin du 'tshal zhes glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pas rgyal po 'od ldan las mnyan pas glang po che dam pa de 'dul bar byed de/ de dul bar rig nas rgyal po 'od ldan la phul te/ lha glang
4676(): po che dam pa ni dul lags pas/ lha de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas rgyal po 'od ldan glang po che dam pa de la 'on te/ glang po che 'dul mkhan
4677(): yang gong du bskyon nas ri dgas gshor du song ngo // de'i tshe glang po des nags kyi lam du glang mo'i dri tshor nas des dri de'i rjes bzhin du brgyugs so// de nas rgyal po glang po che rlung ltar mgyog
4678(): pas khyer ba dang glang po 'dul mkhan la smras pa/ kye glang po 'dul mkhan/ nam mkha' 'gul ba 'dra zhing phyogs kun myur du 'du bar 'gro ba 'dra// sa ni mtha' dag 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor zhing
4679(): mkha' la 'gro ba 'dra// glang po'i dbang po gangs ri 'gro ba lta bu 'di rgyug mthong nas 'di// ri bo 'dir brgyugs snyam nas ri rnams gya chom myur du rgyug pa 'dra// kye glang po 'dul mkhan glang
4680(): po che'i dbang po thul cig thul cig/ glang chen dbang po tshar bcad par// bzang po rab tu 'bad par gyis// glang chen gnya' rengs khyer ba yis// kho bo ci 'gyur gtol med khyer// glang po che
4681(): 'dul bas smras pa/ lha drang srong dam pas smras pa'i gsang sngags bzla bgyi zhing // 'di la lcags kyus tshar gcod 'bad pa yang bgyi na// 'chi bar nges pa rnams kyi tshe yi sman bzhin du//
4682(): glang po 'dis ni bdag stobs zil gyis mnan nas mchi// mi yi dbang po lcags kyu 'am// zhags pa 'am yang na lcag gis kyang // 'dod chags gnya' rengs khyer ba'i sems/ tshar
4683(): bcang rus pa ma yin no// 'dod chags sems kyi zug rngu ni// ji zhig ltar na skye 'gyur te// tshul 'ga' zhig gis rgyas 'gyur la// 'ga' zhig gis kyang zhi bar 'gyur// gang gi tshe glang
4684(): po che 'dul mkhan des glang po che dam pa de gnas thams cad du bzlog par ma nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po la smras pa/ lha glang po che 'di ni 'khrul gyis shing gi yal ga la 'jus shig/ de nas rgyal po
4685(): dang 'dul mkhan shing gi yal ga la 'jus te 'dug go// de nas de'u shi ba las thar te bde bar gyur nas/ rgyal pos 'dul mkhan la smras pa/ khyod kyis glang po che dam pa mthul bar ngal phul
4686(): lo des smras pa/ lha 'di bdag gis shin tu'ang dul bar bgyis te/ 'on kyang nags kyi ba lang mo'i dri tshor nas nyan du ma btub lags so// lnga de lta lags mod kyi dpyad dran nas ring po mi
4687(): thogs par mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas glang po che de myos pa dang bral bar gyur nas zhag bdun pa lon pa dang dpyad rjes su dran nas rang nyid gnas su 'ongs te 'dug go// de nas glang po che 'dul
4688(): mkhan gyis rings pa rings par rgyal po la smras pa/ lha glang po de ni mchis lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis 'di ma thul to// lha thul lags so// cis mngon/ lha'i spyan la bab par
4689(): bgyi'o zhes des lcags kyi thu lum me ma mur du chos par bsregs pa zhig dpyad kyi sar khyer te len du gzhug par brtsams so// de nas des bag tsha ba med par blang bar brtsams pa dang / glang po 'dul
4690(): mkhan gyis smras pa/ lha len du ni btub na/ 'on kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ kye mkhan po de ltar shin tu dul ba 'dis bdag cag g.yengs pa 'di
4691(): la rgyu ci zhig yod/ lha bdag gis sngar lus dul gyi sems ni ma lags so zhes ma gsol tam/ bdag gis lus dul ba lags kyi sems dul ba ni ma lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/
4692(): sems dul ba 'ga' khyod kyis yod par mthong ngam thos sam/ de lhas bskul nas smras pa/ lha lus dang sems thams cad 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchis so//
4693(): 'dod pa'i rgyus byung nyes gzhol phyir// mang po brtson par byed mod kyi// mi nus par ni shes nas kyang // brtson 'grus nyams nas ldog par byed// de dang de ni de lta bu'i// 'bad pa rnam pa
4694(): mang byas kyang // 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nags tshal ni// rtsad nas phyin par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod pa gzhom par 'dod pa ni// kha cig yul rnams spong bar byed// de gzhom 'dod pa
4695(): gzhan dag ni// dga' zhing dbang po tshim par byed// lha dang lha min mi dang seng ge stag dang sbrul dag dang // srin bu phye ma leb dang 'jig rten 'di dag kun// 'dod pa'i zhags pa shin
4696(): tu phra mo rnams kyis yid bcings nas// srid 'gro'i thibs po 'di ni 'khor lo bzhin du shin tu 'khor// bdag ni sna tshogs thabs kyis 'di lta bur// gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs pa'i rmang/
4697(): po 'dul// rgyal po gzugs can ma lags pra sems ni// drang srong chab rlung 'tshal bas ma thul lo// gang zhig 'dod pa du mas dkris gyur pa'i// sems gnas dag pa nyid du 'dul mkhas
4698(): pargyal po chen po sangs rgyas mthu bo che// nyon mongs spangs pa dpa' bo stobs ldan pa// de dang gang dag de 'dra'i rjes 'brangs pa// de rnams ma lags 'jig rten gsum na med// de skad ces
4699(): smras pa rgyal po 'od ldan gyis thos nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// e ma'o khyod kyis legs par spras pa legs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni brtson 'grus dang / mthu stobs dam
4700(): pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'khor ba'i pha rol tu yang dag par son pa/ sems can thams cad la mnyam par gzigs pa can/ nyon mongs pa'i tshogs thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa ni ngo ma
4701(): che'o// bdag gis kyang de lta bu'i bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bya'o// zhes smras te/ de nas de ni bsam pa dag pa yis// gzhan la par byed byang chub mchog tu bsams// rang gi sring
4702(): dang longs spyod dbang byed pa// gzhan la phan phyir dam pa'i spyod la zhugs// de nas rgyal po chen po des blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag dang la/ gang na skye bo'i tshigs thams
4703(): cad kyis 'dra bar rung ba'i gnas rnams su phongs pa rnams la ci 'dod pa dag byin cig/ blon po rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes bsgo ba mnyan te/ phyogs thams cad du sbyin
4704(): gtong gi khang pa skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi rdzing bu dang 'dra bar bshams te/ 'di skad ces kyang bsgrags par nges so// gang na skye bo phongs pa rnams// bza' btung
4705(): longs spyod ci 'dod pa// thams cad yid bzhin blang bar gyis// blang byas nas ni tshul bzhin spyod// sdig pa'i las rnams spang bar gyis// chos la gcig tu bag yod byos// zhes bya ba
4706(): la sogs pa bsgrags nas skye bo thams cad yongs su tshim par byas so// de nas 'jig rten dga' bas brgyar gyur te// sa bdag las ni mthun par dpal thob nas// rgyal po'i glags pa
4707(): phyogs su rgyas gyur cing // kur kyang chos kyi lam la gnas par gyur// rgyal po de ni gzhan gyi dor byed pas// byang chub tu ri smon lam 'debs par rtsom// sbyir pa rgya cher gyur pa 'di yis ni// 'gro/
4708(): ba rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bsgral ba// skye bo'i tshogs dag bdag gis bsgral bar bya// bdag gis skye dgu bskyangs las byung ba 'am// btang ba las
4709(): byung bsod nams gang yin pa// de ni sangs rgyas nyid thob 'jig rten dag/ 'dod pa'i rims nad las rab thar bar bya// rgyal po des bla na med pa'i byang chub dang rjes su mthun pa'i sems bskyed
4710(): cing / smon lam ci ltar yongs su btab pa de nyid kyis rmang du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang brnyes pa yin no zhes grag go// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas 'di
4711(): lta bu'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing rjes su bslob par bya'o// gzhan yang bdag cag gi stor pa 'di sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang ldan pa yin no zhes sangs rgyas kyi
4712(): yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// rgyal po 'od ldan gyi skyes pa'i rabs te bdud cu gcig pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa
4713(): mngon par 'du byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa sgrogs par byed cing bdag nyid kyang smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de yang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
4714(): na bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu/ rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa/ skye bo rgya chen pos
4715(): bkur ba shes rab kyi mthus rig byed dang brtag pa'i de kho na nyid legs par shes pa/ sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang chos kyi bdag nyid kyis sems can rnams yongs su sdud cing phar 'dogs
4716(): par byed pa/ ma smad pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i bram ze sgra rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur to zhes grag go// de ni rang bzhin che ba'i bdag nyid can// lha dbang bzhin du 'gro ba rnams
4717(): kyis bkur// rig byed don grub de ni tshangs pa bzhin// shes bya rnams la de ni nyi ma bzhin// dag cing gsal bas sdang ba skyed par byed// yon tan tshogs kyis che ba'i bdag nyid gyur// de ltar
4718(): bram ze chen po de rang gi yon tan gyi gnas tshol ba la shin tu brtson par gyur te// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
4719(): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib med lung bstan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par gyur to// de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang byang
4720(): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun kyang dpag tu med pa byung ngo // de lta bu'i de bzhini gshegs pa de byung ba bram ze sgra rnam par grags pas thos nas bram ze bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad dang lhan
4721(): cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i rtsom
4722(): pa byas te/ gser las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad gcig/ chur dpag tshad stong phrag brgya/ zheng du stong phrag brgyar gnas pas kun tu brgyan te/ gzhi thams cad gser
4723(): gyi glegs mas kur tu g.yogs/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i bar snang la nor bu'i bla re ni kun tu bres/ me tog kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ni kun tu bkram/ khang pa brtsegs pa re re la'ang sil snyan yid du
4724(): 'ong ba stong gis ni sgra 'byin par byas/ khang pa brtsegs pa re re la'ang mchod pa'i las su bskos pa bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa/ rgyar thams cad kyis mngon par brgyan pa/ rnam
4725(): par dag pa'i spyod tshul can stong gis mdzes par byas so// rin chen khang rtsegs rgyan spras de dag dang // sna tshogs mchod pa'i bye brag bkram byas shing // lha yi bdug spos bzang
4726(): po'i tshogs rnams dang // rin chen chun 'phyang chun pos kun tu brgyan// pad+ma ut+pal par sha tsam pa ka/ zla ba zla bzangs tshogs kyis legs par bkram// de ltar rgyal ba mchod
4727(): phyir brgyan par gyur// mchod pa'i las su bsgos pa yi// lha mo ltar mdzes lha mo'i tshogs// zla 'dra'i gdong can ut+pal mig/ yan lag glog gi phreng ba bzhin// 'od 'bar rin chen
4728(): rgyan spras pa// rna cha g.yo ba'i dpal gyis mdzes// gus pa'i tshul la 'phyar ba sbyangs// stong phrag du mas rnam par mdzes// de ltar rab tu rnam par brgyad pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag de/
4729(): bzhin gshegs pa la phul ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad kyang steng gi bar snang la rang 'gro'o// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad las sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'du
4730(): bstod pa'i sgra grag go// de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i sgra grag go// rgyud tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i sgra grag go//
4731(): rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa'i sgra grag go// bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la rnam par gnas pa'i sgra grag go// rdzu 'phrul gyi ra ba'i
4732(): sgra grag go// lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba'i sgra dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgra dang / sngon gyi gnas kyi sgra grag go// 'gog pa'i sgra grag go// kha cig ni byung
4733(): chub dang mthun pa'i sgra grag ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi mdun du yang spos chu'i char rab tu 'bab cing mi las 'das pa'i lha'i me tog gi char yang bab po// de nas de bzhin gshegs
4734(): pa sgrib med lung ston pa'i spyan sngar/ skon pa khri me tog sna lnga dag gis bkang nas mngon par 'thor ro// gtor ba de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa la mi ltung zhing steng du me tog
4735(): gi bla bres so// de nas bram ze sgra rnam par grags pa shing sA la chen po lta bu des rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong nas ci lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ri rab lta bur brtan pa'i shugs
4736(): thob pas shing ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags so// de bar snang la song nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo thugs dag mi yi
4737(): seng ges bdud stobs rab tu bcom// nyon mongs tshogs bcom 'gro ba mkhyen pa bde 'gro rjes su brnyes// srog chags kun sman thabs chen kun 'grub dge ba sdig mi mnga'// stobs
4738(): bcu sred pa'i chu bo rnam skems sred pa'i rgya mtsho brgal// mi dbang mi yi seng ges srid mtsho bskems te skam la zhugs// srid mtshor zhugs pa'i sems can shin tu nyams thag gzhan yang
4739(): sgrol mi yi seng ges me gsum gdungs pa'i skye bo zhi mdzad cing // rang byung rang byung nyid kyis thugs chud 'jig rten lam ston mdzad// ston par gyur pas sems can lam nyams pa dag
4740(): lam las bsnams// drang srong chen po khyod la bslab na bla med byang chub 'thob// khyod kyi sras dga' ching las brgal zhing srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal// skam la phyin cing mya ngan 'das par zhugs
4741(): te phyag 'tshal bgyid// 'di ltar 'jig rten mur lam rang byung chen po khyed kyis bstan// bdag kyang byang chub thob nas lam rab nyams pa lam la bzhag/ mgon po khyod la bslabs na
4742(): bla med byang chub zhi bar mchi// byang chub zhi ba rtogs nas 'gro yid ma zhi rab tu zhi bar bgyid// 'gro ba lam rab nyams pa 'di dag btsal nas snying rje bskyed// sgor ma gsal bar bgyid
4743(): cing mig long gyur pa rnam par sbyang // bdag gis rgyal ba bstod pa'i bsod nams mi nyung 'di bskyed pa'i// dge rtsa de yis dgra 'dul rgyal bar bgyi zhing 'gro lam bstan// de skad ces
4744(): bstod nas smon lam btab po// de ltar rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa dang bstod pa de la brten nas bram ze bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don rgya chen
4745(): po grub par gyur to// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan gyi phreng bas legs par bstod cing / smon lam chen po gdab par bya'o//
4746(): gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de lta bu'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing dam pa'i chos sgrub pa yin pas de'i rjes su slob pa rnams kyang rim gro
4747(): bskyed de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la brtson par bya'o// bram ze sgra rnam par grags pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te bdun cu gnyis pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bsam pa
4748(): rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis bsod nams yongs su byas shing / smon lam gyis yongs su spel ba byas na 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/
4749(): sngor byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten
4750(): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi stor pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las
4751(): 'das nas rgyal po zhig gis de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten mchod pa'i bye brag du ma dang ldan pa brtsigs nas/ dus ston chen po'ang byas so// de nas dus re shig gi tshe na/ mchod rten gyi dus ston
4752(): byed pa'i tshe/ gaN+DI'ang brdungs/ dung yang bus te/ 'khor bzhi po yang dag par 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa'i don du dus stor byed do// gangar skye bo'i tshogs rnams
4753(): der 'dus pas// rgyal ba'i mchod rten mchod par bya ba'i phyir// spos dang me tog phreng dang thug pa dang / mar me'i phreng ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // gos bzangs legs par sbyangs pa
4754(): rnams kyis mchod// dus tshigs dga' ston rab tu rgyas gyur cing // ngang ba'i yid ldan skye bo'i tshigs 'dus te// rgyal ba'i sku gdung legs par mchod par byed// de ltar skye bo phal cher
4755(): 'dus pa de'i tshe na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bya ba mdzad cing sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa'i dge slong zhig/ phyi dro'i tshe srog chags 'bum phrag du
4756(): ma rnams la chos ston par byed do// de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de na rgyan po pa rgyal ba zhes bya ba rgyan po la shin tu zhen pa zhig gnas te/ de'i chung ma ni rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya/ bu ni rgyal ba zhes bya ste/
4757(): de nas re shig na/ rgyan po pa de bdag nyid gyon pa'i ras zung cig dang gdugs dang mchil lham zung cig dang / pa na lnga'i 'gron bu rnams ma gtogs pa bdag gi khyim gyi rang dang phyi rol na yod pa'i
4758(): dngos po thams cad rgyan skugs su gzhal nas de sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde bas gdungs te/ kyi hud bsod nams ma byas pa/ dbul ba ni sdug bsngal ba'i gnas su gyur to zhes rgyun ring
4759(): po'i shugs kyang phyung ste/ mchil lha pa ni bsgos/ pa na lnga dang gdugs kyang khyer nas rgyan po'i sa nas song ste/ mthar gyis chos sba ba gang na 'dug pa'i sa phyogs der phyin pa dang / der skye lo
4760(): pal mo che/ 'dus shing 'byor pa rmad byung dang // ldan pas chos ni stor byed cing // zhi ba'i tshul du spyod pa mthong // de yi rang bzhin rmad du byung ba dang // 'byor pa'i
4761(): dpal gyis mtho ba de mthong nas// rgyan po pa de yid la dang ba skyes// gus pa'i sems kyis chos kyang nyan par gyur// de sems rab tu dang zhing dri ma med par gyur nas re shig bdag nyid kyang
4762(): chos nyan pa'i bsam pa skyes te/ de nyid kyis phyogs gcig tu gdugs bzhag ste mchil lham gnyis phud nas rna blags shing thal mo sbyar te chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas re shig
4763(): na chos smra bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad brjod de/ bsod nams bsags na bde bar 'gyur// de phyir mi yis bsod nams bya// de yang yang dang yang du bya// de nyid la ni 'dun par bya//
4764(): zhes smras so// de nas nges tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/ bsod nams bsags na bde bar 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin te/ gang gi phyir bdag 'di kho na ltar mchog tu mi bzad pa dgos
4765(): thag cing 'dug pa las na/ bdag gis tshe snga ma la gor ma chag par bsod nams ngag ma byas kyis/ bdag gis bsod nams cung zad cig bya'o snyam du bsams so// des de ltar bsam/
4766(): nas bdag la ci bdog pa rtog pa la zhugs so// re shig na ras zung cig gyon pa dang / gdugs dang / mchil lham gnyis dang / pa na lnga'i 'gron bu lus pa rnams mthong ste/ gzhan
4767(): thams cad rgyan srugs su yal nas/ de sems pa la zhugs te/ ci ste pa na lnga'i 'gron bu rnams dang / bla gos byir rwa ri ltogs te 'chi ba yang 'gyur/ 'on te ma byin na ri bsod rams/
4768(): med par 'jig rten pha rol tu bgrod dgos te/ de yang yang dang yang du dbul ba'i sdug bsngal can du 'gyur na/ gang gis ltogs te 'chi bar yang mi 'gyur la/ bsod nams kyis god
4769(): par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam ste/ yang bsams pa/ bsod nams med par 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba bas ni lhogs te shi yang bla'i pa na lha dang bla gos 'di dag ni nges par
4770(): sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/ de ltar sems pa'i skabs su/ yang chos smra bas tshigs su bcad pa tha dad pa 'di brjod do// bsod nams ngal nas byed na ni// sdig la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur//
4771(): de phyir dge ba myur te bya// sdig pa las ni sems kyang zlog/ ces smras so// de nas des tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas bsams pa/ bsod nams myur te bya'o zhes bshad pas na la
4772(): 'ur du sbyir pa byin par bya'o snyam mo// gang ra rgya mtsho'i chu yang rlabs kyis bskyod pa'i tshe// mkha' la bkra yang gsal bar byed pa nus min pa// dal cing dngas pa'i rkyen gyis gza' skar
4773(): bkod pa bzhin// gsal bar gang gyur 'di yang 'jig rten ston pa yin// rang bzhin dag pa rnams kyang yul gyi rnyog ma yis// bsgribs pas dag pa'i spyod las gzhan du snang bar 'gyur// de yang
4774(): rkyer gyis rtswa dang me shel phrad pa bzhin// shes rab gsal bas sgrib pa'i tshang tshing sreg par byed// de nas rgyan po pa de rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis chos smra ba ga la
4775(): ba der song ste/ bdag nyid kyis de'i dbu thog tu gdugs bzung nas mchil lham gnyis rkang pa'i drung du bzhag ste/ ba na lnga'i 'gron bu de dag gis chos smra ba'i rkang pa la gtor te rang gi lus las bla
4776(): gos phud te chos smra ba'i rkang pa la bkab nas/ ba spu thams cad zing zhes gyur cing dang par gyur te rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas dad pa'i shugs drag pos smon lam 'debs pa la zhugs te/
4777(): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang / chos kyi phyir sbyin pa yongs su btang ba 'dis ni/ bdag tshe 'di phan chad du dbul por ma gyur cig/ skye ba thams cad du'ang bsod nams kyi che bar grags par
4778(): gyur cig/ lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang bdag rgyal por bcug par gyur cig/ ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las grub par gyur cig/ bdag bcas pa na'ang ngo mtshar rmad du
4779(): byung ba mang po dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ gter mi zad pa'i rin po che mang po dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par yongs su gang ba dag kyang 'byung bar gyur cig/ ces de ltar smon lam btab
4780(): pa'i skabs su chos smra bas kyang yongs su bsngo bar byas te/ 'khor thams cad dong ngo // rgyan po nga rgyal ba'ang chos kyi phyir sbyin pa de nyid yid la sems shing / ras gcig po gyon bzhin du rang gi khyim
4781(): du song nas/ chung ma dang / bus mthong ngo // de nas chung ma dang bus bsams pa/ 'dis gshed du bla gos kyang rgyun skugs su yal bar byas shig gu skam ste/ mi dga' bar gyur nas
4782(): da ni bdag cag gnyis lus su zad de/ bdag cag gnyis kyang yal bar byed du 'ong gis 'dod zhes smras so// de yang ngo tsha nas bdag gi dbul ba'i nyes pas 'di lta bu spa phab bo
4783(): bsam ras tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci zhig sdug bsngal dbul ba sdug bsngal yin// ci zhig shin tu sdug bsngal dbul de nyid// dbul ba de nyid shi ba dang yang mtshungs//
4784(): bdag ni 'chi bar 'dam gyis dbul ba min// zhes smras nas/ dbugs rtsa ba rgyun ring ba'i shugs phyung ste/ cang mi zer bar 'dug go// de nas de'i khyim gyi ra ba na khron pa zhig yod pa
4785(): der de'i chung mas chu gcu pa'i phyir bum pa thag pas bcings nas de'i nang du btang ste/ chu yar dbyung snyam pa dang re shig na yar dbyung bar ma nus nas des rgyan po pa la jo bo bum pa 'di
4786(): yar dbyung bar mi nus pa la/ tshur spyon te gzigs zhes bos so// de nas des kyang dbyung bar brtsams so// re shig na des kyang yang dbyung bar ma nus nas/ de gnyis kyis bu la bos so//
4787(): de nas mi gsum car gyis sha zang 'bad pa chen pos de'u ma byin to// re shig bltas pas na bum pa de'i 'og na zangs zung lnga gser dngul gyis yongs su gang ba thogs shing 'dug
4788(): pa mthong ste/ de nas rgyan po nga rgyal bas tshe 'di'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas ya mtshan gyi mig rgyas te/ snying rab tu dga' nas tshigs
4789(): su bcad de smras pa/ kye mnyes pa kun spangs pa// yon tan ngo bo nyid kyi zhing // de ltar bdag gis sa bon btab// da lta nyid du 'bras bu smin// zhes smras so// de nas de'i chung ma de ya
4790(): mtshar gyis mig rgyas te smras pa/ jo bo 'di ci zhig las dgongs te gsungs/ des skabs 'di rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas des tshe 'di la bsod nams dag gi 'bras bu mchog tu yid du 'ong
4791(): ba smin pa'i rmad du byung ba des thos nas ya mtshan du gyur to// gtam de yang gcig nas gcig tu thos pas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag kun tu grags so// de thos pas skye bo phal po
4792(): che ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung nas phan tshun kye ma ngo mtshar to// kye ma bsod nams ngag gis che ba nyid ces 'dzer to// de nas blo bur du byug cing nor mang la longs spyod che bar gyur te/
4793(): bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mngor sum du mthong nas/ des sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la dad pa drag pos shugs cher bkur sti byas so// de nas de nyin gcig bzhin du de
4794(): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa rgya chen po byed do// chos nyan to// dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong dag kyang nyid bzhin du kha zas bzang pos yang dag par tshim par byed do//
4795(): dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / rung pa dang / slong ba gnar dag kyang nor gyis ci 'dod par yang dag par 'tsho bar byed do// gtsug lag khang chen po yo byad thams cad kyis gang ba
4796(): yang byed du bcug ste/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas/ de'i grags pas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der kun la rgyas par gyur to// gang na longs spyod cung zad la'ang /
4797(): khe 'dod phyir ni kun tu rgyug/ rmad byung 'bras bu mngon mthong nas// spel bar byed la ya mtshan med// gang na chos sgra dag pa'i yan lag brgyad ldan gyis// gtams pa'i rdzing der dad pas
4798(): sbyin pa'i sa bon dag/ btab pa'i rkyer gyis longs spyod pad tshal rgyas gyur te// dga' ba'i 'dab rgyas yid kyi ge sar g.yo ba dag/ yor tan bsngags pa'i dri bsung skye bo'i tshig rlung gis/
4799(): drangs te 'jig rter mgo bor brgyar gyur chos nyid yin// de ras dus re shig gi tshen pho brang 'khor de'i rgyal po de bu med par dus las 'das so// de'i dbang gis grong khyer gyi mi dang / blor po thams
4800(): cad kyis gang na rgyal por 'os pa bgros shing brtags na/ rgyan po pa bsod nams kyis che bar grags par shes nas/ rgyal por bskos te/ de'i ming yang rgyal po rgyal ba zhes bya bar gyur
4801(): to/ de ras rgyal po rgyal ba po// tshe 'di nyid la bde ba yi// dge ba'i myu gu de mthong nas// phyir zhing gzhan la phan byed pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa bas sdong po dag/ ma chags 'bras bur
4802(): bcas pa ni// spel bar shin tu brtson par gyur// 'di ni rbad byung spyod pa yin// de nas de 'i sbyir ba'i char rkun dag/ 'bebs par byed la klu yi rgyal
4803(): po bzhir// rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dge 'dun bcas// mchod par byed la nyin mtshan g.yel ba med// skye bo bag med gyur pa rnams la yang // bskul bar byed cing mngon
4804(): par mthong ba yi// chos kyi 'bras bu dag kyang ston par byed// des ni skye bo kun gyi don 'gyur bar// thub pa'i dgongs pa yongs su mthuran par byas// 'dis ni 'jig rten phan par byed
4805(): pa yin// de nas rgyal po rgyal ba po bdag nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu de la yid ches pa'i dbang gis/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang blon po dang grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dge ba'i
4806(): bas kyi lam yang dag par bkod cing 'dzin du bcug nas/ de tshe 'phos pa na'ang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ lha'i rgyal po dbang byed
4807(): kyi bur skyes so zhes zag go/ de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas dngos po thams cad chags pa med par btang zhing gzhan gyi don la smon lam gdab par
4808(): bya'o zhes kyang sbyar bar bya'o// don de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed kyis de'i tshe de'i dus ra rgyan po par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin par sems na/ de ltar
4809(): mi lha'i/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyan po brgyal ba po zhes bya bar gyur te/ dam pa'i chos la dang pa'i dbang gis/ sbyin pa byin cing smon lam rnam par dag pa btab pa'i mthus// skye ba de nying /
4810(): la mthong ba'i chos la 'bras bu thob par gyur nas lan brgya stong du mar lha dang mi rnams kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gyur te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi mthar gtugs par gyur to// zhes
4811(): gsungs so// rgyan po pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te bdun cu gsum pa'o// / bdag nyid che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams ni smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can gyi sdug
4812(): bsngal zhi bar byed cing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu smin par byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i
4813(): tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byir mig bzang zhes bya bar gyur to// zhes grag go/ snying rje'i yon tan gyis ni che ba rnams// 'dod pa'i yon tan spangs kyang 'dod khams 'jug/ 'dod dang bsam/
4814(): gtan ro myang mi byed par// de dag rnams la brtse bas don yod spyod// 'dod la zhen pas rang don dor gyur pa'i// tshul dang mi mthun gzhan phyir rang dor 'dor// de bas brgya byin dpal gyi
4815(): longs spyod la'ang // 'dod par mi byed bdag nyid brtan pa rnams// snying rje'i dbang gis spyod pa dpal dang ldan// e ma'o 'di ni 'jig rten rmad du byung // de ltar lha rnams kyi dbang po de lha'i mig
4816(): rnam par dag pas lha dang mi'i 'jig rten kun tu rtog par byed cing sems can rnams bag med pa las ni bzlog/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam ni rjes su ston/ gang/
4817(): na sdug bsngal ba'i rang bzhin las bskyab par bya dgos pa de dang der dus las mi 'da' bar yongs su skyob par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa 'di
4818(): nyid du grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de na grong khyer dang tshong dus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang po/ srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po gnas pa de rnams thams cad
4819(): la nad chen po'i bskal pa byung ste/ der sems can rnams nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur te/ sems can phal cher lus shu ba dang / brnag pa dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang //
4820(): be dpal dang / thor bu dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyi nad kyis rgyas par gyur to// de'i tshe sman pa stong phrag du ma sems can de dag gi nang zhi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa bskyed
4821(): par gyur kyang / sus kyang nad zhi bar byed ma nus so// der sems can de rnams kyis gso ba'i dpyad ma rnyed de/ skyabs med pa rten med pa/ sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag smre sngags rnam
4822(): pa sna tshogs pa 'don par gyur te/ 'di skad du/ nad 'di las ni thar byed pa// lha 'am klu 'am dri za 'am// gnod sbyin dang ni mi yang rung // mi ma yin pa'ang su zhig yod// sdug bsngal
4823(): 'di las thar byed pa// de la nor rnams thams cad btang // rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bya// byas pa dag kyang gzo byas te// kyi hud bdag cag nad 'di las// kye ma su yis thar bar byed/
4824(): de skad du sdug bsngal ba'i sgra chen po bsgrags par gyur to// de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin mig bzang des/ lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pas sems can nadang sna tshogs kyis btab
4825(): pa de yang mthong // sdug bsngal ba'i sgra chen po 'bod pa de yang thos nas snying rje chen po'i sems skyes te 'di snyam du/ bdag gis ci nas sems can sdug bsngal ba/ gnas dang rten dang
4826(): skyabs med par gyur pa 'di rnams kyi gnas dang rten dang skyabs su gyur par bya'o// snyam du bsam par gyur to// brtan pa rnams ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal ba// de ni bdag gi sdug bsngal nyid du
4827(): 'gyur/ gzhan gyi gnas skabs bde ba bskyed pa'ang // bdag gis sdug bsngal brgya phrag khur bar byed// gzhan bde ba yi snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams// bdag gi bde ba bla na med par sem//
4828(): de 'dra ba dag srid na gzhan don gyi// sdug bsngal rnams la dgyes pa'i dbang gis 'jug/ de nas bdag nyid chen po des// 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba yod/
4829(): pa dang / ha cang yang thag mo ring ba zhig tu srog chags nges pa zhes bya ba zhig tu brdzus te skyes nas/ steng gi bar snang la lha'i sgra 'di ltar du bsgrags te 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du
4830(): tshig gis go bar byas pa/ ku ru'i grong khyer nye ba na// srog chags nges pa bya ba yod// de yi sha la sus zos pa// de ni nad rnapas thar bar 'gyur// 'jigs par
4831(): mi byed skrag par ma byed par// ci ltar 'dod pas de yi sha long shig/ de la khro med gshe med gnod sems med// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir de ni spang yin no// de ltar grong dang / grong khyer
4832(): dang grong brdal dang / tshong dus dang / ri khrod de dag na sems can dad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas grong khyer chen po ku ru ga la ba dang / srog chags kyi rnab pa nges pa ga la
4833(): ba der song ste phyin nas/ srog chags nges pa'i lus la sha bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la sha zad par ma gyur nas/ des tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// bden pa gang gis byang chub
4834(): thob 'gyur zhing // bdag gi ye shes zad par mi 'gyur ba// bden pa des ni bdag gi lus las sha/ 'di ni rab yang zad par ma gyur cig/ de ltar phyogs bzhi'i sems cad nad pa
4835(): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa'i lus las sha bcad cing khyer yang lus la bri ba ma gang bar yang mi mngon te/ yang yang bcad kyang phyir skye bar gyur to// smon lam
4836(): stobs kyis gzhan la phan pa'i lus// nad rnams sel byed sman gyi rgyal po mchog/ gang gi lus la zad pa med gyur pa// dab mkha'i ngos la bcad par byas pa bzhin// de ltar sems can ji
4837(): skyed pa rnams kyis srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa'i sha zos pa de dag zos ma thag tu dang thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ nad med par bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de ltar mthar gyis 'dzam bu'i gling
4838(): gi sems can thams cad kyi nad zhi bar gyur nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu bo dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa des
4839(): bdag cag rnams nad las yongs su thar zhing / nad med par byas te/ bde zhing 'gyur ba med par byas kyi/ bdag cag gis de la mchod pa'i las shig bya'o snyam nas/ de dag thams
4840(): cad gcig tu 'dus te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa ga la ba der song nas thal mo sbyar te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ khyod ni bdag cag
4841(): gnas dang skyabs// khyod ni bdag cag sman pa smad// khyod la mchod pa gang bgyi ba// khyod kyis bdag cag bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems cad de rnams kyi
4842(): sems rnab par gyur pa rig nas/ nges pa'i lus de mi snang bar byas te/ bdag nyid brgya byin gyi lus dri ma med pa gsal zhing rnam par mdzes pa lha'i rgyud thams cad kyis rnam par brgyad pa/
4843(): gzi brjid che zhing 'od 'bar ba/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po de rnams la bltas nas tshigs su bcad te smras pa/ nga la nor dang zlas skom dang // gser dang 'bru rnams dgos pa med//
4844(): lhung ba nga yid shes par byos// de bas dad pa'i sems ldan rnams// thams cad lhan cig mthun par ni// dge ba bcu 'i las lam srungs// sems
4845(): can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub smon lam brtan pa thob// phad pa'i dngos po nyid kyi sems// cig la cig kyang byams pa skyed// de ltar byas ma khyed cag rnams// kun
4846(): tu bde ba nyid du 'gyur// gang na 'jig rten bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyu// dam pa rnams kyi rjes su slob pa yin// de bas ci nas bag yod ldan pa yis// sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad pa
4847(): dod yod par// byang chub sems kyi ljon shing rab bskyed na// ring por mi thogs rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung // de skad ces rjes su bstan nas gzhan yang chos kyi gtam
4848(): zhing yun dude bar gnas pa'i rgyu rjes su gdams nas yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas// kha cig ni bla na med
4849(): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ la la ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob par gyur te/ sems can tshad med pa rnams
4850(): yongs su smin par gyur to// de ltar sems can de rnams kun// brgya byin las ni tshig thos nas// rab tu dga' zhing gus pa yis// yongs su dag par gyur pa'i lam// dge ba
4851(): bcu dang mthun par gyur// kha cig chos rnams legs mthong la// gzhan dag byang chub sems bskyed pa'i// rmang byung gnas la bkod par gyur// de nas 'gro ba chos lam mthur gyur/
4852(): te/ ji ltar sems can nad med bde thob pa// de ltar lha dbang yongs su tshim par gyur// mi snang gyur te rang gi gnas su song // 'dzam bu'i gling der gnas pa'i skyes pa dang //
4853(): khye'u bud med bu mo de rnams kun// de nas bzung ste rnam pa thams cad du// gcig kyang log par ltung b.ras gyur to// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rmad du byung ba gzhan la
4854(): phan par byed pa'i smon lam gyi mthu ni dpag tu med do zhes sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob par 'dod pas// 'di lta bu'i rmad du
4855(): byung ba'i spyod pa la bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du rim gro bskyed de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// nges pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te bdud cu bzhi pa'o// /
4856(): skyes bu dam pa rnams ni dud 'gror gyur kyang snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis/ bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal ba thams cad bzod par byed cing / rmad du byung ba'i spyod pas gdug
4857(): par byed pa'i dgra bo rnams kyang sems mgu bar byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du gang na nags tshang tshing dang / gel ba dang /
4858(): shing sA la dang / pa la shas mdzes par byas pa/ phyogs thams cad na dri ma med pa'i 'bab chu du ba 'bab pa/ pad+ma dang ut+pa las gang ba'i mtsho dang lteng ka dngus
4859(): gyi me long lung med pa lta bus brgyad pa/ rtswa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bus gang ba'i sa phyogs shig na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di re shig cig glang po che'i rgyal po/ mche ba drug
4860(): pa grangs ri'i dum bu 'gro shes pa lta bu zhig tu gyur to zhes grag go/ de ni lus bzang snying stobs che ba dang // rnam par dag cing sbyangs pa'i ngang tshul spyod// gang sa ri ltar mdzes/
4861(): lus ni rab tu brtan// rdul gyi dri zhim dregs pa'i gdong brgyan pa// pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar mche ba drug/ rab mdzes gdong ni pod+ma 'bar ba bzhin// de yis nags khrod mchog
4862(): de mdzes par byas// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam par bkod pa bzhin// de'i tshe ba lang mo mchog tu yid 'phrog ma zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang glang po che'i tshogs kyi khyu chen po rnams kyang
4863(): de'i spyod tshul rnam par dag pas gdams pa bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing gnas so// de'i tshe lus 'phags kyi rgyal po chen po'i btsun mo dam pa la bu mo zhig btsas te/ de chen mor gyur
4864(): pa'i tshe yul kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin la byin te/ de tshe rabs snga ma'i bag chags ngan pa'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa'i dbang gis/ byar ba rnams kyis glang po che mche ba drug pa byar
4865(): sod par byed du bcug ste/ de nas des rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smras pa/ lha phyogs che ge mo zhig da glang po che bache ba drug pa zhig mchis zhes mchin/ de'i mche ba bdag la 'tshal ba zhig pa
4866(): kyis lhas grong mi rnams la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal pos yul thams cad na gnas pa'i rngon pa rnams bkug ste bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la/ phyogs che ge mo zhig na/
4867(): glang po che mche ba drug pa zhig 'dug pa de'i mche ba dgos kyi myur du khyer te shog cig/ lha bka' bzhin du 'tshal zhes rngon pa de rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sgyid la mnyan to// de nas rngon
4868(): pa de rnams kyi sde dpon gang yin pa des rngon pa rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rang rang gi las la 'bod cing 'dug cig dang / kho bo kho na 'gro'o zhes des gtor ma'i cho ga byas/ go
4869(): dgos mda' dug cad lag na thogs gzhu brdungs te glang po che tshol zhing song ba las phyogs der phyin pa dang / des de khyu las bkar te/ chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur rgyu zhing bag brgyas
4870(): ste 'dug pa mthong ngo // smras pa/ ut+pal pad+ma mod pa'i chu ldan yul phyogs su// glang chen dbang po me tog kun+da zla ba dang // ba yi 'o ma dang ni ba mo'i mdog can de/ gangs ri brtseg
4871(): pa 'gro ba lta bu de yis mthong // glang chen mchog gi dbang po zla ba 'dra ba de// mche ba drug pa zla ba'i 'od zer ltar sba ba// pad+ma dkar po'i phung chen gyen du 'phags pa la// pad+ma'i rtsa lag dri/
4872(): med 'dug cing rten pa lta// de nas rngon pa de lus la gos ngur smrig bgos/ mda' gzhu mtshan du bcug nas 'khri shing tshang tshing gi nang na sa/ 'jab cing gom pa brtan
4873(): te dal bus nye bar song ba dang / de nas ba lang mo des rgyang ring po kho nas mthong nas/ des glang po de la smras pa/ lha tshur spyon mi zhig mchis kyis gzhan du bzhud do// des smras pa
4874(): mI ci 'dra ba zhig/ des smras pa/ gos ngur smrig can zhig go/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta na ni bag ma tsha zhig/ ngur smrig las ni mi dge ba mi 'byung ngo // ci
4875(): phyir zhe na/ 'di ni snying rje'i bdag nyid byams pa'i yid ldan pa// gzhan gsod dga' ba spangs pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te// zla bas bsil ba 'ba' zhig byed kyi gdung med ltar//
4876(): 'di las 'jig pa mi 'byung 'di las zhi ba 'thob// de nas ba lang mo de dang byang chub sems dpa' de yang bag tsha ba med par gnas pa las/ de nas rngod pa des tshang tshing gi nang du zhugs nas
4877(): mnga' dug can gyis gnad du bsnun to// de nas ba lang mo des byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ lha cing chos gos can las bsnyems pa byung ngam ma byung / byang chub sems dpas smras pa//
4878(): snying gi sdug pa ma byed ma byed cig/ nyes 'di thub pa'i na bza' 'di min gyi// nyes 'di nyon mongs dbang du song ba yi// sems ldan snying rje rnam par spangs pa'i yin// skye bo ma rmongs
4879(): sems ldan rtog pa can// su yis gser gyis g.yogs pa'i lcags las ni// mi rnams slu bar byed ces bsams nas su// gser de lcags dang 'dra ba nyid du blta// 'di yis mda'
4880(): dang gzhu dang yid gdug pa// gang yid de ni gdug pa nyid du shes// ngur smrig mchog tu zhi ba 'di yang ni// rtag tu zhi ba nyid du blo yis rtogs// de nas ba lang po de mi bzod pa skyes nas
4881(): smras pa/ bdag ni tshig 'di dag gis bde bar bskrad pa khyod gsod pa btang snyoms su bgyid rdo pi thog pas bdag gis 'di yan lag dang nying lag rnams dkrug g.yeng dbug gsheg
4882(): gzhom par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dzum phyung nas smras pa/ e ma'i nyon mongs pa'i 'byung po gsod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma'i mngon par zhen pa rung ba ma yin/
4883(): no/ ci 'di yang mi shes sam/ 'byung po'i gdon gyis thabs pa sems rmongs pa// dad pa des ni spad pa mi bkur te// de la sman pas gnod par mi byed kyi// 'byung po de nyid zil
4884(): gyis mnan nas 'joms// de bzhin nyon mongs gdon gyis thebs pa yis// skye bo sems rmongs 'di ni sdig par byed// de la bdag shes nyon mongs gdor byed kyi// nyon mongs pa yis
4885(): pham byas rnams la min// lhan cig spyod pa bdag gis byang chub thob nas srid gsum 'di// grags pas kun bkang nyon mongs g.yod can dran 'dul brtan pa dang // drag po 'joms
4886(): byed phyer brlag bcad cing btag dang skam pa dang // rab tu bskab pas ring po mi thogs shin tu tshar bcad bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig rnams kyis ba lang
4887(): mo de snying rtswa bri bar byas pas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas glang po che'i tshogs des byang chub sems dpa'i drung du dong ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ glang po che 'di dag
4888(): gis 'di nyid du rjod pa 'di la gnod pa bskyed na mi rung ngo snyam mo// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems pa rnams ni lus kyis log par ltung bar 'gyur gyi/ sems kyis ni ma yin
4889(): pas de rngon pa de'i bdun du song nas mi'i skad kyis ma 'jig shig ces smras te/ dbugs phyung nas brang 'og tu sbas te 'dug go/ glang po che rnams kyang snyed cig btags na sa phyogs de nas
4890(): gzhan du btang ngo // glang po che rnams dong ba dang des rngon pa la smras pa/ kye nang rje shes par gyis shig/ glang po che rnams dong gis/ da ni rang gi dgos pa byos shig/ rngon pas
4891(): bsams pa/ bdag 'dra ba'i mi ni tha shal yin te/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba 'dis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag gi dad pa bskyed do snyam nas/ des skad phyung ste ngus pa dang //
4892(): de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci'i phyir du/ rngon pas smras pa bsnun no// byang chub sems dpa' mi dga' nas bsams pa/ ma la 'di bdag gis skyabs
4893(): byas pa'i gnod par gyur pa'am/ ba lang mo 'dis bdag gsod pa las mi bzod pa skyes pas/ 'di la mi dga' ba cung zad cig byas par ma gyur tam snyam nas/ rngon pa de la smras
4894(): pa ru kye nang rje khyod la su zhig gis bsnun/ de nas rngon pa de mig mchi ma'i rba rlabs kyis gang bzhin du smras pa/ glang chen dbang po khyod kyi ni// lus la bdag gis mda' yis bsnun// khyod
4895(): kyi yon tan tshogs kyi mda'// bdag gi sems la bsnun par gyur// dug can mda' yis phog pa yis// lus rnams skye bar 'gyur ba ste// yon tan gyis ni mangs phog po'i/
4896(): mi mkhas rnams ni skye mi 'gyur// gshed ma la yang snying rje bre// 'di 'dra gang la yod gyur pa// yon tan rgya mtsho khyod kyi ni// yon tan de brjod su yis nus// mdor na bdag gis mi
4897(): snyam pa'i// blo yang bdag la mi 'byung gi/ bdag lus yon tan gyis stong pa// 'di la tshig pa za ba skyes// mi yi sha tshugs ldan yang bdag/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas song ba yin//
4898(): glang chen mchog khyod dud 'gro yi// skye gnas sha tshugs 'chang yang mi// sha tshugs tsam gyis dud 'gro 'am// mor yang brtsi ba ma yin gyi// gang la yon tan nyer dmigs pa// de ni mi shes bya bar
4899(): dran byang chub sems dpas smras pa// yon tan gyis bstod par byed pa'i tshig gis gtam gyi bar chad byed pa thong la/ don ci zhig gi phyir khyod kyis nga la mda' bsnun pa myur du smros shig/ des
4900(): smras pa/ rgyal po'i na tur gyis bdag gi bya ba ma yin pa 'di byas te/ khyod la dgos pa ci zhig yod do// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ lag pa
4901(): gnyis ni myur rkyong la// ci 'dod pa ni blang bar gyis// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// mi btang cung zad med pas long // bdag gi sha 'di bcad nas khyer ba'am// mche ba rnams
4902(): kyang 'dod par byed la rag/ 'di ni gzhan la brtse ba'i phyir bskyed pas// lus 'di la ni ji ltar dga' bar gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer 'jug nus kyang // 'khor bar bgrod
4903(): dka' dag ni zhugs pa gang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa// gzhan la brtse ba de yi rgyu yin no// de nas rngon pa de ngo tsha ba skyes kyang rgyal po'i nan tur la bsams nas smras
4904(): par khyod kyi mche ba rnams dgos lags so// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ dal gyis phyung la khyer cig/ des smras pa/ khyod nyid kyi thugs dpag mdzod cig/ bdag ni khyod kyi mche
4905(): ba 'byin mi phod do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te snying rje'i bdag nyid can// khyod kyi mche bo rnams phyung na// byams pa'i me yis nges bsregs nas/ bdag gi lag gnyis mi ltung
4906(): ngam byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta na nga nyid kyis phyung la sbyin no// zhes de nas nges mche ba rtse ba shin tu ring du zug pa dag phyung ba dang / bdag nyid chen po de las khrig
4907(): phyung ste/ de mthong nas gzhan dag gis dper byas pa/ mche ba bton pa las byung khrag gi mthong ga kun nas bshos pa de/ me tog ku mu bkram mdog lta bu'i lus te dpal ldan rnam par mdzes
4908(): ri steng kha bas khengs pa'i ri bo 'od zer mdzes dang ldan par gyur pa yi// rtse mo tshon rtsi btsag gis kha bsgyur chu yis gas pa gseb gtor ba bzhin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag
4909(): nyid spro sring ba'i phyir smras pa/ snying rje can khyod dang ri brtan par mnos shig rmongs su ci zhig yod// 'phongs par gyur dang mgon med 'jig rten la yang blta bar gyis// khyod ni skye bo
4910(): 'ching ba'i dbang du song ba rnams kyi mgon// de lta 'dir ni de ring zhub par bya ba'i cha ma yin// bar skabs der nam mkha'i ngos kyang ya mtshan gyis yi rang ba'i lha rnams kyis gang
4911(): zhing ya mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byung ngo // de nas lha zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' las shin tu dka' ba spyod pa de mthong nas smras pa/ grogs po bdag nyid chen po'i gnas
4912(): gang yin pa 'di ni ya mtshan che ste/ mche ba rnams ni phyung ba yi// tshor bas nyam thag gyur kyang de// lhag po'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems// byang chub las kyang mi ldog go/
4913(): de nas lha gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa/ mche ba phyung ba las byung ba'i// sdug bsngal rang gis myong yang de'i// snying rje dmyal ba na gnas pa'i// sems can rnams la mngon 'phel
4914(): ba gang yin pa ni de yi sems// byang chub las ldog ga la 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpas mche ba de dag phyung nas rang nyid thogs te cang mi smra bar
4915(): 'dug go// de nas rngon pa mi dga' ba skyes te/ ci 'dis rang gi mche ba de dag bzung nas sbyin par gtong mi 'dod dam snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i bsam pa shes
4916(): nas me tog kun da lta bu'i sna mongon du brkyang nas/ grogs po bag ma tsha zhig ces smras te/ ku mu da dang zla ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa 'dra mche ba'i mdog/ drug po 'di dag khyod sbyin zhes//
4917(): bdag gis bzung gis bde bar 'dug/ skad cig tsam cig sdod cig dang // len pa po dang nye bar ni// de yi bar du sdug bsngal gyis// gdungs pa'i yid rab dang bar bya// gal te khyod
4918(): ni ci ste bdag brtags nas// khyod kyi sems ni rab tu dang bar bya// bdag ni gsod 'khu g.yon can ngo tsha med// de la go bar gyis shig snyam sems na/ khyod kyi nyes spyad go dug dang gzhu
4919(): gdug pa// de dang mda' rnon khyad du bsad nas ni// ngur smrig 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyur pa de// mthong nas yid ni rab tu dad par byas// sbyin pa kha cig len pa la dga' ste// de bzhin gzhan ni sbyin
4920(): pa po la dga'// de yi phyir na 'di ni rang sems las// yod kyis dga' ba yang dag bskyed par 'bad// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan yinan
4921(): snyam nas// ngur smrig de nyid la rtog cing sems rab tu dang bar byas te/ mche ba de rnams rang gi sna ljags kyi lag pas brkyang ste byin pa/ dug can mnga' yis po gnas rang gi snying la ni// mi dga'
4922(): cung zad ma gyur bden pa gang yin pa// bden pa de yis yang dag byang chub mchog thob nas// 'gro ba nyam thag sdug bsngal rnams las yongs thar gyur// de skad ces brjod nas/ bdag gi
4923(): lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rnam par dag pa bstan te/ rjod pa de 'dud par byas nas/ rang gi mche ba rnams byin ni// rngod pa des kyang mche ba khyer nas rgyal po'i drung du song ngo // de lta bas na
4924(): byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob par 'dod pas dngos po thams cad la zhen pa med par skyid cing / de lta bu'i smon lam yang gdab par bya'o// gzhan yang byams pa'i bdag nyid can
4925(): rnams ni gnod par byed pa rnams kyi don yang byed par 'gyur ro// zhes snying rje'i phan yod bsngags pa dang / bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gnas skabs de lta buda'ang yon tan
4926(): de lta bu dang ldan no zhes sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// glang po che mche ba drug par skyes pa'i rabs te bdud cu lnga pa'o// skyes bu dam pa rnams
4927(): de bdag nyid kyi brtson pa dang snying rje'i stobs kyis/ chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs ji lta bar rig cing smon lam gyi dbang gis gzhan gyi don chen po'ang byed par 'gyur ro// de yang 'dim sa/
4928(): te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ re shig cig yongs su rgyu ba 'char ka zhes bya ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsags pa/ shes
4929(): bya'i gnas la yongs su bslabs pa/ mkhas pa'i bdag nyid can zhig tu gyur to zhes grag go// rang rgyud yongs su sbyangs shing zhi ba yi// mi yi 'jig rten dam pa'i spyod bral ba// de las de
4930(): ri mngon par log pa bzhin// dam pa'i spyod pa yang dag rjes su 'jug/ mkhas pa'i bdag nyid shes rab gsal gyur pas// 'jig rten spyan ngag bstan bcos tshul bzhin rig/ bdag
4931(): nyid chen pos gzhan gyi don brtsod pa// gi yang ba med par sems can rnams la brtse// zos dang dran dang sbyangs po'i yon tan gyis// 'gro ba rnams kyi don la tshul bzhin spyod// de ltar ba
4932(): nyid chen po de gzhan gyi don yang dag par spyod pa la gzhol bar gyur to// de'i tshe rtog pa nges par spyod pa zhes bya ba rtsa ba 'byid pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyu mngon par shes pa zhig byung ste/
4933(): des grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su zhugs nas/ rtsa ba shes pa yang dag par bstan to// de de ltar ston pa yongs su rgyu ba 'char ka des thos nas
4934(): 'di snyam du sems te 'jig rten gyi shes pa 'di lta bu bstan par mi bya ste/ 'di bdag nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi shes pa rig par bya'o snyam mo// 'di rtogs par byed pa la ni rnam par g.yengs pas thob pa
4935(): ma yin zhing / dben par brtson pa las shes par 'gyur ro zhes rig nas/ gangan rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs skye bo rnams kyi rgyud lam med pa zhig tu brgyan par gyur to// gang na bas ma gtan rjes
4936(): mthun par// brtson par byed la mthuran gyur pa'i// ri khrod sman ljongs mdzes pa dag/ chu gzhi chu gtsang sngon por bcas// sna tshogs me tog tshogs kyis gang // rtswa dang ldum bu rtsa ba'i tshogs/
4937(): kun nas mdzes par kun tu bkram// gan ma ni dgod pa ltar byed pa'i// zla ba skar pa dri med rnams// bkram pa bzhin du phyogs kun tu// rang bzhin longs spyod kyi bkra ba// 'jig rten ca co med
4938(): pa'i gnas// zhi ba'i gnas der bsam gtan dang // shes rab lhag par 'phel byed pas// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don// rtogs par 'gyur 'di chos nyid yin// de nas de bsam gtan dang /
4939(): mthun pa'i gnas su de ltar gnas bcas nas/ bdag 'dzin gyi shes pa gang nas byung ba de so sor rtog go// de 'di snyam du sems te 'jig rten gyi shes pa lus 'di nyid nas gzhan du btsal bar mi
4940(): bya'o snyam mo// yang 'di snyam du sems te// 'jig rten 'di dag gang yin zhes de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di ltar sems skyes te/ 'jig rten 'di ni 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ga/ phung
4941(): po lngar 'dzin pa ste/ rgyu des de dag ni skye ba dang / rgas pa dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas 'jig rten 'di ma rung bar gyur to// yongs su shes pa gang dag gis 'jig rten 'di nyid de ltar shes nas/ rgas pa'i sdug
4942(): bsngal dang / na ba'i sdug bsngal/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag dgag par 'gyur ro snyam mo// des 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di dag thams cad ni 'jig pa'i chos dang / rab tu
4943(): 'jig pa'i chos su sems te/ bdag gis rab tu mi shes so// de sems cad de dag nyid las snying rje chen po thob ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag 'jig rten las yongs su thar bar bya'o snyam mo//
4944(): de 'di nyid la brtson pas mngon par shes pa lnga thob ste/ 'jig rten ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mngon par gyur to// de mngon par shes pa'i mthus sems can thams cad la yongs su rtog par byed pa na/
4945(): 'gro ba rnam pa lnga kun tu rgyug par mthong ngo // gang dag 'dod dang khro ba gti mug gis bsgribs pa/ de dag ma rungs mngon par spyod la rab tu 'jug/ sna tshogs yul la sred pa'i zhags pas 'ching/
4946(): byed cing // so so'i rgyu las 'bras bu mngon par snang bar 'gyur// srog gcod ldan pas 'bras bu 'jigs rung ba// mtshon nod brgya phrag tshogs kyis gnod byas shing // las kyis sos te slar yang
4947(): phyi mar rlog/ gzhan dag ser sna'i rgyu las rab 'bar bas// sog le me 'bar brgya yis gtub cing bsrel/ gzhan dag 'dod pas 'bar ba'i bud med dag/ 'khyud pas kun tu phye mar byed pa dang // kha
4948(): dang 'phar skam rab tu 'bar ba yis// dbang po drangs shing du btsam la rten// la la btung bas 'dod pa phyogs kun rgyug/ ro nye 'bar ba 'thung zhing 'khur sgra 'byin// kha cig me 'bar phur pas lce brgyangs te/
4949(): lcags kyi thong gshol 'bar ba lnga brgyas rmod// la la lcags leb 'bar bas lus dkris shing // rus pa'i steng nas tshor tshir sgra yang 'byin// kha cig lcags kyi rdza chen ro nya yis// gang par bcug ste mar
4950(): gsar gong bu bzhir// kha cig mnar med 'bar bar rab tu zhugs// grang pa'i reg dang de bzhin so tha ma dang // chu bur rdol cing kun tu rnag khrag 'dzag/ lus gas zhig cing dum bur rab tu zhig/ yi
4951(): blong sgra yang 'byin par mi nus pa// de 'dra las kyis kun tu zhugs par gyur// de bzhin du ni 'dod pas zil mnan pa'i// skye bo smig rgyu'i chu la zhen pa bzhin// bkres skom dbang gis sdug
4952(): bsngal brgya phrag myong // dri ma mi gtsang ngar snabs za byed cing // de yang mo myong sdug bsngal gyis gtses pas// de 'dra'i sred par 'gro rnams yud ring 'khyam// de bzhin cig gis cig la gnod byed/
4953(): cing / glen lkugs dbang po yongs su ma dag pas// dpag med dus ring 'i'agro 'dir kun tu rmongs// de bzhin nga rgyal dbang gis 'thab cing rtson// 'dod dang mtho ris bde ba cung zad kyang // mi 'dod
4954(): bzhin du 'bral ba'i ngan song lhung // long yod tsam la le lo'i dbang gis rmongs// ngal so'i bde la 'dod pas kun tu dregs// de 'dra'i srid du 'gro rnam mtshar cig byas// kye ma 'di ltar nyon mongs snying re rje// de ltar
4955(): 'gro ba rnams kun tu zo chu'i khyud mo bzhin du 'khor zhing // sdug bsngal ba sems dpa' chen po des mthong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa lngas
4956(): ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstar te/ thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa la bkod do// sems cad de dag thams cad kyis mngon par shes pa lnga thob ras kyang bla na
4957(): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la mngon par bkod do// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas 'di lta bu'i brtsor 'grus dang smon lam gyis gzhan gyi ngor bya ba
4958(): la brtsor par bya'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o// gzhan yang thabs mkhas pa ri mngon par shes pa dang 'brel to zhes brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sngon yang sems can gyi don dpag tu med pa
4959(): mdzad do// ces sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// kun tu rgyu 'char ka'i skyes pa'i rabs te bdun cu drug pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni snying /
4960(): rje chen po'i dbang gis gzhan gyi don du lus dang longs spyod thams cad chags pa med par gtong zhing / smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa
4961(): dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul med lhun po sras ces bya bar gyur te/ de tshe bskal pa chen po byung ba na/ mar 'grib pa'i skyes bu rnams tshe lo brgya thub pa'i dus su/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
4962(): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi pad+ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de yongs su mya ngar las 'das nas/ bstan pa nub par gyur cing / dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag
4963(): cag gi smon pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling las ram par rgyal ba stobs kyi 'khor lo bskur banor car zhes bya bar gyur to// ces zag go// rgyam chos 'khyud ba'i sa 'di dpal 'bar bar/ byed las bdag rgyam
4964(): po zhes su grags// de bas 'dir ni chos dang sring lam dag/ gsal bar byed la brtan cing ngang tshul bzang // phan byed 'jig rten brtson pas don grub pa// dregs dang 'phyar dang rgod pa rnam par spangs/
4965(): gzhan la phan byed bsil zer 'gro ba 'di// bsil bar byed pa'i 'od kyis 'gran pa min// rgyal po de ni 'bangs kyi don byed pas// rang gi lus dang longs spyod rnams la yang // dman pa rnams dang thun mong
4966(): bzhin du spyod// de bas 'di ni 'phags pa'i nor dang ldan// sa bdag de yis bsrung ba'i sa phyogs rnams// mtshon gyi chad pa med cing bder gnas pa// tshul gyis tshul min spyod pa ring du spangs//
4967(): de ltar 'jig rten phan par byed par gyur// de ltar bdag nyid re ba'i rgyal po de la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi dpal chen po nye bar spyad pa'i pho brang dang btsun mo dang longs spyod du ma dang / mdun na 'dod
4968(): dang blon po rgya che ba du pa dang ldan zhing / bu'ang stong yod par gyur to// de ras rgyal po des sangs rgyas kyi bstar pa de yang nub tu nye bar mthong ras/ lhag pa'i bsam pa rgya chen pos sangs
4969(): rgyas kyi bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gi bu rnams dang sa chen po rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa'i skye bo rnams la 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis yongs su bskul bar byas so// gang na rgyal ba'i
4970(): bstan pa rin chen mchog/ mngon sum 'di dang phyi ma'i 'bras stsol ba// phan byed 'di dang mchog tu phrad par dka'// mi yi skye ba'ang rnyed par dka' bas na// des rang yi bkra' khrim
4971(): gnas pa rnams// mthun par bag yod dge ba'i gnas la zhugs// dul dang sdom pa'i gnas la mngon par brten// blo ldan rnams kyis byang chub sems mchog bskyed// de ltar spyad na gtan du phan bde'i
4972(): lam/ bro mchog rnams kyis bgrod pa'i go 'phang 'thob// su dag rab tu byung zhing chos spyod pa// gang yin de yis yongs su spyad pa rnams// yongs su sbyar zhing dogs pa med par bya// de skad ces
4973(): yongs su bsgrags shing bla na med pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go// de'i dbang gis bu stong po de dag la'ang / drug ma gtogs pa thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung zhing
4974(): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bu drug po de dag la'ang / yang dang yang du bsgo ba/ khyed rnams bsam pa ci lta bu zhig gis rab tu mi 'byung zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag
4975(): cag rnams rab tu mi 'byung lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang zad pa'i dus kyi mthar dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa na/ rab tu byung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po mtha' dag kur tu 'dzin par yang rdzom
4976(): thog la/ der ror bdud dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying nas/ des slar res 'ga' zhig lha dang mi'i nang du dpal thob par bas kyis/ rtag tu ngan song gsum po dag tu yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur
4977(): zhing sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin par mi 'gyur te/ de'i slad du bdag cag rab tu mi 'byung lags so// yang smras pa/ zad pa'i dus la nyer gnas tshe// bstar ba'i dor ri mi 'thob par// kun
4978(): tu rmongs pa'i dge sbyong dag log par spyod pa 'byung 'gyur te// thos pa'i don la mi brtson zhing // mngon pa'i nga rgyal ldan pa dag/ rtog ge'i dregs pas mu cor smra// zhi ba'i dgon dben spyod pa las/
4979(): nyams te chags pas grong du rgya// 'dod la bag med spyad pa yis// 'phags pa'i nor las ring 'gyur zhing // ngan 'gro rnams su gzhol ba'i phyir// de yi slad du bdag cag rnams// rab tu 'byung bar
4980(): mi 'tshal lo// yang de dag la dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ gal te bdag cag la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad stsol na/ de lta na bdag cag
4981(): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// de skad ces smras pa rgyal pos thos nas mchog tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba thob nas 'di snyam du bsams pa/ ngas 'dzam
4982(): bu'i gling gi mi thams cad dkor mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la bkod cing / 'phags pa'i gso sbyong yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'ang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/ theg pa gsum po dag kyang yang
4983(): dag par 'dzin du bcug zir gyis/ bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di cha drug tu bgos te/ bu drug po dag la byin la/ byin nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug cing /
4984(): bdag kyang mngon par byung ste rab tu byung bar bya gor ma chag go snyam nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad cha drug tu bgos te bu drug po de dag la byin nas/ rjes su gdams pa byas
4985(): te sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bdag nyid rab tu byung bar gyur to// longs spyod snying po med par des rig nas// mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du yongs su spangs// 'dzam gling longs spyod dpal gyis
4986(): bkra ba yang // gnod byed bzhin du des ni ltos med btang // rgyal ba'i bstan pa yon tan rmad byung ba// lha dbang rnams kyi gtsug gis legs bsten pa'i// tshul khrims thos dang ting 'dzin gyis
4987(): brgyan pa'i// de 'dir mngon du blangs te brtson par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dang 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po de dag kyang phan tshun mi mthur zhing 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang /
4988(): 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par gyur to// de'i dbang gis mi ma yin pa rnams 'khrug par gyur te/ rang dang mu ge'i bskal pa dag gis sems can rnams la shin tu gnod par gyur to// gang dag mi rnams
4989(): chos tshul mi spyod pa/ de tshe lha dang lha min 'khrug gyur te// nang dang mu ges rab tu gtses par gyur// 'bru rnams 'phel ba'i go skabs zhar gyur te// dus tshigs ldang ba'i lhas kyang gzhan
4990(): du gyur// char rgyun rab tu ldan pa'i 'brug gi sgra// rgyun chags ngal bus sgrogs pa med gyur te// nyi ma'i zer gyis sa yang skems byed cing // tsha ba'i dbugs kyis chu rnams drangs pa bzhin// /
4991(): nyin re bzhin du zhub zhing zos pa 'dra// de yi dbang gis sa yang bkres pa bzhin// rgya mtsho'i chu rdul 'khrug pa'i spyir dag kyang // lha yin gtum po 'khrugs pa'i sgra skrad bzhin/ thog
4992(): thog sgrogs shing gnam lcags mnga' 'phen pa'i// snying dang mgo bor zug pa byas pa 'dra// pad+ma ut+pal gang ba'i mtsho rnams dang // dang mo'i dpung mgos bskyod pa'i rlabs phreng car// de
4993(): ngag rnams kyang bskams shing med gyur te// nagra tshal sngor po sprir stug 'dra ba dag/ tsha ba'i rlung gis bskyod pa yal ga las// 'bar zhing tshig pas rang rod can gyur te// mya ngan car gyi gdong bzhin nag por
4994(): gyur rtswa dang 'bras bu me tog tshogs rnams kyang // mthu dang bral nas gang ngan 'gran pa 'dra// de yi dbang gis bya dang ri dgas tshogs// bkres shing yid 'gyur sgra yang chung ngur sgrogs// sa rdul 'khrug
4995(): pa'i bud kyis bar snang khyab// nyi zla gza' skar mdangs dang mi ldan gyur// skye bo bkres shing rad kyis nyams thag pa// phyir phyir zhum zhing mya ngar kyi hud 'don// de ltar 'jig rten dga' ba med par gyur/
4996(): ltar skye 'gro rnams shin tu nyams thag par gyur pa byang chub sems dpas mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams pa/ kye ma'o// mtshar byas rang gi nyes pas sems can rnams 'khrugs par gyur te sdug bsngal bar/
4997(): byas so// nga ni ci nas 'di rnams sgrub pa'i mthu yod pas bdag gis smon lam gyis spel bar byas la// rang gi lus kyi sha khrag gis sems can rnams 'tsho bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems
4998(): dpa' yul gyi dbus su song nas risu stong zhes bya ba shin tu ma po kyang dang ldan pa ni gsod pa la 'dzegs te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po nye bar gnas pas smon las
