4999(): btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag lus yongs su gtong ba ni// snying brtse'i phyir te lus kyi sha khrag rnams// ri 'di'i 'phang tsam dag tu gyur nas ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten don du 'gyur bar shog/ 'di ltar
5000(): gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs gtong ba// bdud phyir ma yid brgya byin tshangs phyir min// bdag gi sha khrag mang por gyur nas ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten don ni byed gyur cig/ gang dag ri dang
5001(): brag la gnas pa yi// lha klu gnod sbyin mi rnams nga la nyon// sems can don phyir bdag gis brtson bskyed de// rang gi sha khrag dag gis tshim par bya// gang gi tshe de skad du smon lab btab nas byang
5002(): chub sems dpa' rang gi lus ri chu skyong gi kha nas bor ro// de nas sa chen rgya mtshor bcas pa chags pa'i rlabs kyis bskyod pa bzhin// shig shig g.yos shing ri rab lhun po rab tu dga' bas bskyod pa
5003(): bzhir// lha dang dri ba dga' ba'i phyogs rnams spyod pa de yis yid g.yos bzhir// mchi ba'i rlar bcas yang lag me tog bcas pas bskyod cing bstod pa bzhin// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' yis// rang
5004(): gi lus ni dor gyur pa// de tshe garar grub skra grag cing // sa yang skrag cing 'dar ba 'dra// rmang du byung ba'i spor lam gyi// sgra yang kun gyis thos par gyur// 'di ci zhes ni phyogs kun lha// lus kyang 'dar/
5005(): zhing ba sku g.yos// de tshe lha rnams thams cad kyis// rjes su bstan pa thos gyur te// bkres shing skom pa'i lus can rnams// rmang du byung ba'i skyir ba de// zos par gyur nas 'dus par gyur// de ltar
5006(): byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus bor zhing smor lam btab pa'i dbang gis// zag ri chen po la lhung ba na rdo'i tshogs chen po spungs par gyur pa bzhin du lus kyi rnam pa 'thor nas sha'i phung po chen po'i ri//
5007(): mgo dang dbang po dang don snod 'bum phrag mang po dang ldan pa khyon ni dpag tshad brgya/ 'bang du yang dpag tshad brgya par gnas par gyur te/ de ras mi dang gcan gzar dang bya dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de'i
5008(): sha za ba'i phyir 'dus shing gang dang gang 'dod pa thams cad blangs so// de ci ltar blangs pa bzhin du smon lam gyi mthus 'dzad pa med de sha dang khrag dang pags pa dang dbang po la sogs gang 'dod pa de dag dpag
5009(): tu med par gyur ras 'dzam bu'i gling ji snyed par bkres pa dang skom pa dag gi longs spyod du gyur te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo khri'i bar du sbyin pa byas te sems cad rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub la
5010(): bkod do// rmad du byung ba'i smon lam dpag tu med pa'i mthus// rgya mtsho'i chu thigs phreng ba'i tshad kyi dper mi rung / zang mi shes pa'i mthu ldan nam mkha'i mdzod kyi gter// mnga' mdzad thugs rje'i
5011(): bdag nyid de la skyabs su mchi// de lta bu'i don de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus nangs 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad byin nas bla ra med pa'i byang chub tu sems
5012(): bskyed du bcug pa'i tshul bu drug po ni skyes bu dam pa legs dga' dang / rab tu lag brkyang dang sa sbyin dang / brtson 'grus bskul dang / snying po me tog rgyas pa/
5013(): dang / shes rab 'ong zer kun nas 'khrugs 'dzin zhes bya ba 'di rnams yin no// ngas sems can gyi don du gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mig kyang rab tu btang ngo // rgya mtsho bzhi'i chu snyed kyi khrag yongs
5014(): su btang ngo // ri rab stong gsum tsam gyi sha dag yongs su btang ngo // ri khor yug tsam gyi lce dag yongs su btang ngo // lhun po gnya' shing 'dzin tsam gyi rna ba dag yongs su btang ngo // ri rab tsam gyi sna rgyu
5015(): chen po yongs su btang ngo // bya rgod phung po'i ri 'di tsam gyi so dag yongs su btang ngo // de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed mtha' dag gi gzhi tsam gyi rang gi pags pa'ang yongs su btang ngo // rigs kyi bu de
5016(): ltar lo khri'i bar du srog gcig gis rang gi lus yongs su btang ba/ tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su btang zhing / sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tshim par byas kyang nga'i
5017(): sems skad cig gcig tsam yang 'gyod par ma gyur to zhes gsungs so// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas gtong ba dang yongs su gtong ba dang gtong ba chen po dag gis
5018(): sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan pas rmad du byung ba'i sngon
5019(): lAs dang spyod pa bsam kyis mi khyab bo zhes sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// rgyal po nor can gyi skyes pa'i rabs te bdun cu bdur pa'o// skyes rba/
5020(): dam pa smon lam gyi stobs rab tu bsgrub pa rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / bdag nyid kyi sems yongs su skyo ba dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
5021(): dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ re shig bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rang bzhin mkhas pa'i bdag nyid dang pa ma rnam par dag pa'i spyod tshul dang ldan pa/ zla ba
5022(): yar gyi ngo ltar yon tan gyi tshogs kyi che bas je cher gyur pa'i bram ze'i khye'u zhig tu skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur te/ de btsas nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i spyod tshul dang ldan pa 'jig rten
5023(): thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhig tu byung bas/ de'i ming zla dga' zhes btags so// de je cher gyur nas rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyi mthus rig byed rnam pa gsum dang / sba nges par sbyor ba dang
5024(): gsal ba dang / yi ger rab tu dbye ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gzhung dang / mchod spyir gyi rgyud dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan brtag pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// de ri rig byed
5025(): gnas kyi pha rol phyin// mkhas pa'i bdag nyid gzhan la ci nus ston// skra dang yi ge'i sbyor ba rmang byung ba'i// 'jig rten gtsug lag gsal bar mngon sum gyur// grags pa'i lam gyis je cher
5026(): gsal gyur pa// gangs kyi ri la nyi ma shar ba bzhin// de yi yon tan gsal bas skye bo rnams// mngon par 'dud cing de yang skye bo la// bu ltar brtse ngas ci rus par 'dogs byed /
5027(): yon tan rnams kyis che ba'i bla mar gyur// de ltar bram ze zla dga' shing sA la chen po lta bu rang gi yon tan gyis skye bo rnams la phan 'dogs par byed cing / longs spyod kyi dpal chen po thob pa rnams la snying po/
5028(): med par shes nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang slongs mos 'tsho ba dang mu stegs byed rnams la so so'i yid bzhin du bza' ba dang bsgo ba la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyis/ nyi ma gcig bzhin du tshim par byed/
5029(): pa'i zla ba'i mchod sbyin chen po rab tu bsgrubs shing lo 'bum phrag brgyad du sems gzhan du g.yeng ba med par byas so// de ri zla ba'i mchod sbyir chen po la// rab tu bsgrubs pas skye bo kun 'dus te// nagra
5030(): tshal glang po mtsho chen ngogs lhags bzhin// dgos pa'i dbang gis mchod spyir rgya cher gyur// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
5031(): mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i 'khor 'dus pa nyan thos dgra bcom pa skar ma dang mnyam par gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'ang skar ma dang mnyam par gyur
5032(): to de'i nyan thos rnams las gcig tsam yang mchod sbyir gyi bkang sar mi 'jug go// rgyu des bram ze bla dga' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi mchod sbyir gyi bkang sa 'dir ya mtshan can kun pal
5033(): cher 'jug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ni 'dir mi 'byon pa'i rgyu ci lta bu zhig yod snyam du bram ze nges legs par brtags pa las 'di
5034(): snyam du gyur te/ gang gis rgyal ba'i nyan thos dag/ mchod sbyin bkang sar 'jug min pa// bdag gi mchod sbyin de yi sbyor// de 'dir nges pa rnyed par gyur// bcom ldan 'das nyar thos kyi dge 'dun
5035(): dang bcas pa ni gzhan dag la phar par bzhed pa// dus su za ba dang ldan pa yin la// bdag gi sbyin pa chen po 'di ni dus dang mi ldan par kun tu brims pa'i dbang gis skyor des de bzhin gshegs pa
5036(): de bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi bkad sar mi 'jug pa lta zhig snyam mo// de nas bram ze zla dga' de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod pa'i dbang gis/ nang par snga bar langs nas rang gi bzang mo dang bram ze'i/
5037(): tshogs rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig/ gang na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes// 'jig rten pha rol byon gyur pa// de 'dir mthong bar dka' ba ste// 'jig rten mngon sum gyur bzhin
5038(): du su zhig bag med rjes su 'jug/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams khyer la// rgyal ba de yi drung du 'dong // de skad ces smras nas bram ze dang bram ze mo'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing bdag
5039(): nyid kyis bkod pa'i longs spyod du mas brgyan te/ thams cad kyang rta dkar pos drangs pa'i shing rta la zhon nas/ bzhor pas bgrod pa'i sa ji tsam pa de tsam du bzhon pas song ste/ bzhon pa las babs
5040(): nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de shing ljoran pa zhig gi drung na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs/
5041(): pa mthong zhing 'di ltar mngon du gyur par nges so// dpal ldan bzang zhing mdzes pa dbang po dul// mnyam par bzhag cing zhi ba dam pa brnyes// glang po'i rgyal po bya ba mthar son pa// rgya mtsho'i
5042(): dbyings ltar dngas shing rnyog pa med// lha klu dge sbyong tshogs rnams thams cad kyi// dbus na rab tu gsal ba mchod sdong bzhin// mthong na dga' ba'i dpal gyis 'bar bar mthong // e ma'o//
5043(): rmad du byung zhes ngo mtshar skyes// de ltar mngon du gyur nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ltar rmad du byung ba la/ dge slong gi tshogs su 'du shes par gyur pa ni bdag
5044(): gis leg par rtog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang bcas shing bdud dang bcas pa thams cad kyi garas la phul du phyin pa ste/ 'khor ba'i pha rol du yang dag par gshegs pa yin te/ nga
5045(): ci nas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la yo byad thams cad kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam du nges pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song ste phyag 'tshal nas bla gos
5046(): phrag pa gcig tu gzar cing pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la kun tu rtog pa'i nongs pa gang mchis pa ni 'chags lags so//
5047(): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ji srid kyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'tshal na/ bde bar gshegs pas bdag la garang bar mdzad du gsol de
5048(): skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral bas bram ze zla dga' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// zla dga' bde bar gyur cig lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang klu dang
5049(): gnod sbyin dang dri za dang mi 'am ci la sogs pa gzhan gang rnams bsod nan gyi ga bya bar 'dod pa mang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gang zag gcig gi phyir ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi bzhugs
5050(): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa'i phyir byung ste/ sems can gang dag zas dang mal cha dang gos dang gnas rab tu nyams pa de rnams la thugs
5051(): brtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ngo // gsol pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la dgung bdun du bde ba'i rim gro thams cad kyis mchod par bgyid pa de gnang bar mdzad du gsol
5052(): de la de bzhin gshegs pa des cang mi gsung bar gnang bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bram ze lhag pa'i bsam pa yis// de bzhin gshegs la 'di skad gsol// rgyal ba thugs dag
5053(): rang byung dri med mchoganyes pa'i tshogs kun spangs la skyabs su mchi// bdag ni lus dang longs spyod thams cad kyis// bde bar gshegs la bla med mchod par bgyid// thugs rje'i mnga'
5054(): bdag 'dir ri dgongs par mdzod// lhag bsam ldan la rgyal bas 'di skad gsungs// rgyal ba rnams ni mtha' yas dor grub cing // sems can gcig phyir 'khor
5055(): bar byon pa min// de thos nas ri slar yang rgyal la gsol// dgung bdun du ri 'byor pa'i yo byad kyis// gzhan dor slad du bdag gis mchod par bgyid// rgyal ba thugs rje'i mnga' bdag gis gzigs
5056(): te 'badag la dgongs shing gnang bar mdzad du gsol// de ltar gsol nas de bzhin gshegs pas gdang bar rig ste// bdag gi gnas ga la ba der song nas phyir te gnyer bshes su gyur pa rnams
5057(): la 'di skad ces smras so// gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhag bdun du yo byad thams cad kyis gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa khyed rnams kyis shes par
5058(): gyis shig/ khyed la nus pa dang mthu ci yod pas mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyis shig/ de dag gis legs so zhes smras so// de bzhin du zan dang las byed pa zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang
5059(): bcas pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo// bskul ras kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyan
5060(): thams cad kyis brgyan par bshams so// de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis 'dus pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyidan la sogs pa rnams la spras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ gang na
5061(): sems cad kun ngor mdzad la g.yel ba mi mnga' ba// lha dang klu dang bdud dang tshangs ris kur las bla la mchog/ de 'dir de ring sems can dor phyir gnas 'drir gshegs par 'gyur// mchod
5062(): pa'i las la kur tu brtson pas bdag gi grogs byos shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mthun par so so nas spras pa/ de yi yid bzhiran klu rnams kyis// bram ze'i
5063(): mchog la 'di skad smras// de ring 'dir ni spos chu dang / klu yi rin chen tshegs rnams kyis// bdag cag mthu ni ci yod par// de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa bya// de la gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras
5064(): pa 'dir ni khyod kyis bsgo ba bzhin// rin cher khri mchog mdzes pa yis// rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pa la// kun nas mngon par brgyan par bgyi// de la grul bum rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po
5065(): bdag cag rnams kyis ri// bla re legs par bsham par bgyi// gang na bkod pa'i rgyar rung bar// de lta bur ri snang bar bya// lha rnams kyis spras pa// grogs po 'dir ni bde gshegs la// me tog chog
5066(): kyis mchod bya zhing // kun ras chur 'phyang rgyar rnams dang // sil mas kur tu bkram par bgyi// de ltar nges 'khor gyi khyams chen po bshams shing / 'byor pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis nye bar sbas nas// lhag
5067(): ba'i bsam pas bskul ba dus la bab par mkhyen nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngar thams cad dang bral ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bram ze zla dga'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs te gdan bshams
5068(): pa la bzhugs so// der bzhugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di lta bu snang bar byas so// rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs ma thag tu yang // lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa du ma byed/
5069(): klu dbang rnams ri spos kyi char pa 'bebs// 'khor gyi khyams ni dpag tshad brgya par snang // bai DUr+ya yi ra bas legs bskor zhing // shel gyi ba gam mdzes pas yongs su bskor// rta babs rir chen ka ba du
5070(): mas mdzes// nyid por byed pa'i 'od zer stong 'bar ba// mog log por byed 'od kyis kun tu lham// rgyan 'phreng chun 'phyang tshogs kyis kun tu spras// mthong na dga' bar kur tu gnas par gyur// der 'dus
5071(): lha dang mir bcas rnams// rgyal ba'i zhal gyi zla 'od kyis// phog pas snying gi ku mu da// rab tu rgyas shing yan lag gi/ thal mo'i chu skyes thub pa bzhin// yid ni rnam par g.yo med pa'i// bsam gtan ro ri thob
5072(): pa bzhir// kun ras bde bar gnas par gyur// de ltar gyur par rig nas bdag nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la// bza' ba dang bca' ba dag dpag tu med pa bstabs te lha'i
5073(): rol mo dang me tog dang bdug spos rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas dpag bsam gyi ras zung gis kyang legs par g.yogs te/ zhag bdud gyi bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so//
5074(): de nas de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur ras bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btung ras/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bde bar gshegs pa
5075(): thams cad dakhyer gyur la// bdag gis 'dir ni mchod cing sbyin pa yi// bsod nams mthu ldan de dag thams cad kum/ mtha' yas sems can kun la su la bar bgyi// dge ba 'di yis 'gro rnams thams
5076(): cad kun// bla meng yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog/ de skad ces smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum par mdzad do// 'dzum par mdzad ma thag tu/ 'od cher po gser gyi kha dog lta bus stong
5077(): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad de/ 'od nges gang la reg pa'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ngang pa rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// de nas bram ze zla
5078(): ngags de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas slar bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bde bar gshegs pa rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ 'dzum pa'i 'od zer 'gyed par mdzad ma lags//
5079(): rgyu rkyen gang gis bsal ba'i 'od 'gyed pa// bde bar gshegs pas bdag la lung bstan gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba des
5080(): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze chen po ci tsam du 'od 'dis reg pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ thams cad kyang
5081(): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems cad rnams kyi don byas te/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
5082(): 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa yis// sems can rnams ni lung bstan te/ de nas gdan la bzhengs te gshegs/
5083(): bram ze lhag pa'i bsam pa yis// bskul ba'i 'gro rnams lung bstan pa// thos nas bdag nyid yi rang gyur// rgyal bas bdag la mngon sum du// lung ni bstan par ma gyur kyang // kun tu rtog par ma
5084(): gyur to// de lta bu'i skyes pa'i rabs 'di yang ci'i phyir bshad ce na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'i phyir smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / rmad du byung ba'i
5085(): spyod pa rnams mthar phyin par byed do zhes brjod par bya'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// bram ze zla dga'i skyes pa'i rabs te bdun cu brgyad pa'o// /
5086(): skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag gi bde ba thams cad khyad du bsad te/ gzhan gyi don spyod pa la smon lam dang sbyin pa'i stobs dpag tu med do// de/
5087(): yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i snga rol du/ bskal pa chen po legs bcas zhes bya ba la 'dzam bu'i gling dga' ba zhes bya bar bdag cag gi stor pa 'di gling
5088(): bani la dbang ba'i 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur to zhes grag go// dbang po'i sgra rnams nyer zhi sa yi bdag/ dpag med sbyangs pa'i mthu ldan gzi che la/
5089(): rang gi yon tan dkyil 'khor rab rgyas pas// rgyal phrar rnams dang bloran po dregs pa rnams// dregs pa kur spangs rta mchog tshul bzhin dul// de yi bka' lung gnyen po spyi bos rod // dge bsun
5090(): lam gyi snang ba che rgyas pas// de yi 'bangs rnams skal pa bzang por gyur// 'od kyang gling der skyes pa'i sems cad rnams phal cher 'dod pa can du gyur te/ de dag thams cad la sa'i bdag po des
5091(): rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod thams cad skye bo 'phongs pa rnams la ci dang ci dgos pa thams cad sbyin par btang nas/ slongs mo pa rnams kyis kyang / gser dang dbyig dang an+da rnyil dang mthon ka chen po dang
5092(): skar mdog dang / chu gdang gi bar gyi rin po che sna tshogs pa dag yongs su thob cing 'dzad pa med par gyur to// de'i tshe blong po rnams la dris pa/ rin chen 'di rnams gang las byung / blon po rnams kyis
5093(): gsol pa/ klu dbang rnams kyis rin cher gter bstan te// lha'i zhal sngar slongs mo mchis pa bzhin// de tsam gyis ni rin chen gter byung zhing // de las gzhan du sbas pa bzhin du gyur// de skad ces
5094(): smras pa dang / rgyal po de sems cad la brtse ba'i sems kyis smon lam 'debs par rtsom pa/ bdag snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su bskyab
5095(): pa'i phyir bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag gi re ba 'di yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bdag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan
5096(): pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod pa thams cad du klu'i rgyal po gter ston par skyes par gyur nas rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang pa'i gter bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma
5097(): ngag stor cing gtong bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa'i zhing re rer yang skye ba lan bdun bdun du yongs su bzung nas sems can thams cad kyi yid la 'dod pa'i sbyin pa dag yongs su gtong
5098(): bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa de'i tshe/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis me tog gi char rab tu phab cing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ e ma'o thams cad sbyin pa legs so legs/
5099(): mi dbang khyod ni thams cad sbyin pa ste// ci ltar khyod kyis smon lam btab pa bzhin// khyod kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs 'gyur ro// de ltar lha rnams kyis yongs su bsgrags pa skye bo phal po che rnams
5100(): kyis thos ras de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag cag gi rgyal po 'di la gang btang bar dka' ba'i sbyir pa dag spang bar bya ste/ gal te yongs su gtong bar byed na ni de'i tshe 'di'i ming
5101(): thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur gyi/ ci ste yongs su gtong bar mi byed na ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems cad 'dod chen po dag gis de'i bu spang bar 'dod nas mi'i bdag po seng ge'i khri
5102(): la 'dug pa'i drung du song ste/ smras pa/ khyod ni thams cad sbyin pa zhes// lha rnams kyis ni bsgrags par gyur// de bas sras kyi thu bo rnams// bdag cag gi ni g.yog tu stsol// de skad ces smras pa/
5103(): thos nas/ sa'i bdag po de'i bu la sdug pa'i sems yongs su spangs te/ slongs mo pa rnams la dga' ba'i yid kyis lta na sdug pa'i bu rnams kyang tsham chom med par yongs su byin ro// de nas
5104(): yang gzhan dag gis/ rgyal po de'i btsun mo bslang ba'i phyir smras pa/ khyod ni thams cad chags med gtong ba zhes// grags pas btsun mo dam pa mdzes ma rnams// rgyan bcas bdag cag rnams
5105(): la yongs su stsol// lha yis bstan pa'i ming ni dor mthur mdzod// de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ bdag gi btsur mo bud med rir po che mdzes shing lta na sdug pa/ rin po che'i rgyur sna tshogs kyis
5106(): mngon par brgyan pa rnams chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis byin to// gang ra bu dang mdzes pa'i chung ma rnams// gtong bar byed pa 'jig rten rmad byung ste// dam pa de la gus pa mi byed par// 'dod chen
5107(): ba dag slar la slong byed pa// rgya mtsho 'dzings rnams chu yis mi ngoms bzhin// chog shes med par 'dod pa'i rba rlabs 'phyo// de nas bram ze skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya bas// 'di la bdag gis rgyal
5108(): srid bslang bar bya'o snyam ste/ rgyal po'i mdur du 'dug nas shis pa brjod de smras pa/ thams cad sbyin pas yi bdag/ khyod ri thams cad stsol bar mdzad// bdag ri slong la dga' bar gyur/
5109(): de bas rgyal srid bdag la stso la// de skad ces smras pa thos nas rgyal po mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ bdag nyid kyis bram ze de khrus byas te thong bcings nas rgyal por dbang bskur zhing
5110(): rgyal srid la rab tu bzhag ste 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad byin nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gi khyod 'dir 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal srid la// rab tu bzhag pa'i
5111(): bsod nams 'di yis dus ring bar// khyod kyi rgyal srid rab tu brtan par gnas gyur cig/ bsod nams 'di yis bdag kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyur// de yi tshe na khyod kyang bla na med pa
5112(): yi byang chub nyid du rgyal tshab lung yang ston gyur cig/ de skad ces smras nas bram ze de la rgyal srid yongs su byin ro// de'i 'og tu bram ze 'dod pa zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa
5113(): yongs su bslangs pa dang / de mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas/ de la sems ni rab dang bas// ut+pal 'dab ma lta bu yi// ral gri rnor pos rkang pa dag/ dum bur bcad de de la byin// de nas snying
5114(): rje'i shugs kyis smon lam btab// bdag gi sha ya~M rkang pa 'di byin nas// bla na med pa'i tshul khrims rkang pa dag/ thob cing go 'phang mchog tu 'gro gyur cig/ de skad ces smon lam btab nas/ bdag
5115(): nyid kyi tshor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad khyang du bsad de rkang pa byin no// de'i 'og tu bram ze ltan srung zhes bya ba des dgos pa zhig gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de'i mig spyang par 'dod nas de'i drung du
5116(): song ste smras pa/ saM bdag thams cad sbyin pa zhes// sa yi steng du spyir bdag grags// sa bzhin khyod ni sbyin pa'i gzhi// sa yang ltos med sbyin mdzad ces// thos pas khyod kyi drung bachis so// de bas
5117(): mig gnyis bdag la stsol// de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ bdag gi yid rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis ut+pal mthing ga lta bu'i mig gnyis kyang legs par phyung ste de la byin nas smon lam
5118(): btab pa/ bdag gi sha yi mig ni 'dir byin pas// mi las 'das pa'i mig ni rnam dag pa// dri ma med pa'i spyan lnga thob gyur cig/ 'gro rnams shes rab spyan gyis sgrol bar shog/ yang ring po ma ldon
5119(): par bram ze sgra bzangs zhes bya ba zhig gi byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba gnyis bslangs pa/ khyod ni 'phangs pa'i dngos po dang // bdag gi lus kyang spyir zhes grag/ de bas dgos pa zhig gi phyir// mi
5120(): dbang snyan gnyis bdag la stsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de la dga' ba'i yid kyis bai DUr+ya'i kha dog ltar 'bar ba'i mtshon rdor pos rang nyid kyi rna ba gnyis bcad de
5121(): byin nas smras pa/ mi gtsang du mas yongs su gang gyur pa'i// lus ni gzhan dor gyur pa shin tu legs// de bas sha yi rno ba 'dir byin nas// bla na med pa'i snyan ni thob par shog/ de skad ces smras
5122(): nas byin to// de ltar yongs su gtong ba chen po'i sgra phyogs kun tu grags pa las 'tsho ba pa yang dga' tshe zhes bya bas// rig sngags sgrub pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste/
5123(): skyes bu'i po'i dbang po bslangs te/ gang na sbyin par dka' ba ni// lus ri sbyin par bgyid ba lags// khyod ni thams cad sbyin no zhes// thos pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so// de la byang chub sems
5124(): dpa' ltos pa med par sbyin pa de byin nas smras pa/ gang dag skyes bu chen po'i dbang po mchog/ dri ma med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir// 'dir ni mi gtsang lus la byung ba 'di// khyi/
5125(): pas khyod kyi dor rnams 'grub gyur cig/ de nas kun tu rgyu me 'dzag ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa spang bar 'dod pas de'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni lus kyi mchod sbyin
5126(): gyis ngas 'dir kun tu grags par bzhed// de bas bdag kyang dgos pa'i phyir// yan lag spang ba'i phyir mchis so// de skad ces smras pa byang chub sems dpas thos nas/ e ra'o lus gcig gis sbyin
5127(): pa dpag tu med pa 'grub pa 'di ni rmang du byung ba'o// zhes khong du chud nas des rang nyid kyi lag pa g.yon pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar mchog tu dkar zhing 'jam pa sor gdub kyi rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa/ mtshon non
5128(): pos bcad de/ 'jig rten na ni mkhas pa dag/ slong la su zhig sbyin mi byed// de ni rmongs pa chen po ste// 'dir ni 'dod pa bzhin du bya// gang zhig nyes pa'i sgo mang brgya drug gi/ gnas gyur lus la
5129(): legs pa'i rin chen nor// bla na med pa dad pa'i phyag gyur pa// thob par bya phyir yan lag 'dir sbyin no// de skad ces smras nas/ rang gi lag pa g.yon pa bcad nas byin cing / de'i 'og tu lag pa/
5130(): g.yas pa'ang ci ltar dgos pa bzhin du khyer cig ces byin par gyur to// 'dir gzhan dag gis smras pa/ sa bdag lus kyi pad+ma'i rgya mtsho las// byung ba'i yan lag lo 'dab mdzes pa dang //
5131(): dbang po'i ge sar bcad cing gtubs gyur pa// snying rje'i chu rgyun rlabs kyis 'thor ba bzhin// tsan dan dmar po lta bu'i khrag gi rgyur// rlabs kyi 'phreng ba 'phro ba bzhin du dbab// mchod/
5132(): gyis reg pa'i tshor ba 'bar ba yang // de yi shes rab stobs kyis brnags pa yis// byams pa'i chu rgyun snying stobs kyis phab pas// tshor ba'i sdug bsngal zhum zhing 'bros pa 'dra//
5133(): snying rje'i gzhu dang sbyin pa'i stobs kyi mda'// brtson 'grus 'khrul 'khor gyis ni yongs bskul nas// dgra sde bdud kyi snying la phog gyur te// mya ngan nyam thag shugs kyang nar ces
5134(): 'byin// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rmad du byung ba'i spyod pas gtong ba dang yongs su gtong ba dang gtong ba chen pos rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang lus la chags pa med par yong
5135(): su btang zhing rin po che chen po dang mtshungs pa lus dang srog gi lhag ma tsam lus par gyur pa de la/ de'i nye 'khor du gnas par gyur pa'i khams kyi rgyal phran dang blon po rnams dang mi de dag
5136(): snying rje med cing 'phags pa ma yin la byas pa mi gzo bar gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal po 'di ni bro dman zhing shes pa chung ste/ yan lag thams cad gtubs shing dbang po nyams
5137(): pas rgyal srid las yongs su nyams pa yin na/ da sha snag 'dis ci zhig byed zer te/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol gyi dur khrod kyi gnas su bor te dong ngo // 'dir smras pa/ gnyen la phan phyir g.yul ngor zhug
5138(): pa yi rma yang me tog 'breng ba bzhin du sems// kun gyis dga' bas srid zhu cher byed na// rgyal sras sems can kun la phan don du// sbyir mdzad lus la gus pa mi
5139(): bskyed par// mi gtsang bzhin du dur khrod 'dor byed pa// kyi hud 'di na gtam ngan gzhir gyur cing // yon tan mig ni ring du gyur pa bzhin// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi khrag gi dri tshor ba'i
5140(): sbrang bu dang sha sbrang mchu rings dang // khyi dang wa dang / khru dang bya rgod la sogs pa du ma lhags te sha za zhing khrag 'thung bar rtsom pa byed pa na/ 'di snyam du gyur te/ kye ma dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes
5141(): pa'i sems can sdug bsngal ba sha dang khrag tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed pa 'di rnams kyi don du bdag gis smon lam yongs su btab par bya'o snyam nas sems rab tu dang bas 'di skad ces smras so//
5142(): bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag yongs su btang ba na skad cig tsam yang sems 'gyod par ma gyur cing bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs pa lta na bdag gi lus/
5143(): 'di sha'i rir kun tu gnas par gyur cing / sems can gang dag sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i rigs de dag thams cad bdag gi lus la sha za bar gyur cig/ ji ltar zos pa bzhin phyi phyir skye zhing
5144(): bdag gi lus kyi sha 'dzad pa med par gyur te/ gang gis zos pa'i sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa byang chub tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab po// de nas de yi smon lam mthu yos der// lus
5145(): kyang sha yi ri ltar gnas gyur cing // gang+gA'i rgyun bzhir khrag kyang zad pa gyur// sha ba'i tshogs rnams kun tu tshim byas pas// lo sbyong bar du gtong ba chen po byas// brtar pa'i lha rnams/
5146(): ngo mtshar skyes gyur te// rnam pa du ma mchod cing yi rang byed// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis lo stong gi bar du lus kyi mchod sbyin byas te skye ba gzhan
5147(): du gzung bar gyur to// zhes grag go// rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa 'dis sems can dpag tu med pa rnams theg pa gsum la yang dag par bkod do// de lta bu'i skyes pa'i rabs 'di yang ci'i
5148(): phyir bshad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i smor lam dang sbyir ba'i stobs ni dpag tu med pa'o zhes sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa
5149(): la'ang brjod par bya'o// rgyal po na mkha'i skyes pa'i rabs te bdud cu dgu pa'o// // skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi gzhan la phan par byed pa dang sbyin pa dang smon lam gyi
5150(): stobs ni dpag tu med do// de yang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Ti zhes bya ba 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/
5151(): zheng du dpag tshad bdur pa gru bzhi pa rnam par mdzes pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dar dang rta babs bsgreng ba zhig byung bar gyur to// rgyal po'i pho brang der rgyal po dpal gyi sde zhes bya ba stobs kyi
5152(): 'khor lo bsgyur ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin gyis skye ba dran pa chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos
5153(): kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag por byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// rgyal po de'i btsun mo ni rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa yid bzhin du spyod pa
5154(): byung ngo // rgyal po de'i blon po ni stong phrag bcu gnyis yod de de rnams kyi mchog ni blo gros cher po zhes bya'o// sa bdag sa tshon rgya mtsho'i gos gyor pa// skyong byed bsod nams mthu yi dpal gyis
5155(): mdzes// de ni sems can kun la mnyam par blta// snying rje'i dbang gis dngos po thams cad gtong // chags med yongs su sbyangs shing zhi ba yi// bdag gi yan lag mchog kyang sbyin par stsol//
5156(): de bas 'dzam gling gnas pa'i skye bo la// dpya dang sho gam tsam yang sdud mi byed// dge bcu'i bka' khrims mtho ris them skyes mchog/ rnam dag skye bo'i brag chas bsgrags pa rnams// sa
5157(): 'dir kur tu gsal bar byas par gyur// de yis rang gi pho brang a riSh+Ta'i// sgo bzhir sbyin pa'i bkang sa rgya chen dag/ sna tshogs longs spyod kun gyis gang byas te// rdzogs ldan sprin las byung /
5158(): pa'i char rgyun bzhin// bza' btung gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang // rta dang shing rta glang po bgyid pa dang // na chung gzhon nu pad+ma rgyas pa'i gdong // ut+pal mig car rin chen brgyan pa dag/ skye bo
5159(): rnams kyi yid bzhir thob par gyur// de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi sdes 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du skye bo rnams chos kyi bdag nyid la bkod pas/ mi'i srid pa nas tshe 'phos pa de thams cad lha'i
5160(): 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to// yang de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis/ lha'i grong khyer lta na sdug ces bya ba lha'i tshogs kyis kun tu gang zhing der go skabs med par gyur pa dang / lta na sdug
5161(): gi phyi rol yongs 'du dang shing rta sna tshogs can dang dga' ba'i tshal la sogs pa'i skyed mos tshal rnams su gnas par gyur to// de nas sngon skyes pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yang dag/
5162(): pa'i 'byor pa de mthong ste rab tu dga' nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang du ri'i rgyal po ri rab de nyid lha'i bu dag gis gang ste lha'i tshogs rnams ni 'phel bar gyur/
5163(): lha ma yin gyi tshogs ni 'grib par gyur pa'i ngo mtshar 'di la gzigs/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i bu rnams las thos nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji
5164(): tsam na ri'i rgyal po ri rab lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun ras gang bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems cad ji snyed cig 'dir skyes par gyur snyam ras
5165(): 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i mthu yin par mthong ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sems rab tu dga' bas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
5166(): rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed rnams nyon cig/ 'dzam gling dbang phyug rgyal po ni// dpal gyi sde zhes rnam grags pa// rtag tu chos la gzhol ba dang // rgyal po
5167(): chen po chos la gnas// thog ma par dang mthar dge zhing // sems can kun la phan par dga'// gtso bo mi rnams dge ba la// rtag par yang dag sbyor bar byed// rtag tu snying rje'i bdag nyid tsam/
5168(): phyi rol dngos po res gtong zhing // de ni sha yang spong pa la// rjes su brtse ba nyid kyis ster// nang ngam yang na phyi rol la// de ni yongs su 'dzin med par// rjes brtse nyid kyis gtong byed cing // byang chub
5169(): mthar 'byung ba la brtson// de ri rnam dag gser bzhin du// 'gro ba thams cad rab bsgrubs pas// rgyal po de yi mthu yis ni// thams cad mtho ris la gzhol gyur// rgyal po blo gros che de yis//
5170(): mthu yis su yang dmyal ba dang // yi dgas dang ni dud 'gro yi// skye gnas rnams su skyo mi 'gyur// de yi gzi brjid mthu yis ni// thams cad snang bar 'gro ba dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims dga'
5171(): 'gyur bas// dga' ba'i tshal na dga' bas rtse// dpal gyi sde la rjes brten pa// gus dang bcas par gyur pa 'di// lha yi 'jig rten nyams dga' bar// de yang dga' bar rnam par snang // de ras
5172(): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha de rnams kyis tshig de thos nas yid dga' ba dang sems rangs par gyur te dga' ba'i sems su gyur cing 'di skad ces kyang smras so// gang rgyal po 'di yan lag dang nying lag
5173(): kyang sbyin par gtong 'dod par stsol ba ni ngo mtshur che'o// 'on kyang 'di ltar yan lag dang nying lag ster ba 'di ni dka' ba ste/ bdag dang mnyam pa bangs pa gzhan med pas/ de ji ltar na bdag
5174(): nyid chen po 'di rang gi lus sdug bsngal ba la mi sems par yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par gtong bar 'gyur te 'di ni rjes su dpag nus pa ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ snying rje'i bdag nyid
5175(): blo ldan rnams// dpag med mthu dang ldan pa yin// de bas 'di ni pi gtong ba// cung zad tsam yang yod pa yi ni// zhes bstan to// de ras dus gzhan zhig gi tshe rgyal po'i btsur mo dam pa'i rmi lam na/
5176(): dpal gyi stan la bdag nyid phab nas slar yang bteg par mthong ba dang / rang gi mig phyung nas slar yang skyes par mthong ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa 'di bcad de sa la lhung ba yang skyes par
5177(): mthong ba dang / mi ma yin pa dngul gyi rdo bcag pa zhig gis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i dpung pa g.yon pa mod la phyung ste phrogs nas slar yang skyes pa rmis so// gnyid sad pa dang 'jigs shing bsdangs la
5178(): spu zing zhes byed de nga'am lha la sdug bsngal 'ga' zhig 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang zhes bsams nas/ des rgyal po dpal gyi sde la smras so// de rmi ltas la byung ba yin pas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis
5179(): rmi lam 'di lta bu mthong ba lags ra ring por mi thogs par chung ma 'di nyid slong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas smras pa/ ma 'jigs shig sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam la sems pas ci zhig bya/ dpal
5180(): gyi sde la bdag nyid gnas par khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/ mig ma nyams par de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa de bzhin du yod pa dang / nga'i'ang dpung
5181(): pa g.yon pa gnas bzhin pa nyid zhes dbugs phyung ba dang cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ ci tsam na mtshan mo gnyis pa la blon po'i mchog blo gros chen po zhes bya bas rmi lam du rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rin
5182(): po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang bzangs mod la zhig pa dang / rin po che de rnams sha za mthong na 'jigs su rung ba rnams kyis phan tshun khyer ba dang slar yang khang bzangs so sor sbyar ba rmis so// sang
5183(): pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang yi mug ste spu zing zhes byed pa dang / bsams pa/ sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/ lha dpal gyi sde'i sku lus slong pa 'ong bar mi 'gyur grang / lha'ang thams
5184(): cad stsol pa/ thams cad yongs su gtong ga chags pa med par gtong ba ste 'di lta ste/ dman pa dang / long pa dang / bkren pa dang sdug 'bongs rnams la 'di yongs su mi gtong ba ci'ang med do// rgyal po
5185(): dpal gyi sde la ni zhu bar mi bya ste shin tu spro ba skye bar mi 'gyur grang / de nas des gsangs te/ mtshan mkhan bos nas dam bsgos te smras pa/ shes ldan ngas 'di lta bu'i rmi lam rmis pa'i 'bras bu ci lta
5186(): bur gyur pa khyod kyis lung ston cig/ mtshan mkhan gyis smras pa/ rmi lam 'di lta bu las ni ring po mi thogs par lha'i sku lus slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam bstan pa de lta bu 'di thos pa dang blon
5187(): po blo gros chen po sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs shing mig mchi mas gang ba dang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud pas gnas nas rgyal po dpal gyi sde byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag
5188(): nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa la mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas pa ni ha cang myur ches so// de nas rub gsum pa la blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis/
5189(): rmi lam lnga rmis te/ khra yis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i gdugs dang cod pan phrogs te slar yang byin pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi mgo bcad nas slar yang byung ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad
5190(): kyi mig phyung nas slar yang skyes pa dang / 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad kyi rkang pa dang lag pa rnams bcad nas slar yang skyes pa dang / rgyal po dpal gyi sde seng+ge'i khri las babs nas slar yang 'dzeg par
5191(): brtson par rmis pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag la yi mug nas rgyal po dpal gyi sde sa chen po skyong bar mdzad pa byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje ba sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa mi rtag
5192(): pa'i stobs nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur grangabadag cag rnams lha dang lhan cig gnas pa las tha dad par gyur cing bye bar mi 'gyur grang / 'dzam bu gling pa'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen med par mi
5193(): 'gyur grang snyam nas/ de rnams kyis mtshan mkhan rnams bos nas spras pa dang de rnams kyis kyang 'di bzhin du 'gyur zhes lung bstan to// 'di lta bu'i rmi lam bstan pa thos pa dang grong khyer a riH/
5194(): na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams nyams thag pa'i nga ros ngu bar brtsams so// thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ 'dzam bu gling ba'i mi thams cad mya ngan
5195(): drag po'i sdug bsngal gyis bcom nas shin tu smre sngags 'dor par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa de rgyal po dpal gyi sdes thos nas bsams pa/ nga'i lus slong pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam
5196(): nas sems rab tu dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur to// de la rgyal pos dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir bstan pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo rnams// dngos kun bden par grub min pa// sgyu ma lta bu'i
5197(): rmi lam la// su zhig bden par rtog par byed// de bas mya ngan ma byed par// bde bar bag yod gnas par byos// rang gi dpal la rjes spyad cing // yid ni dga' bas gnas par gyis// zhes/
5198(): dril bsgrags pa de thos nas 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi thams cad dbugs phyin par gyur to// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Ti'i byang phyogs na ri bo zhig yod de/ de na drang srong lnga brgya
5199(): tsam gnas so// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe de rnams kyis 'don du 'jug pa'i mkhan po drang srong zhig don gyi bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs so// de'i tshe rgyal po dpal
5200(): gyi sde btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal du song ngo // bram zes btsun mo dam pa de mthong bas/ 'di ltar de'i skye ba snga ma'i chung mar gyur pa'ang yin pas sngon gyi chags pa dang
5201(): 'brel pa'i dbang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa skyes par gyur te/ smras pa/ sngon gyi bag chags sred pa'i rjes 'brang dang / bde ba'i rgyu las zher pa rjes 'brang phyir// gzugs dang
5202(): lang co'i yon tan rjes 'brang ba'i// btsun mo'i dpal la bram ze yid 'brangs te// rtse gcig 'dod pas 'jig rten g.yos pa bzhir// mngor sum bzhin du sems shing de nas dong // de yid
5203(): la de sems shing lam de nas song ste rgyal po'i pho brang du bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsti gnas su song ngo // de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe drang srong des bram ze'i khye'u zhig rig byed 'dor/
5204(): pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / des mkhan po'i rkang pa la gtugs ras smras pa/ mkhan po la nor ci lta bu 'bul bar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ drang srong gis smras pa/ de bas na bu rgyal po dpal
5205(): gyi sde'i btsun mo'i mchog rgyal ba'i 'od slongs la nga'i bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mkhan po la mkhan po'i nor dang bla ma la mchod pa'i phyir byin cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bram ze'i khye'u de gnang du
5206(): bsnun pa'i ri dgas bzhin du sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs te/ mchog tu yi mug pa dang bsams pa/ gnas 'di ni 'byung bar dka' ba dang / rnyed par dka' na ji ltar yang bram ze nyon mongs pa
5207(): bdag lta bus rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od byin cig ces ji ltar smra bar nus/ 'di ltar bslang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i dngos po 'di la kur tu sbyor ba gang yin pa des na mkhan po nges par bdag
5208(): la dmod pa byed par 'dod pa yin no// de nas drang srong des de'i bzhin rnam par gyur pas nang gi bsam pa rtogs nas smras pa/ ma 'jigs shig/ sa bdag 'di ni bdag nyid/
5209(): che bas na// thams cad yongs su gtong ba byed pa yin// chags shing zhen pas de rgyud dkris pa med// de bas ci nas don ni 'grub par 'gyur// de bas na bag tsha ba med par song zhig/ bram ze'i
5210(): khye'u de mod pa de la 'jigs nas/ de ltar bgyi'o zhes rkang pa la gtugs te song ngo // de nas rgyal po'i pho zang a riSh+Tar phyin nas/ shing shun ni gyon dbyug pa dang ril ba ni thogs lus la rdul
5211(): gyis gos pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ tshe spel bar byas te bsams pa/ ji ltar slang ngam 'or te mi slang / ster bar 'gyur ram mi ster bar 'gyur nga'i yid la byed pa 'bras bu dang bcas par
5212(): 'gyur ram 'bras bu med par 'gyur ram snyam nas bdag nyid smod bzhin du dman pa'i bzhin gyis cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas rgyal po dpal gyi sdes bsams pa/ 'di ni ngal slong du 'ongs so snyam
5213(): nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze khyod kyi dgos pa gang yin pa de smros shig dang / de ring khyod yid la byed pa'i re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / bram
5214(): ze'i khye'u de mi 'jigs pa skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ sa bdag chen po dpal ldan rgyal gyur cig/ khyod ni 'jig rten chags med lkug par gtong // 'jig rten 'di dag 'dod pas
5215(): zil mnar gyur// de bas lha mchog khyod la 'phags ma spong // bdag gis thos pa'i drir lan bsab pa'i phyir// btsun mo stsal bas 'jig rter grags par mdzod// lha byang phyogs kyi ri bo na bdag gi
5216(): mkhan po drang srong 'don du 'jug pa 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas nas gnas te de la bdag gis rig byed 'don pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ rgyal po chen po thugs brtse bas btsur mo rgyal ba'i 'od bdag la
5217(): stsol cig/ mkhan po la mkhan po'i nor dang / bla ma la mchod pa'i phyir te/ bdag gi mkhan po la dbul bar bgyi'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po dpal gyi sde brtse ba'i dbang gis yid g.yos
5218(): par gyur te btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od 'di nga dang bral na ji ltar srog 'dzin par nus/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyang rgya mtsho zab mo'i sgra ma g.yo ba dang gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du sdug bsngal drag pos
5219(): gdungs te nga 'di ji zhes skyo bar rab tu gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' skad cig cang mi smra bar gnas te bsams pa/ bu dang chung ma la sogs pa sbyin pa med pas ni bla na med pa yang dag
5220(): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro// de'i phyir bram ze 'di la dga' bas chung ma 'di sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas gnyen sdug pa dang bral bas zhub pa'i sems yang dag par bsal
5221(): te 'phral du seng ge'i khri las babs nas byang chub tu smon pa'i sems kyis btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od lha'i bu mo bzhin du rnam par mdzes pa khyo dang bral ba'i gdung bas shin tu dbugs ring por byung
5222(): ste mchi mas gang ba'i mig dang / mur par g.yang sa chen po nas lhung ba bzhir du mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdong phab pa lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ lag pa g.yas
5223(): pas gser gyi bum pa thogs nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad smras so// bram ze chen po chur shog cig/ gzugs bzang sdug pa 'di long zhig/ sbyin pa 'di yis myur du ni// byang chub dam pa
5224(): thob par shog/ ces smras nas/ byang chub sems dpas bram ze'i lag par chu rgyur blugs so// de tshe de yi sbyin pa'i mthus// sa 'di rnam drug g.yos gyur te/ e ma'o rmad du byung ba zhes// bram ze'i
5225(): khye'u yi rang gyur// 'di 'dra'i mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba dag/ bde la ma chags sbyin par byed pa ni// sa 'di mgon byas mya ngan bya mi dgos// de bas dpal ldan spyod pa rmad du byung // de nas bram zes bde
5226(): legs su gyur cig ces smras nas/ btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od khyer te rings pa rings par bsti gnas su song nas mkhan po la byin pa dang btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od nya chu las bton pa bzhin du sdug pa dang
5227(): bral ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs shing nyams thag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid la mngon par sems shing 'gro ba thams cad mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa bzhin du shes shing / kyi hung rgyal
5228(): po chen po kyi hu nga rgyal po chen po zhes mchog tu gdung pa'i sems dang zas bcad pa la zhugs so// sa g.yos pa des brgya byin gyi gnas g.yos par gyur to// chos nyid kyi lha rnams kyi shes
5229(): pa 'og tu mthong ba 'jug gi/ gong du ni ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ shin tu drag bros g.yos pa// mtshan ma 'di ni su yi mthu// gang gi mthu ni ji 'dra ba// shin tu/
5230(): gsal ba 'di shes bya// 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu mchog tu dka' ba'i las byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te
5231(): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag rnams rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i las la ltos/ gang zhig 'di ltar sdug pa dang / 'di ltar yid du 'ong
5232(): ba rtswa bzhin du btang ngo zhes smras nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rmad du byung ba sems can rnams la bsgrag pa'i phyir/ de'i phyi nyin nam langs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin/
5233(): lha'i bu bzhi dang thabs cig tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas ras babs te/ a riSh+Ta dang ha cang yang pi ring ba'i nags tshang tshing nas lus kyi phyed man chad med pa'i bram ze'i gzugs su sprul te/
5234(): lha'i bu de dag kyang bram ze'i cha byad 'dzin pas/ bram ze rgan po lus kyi phyed stag gis bcad cing zos shing khrag 'dzag pa de khri la bzhag nas bteg cing 'gro ste de'i khrag gi dri de las kyang steng nas khwa
5235(): dang chu skyar dang / bya rgod rnams rjes su 'brang ngo // 'og nas kyang khyi dang wa rnams rjes su 'brang bzhin du rings pa rings par grong khyer gyi sgor song ngo // de yang 'di ltar snying rje'i gnas su gyur pa
5236(): skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis mthong nas snying rjes gdungs pa'i yid kyis cig la cig sba ba/ grogs po dag bram ze 'di rked pa chad cing 'di'i dbang po'ang ma 'khrugs
5237(): pa ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ 'di mi ma yin sha za mi'i cha byad kyis bdag cag rnams bza' ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis mi da pa chad pa ni che ba med do// de skad ces thos pa dang /
5238(): skyes bu snga pa rnams ni 'jigs pas 'bros par brtsams so// skyes bu dpa' bo gzharan zhig 'di snyam du 'di ni sha ba zhig ste de lta na'ang tshor bas nyen bzhin du 'di ltar dbang po rnams bde bar snang /
5239(): na de ci lta bu yin/ bdag gis 'di la dri bar byas na 'dis tshig then par dka' mod kyis gal te tshig thon na ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro snyam nas smras pa/ bram ze khyod ci mi yin ram 'on te sha za yin/ de nas
5240(): brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs su 'dug pa des sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag pos nyen par ston cing smras pa/ skyes bu khyod ni ma 'jigs shig/ bram ze nga yin srin po min// sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis// gan
5241(): skabs 'di 'dra thob par gyur// 'di nyid du ni kun bshad na// dus ni kun tu 'da' bar 'gyur// 'chi bdag myur du 'ongs nas ni// srog ni 'phrog par 'gyur du 'ong // chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar
5242(): ni 'di dag kun kyang bshad par bya// sngon gyi las kyi mtshan nyid ni// da rung nga la 'bras bcas 'gyur// yon tan kun gyi rnam mdzes las// zla ba lta bur zhi ba dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims la dga'
5243(): bzang gtso bo gang du mthong bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho bzhin du zab gyur cing // ri rab lta bur mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten kun gyi gtsor gyur pa// chos kyi rgyal po gang na bzhugs// 'jigs shing skrag pa rnam
5244(): kyi skyabs// slong pa rnams kyi bgrod bya'i mchog/ snyan smra sbyin dang tshul khrims ldan// bdag nyid che de gang na bzhugs// bdag mdun 'chi bdag nyer 'ongs kyi// shi ba'i pa rnams myur du smros// thug
5245(): rje can de ma gtogs par// nga la lus phyed su zhig ster// de ltar rgyal po'i rna lam nas snying rje ba dang / dman pa dang zhum pa'i tshig smra zhing / rims kyis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i pho zang sgor song ba dang /
5246(): srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyang ngo mtshar skyes nas rjes bzhin 'brangs so// de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu ltas kyi khyad par 'di lta bu'ang byung bar gyur te/ de mthong nas der gnas pa'i ri'i drang
5247(): srong gis tshigs su bcad pa/ mi 'am ci yi tshogs dang nags kyi lha rnams ngu// nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang ri smra bar byed// zla ba 'od med nyi mas mun pa sel mi byed// de ring rol mo
5248(): brdungs na sgra mi grag par gyur// shing tshogs me tog 'bras bur ldan pa 'di dag kyang // rlung gis bskyod pa gzhan du sa la lhung gyur la// ji ltar 'jigs shing rtsub pa'i sgra kun grag pas na/
5249(): grong khyer dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzang 'byung bar gsal// a riSh+Ta nas skye bo 'di kun sdug bsngal zhing // mya ngan zug rngus bcom nas sgra rnams so sor sgrogs// zla ba'i bzhin ldan bud med
5250(): 'di rnams smre sngag 'byin// nam mkhar gnas pa'i sprin 'di'ang chu med par sgra sgrogs// sa la gnas pa'i chu rnams kyang ni skam par gyur// rma bya rnams ni nags mes
5251(): bcom zhing sgra sgrogs te// de bas 'dir ni rgyal po'i pho brang nyes pa 'byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la gnas pas skye bo'i tshigs chen po'i tshe de'i sgra thos pa dang
5252(): rings pa rings par rin po che las byas pa'i khang bzangs las babs nas seng ge'i khri chen po la 'dug ste/ shin tu brtabs pas shes ldan dag/ 'di ci yin 'di ci yin zhes dris so// skabs der
5253(): brgya byin nang pa'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de bram ze'i khye'u bzhi po des bteg cing rgyal po'i mdun du bzhag pa dang / de khri la bskyon pa lus kyi phyed bcad pa de las khrag kur ras 'dzag cing rab tu 'dzag pa
5254(): dang nges lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste snying rje rje skad du byang chub sems dpa' la rgyal ba dang tshe spel bar byas nas pa rims khengs pa'i mig dang rang gi lus kyi byed nye bar smon cing byang chub sems dpa'
5255(): la smras pa/ 'jig rten na khyod snying rje can// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal// nyid kyi sku yi phyed stsal bas// gtso bo bdag ni bskyab tu gsol// de nas de skad ces thos pa dang / blon
5256(): po chen po'i mchog blo gros cher pos smras pa/ lha 'di mi ma lags kyi sha za 'am sha zas byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa zhig ste mi ni rked pa bcad pa 'tsho zhing sngon gyi ltar gnas pa bzhin du tshig tu smra ba ni/
5257(): mi srid do// de skad ces smras pa dang / zam zes smras pa/ khyed cag rnams ma 'jigs shig/ da ni sha za ma yin gyis/ gzhan du nang ni bram ze yin gyis dbul bas bdag gi bu dang chung ma bzhag ste
5258(): nor gyi bsam pas rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i thang du chas nas rims kyis 'ongs pa na/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir nyi ma nub pa nas phyin pa dang grong khyer gyi sgo rnams bcad par gyur to// de nas grong khyer dang
5259(): cang mi ring ba na bsod nams khang pa yod par bdag nye bar song ste nub mo gnas pa na/ lam gyis dub pas gnyid 'thug pos non pa dang sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas nub mo gcan gzar stag 'ongs nas//
5260(): bdag gi lus kyi phyed sog le lta bu'i mche ba shin tu rnon pos bcad nas khyer te song ngo // der bdag tshor ba drag pos kun tu bcom nas gnyid sad pa dang ji tsam na bdag gi lus kyi ro smang byed po stag
5261(): gis sog les dras pa ltar bcad pas bdag tshor ba drag pos kun tu bcom kyang sngor byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis kun tu bzung bas shi bar rim gyur gyis/ gcig tu sdug bsngal ba drag po
5262(): rtsub pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong zhing nyams thag pa'i nga ros smre sngags 'don par gyur te/ bdag de ltar nyams thag pa'i smre sngags thos pa dang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha
5263(): gzhan zhig gis bdag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/ ma 'jigs ma 'jigs bram ze mchog/ khyod kyi tshe ni ring bar mthong // grong khyer a riSh+Ta ra myur song // khyod ni legs gsal dag tu
5264(): 'gyur// de na kur ster rgyal po ni// dpal gyi sde zhes rnam grags pa// de yi lus kyi phyed bslangs na// de ni nges par khyod la ster// zhes smras nas lha mo de nyid mi snang
5265(): pabar gyur to// de nas bdag gis lha mo'i tshig thos pa dang // 'tshe ba re ba kun tu skyes te tshor ba'ang chung bar gyur to// de nas bdag gi lus kyi phyed ro spang med pa langs kyang ma nus na 'gro bar
5266(): lta ga la nus snyam nas yang yi mug par gyur pa dang / stes dbang gis nyi ma shar ba'i tshe gnyen 'di bzhi 'ongs par gyur to// 'di dag kyang bdag nyam nga bar zhugs pa mthong ba dang 'di 'chi ba
5267(): nyid do snyam nas ngu bar gyur to// de nas bdag gis de rnams la dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir lha mo'i tshig rgyas par smras so// de nas bdag 'di rnams kyis khri la bskyon cing 'dir khyer te 'ongs
5268(): so zhes smras nas gdong mchi ma'i rlabs kyis gang ba lta bur bdag nyid nye bar ston cing smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dge mchog chos la gnas// thams cad mkhyen nyid mnyam pa med
5269(): bzhed na// bdag la sku phyed 'di stsol de ring ni// shin tu rnyed dka'i srog ni thob par mdzod// rgyal po chen po'i sku yi phyed// shin tu btang dka' bdag stsol la// chos dang de bzhin gras/
5270(): pa yis// 'gro ba kun la khyab par mdzod// de nas tshig 'di thos pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sngon goms pa'i dge ba'i bag chags blo la bsgos pas snying rjes sems 'dar zhing slong
5271(): pab de dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/ zam ze chen po ma 'jigs shig dang ring po mi thogs par lus 'di rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur gyis/ g.yo med pa'i
5272(): sems kyis khyod la lus kyi byed sbyin par bya'o// zhes smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba dang tshigs su bcad pa de smras pa/ kye ma rang gi lus slong ba/ yun mi ring bar blta bar
5273(): bya nga yi yan lag btang ba ni// dka' bar gyur pa ma yin no// ji ltar yab kyi bu gcig nga yin kyang // de ltar ra yang nga yi lus 'di khyer// lus 'di byin pas byang chub rnyed gyur cing // 'gro 'di shing
5274(): tu sdug bsngal las grol shog/ de skad ces smras nas/ byang chub sems dpas skyes bu gzhan zhig la smras pa/ kye rings par song la sog le shin tu rno ba khyer la shog cig/ de brgya byin gyis rmongs
5275(): par byas pas rings par sog le khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha sog le 'tshal te mchis so// de nas byang chub sems dpas blon po rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag gis ji srid du bram ze 'di shib
5276(): ma gyur par nga'i lus 'di sog les chod cig dang bram ze 'di la sbyin par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa thos nas skye bo'i tshogs thams cad sdug bsngal bar gyur te mya ngar gyi ca co 'byin to// /
5277(): blong po blo gros chen po des byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi sku la chags pa med par gtong bar rig nas mchog tu yid gdungs pa'i gdong mchi ma can gyis de'i rkang pa la gtugs te bzlog pa'i
5278(): phyir smras pa/ lha 'di ni mi srid de/ 'di lta ste/ lus sog les bcad pa'i lus ni nges par 'chi bar 'gyur te/ 'chin las su mi rung ba'i ror gyur la las
5279(): su mi rung bas ni bram ze la'ang byas pa don ma mchis par 'gyur ro// gang gzhan gyi yan lag bcad pa gzhan gyi yan lag la sbyor bar gyur pa 'di yang gnas ma mchis so// de lta na lha'i ngal
5280(): ba'ang don ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na lha bzod par mdzod la bdag nyid don ma mchis par gsod par mi mdzad cing nyid kyi srog yongs su mi btang bar gsol/ de nas byang chub sems
5281(): dpas blon po dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/ blo gros chen po bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gegs ma byed cig/ 'jig rten na ni chos nyid 'di yin te// 'du ba gang yod mtha' ni 'bral bar 'gyur//
5282(): tshe yang glog bzhin 'gyur zhing mi brtan ni// dus ring 'gro la phan par byed pa yi// sbyin la mkhas pas su zhig gegs byed 'gyur// de bas blo gros chen po yi rang byos// de skad ces smras pa dang /
5283(): byang chub sems dpa'i de lta bu'i sbyin pa la mi ldog par shes nas blo gros chen po mchog tu gdung pa'i sems kyis mchi ma char bzhin du bab cing byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la 'jus te skye
5284(): sngags 'don par gyur// kyi hud 'dzam gling skyong byed pa// snying rje'i bdag nyid sa bdag che// 'di ni 'jig rter skal nyams pas// slan chad mngon du mthong mi 'gyur// bram ze 'di nyid gcig
5285(): bu'i phyir// 'jig rten thams cad 'dor bar byed// de skad ces smras nas sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas skyes bu shing mkhan gnyis la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs
5286(): ngag 'dir nga'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sog les nga'i lus 'di myur du chod cig bram ze 'di'i re ba rdzogs par bya'o// shing mkhar de gnyis mchog tu
5287(): sdug bsngal bas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/ lha 'di skad gsung pa mi rigs te/ sa bdag khyod la gnod pa dag/ gal te gzhan gyis byas na yang // bdag cag
5288(): mthu yis bzlog rigs na// gnod pa'i tshul 'di ji ltar bgyi// yang byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bu dag 'di ni nga la gnod pa byed pa ma yin no// snying rje'i bdag nyid brtan pa rnams//
5289(): gzhan la phan par byed pa na// de yi spyod la grogs byed pa// 'di ni dam pa'i spyod pa'o// de bas na ci nas nga'i ngag bzhir du byos shig ces smras te/ yang bdag nyid khri las babs nas skye bo'i
5290(): tshegs dang lha dang klu gegs byed pa de dag thabs dang tshig snyan pa de dag gis so sor bzlog nas smon lam btab pa/ lha dang mi dang gnod sbyir tshegs rnams nyon// gang gis bdag ni 'di ltar 'bad
5291(): byed pa// lha dang mi dang brgya byin thob phyir mir// tshangs pa 'am rang nyid zhi ba 'dod min te// 'gro ba sdug bsngal bcas pa bskyab phyir dang // bla med byang chub yongs su rdzogs phyir ro// de bas ci
5292(): nas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dag/ bsgrubs nas sangs rgyas mchog nyid thob gyur cig/ de skad ces smras nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid sa la phab ste shing
5293(): mkhan la smras pa/ tshur shog bram ze 'di dus ma byas pa la nga'i lus 'di sog les legs par chod la byin cig/ ces smras so// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis de lta bu'i rnam pa de/
5294(): mthong nas stabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la gtugs nas/ snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don par brtsams pa/ kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pa sems can
5295(): thams cad la mnyes gshin pa snying rje che ba yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i lha la deng nyid du mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas pa ni sdug bsngal lo// deng 'dir bdag cag lha dang lhan cig pa
5296(): las tha dad par gyur te so so ba dang bye ba dang bral bar gyur to// 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ lha bzod par mdzod cig/ nyid kyis srog med par mdzad pa 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye
5297(): bo'i tshogs thams cad mgon med par mi mdzad du gsol/ lha btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang mdzod dang bang ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyus shing gang ba la gzigs su gsol/ 'dzam
5298(): bu'i gling gi skye bo'i tshogs rtag tu rab tu dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa la'ang gzigs su gsol/ lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal lta bu'i grong khyer a riSh+Ta bza' ba
5299(): mang po phur sum tshogs par skye bo rab tu dga' ba rnams brten pa la'ang gzigs su gsol/ mgon po khyod kyis rnam kun tu// sras ltar yongs su bskyab pa rnams// khyod bral me yis
5300(): nges gdungs nas// lus can ji ltar gnas par 'gyur// khyod dang bral ra bdag cag kun// shin tu 'chi bdag dbang du 'gro// mgon po khyod dang rnam bral na// bdag cag 'tsho ba mi
5301(): nus so// btsun mo mya ngan gyis gdungs dang // sems can gcig tu sdug bsngal na// thugs rje ldan pa thugs rje yis// mi dbang de ni gzigs su gsol// sems can rnams la
5302(): mnyes gshin lha// bzod mdzod srog ni mi btang gsol// mgor po dpa' bo khyod gshegs na// su zhig 'jig rten skyong bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpas de rnams snying rje
5303(): rje skad du de ltar smre sngags 'don pa thos pa dang / snying rjes gdungs pa'i yid kyis de rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/ khyod cag rnams mya ngan gyis chog gi/ shin tu yun ring
5304(): por sdug pa dang phrad par 'gyur ba'ang nges par tha mar bral ba'i mtha' nyid du gyur pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin te/ khyed cag rnams kyis rtag tu dge ba'i chos rnams la bag yod
5305(): par gyis shig ces smras nas shing mkhan de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// bzhin bzangs dag rings par shog la lus yun ring po mi thogs par chod cig ces smras pa tsam gyis de
5306(): gnyis kya ban+d+ha b+hin gyis kun tu rmongs par byas nus/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus lte ba pan dang la 'bral du srog les bta ba ste ni ring po sa thags dang /
5307(): tshong par 'gyur ro// de nas blon pa blo gros chen pos byang chub sems da ba'i spyod po shin tu dka' zhing bzong bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal mi ba' ba'i sdug bsngal mya ngan drug ngas gud
5308(): tu skrag pa'i yid kyis brtabs pag tu shing mkhan gnyis bzlog cing 'di skad ces smras so// kyi dung gi hud lhong gnyis kyi rtsol de 'di ni ci zhig ci zhig/ 'di ltar khyod cag gnyis kyis
5309(): byams pa'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes shing yon tan du ma dang ldan pa 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su sbyong ba ston med pa gnod pa mi byed pa 'di ji ltar gsod/ mi gti mug
5310(): cen khyod cag 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rgyal po ji ltar gsod par spro/ khyod cag gnyis sa chen po'i lha mo 'dis ji ltar mi 'jigs khyod cag lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang dri za dang /
5311(): nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / 'khor lo dang mnga' bo che dang mtshor rtse gcig pa la sogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyis ci ltar mi
5312(): bsnun/ khyod cag 'di lta bu'i 'phags pa la tshul ma yin pa'i las byed na lus rnam pa stong du ji ltar ma brlag/ khyed cag gnyis rang gi lus kyi phral du dmyal bar ji lta bur ma
5313(): lhung mi gti mug can khyed gnyis bdag nyid chen po 'dis bu bzhin du ma bskyangs sam zhes 'di dang gzhan yang rnam pa mang pos spras nas/ kyi hud lha zhes blon po chen po blo gros
5314(): chen po rings par stan las langs te/ lag pa gnyis kyis sog le bzung ras byang chub sems dpa'i lus la mchi ma 'dzag pas brlan par byas te zlog par byed do// de nas byang chub
5315(): sems dpas zhum pa'i yid de la dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/ bu zhog zhog mya ngan pa byed cig sdug pa dang phangs pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang mngon par dga' ba thams cad nges par tha
5316(): dad par 'gyur te/ so so ba dang bye ba dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bu/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing // bslang ba'i mtha' ni 'gyel bar 'gyur// phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral
5317(): ba ste/ gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin// de'i phyir lus slong ba la bar chad pa byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros cher po sngon byung ba na nga'i lus slong ba la lha mo zhig gis bar
5318(): rang byas te/ des nga'i bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar chad byas la bdag nyid kyang bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyes so// gal te nga'i lus slong pa la lha mo rnams kyis bar chad ma
5319(): byas par gyur na ni yun ring po mi thogs par nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// bu gzhan yang ngas phyogs 'di nyid du stag mo zhig bkres pa'i sdug
5320(): bsngal ma tshor ba mang pos lus gdungs pas/ bu 'dod par 'thong ba dang / mchog tu sbri ne'i dang du song ba yid kyis songs su bzlab d+ma'i phyir du byu/
5321(): bdag nyid yongs su btang byes byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa bskal pa ba'i bcu ru zhugs pa phyir lus par byas so// gzhan yang tha meng pa yang dag par d+h+r-i g+has d+ma'i na pa rjo
5322(): par 'dod par bya ba'i phyir sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du rkang pa dang lag pa dang bu dang chung pa steng drug yongs su btang par byas na'ang sus kyang bar chad pa byas so// de'i phyir 'di ltar rig par byas
5323(): te nga'i lus spong ba la khyed par chud ma byed cig/ de nas blon po chen po tho zos chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po shes nas byang chub sems dpa' la dang pa chen po skyes to//
5324(): cang mi smra bar gyur cing mchi ma'i tharlabs kyis yang dang yang du gdong lebs bzhin du bsams pa/ kyi chud 'jig rten 'di dag de// bskal ba ngan ti b+ha bcu// chos kyi rgyal pos bor bar
5325(): gyur chos kyi sgron ma shi bar gyur// chos kyi rnga yang chag par gyur// chos kyi rgya mtsho bskams par gyur// chos kyi ri bo bsnyil bar gyur// chos kyi grong khyer choms par gyur// chos kyi
5326(): gru yang zhig par gyur// kyi hud shin tu sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni 'jig rten kun gyi ba// sems can kun la phan byed pa// bdud kyi 'khor los bcom nas ni// rgyal po chen po med
5327(): par gyur// gang phyir mi bzang dus 'dir ni// bdag gi lus kyi snying 'di ni// rnam pa stong du mags pa// snying rje chen po bzhin gyur tam// shis pa'i dus 'di shin tu 'das// mi
5328(): bzang dus ni nye bar gnas// shes rab ldan mir mang po dang // 'jig rten drag kyang brlag par gyur// ji ltar ji ltar mthong gyur pa'i// sa yi mtshar ma du ma yis// ma nges yur
5329(): ni mi ring bar// rgyal po seng ge med par 'gyur// dri med mi yi nyi ma ni// shin tu bsten dka' de rub 'gyur// yur mi ring par 'jig rten 'dir// mi snang ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
5330(): sems can kun la phan pa yi// rgyal po chen po 'di med de// phyi nas 'jig rten mi sdang ba// su zhig 'jig rten skyong bar gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar
5331(): rmongs par byas pa de lta de ltar mya ngan chung bar gyur nas sog le btab par gyur to// de ras byang chub sems dpas shing mkhan de gnyis la/ bzhir bzangs dag khyod cag gnyis
5332(): kyis sog lis myur du drongs la nga'i lus kyi phyed ro smad chod cig bram ze 'di shi bar gyur na nga'i ngal ba 'bras bu med par 'gyur grang / de nas shing mkhan de gnyis brgya byin gyi
5333(): mthus kur tu rmongs pas nyams thag pa'i nga ros cho nges 'debs shing / skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkag bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus la sog les 'dra bar
5334(): brtsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub yid la smon zhing dga' ba'i yid kyis slong ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bsam
5335(): nas cang mi smra bar gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi lte bar sog les bcad pa las khrag gi tshogs chen po 'bab par gyur to// de nas blon po blo gros chen po 'di
5336(): ltar sog les bcad pa'i tsher ba drag pos nyen pa'i khrag 'bab par mthong ba dang / lha grongs pa ni sdug bsngal lo zhes bsams nas re thag chad par gyur te 'phral du brgyal nas sa'i steng du 'gyel/
5337(): bar gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang mya ngan drag pos gdung
5338(): te ngu bar gyur pa dang de rnams kyis ngus pa'i mchi ma char ltar bab po// de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 'di ci zhig yin snyam nas steng du lta bar brtsams pa dang ci tsam na lha brgya stong du pa rnams
5339(): ngu ba mthong ngo // de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po shas cher mya ngan drag pos gdungs te byang chub sems dpa' gnas skapra 'di lta bur sdug bsngal bar mthong nas kyi hud lha grongs pa ni sdug bsngal
5340(): lo zhes bsams nas kun tu rmongs par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis srog chags brgya stong du ma 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa'i bya ngan gyis gdungs pas shin tu snying rje zhing
5341(): zhum pa mthong ba dang / myur bar snying rje ba'i yid kyis bsams pa/ bdag nyid che ba sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/ snying rje can/ thams cad ster ba 'di'i lus la 'di ltar tshor
5342(): ba drag po'i las kun tu sbyor ba ni bzang po ma yin no// gzhan du ra da ni ji ltar srog mi 'jig par gyur pa de ltar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' la shing mkhan de gnyis kyis sog
5343(): le drung cing sog le rnon pas lus bcad pa'i tshor ba drag pos gdungs pa dang / brtan pa'i stobs dang ldan pas song pa la byams pa'i sems bskyed nas bsams pa/ ngas 'khor ba'i skyon gyi/
5344(): rang bzhir shes nas brtson 'grus drag cing brtan pa dang ldan pas lus phyogs gcig bcad pa 'di las 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal skye na sems can sngar ma rnams phal cher sems can dmyal
5345(): ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa na shin tu sdug bsngal lo zhes de lhag par yang snying rje chen po'i sems su gyur te/ kye me'o 'khor ba na gnas pa'i sems cad gyi sdug bsngal ni kye ma mi bzang
5346(): pa yin la/ 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bdag gis spro bar byas kyis/ sems can 'ga' yang sdug bsngal ba'i skal ba can du ma gyur cig
5347(): ces sems skyes ma thag tu byang chub sems pa'i tsher ba 'phral du rgyun chad par gyur to// de ras byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ ci'i phyir nga'i lus bcad pa'i tsher ba 'gags par gyur/
5348(): sog le 'ga' zhig gis bton par ma gyur grang snyam nas sog le de la bltas so// bltas nas kyang mchog tu yid bde bar gyur nas 'dar bar gyur to// 'di na
5349(): 'jig rten cung zad tsam gyis kyang // kur tu nyam nga spa bkod skrag par 'gyur// snying rje'i bdag nyid gzhan gyi don spyod pa// srid ra rmad byung gang de mtshungs med do// de nas brgya byin
5350(): gyis kun tu rmongs par byas pa'i mi de gnyis sog le rnon pos byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi phyed ro smad bcang ma thag tu sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang 'gul bar gyur to// de nas byang chub
5351(): sems dpa' rang gi lus bcad pa'i sdug bsngal mi sems par rings pa nyid du skyes bu de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// bzhin bzangs dag khyed cag gnyis kyis myur du nga'i lus 'di/
5352(): rings pa rings par bram ze'i lus la sbyor cig/ de gnyis kyis kyang de bzhin du byas so// sbyar ba tsam gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji ltar skad cig ma de nyid la rma kun tu 'byor cing mnyam
5353(): par gnas pa dang mdog 'dra bar snang ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ skad cig ma de la ston cing yang byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya ba'i phyir lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni khri las langs te 'chag
5354(): pa dang langs pa dang 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slong ba po'i lus yongs su rdzogs shing yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang mchog tu dga' bas kun tu
5355(): rgyas pa'i yid kyis ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur cing yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// bdag gis 'di ltar 'bad pa don yod cing // gzhan don spyod phyir sbyin pa 'di byas
5356(): pas bram ze 'di yi re ba rdzogs pa ltar// phyi dus rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho che las bsgral gyur te// bla med go 'phang lam la 'jog gyur cig/ de skad ces sbas
5357(): nas tsher ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pas mig btsum te 'dug go/ de nas brgya byin gyis rings par byang chub sems dpa'i lus la stobs bskyed pa dang 'tsho ba'i sman gyis gsos so// e me ho
5358(): gang tshe rgyal pos lus btang ba// de tshe sa chen ri dang rgya mtsho rnams// rlabs kyi phreng bas bskyod pa'i gru cher bzhin// kun tu bskyod cing 'ur 'ur sgrogs par gyur// phyogs rnams dus tshigs snang ba med
5359(): par gyur// lha dang klu rnams dga' zhing mya ngar byas// snga tshogs me tog gos dang rgyan phreng 'thor// skye bo'i tshogs rnams mya ngan gdungs pa yis// sna tshogs mya ngan ca co sgrogs par gyur// de'i/
5360(): tshe lha rnam kyi dbang po brgya byin byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ri rab ltar shin tu mi g.yo bar shes shing / byang chub sems dpa' rmad du byung ba yongs su
5361(): gtong la de yang ba spu ldang ba ni shin tu dka' zhing phul du byung ba mthong ba dang / ngo mtshar gyis mig gdangs te/ lha'i bu de bzhi dang lhan cig tu bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ rang gi
5362(): gzugs kyis bltas te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin lags kyis bram ze ma lags te/ rgyal po chen po
5363(): legs so legs so// e ma'o khyod kyi brtson 'grus dpag tu med// e ma'o ma bcos nyid kyi spyod pa bstan// e ma'o rang gi lus la chags med gtong // e ma'o sems can
5364(): rnams la snying brtse ba// las 'di mngon sum bstan gyur kyang // the tshom za bar gyur pa 'dra// zhes tshod du brjod nas yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod bya dka' ba'i spyod pa 'di lta bu la ci
5365(): zhig don du gnyer/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ko'u shi ka nga'i lus kyi sbyin pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can
5366(): rnams 'khor ba nas bsgral bar bya'o// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po rang gi lus yongs su zad pa'am gtad pas sems rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gyod par ma gyur grang /
5367(): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ko'u shi ka ngan 'gyod pa med do// brgya byin gyis smras pa ji ltar shes par bya/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir nga'i lus kyi phyed bcad pa
5368(): 'di na ji lta ba bzhin du zhog cig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi phyed bcad pa de na ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpas sems can
5369(): thams cad la rjes su 'gro ba'i byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ bden pa gsol bar byed cing / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ji ltar byang chub 'dod gyur nas// snying rjes lus
5370(): ni gtang ba la// ser sna med cing zhum med pa// de ni 'gyod par gyur pa med// 'gyod pa'i sems kyang med gyur na// bder tshig 'di dang legs byas pas// brgya byin de ni nga yi lus// 'di ni
5371(): sngon gyi ji bzhin du// dbang po ma lus rdzogs gyur cig/ de skad ces smras ma thag tu// byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'phral du sngon du ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil na
5372(): gnas pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ngo mtshar de mthong ba dang / ngo mtshar gyi rig gdangs te/ ca co dang gzha'i sgra sgrogs
5373(): so skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba dang lha dang mi rnams yid sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus yongs su rdzogs
5374(): pa mthong ba dang / srog stor ba las slar rnyed pa bzhin du mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so// 'di skad ces smras te/ kye ma'o khyod ni slar 'tshe ba'i// ngo mtshar dag ni blta bar bgyi// sa dang nags su
5375(): bcas pa yi// 'jig rter 'di ni skal bar ldan// de'i tshe brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kye ma'o khyod ni brtson pa drag/ brtan pa nyid kyang bla na med// kye ma'o sems can las snying brtse/
5376(): sema'i sems can las ming sa khye 'om sa 'jig rten 'di/ mgon po khyod kyis stong gyu te// drug brgyal chen po dag 'jigs las/ srung dag cu 'dug /
5377(): desang ces smras nas/ lha'i dbang po ban byinas khyim nur bzhin du bab cing sna 'dod pashid du byang chub sems dpa' ma 'ang ri gsal te rgyal ba cir gang bdag gis nyams sad pa'i
5378(): tshor badrug pa la / gyur ba bang par mdzod cig/ gzhan yang gang gi ci khyod kyis tha rid pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu du ngo par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i na yang bdags
5379(): dgongs shig/ byang chub sems dpas spras pa/ ko'u shi ka bzod kyis de bzhin du byas te ngas kyang dran par bya'o// de ma thag tu lha yi rnga sgra yang // nam mkha'i ngos kun gsal bar khyab par grag/
5380(): lha mi dga' bas mching ba brgya stong dag/ mi dbang mthu yis bskul ba bzhin du byeng // de lta bu'i rmang du byung ba'i lhas de dag mthong zhing / lhas bstan pa drang srong des thos te 'khor lnga brgya dang
5381(): bcas pa btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od khrid de/ rings par byang chub sems dpa'i thang du phyin nas/ rgyal ba dang tshe spel bar byas te smras pa/ lha yi bu mo babang 'dra ba// lha mo sdug pa 'di rnams la/
5382(): mgon po khyod kyis bskyang ba dang // dge ldan 'di la dgyes par mdzod// khyim thab mi byed btsun mo 'di// 'di ni khyed la 'bul lags kyis// khyed kyis nga ni slong ba la// nam du yang rim stsol cig
5383(): de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong de dang lha rnams kyi dbang pos gsol ba btab pa bzhin du bzhes so// 'di lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag kyang phyir mi ldog
5384(): par gyur to// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas bdag nyid kyi bde ba la ma chags par gzhan gyi don la brtson par bya'o// de bzhin du smon lam gyi mthu bstan pa
5385(): dang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// dpal gyi sde'i skyes pa'i rabs te brgyang cu pa'o// / sdom la/ 'od ldan bram ze rgyan po pa// nges pa dang ni glang
5386(): po che 'char ka nor caran zla dga' dang // nam mkha' dpal gyi sde dang bcu// byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis gzhar gyi dor bya ba ni bsam gyis mi
5387(): khyab po// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo // rgya mtshos bskor ba'i sa phyogs 'di nyid du// sa bdag
5388(): dpal lngar lus ni rgyas gyur cing // blo gros chu gter rlabs kyi phreng bas bskor// yon tan mu khyud bzhi yis legs bzung bas// dpag yas 'byung po rnams kyi rten gyur pa// yon tan ldan rnams
5389(): sa 'di skyong zhes grags// de lta bu'i rgyal po chen po thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa rang gi bsod nams ma smad pa'i mthus rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa'i sa chen po rab tu skyong ba/ snying
5390(): nye ba'i btsun mo'i tshogs dang blon po rgya che zhing stobs dang ldan par gyur to// rgyal po de la bu gzhor nu mdzes shing ltar sdug pa skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi yid 'dren pa gsum
5391(): zhig yod par gyur te sgra chen po dang / lha chen po dang snying stobs chen po zhes bya'o// de dag gi yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur gyur te/ shes rab yongs su sbyangs shing mthu che la// gzhon yang rgan pa'i
5392(): nye bar spyod la gnas// mdzes shing yid 'ong dam pa'i spyod pa can// 'jigs med rab tu brtan zhing 'gro ba la// byams pa'i rang bzhin bu sdug bzhin du lta// 'gro ba'i yid bzhin rab tu spyod gyur
5393(): pa dgra bo rnams kyang gnyen dang mtshungs gyur na// rjes su mthun rnams yid 'ong spros ci dgos// de lta bu'i bdag nyid chen po de rnams par tshun rjes su brtse ba'i bdag nyid dang ldan par gnas so//
5394(): de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe rgyal po shing na chen po bdag nyid kyi skyid mos tshul gyi mchog rnams blta zhing 'jig rten gyi bde ba yongs su spyad pa'i phyir gzhon nu rnams dang bcas te rags khrod cher ma
5395(): bcu gnyis kyi skyed mos tshal rnams kyi gzhir byin no// nags tshal ltor shing sdug gu yi// lo ma me tog mdzes pa rnams// sos ka'i rkyen gyis la 'bus tshe// rma bya khu byug snyan pa rnams// de la
5396(): dga' bas 'bod pa bzhin// de yis skye bo yid drangs nas// ljon shing me tog tshogs brgyan pa// bsil ba'i rdzing bu bcas pa rnams// ched du blta bar 'dod par gyur// de ltar skyed mos
