5787(): rang gi gnas su song ngo // brtson 'grus kyi don 'di dang ldan pa ni skyes bu dam pa rnams la rig pa yin te/ ri dang sa chen rgya mtsho'i chu gter mtha' dag gi/ rdul phran khams kyi shing rta'i 'phang lo'i rgyu khyon la//
5788(): gnas pa'i sems can khams la rdul gyis 'gran bya min// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs sems can don la rab zhugs pa'i// blo yi stobs ni skye bo'i tshogs kyi bsam bya min// dpag med stobs kyi rjes su
5789(): zhugs pa rgyal ba'i sras// phyogs gyur rnams kyi mtshan gyi stobs kyang dpag tu med// de nas ded dpon slong ldan yid bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs te/ skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid bzhin du sbyin pa'i char
5790(): chen po kun tu phab cing // snyan par smra bas skye bo rnams 'dun par byas te/ chos dang mthun pa'i dga' ston gyis skye bo rnams bag med pa las zlog cing byang chub kyi lam dang mthun pa'i brtson 'grus la bkod do//
5791(): de'i tshe skye bo'i tshigs rnams kyis ded dben slong ldan la ched du brjod pa 'di lta bus bstod par nges so// ded dpon chen po ded dpon mchog/ slong ba'i yid bzhin mchog dang ldan// dpag med brtson 'grus
5792(): cher po'i stobs// rab tu gsal zhing ma smad pa// e ma'o nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// blo yi mun pa sel bar byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa bzhin// dbul ba'i tshe gdung zhi bar byed// bum pa
5793(): bzang po mdor grub ltar// ci 'dod yid bzhin re bskong // 'di 'dras zin pa skal ba bzang // nam zhig ded dpon 'di yi mthus// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skem par byed// e ma'o smad byung a la la// zhes bya ba
5794(): la sogs pa ched du brjod pas lha thams cad kyang mgu bar gyur to// de lta bu'i don 'di yang brtson 'grus kyi stobs dpag tu med pa bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ mo'u bgal gyi
5795(): bu nga de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon gyi bu slong ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs bskyed pas na bdud thams cad
5796(): las rgyal bar gyur to zhes gsungs so// ded dpon slong ldan gyi skyes pa'i rabs te brgyad cu bdur pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
5797(): stobs thob pa rnams ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang rjes su mthun par spyod para'ang bdag nyid kyi snying stobs dang brtson 'grus phur sum tshogs pa yon tan gyi che ba bstan nas thabs kyis sems can rnams bla na
5798(): med pa'i byang chub tu drangs te/ 'jig rten pa rnams ngo mtshar skye bar byed do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ yul lnga len ces bya ba 'byor zhing rgyas pa grong khyer glang po'i khyim zhes bya ba
5799(): na rgyal po nor can zhes bya ba tshes bzhin du rgyal srid byed pa las/ bu med nas 'jig rten gyi lha rnams la gsol ba 'debs par rtsom ste/ dus gzhan zhig na khye'u zhig btsas par gyur nas/ btsa' ba'i tshe/
5800(): ga rnams legs par byas shing rdzing gi pad ma bzhin du legs par bskyed cing / de'i ming yang nor bzangs zhes bya bar btags so// gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/ yi ge dang rtag pa brgyad dang / dbye ba
5801(): dang klag pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gsal bar gyur to// de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ ljongs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di mngon
5802(): par rgyas par byas te/ gnas pa rnams kyi bzo la sogs pa'i gnas rnams la byang bar gyur to// lhag bsam dag pa'i dpal ni rgya che la// yongs su sbyangs pa'i dpal ni gsal bar snang // zla ba'i 'od zer
5803(): dpal ni rab dkar bas// ku mu da yi dpal ni 'phel ba 'dra// de bas 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// yon tan dpal rnams dpal ldan de la mdzes// de bas sa bdag sa rnams skyong byed pa/ 'byung
5804(): po'i dpal rnams dpal ldan 'phel bar byed// de yi phas kyang gzhon nu de la chung ma gsum po// chen ma dang / 'bring ma dang / chun ma dag bzhag cing / gnas pa'i khang pa rnam pa gsum po/ dgur gyi
5805(): dang dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi rnams brtsigs nas/ skyed mos tshal rnam pa gsum po dgur gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi ngag btsugs so// de nas gzhor nu nor bzangs steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la skyes pa
5806(): med par song nas/ sil skar rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na rngon pa spang leb can ri dgas tshol zhing de dang de dag tu rgyu ba na/ ri bo gzhan
5807(): zhig la byin pa dang des ri bo de'i shod na/ drang srong gau bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs rgyu ba der mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos g.yegs pa dang / ngang
5808(): pa dang / bya ka raN+Da ka dang / ngur pas mdzes pa de lta bu zhig mthong nas/ de bsti gnas su 'khyam par brtsams pa las ji tsam ra/ drang srong skra dang kha spu dang / sen mo dang spu rnams ring ba/ lus rlung dang tsha
5809(): bas gdungs pa/ shing le'i gos gyon pa zhig shing gi drung du gnas bcas te/ rtswa'i spyil bu na 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas dris pa/ legs ldan
5810(): sa phyogs 'dir khyod bzhugs nas yun ji srid cig lags/ lo bzhi bcu lon no// khyod kyis yun de srid cig tu phyogs 'dir lon na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
5811(): 'ga' yang gzigs pa 'am gsan pa lta ci mchis sam/ drang srong zhi ba'i bdag nyid des dal bus dal bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyi mtsho 'di mthong ngam/ legs ldan mthong lags so// 'di ni
5812(): tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing zhes bya ste/ ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa/ kha ba dang / dngul dang / ba mo'i mdog lta bu'i chus shin tu gang ba shin tu drizhim pa'i ma
5813(): tog gis bskor ba'i chu'i rdzing 'dir tshes bco lnga la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bya ba mi 'am ci'i bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas/ mgo khrus dang / sku mnye sna tshogs la 'ongs nas/
5814(): khrus byed do// de khrus byed pa'i tshe bro gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra snyan pas bya dang ri dgas rnams kyang yid 'phrog par byed do// kho bo'ang de'i sgra thos nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde bo chen pos zhag bdun 'da' bar/
5815(): byed do// bzhin bzangs kho bos ngo mtshar smad du byung ba de mthong ngo // de nas rngon pa spang leb can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis klu las don yod pa'i zhags pa thob pa des mi 'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma/
5816(): la gdab po snyam nas/ des dus gzhan zhig na chos bco lnga la don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te/ mtsho 'gram dang nye bar me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo ma tshang tshing zhig tu 'khras nas gcig tu bsgrim par byar byed cing /
5817(): 'dug go/ tsam na yid 'phrog ma mi'am ci'i bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te de 'dra ba'i 'byor pa nyid kyis tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing du khrus kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / don pa spang le bcan gyis de mthag tu dor yong 'dra/
5818(): ba btab pa las/ des mi 'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma zin to// don yod zhags pas zin nas mtsho'i nang na mchod rgal zhing 'jigs pa'i sgra'ang byung ba dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo'i tshogs lhag mas de thos nas pan
5819(): tshun rgyugs te/ mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma la brtag par brtsams pa las bzung ba mthong / mthong nas kyang skrag nas bros so// rngon pa des mchog tu gzugs bzang po lta na sdug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
5820(): bzung ba'i phyir drung du gtugs pa dang / des smras pa/ ma rabs khyod ni nga la ma reg cig/ khyod kyi 'di ni thog tu bab ma yin// nga ni gzugs mchog rgyal po'i 'os yin pas// 'dzin pa legs par 'gyur ba ma
5821(): yin no// rngon pas smras pa/ gal te khyod me bzung na 'bros par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ kho mo mi 'bros kyis gal te yid ma ches na/ 'di'i mthus kho mo steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro ste gtsug gi nor bu 'di
5822(): zung cig/ rngon pas smras pa/ sus shes/ des de la gtsug gi nor bu byin nas smras pa/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di su'i lag na gnas pa de'i dbang du kho mo 'gyur ro// de nas rngon pas nor bu de blangs te zhags pas
5823(): bcings bzhin du khrid di song ngo // de'i tshe gzhon nu nor bzangs ri dgas gshor du chas pa dang rngon pa des gzhon nu nor bzangs gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/
5824(): 'di ni rgyal bu gzhon nu yin la/ 'di yang mchog tu gzugs bzang mo lta na sdug pa yin te/ gal te 'di mthong na btsan thabs su khyer bar 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis 'di skyes kyi tshul du
5825(): bdag nyid kyis dbul lo snyam nas/ de nas de zhags pas bcings bzhin rgyal bu gzhon nu nor bzangs gang na ba der khrid de/ song nas phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la bzung nas spras pa/ lha bdag gis bud med
5826(): rin po che 'di skyes su 'tshal te mchis na bzhes su gsol/ gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis mi 'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma gzugs bzang mo lta na sdug pa mdzes shing kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa yon tan thams
5827(): cad 'dus pa bud med kyi mtshan bco brgyad kyis brgyan pas yul gyi mi bas bzang ba nu ma gser gyi bum pa dang ru sbal ltar rgyas pa/ brla mkhrang zhing mkhregs pa shin tu legs par zlum la ldem pa/ mig
5828(): mthon mthing la rtsa dmar zhing dkyus ring la pad+ma gzhon nu 'dra ba sna'i gzengs ring zhing mtho ba/ ma mchu byu ru dang nor bu rin po che dang bim pa'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ 'gram pa ma rnyongs shing yongs su rgyas pa/
5829(): mkhur chos lhag par dga' bar byed pa'i ri mo'i thig le can/ smin ma rims kyis mdzes shing 'jar la bung ba'i tshogs ltar gnag pa/ dpung pa zla ba nya ba dri ma med pa ltar rgyas la ring ba lto gnyer ma
5830(): zab mo gsum dang ldan zhing yid tsam rnyongs pa/ nu ma'i g.yur gyis ro stong pags kyis 'dud pa dgu zhing shing rta'i yan lag ltar dbyibs shin tu mdzes pa/ lag pa chu shing gi snying po 'dra ba brla
5831(): byin gyis phra bas zlum pas mdzes pa/ rtsa shin tu mi mngon zhing gya gyu med pas yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ nor bu mang po'i mgo rgyan dang / mgul rgyad dang / rkang gdub dang / gdu bu do shal dang /
5832(): se me de'i sgras 'gying zhing 'gro ba dang / skra nag la 'jam pa/ bde sogs lur rkang pa rkang gdub kyis brgyan zhing gser gyi 'og bag can lho phyang nge ba/ do shal mang pos dbyangs pakha dog gser btso
5833(): ma ltar bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu gzhon du 'dod chags kyi zhags pas chu zla dri ma med cing gsal ba g.yo ba'i rang bzhin lta bur bzung dka' ba/ rlung chu rlabs dang bcas pa'i chu srin lta bur rtogs
5834(): par dka' ba/ nam mkha' lding gi shugs 'dra bar 'gro ba shing bal gyi 'dab ma lta bur myur du 'gyur ba/ spre'u ltar sa gcig na mi 'dug pas g.yo zhing tshabs can gyis ni dam du zin/ 'dod chags kyi mda'
5835(): rag tu nyon mongs pa bsnyen pa goms pa'i 'dod chags kyis bde ba ro myong ba la bdam pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yul ngan 'gro'i g.yangs las mi ldog pa/ bzang mo la rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis/
5836(): shin tu drim can du byas pa/ 'brad par 'dod pas shin tu dbugs mi bzod pa'i sgra 'byin pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i gzhus 'phangs pas ni snying la phog ste/ me'i nang du phye ma leb bzhin du de nyid du 'gyel to//
5837(): smras pa dbyar gyi char sprin nang nas glog ni 'grub ltar// bzhin ras zla ba 'dra ste nor bzangs kyis mthong ste/ de la chags pa'i 'dod pa stegs tshul legs byung ba'i// 'dod chags mda' yis de'i
5838(): snying la phog par gyur// de nas rgyal bu nor bzangs kyis/ yid 'phrog ma khrid de glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song nas/ rngon pa de la'ang grong khyer mchog cig byin no// de nas
5839(): gzhon nu nor bzangs yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir dong nas lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa byed de/ yid 'brog ma'i gzugs dang na tshod dang bsnyen
5840(): bkur brgya phrag du ma'i yon tan gyis gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi sems ji ltar de dang skad cig kyang 'bral mi phod pa de ltar phrogs so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'ongs pa las
5841(): de las gcig ni rgyal bu la rten bcas so// gnyis pa ni/ gzhon nu nor bzangs la'o// rgyal po la rten bcas pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal pos mdun na 'don du bcug ste/ longs spyod kyi skal ba
5842(): yang byin no// gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi gang yin pa de la ni des longs spyod kyi skal ba tsam zhig byin pa dang / smras pa gzhon nu gang gi tshe yab 'das nas khyod rgyal por bcug pa de'i tshe/ bdog la ci zhig/
5843(): bgyi/ nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod kyi grogs po bram ze nga'i yab kyis mdun na 'don du bcug pa de bzhin du khyod kyang nga'i mdun na 'don du bzhug go/ zhes byas pa'i gtam de gcig nas gcig tu
5844(): brgyud pa bram ze mdun na 'di ni des thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ngas ci nas gzhon nu nyid kyis kyang rgyal srid mi 'thob pa de ltar bya na/ mdun na 'don du gzhug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ ci tsam na
5845(): dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po de'i yul du ri bor ba zhig brdo bar gyur nas rgyal po de 'bebs su dmag kha chen gcig btang ba las de rnams bcom rnam par bcom ste/ pham par byas nas slar log go// de bzhin/
5846(): du kha chen bdun gyi bar btang ba las de rnams kyang bcom rnam pas tsam tha bas pa rgya drasang lhags so// rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha ci'i slad du rang gi dpung nyams shing gzhan gyi mthu bskyed par
5847(): mdzad/ gang yang lha'i yul nas mtshon gyis 'tsho ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad dgug tu gsol/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/ gzhon nu bsad pa'i thabs bya ba'i dus ni 'di yin no/
5848(): snyam nas/ des rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha de lta bus ni dbab par rngo mi thog go// rgyal pos smras pa ji ltar bya/ nga nyid kho na 'gro 'am mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ ci'i slad du lha nyid gshegs/ gzhon
5849(): nu nor bzangs 'di ni der la bab cing mthu rtsal bsnyems pa dang ldan pa lags pas/ dmag 'di rnams dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu
5850(): dmag dang lhan cig tu deng la ri bor ba rnams phob cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas btsun mo rnams kyi nang du song ste/ yid 'phrog ma mthong ba dang / des
5851(): thams cad brjed par gyur to// smras pa/ rnam rtog bung ba lang tso'i 'dab bshog rgyas// sna tshogs bde ba'i pad tshal yid 'ong du// 'gro rnams rang dbang med par rab tu 'jug/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams sred pa
5852(): / yod min kyang // yid 'brog lus sems tshim par byed rgyu de// mthong ma thag tu brjed pa bzhin du gyur// de nas mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gzhon nu nor bzangs ni yid
5853(): 'phrog ma la lhag par chags pas mchi rngo mi thog gis/ dmag bsdogs la gzhon nu btsun mo rnams kyi nang nas dbyung ba dang / ci nas kyang yid 'phrog ma'i drung du mi mchi bar thal byang du btang bar bgyi'o//
5854(): rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag dpung gi tshogs sta gon gyis shig/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la mnyan nas// dpung gi tshogs glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung
5855(): phun sum tshogs pa 'tsho chas dang go mtshon rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa dag sta gon byas so// de nas gzhon nu phyir byung ba dang bsgo ba/ gzhon nu dpung gi tshogs sta gon byas kyis song zhig/ smras pa/ lha yid/
5856(): 'phrog ma la bltas te mchi bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu thogs par 'gyur gyis ma lta zhig/ yab gal te de ltar nam la bltas te mchi'o// gzhon nu ma la ltos shig/ des yid 'phrog ma'i
5857(): gtsug gi nor bu khyer te ma'i drung du song nas/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yum bdag gis ri bor ba rnams 'bebs su mchi lags kyis gtsug tor gyi nor bu 'di khyod kyis shin tu dben par spos
5858(): la yid 'phrog ma 'gum pa la tug pa ma lags pa ci ltar gyur kyang ma stsal cig ces de skad ma la bsgos nas phyag byas te dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang de rims kyis yul 'das
5859(): nas ri bor de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du btab ste 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma lam de nas gnod sbyin rnams kyi 'dun sar chas so//
5860(): de dag lam de nas chas pa na/ nam mkha'i lam nas thogs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis lam 'di nas lan mang po zhig tu song na bdag gi bzhon pa lan 'ga' yang thogs par ma gyur pas/
5861(): gang gis na da ltar thogs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod snyam pa las/ des gzhon nu nor bzangs mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bskal pa bzangs po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ dpag la chas pas
5862(): nyon mongs par gyur gyis/ 'di'i grogs byas te ri bor ba 'di rnams srog chags 'ga' la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur bar dbab po snyam du bsams nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len la smras pa
5863(): lnga len tshur shog/ khyod kyis gzhon nu nor bzangs ri bor ba rnams dang g.yul ma bkye bar srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod par ma byas par phob cig/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis bka'
5864(): bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la mnyan nas lha'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa shing ta la'i tshad tsam gyi skyes pa dang / ri'i tshad tsam gyi glang po che dang / glang po che'i tshad tsam gyi rta dang /
5865(): gzhal med khang gi mad tsa gyi shing rta rnams sprul to// de nas ral gri dang tho ba dang / mnga' bo che dang / mdung dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung thung dang / mda' dang dgra sta la sogs te mtshon cha rnam pa sna
5866(): tshogs dang / sil dkrol gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'byin pas/ 'jigs pa chen po ston cing lnga len mthu chen po'i tshogs rnams dang bcas ri bor du phyin pa las/ glang po che dang /
5867(): rta dang shing rta'i sgra dang sil dkrol gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi rang gi mthus rab dag ral bar gyur to// de nas ri bor na gnas pa de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs de dag dang ra ba dag ral
5868(): ba mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te dris pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di dag gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis spras pa/ myur du sgo phye zhig gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di'i mjug nas 'ong ste dpung gi tshogs 'di ni
5869(): de'i mthu yin no// gal te myur du ma phyen thams cad rmeg med par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rgyal la mi bsngo ste// gzhon nu blo dang ldan la min// rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho rnams kyis//
5870(): bdag cag 'jigs shing skrag gyur mod/ ces smras nas/ de rnams kyis sgo phye ste/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgrengs nas// bum pa gang ba dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis gzhon nu nor bzangs bsu'o//
5871(): des kyang dbugs phyung nas de rnams bgrang ba las sna bo bskos te/ dpya thang bcang gte'u'ang bzung ngo // de nas ri bor ba rnams cham du phab nas/ gzhon nu nor bzangs slar log go// rgyal po nor can gyi de nyid
5872(): kyi nub mo'i rmi lam na bya rgod cig 'ongs te rgyal po'i lto dral nas rgyu ma drangs te/ grong khyer de thams cad kyi mtha' bskor ba dang / rin po che sna bdun khyim du 'ongs par mthong ngo // mthong nas rgyal po 'jig
5873(): skrag mi dga' zhing / spu ring zhes byed nas myur bar langs te/ mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chang du mi 'gyur
5874(): grang snyam nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las/ nam langs nas rmi lam de bram ze mdun na 'don la spras pa dang / des bsams pa/ lhas rmi lam de lta bu mthong ba de ni gdon mi za bar gan//
5875(): nus ri bor ba rnams pham par byas kyis/ log pa zhig tu bstan par bya'o snyam nas smras pa/ khyed kyi rmi lam du gzigs pa ni bzang po ma lags te/ gdon mi 'chal bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal
5876(): srid las nyams pa 'am/ sku tshe'i bar chad du 'gyur lags so// 'on kyang 'di zlog pa'i thabs mchis te/ de yang bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig las mthong ngo // bzlog pa'i thabs de ci yin// lhas skyed mos/ la
5877(): du rdzing dbyibs legs pa tshad la bab pa bgyis la de rdo thal gyis byugs te legs par bstar nas ri dgas phra mo rnams kyi khrag gis bkang la/ der lhas khrus la gshegs pa na/ rdzing de'i them skas gcig
5878(): la 'jug par bgyi'o// gcig la zhugs nas gnyis pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o// gnyis pa la zhugs nas gsum pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o// gsum pa la zhugs nas bzhi pa la 'jog par bgyi'o// de nas
5879(): bram ze'i rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis lha'i 'bas lces ljags la mi ma yin pa'i tshil gyi bdug pas bdug go// de ltar na lha'i dngos sdig byang zhing yun ring por rgyal srid stong
5880(): bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ de dag thams cad ni nus na/ 'di ltar mi ma yin pa'i tshil 'di ni shin tu dkon no// mdun na 'don gyis spras pa/ lha mod pa gang lags par
5881(): dkon lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de ji lta bu zhig yin/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha yid 'phrog ma ni mi ma lags pa ma lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ mdun na 'don 'di la gzhon nu'i
5882(): srog 'dug gis de skad ma smra zhig/ des smras pa/ lha khyim gyi phyir ni 'ga' btang ste// grong brdal phyir ni khyim btang ngo // yul ljongs phyir ni grong brdal te/ bdag gi phyir ni sa btang ngo // zhes bgyi
5883(): pa'ang ma gsan tam/ rgyal po bdag nyid rten gyur na// gzhon nu blo ldan de la ni// gzhan zhig stsal bar spyod gang gis// yid 'phrog 'di ni 'gum par mdzod// bdag nyid la mngon par chags pa ni mi
5884(): byed pa ci'ang med pas des khas blangs so// de nas mdun na 'don gyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bya bar brtsams te/ rdzing brkos nas rdo thal gyis byugs shing legs par bstar nas ri dgas phra mo rnams
5885(): kyi khrag bsog pa la zhugs so// sbyor ba de nor bzangs kyi btsun mo'i skye bos shes nas/ de rnams dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bdag cag lang co la bab cing gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin pas
5886(): da ni bdag cag dang gzhon nu nor bzangs yongs su dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro zhes de rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag yid 'phrog mas mthong nas dris pa khyod cag ci'i phyir lhag par dga' de la
5887(): gzhan zhig gis yid 'phrog ma la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / yid 'brog ma sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi ma gang na ba der song nas/ rkang pa gnyis la/
5888(): gtugs nas/ snying rje rje skad du sgra bcom chung ngus don de dal bus smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gal te de lta na legs par rtogs shig/ bdag gis kyang brtag go/ yid 'phrog mas brtags
5889(): nas yang smras pa dang / des brtags na'ang bden par mthong nas/ de nas des gtsug gi nor bu de dang gos shig yid 'phrog ma la byin nas spras pa/ bu mo khyod dus la ma bab par ma 'gro zhig/ de lta na lo
5890(): mo la kha mchu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos ji skad bstan pa'i rim pa bzhin du khrus la chas te/ khrag gis gang pa'i rdzing du zhugs nas phyin pa dang / de nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la bram ze
5891(): rnams kyi lces bldags so// ci tsam na mi 'am ci'i bu mo khrid de shog ces bsgo ba dang / de ma thag kho nar yid 'phrog ma nam mkha' la 'phags te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni reg dang phrad pa dang /
5892(): bdag ni rgad dang brtses pa las/ ba lang mo btags thar pa ltar// da ni bdag mo 'gro bar bya// rgyal pos nam mkha'i lam las 'gro bar mthong nas/ de skrag ste/ mdun na 'don la smras pa/ gang
5893(): gi phyir 'bad par bya ba de ma grub par/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma zos so// mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha da ni don grub ste/ dngos sdig dang bral lags so// de nas yid 'phrog ma nam mkha'i
5894(): lam las 'gro ba na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yang bdag gnas skabs 'di thob pa de ni drang srong des brtan pa las gyur gyis/ gal te des ma bstan na ni bdag bzung zhing 'gro/
5895(): bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/ de lta bas na re shig drang srong de'i drung du 'gro'o snyam nas/ de de'i bsti gnas su song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/ drang srong la smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod kyis bstan pas
5896(): bdag bzung ste mchis nas/ mis reg pa rnams thob cing srog gi bar chad du cung zhig gis ma gyur to// de bas gsol ba ni gal te na gzhon nu nor bzangs bdag 'chol zhing mchis na/ de la bdag gi sor
5897(): gdub 'di stsol la 'di skad kyang gsung ba'i rigs so// gzhon nu lam yang ba bgrod par dka' ste/ nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis slar gzhud cig/ gal te bzlog kyang mchis su ma gtub na/ de la
5898(): lam bstan pa'i rigs kyis/ gnon du yid 'brog mas bstan pa/ byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum mchis so// de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na gsum/ de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na gsum mchis
5899(): so de dag brgal ba na ri'i rgyal po gangs can mchis so// de'i byang phyogs na ri bo phur pa'i rtse mchis so// de nas lam du chu sgra can dang / seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod
5900(): dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can dang / bur ba'i dbyibs 'dra ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / rab sgrol te ri bo de dag khyod kyis rgol cig/ de la ri bo seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / phur pa'i dbyibs la
5901(): phug nas 'jug/ rdo rje can la byi'i rgyal po 'jug ste/ thabs de dag gis ri bo de rnams brgal bar bgyi'o// 'khrul 'khor rta gdong can dang / lug lta bu dang / skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can
5902(): dag kyang gzhom par bgyi'o// phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni zho shas gzhom par bgyi'o// gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig/ phug na phyed 'dug mthong na ni/ bdag gi
5903(): slad du gzhu brdungs pas// mda' yis bsnun te bsad par gyis// gang na lug gnyis phan tshun nas/ brdud par byed pa mthong na ni// de gnyis rwa de bcag mdzod dang // lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so//
5904(): 'jigs pa che bskyed mtshon thogs pa'i// lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na// de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang // lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so// srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig/ kha btsum
5905(): gdang ba bgyid gzigs na// de tshe de yi dpral ba la// phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod// de bzhin khron pa glong drag 'khyil// drug bcu'i khro can la khyod mchongs// skra mig seng+ge ltar ser zhing / mi bzad
5906(): bsnyen par dka' ba yi// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag/ gnu bkang de ni bsad mdzod la// chu srin 'dzin khris grang ba yi// chu bo mang po rgol mdzod cig/ nag phye ma leb gdungs dang // sna tshogs dung mo
5907(): rgod pa dang // sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung / na ga na ni srin mo khro// phye ma leb ni mi ma yin// gdungs pa nini 'dzin khri mang // sna tshogs can na 'dod sgyur gzugs// dud mor mi 'am ci yi zin// rgod
5908(): pa na ni mi 'am ci// mna' ma sbrul mang sbrul can na// 'od macan rlung zhal ma li// na ga la ni brtan par bya// phye ma leb la brtul pod bya// gdud par 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo // sna tshog/
5909(): can du klu sna tshogs// dud mo can du yid bde bas// rgod byed du ni mi smra ba'o// sbyor bas kun tu brgal bar mdzod// sbrul can du ri sbrul dug gi/ sngags kyi sbyor ba 'od ma can// klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa yi// sbyor/
5910(): bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod// chu bo rnams brgal nas gcan sa'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te gzhom par mdzod cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so zhes gsungs shig/
5911(): drang srong de la yid 'phrog mas de skad smras nas/ rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te de nas song ngo // de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis ri bor de phab nas skyes khyer te glang po'i grong khyer du 'ongs so zhes rgyal pos
5912(): thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so// de nas gzhon nu ngal sos nas pa'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas mdun du 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod ba/
5913(): bar 'ongs sam/ lha khyod kyi bka' drin gyis ri bor ba phab ste gte'u bzung / sna bo bskos lags te/ dpya dang skyes kyang 'di dag lags kyis// phyag mdzod du gzhug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu legs par
5914(): bzhes so// de nas gzhon nus pa la phyag byas nas chas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gnon nu skyes la lhan cig kho nar longs spyad kyis 'dug cig/ lha bdag gis yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas yun ring zhig lags pas/
5915(): mchis lags so// gzhon nu deng 'gro ba shol la sang song zhig/ de gal gyis mchu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// yab nges par deng nyid bdag mchi lags so// rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas gzhon du
5916(): rang gi khyim du song ba las btsun mo'i pho brang gi sgo dpal gyis stongs par mthong nas/ de sems khong du chud bzhin du zhugs na yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas// phan tshun du rgyu zhing yid 'phrog ma zhes sgra byung ngo // ji tsam ni
5917(): btsun mo rnams 'tshogs nas/ btsun mo de rnams kyis gtam rlung la bskur ba dang / de'i snying la zug rngus thug pas yang nas yang du dris pa las/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pas de myi ngan gyis yid thong bar/
5918(): gyur to// bud med de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha btsun mo'i 'khor 'di ni de bas bud med khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na/ ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ des pa snying rje med cing byas pa chud gson pa mthong
5919(): nas ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/ yum/ yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur cing // gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi/ yid 'brog mni mi gda' na/ bdag gi yid ni gang du
5920(): mchis yid kyis rab tu rgyug snyam na'ang / bdag gi yid ni shin tu rmongs// de dang bral bar gyur pa yis// snying ni shin tu gdungang ba nyid// bdag gi yid du mchi zhing yid 'phrog pa/ yid du 'thang /
5921(): cing yid du dga' ba yi// yid 'phrog dang bral bdag lus gdung ba yi// bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas mchis// des smras pa/ bu yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur
5922(): nas kho mos btang ngo // yum ji ltar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / nges pa snying rje med cing byas pa mi gzo ba yin no// zhes smras nas yang
5923(): smras pa yum gang du mchis/ ba shul ni gang nas/ des smras pa/ gang du yid 'phrog song ba yi// lam yang de ring drang srong dang // seng+ge dag gis rtag bsten cing // chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa
5924(): yin bu btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bud med dag yod na/ ci'i phyir mya ngan byed gzhon nus smras pa/ yum de ma rnyed par bdag dga' bar ga la 'gyur/ nges
5925(): de dbugs phyung yang 'on kyang mya ngan gyis gdungs nas de'i khungs tshol zhing phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams so// de blo skyes pa/ thog mar gang kho na las thob pa de nyid la re shig dri'o snyam nas/ des
5926(): rngon pa spang lab can la dris pa/ khyod kyis yid 'phrog ma gang nas rnyed/ des smras pa/ ri bo che ge mo'i ngos la drang srong zhig gnas te/ de'i bsti gnas na tshangs pa 'du ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing mchis te der
5927(): khrus la zhugs pa las/ drang srong gis bstan nas rnyed do// des bsams pa da ni drang srong gi drung du song ba dang / de las khungs rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo// rgyal pos gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba
5928(): shin tu yid blong pa'i gtam de zos so// de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gnon nu khyod yid blong du ci yod// da ni de bas khyad par 'phags pa'i rlung ma sbyin no// des smras pa/ yab bdag ni de ma lags pa'i mchis
5929(): brang gi 'khor dang mchis pas rngom thog lags so// rgyal pos de la lan du ma smras kyang ma rdzogs so// de nas rgyal pos grong khyer gyi sgo dang ra ba'i khar/ ci nas kyang gzhon nu phyir mi 'chor ba'i phyir skyes bu
5930(): bsrungs ma dag bkod do// de nas gzhon nu ni mtshan thog thag mi nyal bar gyur to// de nas gzhon nu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag sgo nas song na/ rgyal po'i sgo bsrungs pa gtum po dag yod de
5931(): de rnams kyis bdag chad pas gcod pa 'am srog dang bral bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang bsrungs ma med pa'i lam nas 'gro'o snyam nas/ de mtshan mo langs te ut+pal sngon po'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings
5932(): pa'i phreng ba rgyal mtshan la btags nas gang na bsrung mi med pa de nas babs par zla ba shar ro// de nas des zla ba la bltas nas/ yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i smre sngags 'di lta bu dag 'don par byed te/ zla ka N+ya
5933(): skar rgyal po mtshan mo gsal mdzad kyi/ khyod ni sngar ma'i mig tu sdug pa'i sde dpon bzang / ci gang bdag gi sdug pa ut+pal lta bu'i mig/ yid 'phrog ces bgyi khyod kyi sa stengs gzigs lags sam// zhes
5934(): smras nas/ sngon gyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba dran zhing song ba las ri dgas mo zhig mthong nas de la'ang smras pa/ kye ma ri dgas mo khyod rtswa chu lo ma za/ khyod ni legs 'gyur ba der spyod bdag ni rngon pa min/
5935(): ri dgas mo ltar mig dkyus ring ba gzungs bzang ba// bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam// de de nas song ste phyogs gzhan zhig tu song ba dang / tshal me tog dang 'bras bus mdzes
5936(): narnams sa sa sa b+hU y+YA/ sa /
5937(): rgyum mas su sa rnams sa /
5938(): smras pa kyi ma skam nag shing lo su rdzogs dang / mas dpal yin nas drud pa'i tshigs 'byi / khyod kyi dug pa'i ma nga 'dod rtags pa mim dus// dag gi gas
5939(): sa gyu / nas kya byigs ga nga nga/ lag shigs das yong // yongs kyang bad+hA sa smra
5940(): sngan shing la gnas pa'i// 'dab chags tshogs kyi rgyal bzud med mi 'dug pa// sa hU~M ba ste bu'i dri ming mdzes pa'i rig/ bdag gi ying 'brog ces kyi stod kyis mdzod rgya / /
5941(): nas kyang song ba dang / shing ma ngam tshang zhes bya ba me tog thams cad rgyas pa zhig mthong nas/ ming gi rnam grangs dgra shis zhes brjod pas// sto pa rnams kyi rgyal por gyur pa la// yid 'dzin/
5942(): mya ngan gyis ni thong ba bdag/ zil mo sbyor na khyod kyis mya nganasol// bkra shis ming 'brog srur du spang bar mdzod// de de slar ring blang bzhin du rim gyis drang srang de'i bsti gnas su byin te/ des
5943(): srong de la phyag byas nas dul ba dang bcas pas spras pa/ bzod 'phags gos su shing shun dang ni g.yang gzhi mnabs// rtsa ba myu gu sU ru bil ba ka pud gsol// drang srong mgos btud khyod la phyag 'tshal/
5944(): yid 'brog ma// khyod kyis gzigs sam khyod ni bdag la myur du gsungs// de nas drang srong des gzhon nu nor bzangs la/ byin pa legs zhes bya ba dang / stan gding ba bya ba la sogs pas yang dag par
5945(): dga' bar byas nas spras pa/ smin ma 'jam pa'i smin tshugs mthon mthing bzhin legs mthong na dga' ba'i gzugs 'chang ba// bzhin ras zla ba nya 'dra ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i mig de bdag gis mthong /
5946(): dpon khyod bag rkyong bzhugs te rtsa ba 'bras bu sna tshogs gsol bar mdzod cig dang // slad kyis bde blag 'byon 'gyur 'di la bdag gi yid la the tshom yod ma mchis// smin ma bzang mos 'di skad tshig smras te//
5947(): gzhon nu khyod la srid pas bdag mi bde// nags khrod gnas pa'ang sdug bsngal chen po ste// gshegs par gyur na nges par bdag mthong ngo // des sor gdub kyi rgyan 'di byin nas smras pa/ lam yang
5948(): ba la bgrod dka' bas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis slar log cig/ gal te bzlog kyang 'dug tu ma btub na de la lam bstan par rigs so// de yang 'di skad ces bstan te byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum
5949(): yod do// de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum/ de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum yod do// de dag brgal ba dang ri'i rgyal po gangs can zhes bya ba yod de phyogs 'di na sman blang bar bya ste/
5950(): 'di lta ste shin tu 'o ma 'dzag ces bya ba'i sman yod de de mar la bcos nas btung bar bya'o// des ni skom pa dang bkres pa med cing dran pa dang mthu stobs 'phel bar sh+tsa I'u zhig kyang bkri/
5951(): bar bya/ gsang sngags kyang bsgrub par bya'o// gzhu mda' dang bcas pa dang / nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang / drug gsod pa'i sman dug sel dang / lcags kyi phur pa gsum dang / pi wang yang bcad par
5952(): bya'o/ ri'i rgyal po gangs can gyi byang phyogs na ri phur pa'i rtse yod do// ces pa la sogs pa yid 'brog ma'i 'phrin rnams ji lta ba bzhin bsnyad do// de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis ji skad bstan pa'i sman
5953(): dang gsang sngags dang sman dug sel gyi sbyor ba rnams btsal ba'i phyir drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo // de nas des spre'u ma gtogs par ji skad bstan pa thams cad sta gon byas nas/
5954(): de rnams khyer te drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang / des de la spre'u byin nas smras pa/ gzhon nu 'bad pa 'di yis ci bya/ yid 'phrog ma ci dgos so// khyod gcig pu grogs med pa/ lus gdon za bar
5955(): 'gyur gyis mthong / gzhon nus smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag ni gdon mi za bar mchi'o// ci'i slad zhe na/ mkhas pa zla ba rgyu ba grogs shig ga las mchis// mche ba'i mthu stobs ldan pa'i
5956(): ri dgas gtso bo dang / me yis nags bsregs pa na grogs shig ga la mchis// bdag lta bu la grogs po mthu ldan ci zhig 'tshal// kye ci rgya mtsho che chur 'jug par mi bgyi 'am// ci lags sbrul gyis
5957(): zin ces gso bar mi bgyi 'am// sems can srungs can gyis bsnyen brtson 'grus cher brtsams te/ gal te 'bad de ma rungs 'di la nyes pa med// de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs yid 'bros/
5958(): mas bstan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang chas te rims kyis ri dang chu bo dang phug dang g.yang sa la sogs par sman dang gsang sngags dang sman dug sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas/ mi
5959(): 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / gzhon rus grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa/ skyed mos kyi tshal me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pas mdzes par
5960(): byas par bya sna tshogs kyis bsnyen pa/ rdzing bu dang mtshe'u ring po dang gru bzhi dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo rnams kyis bskor ba de la/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo rnams chu len du 'ongs pa mthong ba dang /
5961(): de nas gnod du nor bzangs kyis de rnams la smras pa/ chu mang po 'dis ci zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis
5962(): pa de mi'i lag tu son par gyur pas/ de'i mi'i dri bshal ba lags so// gzhon nu ror bzangs kyis dris pa/ ci bum pa 'di dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de'i steng nas blug gam 'on
5963(): te rims kyis/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ rims kyis so// des bsams pa/ thabs 'di bzang ste/ sor gdub kyi rgyan 'di bum pa cig gi nang du gzhug go snyam nas/ des mi 'am
5964(): ci'i bu mo cig gi bum par mi tshor bar bcug nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo de la smras pa/ khyod kyi bum pa 'dis thog mar yid 'phrog ma la khrus byos shig/ des bsams pa
5965(): gdon mi za bar 'di la dgos pa zhig yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des bum pa thog mar yid 'phrog ma'i spyi bor blug pa las/ ji tsam na sor gdub kyi rgyan pang du lhung ba dang / yid 'phrog mas de
5966(): phrigs so// de nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo de la dris pa/ 'dir mi zhig ma 'ongs sam/ des smras pa mchis so// song la de dben pa zhig tu zhog zhig/ des nang du khrid nas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go//
5967(): de nas yid 'phrog mas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yab gal te bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa/ gzhon nu nor bzangs de mchis na de la khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ des smras pa/ de mi
5968(): yin te/ cir mi rung / ngas de dum bu brgyar byas la phyogs bzhir gtor te btang ngo // yid 'phrog mas spras pa/ yab mir gyur pas 'dir ga la mchis/ bdag nyid de skad mchir bas so// de nas mi
5969(): 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/ de kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/ gal te gzhon nu de 'ongs na/ ngas khyod rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ nor dang yo byad mang po
5970(): dang mi 'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/ de la chung ma'i don du sbyin no// de nas yid 'phrog ma dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rab tu dga' bas/ gzhon nu nor bzangs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mi 'am
5971(): ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bstan to// de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pas gzhon nu nor bzangs gzugs bzang po mdzes pa/ lha na sdug pa kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong ngo // mthong nas
5972(): kyang shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de nas de ba gam 'dod nas/ gser gyi sdong po bdun/ shing ta la bdun pag bdun btsugs so// gnon nu nor bzangs ni byang chub sems dpa' yin la/ byang chub
5973(): sems dpa' rnams ni gzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin no// de rnams kyang de gegs med par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gar dang /
5974(): glu dang pi wang dang / 'khar rnga dang / shin tu sgra snyan dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / rdza rnga la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bud cing
5975(): mi'am ci stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas/ ral gri ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra ba thogs te/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas mthong bar gser gyi sdong po'i drung du song nas chu shing la gcod
5976(): pa bzhin du sdong 'dus bu dum bur gcod par brtsams te/ de nas yungs 'bru tsam du blags so// mangs shing rdul bdun dang / sla bdun dang / phag bdun gtsang mar phyung ste/ ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo
5977(): bar gnas so// de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang mi 'am ci brgya stong phrag du mas/ a la la zhes ca co dang gzha'i sgra chen po phyung ngo // mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de lta bu mthong zhing thos nas
5978(): shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to// de nas mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma 'dra ba sha stag stong gi dbus su yid 'phrog ma bzhag nas/ nor bzangs la smras pa/ gzhon nu tshur
5979(): yid 'phrog ma ngo shes par gyis shig/ de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis de ngo shes par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod ni ljon pa'i bu yin la/ kho bo'i sdug/
5980(): pa yid 'brog yin zhe na// bden pa 'di yis myur ba kho nar ni// yid 'phrog gom pas myur du 'gro bar shog/ ces smras pa dang / de nas de ma thag tu gom pas song ba dang / mi 'am rtsa
5981(): rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di ni stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang pha rol shin tu gnon pa lags te/ yid 'phrog ma dang thab rir bab lags na/ ci'i slad du 'di la tho 'tsham
5982(): 'di la yid 'phrog ma stsol cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams kyis rjes su bsngags pa dang / mi 'am ci rnams kyi rjes su 'dun pas/ gzhon nu nor bzangs la
5983(): bkur sti chen po byas nas/ yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams kyis mngon par brgyan te lag pa g.yon pas bzung / gser gyi bya ma bum lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas/ nor bzangs kyi drung du song
5984(): steste spras pa/ gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma 'di mi 'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/ kho bos khyod la chung ma'i phyir byin gyis mi rnams ni ngo mi rtag pa yin gyis/ ji ltar yang 'di mdor cig/
5985(): yab bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las mnyan nas/ mi 'am ci'i gnas kyi gang pa na yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig sil snyan rnams kyis rtse bar/
5986(): byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi yul dran nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur nas yid 'phrog
5987(): ma la smras pa/ pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gnon par gyur to// de nas yid 'phrog mas de ltar gyur pa dag pa la rgyas par smras so// des smras pa/ gzhon nu dang
5988(): lhan cig song la mi rnams ni slu bar byed pa yin gyis/ khyod kyis bag yod par byos shig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ nor bu dang mu tig dang gser la sogs pa mang du
5989(): brdzangs te btang nas des yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha'i lam la/ mi 'am ci'i shugs kyis chas pa na/ rims kyis glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du phyin no// de nas glang ba
5990(): khyim du grong khyer rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang gyo mgo rnams bsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dar gyi chun 'phyang dpyangs/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan btsugs/ shin tu dri
5991(): zhim ze'i spos por dag bshams/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bkram te/ dga' dga' ltar byas so// de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs mi'i gtso bo stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / yid 'drim
5992(): ma dang lhan cig tu glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du bzhugs so// de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag khyer te ba'i drung du song nas
5993(): rgyal po'i stan gyi gru zhig tu 'dug ste/ mi 'am ci'i grong khyer du song ba dang / 'ongs pa rnams rgyas par smras so// de nas rgyal po nor can gyis 'di ni shin tu stobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol
5994(): gnon pa can zhes bya bar rig nas/ rgyal por dbang bskur to// gzhon nus bsams pa/ gang dag yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig 'tshogs pa dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur
5995(): pa 'di ni sngon byas pa'i rgyu'i khyad par yin gyis/ ma la da bdag gis sbyin pa dag ni btang / bsod nams dag ni bya'o snyam nas/ des glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i
5996(): mchod sbyin byas so// gang na mthu chen blo gros ldan pa dag/ 'jig rten mtshungs par spyod pa dpal ldan pa/ de dang de yi rjes su 'jug par ston// 'dul ba'i tshul 'ang bla na med pa yin// gang
5997(): stobs dang pha rol gnon pa'i mthus// 'dul ba'i tshe na rnam pa 'di 'dra sto// de yang 'jig rten spyod las gzhan gyur pa// mthun par 'jig rten gsal bar ston pa yin// rgyal ba'i sras rnams rnam
5998(): pa sna tshogs mdzad pa yis// 'gro ba'i chu gzhir rgyu skar zla 'od dang bcas pa// gsal ba bzhin du rang gi mthu rnams 'jug byed pa// 'di yang 'jig rten snang ba'i rgyur gyur lags pa snyam/ de lta bas na
5999(): skyes bu dam pa rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pas 'jig rten gyi don byed par 'gyur ro zhes thabs mkhas pa bsngags pa dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyi nang du brtson 'grus kyi khyad par
6000(): bstan pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du spyod pa'i stobs bstan pa'ang yin no// nor bzangs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te brgyad bcu brgyad pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bya
6001(): dka' ba chen pos pha ma la sri zhu byed cing bdag nyid kyi lus dang srog la'ang mi lta bar bya dka' ba'i spyod pa du ma dag gis rnam par smin pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ba'i chos la reg par
6002(): 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba bskal pa tshad med pa 'das pa'i snga rol na/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
6003(): pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste/ dam pa'i chos tha ma gzugs brnyan la spyod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi'i bdag po ma hA rA dza ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i pho brang ni bA ra NA sa zhes bya'o//
6004(): sa'i bdag po de la rgyal phran ni drug cu zam pa/ blon po ni bzhi stong btsun mo dam pa ni khri/ grong khyer ni brgyad khri la dbang thob par gyur to// rgyal po de la rgyal bu dam pa gsum zhig kyang yod de
6005(): dag kyang so sor rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la spyod par gyur to// sa yi dbang phyug rnams kyi bsod nams mthu// rab tu gsal zhing dus la bab pa yis// ston ka'i dpal gyis rab tu brgyan gyur pa'i/
6006(): yang ngo bzhin du lhag par rnam par gsal// rab tu lhang nge gsal ba'i zla 'od kyang // sgra gcan rkyen gyis cig car mdzes mi 'gyur// de ltar rgyal po de byams pa'i rang bzhin/
6007(): gyis rang gi srid legs par bskyangs su zin kyang / sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas/ blong po thams cad kyi nang chen sgra gcan zhes bya ba sems ma rangs par gyur te rgyal po chen po de'i srog la gnod pa/
6008(): byas so// de ltar rgyal po de bsad nas kyang dmag gi tshogs chen po bzhi bkye nas rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang bsad de rgyal po tha chung gi steng du'ang dmag drang bar bshams so// 'jig rten na ni ma rab
6009(): dag tshul min spyod pas rab tu phung // bdag gzhan rlag par byed pa la// tshul bzhin spyod pa bzhin du sems// de ltar ngan par spyod pa chen po bdag gzhan thams cad phung bar byed pa ngan pa'i
6010(): bdag nyid can gyi rnon po des/ rgyal bu de la dpag drangs te gzhom par bsams so// rgyal bu de yang rang bzhin gyis// dge zhing gzugs byung phun sum tshogs// gcig tu dam pa'i
6011(): chos lam dga'// rnam par dag pa'i tshul zhugs pas// de la lha rnams rab tu dga'// bsod nams dpal gyis lhag par mdzes// de la bu ni gcog yod pa// de ming su sha de ba zhes
6012(): lha rnams kun gyis bsgrags par gyur// de ni yid gzhungs gsal zhing des pa dang // gzhon yang rgan pa'i nye bar zhi la gnas// sbyin la dga' zhing ser sna rnam par spangs// 'gro ba rnams
6013(): kyi yid bzhin spyod par gyur// de ltar rgyal po yab sras de'i bsod nams kyi mthu las grub pa pho brang bsrung ba'i lha zhig gis rgyal po ma hA rA dza dang / gcen gnyis kyang blon po sgra gcan gyis bcog
6014(): par gyur nas dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po mi thogs par 'dir myur du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po khyod kyang sreg 'tsho ba'i phyir yul gzhan du 'gro bar rigs so// de skad ces zer ba zos nas
6015(): spu zing zhes byed cing mya ngan gyis yid gdungs nas sa la 'gyel par gyur to// slar dran pa rnyed nas lha de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di skad gzugs mi snang bar brjod pa su yin// tshig 'di yang
6016(): dag par bden nam/ lhas smras pa/ bdag ni pho brang bsrung ba'i lha yin te// des na rgyal po khyod la sbran pa yin gyis de bas na re shig sdug bsngal las thar pa'i don du yul gzhan du byol zhing 'gro/
6017(): ba'i rigs so// de nas rgyal po de 'di ltar sems par mngon no// kye ma'o blon po sdig pa can// sgra gcan gtum po ma rungs pas// phan pa'i lan du gnod byas te// rgyal po yab kyang ma
6018(): rungs byas// bdag la'ang dgra bo bzhin du sems// 'dir ni lha yis bstan pa bzhin// bdag kyang gzhan du 'gror zad med// 'di ltar nyam nyes gyur pa la// su yang grogs su sems pa med// /
6019(): gcig pur 'gro bar rigs pa snyam// de nas rgyal po de bdag nyid kyi 'khor du gtogs pa rnams kyis kyang gnod pa byas kyis dogs pa'i 'jigs pa skyes te bdag nyid gcig pu yul pha rol gyi
6020(): rgyal po gzhan zhig gi drung du 'gro bar bsams nas zhag bdun gyi bza' ba tsam dang bcas te pho brang gi phyir byung nas slar yang rgyal bu su sha de bal chags pa'i dbang gis pho zang /
6021(): du zhugs te rgyal bu de pang du blangs nas mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing 'dug go// de de ltar skrag cing mdog nyams la mya ngan gyis non pa btsun mo dam pas mthong nas dogs pa skyes te smras pa/ rgyal po chen po
6022(): yi phyir lung shin tu skrag pa bzhin du mdzad// gang gis khyed thugs 'gal gyur pa'i// gtam zhig gsan pa ma lags grang // rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bo ci nyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyis ma smra zhig/
6023(): btsun mos gsol pa/ bdag dang rgyal po lus tha dad du sdang yang sems gcig pa lta bu lags na ci'i phyir mi gsung / de nas rgyal pos btsun mos nan tan du gsol ba rigs nas smras pa/ blon po/
6024(): sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas yab rgyal po dang gcen gnyis kyang dkrongs te/ da dmag dang bcas pa nga la rgol du 'ongs pas kho bo yul gzhan du 'gro'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal bu de pang du blangs
6025(): te lam du zhugs so// btsun mo de yang rgyal bu'i phyi bzhin du song ngo // de nas rgyal po btsun mor bcas pa de dag kyang // mya ngan mun pas blo ni kun tu g.yogs gyur pas// pha rol bgrod pa'i lam
6026(): yang ring du zhugs gyur te// 'tsho ba'i yo byad shin tu nyung bar gyur pa yis// ring zhig lon nas de dag brgyags kyang zad par gyur// de ltar mya ngan dgon pa mi'i rgyu 'grul med pa der 'gro ba'i
6027(): lam yang ring bar zhugs/ gcig gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad la gsum gyis kyang zos par gyur pas/ de'i bza' ba'i dngos po cung zad tsam yang med par gyur te rgyal po dang btsun mo nyams thag nas sa
6028(): la 'dre ldog cing skad phyung ste smre sngags 'di dang 'di dag 'don no// kye ma sngon tshe bdag cag gis// sdig pa'i las ni ci zhig byas// dam pa'i chos la skur pa sngon byas sam// dgra bcom pasad
6029(): dam dge 'dun mthun pa phye// 'on te pha ma bsad pa'i las byas sam// ci yi rkyen gyis 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyur// legs pa'i srid lam bzhag pa mi shes shing sa yi bdag po gnyis par
6030(): gyur bzhin du// ci zhig 'dod nas bka' drin khyad du gsod// sdig can blon po chos min lam du zhugs// kye mo'o lha rnams zad dam mthu chung ngam// grags pa zad dam 'on te gud du dong // kye ma'o rgya
6031(): hud bdag cag kyang // nyes pa cung zad med pa la// mi zad srog la rgol byed pa// 'chi bdag sngon du 'ongs pa bzhin// dbugs 'byir tshig kyang yong mi thos// bdag cag ma rungs gyur gyis med//
6032(): de ltar smre sngags du ma 'don cings la 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang / rgyal pos bsams pa/ gsum char gcig tu 'di kho nar shi bar 'gyur gyis btsun mo bsad la/ bdag dang bu'i srog thar
6033(): bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas ral gri phyung ste/ btsun mo bsad par gzas pa dang / rgyal bus rgyal po'i lag pa nas bzung ste de ci zhig mdzad ces gsol ba dang / yab rgyal pos mig mchi mas
6034(): gang bzhin du rgyal bul 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyim btsun mo bsad la khyod kyi srog gso bar bya'o snyam mo// gal te ma bsad na'ang rang 'chi bar 'gyur te khro bo na'i ni 'am/
6035(): gson yang rung na/ bu khyod kyi srog gso ba'i phyir khyod kyi ma btsun mo bsad na snyam mo/ de nas rgyal bus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te btsun mo bsad par gyur na de'i sha la bdag
6036(): mi 'tshal te gang na'ang ma'i sha bus za ba mi srid pas bdag kyang 'chi bar gyur na/ yab rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum te pha ma'i srog thar bar mi mdzad/ yab rgyal pos des skad smras pa thos nas me
6037(): la 'khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'dre zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma'o gang phyir kag gi mig/ phyung ste za ba ga la srid// de bas lhag par gzhon sha can// rab tu sdug pa'i bu dag ni//
6038(): bsad nas su zhig za bar byed// kyi dung bdag ni ma rungs gyur// de skad ces smras nas mya ngan gyi shugs kyis sems blong blong por gyur te 'dug go// yang rgyal bu thabs mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis
6039(): yab yum la gsol pa/ yab yum bdag gis gsol pa gcig gcig ma gnang na/ byams pa'i yab yum ma lags pas/ bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas yab rgyal po
6040(): smras pa bu khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya yis/ ci gsol ba smros shig/ rgyal bus gsol pa/ yab yum byams pa'i rang bzhin can// bdag la brtse bar mdzad dgongs na/ nyin re bzhin du
6041(): bdag lus la// cha shas gsum tsam shA bcad de// cha re yab yum gnyis la 'bul// cha shas bdag la stsal ba yis// bdag kyang nyam nyes mi 'gyur zhing // zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas su / kha ros/
6042(): gshegs par mdzad du gsol// bdag gis gsol ba ma gnang na// mya ngan dgon pa gzhan med la// bgrod par dka' bas ma rungs 'gyur// bdag dang yab yum bcas pa 'dir// dus gcig
6043(): 'gum par gyur pa na// dgra rnams mngon du dga' bar 'gyur// de bas tshul 'di rigs pa lags// zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig snyad pa de dang de dag gis gsol ba btab pas/ yab rgyal po dang
6044(): btsun mos kyang / de ni bden no snyam nas gsol ba gnang ste nyin re bzhin du rgyal bu su sha de ba'i lus las sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de 'tshe ba'i yo byad byas te lam du zhugs so// de ltar dong
6045(): ba las yul pha rol tu nyi ma gnyis kyis sleb pa'i sar rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha thams cad zad nas srog gi lhag ma tsam lus te sa la 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos skad chen
6046(): po phyung ste cho nges btab nas/ bdag cag gnyis ni ma rig dbang gyur te// khyod ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal nyam nyes song // pha rol bgrod pa'i lam yang da dung ring // kyi hud rab tu sdug pa'i bu dang bral
6047(): mya ngan shugs kyis 'dir ni bdag sems bsregs// sgra gcan gtum po sngon du ma bsad pa// 'dir ni blun po'i dbang gis mtshar cig byas// zhes pa la sogs pa'i smre sngags de dang de dag 'od/
6048(): tonade lta bu'i gnas skabs na'ang rgyal bu de bdag nyid kyi lus kyi shes pa ma la srid zhu byas pa des yid mgu bar gyur nas bdag gi sems rab tu dang zhing brtan pa bstan/
6049(): pa'i phyir yab yum la gsol pa/ da 'di nas pha rol tu zhag gcig gi lam tsam las ma lus te/ bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyod par ma nus pas srog 'dir 'dor ro// yab yum gnyis ni mi ma rabs/
6050(): ngan pa ltar 'dir lhan cig bdag la chags par ma mdzad cig/ shin tu byams pa'i bdag nyid can// yab yum bdag la dgongs su gsol// 'dir ni 'gum par 'gyur ba la// bdag ni sdug bsnga
6051(): ma mchis te// yab yum mthu yi khyad par gyis// don chen grub pa gzigs su gsol// mi gtsang khyab pa'i lus 'di yang // de ring rin chen mchog tu gyur// yab yum pha rol bder gshegs pas//
6052(): bdag ni rnyed pa chen po rnyed// de bas gsol ba gsan nas ni// slar yang bdag gi lus 'di la// yod pa'i sha rnams bsnams nas ni// pha rol byon te don yod mdzod// pha rol grags pa'i
6053(): rgyal po yis// gnyen byas rgyal srid bde bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yongs su bskul bar nges so// de nas rgyal po yab yum gnyis po mya ngan dang /
6054(): bcas bzhin bdag gi bu gson par 'gyur ba'i skabs med par rig nas/ de ltar gsol ba lta bu'i don la'ang bsams te/ sha thams cad zad par yang gtogs nas yab yum yul pha rol tu
6055(): song ngo // de ltar rgyal bus la 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang / phyogs bcu nas sha khrag gi dris mngon par bskul ba bzhin du/ sbrang bu dang sha sbrang la sogs pa sha za ba'i srog chags du ma 'dus
6056(): te zos par gyur to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i mthu 'di la brten nas thog ma med pa nas kyi sgrib pa thams cad kun tu byang zhing sems can thams cad sdug bsngal
6057(): gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ bdag gi lus la za bar byed pa'i srog chags thams cad kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las grol thar bar gyur cig ces smon par byas pa dang /
6058(): de nas de yi lhag bsam mthu yis der// sa chen ri dang bcas pa rab tu g.yos// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyang dga' ba'i gos gyon bzhin// kun tu 'khrug cing dus las 'das pa byung // nyi ma'i 'od kyang mog
6059(): mog por byed pa// dus tshigs 'od bzhin phyogs kun gsal bar khyab// lhun po g.yos pas ljon shing yal ga bzhin// lha yi gzhal med khang rnam kun tu g.yo// de la brten nas 'di yi rgyu gang
6060(): zhes lha yi dbang po'i yid la dogs pa skyes// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa yis// bya dka'i spyod pas 'jig rten brten par rig/ e ma ho 'di ni bden nam rdzun// bdag nyid ma sbyangs pa
6061(): rnams ni// lus dang srog la ltos med pa// 'di ni 'jig rten yod ma yin// de ltar de la sems dpar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de ba gam pa'i phyir// sing+ge dang stag la sogs pa
6062(): gcan zan khro mo du ma'i gzugs su sprul te/ rgyal bu ga la ba der song nas de la 'jigs par byed pa bzhin du bsdigs so// de dag la byams pa'i shugs kyis rgyal bus spras
6063(): pa khyed rnams kho bo za 'dod na ci bde bar zo zhig/ 'dri 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs ci dgos// de nas dbang po lha'i dbang po brgya byin de la ya mtshan che bar gyur te/ bdag nyid kyi lha'i
6064(): gzugs bzang po nor bu'i rna cha g.yo ba bstan nas de'i drung du 'dug ste smras pa/ kye 'di lta bu'i bya dka' ba la brten nas lha'i rgyal po'am bdud nam tshangs pa'on te 'khor lo bsgyur ba 'dod
6065(): rgyal bus smras pa/ lha'i dbang po gzigs su gsol/ bdag 'di ltar bgyid pa'i don brjod par bya'o// bdag ni tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal po thob par 'dod pa min/
6066(): srid pa'i rgya mtshor lhung ba'i 'gro ba rnams// zar byed rdzogs pa'i byang chub de 'dod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni shin tu'ang gti mug can cig yin pa lta/ bla na med pa'i byang chub ni yun
6067(): ring por bya dka' ba dpag tu med pas bsgrubs pa yin no zhes grag na/ khyod kyis 'khor ba na sdug bsngal ba bzod dam/ rgyal bus smras pa/ gal te lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba bdag gi
6068(): spyi bo'i steng du rgyun du 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi tshig 'di la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ rgyal
6069(): bus smras pa/ de tsam yid mi ches bzhin du bdag la dri ba ci ched che/ 'on kyang 'di la khyed mgu bar bya'i lha'i dbang po gsan du gsol/ gal te tshig 'di thun bu na// bdag gi lus
6070(): 'di nam du yang // sdug bsngal bzhin du gnas par gyur// rma yang 'tshe bar ma gyur cig/ gal te brjod pa don mthun na// gzhon shar bcas pa'i lus gyur to// dpal dang gzi brjid
6071(): kyis brgyar zhing // khrag kyang 'o mar 'gyur bar shog/ de skad ces smras ma thag tu rgyal bu'i lus snga ma bzhin du gyur te dpal dang gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan par gyur to// de nas brgya
6072(): byin lha'i dbang po yid mgu bar gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa le gso legs so// shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus can// khyod ni byang chub ring ma yin// ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'gyur//
6073(): de tshe thog mar bdag nyid la// chos kyi bka' drin stsal du gsol// zhes brjod de mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo // pha ma gnyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus pha rol
6074(): gyi rgyal po'i drung du legs par sleb nas rgyal po des kyang rgyang ring mo nas bsus te yo byad rnams yid bzhin du sbyar zhing rgyal bu'i spyod pa rmad du byung ba de thos nas slar dpung gi tshogs chen
6075(): bo bshams te yul bA ra NA sir dmag drangs so// de'i tshe rgyal bu gang du lus pa'i sa der rus pa dag bsdu'o snyam du bsams ti sa phyogs der phyin pa na snga ma bas kyang ches gzugs bzang zhing
6076(): mdzes par gyur nas drung du 'ongs so// de nas skye bo dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa// gus pa'i yid can rnams kyis mdun bdar te// sos ka'i sprin chen blo bur langs pa bzhin//
6077(): ru mtshon ba dan bcas pa'i 'od 'phro zhing // rnga sgra'i brag chas ri klung kun tu gang // dgra bo'i tshigs rnams kun tu zil mnan bzhin// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pas rang gi yul du
6078(): phyin pa dang de'i bsod nams kyi mthus dgra thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob par gyur te srid thams cad kun tu bde bar gyur to// de lta bu'i phyis byung ba'ang bcom ldan 'das
6079(): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de tshe rgyal po de ni zas gtsang yin// lha mo sgyu 'phrul de ni btsun mor gyur// lus kyi sha yis srid zhu byas pa ni// rgyal bur gyur pa de ni nga nyid yin// da tshe brgya byin lha yi dbang po/
6080(): de 'di na kun shes ko'u Di n+ya'o// zhes gsungs so// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bya dka' ba'i go cha'i stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mthun pa'i
6081(): mdo sde dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du pha ma la gus pa'i dbang gis srid zhu bya ba la'ang brjod par bya'o// su sha de ba'i skyes pa'i rabs te brgyad bcu dgu pa'o// // skyes
6082(): bu dam pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi stobs ni dpag tu med pa yin no// de yang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rab tu 'byor zhing rgyas pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba zhig tu rgya'o//
6083(): gsal stobs zhes bya ba dang de'i btsun mo rnam par sba ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la bu lnga zhig yod par gyur te/ de'i bu chen po ni gzugs shin tu mdzes pas gzugs stobs zhes bya'o//
6084(): gnyis pa ni brtson 'grus ldan zhes bya'o// gsum pa ni bzo ldan zhes bya'o// bzhi pa ni shes rab ldan zhes bya'o// lnga pa ni bsod nams kyi stobs zhes bya ste/ gang gi tshe btsun mo rnam par sba ba
6085(): la bu lnga po de nyid mngal du chags pa de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i khyad par gyi lhas dag byung ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang de yi 'khor yug tu// gser gyi char pa kun tu bab par gyur// lha yi bla re rin chen gyis spras
6086(): pa btsun mo'i steng du bres pa bzhin du byung // gang gi tshe rgyal po gsal stobs kyis ltas de mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ ltas mkhan rnams la smras pa/ kye'i sngon ma byung ba'i mtshan
6087(): ma ngag byung ba 'di ci zhig las gyur/ lhas mkhan rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha 'di ni btsun mo'i lhums su sras gang zhugs pa de bsod nams kyis che ba zhig mchis te de'i bsod nams las
6088(): gyur to// de skad smras pa thos nas rgyal po de// ngo mtshar skyes shing rab tu rangs gyur pas// rgyal po'i pho brang rab tu 'byor pa rnams// legs par brgyan pas mchog tu mdzes par byas//
6089(): btsun mo de yi lhag pa'i bsam pa bzhin// gser dngul ringo chen gos dbyig thams cad kyis// dngul po rnams ni yongs su tshim par byas// brtson rar gnas pa rnams kyang thar byas shing /
6090(): kun dga' dga' ston bzang po rgyas par gyur// de ri skyes bu dam pa de yi mthu// de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dam pa de'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa la 'di lta bu
6091(): skyes te/ gang lha rnams kyis seng+ge'i khri nye bar bshams te bdag de la 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bstan kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems par gyur pa na/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho/
6092(): drang kun tu legs par brgyar cing btsun mo dam pa de bud med kyi 'khor gyis bskor nas lha'i bu mo bzhin du skye bo dag gi mig dang yid 'phrog par byed cing skye bo mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ste
6093(): sems can gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i byams pa lte bar gnas pas nam mkha' la lta zhing / tshigs su bcad de bden pa'i byin rlabs smras pa/ mi dbang lha yi rnam par grub pa yi// bsod nams stob
6094(): 'phags ci ste bdag la yod// bden pa des ni de ring lha rnams kyis// myur du bdag gi sed+mor khri shoms shig/ de skad smras me thag tu lha rnams kyis seng+ge'i khri bshams shing // lha'i ma
6095(): tog gi char phab po// de nas btsun mo rnam par smra ba seng+ge'i khri de la 'dug ste nam mkha' la 'phags nas lha rnams kyis rin po che'i bla re bres shing / rgyal po dang bcas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
6096(): rnams dga' ba'i mig dgrad de thal mo sbyar nas 'khod do// de nas btsun mo des sngon ma byung ba'i chos kyi gtam tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bsod nams bsags pas bde ba'ibyung // de phyir mis
6097(): ni bsod nams bya// de yang yang dang yang du bya// de nyid la ni 'dun par bya// de skad ces smras ma thag tu bar snang las legs par smras so// zhes lha rnams kyis sgra phyung ste lha'i rol mo'i sgra
6098(): bsgrags shing gos dang rgyan gyi phreng ba dag gis kyang gtor ro// de nas btsun mo seng+ge'i khri las babs te rang gi gnas su song ba ni de lta bu'i cho 'phrul de yang med par gyur to// de nas gzhon
6099(): nu nga yongs su btsas par gyur pa na de'i bsod nams kyi khyad par 'di lta bur gyur te/ sa rnams rab tu g.yos shing me tog tshogs// rab tu bkram pas phyogs kun khyab par snang // de tshe mig stong
6100(): ldan pa'i brgya byin yang // zla ba rgyas 'dra'i gdugs ni dkar po dang // rnga yab mdzes pas de la g.yob par byed// lha rnams stong gis mchod pa byed par gyur// rin chen lnga yi gter yang rdol
6101(): gyur te// de tshe skye bo 'phongs pa med par gyur// rta dang glang chen khyu mchog du ma rnams// de yi bsod nams mthu yis dus gcig byung // gzhon nu de yis sngon gyi gnas dran nas// bdag
6102(): nyid kyis ni sngon bzhin tshigs bcad smras// de ni bsod nams rgya chen mthu ldan pas// ming yang bsod nams stobs zhes grags par gyur// de ltar gzhon nu bsod nams stobs//
6103(): dge zhing dpal yon bsam mi khyab// dad dang snying rje che ldan zhing // bdag nyid yongs su sbyangs pa yis// gzhan don yongs su spyod par gyur// de ni 'jig rten 'phangs pa'i dngos po la//
6104(): ser snas sbyin par mi byed gang yang med// rang gi rgyud ni tshul khrims kyis 'phags shing // bzod ldan g.yo sgyu spangs shing rab zhir gyur// de yi grags pas 'dzam
6105(): bu'i gling du khyab// chos don ldan pas lha yi rnga sgra bzhin// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe gzhon nu bsod nams stobs pho bo bzhi dang lhan cig tu 'byor pa mchog gi skyed mos tshal du
6106(): dong ngo de'i tshe yi dgas kha khab lta bu la sogs pa stong phrag du ma dag gzhon nu bsod nams kyi stobs la zas slong bar gyur te gzhon nus de dag mthong ste snying rje chen po'i smon lam gyi
6107(): stobs brjod pa/ bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mthu yis ni// lha yi bza' ba btung ba du ma rnams// 'dir ni thogs pa med par mngon gyur te// yi dgas rnams ni yongs su tshim par
6108(): shog de ltar smon lam gyi mthus yi dgas rnams kyis lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba dag thob cing yi dgas kyi skye gnas las 'phos te dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes par gyur to// de nas
6109(): gzhon nu de dag skyed mos tshal du gtam bya ba'i skabs su bab pa na mi rnams la gtan du phan par byed pa gang yin pa gleng bar byed de// gzhonu gzug dang ldan pa ni rag ya 'di ni skye bo rnams la phan pa/
6110(): yin te/ yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa ni// mthong ba tsam gyis mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur// gzhan gyis bkur ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes// sngon gyi drang srong gis kyang spras pa yin//
6111(): zhes smras so// gzhon nu brtson 'grus can gyis smras pa/ gzugs byed dang ldan pa bas ni brtson 'grus mchog tu gyur pa yin te/ brtson 'grus kyis ni rang bzhin dor grub byed// 'di
6112(): dang phyi me'i 'bras bu myur du sdang // gnod pa bzlog cing phan pa 'byin pas na// brtson 'grus kyis ni thogs pa med par 'gyur// zhes brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i gtam glengs so// de nas gan/
6113(): nu bzo la mkhas pa na raM// bzo'i gnas rnams la yongs su mkhas pa ni mi rnams la phan pa yin te/ sna tshogs las la mkhas rnams ni// mi rnams kyis kyang legs par bkur// de bzhin
6114(): dman pa'ang bzo yi phyir// mi dang lha rnams kyis kyang bkur// zhes bzo dang ldan pa bsngags so// de nas shes rab can gyis smras pa/ de dag pas kyang shes rab ri mi rnams kyi nyams su phan
6115(): cing don thams cad grub par byed pa yin no// shes rab kyis ni gzugs dang bzo// brtson 'grus nor yang thob par 'gyur// mi rnams legs par bde ba che// shes rab kyis ni thams cad 'thob/
6116(): ces shes rab can gyis de skad smras pa la// gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pas bltas te spras pa/ shes rab dang bral ba'i gzugs dang bzo dang brtson 'grus thams
6117(): cad ni nyams su phan pa ma yin la shes rab kyis zin pa ni yongs su phan pas bden mod kyi/ 'on kyang shes rab de yang bsod nams med par 'thob pa ma yin te/ de bas na bsod nams
6118(): phan pa yin no// de bas na 'dir bsod nams kyi tshogs phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ bsod nams dag gis byad gzugs 'thob// bse
6119(): nams kyis ni tshul khrims ldan// bsod nams ngag gis dpal 'thob cing // de bzhin longs spyod can du 'gyur// bsod nams dag gis shes rab 'thob// sman dag sbyor mchog bsod
6120(): nams kyis// bsod nams dag gis yid gzhungs 'thob// bsod nams dag gis bzang 'gro 'thob// bsod nams dag gis rigs mthor skye// bsod nams kyis ni skye bo dran// bsod
6121(): nams dag gis grags pa 'thob// bsod nams dag gis ngang tshul can// bsod nams dag gis stong ldan 'gyur// bsod nams dag gis dbang po tshang // bsod nams dag gis bde ba
6122(): 'thob// bsod nams dag gis mkhas pa mchod// bsod nams dag gis stobs 'thob cing // dam pa phrad pa bsod nams kyis// bsod nams dag gis don kun 'thob// 'dir ni
6123(): yon tan gnas su'ang rung // ci ste zhing las tshong yang rung // mi ni skye 'dod phyir byed na// cung zad byas pas bsod nams kyis// longs spyod rgya chen tshogs kyang 'thob// bsod nams/
6124(): byed rnams bsod nams kyis// bsod nams tsam gyis nam mkha' la// gos dang zas skom rin chen rnams// thams cad bde bar 'thob par 'gyur// yid 'ong khyim rnams bsod nams
6125(): kyis bsod nams dag gis bud med mchog/ bsod nams chen pos nor dang 'bru// de yi 'dod dgu 'byung bar 'gyur// bsod nams dag gis 'gro ba na// sa ni sdong dum tsher ma
6126(): med ra bsod nams ci ltar ldan pa bzhin// mnyam gnas yang na gos kyang bting // ci ltar reg pa tsam gyis ni// nad pa dag ni sos 'gyur zhing // bsod nams dag gis reg gyur na//
6127(): zas skom de bzhin gnyis ka dang // gos dang rin chen 'bru dag dang // rtag tu zad par mi 'gyur ro// lha klu lha min gnod sbyin dang // yi dgas lto 'phye mi rnams dang // bsod nams bdag
6128(): nyid che ba'i phyir// dug dang gnod pa rnams las bsrung // bsod nams ngag gis bsnyen bkur 'thob// skye bo mang dga' bsod nams kyis// bsod nams dag gis grags ldan
6129(): 'gyur ra bsod nams dag gis skal bzangs 'thob// bsod nams dag gis tshig kyang brtsan// bsod nams ngag gis sdug gur 'gyur// tshangs pa'i dbyangs thob bsod nams kyis//
6130(): bsod nams kyis ni lus mdog sdug/ bsod nams ngag gis tshig kyang bzang // dran ldan mdza' ldan gtso bor 'gyur// de dang der ni mkhas par 'ong // mi phyed pa yi 'khor dang ldan//
6131(): bsod nams can ni nad med cing // smon pa'i gnas gyur bsod nams kyis// bsod nams rnyed ldan gzi byin yod// bsod nams dag gis rgyal srid 'thob// 'gran zla med cing gnod/
6132(): pa med longs spyod mi nyams bsod nams kyis// bsod nams dag gis gter yang rnyed// 'khor los bsgyur 'gyur bsod nams kyis// rin chen bdun ni
6133(): mdun du 'gro// nam mkha'i bar ni kun tu rgyu// nyi zla dang yang gzi byin mnyam// zla ba nyid 'thob bsod nams kyis// bsod nams kyis 'thob nyi ma nyid// tshangs pa nyid thob bsod nams
6134(): kyis bsod nams kyis 'thob brgya byin nyid// gzhal med khang na rgyu ba yi// bsod nams kyis ni lhar yang 'gyur// bsod nams de bzhin lha yi bu// lha mir dbang po stobs po che//
6135(): bsod nams dag gis ngan 'gro spang // bsod nams kyis ni bde 'gror 'gro// shin tu yid 'ong rab dkon pa'i// me tog bsod nams dag gis rnyed// bsod nams ngag gis grub pa
6136(): 'thob 'gro ba snang byed bsod nams kyis// lha dang lha min mi rnams kyis// yang dag mchod 'gyur bsod nams kyis// ces gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis de skad ces smras nas/
6137(): 'or kyang rang rang gi phyogs 'dzin pas khas mi len to// de nas bsod nams stobs kyis de dag la yang smras pa// kye tshur gshegs bdag cag shin tu ring ba gzhan gyi yul zhig tu dong
6138(): ste cha lugs mi mngon par 'khod na/ 'di ltar ci gzugs mi rnams kyi nyams su dben pa yin nam/ 'on te brtson 'grus sam/ bzo 'am/ shes rab 'am/ bsod nams su dben
6139(): pa shes par 'gyur ro// de nas gzhon nu de dag gis de ltar bya'o zhes byas nas gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byas te yab la ma gsol bar/ tsham tshom med par shin tu ring bar
6140(): rgyal khams gzhan dang yul gnan du dong nas rgyal po'i pho brang gzhan zhig tu zhugs te cha lugs mi mngon par 'khod do// de nas gzhon nu gzugs dang ldan pa ni mthong na yid du
6141(): 'ong bas bsdus pa'i skye bo dag gis bshugs pa'i longs spyod tsam gyis 'tshe'o// brtson 'grus can gyis ni chu klung shugs drag cing mgyogs la shin tu zab cing mthong na
6142(): 'jigs pas tsan dan gyi shing chen po khyer ba na gzhan dag gis bslang bar mi nus pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen pos drangs nas de las byung ba'i longs spyod tsam gyis 'tshe'o//
6143(): bzo dang ldan pa ni bzo ston pa las byung ba'i longs spyod tsam gyis 'tshe'o// shes rab can gyis kyang tshong dpon gnyis 'khon byung nas yun ring du lon pa shes rab kyi mkhas pas
6144(): mdza' bar byas te// de nas de gnyi sa yongs su mgu bas nor byin pa tsam gyis bde bar 'tsho'o// gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyang bdag gis bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi tshe
6145(): ba nyid bsgrags pa'i phyir mi shin tu dbul po zhig gi khyim du zhugs nas/ de gang gi nyin par khyim du zhugs pa de'i nyin par nyid du gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi bsod nams kyi mthus
6146(): khyim de nyid kyi nang du 'byor pa chen po byung ste/ khyim der nor dang / 'bru dang / gser dngul mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas mi dbul po de 'di snyam
6147(): du sems te sngon ma byung ba'i 'byor pa 'di dag go las 'ongs snyam mo// yang de 'di snyam du khyim gyi longs spyod 'di rnams ni sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di bdag gi khyim du 'ongs pas
6148(): de'i mthu yin no snyam du nges so// de nas gzhon nu'i bsod nams mthu yis der// dbul po de yis 'byor pa'o mchog thob nas// gzhon nu de la gus pas lha bzhin nu// bdag gi mthu
6149(): yis bkur sti shin tu byas// sa phyogs de yang dpal gyi khyad par gyis// 'bras bu'i shing rnams rtag tu rgyas par gyur// sna tshogs me tog tshogs rnams dad kyang ldang // lha rnams
6150(): kun gyis legs par bzung gyur pas// dus tshigs rnams kyang ma 'khrugs bde bar gyur// de ltar gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi mthu chen pos rab tu grags pa mi dngul po che ge mo zhig
6151(): gi khyim du gnon nu sngor ma byung bzhig 'angs te/ de'i mthus khyim du dpal byung bar gyur to// zhes kun tu grags nas skye bo bsod nams la sems 'dun pa dag gzhon nu de wA ra
6152(): 'dod pa'i phyir phyogs dar lpags par gyur to// de nas gi 'od du bsodan pas stobs kyi skye bo de rnams bsdu bar 'dod nas de 'di snyam du sems so// khyim bdag la khyi mo rin po
6153(): sna tshogs kyis gang zhing 'tshog chas rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ las byed mkhan du mas gang ba zhig yod kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa na/ de ji ltar yid la sems bskyed pa bzhin
6154(): du byung bar gyur te/ skye bo de rnams bsdu ba'i dngos pos yang dag par bsdus nas de'i grags pas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de kun tu rgyas par gyur to// de nas yang dus gzhan zhig na rgyal ba
6155(): la nyes pa byas pa'i mi zhig gshed ma dog gis yan lag bcad de grong khyer gyi phyi rol du bzhag par gyur to// gzhon nu bsod nams kyi stobs kyang sa phyogs der phyin pa na mi des gzhon
6156(): nu bsod nams kyi stobs mthong nas/ nyam thag pa'i nga ros dra zhing // jo bo gzhon nu bdag la yongs su skyab tu gsol/ zhes smras so// gzhon nu des de mthong nas snying rje'i sems
6157(): skyes te dkye ma'o 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho na// las kyis dbang med lhung gyur pa// sdug bsngal 'bras bu myong ba 'di// bdag gis ji ltar bskyab par bya// 'on kyang 'di lta bu bdag gi
6158(): bsod nams kyi mthus bskyab par nus pa'i bdag nyid kyi mthu rtogs nas mi de'i drung du song ste/ tshig snyan pa dag gi dbugs phyung zhing thog ma nyid du rang gi lus las rtsa gtar nas/
6159(): khrag gzugs te mi de la blud pas de'i lus cung zad rtas par gyur to// de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs// snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa des// de yi ting lag bcad pa yis/
6160(): sdug bsngal de yang thun mong gyur// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bdag gi khur khyer zhing // gzhan dag bde bas bdag nyid bder sems pa// snying rje'i rang bzhin
6161(): skyes chen brtan pa rnams// bdag gi bde ba ring du spangs pa yin// de nas gzhon nu bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bdag nyid kyi rkang pa dang lag pa rnams mtshon rnon pos bcad de/ mi de'i yan/
6162(): log gi gnas rnams la sbyar nas/ sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i byams pa'i sems bskyed de bden pa'i tshig brjod pa/ gang yang bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams gang /
6163(): gzhan gyi don du spyad par byas pa dang // bdag la bsod nams mthu yang ci yod pas// 'di yi rkang lag gnas su 'byar gyur cig/ sngon gyi lus bzhin rnam par dag par shog/ de skad
6164(): smras ma thag tu skyes bu de'i// yan lag dam pa rab tu gsal gyur te/ ri bong can dag sprin las 'thon pa bzhin/ mi de ji ltar mngon du dga' gyur pa// de bas lhag par snying rje'i rang /
6165(): bzhin dga'// rang gi yan lag bcad pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ zil gyis mnan nas smon lam 'debs par rtsol// e ma ho bdag gi 'bad pa don dang ldan par gyur cing / mi 'di
6166(): srog dang yan lag dang ldan par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mi 'di dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis yang dag
6167(): par tshim par byas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par gyur cig ces smras so// de nas sa chen rgya mtsho'i gros gyon pa// dga' bas g.yo ba bzhin du rab tu g.yos// de yi dpa
6168(): gis lhun po 'gul pa bzhin// lha yi pho brang kun kyang rab tu ldeg/ phyogs rnams ma 'khrugs dus tshogs shin tu gsal// 'jig rten skyong rnams lha yi mig gis lha// de ltar
6169(): kun tu sa g.yos pa'i rgyu lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par brtags pa na/ gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis bya dka' ba'i las rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa de'i mthu las
6170(): gyur par rig nas yid la ngo mtshar che ba skyes par gyur cing bya dka' ba'i spyod pa de lta bu byed pa de brtag pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyi lus mi snang bar byas nas// bram ze'i cha lugs su
6171(): bsgyur te/ gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi thad du song nas 'di skad ces smras so// kye mi khyod rkang pa dang lag pa med par byas te bzhag pa 'di ci'i phyir med par byas te bzhag
6172(): gzhon nus smras pa/ grogs po bdag ni gzhan dag gi sdug bsngal gyi mchog tu sdug bsngal lo// bdag ni gzhan dag gi bde bas mchog tu bde ste/ de bas na bdag gis mi 'di'i
6173(): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyams thag pa de mthong nas/ sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams la bab par bsams te/ rang gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams yongs su gtang nas/ mi 'di
6174(): bden pas bskul bas sngon gyi lus ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag go/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas bram ze'i cha lugs mi snang bar
6175(): byas te ngang rang bzhin du gnas par gyur nas/ gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod rang gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams yongs su gtong bar byas pa 'am/
6176(): de yongs su gtong ba na sems gzhan du gyur pa 'am/ 'gyod par ma gyur grang / gzhon nus smras pa/ ko'u shi ka/ bdag ni rang gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams yongs su btang /
6177(): bar byas pa 'am/ yongs su gtong ba na sems gzhan du gyur pa 'am/ 'gyod par gyur pa'ang med do// brgya byin gyis smras pa de ci mngon/ bsod nams stobs kyis smras pa/
6178(): ko'u shi ka/ 'o na bden pa'i tshig bya yis nyon cig/ de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhago ste/
6179(): phyogs bzhir bltas nas/ bden pas bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ rang gi yan lag mkhrig ma bcad pa na/ ci ste de ring 'gyod par ma gyur na/ bdag gi bden pa
6180(): tshig ni gang yin pas// bdag gi lus 'di sngar bzhin gnas gyur cig/ ces tshigs su bcad pa smras ma thag pa'i rjes la/ bdag nyid chen po de'i lus 'phral du sngon bzhin du/
6181(): gyur to / de nas de yi mthu yis rab bskul bas// nam mkha' las kyang me tog char pa bab// lha rnams snyan pa'i rol mo sgrogs par byed// dal zhing 'jam pa'i bser bu
6182(): ngad kyang ldang // brgya byin de yang shin tu dga' ba yis// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan rig nas// shin tu dang bas ched du brjod pa brjod// e ma ho khyod ni smon lam rgya chen
6183(): po khyod kyi spyod pa rlabs chen shin tu brtan// 'gro ba bde 'dod bdag gi bde ma chags// khyod 'dir 'bad pa byang chub mchog legs so// zhes bya ba la sogs pas mngon par
6184(): bstod nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyang rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe yul de'i rgyal po la bu med par dus las
6185(): 'das par gyur te/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang / blon po rnams dang / grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams 'dus nas/ kye bdag cag gi rgyal por gang zhig dbang bskur bar bya zhes bgros pa
6186(): lasagang bsod nams kyis che ba de rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes glengs nas/ bsod nams dang ldan pa'i mi tshol ba'i phyir kun tu bkye'o// de'i tshe gzhon nu bsod
6187(): nams stobs kyang grogs dang bcas pa phyi rol gyi skyed mos tshal du song ngo // de tshe bkra shis mtshan ma dag/ sngon du gsal bar snang gyur te// spos chu'i rgyun yang mkha' la 'bab/
6188(): sna tshogs mdzes pa'i bya rnams kyis// mkha' la bskor zhing sgra snyan sgrogs// yid kyang dga' bas rab dang zhing // lus la bde ba rgyas par gyur// de mthar
6189(): gyis skyed mos tshal gyi nang du// shing mya ngan tshang me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhig gi drung du song ste gnyid kyi log go/ de'i grogs dag kyang skyed mos tshal du kun tu 'khyam pa la zhugs so//
