6190(): skabs der gzhon nu'i bsod nams kyi mthus 'di lta bu dag snang bar gyur te/ klu rnams kyis ni shin tu yid 'ong 'dab stong ldan// dga' bar byed pa dri zhim kha dog ldan gyur pa// mdzes
6191(): pa'i pad+ma 'dab stong ldan pa byung bar gyur// bsod nams mthu yis bsod nams stobs la de ltar gyur// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gung las yol gyur cing // shing gzhan grib ma shar/
6192(): phyogs bab pa na'ang // de yi grib mas de yi lus ma btang // de bzhin ltas kyi khyad par gzhan yang snang // gzhon nu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du// rgyal por gyur pa'i lhas
6193(): rnams rmis par gyur// de'i tshe bsod nams dang ldan pa tshol bar byed pa'i grong khyer gyi mi de rnams phyogs der phyin pa na/ rmad du byung ba'i ltas kyi khyad par de dag thams cad mthong zhing
6194(): yid la ngo mtshar skyes par gyur nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i don du gtam nye bar bgyid pa'i dbang gis blon po dang grong gi gtso bo thams cad rgyal po'i
6195(): yo byad kyi rnam pa thams cad khyer te lcags so// gzhon nu yang gnyid las sad pa na de lta bu'i skye bo de dag lpags pa mthong nas/ bdag nyid ltas kyis khyad par la mkhas pas
6196(): de ring bdag ni nges par rgyal por dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ rang gi bsod nams kyi mthu las grub pa'i pad+ma de la skyil krung bcas te 'dug go/ de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang
6197(): 'di lta bu'i 'byor pa'i khyad par dag yongs su byas te/ lha rnams kyi dbang pos ni gdugs dkar po dri ma med pa 'bubs por byed/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni sing+ge'i khri bshams/
6198(): lha'i tshigs rnams ni nam mkha' las rin po che dang me tog gi char 'bebs par gyur to// de nas de yi bsod nams mthu yis der/ sa gzhi dag byas dag pa'i gos kyis bkram//
6199(): 'das rdzab med par 'dam las skyes pa byung // lha dang mi rnams rab tu mgu byed pa'i// rlung du byung ba'i 'byor pa mtha' yas snang // de ni rgyal srid dbang bskur gyur pa'i tshe// rang gi
6200(): lus las sdang ba'i 'od zer gyis// dpag tshad gcig gis kho ra khor yug tu// nyi ma'i 'od kyang mog mog por byas te// ming yang rgyal po snang byed zhes byar gyur// de ltar rgyal por
6201(): dbang bskur ba thob nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kun tu song ste/ skye bo thams cad kyang 'khrug pa med par chos dang mthun par bskyangs shing / dge legs kyi khyad par thams cad kyis ni
6202(): brgyan shing ljon pa dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams ni rab tu rgyas shing 'phel/ de'i dbang gis skye bo phongs pa dang ni bral/ rgyal po'i grags pa ni
6203(): phyogs su rgyas par gyur pa na/ de'i pho bo rnams kyang de lta bu'i bdag nyid che ba'i bsod nams kyi khyad par mngon du gyur pa thos nas/ shin tu gus pa dang bcas pas de'i drung du lhags
6204(): so gang gis rigs gzugs 'byor pa'i khyad par dang // bzo dang brtson 'grus shes rab kyis 'phags pa// de dag bsod nams mthu yi bzi brjid kyis// zil mnan gyur te
6205(): nyin mor byed pa yis// rgyu skar dang bcas zla 'od zil mnan bzhin// mtshungs pa'i gnas kyang gus pa'i slob ma ltar// kun nas zhum zhing 'du byed bsod nams mthu// bstan
6206(): par gyur pas grags pa pham par byas// de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi pho bo de rnams la 'byor pa'i tshogs chen pos bkur sti byas nas longs spyod kyi bgo skal chen po la/
6207(): byin cing / de dag dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang bcas pa rnams la bsod nams dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam shin tu yid du 'ong ba dag kyang bstan/ bdag nyid kyi smon lam gyi
6208(): mthu'i khyad par gyis dbyig brgya stong du ma dag dang / lha'i bza' ba dang gos dang rgyan gyi khyad par du ma dag kyang lha rnams kyis char du phab cing / de'i dbang gi skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang bsod/
6209(): nams la mngon par gzhol bar gyur to// sa bdag bdag nyid chen po de// dpal dang dang ba'i bsam pa yis// dpal 'byor 'byor pa rmang byung ba// lhan cig gcig tu 'gyed
6210(): par 'gyur// de yi mthu yis sa skyong rnams// rnam skyong sa ni mthu dang ldan// dga' bas sa 'di 'jig rten pa// dga' bar byed pa'i sa gzhi bzhin// bsod nams mthu las
6211(): 'thon pa'i dri// skye bo dga' ba'i rlung bskyod pa// rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs kun tu khyab// sa bdag gzhan gyi dpal 'byor dri// 'phro ba'i skabs ni med pa bzhin// de yi dbang gis
6212(): mi dbang la// mchog tu 'dun pa bzhin du gyur// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs stong gis kyang // sa bdag rgyal bar gyur cig ces// rmad du byung ba'i bsod nams stobs// 'jig rten gsal
6213(): bar gyur pa mtshar// de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyi stobs de'i mthu shin tu che ba gzhan la phan par byed pa de lta bu bdag gi pha rgyal po gsal stobs kyis thos nas// bdag gi bu'i
6214(): drung du pho nya btang ste/ gus pa'i tshig gis go bar byas nas bdag nyid kyang dpung gi tshogs chen po dang bcas pas gdung ba'i dbang gis song ste/ rgyal po bsod nams kyi stobs dang
6215(): phrad nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs pa'i dbang gis rgyal srid kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyi/ bu khyod
6216(): kyis rgyal srid kyi khur long zhig ces smras nas rang gi cod pan byin te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag go// de ltar rgyal po bsod nams stobs rims kyis
6217(): 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la dbang byed par gyur te/ thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par bzhag nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du'ang 'jig rten dang 'jig
6218(): rten las 'das pa'i yon tan ma lus pa thams cad la bkod do// gang dag de nas tshe 'phos pa'i sems can rnams kyang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so
6219(): zhes grag go// de lta bas na bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi bsod nams gyisabu dpag tu med cing de lta bu'i rjes su slob par 'dod pa rnams kyang bsod nams la mngon par brtson par bya'o zhes bstan
6220(): pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa ni bdag gzhan thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang sbyar bar bya'o// skyes pa'i rabs 'di phyis byung ba'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis
6221(): bka' stsal pa/ sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni// gzugs ldan dang ni brtson 'grus dang // bzo ldan shes rab can rnams ni// dga' bo dang ni gro zhun skyes// ma 'gags pa dang
6222(): shA ri'i bu// de yi tshe na spun du gyur// bsod nams stobs ni nga yin no// gsal stobs de ni zas gtsang yin// lha mo sgyu 'phrul btsun mor gyur// de'i tshe brgya byin gyur pa ni//
6223(): mo'u gal gyi bu yin no// yan lag bcud las thar byas pa// ko'u Ti n+ya ya nyid do// bsod nams stobs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu pa'o// / sdom la//
6224(): snying stobs chen po zla 'od dang // shi bi bram ze rtag tu brnyas// seng+ge ded dpon nor bzangs dang // su sha de ba bsod nams stobs/ skyes bu dam pa rnams ni b+hU
6225(): na med pa'i ye shes tshol ba la sems kun tu skyo ba med par gyur to// de yang 'dri skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub tu spyad pa spyod pa'i
6226(): tshe ra re shig cig drang srong 'od bzang ces bya bar gyur to zhes grag go/ de ni rang bzhin gyi yon tan dang / shes rab kyi khyad par dang bsam gtan dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i yon
6227(): tan rmad du byung ba du ma dang ldan par gyur to// sna tshogs mtshan rnams kun gyis de lus brgyan// ral pa'i thor tshugs lnga dang ldan pa ste// kun tu rgyu yi yo byad gsum dang ldan// 'dod
6228(): pa chung zhing chog shes dka' thub ldan// dka' thub nags tshal zhi bar gnas pa brtson// sdug bsngal rnams kyis de lus nub pa med// rang bzhin yon tan bzang pos brgyan par
6229(): gyur de ni gcig tu tshul khrims ldan pa ste// snying rje'i dbang gis srog chags rnams la brtse// ser sna med cing ma byin len pa sdom// 'dod las ring gyur bud med bsnyen pa
6230(): med nga myos gyur la sogs bag med rgya rnams spangs// de yi ngag ni bden zhing nges pa yis// mi rtsub mi brlang dag tshig dri ma med// yid ni gcig tu rgyal
6231(): ba'i ye shes tshol// ji ltar gser mgar mkhas pas brdungs pa'i brgyan// nor bu'i snying pos spras pas lham me ga/ de ltar de yang yon tan tshogs kyis lham// de lta bu'i bdag
6232(): nyid chen po de rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa la brten nas shes pa'i khyad par 'di lta bu rnams mngon du gyur te/ bzo'i
6233(): gnas dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang lha'i rna ba dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang yon tan gyi gnas dang / sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang gzhan yang bya ba dang bya ba ma
6234(): yin pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi shes pa dpag tu med pa mngon du gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis shes pa'i khyad par 'di dag ni rtogs na/ shes pa gang gis
6235(): shes pa 'di thams cad gang du 'gag par 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi shes pa 'di ma shes te/ 'jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram ze dag shes pa 'di mngon du gyur pa su yod snyam mo// gang nA
6236(): shes pa'i tshogs rnams kyang // rten med skyo zhing 'gag par snang // gang gis shes pa de yi gnas// mngon du gyur te mtshungs med do// de ni don 'di btsal ba'i phyir// kun tu rgyu yi
6237(): tshul gyis rgyu// gzhan du rnam par g.yeng med de// brtan pa tshol bas g.yengs pa bzhin// de ltar drang srong 'od bzangs chos kyi don du grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang yul
6238(): 'khor dang / ri khrod la sogs pa thams cad du kun tu rgyu zhing song ba las/ de slongs mos 'tsho bar rig nas thams cad kyis de la mchod sbyin byas kyang de la longs spyod kyi dngos po
6239(): ni ci'ang len par ma gyur te/ de'i grags pas kun tu khyab par gyur to// de'i tshe lho phyogs gangs ri'i rgyal po la drang srong kun rig ces bya ba/ ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa'i ye shes mngon
6240(): du gyur pa zhig gnas so// de ni nyin mtshan kun tu g.yel med pa// 'jig rten kun gyi don rtog pa la zhugs// ting 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i mthus// sems can kun
6241(): gyi sems kyi spyod pa dang // ngag dang lus dang bya dang bya min pa// rnam kun mkhyen pas 'jig rten phran 'dogs byed// drang srong mchog de gangs ri'i rgyal po la// de ltar bzhugs
6242(): shing dgongs pa mdzad par gyur// de ltar drang srong chen po kun rig gi lha'i mig gis slongs mos 'tsho ba 'od bzangs mthong ste/ de'i sems kyang rab tu shes so// slongs mos 'a
6243(): ba 'od bzang 'di/ stobs dang stobs ma yin pa shes pa'i nges par byung ba rab tu mi shes pas nyam thag go snyam nas de de ltar snying rje skyes so// de snying rjes non pa'i sems
6244(): kyis 'di lta ste/ dper ra skyes bu lug pa bsgrub pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang pa las bskum pa de bzhin dus srong kun rig gangs rI'i rgyal po las
6245(): babs nas slongs mos 'tsho ba 'od bzang gi mdun du 'dug go// 'od bzang gis de mthong nas yon tan gyi tshogs kyis che ba gzigs nas/ de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
6246(): stan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol nas/ re shig drang srong kun rig la tshigs su bcad pas dris pa/ mkhyer pa kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// kun tu rtog par ldan khyod la/
6247(): gang du bdag la the tshom mchis// de 'dir kun mkhyen khyed la zhu// dge ba'i lus rnams ci bgyis pas// sems can kun la phan par byed// sems can kun gyi spyod pa dang // stobs
6248(): dang stobs ma yin shes shing // gang gis shes rab mchog gis ni// thob nas de yang phyir mi 'gag shes pa gang gis rnam shes pa// ye shes chen po khyod la zhu// mkhas
6249(): pas de dag bdag la gsungs// de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong chen po kun rig gis/ seng+ge ltar bag tsA ba med pa'i dbyangs kyis/ bdag nyid kyi ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par/
6250(): de la gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/ gang gis 'jig rten phan par byed pa'i sems// ldan pas ye shes khyad par gang tshol ba// 'od bzang khyod kyis 'dir ni gang dris
6251(): pa tshul bzhin bstan pas yid ni tshim par bya// chos sbyin pa la ser sna med pa dang // shes pas yang dag don rnams yongs su sdud// shes ldan rnams la rtag tu de dga'
6252(): zhing dag pa'i sbyin pas yang dag sdud par byed// ji snyed shes pa mang po rnams kyang 'dod// ji lta ba yi ye shes tshol byed pa// des ni ye shes dam pa de 'thob bo// sems
6253(): yid rnam par shes pa'i gsang shes shing // phung po khams dang skye mched kyis sngags pa'i// sems kyi rtsa ba rnam par dag rtogs shing // nga dang nga yir kun tu rtog pa'i yid// rnam
6254(): bar dag cing shes pa'i tshogs rnams ni// lha las grol zhing ji bzhini shes pa yis// sgyu 'drar rtogs pa'i ye shes de rtogs so// zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su bstan nas/
6255(): des ji lta ba bzhin 'phags pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu thob po zhes grag go// blo gros snang ba rab rgyas shing //
6256(): brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'od 'bar ba/ mngon par shes pa gsal ba dag/ ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal ba yin// 'di lta bu'i don phyis byung ba'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
6257(): stsa la pa/ mo'u gal gyi bu de ji snyam du sems de'i tshe drang srong 'od bzangs zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na slongs
6258(): mo ba 'od bzangs du gyur pa de nyid nga yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong kun rig ces bya bar gyur pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad yin no//
6259(): de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs dang stobs ma yin pa dang 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam dang ye shes kyi snang ba thob par 'dod pas yang dag par sdom pa
6260(): can du bya/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing thams cad yongs su spang bar bya/ ye shes kyi snang ba rtogs par bya'o zhes gsungs so// 'od bzangs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu gcig pa'o//
6261(): skyes bu dam pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa rnams ni/ bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyi mthus rmad du byung ba'i yon tan gyi gnas thob par 'gyur ro// de yang sngon
6262(): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub kyi spyad po spyod pa'i tshe drang srong phyi ma'i mtha' sgrub pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// de ni sngon du sbyangs pa rgyu
6263(): tshon dang // yon tan tshogs kyis rab tu dpal 'bar zhing // skye dgu'i tshogs kyis bkur pas rgyal po bzhin// lha rnams tshogs kyis bstod pas tshangs pa bzhin// drang srong tshe ga/
6264(): kyis bla mar mchod pa byed// 'jig rten bstan bcos snyan ngag tshul rnams la// des ni mngon gsum mngon 'gyur bzhin du ston// byams pa'i bdag nyid gzhan la phan brtson pa// thos dang
6265(): dran dang ting 'dzin rmad byung bas// de yis mngon sum rjes su dpag pa yis// yang dag yang dag min pa rjes su rigapa shes bya'i yul la de yi shes rab mthu// nyin mor byed pas
6266(): kun tu gsal byed bzhin// de lta bu'i bdag nyid chen po de rnam par g.yeng ba ni don mthong ba la sgrib par byed pa yin par rig nas gcig pur dben pa'i gnas shig tu gnas so//
6267(): dka' thub can dang rjes su mthun gyur pa// nags khrod zhi ba sman ljongs 'bab chur bcas// ut+pal 'dzum zhing pad+ma rgod pa 'dra// rlung gis bskyod pas rab tu 'bar ba bzhin// ljon
6268(): pa'i tshogs rnams phreng ba bkod pa 'dra// bya rnams rang gi yon tan gsal sgrogs byed// gnas der ting 'dzin mthu yis bsam gtan byed// 'on kyang zhi ba rjes su sems pa med//
6269(): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan byed pa na 'di snyam du mngon par rtog go// las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis 'gro ba'i bye brag dag sngas snyam mo// de 'di snyam du sems ni bag
6270(): chags sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa yin la/ sems can rnams kyi rgyud kyang sna tshogs pa yin te/ de ltar nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dag byung bas sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed par
6271(): 'gyur las mngon par 'du byas pas 'gro ba sna tshogs dag 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba'i bye brag kun tu sdug bsngal ba brgya phrag gis nyam thag pa rnams dang / de bzhin du
6272(): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / mi'i 'gro ba rnams dang / lha'i bye brag dpag tu med pa dag snang ngo snyam mo//
6273(): smras pa/ sems kyi skyes bu'i 'du byed kyis// yul gyi kun rtog tshen blangs te// sred pas kun tu dbang byas nas// sna tshogs 'gro ba'i lus su snang // gang dag med la yod
6274(): zhen cing // yod la yod pa min rtog pa// 'gro 'di kun tu rmongs gyur te// kye ma'o ma rungs gyur gyis med// de sems gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad bye brag tu mi 'gyur ba'i
6275(): rtsi smar 'ga' yod dam snyam mo// de 'di snyam du/ sems can thams cad ni bdag tu lta ba la gnas te/ de'i rkyen gyis gzhan du rtog cing nyon mongs pa shin tu skye/ nyon mongs pa'i/
6276(): sems kyis las mngon par 'du byed de rnam par smin pa 'grub po/ de bas na bdag gis chos de rnams kyi bdag yongs su btsal bar bya'o snyam nas kun tu brtags pa/ 'gro 'di
6277(): bdag tu lta ba dang // gcig pu rang dbang can no zhes// rtag cing brtan par gang rtog pa// 'di ni re shig brtag par bya// 'di ltar dngos por snang ba thams cad ni gzugs
6278(): dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pas bsdus pa mthong ste/ 'di thams cad la ni bdag dang bdag gi ba med pas te/ 'di ltar 'byung dang 'byung ba rgyur
6279(): bcas pa// gzugs 'di rnams ni bdag tu mi rung ste// skad cig tsam yang mi rtag 'gyur phyir ro// bde sdug tshor ba'ang bdag tu mi rigs te/ gzhan du rkyen la skyes par mthong /
6280(): phyir ro/ 'du shes 'du byed rnam par shes pa'ang // bdag gi mtshan nyid du yang rung min ste// gang zhig phyung dang rkyen las skye ba dang // rnam par rig cing de dang de'o zhes// nyer
6281(): 'jal spyod la rtag par gyur pa'ang med// rgyu rnams tha dad kyis bskyed 'bras bu ru// gsal ba gang de gcig gis byas pa min// de las gzhan du bdag gi dngos po zhes/
6282(): btags pa'ang ri bong rA yi kha dog bzhin// log par rtog pa'i mun par mi 'gyur grang // bdag de rtag dang byed por 'gyur ro zhes// gang du rtog pa de dag phyugs dang mtshungs//
6283(): gzhan yang gzugs ni skye dang 'gag pa las// bdag de rjes su 'gro 'am mi 'gro ba// 'gro na rtag pa'i mtshan nyid nyams par 'gyur// mi 'gro na ni thams cad byed po zhes/
6284(): de la gzhan du ci ltar bskyod par nus// gzugs med kun tu song ba'i nam mkha' bzhin// 'dod na'ang las dang las kyis byed pa par// bdag tu mi 'gyur 'dus ma byas pa'i
6285(): phyir rdzas su ma grub de yang rgyu nyid du// 'grub par mi 'gyur mkha' las lu bzhin// gang zhig gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug 'gyur ba// de la bdag gi mtshan nyid mi 'jug ste/
6286(): 'jig rten na yang bran dang khyi bzhin mthong // gang zhig las dang las kyi rnam smin dag/ bdag gis byas zhes 'jig rten gang rtog pa// 'di ci bdag de dga'
6287(): dang khro ba yis// 'jig rten bde sdug sgrub par byed na ko/ rnam gnyis rtog par byed de bdag gcig min// 'gyur ba dang bcas de la rtag pa'ang med// bde sdug ngo bo nyid kyis de lta na//
6288(): bdag tu rtog pas thar pa'ang med 'gyur zhing // ngo bos grub ste byas par gyur pa'ang med// de bas bdag tu rtog pa mun pa'i gling // chos 'di thams cad stong zhing bdag med pa// ngo/
6289(): bo nyid kyis rnam par dag gyur to// ci nas 'gro 'di bag ming kun rtog gis// nyes pa tshang tshing 'thug por zhugs par gyur// kun rdzob tu yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung // de nyid dbang
6290(): gis las dang rnam smir dang // nyon mongs kyis ni 'gro ba rab tu gdungs// 'di 'dra'i rmongs chen ma rig 'di grol na// 'du byed rkyen kyang 'byung bar yong mi 'gyur// de spangs pas
6291(): ni bdag med thar 'gyur zhes// blo gros ldan rnamams 'di bsten par rigs// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag dang bdag gi ba thams cad sel bar byed pa rten cing 'brel
6292(): bar 'byung ba'i tshul gsal bar rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa de las langs nas/ de snying rje chen po'i sems kyis grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang yul 'khor
6293(): dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la sogs pa thams cad du song ste sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa dang spyod pa ci lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas sems can khri phrag dpag
6294(): tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'jig rten du// ye shes mthu yis rab tu 'bar// rnam par dag pa'i shes rab kyis// lta
6295(): ba'i thibs po sel byed cing // yang dag lam ni sdang byed pas// pad+ma'i gnyen mchog mtshungs med bzhin// blo ldan rnams ni gzhan gyi don du spyod pa na// rnam pa sna tshogs tshul/
6296(): gyis ye shes mthu yis 'dir// kun tu phan byed re ba med pa'i bsam pas 'jug/ lhar bcas sgron me 'jig rten nyi ma bzhin du lham// de bas de dag rjes su zhugs te bslab
6297(): bya zhes bstan pa de la brtson pa sa rab tu sbyar bar bya// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pa rnams kyi blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab po
6298(): zhes yon tan bsngags pa nyid la sbyar ba dang / bdag tu rtog pa ni lta ba ngan pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa yin pas bdag tu lta ba spang zhing chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid du rtog
6299(): par bya'o zhes shes rab dang mthun pa'i mdo sde dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// don 'di rang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ mo'u gal gyi bu de ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i
6300(): dus na drang srong phyi ma'i mtha' sgrub pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na de de ltar mi lta ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong phyi ma'i mtha'
6301(): sgrub pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar gyur to// ngas nyon mongs pa dang las kyi tshogs 'joms pa'i gtam de lta bu bstan pas bdag tu lta ba'i sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag
6302(): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// mo'u ma gal gyi bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
6303(): 'dod pas las rnam par bzhag pa gsum la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs so// drang srong gi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu gnyis pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa ye
6304(): shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa dang mthun par chos thams cad bdag med par sten cing skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad/
6305(): thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus dpag tu med pa'i snga rol na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sa 'dzin zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de nyid yongs su
6306(): mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyi ma'i tshe dam pa'i chos nub tu nye ba na chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che la mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ba yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis spobs pa thob pa rnams byung /
6307(): ngo rgyal sras rnams kyi mdzad pa rgya chen po// phan byed mthu ni dpag tu med gyur te// sa bdag tshul gyis sa 'dir 'gro ba la// chos tshul zab mo ston pa dpal dang ldan// de tshelnga
6308(): dang mi rnams thams cad la// mchog tu gyur pa'i rgyal po rnams byung ste// phan par byed pa lam dang lam min gyi// khyad par sngon du gsal bar gyur pa ston// de'i tshe me rnams kyis
6309(): tshes bco lnga la babya pa'i tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis 'dun khang du mi'i rgyal po rnams 'gro zhing chos bgro bar byed par gyur te/ de'i tshe rgyal po grags pa chen po zhes bya
6310(): ba dang / rgyal po tog gi blo gros zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du rgyal po khyab 'jug blo gros dang / rgyal po zla ba'i blo gros dang / rgyal po thogs pa'i blo gros dang / rgyal po me tog gi blo
6311(): gros dang / rgyal po shugs kyi blo gros dang / rgyal po sprin gyi blo gros dang / rgyal po skar 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa khri phrag dgu rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dun
6312(): khang du dong ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu chos bgro bar byed de/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu rnyed par dka'/ brgya lam na ni u dum pa ra bzhin/
6313(): de bas chos kyi rjes su bslab bya zhing // chos ma yin pa ring du spang bar bya// yang dag bdag med smra ba bsten bya zhing // yang dag ma yin bdag lta spang bar bya// zhi ba smra ba dag gi phyogs
6314(): su byang ma zhi ba la brten par bya ba min// ngag ni bden pa yongs su bsten bya zhing // nam du'ang rdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// gzhan yang grogs po drag/ sangs
6315(): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bdag dang gang zag la sogs pa bden par mi gsung ngo // grogs po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam
6316(): ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gsung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos kyi btam rnams phan tshun gsal bar ston pa las/ de'i tshe der 'dus pa yongs su ma smin pa'i lha'i 'khor mang pos
6317(): sgrags la bar smras pa/ grogs po dag stong pa nyid la las mngon par 'du byed pa ci ltar yod/ gal te bdag dang bdag gi med na lha'i 'khor 'dis las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gi
6318(): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skyes/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gzhan lha'i bu bstan pa la rab tu gnas pa rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
6319(): kyi bstan pa la skur pa ma 'debs shig/ gnas 'dir lha yi bu rnams kun// las kyis skye zhing 'chi ba na// ltas lnga'i dang po sdang ba'i tshe// bdag la rang dbang med mthong nas// kun tu/
6320(): sdug bsngal yi mug 'gyur// de bzhin du ni grog 'gag cing // ltas lnga mngon par tshang ba'i tshe// 'chi bar 'dod dang 'chi 'pho yi// bdag ni gang du'ang dmigs mi 'gyur// dngos
6321(): rnams bdag gi bar 'gyur med// mi rtag stong zhing bdag med pas// chos rnams thams cad bdag gis stong // de bas sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung // mthu ldan bden par gsung ba/
6322(): yin// de skad ces smras so// de nas rgyal po tog gi blo gros kyis// rgyal po khri phrag dgu po de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma lha'i 'khor 'di dag ni mi mthun par smra ba ste/
6323(): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa mi shes pa'o// bdag cag re shig 'dzam bu'i gling nyid du chos yongs su bgro bar byas te/ lha'i 'khor phal po che rnams ni the tshom du gyur na mi rung ngo //
6324(): yang smras pa/ 'di na bdag dang bdag gir rtog pa can// phyir ci log gi mun pas dkris pa gang // rgyal ba'i bstan pa zab mo mi shes te// bdud kyi 'ching bas g.yang sar lhung bar
6325(): gyur 'debs ci nas chos tshul bsten nas ni// bag dang ldan pas gzhan gyi dor spyad kyi// bag med pas ni nyes pa'i byung khrungs 'gyur// de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas 'khor 'dus
6326(): pa dag phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rgyal po tog gi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni yul dbus legs skyes shing // shes rab ldan zhing dbang po rul// gsal byed nyin
6327(): mor byed pa bzhin// phan byed chos kyi don kun rig/ de bas khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin// tshul bzhin bgyi ba'i dus lags so// de skad ces gsol nas/ yang rgyal po tog gi blo gros
6328(): kyis smras pa/ re shig dam pa'i chos yongs su bgro ba'i phyir// khyed rnams las/ gang mkhas shing gsal la 'dzangs pa spyod pa dang ldan pa bsgrub par bya ba dang
6329(): bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa gsel bar shes pa/ shar phyogs dang lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs kyi rgyal po rnams las/ nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga shog cig chos kyi tshul bgro bar bya'o//
6330(): de nas rgyal po de dag gis tshul bzhin du 'tshal zhes rgyal po tog gi blo gros ltar mnyan nas/ rgyal po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ rang gi bsod nams kyi mthu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bya ngang pa'i
6331(): rgyal po bzhin du nam mkha' la song ste gangs ri'i rgyal po la yang dag par gnas so// de dag gi phyi bzhin du dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' ba'i lha de dag 'brang bar gyur to// gang du de rnams
6332(): gnas gyur pa// der ni lha rnams kyis byas pa// bkod pa'i khyad par de dang de// ched du byas par gyur pa bzhin// rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar las grub pa// gzhal med khang mdzes rab tu
6333(): bkru ba sprul// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu mdzes byas pa// rin chen rgyan phreng lhab lhub kyis spras pa'i// chos kyis seng+ge'i khri stan mngon par sprul// lha dang lha mo dga' bas bskul
6334(): ba'i gdong // mdzes pa'i rna cha g.yo bas rab tu btud// skyed mos tshal dang kun dga' rdzing bu dang // rin chen ljon pa pad+mas rab tu gang // lus kyi yon tan gsal bas rab brgyan pa//
6335(): bya dang ri dgas bung ba myos pas gang // lhung lhung sgra 'byin sil snyan 'dra bar sgregs// de ltar mchod pa'i khyad par du ma rnams// gangs kyi ri bo de la grub par gyur// de ltar rgyal po tog gi
6336(): blo gros la sogs pa de rnams lha rnams kyis sprul pa'i 'khor gyi khyams der so so'i stan bshams pa la 'khod do// de'i tshe lha rnams kyis de dag la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson par byed par
6337(): gyur te nga rgyal po tog gi blo gros gang la 'khod pa'i khri de rin po che sna bdun las mngon par grub par sprul to// lha'i me tog man da ra ba la sogs pas mchod cing // re shig 'dzam bu'i gling
6338(): du dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems shing yid dga' bas dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po tog gi blo gros seng+ge'i khri de la 'dug ste seng+ge ltar bag cha
6339(): ba med pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas dam po'i chos bgro ba'i don du rgyal po'i pho nya zhig la smras te/ grogs po gangs ri'i rgyal po'i rtse mo
6340(): na drang srong dge ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba mkhas shing gsal ba dam pa'i chos mthong ba zhig yod kyis der song la rgyal po'i 'dus pa rnams khyod mthong bar 'tshal zhes smros shig/ de nas rgyal por
6341(): pho nya des/ myur bar gangs ri'i rtse mo ga la ba der song ste drang srong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gsan du gsol// 'jig rten 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das// des ni
6342(): mya ngan 'das pa yi// bstar pa sems can par byed pa// de yang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur// de yi dbang gis sa bdag rnams// chos kyi don du 'dus gyur
6343(): te khyod ni mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes// yid ni rtse gcig ldan par mchis// de bas chos kyi dor brtson pa// brtul zhugs ma nyams pad+ma'i spyan// bdag gis rtsol ba don yod mdzod// de skad
6344(): ces gsol pa dang / drang srong des de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing snyigs ma'i dus kyi mtshan nyid shes nas snying rje'i dbang gis mchi ma byung ste/ snying rje'i sprin gyis
6345(): mngon bskyod pa'i// mchi ma'i thigs pa de yi rgyun// gangs ri'i rtse mor lhung pa las// nyi ma'i 'od kyis phog pa bzhin// grangs ri'i rtse mo rab nyams par// mngon du zhu bar gyur zhes
6346(): grags de nas drang srong chen po des pho nya de la smras pa/ grogs po gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'am thos pa'i sems can 'ga' yod na'ang dam pa'i chos gnas te/ de bas
6347(): na khyod song zhig kho bo mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi ba'i gnas btang nas 'du 'dzir 'jug par byed pa ni tshul dang gnas ma yin no// bstan pa'i don ni rab tu zhi ba
6348(): yin pa 'gro ba rnams ni ca co'i rang bzhin te// 'dod pa rnams ni dus kyi ba mo bzhin// zhi ba'i 'bras bu nyams par byed par 'gyur// de bas bsam gtan zhi ba yongs spangs nas// 'du
6349(): 'dzi'i gnas su 'jug par mi byed do// drang srong chen po lha rnams bdag yod do// bdag med do zhes tha dad par smra bar gyur te/ de'i dbang gis gnas 'di khyod la 'dri'o// des spras pa
6350(): gal te bdag rtag pa gcig pu rang dbang can yod na sems can 'di dag skye ba dang 'chi ba kun tu 'byung bar mi rigs te/ mi rtag cing mi brtan pa/ bdag dang bdag gi ba med par 'khrul pas
6351(): khams gsum kun tu 'ching bar gyur pa ste de bas na 'di la don du bdag med do// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos// ma rtogs bdag dang bdag gir bcings// stong zhing bzod nas zhi bas
6352(): na 'di la chos rnams gzugs brnyan bzhin// de bas blo gros ldan pa rnams// chos kun bdag med mngon du bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / pho nya pa de chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul
6353(): med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob po// de nas de dam pa'i chos kyi mthus yid dga' ba dang bde ba khyad par can thob ste/ skad cig de la bya dang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la 'phag/
6354(): te nga rgyal po'i 'dus pa ga la ba der 'ongs so// de sangs rgyas kyi mthus par snang de nyid las/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra dbyangs phyung ba/ e ma'i grogs dag dam pa'i chos gnas te/
6355(): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnyed dka' ba// 'gro ba sim byed bdud rtsi'i 'dri med mchog/ bstan pa de ni brtson 'grus ldan la 'bar// stong zhing zhi ba'i bzod la gang brtson pa// de dag rnams
6356(): kyis bstan pa'i snying po len// gang zhig le lo'i mun pas zil mnan pa// bdag tu rtog shing ga shin tu nyams// 'drin chos rnams stong zhing zhi bas te// bdag dang
6357(): bdag gir bden pa cung zad med// su dag chos kun rten cing 'brel 'byung bar// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med rang bzhin du// rtog pa de ni 'ching ba rab bcad nas// rgyal ba'i bstan pa bya ba/
6358(): shin tu byas// de skad ces smras pa'i sgra de phyogs thams cad du thos par gyur te gang gis thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang chos thams cad sbyong zhing bdag med pa'o// 'dus byas
6359(): thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o// srid par song ba thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes shes shing khong du chud par gyur te thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub
6360(): tu nges par gyur to zhes grag go// rgyal ba'i sras rnams rtag tu chos kyi don brtson pa// de dang de yis phan byed mthu rnams rgya che zhing // bdag lha'i nyes tshogs tshang tshing nags tshal rab 'bar
6361(): bas ye shes mthus mdzad thal ba'ang lus par mi 'gyur zhes// lhar bcas 'jig rten lha bi rnga sgra bzhin du grag/ de bas mtshungs med rgyal sras spyod pa rmad du byung // de lta bu'i don de
6362(): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo ru gal gyi bu khyod ci snyam du sems// de'i tshang rgyal po tog gi blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/ ngas skye bo thams cad chos la rab tu bkod do//
6363(): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snying rje chen po'i shugs kyis sgra de go bar byas te sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags so zhes gsungs so// de lta
6364(): bas na skyes bu dam pa ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pa rnams ni 'jig rten thams cad la ston par 'gyur zhing mtshungs pa med pa yin no// bdag cag gi sten pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni
6365(): sngon rgyal po tog gi blo gros su gyur pa na'ang de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pa dang ldan na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes sangs rgyas kyi phan yon/
6366(): bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// tog gi blo gros kyi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu gsum pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa shes rab kyi mthu thogs pa med pa rnams ni
6367(): 'jig rten ston par 'gyur zhing shes bya'i yul thams cad la skad cig gis rtogs pa'i ye shes 'jug go// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid
6368(): du drang srong sdang ba zhes bya ba dang bram ze sngo bsangs zhes bya ba byung ngo nas grag go// 'jig rten phan par brtson byed dam pa rnams// shes rab mthu yis blo gros rgya che zhing // brtson 'grus stob
6369(): kyis 'jig rten bla mar ston// lhag pa'i bsam gtan yongs su spyod cing zhi// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i 'jing rnams rgya che yang // thigs pa'i tshad kyis bgrang bar mi spyod pa// de bzhin 'dir yang
6370(): rgya mtsho chen po zhes// ye shes mthu ni dpag tu med pa yin// de 'dra'i rgyal sras mthu chen ldan pa rnams// 'jig rten tshul dang mthun pa'i spyod bzung ste// 'dul
6371(): ba'i thabs kyis rnam thar rgya chen ston// nyon mongs srid pa'i rlan dang bral gyur kyang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nyid kyi chu skyes dag/ gsal bar ston cing blo yi ze'u 'bru rnams// 'jig rten/
6372(): rgyan phyir dgod pa bzhin du 'dzum// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba yal ga dang 'dab ma mang pos g.yogs pa ljon pa thams cad
6373(): kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i yal ga dang lo ma'i tshigs rnams ni so ga'i char sprin sngon po rab tu spungs pa lta bu/ rtsa ba shin tu brtan zhing yal gshin tu 'byes pa khor khor yug tu ni rgyang grags
6374(): gcig khyab par gnas par gyur te de'i lo ma'i lding khang ni dkara' thub can rnams kyi gnas su rung bar gyur to// der drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba de bsam gtan byed cing gnas pa las de
6375(): mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to// gang na shing drung nyams dga' ba// 'du 'dzi'i skyes pos rnam dben zhing // nags tshal sdug gu'i phreng ba dang // me tog tshogs kyis legs
6376(): brgyan pa// dag pa'i chu gtsang sngon po dag/ bsal zhing yang la bdud rtsi mtshungs// phyogs rnams rab tu gsal byed pa'o// pad+ma'i gnyen mchog de dang ni// mtshan mo'i
6377(): gsal byed skar mar bcas// mthu yis bskyod par mi nus pa'i// gnas su rnal 'byor brtson pa las// nyon mongs rnyog pa rab zhi zhing // shes bya'i gzugs rnams gsal
6378(): byed pa nga 'di yang bsam gtan tshul yin zhes// bstan bcos gnyis kar grags pa yin// de ltar drang srong snang ba de mngon par shes pa'i mthus shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po de'i yal
6379(): ga dang 'dab ma grangs su bya bar 'dod nas mngon par shes pas rtog pa la zhugs so// des lo bcu gnyis dang zhag bdun gyis shing gi rgyal po de'i 'dab ma'i grangs shes par
6380(): gyur to/ de nas rus gzhan zhig na/ bram ze'i mchog sngo bsangs zhes bya ba de grong khyer nas kha zas blangs te nyin mo gnas par bya ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang po gang na ba der
6381(): song ste phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ de nas drang srong sdang ba gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mngon sum du yang dag par dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur zhing yid du 'ong
6382(): ba'i gtam mang du byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas drang srong sdang ba zhes bya ba des bram ze sngo bsangs la 'di skad ces smras so// kye bram ze chen po mi'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi
6383(): rigs na gang shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po 'di'i 'dab ma'i grangs du yod pa brtsi ba'am rtogs par byed pa'am shes par byed nus pa'i sems can dag yod dam/ bram zes smras pa/ btsun pa
6384(): bdag gis bgrang bar bgyi'o// drang srong gis smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po de de'i phyir grongs shig/ de nas bram ze sngo bsangs shing ljon pa de la'ang mi lta 'dab ma
6385(): rnams la'ang mi bgrang bar skad cig tsam la ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'dab ma rtog pa la zhugs nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// drang srong chen po khyod nyon cig/ shing gi
6386(): rgyal po 'di la yang // mi 'khrug drug cu yang stongs phrag/ bcu drug dang ni khyad phyin phrag/ bcu gsum dag dang dkris pa phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa drug khrag khrig phrag/ sum cu dang ni ther 'bum
6387(): phrag brgya stong dang yang bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'dab 'di mchis// bram ze dam pa bdag gis 'tshal// de skad ces smras pa drang srong sdang bas thos nas yid la ya mtshan rtsa
6388(): bar gyur te/ bram ze sngo bsangs la smras pa/ bram ze chen po legs so legs// khyod ni bden pa'i tshig smra ba// legs so legs so 'di bden no// blo gros chen po bram ze'i mchog
6389(): bdag ni mngon shes mthu yis ni// lo ni 'khyud 'khor bcu gnyis dang // nyi ma bdun gyi bar du ni// 'dab ma rnams ni bdag gis bgrangs// gtso bo khyod kyis skad cig mkhyen// khyod ni
6390(): gzigs pa mi mdzad cing // bgrang bar mi mdzad skad cig tu// 'dab ma rtog pa'i rjes su zhugs// mkhyen 'di nyid kyi 'am lha yi bstan// bram ze bdag la don 'di gsungs// sngo bsang
6391(): kyis smras pa/ kye btsun pa chen po gson cig/ 'di ni lha yis smras min bdag gis te// bdag tshig bden pa'i rjes 'brang don bzhin 'jug/ nam mkha' zad cing grum par gyur srid
6392(): kyang kho bo rdzun du smra bar mi srid do// de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong snang ba mchog tu yid dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas bdag nyid chen po de'i rmad du byung ba'i yon tan gyi khyad
6393(): par de la mngon par bstod pa'i ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod par rig so// e ma'o rlabs che e ma'o khyad par che// khyod ni ye shes tshogs kyis che ba ste// gang gi drang srong mngon
6394(): shes brtan pa'i mthus// nyi ma bdun dang lo ni bcu gnyis su// rtog cing dpyod pas bgrang bar byas pa yang // skad cig gis ni sgrib pa med mkhyen nas// ji bzhin gsal bar
6395(): ston pa'i ye shes 'di// lha klu mi yi 'jig rten thams cad du// snang bar byed pa gzhan du yod ma lags// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer mthu yis ni// gling rnams kun tu
6396(): gsal bar byed ma lags// khyod kyi ye shes dkyil 'khor rgyas pa yis// shes bya'i gnas rnams skad cig gcig la sdang // de bas rmad du byung ba khyod la ni// srid 'dir
6397(): gus pa mi bskyed su zhig yod// de bas bdag kyang mkhas pa khyod bzhin du// ye shes mchog gi blo gros ma spang ba// 'jig rten kun tu gsal bar ston gyur cig/ de skad ces
6398(): smras nas drang srong de bram ze chen po de'i rjes su 'jug par gyur to// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med cing shes bya'i yul
6399(): thams cad la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes 'jug cing / skad cig gcig dang ldan pas ji snyed pa thams cad khong du chud par gyur te ji ltar smras pa thams cad kyang bden par
6400(): gsung pa yin no// zhes sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// 'di'i don bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'ang / gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gsungs pa// snang
6401(): bar gyur pa bdag nyid chen po shA ri'i bu// bram ze sngo ba sangs gyur pa shAkya seng+ge ste// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams kyi bdag 'di 'dra// bden la gnas shing don dang chos dang ldan pa
6402(): yin zhes so// sngo bsangs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu bzhi pa'o// // skyes bu dam pa ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pa ni/ rmang du byung ba'i spyod pas
6403(): sems can gyi don dpag tu med pa byed cing byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sder byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i
6404(): sngon rol du bskal pa mgo byed ces bya ba byung ste de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rab rib can zhes bya bar gyur te/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing skye dgu rnams tshe lo lnga stong thub par gyur pa
6405(): na bcom ldan 'das 'dri byang chub sems dpar gyur te 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rig byed 'don pa'i bram ze nyi 'phreng spong zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go// de ni smon lam stobs kyis ning
6406(): khams der// bram ze'i rigs mchog jebs je mtho bar// skye ba'i las rnams yongs su rdzogs gyur cing // gzhan pas khyad du gyur pa'i spyod pas mdzes// ri rnams dbus na
6407(): lhun po ji bzhin du// yon tan dpal gyi tshogs kyis lham mo mdzes// de yis yongs su spyod pa mthu che bas// rigs dang gzugs dang 'byor pa rgya chen dang // stobs dang blo
6408(): gros yon tan gsal ba rnams// de la 'gran pa bzhin du gnas par gyur// de yi lhag bsam snying rje'i mthu che bas// 'gro ba'i bag med nyes tshogs tshang tshing rnams// de yi shes
6409(): rab stobs kyis bsreg pa 'dra// 'gro blo'i mun pa sel byed nyi ma bzhin// yang dag yul la gsal byed rgyas pa bzhin// yon tan tshogs kyi phreng ba brgyus pa bzhin// nyon mongs
6410(): gdung pa bsil bar byed pa bzhin// de bas 'dir ni nyi phreng spong zhes grags// de'i tshe sems can rnams phal cher rtag par lta ba'i mun pas kun tu khebs shing 'thabs mo dang
6411(): 'khon dang mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur te/ rgyu des ngan 'gro la gzhol bar gyur to// kye ma 'jig rten rtog pa yis// bdag dang bdag gir shin tu rmongs// de yis mgal me'i
6412(): 'khor lo ltar// yang yang 'khor zhing sdug bsngal gyur// dar gyi srin bu bzhin du rmongs// rang gis rang nyid 'ching bar byed// 'di las grol bar byed pa gang /
6413(): dam pa rnams kyi bya ba yin// de ltar nges par byas nas bdag nyid chen po des snying rje chen po'i stobs bskyed de ting nge 'dzin dang mngon par shes pa'i mthus 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong dang
6414(): grong khyer dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang ri brag la sogs pa rnams su gang dang gang gis 'dul ba de dang de lta bu'i spyod pas chos yang dag par bstan te// kye shes ldan dag shes
6415(): par gyis shig/ gzugs ni bdag min gzugs la bdag med do// phra rags dngos ni rmi lam glang por mtshungs// tshor dang 'du shes sems pa 'di dag ni// bdag min 'di dag
6416(): la yang bdag med do// med bzhin phung por zhen pas 'dod byed pa// dper na mi 'ga' rmi lam bzang po la// 'dod cing zhen pas chags par byed pa bzhin// 'khrul pa'i dbang gis blo
6417(): ni nyams par byed// de bas phung po sgyu ma lta bur ltos// shes pa rnams ni kun tu g.yo ba las// dbang po'i skye mched de dag grong stong bzhin// rkyen gyis skye dang 'gag par snang ba
6418(): rnams brtags na smig rgyu bzhin du snying po med// de bas rtag par lta ba yongs spongs la// chos kun rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don// sgyu ma lta bur yongs su rtogs par
6419(): gyis dA zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos yang dag par bstan cing // gzhan yang dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa drug la sogs pa'ang bstan te/ de las ji ltar
6420(): dran pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog ce na/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bgrang ba dang / rjes su 'gro ba dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong /
6421(): dang 'jug pa dang / yongs su dag pa la rtog pa'o// de la bgrang bas ni bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te rten du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par
6422(): dpyod pa thul ba dang dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin par nus pa'o// rjes su bgrang bas kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te yang dag par 'byung /
6423(): ba la rten cing rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dang bral ba dang dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba'o// zhi gnas kyis ni rab tu bya ba'i las kyi dngos po
6424(): rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bri bar mngon du ston pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog la gnas par nus pa'o// lhag mthong gis kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam
6425(): pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba zad par mngon du ston pa dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos so so bar rtogs pa la gnas pa'o// 'jug pas kyang bya/
6426(): ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te nye bar len pa'i phung po spong ba'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang / 'phags pa'i sar 'jug pa la sbyor ba'o//
6427(): yongs su dag pas kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / lta ba yongs su dag pa zhes so// de ltar dbugs thung ngu
6428(): brngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhes bya ba bcu drug kyang legs par rtogs par 'gyur ro// zhes bstan pas/ sems can dpag tu med pa bla na med
6429(): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang dben pa dang tshangs pa'i gnas pa la sbyar bas grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'thab
6430(): pa dang rjod pa dang 'khon du 'dzin pa spangs te dben pa spyod par gyur to// de dag ri dang nags tshal dben pa rnal 'byor can gyi spyod pa bzhin// rnam g.yeng dgra sde'i tshogs rnams
6431(): bcom ste bsam gtan zhi ba'i sems kyis ni// bzod pa'i go cha shes rab kyis 'bar brtson 'grus stobs kyis bgos byas shing // zhi gnas gzhu thogs stong pa bdag med mda'
6432(): rnams 'phen par byed pa las// bdag lta'i bdud tshogs nyon mongs dgra sde shin tu pham par byed 'gyur ba// rgyal sras dpa' bo stobs ldan rjes zhugs rmad byung spyod pa rgya chen po/
6433(): de ltar sems can rnams dben par byang chub sems dpas rjes su bstan pa la spyad pas mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms
6434(): par 'jug pa dang 'phags pa'i lam thob par gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe bskal pa de zad du nye ba na sbyin gnas de lta bus 'dzam bu'i gling khyab par gyur te/ 'dzam bu gling ba'i sems
6435(): can rnams 'thab pa dang g.yul 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa de dag kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char pa dag kyang rab tu zhi/ sa la brten pa'i me tog rnams kyang legs
6436(): par smin cing mdangs dang ldan par gyur na// dus kyi nyes pas nang sna tshogs kyis nyen pa 'ba' zhig tu gyur nas de'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis sems can rnams
6437(): kyind rab tu zhi bar byed nus so snyam mo/ snying rje'i bdag nyid mthu chen ldan pa rnams// 'gro rnams bde bas bdag nyid bder 'gyur zhing // gzhan dag sdug bsngal gyur pasa'o/
6438(): rgyal ba cad nyes pas rnam dkrugs 'jig rten 'di ru yang // ye shes thabs mkhas stobs ni rgya chen gyis// de dag kun kyang bzlog pa bzhin du byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
6439(): sems dpa' chen po des 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gang bdag gis brgya byin dang tshangs pa chen po dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang gzhan yang lha'i drang srong rnams dang mi'i drang srong rnams
6440(): kyang bsdus la/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir spyan sbyar ba'i bstan bcos dag bstan par bya'o snyam nas de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste/ brgya byin dang
6441(): tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang lha'i drang srong rnams dang brgya byin gyi drang srong rnams dang mi'i drang srong rnams la bsgo nas ri lan tsha'i bdag po gnyis pa zhes bya ba la lan tshwa
6442(): spyod pa'i rtse mo nges pa'i gnas zhes bya ba der bsdus nas 'byung po yang dag par zlog par so sor 'brang zhing bsrung la rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i bstan
6443(): bcos dag rab tu bstan to// gang gi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi mthu yis ni// tshangs dang brgya byin 'jig rten skyong ba dang // lha dang mi yi drang srong mkhas pa dag/ bskul nas lan tshwa spyod
6444(): pa'i rtse mo der// nad kyi tshe gdung rab tu zhi byed pa// gso ba'i tshul gyis bstan bcos rab tu bstan// tshangs sogs blo gros mthu yis dpag min pa'i// gso ba'i thabs
6445(): kyis gtsug lag rgya chen dag/ gsal bar mdzad pas sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i// nad kyi 'dam rdzab skem par byed pa dang // bde dang lam dang mtho ris them skas dag/
6446(): snang mdzad don chen sgron me gcig pur gyur// rmad byung gang de ye shes stobs kyi mthu// de ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag gi ning
6447(): rnams rab tu zhi bar byas so// smon lam rgya chen po rab tu btab pa'i mthus nyi ma gcig la'ang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba byas shing
6448(): theg pa gsum po dag la nges par sbyar nas ngan song gsum gyi lam ni bcad pa bzhin du byas// mtho ris kyi lam ni lam po che ltar du byas te 'gro ba rnams kyi lus dang sems
6449(): las byung ba'i nad rnams thabs de dang de dag gis yongs su zhi bar byas par gyur to// 'khor ba'i chu bo rab med la// nyon mongs nya dang chu srin dag/ 'phyo ba'i gnas byur sdug
6450(): bsngal gyi// rlabs kyi phreng ba 'phro ba dag/ myur du bsgral te thar pa yi// rin chen gling du son byed cing // 'gro ba'i yid kyi bde ba dag/ so sor stsol ba'i mthu ldan pa// ded dpon
6451(): chen po sems dpa' mchog/ khyod la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// zhes ched du brjod pa bsgrags pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te byang chub sems dpan
6452(): smon lam gyi mthu yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pas sems can gyi bsam pa dang gnas skabs ji lta ba bzhin
6453(): du 'jug cing don byed pa'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsngags pa dang rim gro bskyed de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la'ang brjod par bya'o//
6454(): nyi zeng spong gi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu lnga pa'o// skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems can gyi don mngon par spyod pa na/ thabs mkhas
6455(): pa'i bdag nyid dang ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pas rgyu skar la sogs pas 'jig rten rig pas gzhan la phan par byed cing smon lam gyi mthus mi rtag pa'i dngos po thams cad kyang
6456(): bden pa'i byir gyis brlobs pas 'jig rten pa rnams kyi don du re shig byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i dbang phyug tu gyur to// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal
6457(): ba 'di nyid kyi dang por gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyi go rims dang / zla ba dang yud tsam la sogs pa gsal bar 'jig rten du sngon brjod pa ma byung ba'i dus der/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
6458(): re shig drang srong rnga bong zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go/ spyi mthun las kyi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dir// kun rdzob bden pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung // dus dang phan gnod byed
6459(): pa rang bzhin gnas// de ma mthong bas snying rje che ldan pa'o// rgyal sras rnams kyis de dang de 'dra ba// gzhan la phan phyir mngon gsum ston par byed// de bas na re shig 'dzam
6460(): bu'i gling 'di nyid du/ dpal dang ldan pa'i grong khyer lnga len ces bya ba der mi'i bdag po chos dang rjes su mthun pa 'byor pa chen po byung ngo // de ni 'dod pa spangs shing chos dang
6461(): ldan lus ngag yid gsum rab tu gtsang zhing dag/ dpal dang ldan zhing mkhas pa'i bdag nyid can// sa bdag 'byor pa chen po byung bar gyur/
6462(): de yi btsun mo dam pa ni// 'dod pa rnams la 'chums gyur nas// de tshe yul ni dber par ni// gzu lums can dang lhan cig spyad// de ltar 'dod pa spyad pa las byung ba chos nyid
6463(): kyis mngal sbrum par gyur te/ de btsas pa las khye'u gzugs mi sdug pa zhig byung bar gyur to// beng bu'i mgo la bong mgrin po// bong rna bo la bong gdong po// lus rnams rtsub mo//
6464(): ral pa n+dan// mi DI lus ni byed yod pa// de mthong 'jigs nas myur du ni// snam phyi sar na de bor ro// de ltar mi sdug pa'i khye'u de rang gi bsod nams dang mthu dang stobs kyis/
6465(): srin mo bong bu rigs kyis blangs te rang gi gnas su song nas bu la chags pa bskyed par gyur te/ des bcud len 'thungs nas lus kyi stobs dang yon tan rdzogs te lha rnams dang
6466(): lhan cig spyod par gyur to// shes rab chen po skal ldan po// rab tu brtson ldan snying rje'i sems// gzi brjid chen po byams pa thob// sems can kun la phan byed pa'o//
6467(): de lta bu'i bdag nyid chen po de dben pa la gzhol bar gyur nas gangs kyi rgyal po na rdzu 'phrul thams cad pas byas pa/ shing ljon pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa du ma
6468(): dang ldan pa/ dus su 'brang ba'i dri zhim po ldang ba/ sna tshogs pa'i me tog dang lo ma'i tshon gyis sa phyogs shin tu bkra bar byas pa/ lha'i drang srong dka' thub
6469(): can rnams kyi bsti gnas su rung ba der/ drang srong rnga bong dka' thub spyod par gyur to// de ltar rnam par dben pa bsten nas su// le ni drug khri tham pa'i bar du yang // rkang pa
6470(): gcig pa'i dka' thub lta bur gnas// de la brgya byin tshangs pas phyag 'tshal gyur// de ltar bdag nyid chen po des dka' thub mthu chen po la spyad pas/ lha thams cad thub pa chen
6471(): po drang srong rnga bong zhes ched du brjod par gyur to// tshangs pa gzugs kyi khams kyi lha dang bcas pa dang / brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / klu dang /
6472(): gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang bcas pa mthu dang dbang che bar grags pa thams cad 'dus par gyur te phyag byas nas smras pa/ kye ho skal ldan chen po khyod// bdag cag rnams la
6473(): mngon dga' mdzod// re ba 'di 'dra ci la bsams// ci 'dod pa ni smra bar gyis// drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa/ sngon gyi bskal pa bdag gis dran// 'jig rten phan pa ston byed pa//
6474(): nyin zhag du ni rgyu skar rnams// re re nas ni rgyu bar byed// mkha' la gza' dang rgyu skar rnams// go rims yon tan bdag gis dran// 'dir ni bskal pa bzang po la// de lta du
6475(): rnams yod mi snang // de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin lha'i dbang po la sogs pa lha rnams kyis smras pa/ yon tan rgya mtsho drang srong che// snying brtser gyis te khyod kyis ni// rgyu skar
6476(): go rims kun zhog cig/ ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir gnas bzhir// de yi las dang yon tan gsungs// khyod la bdag cag nyan par 'tshal// de la drang srong rnga bong gis bdag
6477(): nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par rtog pa gsal bar mngor du gyur pas 'dir rgyu skar gyi go rims sdang bar bya ba smras pa/ rgyu skar dkyil
6478(): 'khor thams cad la// re shig dang po smin drug ces// nangs kyi dang por bzhag par bya// 'di la su zhog dad pas 'bul// lha yi bu ni nyi ma yang // skar ma drug po ston par
6479(): byed smin drug rgyu skar de dag ni// mkha' la rtag tu rgyu bar shog/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas me lhas sprul pa byas pa'i lha drang srong mi bzhi 'jug
6480(): gi bus smras pa/ bdag gi sring mo'i bu 'di dag/ gling bzhi par ni gnas par shog/ de ni sprin drug gi lha thog ma nyid du bstan nas/ de bzhin du slar yang rim pa nyid du bstan pa/
6481(): rgyu skar chu yi rus car ni// gnyis pa yang ni yin par bya// skye chu'i bdag gis 'di skad smras// bdag gi bu lnga 'bul lags te// rus ni drang srong chen po chu// rab tu brtsod ldan
6482(): sngar ma lags// zla ba'i bu pho gsum po ni// ming ni mgo zhes bya ba lags// b+ha ra d+ha dza'i rus su ni// mgo zhes bgyi ba bzhag pa lags// rab tu mi bzang
6483(): lag ces pa// lha drag rnams kyis bstan pa ste// ljang sngon po yi bu rus su// de ni bzhi par bzhag pa'o// drang srong bcas pa'i lha tshogs kyis// nyi ma'i bu ni bstan pa ste// nam
6484(): so lags shing gnas 'jog rus// phur bu'i bu ni gsum po ste// lag gi bu yi rus lags shing // rgyal zhes bya bar de dag bshad// sa bsrung gi ni bu lnga po// brtul zhugs spyod pa
6485(): mkhas pa rnams// mdza' bo bu yi rus lags te// de ltar de dag rgyu skar bdun/ shar phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su bzhag/ de yi las dang go rims kyang // phyis ni yang dag bstan par bya//
6486(): phur bu yi nai bu lnga po// byang grol brtul zhugs 'chang ba dag/ ser skya'i bu'i rus su ni// lce yi phyogs su ngas bzhag go/ dbyangs can gyi ni bu gnyis po// ming ni gre zhes bya bas te/
6487(): go'u ta ma yi rus su ni// lho'i phyogs su ngas bzhag go/ lha mo yi ni bu gnyis po// de yi ming ni sgra yin te// lho phyogs kha 'dzin gsum par bzhag/ sdig pa yi ni bu bstan pa//
6488(): drang srong kA t+ya bu yi rus// lhar bcas drang srong rnams kyis der// me bzhi zhes ni bya bar bshad// dri za'i bu ni nag pa ste// kA t+ya'i bu yi rus yin no// sa ri de ni me yi bu// kAt+ya
6489(): bu chen rus yin no// 'dir ni sa ga dpal gyi bu// kA t+ya'i bu rgan rus yin te// drang srong rnams kyi rgyu skar bdun// lce phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su bzhag/ mdza' bo'i bu yi bu
6490(): bzhi po ming ni lha mtshams zhes bya ste// nub phyogs su ni bzhag pa yin// dbang po yi ni bu gsum ste// zla ba kA t+yA'i bu yi rus// 'jam pa'i las na thams cad la// gnyis
6491(): pa snor ni bzhag pa yin// sa yi lha mo'i bu gsum ste// sbubs ni lag pa'i bu yi rus// rgyal ba'i lha mo'i bu bzhi ste// kA t+ya'i bu yi rus yin no// thams cad lha zhes bya ba
6492(): bizhi mo'u mgal bu yi rus yin no// sbubs dang chu stod chu smad gnyis// rgyu skar gsum po bzhag pa yin// sred med bu yi bu gsum po// rgyu skar rnams ni gro zhun 'khor//
6493(): khyab 'jug gi ni bu gsum ste// kA t+ya'i bu pho dpal gyi rus// byi zhur de ltar rgyu skar bdun// nub phyogs kyi ni kha 'dzin yin// nor lha'i bu ni mon gru ste// drang srong rna ba'i rus yin
6494(): no chu lha'i bu ni gcig pu ste// de ba tsi'i bu yi rus yin zhing // sman ma sbrul gyi lha me yi// rgyu skar mon gre gnas pa yin// sdig pa yi ni bu gnyis te// khrums stod zhes ni bya/
6495(): bar bshad// chu yi rna ba'i rus su ni// gsum po 'di ni bzhag pa yin// lho yi drang srong chu lci'i bu// khrums smad zhes ni bya bar bshad// bra nye drang srong rus yin par// bzhi pa
6496(): 'di ni bzhag pa yin// lha yi drang srong rgyal gyi bu// nam gru zhes bya de bstan te// drang srong dbang po'i rus su ni// lta pa 'di ni bzhag pa yin// dri za'i rgyal
6497(): po'i bu gsum ste// tra len bu yi rus yin zhing // rgyu skar tha skar zhes bya ba// 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams kyis bzhag/ drag po'i bu ni gsum yin te// bra nye ngan spong bu yin no//
6498(): rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// byang phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su bzhag/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// de ltar phyogs su nye bar bkod// de ltar drang srong rnga bang gis ji ltar rjes su bstan pa lha/
6499(): thams cad kyis rjes su mthun par bsgrubs te// yi rang nas slar yang lha'i dbang pos/ lha dang drang srong thams cad dang thabs cig tu/ drang srong chen po rnga bong ga la ba der btud de gsol ba//
6500(): nam mkha' 'di la rgyu skar ni// gang zhig dang por rgyu bar byed// kha zas su ni ci zhig za// mi rnams kyi ni las ci bsgrubs// yun ni ji srid rgyu bar byed// thub pa khyod kyis gsung du gsol//
6501(): de nas drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa/ ji ltar ngas ni brjod pa bzhin// 'dir ni khyed rnams dad pas phul// rgyu skar 'od la nga mchog phyir// 'di ni khyod la bstan par bya// zhes bya ba la
6502(): sogs pas/ rgyu skar thams cad kyi rus dang sbyor ba dang / yud tsam dang / phan pa dang / gnod pa'i 'bras bu so sor 'byin pa dang / mchod pa byed pa la sogs pa thams
6503(): cad bstan nas/ de nas drang srong rnga bong gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la smras pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis go rims kyis dang po dang mtshan mo dang nyin mo dang / zla ba dang /
6504(): zla ba phyed pa dang / rgyu skar dang gza' dang dud dang / khyim dang / gnas dang / 'gro bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mthong zhing thos pa rnams/ da ltar yang bstan
6505(): cing rnam par bzhug no/ ci khyed rnams 'di ltar rnam par bzhag pa dang / gdags pas rgyu skar dang gza' la yongs su mgu bas rjes su yi rang bar byed dam/ 'on te ma yin/
6506(): de nas de nyid kyi tshe lha dang lha ma yin dang / mi'i drang srong dang / lag 'gro dang mi 'am ci'i tshogs thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so//
6507(): kye khyed ni thams cad kyi bla ma dang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi gtso bo mtshungs pa med par mkhas la mngon par rtogs pa'i snying brtse bas bskal pa pha rol dran pa po//
6508(): sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ dpal thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ dus gsum thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa
6509(): yin te 'di lta bu'i mtshan mo dang nyin me dang skad cig dang rgyu skar dang gza' dang zla ba dang zla ba phyed par 'dogs par byed pa'i ye shes de lta bu su la yod pa'i sems can su'ang lha dang lha ma yin du
6510(): bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i nang na med pa yin no// ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar btags pa bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyis der dad pas byin pa yin no// rjes su yi rang ngo //
6511(): legs ldan legs so zhes ched du brjed nas/ slar yang khyim gyi byed pa la sogs pa yongasu bstan nas/ rnga bong gis smras pa/ 'di ltar khyim ni bcu gnyis dang // ldan pa'i mkha' la
6512(): gza' skar rnams// bkod pas skye dgu thams cad la// phan bde mngon par bskyed phyir ro// mig stong yang dang yang du ni// 'dus te chos kyi phyogs su ltos// khyod ni shes rab lnga/
6513(): pas na chos ma yin pa bzlog por gyis// chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// thos phyug mkhas pa bsam gtan pa// de dag khyod kyis ches gos dang // bza' btung
6514(): rnams kyi rjes su srungs// de la slar yang brgya byin gyis// rnga bong la ni thal sbyar te// rab tu smras pa bdag cag gis// bya ba yang ni bsgo bar gyis// smras pa/ lha yi bla ma khyod kyis ni//
6515(): rtag par tshangs par spyod pa srungs// rig sngags sman dang gsang sngags rnams// thams cad la ni bya ba sgrubs// gzhan yang 'jig rten bag yod pa// bsrung phyir 'di ltar bsgo bar
6516(): byas ra las kur drang srong zla ba dang // zla ba rlung dang zhag dang bzhi// gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin// drag po dung gi rna can dang // dgon pa dang ni lci ba ste// gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni/
6517(): mchod sbyin rim par gtso bor bkod// rgya mtsho chu zla 'dzeg po dang // rin chen stong dang ring du 'gro// sa yid ches dang zla bsrungs dang // gnas zar byed pa rgya mad+ho rI// gtso bor bzhag ste/
6518(): ma dros dang // khab kyis lus 'bigs chu lhas byed// ri rags 'khrugs pa klu de bzhi// klu rnams kyis ni gtso bor bkod// khyod ni dge ba rab bskyed pa// ne co yi ni khyab byed pa// mkhas pa
6519(): zhing gi gtso bos te// de 'dra ba ni ji lta bu// khyod ni snying po kho nas kyang // me 'i rtse mo'i gtso bo ste// khyod ni rlung dmar 'gul g.yo ba// rlung yang ba yi gtso bo yin// rdo rje mig dang seng+ge'i mi
6520(): legs mthong lag na mdung gsum zegs// lha mo bzhi po de dag ni// grong khyer gtso bor bkod pa yin// gong ma'i tshar skyes rtsibs mu khyud// 'khor lo spen pa gnod sbyin bzhi// de dag/
6521(): rin chen rtag pa la// nyo tshong byed pa'i gtso bor bkod// phyogs mtshams su ni bzhi yin te// bsrung ba'i phyir ni yang dag gnas// yul 'khor grong khyer thams cad du// bsrung ba'i phyir ni
6522(): byung po bkod// drang srong dag ni thams cad dang // lha yi tshogs dang klu rnams dang // lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi// bar yang rjes su yi rang byed// lus brtan rab tu rgyal po mchog zug/
6523(): po yi ni gtso bo ste// khyed ni skye dang 'gag pa dang // zas dang ro dang me tog mchog/ khyod ni dri 'phel byed pa ste// shu dag rdzogs byed 'bras bu'i mchog/ khyod ni lam bde bskyed pa ste/
6524(): rnam par 'tshe las rgyal ba'i gtso// dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis// ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bkod// nor rgyas bu dang thang shing zhing // lce mchog mig dmar
6525(): rmugs byed skems// khyod ni dbyangs chen chu yi gno// khyod ni grub dang yid 'phrog pa// zla ba 'phrog par byed pa ste// bcud kyis len gyi gtso bo yin// gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin//
6526(): khyim rnams thams cad rnam par bzhag/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yang ni// skal ldan rgyur ni rnam par bzhag/ lus ngan gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso// grul bum rnams kyi 'phags skyes so// klu
6527(): rnams kyi ni mig mi bzang // dri za rnams kyi yul 'khor bsrung // khyed rnams 'jig rten bsrung bar gyis/ de ltar drang srong rnga bong gis gling chen po 'dir ci ltar bkod pa bzhin gling gzhan brgyad
6528(): khri thams cad du'ang yongs su skyong ba ma bkod pa ni gcig kyang med do// 'dir smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' drang srong rnga bong gis// 'jig rten don du 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// tshangs da
6529(): dbang por bcas pa mgu gyur par// ye shes mthu yis 'dir ni gsal bar byas// mkha' la rab tu gsal bar bkram pa yi// rgyu skar gza' dang bcas pa'i go rims rnams// pad+ma rgyas
6530(): pa'i mtsho la dang pa bzhin// skye dgu rnams kyi legs spyod don mthong 'gyur// lha yi tshogs la thub pas nyer bstan la// byed po'i las kyis bsgrubs par mngon zhen pa// 'di na kun tu
6531(): lam grol zhugs pa ste// 'di ni phan byed ye shes mthu las ni// gzhan gyur rnams la re shig byung ba yin// de ltar drang srong rnga bong gis bstan pa la tshangs pa dang // brgya byin du bcas pa
6532(): 'jig rten thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing phyag byas te rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pa rnams ni 'jig rten thams
6533(): cad la ston pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// bdag cag gi ston pa 'di ni sngor yang de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan zhing / lha dang drang srong thams cad mgu bar byed pa yin na// mngon par
6534(): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// rnga bong gi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu drug pa'o// /
6535(): skyes bu dam pa ye shes kyi stobs thob pa rnams ni/ bag yod pa dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i go cha bgos te sems can rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god par
6536(): byed do// de yang 'di skad zos te/ sngor byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po bag yod pa lhur len bzhin sems can rnams kyi don yongs
6537(): su spyod pa zhig byung bar gyur to zhes grag go/ sa bdag de ni yon tan gyis mtho zhing // rigs gzugs longs spyod tshe dang nad med dang // ngag dbang shes rab ri bdun rnams kyis
6538(): bskor rang gi yon tan rin chen tshogs kyis phyug/ snying rje'i mu khyud kyi ni brgyar byas pa// yon tan rgya mtshos de yi rgyud gang zhing // dpag med 'byung po rnams
6539(): kyi rten du byung // de bas 'dir ni ming ni don bzhin gyur// de ci las kyi bya ba ji snyed pa// bag yod brtan pas chos dang 'gal mi byed// de ltar sa'i bdag po rgyal po mu khyud de gzhan du
6540(): sbyangs pa'i mthus chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon du gyur te/ chos 'di thams cad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste 'das pa'i dus na'ang chos thams cad rang bzhin
6541(): dang bral bya'o// da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang chos thams cad rang bzhin dang bral ba'o zhes dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la brtson par gyur to// des sems can thams
6542(): cad phyin ci log rnam pa bzhi sa phyin ci log tu gyur ba mthong gi kye ma 'jig te ya 'i rnams ni rung bar gyur to// mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes la// sdug bsngal ba la bde bar rab rtog cing // mi
6543(): rtag pa la rtag par phyin ci log/ bdag med pa la bdag tu zhen gyur pas// mchil pa dam pos zin pa'i nya bzhin du// 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni ma rungs gyur//
6544(): de bas na ci nas bdag gis sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis drangs te/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o snyam ste des snying rje chen po'i shus
6545(): kyis thog mar 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin pa'i dngos po ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams kyis tshim par ni byas/ ngag snyan pa rnams kyis ni skye bo rnams
6546(): bag tsha ba med par ni gyur/ don bya ba des rab tu mgu bas rgyud rnam par dag par ni byas/ de rnams kyang rgyal po chen po mu khyud la bla mar sems par gyur pas/ skye bo'i
6547(): tshogs rnams la rjes su bstan pa/ chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin stong pa ste// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid phyir stong pa'i phyir// 'das pa gang yin de ni 'gags shing zhi//
6548(): ma 'ongs pa dag skyes pa yod ma yin// da ltar byung ba ngo bos dag pas te// de ltar blo yis btags pa rnam stong pas// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid// 'di
6549(): la rkyen gyi snang ba thams cad dang // sgyu ma'i rang bzhini ji ltar snang bar mtshungs// sgyu ma de yang dngos por grub min pas// chos 'di rnams ni de ltar shes par gyis// zhes bya ba la
6550(): sogs pas chos bstad pas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de lta bu'i slad du byung ba'i spyod pa de lha rnams la rim par
6551(): brgyud pa las// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid la ya mtshan che bar gyur nas// chos bzang lha'i 'dun sar 'dus pa'i bar skabs su 'di lta bu'i gtam brjod pa byung ste/ 'di la
6552(): phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la thabs mkhas pas phyin ci log med par yang dag par ston pa'i chos kyi rgyal po mu khyud kyis zin pa'i mi rnams
6553(): ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o// zhes gleng bar gyur to// bar skabs der lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byir/ chos bzang gang na ba der dong ste bdag nyid kyi stan la 'dug nas lha rnams la
6554(): smras pa/ khyed rnams da ltar ci zhig gleng // de skad ces smras pa dang / lha rnams kyis zhes dang bcas pas gsol pa/ lha yi dbang po bdag cag rnams// chos bzang lha yi mdun
6555(): sa 'dir// 'di lta bu yi gleng mo dag/ gtam du brjod pa bzhin du gyur// gang na phyin ci log tu gyur pa yi// sems can rnam pa phyin ci ma log pa'i// lam yangs dri ma med pa mngon ston pa//
6556(): sa bdag mu khyud 'di yis rjes bzung ba// mi rnams rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o// zhes pa'i gtam 'di gleng ba'i skabs su mchis// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag rgyal po mu khyud/
6557(): de ni thabs mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin na// khyed rnams rgyal po mu khyud 'dir 'ong zhing lta bar 'dod dam mi 'dod lha rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha'i dbang po bdag
6558(): cag rnams rgyal po mu khyud 'dir mchis te mthong bar 'tshal lags so// de nas lha'i dbang pos kha lo bsgyur ba ma ti li la smras pa/ ma ti li khyod kyis lha'i shing rta rtsibs stong dang ldan
6559(): pa khrid la rgyal po mu khyud gang na ba der song la 'di skad ces gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing rta cang shes rtsibs steng dang ldan pa dkris te mchis
6560(): lags na rgyal po chen po myur bar 'di la legs par bcibs su gsol/ khyed ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams mthong bar 'tshal zhes mchi'o zhes gyis la gzhan yang rgyal po chen po lam
6561(): gang la gshegs par bgyi/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa mchis pa'i lam nA gzhung dam/ phyin ci ma log pa mchis pa rnams kyi lam nas gzhud ces gyis shig/ legs so zhes smras nas kha
6562(): lo bsgyur ba ma ti li lha'i dbang po'i lhar mnyan te 'dzam bu'i gling du song nas snga ma bzhin du gsol ba dang / rgyal po mu khyud kyis kha lo bsgyur ba ma ti li la smras pa/ gang ni phyin ci log
6563(): gnas dang // gang na phyin ci ma log pa// gnas pa'i sa de gnyis ka nas// drangs te song zhig ma ti li// de nas kha lo bsgyur ba ma ti lis// gang na phyir ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyi byin/
6564(): ci log gi lam dang / byin ci log med pa rnams kyi phyin ci log med pa'i lam de gnyis ga nas dong ba las/ rgyal po mu khyud kyis kha lo bsgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo bsgyur ba ma ti li// shis
6565(): rta yud tsam sdod cig dang // gang na phyin ci log gyur pa'i// sa de re shig blta bar bya// de nas ma ti lis shing rta ci srid thogs par byas pa de'i bar la/ rgyal po mu khyod kyis srog chags
6566(): bye ba phrag brgyad cu/ de kho na nyid nges par brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bkod par gyur te/ 'di ltar bag yod pa dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa'i phyir ro// de dag
6567(): thams cad kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// kha lo bsgyur ba ma ti lis ni rgyal po mu khyud kyis ci byas pa'ang shes par ma gyur te// mkhas pa'i bdag nyid mthu stobs
6568(): thogs pa med pa rnams// skad cig la yang dpag med 'gro ba'i sgrib po dag/ bsal zhing byang chub zang lam dri ma med ston pa// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mun pa sel zhing shar ba bzhin// 'di
6569(): 'dra'i mthu chen srid na nam yang yod min pas// lha rnams kun gyis mchog la ya mtshan ci zhig yod// de nas rgyal po mu khyud ri rab kyi khar phyin nas// nags tshal 'thug po rnam pa ba
6570(): cad du sngo bar mthong ste/ ma ti li la smras pa/ sprin chen spungs pa bzhin du ldan 'thug cing // rgya mtsho'i dum bu lta bur rab tu sngo// nor bu lta bur gsal zhing snum gyur pa// nags tshal me tog
6571(): tshogs kyis bkram byas pa// 'di ni phyin ci log dang bral gyur pa'i// sems can rnams kyi gnas su gyur par nges// ma ti lis smras pa/ 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
6572(): chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa zhes bgyi ba lags pas/ rgyal po chen po thags thogs ma mchis par gdud cig/ lha thams cad kyang 'dir 'dus te mchi'o// de nas rgyal po mu khyud chos bzang
6573(): gang na ba der phyin par gyur to// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ lha rnams longs spyod dga' ston rgyas gyur pas// me tog phreng thogs rol mo'i sgra sgrogs shing // glu gar snyan pa rab tu mdzes pa
6574(): yis ngas bdag de ni gus pas bsu byed pa// rgya mtsho'i dus tshigs rlabs kyi phreng ba bzhid// ma 'khrugs dal zhing mngon du phyogs par gyur// de tshe lha yi dbang po yis// bdag nyid che
6575(): de 'od rig nas// bag yod brtad pa'i rgyal de la// gus pas rang gi rin chen khri// nor bu'i snying po las grub pa// ka tsa lir+tha kas g.yogs pa// de yang dga' bzhin bstabs par gyur//
6576(): de nas rgyal po mu khyud brgya byin gyi stan phyed la 'dug go/ 'dug nas kyang lha'i dbang pos dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtam byas nas rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
6577(): rnams kyi bstan pa 'jig rten du bzhag pa ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de nas lha'i dbang pos/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag shes
6578(): par gyis shig/ mi dbang rgyal po 'di ni thabs mkhas shing // bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dang ldan pa skye// 'di ltar lam 'di skad cig yud tsam la// srog chags bye ba phrag
6579(): ni brgyad cu rnams// mi skyo'i chos la bzod pa thob par byas// e ma'o mthu cheran khyad par 'dil ltos// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang rgyal po chen po mu khyud chos dang ldan pa'i
6580(): gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ slar yang rgyal po chen po mu khyud kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang
6581(): po bdag ni phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro bar 'dod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// bdag der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten mi rtag
6582(): snying po med pa ste// byis pa'i blo can bdag tu rtog pa rnams// srid pa kun tu sdug bsngal rtag tu rmongs// zo chu'i rgyud ltar yang nas yang du 'khor// lha yi bde ba dpag med mngon myong
6583(): zhing yang srid 'khyams pas legs par tshim par gyur// da ni bag yod thabs la mkhas pa yis// bag med rnams kyi don phyir 'jig rten du// gnas pa lha dbang le lo byar mi rung //
6584(): bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro bar 'dod// dbang po khyed kyis lha yi srid pa dag/ bag med 'dod pa chog mi shes pa yi// lha mo rnams dang myos pas dus 'da' ba// bzlog skye thar lam
6585(): mchog la 'god par mdzod// de ltar spras par mngon te// de la brgya byin gyi smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod gang gi dus la bab par mkhyen na bzhud cig/ de nas rgyal po mu khyud phyir 'dzam
6586(): bu'i gling du phyin nas/ snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing / thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la btul bar gyur to// 'jig
6587(): re rA da ni sems cad rnams// yul la myos pa'i kun rtog gis// drangs te bzang me'i reg pa la'ang // dbang med 'khrul pa lta bur byed// rgyal sras bag yod ldan spyod pa// brgya byin
6588(): bde ba dri med la// mi gtsang dong bzhir bsten mi byed// gti mug mud pa 'dis mtshar byas// gzhan dor khur ched mgo la khyer ba rnams// 'gro la phan phyir dmyal ba'i mo dong la// pad+ma'i
6589(): mtsho la ngang pa bzhin du 'jug/ nyid kyi dbu bcad dgyes pa'i spyan gyis blta// bag med bde ba 'dod pa'i rmongs pa dag/ tshig rtsub reg pa gcig ni spang 'dod pas// dmyal ba'i
6590(): me dong dbang med bde ba bcom// gzhan gyi bde la yid smon bzhin du lta// kye ma srid 'di bag med nyes brgyas bcom// dam pa rnams ni de las bzlog pa snyam// de lta bos na skyes
6591(): bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes su slob cing // rang dang gzhan gyi don bde blag tu 'grub par 'dod pas bag yod pa la gnas par bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa/
6592(): mngon du byas pa rnams kyi don bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes thabs mkhas pa'i phan yon bsngags pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi che ba bstan pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// mu khyud kyi
6593(): skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu bdun pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa rnams ni log par lta ba'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po'i shugs kyis khyad par du'ang
6594(): brtson pa dang ldan pas yang dag pa'i lta ba la sbyor bar mdzad do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sdang ba 'chang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal
6595(): pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du skye dgu tshe lo brgyad stong thub pa rnams kyi dus su/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
6596(): 'od zhi spos snang dpal zhes bya ba 'jog rten du byung ste/ sems can rnams la theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i chos ston to// de'i tshe rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdod ces bya ba sa chen po n+ya
6597(): mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa skyong bar byed pa byung ngo // des skye ba'i las yongs su rdzogs nas bdag nyid kyi bsod nams kyi mthus rin po che rnam pa bdun po'ang thob par gyur ci
6598(): 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas pa'i skye bo thams cad sa'i bdag po de'i dpal gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don thams cad grub par gyur te// sa bdag de ni sngon du sbyangs
6599(): pa'i mthus// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa'i rang bzhin dang // yongs su sbyangs shing blo ni ngag gyur pas// gcig tu chos kyi don la rab tu brtson// mtshan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan
6600(): rnam par mdzes// gza' skar tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i nam mkha' bzhin// ngag cing yon tan tshogs kyis rab tu bkra// de ni snying rje'i sprin phung g.yo ba can// rjes su bstan pa'i cho ga gi/
6601(): char rgyun gyis// skye bo'i snying gi gzhi la legs phab pas// dge ba'i tshogs rnams skrun par byed pa bzhin// de bas 'dir ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur// de lta bu'i rgyal po chen po de 'khor
6602(): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob par gyur du zin kyang / 'jig rten thams cad mi rtag cing snying po med pa'i tshul mngon du gyur pas gzhan gyi don du bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi
6603(): sems nye bar gnas pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang btsal ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ni spos sdang dpal de la bdag nyid kyi btsun mo'i 'khor dang
6604(): bu dang khams kyi rgyal phran dang blon po dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang bcas pa thams cad chos mnyan zhing mchod pa'i las la kun tu brtson pa cher byed do// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe
6605(): de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i mthus btsun mo dab pa lha mdzes la sogs pa'i bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams bud med du skye ba'i las kyi sgrib pa byang bar gyur te/ thams
6606(): cad kyang skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong nyid kyi bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag nas bdag nyid dang bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang / skyes bu lba
6607(): mdzes la sogs pa'i brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gzhan yang srog chags dgu khri nyis stong dang bcas te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyad pa spod par gyur to//
6608(): 'dir smras pa/ thugs rje che ldan rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs rje'i stobs kyang dpag med la// rgyal ba'i sras rnams rmad du byung ba'i yon tan stobs kyang dpag
6609(): med dong rwa lus 'di nyid la las kyi mthu bcom sbrul gyi shun pa rjes pa ltar// dman pa'i lus las dag pa'i lus su grub par gyur 'di rang rmad du byung // 'di na bag med kun tu rmongs pas
6610(): sred pa'i rgya mtshor lhung ba rnams// rmi lam bde bo skad cig tsam la'ang sad kyang kun tu rtog par byed// blo gros ldan rnams rgyal srid dpal yang chags med mchil ma ltar// 'dor bar byed/
6611(): cing rgyal ba'i bstan la rmad byung spyad pa spyod par gyur// de'i tshe yongs su ma smin pa'i srog chags bye ba mang po 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'di ltar dge sbyong 'di dag ni bdud kyi las la
6612(): brtson pa ste/ g.yo rgyu can du sgyu mas gzhon slu bar byed pa bud med kyi dbang po dag mi snang bar byed cing bsgyur ba ltar 'chos pa la la ni lhur lung ston// la la ni dmyal ba dang yi dgas
6613(): dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su lung ston/ la la ni shi 'phos nas skye ba med par lung ston te/ dge sbyong 'od zhi spos snang dpal de dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis rab tu smra bar byed pa yin gyis
6614(): bdag cag 'di nis dong ste de'i gzugs dang rtags 'dzin pa'ang mi mthong ba dang / de'i tshig kyang mi thos pa'i sar 'dong ngo zhes glengs par gyur te/ shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul ces bya ba
6615(): zhig yod pa des log par lta ba'i srog chags de dag yongs su bsdus nas/ gang na ri khrod nyam nga ba mtha' khob kyi gnas yod pa der song bar gyur te/ shor ba gnon nu'i tshul des
6616(): sems can de dag la 'di skad du drang srong gi cha lugs bzung nas ston par byed do// kye shes ldan dag 'khor ba la thar pa'ang med/ legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i las kyi
