6617(): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang med na dge sbyong 'od zhi spos snang dpal 'di ni 'di lta bu'i tshul du ston te/ des ni bud med dbang po bsgyur byed cing // skra bregs chos can gos ni bskon byas
6618(): nas sna tshogs 'dod dang dga' ba rgyun bcad de// glu gar gling bu rtsed 'dze'i tshogs rnams dang // chang gi btung ba dus kyi zas bcad de// sna tshogs skye yis 'brid par byed 'gyur ba// 'di
6619(): 'dra sngon chad bdag gis ma thos te// 'di ni dgra bo mngon sum gyur pa yin// zhes bya ba la sogs pa sems can rnams lta ba log pa 'dzin pa la bkod par gyur to// de lta bu'i tshul de
6620(): ngadag dge slong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong gis thos pa mtha' 'khob kyi ri khrod na kha cig bdag nyid kyang lam ngan pa la zhugs shing gzhan yang lta ba mi bzad ma 'dzin du bcug ste/ dkor
6621(): mchog gsum la mi sman pa sgrogs so// zhes thos nas dge sbyong chen po de 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma'o 'jig rten skal nyams rnams// log pa'i lam du zhugs par gyur// thugs rje
6622(): mchog mnga' rgyal bas kyang // kun tu gdul bar mi nus pa'i// 'gro ba dag kyang yod pa lta// ci nas bdag gis lta ngan 'di dag kun// gti mug rgya mtshor log pa'i chu/
6623(): srin gyis// zin pa yid la bzlog par ma nus na// bdag gis rgyal ba'i rjes su ma bsgrubs shing // dge sbyong gyur pa don med nyid du zad// ma 'ongs dus na ye shes mig long gyur pa rnams//
6624(): thar bar bya phyir rgyal ba'i ye shes mig sbyin zhing // bdud bzhi'i zhags pas bcings pa'i 'gro rnams thar byed pa// mthu ldan rdzogs pa'i byang chub ci ltar rdzogs par bya// gzhan yang / lam
6625(): gol zhugs pa'i 'gro ba rnams// snying rje can gyis ma bzlog na// ngan 'gro'i ngam grog 'jigs rung bar// las kyi chom rkun ma rungs pas// sred pa'i zhags pas rab bcings te// thar
6626(): pa'i srog dang phral gyur na// rmad byung spyod pa'ang ji ltar 'gyur// de bas ci nas bdag gis ni// lus skams zhig par gyur kyang rung // nyam nga 'di las thar bya bar// da ni brtson par bya//
6627(): ba'i rigs// 'di snyam du gyur nas de nas dge sbyong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong brtul ba che zhing brtan pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos sdang dpal la zhus te/ srog
6628(): chags brgya stong du mas bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas mtha' 'khob kyi grong dang grong khyer dang grong brdal dang / ri brag nyam nga ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu phyin par gyur to// gang na phal gyis
6629(): bgrod dka' bar// nyam nga gcong rong du ma'i gnas// ljon shing gel ba rang rong can// sdong du mtsher mas gang ba'i gnas// chu rnams 'ur 'ur sgra 'byin cing // gcan gzan khro bo mang pos
6630(): gang mtha' 'khob dgon pa de dang der// skyabs med gyur pa'i 'gro ba la// snying rje'i shugs kyis yongs bskul nas// gzhan don spyad pa spyod par gyur// rgyal ba 'jig rten sgrol
6631(): ma kun gyi gnyen// thugs rje'i nyi ma 'jig rten shar gyur kyang // las kyi mun khrid nag po'i gting rum du// log pa'i bshes gnyen ngag gis bcing byas te// tshul dang
6632(): mi ldan sdug bsngal gnas gyur pa// de dag rnams la snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams// lhag par brtse ba'i shugs kyis nyer dgongs te// bdag nyid sdug bsngal chen po'i khur khyer/
6633(): nas de gzhan dag bde bas mchog tu bder sems pa// rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma gtogs gzhan la med// de bas 'dir ni spyod pa dpal dang ldan// bla na med gyur 'di ni mtshungs/
6634(): med do// de nas dge slong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong gis/ gang na mtha' 'khob tu gnas pa'i sems can skyabs dang skyob pa med cing log par lta ba'i dug gis snying khebs par gyur
6635(): pa'i rgyun phyogs su bangs pa de dag thams cad thabs mkhas pa de dang de dag gis btul te sdig pa'i lto ba las bzlog nas yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dzin du bcug cing / bla na med pa'i
6636(): byang chub dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i theg pa la rab tu bkod nas/ la la ni rab tu byung / la la ni dge bsnyen dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan
6637(): la bkod/ la la ni skyabs su 'gro ba la bkod nas/ srog chags mang po gang de bzhin gshegs pa la the tshom du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang lta ba ngan pa las bzlog nas nyes pa rnam/
6638(): bshags su bcug cingade bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam la bkod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos sdang dpal de nyid la phul nas rab tu byung ngo // de lta bu'i rgyud du byung ba'i spyod tshul
6639(): can de la gzhan dag gis smras pa/ oM ma'o spyod tshul rgya cher ldan// dge slong chen po ut+pal gdong // brtson pa'i mthu dang ldan pa ste// sna tshogs sdug bsngal bzod byed cing // gzhan
6640(): don spyod pa'i bsam pa can// de'i lus dang sems la dub med cing // bdud kyi dbang gyur skye bo ma rabs rnams// log lta'i gzhu la tshig rtsub mnga' rnams ni// kun tu drangs te 'ben
6641(): par gzas pa yang // me tog phreng ba bzhin du dang du len// de ni bzod pa'i go cha brtan po dang // bcas te snying rje'i gzhu rnams legs brdungs nas// cho 'phrul gsum gyi mda' rnams
6642(): 'phangs pa yis// 'gro ba'i snying la legs par phog gyur te/ bdud bzhi'i dmag rnams pham par byed par gyur// de ltar rnam pa du mas sems can gyi don bsgrub pa las/ gzhan 'gro/
6643(): ba du ma rnams rab tu dad par gyur kyang shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul ces bya ba de 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' la lhag par yang zhe sdang zhing khon du 'dzin par gyur nas de 'di skad du/ dge
6644(): slong ut+pa la'i gdong 'dis bdag gri 'khor rnams bslus te drangs pa las/ bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
6645(): rgyas pa'i zhing der bdud byas te 'di ltar mngal na 'dug pa'i dus thams cad du 'di la rnam par gtse'o// de nas phyis btsas nas gzhon nus rtsed mo byed pa dang / bzo'i las kyi
6646(): mtha' dang / klog cing 'dug pa dang / dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bsgrag par bya'o//
6647(): gegs bya'o// byang chub thob nas kyang bstan pa gshig par bya'o zhes smon lam btab po/ yang dag shes rab mig med gyur pa rnams// phan par byed la log par bsgrub 'gyur te//
6648(): dam pa rnams ni drin du gzo ba'i phyir// slar yang 'jig rten phan la brtson par byed// de bas 'dir ni log par bsgrub pa la// slar la phan byed 'di ni bla med do// de nas dge sbyong chen po
6649(): ut+pa la'i gdong gis/ thabs mkhas pa rnam pa du mas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul de 'bad pa drag pos dad par byas/ sdig pa'i lta ba'i thibs po de las bzlog ste nyes pa bshags su
6650(): bcug nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go// 'gro ba'i rnam g.yeng shugs drag gis// las kyi rgyur phyogs 'bas
6651(): pa yang / thugs rje'i shugs kyis khor yug gis// bzlog cing 'khyil ba bzhin du 'gyur// de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul de rab tu dul zhing dad pa skyes nas byang chub sems
6652(): dpa' de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces smras so// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sarba/
6653(): rgyas pa/ de'i tshe bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol zhes smon lam btab bo// de ltar shor po gzhon nu'i tshul la sogs pa srog
6654(): chags byed pa brgyad steng de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas byang chub sems dpa' de yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// log
6655(): pa'i lam zhugs skye bo sdig can la// thabs dang brtson 'grus brtul ba chen po yis// drangs te zhi ba'i lam du 'god mdzad pa// rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa rmad du byung // de
6656(): bas ci nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams// 'jig rten ded dpon bla na med pa yin// de bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi mthu ni dpag tu med cing / bdag nyid
6657(): la log par sgrub pa rnams kyang snying rje chen po'i shugs kyis drangs te bla na med pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa dang / dge ba'i ba
6658(): gnyen gyi phan yon bsngags pa la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// don 'di lta bu phyis 'byung ba'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyis dge slong
6659(): ut+pa la'i gdong de ni nga yin no// byams pa nI lho mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to// 'dod pa'i khams kyi bdud sdig can 'di ni shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul ces bya bar gyur to zhes gsun
6660(): sro don 'dis ni smon lam yang mthu che bar rig par bya'o// dge slong ut+pa lA'i gdong gi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu brgyad pa'o// / skyes bu dam pa/
6661(): ye shes kyi stobs thob pa rnams ni rmad du byung ba'i byang chub kyi spyod pas bdud kyi gnas thams cad 'jig par byed cing thabs mkhas pa chen pos sems can dpag tu med pa bla na/
6662(): med pa'i theg pa la 'god par byed do// de yang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus dpag tu med pa'i snga rol gyi yang che snga rol du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
6663(): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub kyi spang pa spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'
6664(): dpa' ba'i stobs zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go/ 'jig rten sgron ma de yi sangs rgyas zhing // yon tan tshogs kyi dpal gyis brgyan pa de// lha dang mi
6665(): 'gro ba 'khod pa rnams// blo gros rgya chen bsod nams mthu ldan zhing // rgyal ba rgya chen theg pa mchog rab kyi// tshul gcig rgya chen dam chos ston byed cing // yon tan rgya chen byang chub
6666(): sems dpa' gang // de tshe de rnams kun gyi gtsor gyur pa// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba'i stobs de ni// sgra skar dbus na zla ba nya ba bzhin// 'khor gyi dbus su gsal bar 'phag/
6667(): par gyur// de ni de tshe rgyal ba de'i// sras kyi thu bor gyur pas na// ngal zhing dub pa med pa yis// rtag tu 'jig rten 'dren pa bzhin// de yi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis// skye bo log/
6668(): par bltas rnams kyang // yon tan mthu yis rab drangs te// yang dag lam du nye bar 'dren// des na rgyal sras dpa' stobs zhes// rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po bzhin//
6669(): ltar byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba'i stobs de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sras kyi thu bor gyur cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang rjes su ston par byed/ skye bo bag med pa
6670(): rnams kyang bag med pa las bzlog cing bstan pa de rab tu rgyas par gyur to// gang tshe thar pa'i lam mchog gsal gyur pa// de tshe bdud rnams zug rngu ldan gyur te// rin chen rin thang
6671(): med pa rnyed gyur pa// de la dgra byed mang 'di chos nyid yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la bdud du gyur pa bdud shugs 'chang zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
6672(): rnams la bar chad byed pa zhig byung ste/ de 'di snyam du/ kye ma 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten sgron ma 'dis bdag gi yul 'di ring po mi thogs par stongs par byed par
6673(): 'gyur gyis// ci nas bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams la bar chod bya'o snyam nas/ rnam pa 'di lta bus bar chod byed par gyur to// gang na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus
6674(): pa la bdud de sangs rgyas gzugs su sprul byed cing // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam// khyad du bsad nas 'dod yon bsngags par byed// gang dag lam la
6675(): zhugs pa de rnams la// gus pa'i tshul gyis bza' ba sna tshogs dang // dri dang phreng ba byug pa'i me tog tshogs// rol mo sil spyan snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// thogs shing glu dbyu
6676(): dbyings sgra gar dang bcas// rin chen rgyan phreng phreng bas brgyan byas pa// lha dang mi yi yid bzhin mdzes pa rnams// du mas 'dod pa'i ro la 'bring phyir mchod// lha yi bu dang bu mo mdze
6677(): pa rnams// nyin mtshan rgod cing rtse 'dze 'khrig pa dang // kun tu dga' ba du ma ston par byed// la lar yid 'byung byang chub spyod pa dag/ rnam pa brgyar yang bsdigs shing 'khrug par
6678(): byed de ltar rnam pa du mas 'bad pa yis// byang chub lam la sgrib par byed par gyur// de ltar bdud de 'bad pa byed pa la zhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa'
6679(): dpa' ba'i stobs kyis mngon du gyur nas/ kye ma'o bdag gis bdud 'di mngon du ma btul na 'di yang spa bkod par mi 'gyur zhing theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
6680(): sems dpa' dag kyang byang chub la nur bar srid pas da ni dus la bab bo snyam ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi shug+sa kyis bdud shugs chang gi mgul du khyi ro rul pa zhig btags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag
6681(): nyid bdud kyi gzugs kyis gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su song ste/ lha'i bu mo khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag byang chub la bkod nas bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
6682(): gyur te slar bdud kyi gnas de nyid nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga la spyod cing dga' mgur rtse bar sprul to// de nas bdud shugs 'chang mgul du khyi ro btags pa de mthong zhing / med
6683(): par bya'ang ma nus la sdug bsngal te/ myur bar rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i tshe lha yi lus mdzes la// khyi ro btags pa de mthong nas// dr-i nga rul cing myags pa des// mi gtsang
6684(): dong du lhung bzhin gyur// kyi hud bdag ni bdud gnas las// nyams par gyur pa ma yin grang // de nas rang gi gnas su phyin pa na de na lha'i bu dang bu mo rnams lhan cig tu rtse zhing
6685(): yongs su spyod pa mthong nas/ shin tu 'ang sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba blong blong por gyur cing shugs nar ces byung nas 'di skad ces smras par nges so// kye mu bdag ni bdud kyi
6686(): dpal las nyams// kyi hud yid du 'ong ba'i longs spyod rnams// gzhal med khang mdzes rab tu bkra ba na// lha yi mal cha btung ba bzang po dag/ gar byed lha mo mdzes pas skyob pa
6687(): rnams da ni spangs te 'gre ba ma yin grang // dga' bzeng dga' ba'i bu mo rnams// bdag la khros par gyur pa 'dra// spos mchog dus su 'brang ba'i dri// de yang 'dir ni tshor ma
6688(): gyur// rin chen rgyan phreng mdzes pa yis// spangs te khyi ro btags pa snyam// bzang mo dri zhim phreng ldan pa// dro zhing 'jam pa'i reg byar ldan// 'di rnams drung du bsnyen mi byed/
6689(): bdag ni ngan skyugs bzhin du gyur// kyi hud bdag sems rtswa bzhin bsregs// skyob pa gzhan ni med pa lta// de nas lha'i bu mo khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu po de rnams kyis bdud
6690(): shugs chang blong blong por gyur pa mthong nas// snying rje chen po skyes te smras pa/ bdud shugs 'chung 'di srog chags rnams kyi phyir sdig pa'i ros blong blong por gyur cing yang dag pa
6691(): ji lta ba bzhin mi shes pa la ltos/ gang na sdig pas rang sems bsregs pa dag/ dmyal ba'i me lce 'bar bas phog pa bzhin// bstan pa nyams nas smad pa'i gnas gyur te//
6692(): shugs 'chang 'di na sdug bsngal spyod pa bzhin// de nas lha'i bu mo rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ e ma'o slob dpon dpa' ba'i stobs
6693(): bdud shugs 'chang 'di bdag cag gi bdud kyi gnas la dbang phyug gi dbang byed na bdag cag gtses par mi 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba'i stobs//
6694(): ji lta bu yi rdzu 'phrul 'phrul byas te// shugs 'chang gnas las rab mchog mchog gyur pa'i// bdud kyi gzhal med khang chen chen po dang // dbang bsgyur bdud dang bcas pa sprul byas
6695(): nas de ma thag tu zhing de thal bar brlags// zhig cing rdul phran tsam yang med gyur te// mthong ba'i skye bo rnams ni skrag 'gyur zhing // mi rtag 'du shes mngon du rnyed par byas// de lta bu'i
6696(): bdud de dang bdud de'i gnas de zhig cing thor ba bdud shugs 'chang gis mthong nas/ kye ma bdag kyang yun mi ring ba kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur zhing 'di kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam du yid la sgyu
6697(): ba chen po skyes nas 'jig skrag cing spu long long por gyur nas skyabs tshol ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' de mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so// mkhas pas mgon//
6698(): med mgon mdzod rnam par lteng las grol bar mdzad// byis pa'i ngo bo bdag gis mi dge gang bgyis mi rtag pas// srid par 'gro ba kun gnod rtag tu ma lus mthol zhing mchis// rnam
6699(): 'jig chos kyi dngos po cung zhig mgon skyabs bgyis ma mchis// rnam par 'jig chos kun bdag rnam spangs bdag kyang ma grol ba// 'di ltar bzod par mdzod cig dpa' stobs bde bar/
6700(): gshegs pa'i sras// brtabs pas skrag cing nyams pa de yi yid kyis skyob pa can// nga rgyal rnam spangs rgyal ba'i sras la thams cad skyabs su zhugs// gang gis bdud 'jig
6701(): yongs spangs 'di ltar khyod la skyabs su mchi// / rgyal sras mkhas pas sdug bsngal nyams pa dag las bdag la skyobs// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shug+sa
6702(): 'chang dul bar rig nas rjes su bstan pa/ grogs pa rgyal ba'i sras la gegs ma byed cing nga rgyal spongs// srid kun mi rtag yongs su 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa thong // sems ni
6703(): mngon par dad pas nges par 'byung ba rab tu shes// sems can gang yang 'khrug pa'i yid kyis chog shes nam yang med// yid kyi rnyog ma sel dang rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa mthong /
6704(): de nas yang shugs 'chang gis gsol pa/ bdag sems rnyog pa dang bral zhing // yid kyis rnam par dag la 'bad// bdag nyid rgyal ba'i rim gro bgyid// rgyal ba'i gsung dag bdag/
6705(): gsungs// yang byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan byang chub sems la bdud nyon cig/ bde gshegs sras la gang dag thos pas bdud kyi zhags pa
6706(): #gcod nga rgyal bas rab gsungs chos nyid mi g.yo 'gyur med chos kyi dbyings// rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'di shes rgyal la mchod pa byas par 'gyur// gang dag
6707(): blo nges med pas so so'i skye'o byis pa zhes// byas te de ltar sems nges med pa kun rtog rlung dang 'dra// rgyal ba'i gsung las gang dag rnam shes de dag bdud kyi zhags// rlung gi stobs/
6708(): kyis phub ma phyar ltar ma lus shin tu bcom// 'gyur med chos dbyings steng pa gnyis med smras pa ni// bdud stobs 'joms par byed cing bdud dbang shes rab rnam par dag/ sems can
6709(): rnams ni skye dang 'tsha dang 'byung ba gang yang med// kun tu 'pho ba med cing las dang btung ba'ang yod min te// stong nyid rtogs par byed na rgyal ba'i sras rnams yid mi rmongs// tshul bzhin/
6710(): ma yin pa yis chos 'di kun la byed pa po// las dang rnam smin mi mkhas bdud kyi zhags pas 'ching // ji ltar skud mdud gzings pa'i skud pa rnam grol ltar// de bzhin 'dod drag
6711(): ma bral chos la 'dod chags bcas mthong 'ching // de yis sdug bsngal myong ste 'dir ni sdug bsngal gang yang med// gang dag rgyal ba'i gsung la the tshom med yid de 'ching med// de ni//
6712(): mya ngan 'da' zhing 'da' ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar bstan pa la bdud shugs 'chang rab tu dga' zhing chos mthong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba'i stobs la gus
6713(): pa'i dbang gis mchod pa du ma byas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten sgron ma'i drung du stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par gyur to// rgyal sras dpa' stobs snying rje chen
6714(): po yi shugs kyis shugs 'chang bdud kyi shugs bzlog nas// bla med bla ma theg chen blo gros la// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'odas mchog 'jig rten 'dren// sgron mas sgron me bzhin du
6715(): sgron gyur pas// gsal bar 'gro ba rnams kyi dron mdzad ces// deng sang na yang lha yi rnga sgra bzhin// phyogs su gsal bar brag cha bzhin du grags// gang gis 'dod khams
6716(): grags pa'i bdud kyi dregs// bcom nas zhum zhing zhi bar ldan pa yi// tshul 'di nyin mo'i dbang phyug skar ma yi// drung du 'ongs pas zhum par gyur pa 'dra// de bas 'dir ni thab
6717(): la mkhas pa yis// bdud stobs bcom pas byang chub reg par 'gyur// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi mthu thob pas ni bdud kyi gnas thams cad 'jig par
6718(): byed cing log par lta ba rnams kyang yang dag pa'i lam du 'jug par byed do zhes brjod par bya'o// bdag cag gi chos kyi rje 'di ni da ltar bdud sdig can btul bar ma zad kyi sngon nas
6719(): bdud thams cad btul ba yin no zhes sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba'i stobs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te dgu bcu dgu ma'o//
6720(): skyes bu dam pa ye shes kyi mthu thogs pa med pa rnams ni/ sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/
6721(): kyis kyang bsngags pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i snga rol na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
6722(): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyang rnam
6723(): par dag pa'i spyod tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ sngon gyi sbyor ba yongs su dag cing zhi// phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal rnams kun gyis brgyan// yid kyi nyes pa rnams gsum
6724(): g.yo ba med// 'jam zhing nges pa'i ngag gis rab tu brgyad// lus kyi las rnams yongs su dag pas na// 'phags pa'i lha bzhin yon tan gyis che ba'i// sems can
6725(): rnams kyis zhing de gtam par gyur// de bas zhing gi mchog tu gyur par grags// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar
6726(): gyur te de ni bdag cacag gi ston pa 'di yin no// rgyal ba'i sras po mthu chen ma smad pa// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag brgyad rnams kyis// de ni mthu chen gtso bo yin par snang // sbyin
6727(): ngang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab yongs su rdzogs gyur cing // thabs la mkhas pas gzhan don yongs su spyod// snying rje'i stobs kyis smon lam rgya che la/
6728(): ye shes mthu yis sems can thams cad kyi// don bya ba la dub par gyur pa med// chos tshul rgya mtsho'i gting mtha' gtugs gyur pas// sems can rgya mtsho'i nye bar spyad pa che// ting
6729(): 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mthu yis 'gro ba la// rnam thar rgya mtsho ston par gyur ces grag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/
6730(): sems can rnams la chos ston pa la mkhas pa/ sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'gro ba'i dus la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin no// de nas
6731(): byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas de la phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar te gsol ba btab nas sangs rgyas kyis zhing nas sangs
6732(): rgyas kyis zhing du rgyu zhing song ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du rkang pa bzhag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang /
6733(): zhing der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung bar shes so// bdud kyi gnas ji snyed yod pa thams cad spa bkod par 'gyur zhing / lha'i gnas thams cad ni rab tu dga' ba'i yon tan du
6734(): mas khyab par gyur te/ zhing de thams cad du'ang 'od gser gyi kha dog can gyis khyab par gyur to// de ltar rdzu 'phrul mthu chen gyis// gang du khyab par gyur pa des/
6735(): de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams// dga' zhing mgu la the tshom gyur// gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'bar ba'i 'od// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mog mog por byed pa// reg pas lus sems rab tu
6736(): tshim gyur pa'i// 'od 'di lha 'am klu 'am nor bu 'am// mthu chen gang las gyur zhe sa ya mtshan skyes// yid kyang rab g.yos phyogs rnams kun tu bltas// de tshe sems can rnams kyi
6737(): bsam pa bzhin// gsal bar sten byed tshig 'di thos par gyur// sangs rgyas mthu yis zhing 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bas khyab// sems can su dag rgyal ba'i dbang po//
6738(): mngon sum mthong bar gang 'dod pa// de dag thams cad thal mo sbyor la kun mkhyen mtha' las spyan mnga' ba// bdag gis mngon sum mthong bar shog ces 'dir ni gus pa'i tshig smos shig/
6739(): de nas zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can de rnams kyis sgra de thos nas bar sdang la thal mo sbyar te/ khyod kyis bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig sprod cig ces pa'i dgra phyung ngo //
6740(): de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pos sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa de rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das de dang mthun pa'i sprul pa bye ba phrag
6741(): brgya stong dag mngon par sprul te sems can re res sprul pa re re mthong zhing shes kyi sprul pa gzhan ni mi mthong ngo // de lta bu'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pos nyi ma gcig gis
6742(): kyang 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri phrag dpag tu med pa rnams su byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag phyir mi ldog pa la bkod par gyur to//
6743(): 'jig rten mthu chen mthu dang stebs// sman dang nor bu gsang sngags dang // kun gyi mthu yang ci yod pa// rgyal sras rnams kyi ye shes mthu// 'gro la phan phyir skad cig gis//
6744(): dpe bzlar rung ba ma yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas des byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag po mthu dang stobs dang brtson 'grus bskyed par mdzad nas sangs
6745(): rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstun pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu song la nga'i 'od kyi rjes stsogs shig/ gang du
6746(): nga'i 'od gnas par mthong ba de tsam du nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du shes par gyis shig/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'od gser gyi kha dog can btang ngo // de nas
6747(): byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che// gzi brjid drag pos rdzu 'phrul mthu yis ni// rgyal ba'i 'od zer de yi rjes su song // de ni bskal pa grangs med par dag tu// rdzu 'phrul mthu
6748(): yis 'od kyi rjes song yang // 'od de gang na gnas pa ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de bskal pa grangs med pa du mar rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mur ba'i shugs kyis 'od de'i
6749(): rjes su song yang mthas gtugs par ma gyur pas lus rgyu zhing sgyid lug par gyur to// de nas bar snang de la sangs rgyas kyi sku zhig byung nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs
6750(): kyi bu dal ba'i rgyu yid la ma byed cig/ sgyid lug par mi byed par re shig cung zad ring du song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas kyis 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
6751(): mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gang gis byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag po'i lus kyi ngal ba bsal nas lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang yang dag par ldan
6752(): par mdzad do// de nas sangs rgyas mthu yis ni// bskal pa grangs med pha rol song // de nas rin chen sna bdun las// grub pa'i ljon shing gsal bar mthong // gang
6753(): na byang chub snying po'i brgyan bzhin du// rab tu mdzes shing lta bas mi ngoms pa'i// rin chen ljon shing mdzes pa de mthong ste// de yi pha rol rgyal ba'i 'od zer mthong // de
6754(): nas de'i tshe bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ thugs
6755(): la dri ma bral zhing sbyor ba spungs// khyod kyis 'jig rten khams kun thugs su chud// 'dred pa khyod kyi 'od ni ci 'dra ba// 'di la yul gyi mtha' ni rjes su 'jug/ de skad ces/
6756(): gsol pa dang / de'i tshe bar snang las rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig byung ste khang pa brtsegs pa der sangs rgyas kyi gzugs byung la des byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid
6757(): drag po de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang dag nga yi rkang pa'i drung 'dug dang / gang dag yul 'di yi ni mthar 'dug pa// thams cad nga yi sgra dag thos gyur te// de
6758(): yi grub pa thams cad shes par gyur// stobs bcu'i yon tan chos ni ma 'dris pa// bstan pa 'di la srog chags kun la bden// yul gyi rang bzhin yul gyi dngos dang bzo/
6759(): de bzhin yul gyi tshig dag kun thos so// rgyal ba nga yi drung 'dir sems can dag/ tshig 'di thos nas dang bar mi 'gyur med// thams cad bla na med pa'i sa la gnas/
6760(): dag rgyal ba'i chos la ldog mi 'gyur// gang dag nyan thos lhan cig thun mong ba'i// de dag ma yin 'di ni rnam 'dren chos// rgyal ba gang la rab tu sems dngas pa// bdud kyi
6761(): skyon bcom byang chub reg par 'gyur// zhes bstan pa thos nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pos de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad
6762(): pa'i don zab mo 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing mu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis reg pa de thams cad du khyab cing go bar byas so//
6763(): des sems can dpag tu med pa dag phyir mi ldog pa la 'khod par gyur to// 'dir gzhan dag gis smras pa/ rgyal ba'i rnam thar 'od zer rgya chen sprin// nam mkha'i
6764(): dbyings ltar dpag tu med par khyab// rgyal ba'i sras kyi brtson 'grus rgya chen stobs// nam mkha'i rjes zhugs ma nyams brtan pa yin// 'di na tshe gcig brtson 'grus
6765(): brtson med pa'ang // bdag ni mthu chen rgyal ba'i rjes zhugs smra// rgyal ba'i sras 'di rdzu 'phrul mthu chen gyis// grangs med bskal pa du ma'i bar du yang / rgyal
6766(): ba'i gsung gcig 'od kyi don du 'jug/ rnam thar rgya chen sems can yongs smin byed// de bos rgyal sras spyod pa cha shas kyang // stong gsum phra rab rdul grangs nga rgyal gyi// ye
6767(): shes bsdus pas dper yang mi rung phyir// mthu chen rgyal sras brtse bar ldan pa la// dus rnams kun tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// de lta bu'i don de yang bsdus te gsungs pa/
6768(): mo'u mgal gyi bu de ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin par sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i
6769(): dus na byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag por gyur te/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis kyi bar du rjes su 'brangs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams
6770(): cad du tshigs su bcad pas go bar byas so// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi go cha bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la'ang the tshom med cing som nyi
6771(): med par bya'o zhes gsungs so// gzi brjid drag po'i skyes pa'i rabs te brgya tham pa'o// / sdom la/ 'od bzang drang srong tog gi blo// sngo bsangs
6772(): dang ni kau phreng spong // rnga bong mu khyud ut+pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' gnyis te bcu/ skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
6773(): sems can thams cad kyi don du bla ni med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing rmad du byung ba'i spyod tshul rnam par dge pas byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/ rnam pa thams
6774(): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gyur pa 'di ni chos nyid yin la/ khyad par du'ang bdag cag gi ston po bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bskul pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa'i sngon rol
6775(): du bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul la sogs pa ches rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal ba'i sras rgya mtsho las ches rmad du byung ba legs par 'dun pa dang ldan pa'i sa
6776(): gzhi dang gser dang zla ba tshes pa lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis nye bar 'phangs pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i ljon shing chen po rab tu rgyas par
6777(): gyur te sbyin pa'i rtsa ba rab tu brtan pa tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i sdong po bzod pa'i yal gas shin tu phye zhing brtson 'grus kyi shun pas kun tu khyab pa bsam gtan gyi 'dab mas kun
6778(): nas klubs shing shes rab kyi me tog rab tu gsal ba thabs mkhas pa'i dri bsung rab tu 'phro ba can smon lam gyi 'bras bu dang rabs kun tu g.yegs shing stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu
6779(): dang ldan pa can ye shes kyi yon tan rmang du byung bas sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i nad sel bar byed cing rang gi yon tan gyi khyad par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des skyes pa'i rabs
6780(): rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa bstan nas/ rang gi smon lam dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang sems can yongs su smin bar mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
6781(): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs bskal pa bzang po 'di la dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'di yang
6782(): dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba yongs su bzung nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams las gnas gsum gyis rmad du byung ba bstan te rgyal tshab mdzad par gyur to zhes grag go// bskal brgya
6783(): mtsho dpag tu med pa ru// thugs rje rgya mtsho rlabs kyis rab bskul nas// skye rabs rgya mtsho'i phreng ba ston byed pa// gnas 'di klu dbang rgya mtsho khyod la mnga'// snying rje'i chu klung dpag
6784(): yas cher 'bab cing // yon tan gnas dang nags tshal kun bskyed pa// 'phel 'grib med pa'i thugs su ro gcig pa// rgyal ba'i sras mchog klu dbang mtshungs med mthu// nyin
6785(): mor byed dang mtshan mo'i gsal byed ni// mkha' lnga gsal mtshungs mtshungs pa med gsal ba// 'ga' zhig 'byed pa'i pad+ma 'dzum byed la// gzhan ni ku mud rnams rab gsal
6786(): byed// de bas khyod thugs dkyil 'khor 'od zer gyis// snyigs dus mchog gi pad+ma dgod pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i sras gzhan zhing dang gdul bya rnams// dag pa'i ku mud tshal rab
6787(): rgyas byed ces// khyod kyi gsung rab rnga sgra'i brag cha las// gsal bar grags pa thos pa bzhin du gyur// de bas khyod la bdag ni rnam kun tu// lhag pa'i yon tan mnga' bar gyur
6788(): pa snyam// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa tog dkar po de dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dpag tu med pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad de thugs la
6789(): dgongs pa 'di lta bu mngon sum du gyur te/ gang ngas skye ba mang po yongs su 'khor ba na rang gi sha dang khrag dang mgo dang mig dang bu dang chung ma rnams gtong ba dang shin tu gtong bas yongs
6790(): su gtong ba dang // dka' ba'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang / gzhan gyis sbyar ba'i bsnyen bkur ma yin pa sna tshogs bzod par byas pa dang / rtag tu ldog
6791(): pa med pa'i spro ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ma chags par gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i blo gros kyis sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed nas/ e ma ho/
6792(): 'di ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa med pa skyabs dang skyob pa med pa/ snyigs ma rnam pa lnga dang bcas pa rnams la ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang ma grol ba rnams grol ba dang dbugs ma
6793(): phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes yun ring po nas bsams pa gang yin pa ni dus la bab po snyam du/
6794(): dgongs so// de tshe sngon gyi smon lam dang // phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyi mthus// lha rnams kyi ni rol mo las// sgra'i 'das gsal bar yongs su bskul// bsod nams rgya
6795(): chen tshogs mnga' 'dren rtogs dang // blo gros mtha' yas shes 'od mdzad cing // mtshungs med stobs mnga' mthu rtsal rgya che ba// mar me mdzad kyi lung bstan dgongs par
6796(): mdzod rdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis bskul nas// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la rjes su bstan cing byang chub sems dpa' byams pa rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur te/
6797(): rigs dang / dus dang / yul dang / rgyud dang / yum la gzigs pa mdzad nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i dus su shAkya'i rgyud bu ram shing pa nyi ma'i rus
6798(): yul dbus kyi ser skya'i grong khyer gyi dbus su rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzigs pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpyid zla tha chungs
6799(): tshe tshes bco lnga'i skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i dus su lha rnams kyi dbang pos yum gyo lhums sbyangs shing / yum gso sbyong blangs pa'i lhums su 'jug par mdzad de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen/
6800(): pos khyab par mdzad cing dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par gyur to// gdengs ka can gyi mthus bskyod pa'i// chu yang mkha' la bskyod pa las// 'thon cing nub pa'i zla ba bzhin// 'dir yang mtshu
6801(): par gyur pa 'dra// gang tshe dpal ldan mnyam med nyer bshags pa// de tshe 'jig rten so so'i gling bar na// mun gyis khebs gyur phyogs rnams thams cad du// gsal snang 'byung 'gyur 'di ni chos nyid do//
6802(): gang gi tshe lhums su zhugs pa na// lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos rmi lam bzang po dag mthong ste rgyal po la gsol ba lha gsan du gsol/ glang po kha ba dngul mdog che ba drug/ rkang lag rab mdzes mgo bo dmar sdug
6803(): pa 'gros bzangs lus tshigs rdo rje bzhin brtan pa// glang po'i mchog cig khong du song snyam byed// des ni de 'dra'i bde ba brgya lam na'ang // ma mthong ma thos myong bar ma gyur te// lus kyang bde bzhin sems
6804(): kyang bde gyur nas// bsam gtan mnyam par bzhag pa bzhin du gyur// zhes ci ltar rmis pa bzhin du gsol ba dang / rgyal pos bram ze rnams la dris pa/ de ni shin tu dge ske 'khon
6805(): lo bsgyur ba 'am sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro zhes rig byed las 'byung ba bzhin du spras shing sems rangs par gyur to// gang tshe thub chen yum gyi lhums zhugs pa// de tshe lha rnams snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs sgrog
6806(): dbang por bcas pa'i lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs// tshangs dbang lha rnams kun gyis mchod par byed// gzhal med dbyibs legs rin ched du mas spras// tsan dan dri zhim mchog gis rab tu bsgos//
6807(): der ni dpa' bo rnam par bzhugs par gyur// ji ltar lha dbang gzhal med khang gnas bzhin// dper na nor bu shel tshon 'od gsal dang // rab gtsang kA shi ras kyang gos pa med// de bzhin thub che/
6808(): lhums na zhugs pa na// mngal gyi dri mas cis kyang gos pa med// gang tshe lhums su bzhugs pa de yi tshe// de yum lus ngal dub par gyur pa med// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gnod pa bral//
6809(): mgu ba'i sems dang dga' dang yid bder gnas// las kyi rnam smin zad pas mtho ris thob// de tshe 'gyur ba 'di ni chos nyid do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lhums su zhugs pa'i tshe rnam
6810(): par 'phrul pa du mas skye bo yongs su smin par ni mdzad/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang sdug 'phongs rnams la sbyin pa ni gtong / dge legs thams cad ni zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du gyur to// de nas byang
6811(): chub sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab pa na lha rnams kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i snga ltas sum cu so gnyis byung ste/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab par
6812(): shes nas/ rgyal po la gsol pa/ bdag gi bsam pa gang lags gsol gyis gsan du gsol// yun rings thal nas skyed mo'i tshal gyi blo skyes te// gal te khyod ni bkyon zhing phrag dog mi mnga' ma/
6813(): bdag ni rtse nas skyed mos tshal du mchi bar gsol// sA la'i shing ljon mchog rnams kyang // myu gu me tog kha 'bus te// rma bya khu byug sna tshogs rnams// gtsang zhing mdzes pa sgra snyan 'byin// skyed mos
6814(): tshal du mchi bar rigs// legs par bka' lung stsal du gsol// rgyal pos lha mo'i tshig de skad thos nas mgu ba'i tshig gis myur du 'khor rnams la smras pa/ yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan lum bi'i tshil
6815(): brgyar gyis// ri sngo'i mdog can sprin gyi kha dog mthun gyur pa'i// glang po steng phrag nyi shu mumyur du bsnyad par gyis// nor bus rnam par spras shing gser gyi dra bas spud// rgyal po'i bcibs pa rlung ltar
6816(): mgyogs pa'i shugs ldan pa// dngul dang kha ba'i gdong 'dra rnga rngog lcang lo bzang // rta mchog stong phrag nyi shu drangs pa myur du stod// skyes bu brtul phod g.yul la mos shing 'thab na dpa'// mda'
6817(): gzhu ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon cha thogs// stong phrag nyi shur bgrangs pa myur du bsham gyis la// sgyu 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pa bag yod bsrung bar gyis// de ltar bshams nas myur du nga la sbran par gyis//
6818(): de nas ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du 'khor rnams kyis legs par bshams nas/ dpyid kyi dus kyi rgyal dang 'dzom pa'i tshes brgyad kyi snga dro bkod pa'i khyad par du mas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /
6819(): lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo lum bi nI'i tshal du 'gro bar brtsams so// de'i tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis// ser skya'i sgo drung phyin pa dang // tshangs pa'i bu dang skye bo'i tshogs// ched du brjod pa'i sgra snyan 'byin// de tshe shing rta rin
6820(): chen mchog/ lha yi gos kyis legs bkab cing // g.yer kha'i dra ba mchog gis bkab// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis// brgyan pa'i shing rta mchog de la// lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'dug gyur pa// de chos 'di rnam
6821(): drug g.yos// de ltar mthu chen gsal bar gyur// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis ni yongs su bsrungs// shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du bdar// shAkya'i rigs rgan
6822(): pa dang gzhon pa dang bar ma bzhi khris ni yongs su bskor/ lha dang klu dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bkod pa'i brgyar sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa sha stag klu dang rol
6823(): mo'i sgra dbyangs kyis bsngags pa brjod pas rjes su 'brang zhing // gzhan yang / lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'dug pa'i shing rta mchog de ni// 'jig rten skyong ba mthu chen rnams kyis 'dren par byed// tshangs dang brgya
6824(): byin lam rnams kun tu sel byed cing // lha rnams brgya steng du mas thal mo sbyar nas 'dud// e ma'o// 'di ni lha yi lha gcig mchog gyur zhes// rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis de la lta/
6825(): de tshe lha dang mi yi dpal 'byor 'dres gyur cing // lum bi'i tshal rab lha rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// de tshe nags tshal dam pa ste// me tog myu gu rgyas gyur te// lha rnams mthu yis phye ba yis//
6826(): yid dang lhan cig 'brel pa bzhin// me tog myu gu'i thal mo rnams// rab tu phye zhing gsal ba yis// rlung gis phog pa'i ge sar dri// phyogs kun khyab par byed pa 'dra// byang chub sems dpa'
6827(): dpag med dang // lha dang mir bcas thams cad kun// de tshe chos kyi dga' skyon gyis// 'jig rten khyab par byed do zhes// dbul po'i tshogs rnams 'dus pa bzhin// yid ni dga' bas drang
6828(): bar gyur// sgyu 'phrul sras dang bcas rnams la// mchod phyir mchod pa'i bye brag rnams// mchod sprin rgya mtsho'i rlabs phreng can// de yi mthu yi bzlog pa 'dra// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul shi
6829(): mchog las babs nas 'chag na dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su myong zhing // de rims kyis shing rin po che'i mchog kI'i drung du phyin te/ nam mkha'i ngos la snang ba'i glog gi phreng ba lta bu'i yan lag rin po che'i
6830(): rgyur gyi mngon par mdzes pa// g.yas pa brkyang nas p+lak+Sha'i yal ga la bzung ste/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ma'i glo g.yas pa nas dran bzhin shes bzhin mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung
6831(): ste de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis kyis gos kA shi ka'i sleb mos byang chub sems dpa' blangs so// de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sa la babs/
6832(): pa na pad+ma chen po gcig rang byung ba'i steng du zhabs bzhag ste seng+ge'i lta stangs kyi phyogs rnams su gzigs nas shar phyogs su gom pa bdun bor te sems can
6833(): thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs so// de bzhin du lho phyogs su gom pa bdun bor nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi yon gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o// nub phyogs su nga'i skye ba tha ma ni 'di
6834(): yin no zhes pa dang / byang phyogs su srid pa'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar bya'o zhes gsungs par gyur to// gang tshe rnam 'dren bltams par gyur pas sa ni rer bcas shin tu g.yos// nyin mor byed
6835(): pas sdang bar nus min gling bar rnams kyang gsal bar gyur// tshangs sogs lha rnams bla ma de la bstod cing mchod pas phyag kyang 'tshal// rgya mtsho'i klu dbang tshogs rnams spos chus rkang gnyis
6836(): gtso la sku khrus gsol// bram ze rnams kyis sa bdag mchog dang rgyal ba'i dbang por lung ston byed// grong khyer mchog gi dpal rnams rgyas par bkod ma'i chu bo bzhin du 'phel// de tshe don rnams
6837(): grub po zhes// de yi mtshan gyi khyad par kyang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams 'gengs pa'i// lha yi rdo sgra bzhin du grags// de tshe drang srong nag pos kyang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis nyer song ste// 'di ni rgyal//
6838(): dbang 'gyur ro zhes// de la ya mtshan skyes gyur te// gdung ba'i shugs kyis bskyed pa yis// gzugs 'dzin dbang po'i rgya mtsho las// char pa'i rgyun bzhin bab gyur te// gdung ba'i snyan dag brjod ces/
6839(): grag 'de'i tshe rgyal pos kyang phyag byas te smras pa// khyod la lha kun phyag 'tshal zhing // drang srong rnams kyis mchod gyur te// 'jig rten kun gyis mchod rten pas// bdag kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
6840(): zhes bstod do// lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'ang dus byas te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs su skye dgu'i
6841(): bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa'i ma ma bcu drug dang / mchod pa'i las byed pa du ma dag gis rim gro byed cing sems can du ma dag yongs su smin par mdzad do// nyid kyi mthu chen khyad par 'gro ba la// bas
6842(): phyir lum bi'i tshal rab nyams dga' na// chos brgyad rgyal dang 'dzem pa'i dus kyi tshe// nyid kyi mthu yis bltams par gyur zhes grag / de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams
6843(): cad grub pas sems can gyi don du bzo'i gnas la mkhas par mdzad de// thog mar yi ge'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen byis pa sum khri nyis stong dang bcas pa bla na med pa'i byang chub tu smin
6844(): par mdzad pa'i phyir yi ge'i grwar 'jug pa bstan te bdag nyid kyi rmad du byung ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir lha dang klu dang tshangs pa'i yi ge la sogs pa yi ge'i rigs drug cu rtsa ba ni mkhyen par bstan cing de
6845(): bzhin du ral gri'i thabs 'phong dang gyad kyi 'dzin stang la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi dang rig byed du ma'ang mkhyen par bstan par mdzad do// rmang byung yon tan rgya che mthu mnga' ba// de yang 'jig rten don du mthun
6846(): 'jug cing // de dang de yi rnam pa gsal byed de// kum+bi tshal du zla 'od zhugs pa bzhin// dregs pa zil gnon 'jig rten pad+ma'i tshal// de yi blo gros thub par gyur pa snyam// de nas byang
6847(): chub sems dpa' zhing pa'i grong du byon nas nyam thag par gyur pa'i 'gro ba rnams dbugs phyung nas byang chub tu smin par mdzad de// de nas rims kyis 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa me tog dang lo ma lta na sdug pas
6848(): phyogs shin tu mnyam pa zhig gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa na// de'i tshe drang srong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa lnga lce phyogs nas byang phyogs/
6849(): su nam mkha' la dong ba byang chub sems dpa'i thad nas 'gro bar ma nus pa dang / 'og phyogs su bltas nas gzhon nu gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba mthong ste/ 'di su zhig snyam du sems pa dang / nag
6850(): de'i lha mo zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal po'i gtso bo shAkya'i rigs byung nyi ma shar ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ mkhas pa zla zhal pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i kha dog lta bur rab mdzes pa// lha klu gnod
6851(): sbyin dri zas mchod pa de ni bsam gtan dgongs shing tshal 'dir bzhugs// bskal pa dpag med bsod nams spel ba de mthus rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog go// de nas de dag sa la babs te byang chub sem/
6852(): dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'jig rten nyon mongs mes gdungs pa// bsil mdzad mtsho chen 'dir byung ste// gang gis 'jig rten tshim gyur pa'i// chos de 'di yis rnyed par gyur// zhes bya ba la
6853(): sogs pas bstod nas song ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang gzhon nu'i phyi bzhin du song na de ltar mdzad pa mthong nas/ tshigs su bcad pa/ ri yi spol me 'bar 'dra ba ste// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs
6854(): nang 'dug pa bzhin// gzi brjid rab 'bar bsam gtan byed mthong na// nga yi lus 'di shin tu 'dar bar gyur// zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' la bltas pa na shing gzhan gyi grib ma shar du bab
6855(): kyang 'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma g.yos pa mthong nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ thub pa gang tshe bltams pa dang // gang tshe 'od ldan bsam gtan mdzad// 'dren pa 'di ltar lan gnyis su// mgon po
6856(): khyod zhabs phyag 'tshal lo// zhes brjod do// de nas 'jig rten pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pas bud med kyi tshogs rnams yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/ rol rtsed bstan par dgod/
6857(): te de'i tshe shAkya rgan rabs dag 'dus nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni bram ze ltas mkhan rnams dang
6858(): rnams kyis lung bstan te/ khyim na gnas na 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur la/ mngon par byung na ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa lags na/ gzhon nu'i btsun mo blang bar bgyi ste/ de ltar na
6859(): khab nas mngon par byung bar mi 'gyur la/ bdag cag gi 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i gdung rgyud 'chad par mi 'gyur zhes gsol to// zas gtsang mas smras pa/ gal te de ltar bya na de gzhon nu'i tshul dang
6860(): mthun pa'i bu mo gang zhig yod pa khyed kyis ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' la de skad ces gsol pa dang / 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'dod pa'i skyon ni bdag gis
6861(): mtha' yas rig/ 'thab mo 'khon bcas mya ngan sdug bsngal rtsa// 'jigs byed dug gi le ma 'dra ba ste// me dang 'dra zhing ral gri'i so dang 'dra 'dod pa'i yon tan bdag 'dod ma yin te// bdag ni
6862(): bud med tshogs dang mdzes ma yin// bsam gtan ting 'dzin dag pas zhi sems su// mi smra nags tshal zhi bar gnas par bya// yang byang chub sems dpas sems can sbyin par ltas nas go/
6863(): skabs phye ba dang / mdun na 'don gyis phyogs kun tu brtags pa las/ shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba yon tan du ma dang ldan pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la smon lam btab pa zhig
6864(): gnas pa mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bram ze mdun na 'don pho nya btang ste khyod kyi bu mo zhig yod pa de nga'i gzhon nu la byin cig ces spring ngo // lag na be con gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gzhon nu de/
6865(): ni pho brang na skyid par 'khrungs pa lags pas bdag cag gi rigs kyi chos ni 'di lta bu lags te/ sgyu rtsal shes pa la gtong gi/ sgyu rtsal mi shes pa la mi gtong lags zhes gsol pa dang byang chub sems dpes
6866(): gsan nas bka' stsal pa/ gang ser skya'i grong khyer na nga dang sgra rtsal gyi stobs 'gran pa lha yod na 'dus shig/ sgra rtsal bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs na?/ gang sgyu rtsal ston pa'i gnas der lha dang mi
6867(): 'bum phrag du ma 'dus par gyur to// de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam// sgyu rtsal bsnyems pas ser skya'i phyi rol dong // sgo drung der ni glang chen mchog 'dug pa// lhas sbyin gyis ni thal mo gcig rgyab bas/
6868(): mdzes dga' yis ni lag gis blangs te dor// de tshe byang chub sems dpas de gzigs nas// zhabs kyi mthe bos blangs te rgyang rings 'phangs// lha dang mi rnams ngo mdzar skyes gyur te// deng sang dus na'ang gra/
6869(): po'i gshongs zhes grags// de tshe rtsis dang yi ge dang // gyad kyi 'dzin stangs la sogs pa// sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi la// shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya yis// cung zad tsam yang 'gran ma nus// des ni ngo
6870(): mdzar chen por gyur// bong gi las kyang nyer bstan pa// gzhon nu rnams dang kun dga' bo// lhas sbyin mdzes dga' berjon cen// de tshe rgyang grags gcig deng gnyis// bani dang drug dang brgyad kyi bar/
6871(): so so'i sgyu thu la rab bstan pa// zil gyis mnan par gyur zhes grags// de tshe rgyang grags bcu yi pha rol lcags kyi sla tA la dag/ bdun phrag gnyis dang lcags kyi 'khrul mig 'ben du byas pa de la
6872(): yang seng+ge'i 'gram gyi gzhu brdungs nas ni byang chub sems dpas mda' 'phangs te// kun las 'das te sa stengs 'dir nub khor yug tu ni thug ces grag/ de bas zhi gnas gzhu thogs shing /
6873(): stong pa bdag med mda' rnams kyis// bdud rnams ma lus 'dul 'gyur zhes// ched du brjed pa'i sgra snyan bsgrags// de nas de lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i rol pa de mngon du gyur pas gus pa'i skye bo rnam
6874(): kyis so so nas sa 'tsho ma dang grags 'dzin ma dang ri dgas skyes ma rnams 'khor nyi khri nyi khri dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' la 'phul lo// de dag thams cad kyang bla na med/
6875(): pa'i byang chub tu nges par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rin po che'i khang bzangs bkod pa tshad med pa na bzhugs shing // btsun mo'i tshogs kyis rol mo'i sgra sgrogs pa
6876(): tshe sgra de las tshigs su bcad pa byung ba/ sdug bsngal brgyas gang sems can mthong nas ni// 'gro ba'i don dang skyabs dang gnas gyur cing // phan byed mchog dang dpung gnyeran gyur cig ces// khyed kyis
6877(): sngon ni smon lam de skad btang // dge ba dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang // 'gro phan bya zhes smon lam btab dran byos// deng ni khyod kyi dus dang tshod yin gyis// drang srong mchog rab mngon par byung bar byos//
6878(): zhes grag ste/ de nas btsun mo'i 'khor brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lha du ma byang chub tu smin par mdzad de mngon par byung bar dgongs so// de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' bskul
6879(): ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar sgo dang / lho sgo dang nub sgo rnams su rgas pa dang / na ba dang / shi ba'i rnam pa bstan te/ mkhyen bzhin du 'dun pa la dri bar mdzad ras/ slar yang gsungs pa/ kye ma 'di
6880(): ltar na rgas 'chi ba med gyur na// phung po lngar 'dzin mya ngan sdug bsngal che yin na// na rgas 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba smos ci dgos// shing rta slar bzlog 'di las thar pa'i thabs bsam bya// zhes
6881(): gsungs te slar pho brang du zhugs so// yang dus re shig grong khyer gyi byang sgor byon tsam na// gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bus dge slong cig tu mngon par sprul la/ byang chub sems dpas mkhyen bzhin du/
6882(): kha lo bsgyur ba la gsungs pa/ zhi zhing dul ba gos ngur smrig gyon pa 'di su yin/ gsol ba 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi ba ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba nye bar zhi ba don du gnyer ba'o// yang
6883(): gsungs pa/ 'di ni legs smras pa yang 'dod pa ste// rab tu byung ba mkhas rnams rtag tu bsngags// de ni bdag la phan zhing gzhan la'ang phan// bde zhing nyams mthun 'chi med 'bras bur 'gyur//
6884(): zhes gsungs nas pho brang du byon te/ don 'di yid la mdzad par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'byung ba'i lhas mthong zhing bram ze rnams kyis kyang lung ston par
6885(): gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ gang zhig lang tsho'i dpal 'di yang // rims kyis brog te zhum 'gyur zhing // dbang po'i me tog gsal ba yang // dus kyi ba mos phrogs gyur pa// de tshe 'jig rten mya ngar gyur//
6886(): lus kyi bud shing dbang por bcas// nad kyi me lce 'bar ba yis// phog pa'i skyon gyis nyams 'gyur zhing // phyag dar khrod bzhin gyur pa na// de tshe mkhas rnams ci ltar 'gyur// rnam par shes pa'i rma bya
6887(): dgang lus kyi ljon shing spong byed cing // nyam nga'i tshang tshing 'jug byed pa/ mi mkhas rnams ni sdug bsngal 'gyur// zhi ba'i lam bzangs dpal ldan la// sems par byed ces ya mtshan med// de nas
6888(): zas gtsang ma la sogs pa rnams gzhon nu zhag bdun gyi bar mngon par ma byung na ni 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa thos nas/ rnam pa 'di lta bu dag gis
6889(): byang chub sems dpa' bzung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' don grub bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// ser skya'i grong khyer 'obs dang ra ba du mas bskor// sgo dang sgo 'phar lcags la byas shing dril bus
6890(): brgyan// sgo yi sgras kyang dpag tshad gcig tu grag par byas// skyes bu lag na mtshon cha thogs pa sgo drung bkod// go bgos rta dang glang po'i tshigs rnams kun tu 'dzin// shAkya'i tshogs kyis rtse
6891(): gcig nyin mtshan kun tu bsrung // gcong rong dog po'i chu ltar sgra chen sgrog par byed// btsun mo'i 'khor rnams stong phrag brgyad cu lhag pa yis// sgra snyan dri zhim ro mchog du mas mchod byed pa//
6892(): ji ltar mig stong dga' ba'i tshol na gnas pa bzhin// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun nas bsrung bar gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa na/ bdag bsam/
6893(): gnang bar mngon par 'byung ba mi rigs so snyam nas yab la gsungs pa/ bdag kyang yid la brtser ldan zhing // khyod la mi gus ma lags kyis// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin ngan mthong nas// mdo
6894(): par 'byung bas gnang bar mdzod// de nas rgyal po gnyid kyis non bzhin du shugs nar zhes smras pa/ gzhon nu mi gshegs su gsol/ ci ltar dgongs pa rnams ni bdag gis sbar bar bgyi/
6895(): zhes gsol pa na/ yang gsungs pa/ gal te bdag mchir mi gnang na// dam pa bzhi zhig bdag slong ngo // rtag tu nA rgas 'chi med cing // rgud pa med pa de stsal gsol// rgyal pos tshig de thos na/
6896(): mi dga' zhing // dam pa sbyin pa'i mthu med pas sred pa'i shugs btang ste smras pa/ phan byed 'gro ba thar byed rjes su yid rang ngo // khyod kyi bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ ces gan
6897(): nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha thams cad 'dus shing bskul bar gyur pa la/ nyams sad par mdzad pa dang lha rnams kyis smras pa/ ci ltar khyod ni gegs med par// de nyid gnas
6898(): su gshegs gyur pa// bdag cag tshangs sogs bcas pa yi// lha rnams kyis ni de bzhin bgyi// de nas brgya byin gyis lha rnams bskul nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ thams cad gnyid kyis
6899(): non par byas nas sgra ca co med par gyur// gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang btsun mo'i tshogs myos shing mi sdug par bsgyur te byang chub sems dpa' bskul bar gyur to// de'i tshe byang chub
6900(): sems dpa' khang bzangs kyi steng du byung ste/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'dun pa'i drung du byed te gsungs pa/ nga yi bkra shis 'di ni don 'grub 'gyur/ mos
6901(): pas phyi shol ma byed myur du ni// rta mchog rgyan gyis brgyad pa myur du long // thub rnams dgyes mdzad nags su da 'gro'o// zhes gsungs pa 'dun pas thos nas/ mi dga' bzhin du gsol pa/ lha na ma
6902(): gyi gung ni 'jigs pa dang bcas te skyed mos tshal dang nags su mchi ba'i dus ma lags so// slar yang byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal nas sngags ldan legs
6903(): par brgyan te phul lo// de nas lha'i bu myu gu can dang bzhis ni tshabs pa'i zhabs nas bteg/ brgya byin gyis sgo phye/ rgyal po bzhis dpung dang bcas pas ni bsrung // tshangs pa dang bcas pas ni
6904(): mchod cing mngon par byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha dang klu dang 'og min lha yi mthar thug pa// byang chub sems dpa' khab nas byung ba lta byed cing // mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson par byed/
6905(): par gyur// spos chu'i char pas sa rnams kun tu chog chag btab// sna tshogs me tog rdzis bskyod mkha' la mngon par lhags// rgyal ba'i sras po mthu chen ldan rnams lcags gyur pa'i// rmad byung
6906(): mchog las mchod pa de ltar byed par 'gyur// lha klu dri za'i tshogs rnams kun gyis 'dud par gyur// de tshe gsang ba'i bdag po ni// rdo rje 'bar thogs phyi bzhin 'brang // sa ni ri bcas shin tu g.yos//
6907(): 'od zer dra bas phyogs rnams kun// gsal zhing dri med lhang nger gyur// de tshe ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal kun// zhi zhing bde bar gnas par gyur// rmad du byung ba'i bkod pa dag/ ngag tu brjod par nus ma yin// de
6908(): ltar khab nas byung bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tshad drug tu phyin pa dang nam langs te lha'i tshogs rnams kyang slar bkye nas/ sngags ldan dang rgyan thams cad mos pa la gtad de gsungs pa/
6909(): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa ni// lam gyi mchog de ma thob par// grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ni slar// nga ni 'jug par mi bya'o// zhes gsungs nas ral bus gshegs so// 'dun pa'ang yid mi dga' bzhin du
6910(): byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing rta dang rgyan khyer te song ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi dbu skra ut+pal sngon po'i mdog can gyi ral gris rang gi lag pas bregs te dor ba dang / mig steng dang ldan pas
6911(): khyer te ding sang yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams gtsug pud kyi dus ston byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyem du rab tu byung ba la gos kA shi ka mdzes pa ma yin no snyam pa dang / lha'i bu zhig gis gdang gos du smrin /
6912(): terngon pa'i cha lug su byang chub sems dpa'i drung du phyin pa dang de la bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyi ngur smrig dag nga la byin la/ gos kA shi ka 'di dag khyer cig gsung nas ngur smrig blangs te gsol to// de nas gus pa dang bcas pas
6913(): gos kA shi ka dag blangs te khyer ro// 'dun pa'ang phyir ser skra'i gzhir zhugs pa dang tsa co dang du che'i sgra chen po mngon par grag go// de nas yab rgyal pos 'dun pa la smras pa/ gzhon du gang du gzhud/ zlog pa lha nus
6914(): sam des smras pa/ sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du grong khyer du mi 'jug go zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du smras te/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus skye bo rnams kyi mya ngan gyi mthu bsal cing spro bar byas so//
6915(): dman pa rnams ri longs spyod cung zad phyir// dpal las nyams shing sna tshogs sdug bsngal 'gyur// de dang de la 'dod pas kun tu zhugs// dam pa rnams ni brgya byin dpal gyi mthu// zil gnon dpal/
6916(): yang ral gri'i so ltar dgongs// de yang legs pa'i dpal gyis rnam par brgyan// rgya mtsho'i sa yang rlabs kyis bskyod pa bzhin// g.yo bar byed na sems dang ldan pa dag/ de las
6917(): gzhan du byed pa mthu med dam// e ma'o byang chub mchog gi spyod pa brtan// 'gro ba'i nyi ma gcig pu bla na med// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rims kyis ljongs rgyu zhing shAkya dang gle'u ta dang /
6918(): gyad kyi yul las kyang 'das te byon pa na thog mar bram ze rigs ldan gyis byang chub sems dpa' zas la 'gron du bos so// de bzhin du rims kyis bram ze pad+ma dang bram ze drang srong nam gru dang bram ze 'od ldan
6919(): dang rgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod rnams kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la bkur sti dam pa byas shing / de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang yon tan gyi khyad par las rmad du byung ba
6920(): bstan te/ rims kyis ljongs rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab kyi ri'i rgyal po skya bor byon te bzhugs pa na grong khyer pa thams cad ya mtshan du gyur te/ lus kyi yon tan rmad du byung ba skye bo rnams kyis mthong nas yon/
6921(): tan bsgrags pas/ de'i rgyu mtshan gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa gza' skar gyi dpal gyis lham mer gyur
6922(): pa bzhin du/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis 'bar ba mthong nas zhabs la phyag byas te smras pa/ dge slong mchog ni gang dang gang nas 'ongs/ gang du khyod skyes yab yum gang na bzhugs// dpal ldan khyod mthong bdag yid
6923(): dgar gyur pas// rgyal srid 'bul gyis bde bar spyad par mdzod// ces bya ba la sogs pa du ma spras pas/ slar gsungs pa/ rgyal po shAkya rnams kyis ser skya'i grong // mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa thos gyur
6924(): tam/ kho bo'i pa yi ming ni zas gtsang ngo // de spangs yon tan 'dod pas rab tu byung // 'dod pa dug 'dra nyes pa mtha' yas ldan// sems dmal yi dgas dud 'gror ltung byed pa// smad pa de ni ngar snabs bzhin du dor//
6925(): bo 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'dod do// zhes bya ba la sogs pa chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan nas/ rgyal pos kyang bzod par gsol te/ gang gi tshe byang chub brnyes pa na bdag la'ang brtse bas bzung du gsol
6926(): zhes brjod nas slar song ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer du byon pa na/ de dang nye ba na chu klung ne rany+dzan chu bsil la 'bab stegs bde ba shing gel ba mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa'i sa phyogs
6927(): lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ rtsa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bus kun tu khyab pa zhig gzigs nas/ e ma ho 'di ni spong ba don du gnyer ba rnams kyi gnas su rung gis/ bdag gis sa 'di'i phyogs 'dir dka'
6928(): thub kyi mthu bstan pas dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis dka' thub kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gzhom par bya'o snyam nas shing rlon pa dang skam po'i bsrub shing bsrub bstan gyi dpe mngon du mdzad de/ byang chub sems
6929(): dpas byi dor ma byas pa'i sa la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas bsam gtan mkha' khyab la snyom par 'jug par mdzad de/ rims kyis 'bras dang til dang mon sran gre'u gcig tsam nas zas bcad de ting
6930(): nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to// e ma ho mnyam med de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad pa// de tshe grong gi byis pa ba lang rdzis// sa yis bskus shing mi gtsang 'thor
6931(): byed kyang // g.yo med brtse bas bsam gtan mkha' khyab mdzad// sa steng ci yang ma bting bar// skyil mo krung bcas g.yo ba med// til 'bru gcig tsam gsol mdzad de// dbug/
6932(): dbyung rngub pa rnam par spangs// de ni nyi ma grib ma dang // char rlung sha sbrang sdig sbrul gyi// gnod pas g.yo ba med par yang // der ni lo drug gnas par gyur// rdo rje'i lcags kyang nyi rlung rkyen
6933(): gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// sa chen 'di yang dus tshigs rkyen gyis rab tu 'gyur zhing 'jig/ rdo rje'i lhun po nyi zlar bcas pa'ang dus mthar 'dzag par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i bsam gtan
6934(): rkyen gyis g.yo zhing bskyod par gyur pa med// de bas mthu chen khyad par rmad byung ba// de yi bsam gtan stobs la gzhan dag dga'// bdud kyi stobs kyang zil gyis rab mnan nas// lha
6935(): rnams snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs sgrogs par byed// de bas khyod kyi spyod pa rmad byung ba// 'jig rten lam las bzlog par gyur pa snyam// // de ltar byang chub sems dpas/ 'dod pa'i
6936(): yon tan dang ngal zhing dub pa'i mtha' gnyis kas bla na med pa'i byang chub mi 'thob par bstan cing / phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir kha zas rags pa gsol bar mdzad pas na lnga sde 'di
6937(): snyam du sems te/ ji ltar dka' ba spyad pa 'dis byang chub thob par ma nus na da ni thob par mi nus so snyam nas drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags su song ngo // byang chub sems dpa' la stobs ldan ma
6938(): la sogs pa bcus bsnyen bkur zhing de dag tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsol bar mdzad de/ sku snga ma bzhin du gyur pa bstan nas phyag dar khrod kyi ras blangs te chos gos kyi bya ba mdzad do// de'i tshe brgya byin
6939(): gyis bskul bas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas bstong gi 'o ma lan bdun du nyid khur byas pa bzang po sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// byang chub
6940(): sems dpas de bzhes shing gsol ma thag tu sku gser bcom sbyangs pa ltar du gyur to// sngon gyi smon lam stobs kyis rab bskul ba// de gsol nas ni snod de chu klung dor// klu dbang rgya mtshos blang/
6941(): te brgya byin la// byin nas deng sang du yang mchod ces grag/ dpal ldan de tshe bsod snyoms de gsol nas// a shwat+tha drung gshegs pa nyer dgongs tshe// dpag tshad brgyad cu'i kho ra khor yug tu// lha
6942(): rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan par byas// seng+ge'i stabs kyis byang chub snying po ru// mngon par gshegs pas sa rnams dal bus g.yos// 'od zer dra bas ngan song sdug bsngal bsal// 'di
6943(): yi bkod pa'i khyad par mthu chen dag/ tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi dpe byar min// de ltar byang chub shing drung byon par gyur// de'i tshe 'od zer gyi dra bas phog cing klu dung can zhes bya ba dmus long zhig yod pa'ang/
6944(): mig rnyed par gyur nas mchod pa du ma byed cing smras pa/ e ma bdag gi gnas 'dir las kyi nyi zla nor bu'i 'od kyang snang min la// 'dren pa 'jig rten dam pa dgung zla nya ba'i
6945(): zhal 'dra mthong bar gyur pa legs// bdag gis sngon ni drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de 'dra ste/ de ring khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'phang brnyes par 'gyur//
6946(): zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod nas/ de nas byang chub kyi snying por byin zhing bzhugs pa na gdul bya'i dbang gis 'di ltar snang bar gyur te/ zhing 'di'i gdul bya phal pa rnams kyi snang ba la rtswa 'tshong bkra
6947(): shis rtsa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu 'jam zhing 'bol ba phul te byang chub kyi shing drung du rtsa'i gding ba la bzhugs nas gsungs pa/ stan 'dir bdag gi lus 'di bskams kyang rung // brgas pa rus pa sha
6948(): rnams zhig kyang rung // bskal mang rnyed dka'i byang chub ma thob par// stan 'di la ni lus bskyed mi bya'o// zhes dam bcas te bzhugs par snang ngo // lha rnams kyi snang ba la ni shing yongs 'du bas kyang
6949(): khyad par du 'phags pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung na lha'i 'byor pa zil gyis gnon pa'i bkod pa'i khyad par gyis bzhugs par snang ngo // phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni sngon gyi smon
6950(): lam gyi mthus grub pa'i gzhal med khang dang / byang chub kyi shing gi yon tan gyi bkod pa tshad med pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa rnam par 'gengs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa mtha' yas pa
6951(): nyid du snang ste/ de'i rnam grangs bskal ba grangs med par brjod kyang mthas gtugs par mthong ngo // de tshe rgyal ba'i sras po rnams// thub dbang rgyal la mchod don du/ bde gshegs rgyal ba'i smon lam dang /
6952(): mthun par rgyal la mchod par gyur// tshangs dang dbang po 'og min bdag po 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal bsod nams mthu yi dpal 'byor kyang // bde ba'i rgyur gyur mthu chen ldan ces bsod nams chu gter chu rlabs mthu/
6953(): yis bskyod pa bzhin// de 'dir me khyer skar ma'i tshogs dang pad+ma'i gnyen mchog stong drag 'dus pa'i khyad par bzhin// dpag las rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis kyang dpag par mi nus mthu yi khyad par gsal ba
6954(): snyam rgyal ba'i sras rnams mchod par byed pa yang // dpag med chu gter sgra yi rtse mos min// nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin dag gi lam 'das phyir// de bas 'dir ni dpag tu med pa yin//
6955(): de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi log par lta ba 'di dag gi gtso bo 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang bsgyur ba'i bdud
6956(): sdig can 'dam gtul na mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams tshar bcad par mi 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi don rgya chen po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bstan par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/ bdud btul bar byangs
6957(): phyir mdzod spu las bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos shing mog mog por byas
6958(): te sgra 'di'ang grag go// sems can shin tu dag pa bskal mang spyod spyad pa// zas gtsang sras pos rgyal srid dag ni rab spangs te/ ban byed de ni bdud rtsi 'dod pas mngon par byung // byang chub shing drung /
6959(): 'ongs kyis de ring sgrim par gyis/ bdud sdig can gyis de lta bu'i sgra thos shing bdud kyi sde rnams kha sgrub tu 'gyel ba la sogs pa'i rmi lam sum cu so gnyis kyang rmis te/ 'jigs skrag bsngangs shing brtags na/ de bzhin/
6960(): gshegs pa'i mthu yin par shes shing / bdag nyid 'dod pa'i dbang phyug las nyams pa dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad stong par gyur du dogs pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i dug gis snying la khyab par rod rod por gyur to// /
6961(): rang gi 'khor rnams la smras pa/ shAkya'i nang du skyes gyur pa// dge slong g.yo can cig byung ste// des ni nga gnas stong par byed// dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig tu// mthu rtsal chen pos der 'dong la// dge sbyong cig de gzhom
6962(): par bya// zhes bya ba la sogs pa spras nas/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dpung chen po nas mnar med pa yan chad kyi bdud kyi dmag chen po dpung che zhing stobs che ba 'jigs su rung ba spu zing
6963(): zhes byed nus pa lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma thos ma mthong ba bzhin bsgyur ba rnam pa mang po byed khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ dbang po'i sgo nas sbrul gdug pa dang lcags kyi ser ba 'ben
6964(): pa/ me dang dug gi rlang pa 'thul zhing 'bar ba dang glog 'byin pa/ 'ga' zhig ni rkang lag dang mig log par 'dug pa/ rkang lag sbrul brgya stong gis dkris pa/ ral gri dang mda' gzhu dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang
6965(): mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / shak+Shi dang / mdung dang / chu gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha brgya stong thogs pa/ gdong du ma can/ me'i dra ba dang / ri'i 'phreng ba dang / rlung dang / rdo dang / gnam lcags kyi char 'bebs pa la
6966(): sogs pa gcan gzan gyi tshogs du ma la zhon pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra sna tshogs 'jigs 'jigs ltar sgrogs pa/ nam mkha' dang sa gzhi thams cad bar mtshams med par bkang ste/ drag po'i rlung gis
6967(): bskyod pa'i rlung nag po bzhin du byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der 'ongs so// de tshe bdud kyi dmag tshogs rnams// sdig can gyis ni rab bskul bas// sems kyang rod rod por gyur te// mtshon cha'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa dang /
6968(): rang gi rdzu 'phrul stobs 'khrugs pas// sna tshogs nga ro sgrogs byed cing // thog gi tshub mas kun tu 'gengs// ri dang me lce'i 'phreng ba dag/ 'ur 'ur lang long kun tu 'bebs// rlung dang rdo dang gnam lcags char// rab/
6969(): tu 'bebs pas ri bo dang // sa chen kun tu g.yo byed cing // sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams// mtshan mo de la nye bar lhags// de ltar bdud kyi dmag chen po mthong ba tsam gyis byis pa'i skye bo rnams
6970(): snying 'gas par byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang drag shul gyi mthus ri rab kyang thal bar byed par nus pa'i bdud kyi dmag chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du lhags pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i gzugs dang
6971(): sgra byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis mi mthong mi thos par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bdud kyi dmag gi tshogs de rnams thams cad kyis 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra bsgrags shing mtshon cha'i char phab pa las/ de dag
6972(): thams cad ni me tog dang spos rin po che'i phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin du gyur to// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'ga' zhig gi snang ba la ni khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rnams kyis
6973(): bdud kyi 'khor thams cad rab tu bcom par byas par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can gyi dmag gi dpung tshigs thams cad 'thor zhing rab tu 'thor/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems
6974(): dpa' 'dus pa dang bkod pa tshad med par gyur pa de yang mthong nas/ nyam chung zhing yid mi bde bar gyur bzhin du smras pa// kye rgyal bu gzhon nu bzhengs bzhengs rgyal srid la spyod cig khyod kyi bsod nams de tsam gyis
6975(): thar pa ga la 'thob/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtan la zab cing rgya che bas 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig gi smras pa/ sdig can khyod kyis ni gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thob par zad
6976(): kyisangs ni mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gtan pa med pa byas so// de'i tshe bdud kyis smras pa/ kho bas sngon chad mchod sbyin ldan mtho mag/ gtan pa med par byas pa khyod 'dir dbang du yod/
6977(): khyod la 'di na dbang po 'ga' yang yod min la// smras kyang phan pa ci yod khyod ni pham par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bus sa la reg te smras pa/ sa 'di 'gro ba
6978(): kun gyi dbang yin te// rgyu dang mi rgyu snyoms shing nye 'khon med// 'di ni bdag gi dbang ste bdag rdzun min// 'di la khyod ni bdag gi dbang byas shing // de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing sa'i lha
6979(): mo bstan ma 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang bcas pa sa las rdol te byung nas// byang chub sems dpa' gal ba de logs su btud nas skyes bu chen po de de bzhin no// ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'di ni bdag la mngon
6980(): sum mo// zhes smras nas rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// g.yon can dpung bcas sgra de thos gyur nas// nags su seng ge sgra bsgrags wa sa thos dang // bya rog rdo 'phangs mod la byer
6981(): ba bzhin// skrag bsngangs snying gas mod la rab tu byer// de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang spyo ba bcu drug gis bdud nyams dmas par mdzad de sdug bsngal zhing rang gi gnas su song nas mya ngan
6982(): gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug go/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo sred ma dang / dga' byed ma dang / dga' spyod ma zhes bya ba bdud sdig can ga la ba der song ste smras pa/ ya ba khyod ci'i phyir thugs mi bde// ci'i phyir 'di na
6983(): 'di ltar bzhugs// gang gis khyed la gnod pa yi// skyes bu gang la rjes su sems// gsungs shig de ni 'dod chags kyi// zhags pas nags nas glang po bzhin// bcings nas bdag cag 'tshal te mchi//
6984(): de ni khyod kyi dbang du 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa/ skyes bu 'dod chags dang bral te// chags pas legs par dgug mi nus// bdud kyi yul 'das de yi phyir// nga ni shin tu mya ngan byed// de nas bdud kyi bu mo
6985(): gsum lus kyi lang ces dregs shing sprin las byung ba'i glog bzhin gzi brjid rab tu 'bar zhing rang gi gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su phyin pa dngabud med kyi sgyu rtsa la sum
6986(): cu so gnyis ston par byed de/ lus dang ngag gis slu bar byed pa'i rnam pa bstan te/ slar de dag gi rgyags pa gzhig par bya ba'i phyir bdud kyi bu mo de dag rgas shing 'khogs
6987(): la mi sdug pa'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag zhum zhing ngo tsha bas bdud sdig can gyi drung du song nas smras pa/ skyes bu chags rab bral de la// bdag cag gi ni ma byas pa// rnam pa gang
6988(): yang yod min+da na// tha mar gzugs ni 'di 'dra bar// de'i mthu yis snang bar byas// 'di la yab kyis bskyab par mdzod// bdud kyis smras pa/ 'di ni bdag la dbang med kyis// ci srid thub pa de nyid la// skyabs
6989(): su 'gro bar gyis shig dang // khyed kyi gzugs 'di gzhan du 'gyur// zhes rjes su bstan pa thos nas bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol te mchod pas lus sngar bzhin du legs par gyur to// de lta bu'i tshul gyis/
6990(): bdud bye ba sum cu rtsa drug dang / khrag khrig nyi shu rtsa bzhi byang chub tu smin par mdzad do// gang gi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud kyi mthu/ ting 'dzin mthu yis legs par bcom gyur nas// 'jig rten chos kyi rgyal srid leg/
6991(): 'dzugs pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi thabs 'di dpag tu med// de nas bdud dang phyir rgol ba rnams rab tu bcom pa'i rjes de nyid la byang chub kyi shing drung du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul
6992(): du gyur pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad cing skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang thob pa dang / lta ba dang khong du chud pa mngon du bya ba gang ci yang rung ba thams/
6993(): cad sems kyis skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis spang bar bya ba rnams ni spangs/ thob par bya ba ni mngon du mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
6994(): rgyas so// skad cig de nyid la ta la bdud srid du 'phags te lam gyi rgyun ni chad do// sdug bsngal nye bar zhi'o// zag pa ni bskams te mi zag go// lam ni chad de yang mi 'jug go// zhes ched du brjod pas ched du brjod do//
6995(): skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pa byang chub sangs rgyas nas// khrag khrig zhing rnams bskyod cing bdud kyang pham par mdzad// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping ga'i sgra skad kyis// 'dren pas thog mar tshogs su bcad pa 'di
6996(): gsungs so// bsod nams rnam sprin bde ster sdug bsngal thams cad sel// bsod rams ldan pa'i mi yis bsams pa rnams kyang 'grub// bdud bcom nas ri byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das bzhi pa
6997(): bsil ba'i dngos po 'thob// de bas bsod nams byas pas chog par su zhig 'dzin// bdud rtsi'i chos can pas kyang cho ga par su zhag 'dzin// skye bo med pa'i nags gnas chog par su zhig 'dzin// sems
6998(): can dor bya bas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin// zhes gsungs shing skad cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rol pa dpag tu med pa mdzad de// de dag ni bskal bar yang brjod par mi lang ngo // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha'
6999(): yas mu med gyur pa rnams// zhing gi yon tan rgya mtsho'i bkod pa rmang byung ba// rgyal sras rgya mtshos kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin rnams// kun tu mchod cing chos tshul rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa// zhing rnams kun
7000(): tu gsal bar gyur pa brjod mi nus// 'jig rten sgron ma mtshungs pa med 'di dus 'dir byung // / de ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs
7001(): rgyas nas 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bzhed de/ 'dir bsdus pa'i tshul gyis smras pa/ rnam 'dren de ltar sangs rgyas nas// shing dbang drung du bdun phrag bzhugs// stong gsum kun tu chag/
7002(): pa dang // shing la gzigs shing bzhad par mdzad// rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs zhabs kyis bcags// btang bzung gnas na bzhugs pa dang // n+ya gro d+ha yi shing drung bzhugs// shing rgyal sgrol rgyu'i drung
7003(): 'dug pa// de ltar bdun phrag bdun gyi bar// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir tshul 'di snang // mthu chen rmad byung byang chub spyod mchog rab bstan pa// bdun phrag dang po shing dbang drung du rgyas pa'i sras// kun tu bzang
7004(): pos zhing mchog rgya mtsho'i rnam thar bstan// rgyal chen rigs bzhi sum bcu rtsa gsum tshe ma dang // dga' ldan 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas rnams su// bdun phrag bdun du rgyal ba'i dkyis/
7005(): snang ste// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rgyal sras rgya mtsho legs 'dus pas// rnam thar chos tshul rgya mtsho'i bkod pa bstan mdzad ces// tshul 'di rgyal bas bstan par gyur ces mdo las grags// de tshe ga
7006(): gon bzang pos kyang // thog mar rgyal ba mchod ces grag/ de tshe rgyal po bzhi po yis// dad pas rgyal la lhung bzed phul// tshong pa rnams la shis brjod cing // rgyal ba'i dbang por lung yang bstan// de nas bcom
7007(): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye mangs thob pa'i chos 'di ni zab pa rtog ge'i spyod yul las 'das pa yin na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten bdag gis rtogs par dka' zhing / tshangs pa la mchog tu 'dzin na des
7008(): mngon par ma bskul gyi bar du bstan par mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas gsungs pa/ za ba zhi spros bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas// bdud rtsi chos ni bdag gis thob par gyur// bdag gis bstan kyang gzhan
7009(): gyis mi shes te// mi smra nags 'dab gnas par bya'o snyam// zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs nas 'od chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar mdzad do// de'i tshe tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis de
7010(): bzhin gshegs pa thugs las chung ngur bzhugs pa shes te/ skad cig de la tshangs pa 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du gas
7011(): btab pa/ ma ga d+ha 'dir sngon chad chos byung ba// dag pa ma lags dri mar bcas par rtogs// bdud rtsi chos kyi sgo ni phye mdzod la// dri ma med pa rtogs pa bshad par mdzod// zhes pa la sogs pas bskul ba
7012(): dang bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ kha cig ni log pa nyid du gzigs/ kha cig ni yang dag pa nyid du nges// kha cig ma nges par gzigs nas/ ma nges pa rnams la brtse ba bskyed de bka'
7013(): stsal pa/ tshangs pa 'jig rten yul gyi sems can gang // rna ba ldan zhing dang dang ldan gyur la// mi tshe 'du shes rtag tu chos nyan pas// de dag la ni bdud rtsi'i sgo dbye'o// zhes gsungs te/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams
7014(): dga' zhing mgunas mchod cing bstod de rang gi gnas su song ngo // / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thog mar drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi gnas su byon ta/ lnga rje bzang po
7015(): yongs su smin par mdzad de tshur shog gi bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad te/ chos ston par bzhed pa na/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun las
7016(): grub pa'i khri stong byung bar gyur te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gus pa mdzad pa'i phyir/ khri gsum la bskor ba mdzad nas seng ge ltar bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar khri bzhi pa la skyil mo krung bcas nas
7017(): 'dug go// de'i tshe 'od zer gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khor sa thams cad snang bar mdzad nas/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha tshad med pa rnams bskul zhing 'dus par
7018(): gyur te/ de thams cad la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la brtsams nas lan gsum du rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// mi mchog seng ges seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas// de
