7019(): ches 'di 'di ltar rnam drug g.yos// bye ba drug phrag drug cu'i 'od zer 'gyed// ngan 'gro'i 'gro rnams kun tu bsil bar mdzad// rgyal sras mthu chen du ma mngon par lhags// rgyal ba gang
7020(): 'khor lo bskor gyur pa// rgyal ba'i sras rnams de tshe mig rnyed cing // rgyal sras lnga sde de tshe dgra bcom gyur// de tshe lnga sde'i mig rnyed cing // zag pa zad par gyur ces grag/ grags pa gang po ba
7021(): yang bdag/ grong khyer khye'u lnga bcu dang // thog mar dgra bcom drug cu byung // de nas lteng rgyas grong khyer du// drug cu sde yi tshogs brtul zhing // legs skyes ma sogs gdams pa mdzad// de
7022(): nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs la sogs pa// brgya phrag bcu rnams rab tu phyung bar gyur// de dag don du rgyal bas snang mdzad pa// cho 'phrul gsum gyis 'phags pa'i lam la bkod// ga ya gon
7023(): rgyal po'i khab tu byon// gzugs can snying po la sogs skye bo'i tshogs// rab rib bsal nas chos kyi mig bstan mdzad// nye rgyal dang ni pang nas skyes// 'khor dang bcas pa rab phyung zhing //
7024(): mo'u gal bu dang shA ri'i bu// rdzu 'phrul shes rab ldan mchog tu// de yi tshe na grags par gyur// de nas ser skya'i grong khyer du// rdzu 'phrul chen pos nyer byon nas// shAkya'i tshogs rnams
7025(): 'dul bar mdzad// shAkya bzang ldan nam gru dang // ma 'gags pa dang lhas sbyin sogs// shAkya'i tshogs rnams rab tu phyung // de tshe gsal bzhi'i las mdzad gyur// gzhan yang nye bar 'khor
7026(): sogs pa// grong khyer bye bas brgyan pa'i yul// kun tu tshangs spyod rgya chen grags// de tshe bslab tshig rab bcas shig/ zhi dang dul dang sdom pa'i don// 'dod pa'i gnyen por rab gyur pa// stong phrag
7027(): nyi shu rtsa gcig gi/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor zhes grags// rgyal po'i kha bas kyi ri bo nyams dga' bar// sna tshogs ljon pa'i tshogs kyis rab gang zhing // bya rnams du ma sgra 'byin nags
7028(): #/ tshal ldan// sna tshogs ri ngag 'khrugs pa'i sa phyogs su// lha dbang mi dbang gtsug gis legs mchod cing // rgyal sras mthu chen ldan pa'i tshogs rnams la// chos rnams
7029(): thams cad ngo bo nyid med par// ston mdzad rmad dbyung bla na med pa'i gsung // dag tshig dri med mdo sde rgya mtsho'i cho gas// sdug bsngal bsgral phyir 'grol snying brtse'i phyir// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rnams grangs kyi/
7030(): zab cing zhi bar ston byed 'khor lo bskor// 'di dag seng ge'i stong nyid sgra dag gis// bdag lha'i ri dgas tshogs rnams bcom nas grag/ de tshe mnyan yod sa phyogs su// mu stegs tshogs rnams 'dul bya'i
7031(): phyir// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul lam dag gis// cho 'phrul chen po bstan par mdzad// yul ni me dag ces bya bar// lha las babs pa bzang po mdzad// sum cu rtsa gsum dag tu yang // chos nyid la ni brgya byin
7032(): sbyar// sna tshogs lha dang ma rnams kyi// phan ba de'i 'bras bu rtsol bar mdzad// de nas gnas gtsang 'og min du// theg pa gsum la rjes 'jug pa'o// dam chos sngags kyi 'khor lo ni/
7033(): rnal 'byor tshul la brten pas bskor// mi bzang gdug pa rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe// rtsod ldan mi rnams rdo rje'i theg la 'jug 'gyur nas// de nas rgyal sras gsang ba'i mnga' bdag mcho/
7034(): rnams dang // lha dang mi la bla na med pa'i theg pa mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dam pa dang po'i dkyil 'khor du// bla na med pa'i lam mchog dpal dang ldan pa bstan// rtswa can yul du gyad kyi tshogs
7035(): rnams nyer btul nas// tha ma'i chos rnams sal zung gi gnas su bstan// de bzhin lha dbang klu dbang dri ba mi 'am ci// mkha' lding lha min gdul bya sna tshogs rab 'dul ba// mdzad pa'i ches tshul/
7036(): dpag med rnam thar rgya mtsho ni// don dam rnam nges chos skra stong phrag nyi shu gcig/ rdo rje'i sngags tshul chos sgo ci khri chig stong dang // brgyad khri bzhi stong dam chos 'khos bskor gyur pas// dpag med
7037(): mkha' mnyam sems can grangs rnams de snyed pa// 'dul ba'i 'phrin las gdul bya 'dul byed 'dres pa bzhin// pad+ma'i tshal la nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin du 'jug/ de bas 'dir ni bskal mang spyod pa rab
7038(): spyad pa'i// don de gsal bar yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa snyam// de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phrin las dang // dam pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab cing / sems can kyang mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ dam
7039(): pa'i chos kyi sgo dang mdzad pa dang 'phrin las bstan pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la 'dul bar byed pa'i sku
7040(): gzigs shing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku mngon du snang bar ma nus pa'i gdul bya rnams phal che bar gyur pa'i dbang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston par mdzad de/ dpyid zla 'bring po'i chos
7041(): bcwo lnga'i nyin par yongs su mya ngan las 'de' bar nye ba ni/ gsung chen pos srid pa'i rtse mo man chad khyab par/ deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye bo
7042(): rnams la thugs brtse ba can sems can gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen du gyur pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o// gang the tshom dang somanyis su gyur pa dag zhu zhing gsol ba'i
7043(): dus la bab po zhes yongs su bsgrags par gyur to// de tshe 'od zer bye ba phrag drug cu// bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od zer byed pa rnams// zil gyis mnan cing 'og min mthas gtugs par// gsal byas 'gro/
7044(): ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad kun// mya ngan lung gis spyod par gyur pa las// rgya mtsho'i gru chen bzhin du lus g.yos shing // mya ngan rlabs kyi sgra grag tshil tshil gyis// dus gcig cho nges du zhing
7045(): 'di skad smra// kye ma'o shin tu byams pa'i pha ma 'dra// kyi hud kyi hud mya ngan 'da' zhes grag/ slan chad rgyal ba mchog de mthong mi 'gyur// de bas myur du ding 'dir rings par 'dong // zhes bya ba
7046(): la sogs pa smras nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sems pa'i yid kyis rings pa rings par rtswa mchog gi grong khyer ga la ba der song ste/ de'i tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya stong phrag du ma dang / dge
7047(): slong ma khri phrag drug cu snyed dang / klu 'bum phrag ji snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa rnams dang / skye bo'i tshogs tshad med pa rnams dang / 'og
7048(): min gyi lha'i mthas gtugs pa mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba shes nas ci ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas
7049(): sA la zung gi gnas de nyid du lhags so// de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan cing byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'dus pa dpag tu med pa la
7050(): sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la yongs su smin pa'i bya ba mdzad cing / tsun das sbyar ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma la gsol bar mdzad nas/ dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' dang / kun tu rgyu ba bzang
7051(): la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i tha ma rnams btul ba bstan nas/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims khri shoms shig/ de nas de'i tshe kun dga'
7052(): bos mya ngan byed la smre sngags 'don cing mchi mas brnangs la dru zhing gdong la mchi ma 'dzag bzhin du shing sA la zung gi bar du bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i gzims khri bshams so// de'i tshetshigs
7053(): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// thub chen seng ge'i gzims khri ni// bsham pa'i tha ma deng lags te// mi mchog seng ge'i gzims khri ni// slan chad bsham du ma mchis so// mi mchog mya ngan 'das
7054(): gyur cing // 'jig rten mgon po 'das pa na// sA la mdzes tshal stongs pa yi// khrod 'dir bdag gis ci ltar blta// gang zhig sA la'i ljon tshal na// yun rings gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha// des ni rnam
7055(): 'dren ma mthong na// sran chad ci ltar gnas par 'gyur// kye ma'o 'du byed mi rtag ste// sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu lags// 'di 'dra'i ston pa dpa' bo yang // 'di nyid du ni 'da' bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das khri de nyid la
7056(): seng ge'i stabs kyis gzims ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur pa'i bsam
7057(): gtan gyi rnam par thar pa bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de tshe 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams kun// 'jig rten nyi ma nub po zhes// kun tu smre sngags 'don pa'i
7058(): sgrasma rgya mtsho ca co 'byin pa bzhin// sgra chen mngon par grags par gyur// sna tshogs mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// sprin gyis sa stengs khyab par byas// de tshe dad pa'i sems kyis ni// mchi ma'i thig pa
7059(): char bzhin bab// kha cig lcug phran bcad pa bzhin// sa stengs mngon par 'gyel bar gyur// lha dang mi rnams so so nas// nyam thag nga ro'i sgra 'byin cing // mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dag/ bdag med don la
7060(): blta bar gyur// de ltar 'jig rten khyab par snang // de tshe stong gsum ri dang sa chen rnams// ma bzod bzhin du g.yos par gyur pa 'dra// ljon shing nags tshal me tog rgyas pa rnams// dga' ba bzhin du g.yo zhing brgyal
7061(): ba bzhin// lo ma me tog rab gsal 'bras bu'i tshogs// sprin phung rlung gis bskyod par gyur pa bzhin// nam mkha'i ngos kun khyab par dus gcig byung // rgyal ba'i chos tshul zab mo ston pa yi// tshul rnams
7062(): mngon sum gsol bar byas pa 'dra// sna tshogs lha dang mi yi rol mo rnams// skye bo'i ngag dang lhan cig 'brel pa bzhin// sa stengs de tshe ca co 'byin par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis// /
7063(): bdag cag phyi ru mi mjed 'jig rten gshegs// tshad med dbang du 'gyur ba'i gnas bcas nas// 'phongs pa chos 'dod 'gro ba rnams kyang btul// bcom ldan sems can rnams la byams pa'i yum/
7064(): lha mi 'phongs pa'i mgon ma mchis par gyur// kyi hud 'gro ba'i dge ba'i myu gu yang // skye ba'i char ni 'bab pa'i dus ma mchis// 'jig rten stongs so ni ci ltar bgyid// sems can yang dag ye shes mi
7065(): mangs so// kyi hud ci phyir 'jig rten ngan pa 'di// bcom ldan bdag cag spangs nas mya ngan 'dar// zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i smre sngags du ma smra zhing thams cad kyis ris 'gro bskyed de mchod pa'i khyad par grangs med
7066(): pa dag gis mchod nas/ 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang nye bar song nas mchod pa chen po byas te/ de tshe dpag med thugs rje yi// stobs las byung ba'i me 'od kyis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil
7067(): 'khor gsal mdzad de// thugs rje'i stobs kyi sku gdung rnams// yung 'bru tsam du snang bar gyur// de nas dge slong ma 'gags pas// sku gdung thal bar bcas pa rnams// so sor byin te mchod par gyur//
7068(): skyes bu mchog de'i mche ba bzhi// brgya byin dang ni sgra sgrogs klu// tshig 'dzin ka li nga rgyal ba yi// nye bar mchod pa'i 'os su gyur// ser skya'i rgyal po shAg rigs dang // ma skyes dgra dang yang ba can// byi ru
7069(): tha dang cha la ka/ kA shi ka yi rgyal po rnams// khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze sogs// rgyal ba'i ring srel rtsod par gyur// de tshe bram ze bre 'o yi// mnyam par bgos te mchod pa byas// spyan dang sku gdung
7070(): mchod rten brgyad dag la// bdun ni 'dzam bu gling pas mchod pa thob// skyes bu mchog de bre'o gang zhig ni// grong khyer sgra sgrogs klu yi rgyal pos mchog/ mya ngan med rgyal skya nar
7071(): bu yis ni// mchod rten bdun po rgya chen spel bar byas// de yi mthu yis sa rnams thams cad du// rgyal ba'i mchod rten kun gyis brgyan par gyur// gsung rab dri med 'gro la phan byed rnams//
7072(): rgyal sras rnams kyis bsdu bar mdzad ces grag/ rab mkhyen thugs rjer ldan pa stobs bcu'i shugs mnga' ba// shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs ma ga d+ha ra ni byang chub pa// kA shi kar ni chos kyi 'khor la
7073(): bskor gyur nas// grong khyer rtswa can brten nas yongs su mya ngan 'das// rtsod pa'i dus na brtsad par bya ba rnams spangs shing // dpag med yon tan dpag pa'i gnas las 'das gyur kyang // gdul bya'o//
7074(): zo ltar 'dul byed mdzad pa bstan pa 'di// dpa' bo dpal ldan khyod kyis sgyu ma bstan pa snyam// de bas bdag gis snyan ngag mchod pas legs mchod cing // bstan pa'i sems kyis rnam pa kun/
7075(): phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te brgya dang gcig pa'o// / sdom la/ 'pho dang lhums zhugs bltams pa dang /
7076(): bzo dang rol rtse nges 'byung dang // dka' spyang drung gshegs bdud sde 'joms// byang chub chos 'khor mya ngan 'das/ dpal ldan thub pa'i mdzad pa mkha' ltar rgya che la// phyogs phyogs
7077(): bsams pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang // de ni tha dang 'phrin las rkyen gyis so sor shar// lam mchog dpal ldan brtan cing sems can don gyur pa// rmang byung mtha' yas yon tan mthu mnga' gcig
7078(): bu yi/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod pa bstan pa dag/ dpa' bo zhes byas snyan dag me long breng mdzes pas// brgyan par byas zhes phyogs phyogs kun tu gsal bar grags// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang rtso/
7079(): 'grus don ldan pa// bcu phrag gsum dang bzhi ni gnas khang der bzhag pa// rgya gar yul du lnga rig blo ldan du mas kyang // snyan dag rgya mtsho so so'i bro gros chu klung gis// 'gran par ma nus dum zhing dor ba bzhin du gyur// gas
7080(): can brod 'dir mkhas par rlom rnams smos ci dgos// de ltar dpag dka' rgyal bas lung bstan snyan dag mkhan// mtshungs med dpa' bo yang 'dir byung ba ma yin kyang // dus mthar rgyal dang de sras spyod la dang byed
7081(): pa rang byung rgyal ba mchog la rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i// mi phyed dang ldan bdag gi snyan dag blo gros ni// thugs rje ldan dang 'jam dbyangs rgyal sras ma pham pas// nye bar bsgrubs pas bcu phrag drug dang bdun lhag pa'i//
7082(): rmang byung mdzad pa gsal bar byas pa 'di yis ni// lam yangs dri med byang chub spyod tshul gsal byed cing // bstan bcos don gyi lus kyang yongs su rdzogs por gyur// de bas 'dir ni bdag gis 'bad
7083(): pa don yod par// 'gyur bar mkhas mchog rnams kyis brten par bya ba'i rigs// 'ga' zhig 'jig rten don ldan min kyang ngag tshig sdebs sbyor lhur len pa// gzhan dag rmad byung don gyi rjes
7084(): 'jug 'di yang blo gros ldan la yod// gnyis ka'i tshul la rnam par rmongs gyur rnam dpyod mi ldan 'jig rten dag/ 'jig rter snang byed 'od zer gyis ni reg par mi nus
7085(): stobs chung ba// rang gi lta ngan lhur len byed pas gzhung 'di smad par rus ma yin// lung dang rigs pa'i gtsug lag lam la 'gal bar gyur gang smad pa'i rigs// 'di ltar rmad byung
7086(): mdzad pa gsal byed pa'i// skyes rabs 'di byas nga rgyal mthu yis min// khe dang grags pa longs spyod 'drod phyir min// snyigs dus rgya cher 'gyur snyam 'di mi byas// rgyal ba'i spyod 'di 'jig
7087(): rten rmad byung la// tshul 'dis nam zhig 'gro phan byed 'gyur bar// bdag kyang 'gyur zhes smon pa'i mthu yis ni// byang chub spyod mchog rab tu gsal bar bstan// de las byung /
7088(): ba'i dge ba dri ma med pa des// mtha' yas 'gro rnams byang chub spyod la rab 'jug cing // ngag tshig gzungs dang yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs thob nas// the tshom gcod byed rgyal ba'i
7089(): dbang por 'gyur bar shog/ de ltar skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud// slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa'i sum cu so bzhi pa las/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang sa bcu mthar phyin pa'i sar sbyor
7090(): ba'i don du phyi ma drug cu rtsa bdun pa/ mdo du ma las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/ zab mo'i mdo sde rnams la chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ rang byung rdo rjes sbar ba yongs su rdzogs so//
